{PVTT}

[1,1]

yo vidhvastasamastabandhanagatissamyag vaśitve sthitaḥ, sarvvajñeyavisārinirmmalatamajñānaprabandhodayaḥ | sattvārthodyatamānasaśca suciraṃ śrīmañjunātho vibhuḥ, tannatvā bahuśodya vārttikagataṃ kiñcidvivakṣāmyahaṃ || ṭīkākṛtaḥ sakala eva guṇaḥ sa eṣa brūtetra vastugahanepi yadasmadādiḥ | "dignāga"dantamu"śa"lairviṣame'panīte labdheṣu vartmasu sukhaṃ kalabhāḥ prayānti || yo māmavajñāyati kopi guṇābhimānī jānātyasau kimapi taṃ prati naiṣa yatnaḥ | kaścid bhaviṣyati kadācidanena cārthī nānādhiyāñjagati janmavatāṃ hi nāntaḥ ||

[1,2]

yadyapi hi śāstrārambhe namaskāraślokopanyāsamantareṇa kāyavāṅamanobhiriṣṭadevatānamaskārakaraṇena puṇyopacayādavighnena śāstrasya parisamāptirbhavati |
tathāpi vyākhyātṛśrotṝṇāṃ stutipurassarayā pravṛttyā puṇyātiśayotpādāt pārārthyaṃ sadācārānupālanaṃ cālocya viśiṣṭadevatāpūjāślokamupanyastavānācāryaḥ | "vidhūtakalpanetyā"di |

[1,3]

yadā "samantabhadra"śabdo rūḍhyā bodhisattvavṛtto na gṛhyate tadeyaṃ buddhasya bhagavataḥ pūjā | sā ca dvidhā stotrataḥ praṇāmataśca | "namaḥ"śabdena praṇāmataḥ pariśiṣṭaiḥ stotrataḥ | stotramapi svārthasampattitaḥ parārthasampattitaḥ parārthasaṃpadupāyataśca tridhā | svārthasampannaśca parārthaṃprati samartho bhavatīviprathamaṃ pūrvvārddhena svārthasampaduktā | svārthasampacca kāyatrayalakṣaṇā tribhirvviśeṣairvviśiṣṭodbhāvitā | "āvaraṇa"prahāṇaviśeṣeṇa | "gāmbhīrya"viśeṣeṇa | "audārya"viśeṣeṇa ca |

[2,1]

tatrātmātmīyādyākārapravṛttā grāhyagrāhakākārapravṛttāśca traidhātukāścittacaittāḥ "kalpanā" | saiva "jāla"mbandhanātmakatvāt | tadvidhūtaṃ vidhvastaṃ savāsanaṃ punaranutpattidharmatvamāpāditaṃ yāsāṃ "mūrttī"nāntāstathoktāḥ | etenāvaraṇaprahāṇaviśeṣa uktaḥ | gāmbhīryaudāryaviśeṣau tu gambhīrodārapadābhyāmuktau | vidhūtakalpanājālā "gambhīrāḥ" śrāvakapratyekabuddhādyaviṣayatvāt | "udārā"ssakalajñeyasakalasatvārthavyāpanāt | "mūrttaya"strayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvikasāmbhogikanairmāṇikā yasya bhagavataḥ | asau vidhūtakalpanājāla"gambhīrodāramūrttiḥ" | bhadraṃ kalyāṇamabhyudayaniḥśreyasalakṣaṇaṃ | tat samantānniravaśeṣantadarthināṃ yathā bhavyambhavati yasmāt sakāśādasau "samantabhadraḥ" | etena parārthasampaduktā | asyāśca parārthasampadaḥ samantasphuraṇatviṣa ityanena siddhyupāya uktaḥ | tviṣo raśmaya iha tu yathāvasthitavastugrahaṇaevaṃ sādharmyeṇa dharmadeśanā | abhyudayaniḥśreyasasādhanaviṣayāstviṣa iva tviṣa ucyante | samanto niravaśeṣaḥ parārthasādhanopāyaḥ spharyate vyāpyate vinayebhyaḥ sākalyena kathanāt yābhistāḥ samantaspharaṇyastatratathābhūtāstviṣo dharmadeśanā yasya sa samantaspharaṇatviṭ | namaḥ śabdayogācca sarvvatra caturthī | bdo mahāyāne bodhisatvaviśeṣe rūḍha iti bodhisatvasyeyaṃ pūjā | padārthastu pūrvvavad yojyaḥ | ayantu viśeṣo vidhūtakalpanājālatvaṃ bodhisatvabhūmyāvaraṇaprahāṇato draṣṭavyaṃ | gāmbhīryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhapṛthagjanāviṣayatvataḥ | audāryantu bodhisatvama"ā "hātmyataḥ |
kāyatrayamapyanurūpaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ vidyata eva prakarṣagamanāttu buddhānāṃ vyavasthāpyata iti ||

[2,2]

santyeva hi santosya vā rtti kā khyasya śāstrasya grahītārastathāpi śrotṛdoṣabāhalyena santamapyupakāramasantamiva kṛtvā sūktābhyāsabhāvitacittattvameva śāstrārambhe kāraṇandarśayan | ayaṃ ca mahārthabhraṅśe hetudoṣastyaktuṃ yukta ityetacca vakroktyā kathayituṃ dvitīyaṃ ślokamāha |

[3,1]

"prāyaḥprākṛte"tyādi | atra caturvvidhaḥ śrotṛdoṣa udbhāvitaḥ | kuprajñatvamajñatvaṃ anarthitvaṃ amādhyasthyañca | "prāyaḥ" śabda okārānto bāhulyavacanaḥ | prāyo jano bhūyān janaḥ | "prākṛtasaktiḥ prākṛtā"ni bahiḥśāstrāṇi tatra "sakti"ryasyeti |
gamakatvād vyadhikaraṇo bahubrīhiḥ | prākṛtā vā saktiryasyeti | samānādhikaraṇa eva |
prākṛtaviṣayatvācca saktiḥ prākṛtā | anena kuprajñatvaṃ śrotṛdoṣa uktaḥ |

[3,2]

apratibalā śāstragrahaṇampratyasaktā prajñā yasya so"pratibalaprajñaḥ prāyo jana"
iti sambandhaḥ | anenājñatvamuktaṃ | "subhāṣitairnānarthyeva" kintu subhāṣitābhidhāyina"mvidveṣṭyapīrṣyāmalaiḥ parigataḥ" san | anarthī ca vidveṣṭi cetyarthaḥ | etena yathākramamanarthitvamamādhyasthyaṃ coktaṃ | atrāpi prāyo jana iti sambandhanīyaṃ |

[3,3]

anye tu prāyaśśabdasakārāntopyasti nipātaḥ | sa ca bāhulyenetyasmiṃstṛtīyārthe svabhāvādvarttata iti vyācakṣate | "īrṣyā" parasampattau cetaso vyāroṣaḥ | saiva malaścittamalinīkaraṇāt | vyaktibhedād bahuvacanaṃ | yata evantena kāraṇenāyamāripsito vā rti kā khyo granthaḥ | "paropakāraḥ" pareṣāmupakāraḥ | upakriyateneneti karaṇe ghañ | parān vopakarotīti paropakāraḥ "karmaṇyaṇ"pāṇiniḥ 3 | 2 | 1 | paropakāra "iti naḥ asmākaṃ cintāpi" nāsti | kathantarhi śāstraracanāyāṃ pravṛttirityāha | "cetaścira"mityādi | cirandīrghakālaṃ "sūktābhyāsena vivarddhitaṃ vya"sanaṃ saktistatparatā sūktābhyāsavivarddhitaṃ vyasanaṃ yasya cetasasta ttathoktaṃ | iti hetoratra vā rtti ka racanāyā"manubaddhaspṛhaṃ" jātābhilāṣaṃ ceta iti |
evameke vyācakṣate |

[3,4]

anye tvanyathā | kasmādayamācārya dha rmma kī rtti rvārtikanyāyena "pramāṇasamucca"yavyākhyāṃ karoti na punaḥ svatantrameva śāstramityasmin praśnāvasare prāha | "prāya"
ityādi | asya ślokasyāyaṃ samāsārthaḥ | "cinta"yā karuṇayā ca me pra mā ṇa sa mucca ya vyākhyāyāṃ "ceto" jātābhilāṣamiti | cintā karuṇā ca ācārya di gnā garacitaśāstrasyālpopakāritvena | alpopakāritvañca śrātṛjanāparādhena | padārthastūcyate | "prāya" iti bāhulyena "prākṛtasaktirjana" iti sambandhaḥ | prākṛta ucyateloke nīcaḥ | yasya duṣṭonvayaḥ | evantī rthi ka śāstrāṇi parapraṇītāni cācāryanīti śāstradūṣaṇāni | viparyastajñānaprabhavatvād duṣṭānvayād yataḥ prākṛtāni | teṣu saktiranurāgo yasya sa tathoktaḥ | kasmātpunaḥ prākṛtasaktirityāha | "apratibala"prajña iti | atosau durbhāṣitamapi subhāṣitamiti gṛhītvā prākṛte sajyate | apratibalaprajñatvādeva cācāryasubhāṣitāni svayaṃ yathāvadavaboddhumakṣamo doṣavattvena gṛhītvā tairācāryasubhāṣitai"ranarthī" | ācārye ca vidveṣavān bhavatītyāha | "kevala"mityādi |
na kevalamanarthī "subhāṣitai"rācāryīyai"rapi" tu "vidveṣṭyapīrṣyāmalaiḥ parigataḥ" sannācāryadi gnā gaṃ | kiṃ bhūtaṃ "sūktābhyāsavivarddhitavyasanaṃ" | vyavahitenāpi sambandho bhavatyeva |

[4,1]

"yena yasyābhisambandho dūrasthasyāpi tena sa" iti nyāyāt |

[4,2]

śobhanamuktaṃ "sūktaṃ" bhagavatpravacanantatrā"bhyāsa"statra "vivarddhitaṃ vyasa"nantatraivātyarthamāsaktatvaṃ yasyācāryadignāgasya sa tathoktaḥ | anenācāryadignāgasyopacitapuṇyajñānatvamāha | upacitapuṇyajñānā eva hi sūktābhyāsavivarddhitavyasanā bhavanti | yenā"'pratibalaprajña" ācāryasubhāṣitairanarthī prākṛtasaktiśca "tena" kāraṇenāyaṃ pra mā ṇa sa mucca yo na "paropakāraḥ" | upakaraṇamupakāro bhāve ghañ pāṇiniḥ 3 | 3 | 18 | para utkṛṣṭa upakāro nāsmād bhavatīti kṛtvā na paropakāro'lpastūpakārostyeva sa ca prāyaśabdena sūcita eva | "iti" śabdo hetau | asmāddhetorasmākaṃ "cintā" | mahārthamapīdaṃ śāstraṃ na bahūnāmupakārakaṃ jātantatkathamasyātyarthaṃ sāphalyaṃ kuryāmityevamākārā | ācārye ca bodhisatvakalpe vidveṣaḥ svalpopyanarthaheturatohamācāryanīteraviparītaprakāśanenācārye bahumānamutpādya tatonarthahetorjanannivarttayiṣyāmītyevaṃ duḥkhaviyogecchākārā karuṇāpyapiśabdāt | itya"trānubaddhaspṛhami"ti dvitīyeneti śabdena cintākaruṇayorhetutvamāha | ityābhyāṃ cintākaruṇābhyāṃ "cetaściraṃ" dīrghrakāla"matra"
pra mā ṇa sa mu cca ya vyākhyābhūta pra mā ṇa vā rtti ka racanāyā"manubaddhaspṛhaṃ" santānena pravṛttecchamiti ||

[4,3]

yadi pra mā ṇa sa mu cca ya vyākhyāṃ cikīrṣurācāryadharmakīrttiḥ kasmāt svātantryeṇānumānaṃ vyavasthāpayatītyāśaṅkāmapanayannāha | "arthānarthet"yādi | artho hitamahitamanarthastayo"rvivecana"nta"syānumānāśrayatvā"danumānamāśrayo yasyeti vigrahaḥ |
anumānena hyarthānarthau niścityānumānapṛṣṭhabhāvinā prabandhapravṛttena jñānenārthānarthau yathākramaṃ prāpti parihārārthamvibhāgena vyavasthāpayati | tasmādanumānāśrayamarthānarthavivecanaṃ | "tadvipratipatte"riti tasminnanumāne vipratipatte"stadvyavasthāpanāyahi"tyevameke vyācakṣate |

[5,1]

atra tvidaṃ cintyaṃ |

[5,2]

yadi tāvadevamavadhāryate"rthā'narthavive"canasyaivānumānāśrayatvāditi | tanna |
arthānarthābhyāmanyasyāpyupekṣaṇīyasya tṛtīyasya viṣayasya yadvivecanantasyāpyanumānāśrayatvāt arthānarthavivecanasya cāniyatatvāt | pratyakṣāśrayatvamanivāritamiti kotiśayonumānasya khyāpito yena tadādau vyutpādyate | athāpyevamavadhāryate |
arthānarthavivecanasyānumānāśrayatvādeveti | tathāpyayuktamavadhāraṇaṃ | arthānarthavivecanasya pratyakṣāśrayatvādapi | tathā hyarthānarthau vibhaktarūpāveva pratyakṣe pratibhāsete |
tacca pratyakṣamabhyāsātiśayasamāsāditapāṭavatayā apasāritabhrāntinimittaṃ pāścātyamarthānarthavivecanavikalpaṃ janayati | etade"va" hi pratyakṣasyārthānarthavive canāśrayatvaṃ yadarthānarthau vibhāgenānubhūya yathānubhavantatra niścayajananaṃ |

[5,3]

na ca śakyamvaktuṃ pāścātyenaivārthānarthau vibhaktāviti | vikalpena vastusvarūpasyāgrahaṇād grahaṇe vā vikalpakatvahānervikalpānubaddhasya pramātuḥ spaṣṭārthapratibhāsitvavirodhāt |

[5,4]

yatra tu kvacid viṣaye pāṭavābhāvād bhrāntinimittāpanayanāsamarthaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tatrānumānānniścayaḥ prārthyate na sarvatra | tasmāt pratyakṣe svataḥ parataśca prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ | niścāyayiṣyate cāyamartho dvitīya pariccheda iti neha pratanyate |

[5,5]

avaśyaṃ ca pratyakṣasyābhyāsabalādapasāritabhrāntinimittasya yathānubhavanniścayajananāt svatorthānarthavivecanāśrayatvameṣṭavyamanyathānumānasyāpi vyavasthā na syād dhūmāderliṅgasyāniścayāt | dhūmāderapyanumānāt pratipattāvanavasthā syāt |
tatrāpi liṅgāntarasyānumānāntareṇa niścayāditi |

[5,6]

yadi ca pratyakṣamarthānarthavivecanasyānāśrayastadā śāstrakāreṇa prakaraṇāntare yaduktaṃ | "hitāhitaprāptiparihārayorniyamena samyagjñānapūrvakatvādi"tyādi tad bādhyeta | tathā "na hyasyāmarthamparicchidye"tyādi | punaścoktaṃ"dṛṣṭeṣu samvitsāmarthyabhāvinaṃ smaraṇādi" tyādi |

[6,1]

tasmādanyathā vyākhyāyata ityapare | ācārya di gnā ga praṇītaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇādikamartho yuktatvāt | tī rthi ka praṇītaṃ na yuktatvādanarthastayorvivecanaṃ yuktāyuktatvena vyavasthāpanantasyānumānāśrayatvāt | anumānameva hyāśritya lakṣaṇavākyānāṃ yuktāyuktatvaṃ vyavasthāpyannaṃ pratyakṣantasyāvicārakatvāditi |

[6,2]

tadapyayuktaṃ | yato lakṣaṇavākyānāṃ na svarūpeṇa yuktāyuktatvamapi tvarthadvāreṇa | sa cārtho yathānumānena yuktaḥ pratīyate tathā pratyakṣeṇāpi | tathā ca vakṣyati |

[6,3]

"pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva sidhyati | "pra0 vā0
tathā

[6,4]

"pakṣadharmatvaniścayaḥ pratyakṣata ityādi | "

[6,5]

yopi manyate | satyamarthānarthavivecanaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ kriyata eva | kevalaṃ yadarthānarthavivecanasyānumānāśrayatvamucyate tatpratyakṣaviṣayepi vivādasambhave sati nānumānādanyannirṇṇayanibandhanamastyatonumānasya prādhānyāttadvivecanāśrayatvamuktamiti |

[6,6]

etadapyayuktaṃ | yataḥ pratyakṣasya sa eva viṣayo vyavasthāpyate yo niścito na ca niścite vivādaḥ sambhavatītyayuktametat |

[6,7]

anyastvāha | arthānarthavivecanamanumānādeva bhavati na pratyakṣāt | yato yerthānarthā anubhūtaphalā anubhūyamānaphalā vā na te pravṛttiviṣayā niṣpannatvāt phalasya |
tasmādanāgatārthakriyārthantatsamartheṣvarthānartheṣu pravṛttiḥ | na ca tatsāmarthyanteṣu pratya kṣeṇa pratīyate yena pravṛttiviṣayatvaṃ syāt | pravṛttisādhyārthakriyāyā bhāvitvena tatsāmarthyakurvadrūpatāsyāpi bhāvitvāt | tasmāt pūrvānubhūtārthakriyāsādhanavastusādharmyāt pratyakṣeṣvapi vastuṣvanāgataphalayogyatāniścayo na pratyakṣatastenānumānādevārthānarthavivecanamiti |

[6,8]

tadapyayuktaṃ | yato yadi sā yogyatā kurvadrūpatā rtheṣu varttamānakālabhāvinī tadābhyāsātiśayavatāpi pratyakṣeṇa niścīyeta | liṅgavat | athānāgataiva sā tadānumānenāpi na niścīyetānāgaterthenumānābhāvāditi vakṣyati |

[6,9]

etena yaducyate "pravṛttiviṣayavastuprāpaṇaṃ pratyakṣānumānayoraviśiṣṭami" ti tadapi nirastaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ | anāgatārthakriyāsamartho hi pravṛttiviṣayo na ca tatsāmarthyaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ niścīyata ityuktaṃ | paricchinnaśca pravṛttiviṣaya iṣyate na ca santānaḥ pratyakṣādikṣaṇena paricchinnastatkathaṃ pravṛttiviṣayaḥ |

[7,1]

athaikasmin kṣaṇe pratyakṣaṃ pravṛttamapi niścayavaśāt kṣaṇasāmānyaviṣayatvenaikasantativiṣayantadayuktaṃ | pratibhāsamānenaiva hi viṣayeṇa niścayavaśāt pratyakṣaṃ sāmānyaviṣayaṃ vyavasthāpyate na paramārthataḥ | svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt | yathā liṃgaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ | tathā hi pratibhāsamānamidaṃ dhūmasvalakṣaṇantārṇṇamvā pārṇṇamvānyadvā sambhavati | tatra ca viśeṣānavadhāraṇena kṣaṇamātraniścayena ca svalakṣaṇaviṣayamapi sāmānyaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate | pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino niścayasya pratyakṣaviṣayānusāritvāt | na punarekakṣaṇaviṣayampratyakṣamevaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate yato yaḥ pratyakṣe pratibhāsate kṣaṇo nāsau niścito nāpi pūrvakṣaṇarūpo parakṣaṇarūpo vā sambhavati bhinnakālatvāt | tat kathantatra viśeṣānavadhāraṇena kṣaṇamātraniścayena ca kṣaṇasāmānyaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyeta | pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ sa evāyamiti niścayasya sāmānyaviṣayatvepi na santānaviṣayatvaṃ | pratipannapratīyamānayorviṣayīkaraṇenānāgatakṣaṇāniścayād vijātīyavyāvṛttarūpaviṣayatvāccāta eva kṣaṇasya pratibhāsepyayaṃ ghaṭa iti jñāpananiścayaḥ |

[7,2]

nanu yadyarthakriyāsamartho vastusantāno pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ paricchidyate |
kathantarhi tayoḥ pravarttakatvam | vastusvarūpamātraparicchedāditi brūmaḥ | tathā hyagnyādikamvastvekatra prabandhavṛttyā dāhādyarthakriyāsamarthaṃ pratyakṣeṇa niścinvannanyatrāpi deśādāvetadupalabhyamānaṃ prabandhavṛttyaivedṛgvidhārthakārīti niścāyayati |
sa eva punaḥ kālāntare phalārthī tatsvarūpamparyeṣamāṇognyādikaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā tadevedamiti niścayapūrvvakaṃ pravarttate | tenāyamarthastatsvarūpamātraparicchede pramāṇavyāpāro na prabandhavṛttiparicchede | nāpyarthakriyāsāmarthyaparicchede pūrvamevāsya sarvasya paricchinnatvāt | tena pratyakṣānumānayoḥ pravarttakattvaṃ yuktameva |
kathantarhyarthānarthavivecanasyānumānāśrayatvamuktam | ... ... ... ... ... ... ta naivātrātmanābhipretamapi tu caturāryasatyaṃ | yato muktyarthino vayaṃ muktiśca caturāryasatyadarśanād bhavatīti bhagavatoktaṃ | taddarśanañca bhāvanābhyāsato niṣpadyate | bhāvanāyāṃ pravṛttiśca caturāryasatyaniścayena |
tanniścayaśca parokṣatvādanumānādeva bhavatītyarthānarthavivecanāśrayatvamanumānasyaiva |

[7,3]

artho nirodhamārgāvupādeyatvādanartho duḥkhasamudayau tyājyatvāt | yadvārthaḥ paramārthasatyamanarthaḥ saṃvṛttisatyaṃ tayoryad vivecanaṃ svarūpeṇa vyavasthāpanantasyānumānāśrayatvāt | arthānarthavivecanakāri ca sarvaṃ jñānaṃ na svalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇātyapi tvadhyavasyatīti bhrāntameva | tena yadi śabdādijñānamarthānarthavivecanāśrayamiṣyate tadapi bhrāntatvādapramāṇameva | ata eva na tasyeha vyutpādyatāprasaṃgaḥ | anumānasyatu bhrāntatve satyapi pratibandhavaśāt prāmāṇyaṃ | śabdādijñānasya tvevaṃ prāmāṇyebhyupagamyamāne'numānentarbhāvādapakṣadharmasyāgamakatvādarthānarthavivecanāśrayatvamanumānasyaiva |

[8,1]

nanu pratibandhavaśādanumānasya prāmāṇye nityādivikalpasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ syāt kṣaṇikādyarthe pratibandhād | athādhyavasitārthapratibandhena prāmāṇyaṃ maṇiprabhāyāmmaṇijñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ syāt | tadapi hyadhyavasitena maṇinā sambaddhantasmāt satyapi pratibandhe yaddeśādisambandhitayā yorthodhyavasitastaddeśādisambandhitayā santānaikatvādhyavasāyāt tamarthaṃ prāpayadanumānajñānaṃ pramāṇameva | na sarvaṃ jñānaṃ |

[8,2]

"arthānarthavive"canaṃ cādhigamarūpamākāronumānampramāṇatvāt | yadvā liṅgamevānumānamatorthānarthavivecanasyā"numānāśrayatvaṃ | tadvipratipatte"riti tasminnanumāne sammohāt | "tadvyavasthāpanāya" tasyānumānasya vipratipattyapanayanenāvasthāpanā"yāha"
sū tra kā raḥ |

[8,3]

"pakṣadharma" ityādi |

[8,4]

yadyanumānaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ kasmāt pakṣadharma ityādinā hetumeva vyavasthāpayatīti cet || adoṣoyaṃ | hetuvipratipattidvāreṇānumāne vipratipattestadvyutpattidvāreṇaiva tasya vyavasthāpanaṃ | anumānajñānaṃ ca trirūpaliṃgādutpadyamānaṃ lokapratītamevāto vipratipattiḥ pratītyaiva nirākriyate |

[8,5]

yadvānumānaśabdena yadā liṅgamevocyate tadā tadvipratipatterhetumeva vyavasthāpayatītyadoṣaḥ |

[8,6]

atra śloke liṃgasya lakṣaṇaṃ saṃkhyāniyamaḥ saṃkhyāniyamakāraṇamvipakṣanivṛttiścoktā | "pakṣadharmastadaṅśena vyāpta" iti lakṣaṇaṃ |

[8,7]

tasya "pakṣa"syāṅśaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭo "dha"rmastena "vyāpta" evetyavadhāraṇaṃ | "tridhaive"ti saṃkhyāniyamaḥ | "avinābhāvaniyamādi"ti saṃkhyāniyamakāraṇaṃ |
triṣvevāvinābhāvasya niyatatvādityarthaḥ | "hetvābhāsāstatopara" iti vipakṣanivṛttiḥ |
tasmāddhetutrayādanye hetvābhāsāḥ |

[9,1]

nanu yadi tadaṃśavyāptirdṛṣṭānta eva gṛhyate | tadānumānasyotthānanna syāt |
sādhyadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇa hetorvyāptyagrahāt | tadā ca pakṣadharmo heturiti vyarthaṃ lakṣaṇamagamakatvāt | sarvopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptigrahaṇepi nānumānasya prāmāṇyaṃ syāt | vyāptigrāhakapramāṇapratipannaviṣayatvena smṛtirūpatvāt | pakṣadharmo heturiti ca na vaktavyantadaṅśavyāptivacanenaiva gatatvāt | tadaṅśavyāptibalena ca pakṣadharmasya gamakatvannaṃ pakṣe sattāmātreṇa tatrasthasya gardabhāderagamakatvāt | tasmānnaṃ pakṣadharmo heturiti pṛthag lakṣaṇamvaktavyaṃ |

[9,2]

taduktam |

[9,3]

"anyathānupapannatvaṃ yatra tatra trayeṇa kiṃ | nānyathānupapannatvaṃ yatra tatra trayeṇa kimiti | "

[9,4]

kiṃ cānupalabdhestāvanna pakṣadharmatvamanyopalabdheḥ puruṣadharmatvāt | svabhāvahetośca dharmirūpatvāt kāryahetorapi svātantryeṇa dharmyanapekṣatvāt | na ca kalpitasya pakṣadharmasya kāryasvabhāvahetutvaṃ sādhyavyāptiśceti na pakṣadharmo heturiti vaktavyaṃ |

[9,5]

tathā yadi hetutvena tritvaṃ vyāptantadā hetutvasyāniyatatvādanyatrāpi saṃyogyādiṣu hetutvamanivāritameveti tridhaivetyavadhāraṇaṃ na yujyate |

[9,6]

atha hetutvaṃ tritvena vyāptantadā tritvasya hetāvaniyatatvāt kāryādīnāmapyahetutvantataśca kāryādereva hetutvamiti na ghaṭate |

[9,7]

kiṃ ca | yadyanupalambhasya sādhyapratibandho nāsti tadā'pratibaddhopi heturgamaka iti "tridhaiva sa" iti niyamo na ghaṭate |

[9,8]

atha pratibandhosti tadā kāryasvabhāvayorevāntarbhāvāt tridhaiva sa heturiti tathāpi na yujyate | "hetvābhāsāstato'para" iti na yuktaṃ hetvantarasyātyantaparokṣatvānna tadabhāvaḥ pratyakṣādiniścita ityayuktamuktaṃ |

[9,9]

"pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetustridhaiva saḥ |
avinābhāvaniyamāddhetvābhāsāstato'para iti" ||

[9,10]

atrocyate | yadyapi sādhyasādhanayorvyāptiḥ sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratipannā tathāpi na vyāptigrahaṇamātrādiha sādhyadharmiṇīdānīṃ sādhyadharma iti viśeṣeṇa niścayo bhavatyanumānāttu syāt | tasmād pratipannaviśiṣṭadeśādisambandhisādhyārthapratipādakatvena pramāṇamevānumānantacca pakṣadharmatve satyeva bhavati nānyathā | yato nānyadeśādisthena sādhyadharmiṇānyadeśādisthaḥ sādhanadharmaḥ sambaddho'to viśiṣṭadeśādyavacchinnasādhanāvagatisāmarthyādeva viśiṣṭadeśādyavacchinnasādhyapratītirevānumānaṃ | na tu dhamamātrādagnimātrapratītistasyā vyāptigrāhakapramāṇaphalatvāt | nāpi yatra sādhanadharmastatra sādhyadharma ityaviśeṣeṇāvagamepi sādhanasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ sidhyati sādhyadharmidharmatayā viśeṣeṇāpratīteḥ sāmānyenābhidhānāt |
tasmād viśiṣṭadeśādyavacchinnasādhyapratipattaye pakṣadharmatvandarśanīyaṃ |

[10,1]

tena yaduktaṃ "yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgnirityanenaiva pakṣadharmasyoktatvāt pradeśaviśeṣegnisiddhyarthandhūmaścātreti na vaktavyamuktārthatvādi"ti tadapāstaṃ ||

[10,2]

nanvevamanumānasyaṃ prāmāṇye'pakṣadharmmamapyanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ syādapratipannādhigamāt | yathā'dhastānnadīpūrandṛṣṭvoparivṛṣṭyanumānaṃ | tathā śiśurayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ mātāpitrorbrāhmaṇyāditi | taduktaṃ |

[10,3]

"nadīpūropyadho deśe dṛṣṭaḥ sannuparisthitāṃ | niyamyo gamayatyevavṛttāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ niyāmikāṃ || evaṃ pratyakṣadharmatvaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ hetvaṅgamiṣyate | tatpūrvoktānyadharmatvadarśanād vyabhicāryate || pitrośca brāhmaṇatvena putrabrāhmaṇatānumā | sarvalokaprasiddhā na pakṣadharmamapekṣate || kleśena pakṣadharmatvaṃ yastatrāpi prakalpayet | na saṃgaccheta tasyaitallakṣyeṇa saha lakṣaṇaṃ || yathā lokaprasiddhaṃ ca lakṣaṇairanugamyate | lakṣyasya lakṣaṇamevaṃ syāt tadapūrvanna sādhyata iti | "

[10,4]

atrocyate | kasmāduparyeva vṛṣṭyanumānaṃ nānyatra | pūrasya tatsambandhitvāditi cet | yadyevaṃ yatoyaṃ nadīpūra āyātastatra vṛṣṭyanumānannānyatra vyabhicārāt | parasya ca tatsambandhitvaniścaye sati gamakatvamanyathā'naikāntikatvaṃ syāt | tathā śiśurayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ mātāpitrorbrāhmaṇyādityatrāpi yasyaiva śiśorbrāhmaṇyaṃ sādhyantasyaiva mātāpitṛbrāhmaṇyalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ sambandhī gamako na mātāpitṛbrāhmaṇyamātramanyasambandhimātāpitṛbrāhmaṇyasyāgamakatvāt | tenāsyāpi pakṣadharmatve sati gamakatvamato na kleśena pakṣadharmatvakalpanā | yadvā ya evāvyabhicāre nimittaṃ sa eva heturyathā dhūmasyāgnikāryatvaṃ brāhmaṇabhūtamātāpitṛjanyatvaṃ ca śiśorbrāhmaṇyanimittamiti tadeva heturyuktonyasya tatkalpanā kleśena syāditi |
tathā na candrodayāt samudravṛddhyanumānaṃ candrodayāt pūrvaṃ paścādapitadanumānaprasaṅgāt | candrodayakāla eva tadanumānantadaiva vyāptergṛhītatvāditi cet |

[11,1]

yadyevantatkālasambandhitvameva sādhyasādhanayoḥ | tadā ca sa eva kālo dharmīṃ tatraiva ca sādhyānumānaṃ candrodayaśca tatsambandhīti kathamapakṣadharmatvam | atha kālo neṣyate na tadā tarhyetadanumānamvyabhicārād | atha bau ddhā nāmetadanumānannāsti kālābhāvāt |

[11,2]

tadayuktaṃ | pūrvāhṇādipratyayaviṣayasya mahābhūtaviśeṣasya kāla ityabhidheyasyābhyupagamāt | evamanyatrāpi pakṣadharmatvaṃ yojyaṃ |

[11,3]

nanu bhavatu pakṣadharmatve satyanumānasya prāmāṇyantathāpi pakṣadharma iti pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na karttavyantadaṅśavyāptavacanenaiva gatatvāt |

[11,4]

satyaṃ | kintvapakṣadharmasyāpi sādhyavyāptasya hetutvanirāsārthaṃ kṛtaṃ | mahānasādidṛṣṭadhūmādi codadhāvagnyanumāne |

[11,5]

nanu vyāptasya liṅgatvaṃ na ca mahānasādigato dhūma udadhau sādhyenāgninā vyāptaḥ |

[11,6]

satyaṃ | kevalaṃ vyāpto heturityetāvanmātrakeṇa lakṣaṇavacanena yatraiva vyāpyadharmastatraiva vyāpakadharmānumānamityetanna labhyate | tataścānyatrāpi sādhyānumānāśaṅkānivṛttyarthaṃ pakṣadharmavacanaṃ | anupalabdherapi pakṣadharmatvamastyeva | yadā hyanyasya bhūtalāderupalambhajananayogyataivānyānupalabdhistadā yogyatānyabhūtalādisvabhāveti kathannānupalabdheḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ | kṛtakatvāderapyevaṃ śabdādidharmatvaṃ | puruṣadharmarūpāyā apyanupalabdheranyabhūtalādikāryatvameva paramārthatastaddharmatvantadāyattatvāt | dhūmāderapi kāryasyaivaṃ pradeśādidharmatvaṅkevalamvikalpena teṣāṃ sambandhisvarūpameva pakṣasyāyaṃ dharma iti vyavasthāpyate |

[11,7]

hetutvaṃ ca dhūmāderavinābhāvena vyāptamajñātāvinābhāvasyāgamakatvenā hetutvāt | avinābhāvaśca kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ vyāptaḥ | vidhipratiṣedhayośca sādhyatve satyarthāntaravidhāne kāryahetoḥ svabhāvahetoḥ pratiṣedhe cānupalabdhestena hetustritvena vyāpto'tosau trividha eva bhavati | na tu trividho hetureva kāryāderapyajñātasyāhetutvāt | kāraṇavyāpakānulabdyorapi pratibandhādeva gamakatvaṃ |
tathā hi | yata eva pratibandhāt kāryavyāpye kāraṇavyāpake gamayataḥ | tata eva pratibandhāt kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī kāryavyāpyābhāvaṅgamayataḥ | svabhāvānupalabdhāvapi yadā ghaṭāderupalambhajananayogya ātmā upalabdhirucyatenyahetusākalye copalambhāvyabhicārādupalabdhiḥ sattā tadānayostādātmyantenātrāpi pakṣe pratibandhanibandhanameva gamakatvaṃ | na cānupalabdheḥ kāryādihetāvantarbhāvaḥ svasādhye pratibandhānapekṣatvāt | hetośca sakāśāt sādhyapratītistadāyattatve sati syāt | na ca saṃyoge sati tadāyattatvamasaṃyuktānāṃ saṃyogābhāvāt | saṃyuktānāmapi na saṃyogatastadāyattatā'nyata eva saṃyuktānāmutpatteḥ | evaṃ samavāyepi vācyaṃ | tasmāttadāyattatvantādātmyatadutpattibhyāntena kāryasvabhāvānupalambhabahirbhūtānāṃ saṃyogyādīnāmahetutvantadāyattatvābhāvenāvinābhāvābhāvāt |

[12,1]

atha tadāyattatvamasti tadeva tarhi gamakatve nimittamiti sa hetustridhaiveti siddhaṃ |

[12,2]

nanu tathāpi kathamanumānasyotthānannirvikalpakapratyakṣeṇa dharmadharmitatsambandhāgrahāt svātantryeṇa vastudvayādhigateḥ |

[12,3]

ucyate | savikalpakenāpi dhūmapradeśādīnāṃ dharmadharmibhāvagrahaṇamuparyuparibhāvapratibhāsa eva | sa ca nirvikalpakepyasti kevalaṃ vikalpetarayorjñānayorullekhānullekhakṛto viśeṣaḥ | tacca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ yathāgṛhītaviṣayamevedamihāstīdaṃ nāstīti vidhipratiṣedhaṃ janayat pramāṇamiṣyate | tena dharmadharmiṇoḥ svarūpaniścayaḥ sambandhaniścayapratyakṣakṛta eva bhavatīti ||

[12,4]

pakṣadharma ityuktaṃ | "sūtre" pakṣadharmaśca dharmadharmisamudāyaḥ | na ca prativādinaṃ prati samudāyadharmatvaṃ hetoḥ siddhantena sa sarvo heturasiddhaḥ syāt | siddhau vānumānasya vaiyarthyamityāha |

[12,5]

"pakṣo dharmīti" | avayave samudāyopacārāt | ekadeśatvaṃ ca samudāyopacāranimittantena na dṛṣṭāntadharmī pakṣa ucyate |

[12,6]

ī śva ra se naḥ prāha | dharmidha rmmo heturityetāvad vaktavyaṃ "pra""yojanābhāvādanupacāra iti" | tadāha | "prayojane"tyādi | netyādinā pratiṣedhati | na prayojanasyābhāvaḥ | kathaṃ | "sarvadharmidharmapratiṣedhārthatvā"dupacārasyetyapekṣyate | asatyupacāre dharmidharma iti nirdeśaḥ kāryaḥ | tathā ca dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇopi dharmo hetuḥ syāt | upacāre tu sarvasya dharmiṇo dharmaḥ pratiṣiddho bhavati || katha miti cedāha | "tadekadeśatvādi" | tathā hi samudāyasyāvayaveṣūpacāraḥ | tadekadeśatvaṃnibandhanatvena na sarvatropacāraḥ |
sādhyadharmī ca tadekadeśatvāt pakṣasyāvayavatvāt pakṣopacārayogyastasya yo dharmastatpratipattyarthamupacārakaraṇaṃ | "tathā cetyupacārayogyadharmipratipattau cākṣuṣatvādiparihāraḥ" | ādiśabdāt kākasya kārṣṇyādityādi || cakṣurvijñānaviṣayatvāditi hetvarthastadāyaṃ heturanaikāntikatvāt tadaṅśavyāptivacanenaiva nirasta iti kimupacāreṇa | atha cakṣurvijñānajanakatvāditi hetvarthastadāpi tajjanakatvaṃ sattvameva | tacca śabdepyastīti na dṛṣṭāntadharmidharma evāyamiti kaścit ||

[13,1]

tadayuktaṃ | cakṣurvijñānajanakatvaṃ hi sattvaviśeṣaḥ sa ca ghaṭādīnāmeva dharmo na śabdasyātastannivṛtyarthamupacārakaraṇaṃ | na tvasatyapyupacāre vyāptasya liṃgatvaṃ | na ca śabdānityattvena cākṣuṣatvaṃ vyāptantatkathamasya liṅgatvaṃ ||

[13,2]

naiṣa doṣaḥ | anityatvamātreṇa hyasya vyāptatvantacca śabdepyastīti kathamahetutvaṃ syāt ||

[13,3]

"dharmavacanene"tyādi | dharmastadaṃśena vyāpta iti kevalena "dharmavacanenā"pi dharmiparatantratvād dharmasyāvaśyamasau dharmiṇamākṣipati | tena "dharmi"ṇa "āśraya"ṇamāśrayaḥ "parigra"hastasya "siddhau" satyāṃ yadetaddharmidharma ityatra dharmigrahaṇantasya sāmarthyāt pratyāsattiriha vivakṣiteti gamyate | vyāptivivakṣāyāṃ dharmigrahaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt | tasmād "dharmivacanasāmarthyāt pratyāsattiḥ" siddhā | pratyāsattiśca sādhyadharmiṇa eva tatra prathamaṃ hetūpadarśanāt | tayā pratyāsattyā sādhyadharmiparigraho bhaviṣyati | na pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmiparigrahaḥ kutoḥ | dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇopi na kevalaṃ sādhyadharmiṇaḥ pratyāsatteḥ | kadācid vyāptidarśanapūrvake prayoge dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇopi prathamaṃ hetusadbhāvopadarśanāt ||

[13,4]

yadi na pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmisiddhiḥ pāriśeṣyāttarhi bhaviṣyati | yatasta"daṃśavyāptyā" hetubhūtayā "dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi" dharmasya "sattvasiddhiḥ" | na hi dṛṣṭāntamantareṇa hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pradarśayituṃ śakyata iti manyate | tato dharmigrahaṇād vyatiricyamānāt "sādhyadharmiṇa eva parigrahaḥ" | tadaṃśeneti ca tacchabdena dharmavacanākṣipto dharmī sambadhyata iti tatsambandhanārthamapi dharmigrahaṇaṃ nāśaṅkanīyaṃ ||

[13,5]

yatra prayojanānantaraṃ na sambhavati sa pāriśeṣyasya viṣayo | dharmivacanasya tvanyadapi prayojanaṃ sambhāvyata iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādyāha | siddhe tadaṅśavyāptyā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve punarddharmiṇo "vacana"ndṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturiti"niyamārthamāśaṃkyate" | tataśca cākṣuṣatvādaya eva hetavaḥ syurna kṛtakatvādaya ityaniṣṭameva syāt | tasmādupacāraḥ karttavya iti |

[14,1]

kiṃ punaḥ kvacit ta rkka śā stre dṛṣṭaṃ niyamārthamvacanamityata āha | "sajātīya eve"tyādi | tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye sa heturityatrā cā ryī ye hetulakṣaṇe | "sajātīya eva sattvami"tyavadhāraṇena siddhepi "vijātīyād" vipakṣāddheto"rvyatireke" yadetadasaṃstadatyaya iti "sādhyābhāve'sattvavacanaṃ" tanniyamārthamā cā rye ṇa vyākhyātamasatyeva nāstitā yathā syānnānyatra na viruddha iti | tathehāpi dharmivacanambhāvaniyamārthamāśaṃkyate ||

[14,2]

nanvapakṣadharmasyāhetutvānna niyamārthā śaṅkā | yato vyāptasya hetutvaṃ na cānyadharmisthena sādhyadharmeṇānyadharmisthaḥ sādhanadharmo vyāptastasmāttadaṃśavyāptahetuvacanasāmarthyādeva sādhyadharmiparigraho bhaviṣyatītyata āha | "sāmarthyādityādi" |
anantaroditāt "sāmarthyādartha"sya sādhyadharmiparigrahalakṣaṇasya bhavati pratītiḥ paṭudhiyāṃ śrotṝṇāṃ kintvaśabdakamarthaṃ svayamanusaratāṃ "pratipattigauravaṃ" syāt | ata upacāramātrāt svayamaśabdakārthābhyūharahitād dharmidharma ityanena "pakṣadharma" iti samānanirdeśāt pratipattigauravaṃ ca "parihṛta"mbhavati | ca śabdenaitadāha | ye paropadeśamākāṃkṣanti tairayamartho lakṣaṇavacanād boddhavya iti |

[14,3]

yathālakṣaṇaṃ pratīterapakṣadharmo na heturiti kuta iyamāśaṅkā | tatasteṣāṃ lakṣaṇānusāriṇāṃ niyamāśaṃkāparihārārthañcopacārakaraṇamiti || iha vyavacchedaphalatvācchabdaprayogasyāvaśyamevāvadhārayitavyaṃ | ṣaṣṭhīsamāsācca pakṣadharma iti nānyassamāsassambhavati | tathā ca pakṣasyaiva dharmma ityevamavadhāraṇāt tadaṃśavyāptirvirudhyata iti viruddhalakṣaṇatāmudbhāvayannāha |

[14,4]

"pakṣasya dharmatve ta"mpakṣaṃ "viśeṣaṇa"manyato vyavaccheda"mapekṣata" iti | tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya dharmasyānyatra pakṣīkṛtādanyasmin sapakṣe'nanuvṛttiḥ | tathā hi yaḥpakṣeṇa viśeṣyate sa pakṣasyaiva bhavati | yathā devadattasya putraḥ | tato"nyatrānanuvṛtterasādhāraṇatā" sādhāraṇatā na "syāt" | tadaṅśavyāptivirodha iti yāvat |
sādhāraṇatayā tadaṃśavyāptipratipādanāt | tato yadi pakṣadharmo na tadaṃśavyāptiratha tadaṃśavyāptirna pakṣadharma iti vyāhataṃ lakṣaṇamiti |

[15,1]

nanu yadi sādhyadharmiṇi sādhanadharmasya sādhyavyāptirna gṛhītā tadā hetoranaikāntikatvamatha gṛhītā kiṃ dṛṣṭānte heto ranvayena kathañca pakṣadharmasya tadaṃśavyāptirvirudhyate sādhyadharmiṇyapi vyāpteḥ pratipannatvāt | sarvapadārthasya kṣaṇikatve sādhye sattvalakṣaṇasya vā hetoḥ ko dṛṣṭāntenvayaḥ | tasmāt svasādhyapratibandhāddhetustena vyāptaḥ sidhyati | sa ca viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmiṇyapi sidhyatīti na kiṃcidanyatrānvayāpekṣayā | tatkathamidamāśaṃkitamanyatrānanavṛtterasādhāraṇateti |

[15,2]

sattyaṃ yadyapi sādhyadharmiṇi hetoḥ sādhyavyāptimantareṇa nānumānasyotthānantathāpi dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhagrāhakapramāṇamantareṇa na sādhyadharmmiṇyapi vyāptiḥ sidhyatīti tadarthamidamāśaṃkitaṃ |

[15,3]

yattūcyate kāryahetvapekṣayā svabhāvahetuviśeṣāpekṣayaitadāśaṃkitaṃ tatu kṣaṇikatvānumāne sattvāpekṣayā | tasya hi vipakṣabādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva gamakatvā diti tadetaduttaratra nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ | tasmāt pūrvagṛhītapratibandhasādhakapramāṇasmṛtaye hetoranyatra vṛttirapekṣaṇīyā |

[15,4]

etatpariharati "netyā"dinā | "na" anyatrānanuvṛttiḥ | kutaḥ | ayogo sambandhastadvyavacchedena "viśeṣaṇāt" pakṣasya | na hyanyayogavyavacchedenaiva viśeṣaṇambhavati kintva"yogavyavacchede"nāpi | yatra dharmiṇi dharmasya sadbhāvaḥ sandihyate tatrāyogavyavacchedasya nyāyaprāptatvāt | atra dṛṣṭānto "yathā caitro dhanurdhara iti" | caitre hi dhanurdharatvaṃ sandihyate kimasti nāstīti | tataścaitro dhanurddhara ityukte pakṣāntaramadhanurddharatvaṃ śroturākāṃkṣopasthāpitaṃ nirākarotyayogavyavacchedotra nyāyaprāptaḥ |

[15,5]

parābhimatavyavacchedaṃ nirācikīrṣannāha | "nānyayogavyavacchedena" viśeṣaṇādanyatrānanuvṛtterasādhāraṇateti sambandhaḥ | atrāpi dṛṣṭānto "yathā""pārtho dhanurddhara iti" sāmānyaśabdopyayaṃ dhanurddharaśabdaḥ prakaraṇasāmarthyādinā prakṛṣṭaguṇavṛttiriha pā rthe hi dhanurddharatvaṃ siddhameveti nāyogāśaṅkā | tādṛśantu sātiśayaṃ kimanyatrāpyasti nāstītyanyayogaśaṃkāyāṃ śroturyadā pārtho dhanurddhara ityucyate tadā sātiśayaḥ pārtha eva dhanurddharo nānya iti pratīyate | tenātrānyayogavyavacchedo nyāyaprāptaḥ |
tathā kiṃ pakṣestyayaṃ dharmo na veti saṃśaye pakṣadharma ityukte pakṣasya dharma eva nādharmaḥ |
dharmaścāśritatvād viśeṣaṇantenāyogo vyavacchidyate nānyayogaḥ | tadaṃśavyāptyānyayogasya pratipādanena dṛṣṭānte sandehābhāvāt | "ākṣepsyāma" iti nirdekṣyāmaścaturthe paricchede 4 | 190 ||

[16,1]

tadaṃśastaddharma iti tacchabdena pakṣaḥ parāmṛśyate na dharmaḥ | dharmasya dharmāsambhavāt |
tasya pakṣasyāṃśastasyaiva sādhyo dharmaḥ || ekadeśe rūḍhoṅśaśabdaḥ kathaṃ dharmaṃ pratipādayatīti cedāha | "vakturabhiprāyavaśā"diti | na vastubalena śabdānāṃ vācakatvaṃ kintu vakturvivakṣāvaśānna "tadekadeśastadaṃśa" iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ |

[16,2]

kiṃ punarevamiti cedāha | "pakṣaśabdena samudāyāvacanāditi" | yadi pakṣaśabdena samudāyobhihitaḥ syāt tadā dharmadharmisamudāyātmakasya pakṣasyaikadeśo dharmātmakoṅśo bhavati | upacaritena tu pakṣaśabdena dharmyevābhidhīyate | tasya caikātmakasya kuta ekadeśaḥ |

[16,3]

"vyāptaṃ padamvyāptiri"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | tasya pakṣadharmasya sato vyāptiryoṃ vyāpnoti yaśca vyāpyate vyāpyavyāpakadharmatayā pratīteḥ | yadā vyāpakadharmatayā vivakṣyate tadā vyāpakasya gamyasya bhāva eveti sambandhaḥ | "tatre"ti saptamyarthapradhānametannādhārārthapradhānaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāntaratvābhāvāt | tenāyamarthaḥ |
yatra dharmiṇi vyāpyamasti "tatra" sarvatra "vyāpakasya bhāva eve"ti vyāpakadharmo vyāptiḥ |
na tvevamavadhāryate vyāpakasyaiva tatra bhāva iti | hetvabhāvaprasaṃgāt | avyāpakasyāpi mūrttatvādestatra bhāvāt | "nāpi tatrai"vetyavadhāryate | prayatnānantarīyakatvāderahetutvāpatteḥ | sādhāraṇaśca hetuḥ syānnityatvasya prameyeṣveva bhāvāt || yadā tu vyāpyadharmatā vyāptervivakṣitā tadā yatra dharmiṇi vyāpakosti tatraiva "vyāpyasya bhāvo"
nānyatra | atrāpi vyāpyasyaiva | tatra bhāva ityavadhāraṇaṃ hetvabhāvaprasaktereva nāśritamavyāpyasyāpi tatra bhāvāt | nāpi vyāpyasya tatra bhāva evetyavadhāryate |
sapakṣaikadeśavṛtterahetutvaprāpteḥ | sādhāraṇasya ca hetutvaṃ syāt prameyatvasya nityeṣvavaśyambhāvāditi | vyāpakasya tatra bhāva ityanena cānvaya ākṣipto vyāpyasya vā tatraiva bhāva ityanena vyatireka ākṣiptaḥ |

[17,1]

yadvā vyāptervyāpyavyāpakadharmmasamvarṇṇanaṃ niyatāniyatatvakhyāpanārthaṃ | tena vyāpto "hetu"rbhavati na tu vyāpako'niyatatvāt |

[17,2]

nanu yo dharmo vyāpyamantareṇa bhavati sa kathaṃ vyāpako vyāpyāsambandhenāvyāpakatvāt |

[17,3]

satyaṃ | kevalandharmayoḥ sāmānyena vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo niścīyate | yaccānityatvasāmānyaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvavyāpakaṃ niścitantadaprayatnānantarīyakepi dṛśyata iti vyāpako'niyata ucyate | atha prayatnānantarīyakasvabhāvamevānityatvaṃ niścetumpāryate tadānayoḥ parasparaṃ vyāpyatvamiti vyāpta eva heturbhavati |
yadā ca yatra vipratipattistadeva sādhyamitarat sādhanamiti nyāya eṣaḥ ||

[17,4]

yadi tarhi "pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpta" ityetāvaddhetulakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ pakṣadharmatvantadaṅśavyāptiśceti dvirūpo hetuḥ syādanyatra ca trirūpa uktastatkathanna vyāghāta ityāha |

[17,5]

"etena" tadaṃśavyāptivacanenā"nvayavyatirekā"vuktau | anvayavyatirekarūpatvād vyāpteriti bhāvaḥ | tathā hi | ya eva yenānvito yannivṛttau ca nivarttate sa eva tena vyāpta ucyata iti tadātmakatvād vyāptervyāptivacanenānvayavyatirekābhidhānantato vyāptivacanena rūpadvayābhidhānānna vyāghāta iti | tau ca jñāpakahetvadhikārānniścitau | niścayaśca tayornaikeneva pramāṇenāpi tu"yathāsvaṃ" yasya yadātmīyaṃ pramāṇaṃ niścāyakantena | yasya ca yatpramāṇantaduttaratra vakṣyate ||

[17,6]

nanu bhāvarūpatvālliṅgasya kathaṃ vyatirekaḥ | sādhyābhāve'bhāvalakṣaṇosya rūpamiti cet | na | ya eva hi sādhya eva liṅgasya bhāvaḥ sa eva sādhyābhāve vyatirekaḥ | tenānvayavyatireka yorapi tādātmyaṃ vikalpakalpitastu bhedaḥ |
sādhyābhāve liṃgasya nirvṛttidharmakatvaṃ vyatireka ityapare | yataśca yatra yatra sādhanadharmmastatra tatra sādhyadharma ityevaṃ rūpo"nvayaḥ" | tena yaducyate ku mā ri la bha ṭṭe na ||

[18,1]

"yaḥ savitrudayo bhāvī na tenādyodayonvitaḥ | atha cādyodayāt sopi bhavitā śvonumīyate || vyomni dṛṣṭaṃ ca dhūmāgraṃ bhūmau bahniḥ pratīyate | dhūmāgramagneranveti na ca bhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥ || evanna deśakālābhyāṃ liṅgaṃ liṅgyanugacchati | tasmānnāsyānvayo nāma sambandhoṅśaḥ pratīyata iti | "

[18,2]

tadapāstaṃ | yataśca yathopavarṇṇitaḥ sādhyānvayo heturvidyate | tenaitadapi pratyuktaṃ |

[18,3]

"pratyākhyeyaivameveha vyāptisambandhakalpanā | yo hi nānvīyate yena sa tena vyāpyate kuta iti | "

[18,4]

ata evedṛśīmparaparikalpitāṃ vyāptiṃ nirākarttumā cā ryo "vyāpakasya""tatra bhāva" ityādinā laukikīvyāptindarśitavān | sambandhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ liṅgasya sādhyāyattatāgrāhakaṃ | yacca tadāyattatāṃ gṛhṇāti tadevānvayavyatirekātmikāyā vyāptergrāhakaṃ | sādhyāyattatāyā eva vyāptirūpatvāt | tasmād vyāptigrāhakādeva pramāṇāt yatra vyāpyasambhavastatra vyāpakabhāvo yatra vyāpakābhāvastatra vyāpyābhāva itya bhāvepi niścayo bhavati | tena yaducyate kumārila bha ṭṭena |

[18,5]

"sāmānyaviṣayatvācca na pratyakṣenvayambhavet | na cānumīyate pūrvamavijñātānvayāntarāt || athānvayenumānaṃ syādanvayāntaravarjjitaṃ | siddhe tadanapekṣesminnanyatrāpyanvayena kiṃ || vyatirekopi liṅgasya vipakṣānnaiva labhyate | abhāve sa na gamyeta kṛtayatnairabodhanāt || yāvatsarvavipakṣāṇāṃ paryanto nāvadhāritaḥ | tāvaddhetoravṛttitvaṃ kastasmājjñātumarhatīti"

[18,6]

tadapyapāstaṃ |

[19,1]

"pakṣa""dharmaśca" kiṃ "yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścita" ukto veditavya iti sambandhaḥ pakṣadharmmavacanenaiva | evaṃ ca trairūpyamevoktaṃ liṃgasyetyavirodhaḥ |

[19,2]

tena yaducyate 'vi ddha ka rṇṇena | "satyamanumānamiṣyata evāsmābhiḥ pramāṇaṃ lokapratītatvāt kevalaṃ liṃgalakṣaṇamayukta" miti tadapāstaṃ | trairūpyasyāpi liṅgalakṣaṇasya lokapratītatvāt dhūmādāviva |

[19,3]

nanu kathaṃ yathāsvaṃ pramā ṇena pakṣadharmaniścayaḥsāmānyasya liṅgatvāt |
tasya ca pratyakṣeṇa svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvenāgrahaṇāt | agṛhītasya cāliṃgatvāt |
gṛhītasya ca svalakṣaṇasyānanvayenāliṃgatvāt | nāpyanumānena sāmānyagrahaṇantalliṅgasyāpi sāmānyarūpatvena pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇādanumānena grahaṇe'navasthāprasaṅgāt ||

[19,4]

tadāha |

[19,5]

"liṅgaliṅgyanumānānāmānantyādekaliṅgini | gatiryugasahasrepu bahuṣvapi na vidyata iti | "

[19,6]

atha kāryasvabhāvavikalpapratibhāsi sāmānyaṃ kāryādidarśanāśrayatayā tadadhyavasāyācca kāryādiheturityucyate |

[19,7]

tadayuktaṃ | tasyāpi vikalpāvyatiriktatvād vikalpavad anyatra vikalpāntare'nanugamāt kathaṃ sāmānyaṃ liṃgaṃ | tasmād vijātīyavyāvṛttameva dhūmāde rūpaṃ jñāpakahetvadhikārāt pratyakṣaniścitamviśeṣānavadhāraṇena sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ liṃgamucyate | na tu vijātīyavyāvṛttirvikalpākāro vā'vastutvāt | tenāyamarthaḥ |
pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścayenādhūmavyāvṛttarūpāvadhāraṇena dhūmādisvalakṣaṇamidaṃ pratibhāsamānaṃ kadācittārṇṇampārṇṇamanyadveti viśeṣānavadhāraṇena cānekasvalakṣaṇarūpaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣaviṣaye vyavasthāpyate | yathā ca liṅgasya viśeṣānavadhāraṇena sāmānyarūpatvantathā sādhyasyāpi | tadāha |

[19,8]

"atadrūpaparāvṛttavastumātraprasādhanāt | sāmānyaviṣayaṃ proktaṃ liṅgaṃ bhedāpratiṣṭhiteriti | "

[19,9]

tathābhūtasya ca sāmānyalakṣaṇasya liṅgasya sādhyakāryatvaṃ sādhyasvabhāvatvaṃ ca vastutvādaviruddhaṃ | tacca liṅgaṃ pratyakṣādiniścitamiti sarvaṃ susthaṃ ||

[19,10]

"ta eta" ityādinā tridhaiva sa ityetad vyācaṣṭe |

[20,1]

ta eta iti | pakṣadharmatvena yathoktayā ca vyāptyā yuktāḥ "kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhayo lakṣaṇaṃ" svabhāvo yeṣānte tathoktāḥ | "dhūmāditi" kāryahetorākhyānaṃ | agniratreti sādhyaphalasya | na tvayampakṣaprayogaḥ ||

[20,2]

nanu yaḥ pradeśognisambandhī sopratyakṣaḥ | yaśca pratyakṣo nabhobhāgarūpa ālokādyātmā dhūmavattayā dṛśyamāno na sognimānataḥ kathaṃ pradeśe dhūmasya pratyakṣataḥ siddhistasmād dhūma eva dharmī yuktaḥ |

[20,3]

"sāgnirayaṃ dhūmo dhūmatvādityevaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāva" ityu dyo ta ka raḥ | tasyāpi sāgnerdhūmāvayavasyāpratyakṣatvāt | paridṛśyamānasya corddhvabhāgavartinogninā sahāvṛtteḥ kathaṃ dhūmasāmānyasya sādhyadharmiṇi pratyakṣato niścayaḥ | dhūmāvayavī pratyakṣa iti cet | na | avayavavyatirekeṇa tasyābhāvāta | lokādhyavasāyaḥ tasyaikatve vā pradeśasyāpi tāvataḥ kalpitamekātmakatvaṃ na vāryate | pradeśa eva ca lokogniṃ pratipadyate na dhūme dharmiṇi | tena yadyagneranumānamiṣyate pradeśa eva dharmiṇyanumānamastvityevamparametat |

[20,4]

na tvatra pūrvokto doṣaparihāra ityeke | yadvā dṛśyamānaḥ pradeśo dharmī adhastādagnimānityetāvat sādhyadharmo nāgnimātraṃ | īdṛgvidhena ca sādhyadharmeṇa pūrvameva vyāptiḥ pratipannā | dhūmaścātra pratyakṣasiddha iti kathaṃ nānumānaṃ | yatu deśādyapekṣayā kāryahetorgamakatvamatrocyate | tadasaṅgatameva deśāderviśeṣaṇasyāsiddhatvāt | dhūmamātradarśanādevāsya sādhyasya siddhatvācca | yadvā pradeśe'gniṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃśukādirūpeṇa sandehaṃ yadā dhūmadarśanānnivarttayati | tadaitadudāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |
tadā hi pratyakṣeṇa dharmī sādhanadharmaśca siddho bhavati |

[20,5]

yattūcyate | pratyakṣāpratyakṣarūpa eva dharmiṇyanumānamiti | tadayuktaṃ |
pratyakṣāṅśe yadyapi hetuḥ siddhastathāpi na tatra sādhyadharmānumānaṃ pratyakṣabādhitatvāt |
parokṣāṅśe tu syādanumānaṃ kevalantatra heturasiddhaḥ | na ca pratyakṣaṃ pratyakṣarūpasya dhaṃrmiṇo dharmaḥ pratyakṣasiddho'pratyakṣeṅśe pratyakṣāvyāpārāt | yadā vā śravaṇagrāhye śabde'nityatvānumānantadā kathaṃ dharmiṇaḥ pratyakṣāpratyakṣarūpateti yatkiñcidetat ||

[20,6]

śiṅśapātvāditi svabhāvahetorudāharaṇaṃ |

[21,1]

u mve ka stvatrāha | "svabhāvahetorgamakatvaṃ dūrotsāritameva | bhedādhiṣṭhānatvād gamyagamakabhāvasya | na hyabhinne pratibandho nāma | na śiṅśapā vṛkṣātmikā | tato vyāvarttamānatvāt | yo hi yasmād vyāvarttate na sa tadātmā |
ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ | vyāvarttate ca khadirādibhyaḥ śiśaṃpetyatadātmikā | tadātmatve ca liṅgagrahaṇavelāyāmevāvyatirekāt sādhyasvarūpavalliṅgāgrahaṇavattvaṃ sādhyasya gṛhītatvādanumeyatvahāniḥ | tādātmyena ca śiṃśapātvasya gamakatve tādātmyāviśeṣād vṛkṣatvasya śiṃśapāṃ prati gamakatvaprasaṅgaḥ | athāsyāniyatatvādagamakatvaṃ niyatataiva tarhi gamakatve nimittaṃ na tu tādātmyaṃ vyabhicāriṇyapi vṛkṣatve tādātmyasya darśanāt | atha tadātmanaiva vṛkṣe nāsti śiṃśapā... ... ... ...tadātmikā | sarvathā yayoreva...tayā gamyagamakabhāvo nānātmye tu tādātmyābhāvaḥ | evamaśiṃśapā'vṛkṣāpohayorapohabuddhyorvā gamyagamakabhāvo nirākarttavya"iti |

[21,2]

tadayuktaṃ | śiṃśapā hi vṛkṣaviśeṣasvabhāvā | vṛkṣaviśeṣopi śiṃśapāsvabhāva evetyubhayagatantādātmyaṃ | tādātmyepi ca kaścidavṛkṣavyāvṛtte svabhāve kathaṃcinmūḍho nāśiṃśapāvyāvṛtte | tena śiṃśapāderliṅgasya grahaṇānnānumeyatvahāniḥ | yataśca na vṛkṣamātrasvabhāvā śiṃśapā | tena na vṛkṣatvasya śiṃśapāṃ prati gamakatvaṃ |
sādhyasādhanādyabhāvadoṣantu svayameva śāstrakāro nirākariṣyatīti yatkiñcidetat |

[21,3]

"pradeśa" ityanupalabdheḥ kathanaṃ | "pradeśaviśeṣa" ityuddiṣṭe deśe | "kvaci"diti vādiprativādiprasiddhe | "na ghaṭa" iti ghaṭābhāvavyavahāraḥ sādhyaḥ | "upalabdhī"tyādinā hetunirdeśaḥ | upalabdherlakṣaṇāni karaṇāni cakṣurādīnyapratibaddhasāmarthyādyu"palabdhilakṣa"ṇāni | tāni prāptaḥ svābhāsajñānajananayogyaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ |
svajñānajananasāmagryantarbhūtortha ityarthaḥ | "tasyānupalabdhe"stathābhūtasyāsadvyavahārasiddhiḥ ||

[21,4]

kathaṃ punaryo yatra nāsti sa tatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto bhavati | upalabdhilakṣaṇa"prāptatvaṃ" hi jñānaviṣayatvantasmiṃśca sati kuto nāstitvaṃ |

[21,5]

"ucyate" | yāvatyāṃ sāmagryāṃ satyāṃ pūrvaṃ pratipanno bhāvastāvatyāmevasāmagryāṃ satyāṃ "yadi syāt" pūrvakālavadupalabhyetetyevamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ buddhyā parāmṛśya bhāvasyāpratibhāsanānnāstīti niṣedhaḥ kriyate | na tvadṛśyasya |
pratibhāsaparāmarśopāyābhāvāt | sarvadā'pratipannatvāt ||

[22,1]

nanu dṛśyasyābhāve sati saiva sāmagrī kathaṃ pratipanneti cet || na | ekajñānaviṣayayorbhāvayorekopalambhāditi brūmaḥ | svata eva ca niṣidhyamānasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvanniścīyate | etadevaikajñānajananayogyatayopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvandarśayitumāha |

[22,2]

"yadi syād" ghaṭādirupalabhyaṃ sattvaṃ yasya sa tathābhūta eva syāt | "nānyathe"ti na kadācidagrāhyastathābhūto'vaśyaṃ jñānanna vyabhicaratīti yāvat | yata eva"ntena" kāra"ṇena |
upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta"syeti yadviśeṣaṇamuktantadarthādu"palabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasattvasye"tyuktambhavati | atra tvayaṃ bāhyārthaḥ | lakṣyate'neneti lakṣaṇaṃ | upalabdhireva lakṣaṇantatprāptamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ jñānenāvyabhicaritasambandhamityarthaḥ |
evaṃbhūtaṃ sattvaṃ yasya tattathoktaṃ | tathābhūtaṃ hi sattvaṃ jñānaṃ — nivṛttyāvaśyaṃ nivarttata iti bhāvaḥ || vidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ sarvaṃ sādhanaṃ vyāptaṃ | vidhīyamānaśca sādhyaḥ pratibandhadvayena bhidyata iti vidhipratiṣedhau hetutrayāyattāviti darśayannāha | "tatre"tyādi |

[22,3]

"tatra" triṣu hetuṣu "dvau" kāryasvabhāvahetū "vastusādhanau" vidhisādhanau | "dvāveve"ti cāvadhāraṇaṃ na tu vastusādhanāveveti | ābhyāṃ sāmarthyād vyavacchedasyāpi siddheḥ | "ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetu"riti | uktalakṣaṇonupalambhaḥ pratiṣedhahetureva | na tveka evetyavadhāryate pūrvvābhyāmapi vyavacchedagateḥ ||

[22,4]

kaścidāha | "vyavacchedaḥ śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ prasādhyate yāvāṃścid vyavacchedaḥ sa sarvonupalambhādevetyanupalambha evaiko heturi" ti |

[22,5]

tadayuktaṃ | yato na tāvat pramāṇavyāpārāpekṣayaitaducyate | vastunyeva pramāṇavyāpārāt | tadāhāta "eva va"stuviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ dvayoriti | nāpyadhyavasāyavaśādetaducyate vastuna evādhyavasāyāt | vyavacchedena saha liṃgasya sambandhābhāvācca |

[23,1]

yo pi manyate'nupalambhe'sadvyavahārayogyatā sādhyate na pratiṣedhaḥ | yogyatā ca svabhāvabhūtaiva | tathāgnimati pradeśe sādhye agnimattā pradeśasya svabhāva eva sādhyo dhūmavattvāditi ca hetuḥ | pradeśābhinna iti sarvo hetuḥ svabhāvahetureveti |
tadayuktam | evaṃ hi gamakattve gardabhatvāderapi gamakatvaṃ syāt | na bhavatyagnikāryatvābhāvād gardabhasyeti cet | yadyevaṃ dhūmasyāgnikāryatvameva gamakatve nibandhanamiti kathaṃ na kāryahetuḥ |

[23,2]

anyastu manyate"'nupalambhastu pradeśakārya ityasadvyavahāre sādhye kāryahetureva |
kṛtakavikalpaścānityaśabdakārya iti sarva eva hetuḥ kāryaheturi"ti |

[23,3]

tadapyayuktaṃ | kṛtakavikalpo hi kṛtakakāraṇatvāt tasyaivānumāpakaḥ syānnānityasya | kṛtakasyānityasvabhāvatvādanityatvaṃ sādhayatīti cet | yadyevaṃ kṛtakatvādevānityatvapratītiḥ syānna kṛtakavikalpāt | kṛtakasvabhāvatayaivānityatve gamakatvāt | yadvā kṛtakavikalpaśca syānna vānitya ityanaikāntaḥ |
kṛtakavikalpajananasāmarthyaṃ kṛtakāvyatiriktantacca na pūrvanna paścāttenāsāvanityo'vyatiriktantarhi sāmarthyamanityatvaṃ sādhayatīti kathaṃ na svabhāvo heturiti yatkiñcidetat ||

[23,4]

kiṃ punardvāveva vastusādhanāvityāha | "svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ""sādhanaṃ kṛte" ti samāsaḥ | "svabhāvena pratibaddhatvaṃ" | pratibaddhasvabhāvamiti yāvat | "tasmin satyartho"
liṃga"martha"miti liṅginaṃ "na vyabhicarati" |

[23,5]

"sa ca" svabhāvapratibandhaḥ kuta ityāha | "tadātmatvā"diti sādhyasvabhāvatvāt || "tadātmatve" sādhyasvabhāvātmatve sādhanasya | yadeva sādhyantadeva sādhanamiti "sādhyasādhanayo""rbhedābhāva"stena pratijñārthaikadeśo heturiti paramāśaṅkyāha | "ne"tyādi | sādhyasādhanabhūtānāṃ "dharmabhedānāṃ" vyāvṛttibhedena "parikalpanādā"ropād |

[23,6]

etaduktambhavati | dharmabhedaḥ samāropyate tena sādhyasādhanabhedaḥ | yato niścito gamako niścetavyaśca gamya ucyate | niścayaviṣayaścāropita eveti niścayabhedāropito dharmabhedaḥ | etacca vakṣyāmo'nyāpohaprastāve |

[24,1]

ācārya di gnā ge nāpyetaduktamityāha | "tathā ce"tyādi | "sarva eve"ti yatrāpi sādhyasādhanayoragnidhūmayorvāstavo bhedastatrāpi svalakṣaṇena vyavahārāyogādanumīyatenene"tyanumānaṃ"liṅgama"numeyaḥ" sādhyadharmī sādhyadharmaśca teṣāṃ "vyavahāro"
nānātvapratirūpaḥ | "buddhyārūḍhe"na "dharmadharmi"ṇo"rbheda"ste"na" buddhipratibhāsagatena bhinnena rūpeṇa bhedavyavahāra iti yāvat || yadi tarhi "buddhiparikalpi"to dharmadharmi vyavahāra evantarhi kalpitāddhetoḥ sādhyasiddhiḥ prāptā | tataśca hetudoṣo yāvānucyate sa sarvaḥ syāt | tadāha bha ṭṭaḥ ||

[24,2]

"yadi vā vidyamānopi bhedo buddhiprakalpitaḥ | sādhyasādhanadharmādervyavahārāya kalpyate || tato bhavatprayuktesmin sādhanaṃ yāvaducyate | sarvatrotpadyate buddhiriti dūṣaṇatā bhavediti | "

[24,3]

atrāha | "bheda" ityādi | etadāhārtha e"va" vārthaṃ gamayati kevalaṃ "dharmadharmitayā"'yaṃ dharmo'yaṃ dharmīti yo bhedo nānātvamayameva "buddhyākārakṛto" buddhyā parikalpito "nārtho"pi na liṅgamapi buddhayākārakṛtam | vikalpanirmitādeva liṅgāt kasmād arthapratipattirna bhavatītyāha | "vikalpe"tyādi | "vikalpabhedānāṃ" vikalpaviśeṣāṇā"micchāmātrānurodhitvena" svatantrāṇāma"narthāśrayā"darthāpratibaddhatvesākṣādanutpatternārthālambanatvādityarthaḥ | tairarthī — nāśrayairvikalpaiḥ kalpitaścāsau viṣayaśceti "tatkalpitaviṣaya"stas"mā"devaṃbhūtāddheto"rarthapratītāva"bhyupagamyamānāyāma"narthapratilambha eva syā"darthapratilambha eva na syāt ||

[24,4]

dvitīyaṃ pratibandhalakṣaṇamāha | "kāryasyāpī"tyādi | "tatsvabhāva"syeti kāryaṃsvabhāvasya "tadutpatteḥ" kāraṇādutpatter yo'numānasya prāmāṇyaṃ necchati taṃ pratyāha | "etāvanumeyapratyayau" pramāṇamiti sambandhaḥ || etāviti svabhāvakāryaliṅgau |
anupalabdheḥ svabhāvahetāvantarbhāvād dvāvityāha | yadvā prakrāntāpekṣayā dvāvityāha |

[25,1]

svabhāvakāraṇayoranumeyayoḥ pratyayāvityanumeyapratyayau "atatpratibhāsitve"pītyanumeyasvalakṣaṇāpratibhāsitvepi | atatpratibhāsitvantataḥ "sākṣādanutpatteḥ" | kathantarhyavyabhicāra ityāha | "tadutpatte"rityanumeyābhyāṃ svabhāvakāraṇābhyāṃ pāramparyeṇotpatteḥ | "tadavyabhicāriṇā"vityanumeyāṃvyabhicāriṇau | "iti" hetoḥ "pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣavat" |

[25,2]

tena yaducyate 'vi ddha ka rṇṇe nā"nadhigatārthaparicchittiḥ pramāṇamato nānumānampramāṇamarthaparicchedakatvābhāvādi" ti tadapāstaṃ | yataḥ sarva eva prekṣāvān pravṛttikāmaḥ pramāṇamanveṣate pravṛttiviṣayārthopadarśakatvena pravṛttiviṣayaścārtho'rthakriyāsamartha eva | na cānāgataṃ pravṛttisādhyārthakriyā sāmarthyamvastunaḥ pratyakṣamparicchinattītyuktamataḥ kathamasyārthaparicchedamātrātprāmāṇyaṃ | tasmāt svaviṣaye tadutpattyā pratyakṣaṃ yanmayā pūrvapratipannaṃ prabandhenārthakriyākāri tadevedamiti niścayaṃ kurvat pravarttakatvāt pramāṇantathānumānamapi |

[25,3]

"pratyakṣasyāpī"tyādinā vyāptimāha | "arthāvyabhicāra eveti" | pūrvamabhimatārthakāritvena niścitasyārthasya sambhave sati bhāva eva pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamanyathā"tadabhāve" arthābhāve "bhāvinaḥ" pratyakṣasya "tadvipralambhā"nniścitārthāsamvādāt | etaduktambhavati | yadārthakriyāsamarthamvastu pratyakṣaṃ na paricchinatti | yadi ca tathābhūtamapi vastu vyabhicaretpramāṇamapi na syāt | "avyabhicāraścānyasya konyastadutpatte"rityanyaṃsyārthāntarabhūtasya yonyena sahāvyabhicāraḥ sa tadutpatteḥ konyo naivānyaḥ |
tadutpattirevāvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ |

[25,4]

kasmād | a"nāyattarūpāṇā"mapratibaddhasvabhāvānāṃ "sahabhāvaniyamābhāvāda"vyabhicāraniyamābhāvāt | tasmādarthakriyākāritvena niścitādarthādutpattireva pratyakṣasyāvyabhicāra iti prāmāṇyantaccānumānepyastīti samaṃ dvayamiti bhāvaḥ ||

[25,5]

etenaitadapi nirastaṃ "pramāṇasyāgauṇatvādanumānādarthaniścayo durlabha" iti |
yadyagauṇatvamanupacaritatvamucyate tadānumānamapyanupacaritamevāskhaladbuddhirūpatvāt ||

[25,6]

atha dharmadharmisamudāyasya sādhyatve hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvamanvayo vā na sambhavati tena pakṣadharmatvaprasiddhyarthaṃ dharmiṇaḥ sādhyatvamupacaritavyamanvayasiddhyarthañca dharmasyetyevamupacaritaviṣayatvādanumānamupacaritaṃ |

[26,1]

tadayuktaṃ yato loke dhūmamātramagnimātravyāptaṃ yatra dharmiṇi dṛśyate tatraivāgnipratītirbhavatīti kasyātropacāra evaṃ ca samudāyasyāpi sādhyatvaṃ sidhyati | yadāha | "kevala eva dharmo dharmiṇi sādhyastatheṣṭasamudāyasya siddhiḥ kṛtā bhavatī"ti |
na cānumānaviṣaye sādhyaśabdopacāre satyanumānamupacaritannāma ||

[26,2]

atha pramāṇasyāgauṇatvādabhrāntatvādanumānasya tu bhrāntatvādaprāmāṇyamityucyate |

[26,3]

tadayuktaṃ | bhrāntasyāpyagnyanumānasya tadutpattyā bāhyāgnyadhyavasāyena loke prāmāṇyadarśanāt pratyakṣavat | atha pratyakṣamapi pramāṇanneṣyate tadā lokapratītibādhā | pratyakṣānumānayoḥ pramāṇayorlokapratītatvāt |

[26,4]

atha naiva pratyakṣānumānayoḥ pramāṇatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate | kintu liṅgantrilakṣaṇaṃ caturlakṣaṇaṃ vā na kenacit pramāṇena siddhamiti paryanuyoge yadyanumānamucyate sādhakaṃ |
punastatrāpi saṃ eva paryanuyoga ityevaṃ sarvatra paryanuyogaparāṇyeva sūtrāṇi | tathā ca"sūtraṃ" |

[26,5]

"viśeṣenugamābhāvaḥ sāmānye siddhasādhanamiti" |

[26,6]

tadapyayuktaṃ | pūrvameva trairūpyagrāhakasya pramāṇasya vyāptivacaṃnenākṣiptatvāt | na cāpramāṇakena paraḥ paryanuyujyate vādiprativādinorasiddhatvāt |

[26,7]

atha vacanātmakamanumānaṃ na vaktuḥ pramāṇamatha vacanena paraṃ pratipādayati tathā'pramāṇakena paryanuyogaḥ kriyata iti |

[26,8]

tadapyayuktaṃ | dvayorapi hi vacanādarthapratītiḥ pramāṇabhūtaivotpadyate'rthaparicchedakatvāt kevalamvakturadhigamasya niṣpannatvāt pramāṇaṃ no vā tena punarapramāṇaṃ bhavatyaprāmāṇye vā dvayorapyapramāṇamiti kathantatorthapratītiḥ |

[26,9]

yadapyucyate | "parasiddhenānumānenānumānanniṣidhyata"iti "tadapyetena"
nirastamiti || saṃyogavaśād gamakatve |

[26,10]

"na ca kenacidaṅgena na saṃyogī hutāśanaḥ | dhūmo vā sarvathā tena prāptaṃ dhūmāt prakāśanamiti | "

[26,11]

yaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṃga ācārya di gnā ge nākṣiptaṃ paraṃ prati tadihāpi kāryahetau āśaṅkate "yadītyā"dinā sādhyā"dutpatteḥ" kāraṇāt "kārya""ṅgamakaṅ"kāraṇasyetyadhyāhāraḥ "sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāptaḥ" | agneḥ sāmānyadharmavadviśeṣadharmā api tārṇapārṇṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ | dhūsasyāpi viśeṣadharmabad dravyatvapārthivatvādayopi sāmānyadharmā gamakā bhaveyuḥ | kutaḥ | "sarvathā janyajanakabhāvā"t | tathā hi yathāgniragnitvadravyatvasattvādibhiḥ sāmānyadharmmairjanakaḥ tathā tārṇṇapārṇṇādibhirviśeṣairapi | yathā ca dhūmo dhūmatvapāṇḍutvādibhiḥ svaniyatairviśeṣadharmairyukto janyastathā sāmānyadharmairapi sattvadravyatvādibhistataśca yathānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvastathaiva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syādityata āha |

[27,1]

"ne"tyādi | na sarvathā janyajanakabhāvastataśca kutastathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt |
kasmāditi cet | tadabhāve teṣāntārṇṇapārṇṇatvādīnāṃ viśeṣadharmmāṇāmabhāve bhavato dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmebhyo bhavatītyevamātmanastadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt | tathā "tadabhāve"'gnyabhāve "bhavato" dravyatvādeḥ sāmānyadharmasyāgnerevāyaṃ bhavatītyevaṃ — rūpasya "tadutpattiniyama"syā"bhāvāt" | kutaḥ sarvathā janyajanakabhāvo yataḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt ||

[27,2]

yata "eva"ntasmāt "kāryaṃ" dhūmādikaṃ "svabhāvairyā""vadbhi"rdhūmatvādibhiḥ svagatairitthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇā tṛtīyā | "avinābhāvi" | vinā na bhavati | kvāvinābhāvi | "kāraṇe" | kāraṇaviṣaye | yadvā kāraṇe ityādhārasaptamī | kāraṇasthaiḥ svabhāvairyāvadbhiragnitvadravyatvādibhiravinābhāvi | "teṣāṃ" kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ"hetuḥ" kāryaṃ gamakamityarthaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tatkāryatvaniyamā"t | teṣāmeva kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāntatkāryamityevaṃ rūpasya niyamasya sadbhāvāt |
na hi tatsāmānyadharmāt kadācidapi kāryaṃ vyabhicarati | evantāvat kāraṇagatāḥ sāmānyadharmā gamyā ityākhyātaṃ |

[27,3]

kāryagatāstu viśeṣadharmā gamakā iti darśayannāha | "taireve"tyādi | kāryamapi"taireva" dharmaiḥ svagataiḥ kāraṇagatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gamakāḥ | yerthāntarāsambhavino dhūmatvapāṇḍutvādayo viśeṣarūpā"staiḥ" kāraṇagataiḥ sāmānyadharmai"rvinā na bhavanti" | atrāpi tatkāryatvaniyamādityapekṣyate | teṣāmeva kāryagatānāṃ viśeṣadharmāṇāṃ kāraṇagatasāmānyadharmāpekṣayā kāryatvaniyamāt ||

[28,1]

"yadi" sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ kāraṇagatānāṃ kāryagatairviśeṣadharmairevāvinābhāvād gamyagamakabhāvastadāṃ"śena janyajanakabhāvaḥ" syāt | agneḥ sāmānyadharmā eva janakāḥ | dhūmasya ca viśeṣadharmā eva janyāḥ syuḥ | sarvathā ca janyajanakabhāvobhimata ityabhyupagamavirodhaḥ || etatpariharati | nāṃśena janyajanakabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ |
niraṃśatvena vastunaḥ sarvathā janyajanakatvābhyupagamāt | gamyagamakabhāvasyāpi sarvathābhimatatvāt | tadāha | "tajjanye"tyādi | yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇagatairviśeṣadharmairjanyo yo viśeṣaḥ sa grahītuṃ śakyate jñāpakahetvadhikārāt | tadā "tajjanyaviśeṣagraha"ṇe'bhimatatvāt kāraṇagataviśeṣadharmāṇāṃ gamyatvasya | tathā hyagurudhūmagrahaṇe bhavatyeva tadagneranumānaṃ | tathā liṅgaviśeṣo liṅgameva viśeṣo dhūmalakṣaṇaḥ sa upādhirviśeṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ dravyatvādīnānteṣāṃ"grahaṇe'bhimatatvād" gamakatvasya | na hi dhūmena viśeṣitā dravyatvādayo'gniṃ vyabhicaranti ||

[28,2]

nanu dhūma eva tatra gamako na tu tadviśiṣṭā dravyatvādayaḥ | yathā kṛtakatve sati prameyatvādityatra kṛtakatvameva gamakaṃ na prameyatvaṃ |

[28,3]

satyametad | avyabhicāramātrapradarśanārthantvevamabhidhānamityeke | anyastvāha |
na dhūmasya vyabhicārādiha sāmānyopādānaṃ kintarhi sarveṣāṃ pratipattṝṇāṃ dṛṣṭe vastuni sāmānyākāre pratipattirbhavati paścād viśeṣāvasāyaḥ | tatra ca yadupāttaṃ sāmānyantadaparityaktameva | tasmāt pratipatturadhyavasāyavaśād viśeṣopahitaṃ sāmānyaṅgamakambhavati na viśeṣasya vyabhicārāditi |

[28,4]

yuktametat | kevalaṃ yadyeṣa niyamaḥ sāmānyapratipattipurassaraiva viśeṣapratipattiḥ | kathantarhi dhūmamātrasya dravyatvādirahitasya pratītiḥ | pūrvoktaṃ ca codyantadavasthameva | tasmādidamatra sādhu | liṅgaviśeṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣaṇatvenaivopādānād ahetutvaṃ hetutvopādāne hi hetutvaṃ syānnānyathā |

[28,5]

kadā tarhi liṅgagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāmagamakatvamityāha | "aviśiṣṭe"tyādi | "yadā dravyatvādīnyaviśiṣṭāni vivakṣitāni tadā teṣāṃ vyabhicārād""gamakatvanneṣyate" |

[29,1]

svabhāvahetumadhikṛtyāha |

[29,2]

"svabhāva" ityādi | "heturiti varttata" iti teṣāṃ heturityataḥ | svabhāve sādhye kimbhūte "bhāvamātrānurodhini" hetusadbhāvamātrānurodhini "bhāvo" hetuḥsvabhāvo hetuḥ | mātragrahaṇamarthāntarānapekṣāsandarśanārthaṃ || kasmāttanmātrānurodhinyeva svabhāvo heturityāha | "tādātmyaṃ" hyarthasya "tanmātrānurodhinyeve"ti | yosāvarthasya sādhanasyātmā tadbhāvinyeva | "nānyāyatte" | na kāraṇāntarapratibaddhe paścādbhāvini tādātmyaṃ |
kasmāditi cedāha | "tadbhāva" ityādi | tasya heto"rbhāvi"'bhūtasya kāraṇāntarāyattasya dharmasya "paścād" yo "bhā"vastasya "niyamābhāvāt" | na hi kāraṇāntarapratibaddhena paścādbhāvinā'vaśyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "kāraṇānāṃ kāryavyabhicārā"t | sambhavatpratibandhatvāt kāraṇānāṃ kutastebhyo'vaśyambhāvaḥ kāryasya ||

[29,3]

nanu ca sādhyasvabhāvatā sādhanasya na kenacidiṣṭaṃ tatkathamucyate "tadbhāvamātrānurodhinyeva tādā"tmyamiti | evammanyate vyatiriktāvapi kṛtakatvānityatvākhyau dharmāvapyupagacchadbhiravaśyamabhūtvā bhavanaṃ bhūtvā cābhavanamabhyupagantavyamanyathātmāderiva kṛtakatvānityatve paṭāderna syātāṃ | tasmād yadevābhūtvā bhavanambhāvasya tadeva kṛtakatvaṃ yadeva ca bhūtvā'bhavanamanavasthāyitvantadevānityatvamastu kimanyena sāmānyena kalpiteneti || anupala...ityāha |

[30,1]

"apravṛ""tti"rityādi | keṣāmapravṛttiḥ "pramā""ṇānā"m | vahuvacanaṃ vyaktibhedena pramāṇānāmbahutvāt | āgamāpekṣa... ...

[30,2]

sidhyatītyucyata iti |

[30,3]

evammanyate | jñānajñeyayorbādhā bodharūpatvena viśeṣād | bodharūpaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ svata eva sidhyati | jñeyantu ghaṭādikaṃ jaḍarūpatvāt pramāṇamapekṣate |
jñānajñeyābhāvayostu nīrūpatvena viśeṣābhāvāt kathaṃ jñānābhāvasya svataḥsiddhi rjñeyābhāvasya cajñānābhāvāt siddhirucyate | atha jñānābhāvo nānyena sidhyati |
tathā hi jñānānāṃ svasamviditarūpatvenaikajñānasaṃsargitvābhāvāt | kevalaṃ yadi svasantāne jñānaṃ syād upalabhyetānupalambhādasadeva taditi svata eva jñānābhāvaḥ siddha iṣyate |

[30,4]

"tathā sattā'bhāvopi siddhaḥ syāt" | tatrāpi hi yadi sattā syādupalabhyetānupalambhānnāstīti niścīyate tataścā"pārthikānupalabdhi"rabhāvasiddhau | vijñānaṃ vānyavastunīti pakṣaṃ dūṣayitumāha | "athe"tyādi | "anya"sya ghaṭādiviviktasya bhūtalasyo"palabdhyā" ghaṭā"nupalabdhisiddhiriti pratyakṣasiddhānupalabdhiḥ" |

[30,5]

etaduktambhavati | ghaṭagrāhakatvasya bhūtalagrāhakasya caikajñānasaṃsargitvād yadā bhūtalagrāhakameva tajjñānambhavati | tadā ghaṭāgrāhakatvābhāvaṃ niścāyayatīti pratītipratyakṣasiddhaiva ghaṭānupalabdhiḥ ||

[31,1]

"tathānyasattayā'sattā kinna sidhyati" | tathetyanupalabdhivat | dvayorapi ghaṭapradeśayorekajñānasaṃsargitvādityabhiprāyaḥ | anyasya ghaṭaviviktasya bhūtalādeḥ sattayā siddhyā niṣedhyasyārthasya sattā kinna sidhyati ||

[31,2]

nanu bhāvanivṛttirūpo'bhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ pratyakṣasiddha ityucyate |

[31,3]

evammanyate | abhāvo nāma nāstyeva kevalaṃ mūḍhasya bhāvaviṣayameva pratyakṣamanyā"bhāvaṃ" vyavahārayati | tena yadukta"ma rthā pa ttyā"'bhāvaḥ pratīyata iti tadayuktaṃ |
yato na tāvad ghaṭādīnāmanyonyābhāvo'bhinnaḥ ghaṭavināśe paṭādyutpattiprasaṅgāt |
paṭādyabhāvasya vinaṣṭatvāt | atha bhinno'bhāvastadā ghaṭādīnāṃ parasparaṃ bhedo na syāt | yadā hi ghaṭābhāvarūpaḥ paṭo na bhavati tadā paṭo ghaṭa eva syāt | yathā vā ghaṭasya paṭābhāvād bhinnatvād ghaṭarūpatā tathā paṭāderapi syāt | ghaṭābhāvād bhinnatvādeva |

[31,4]

nāpyeṣāṃ parasparābhinnānāmabhāve na bhedaḥ śakyate karttuṃ | tasya bhinnābhinnabhedakaraṇe'kiṃcitkaratvāt | na cābhinnānāmanyonyābhāvaḥ sambhavati | nāpi parasparabhinnānāmabhāvena bhedaḥ kriyate svahetubhya eva bhinnānāmutpatteḥ | nāpi bhedavyavahāraḥ kriyate | yato bhāvānāmātmīyātmīya rūpeṇotpattireva svato bhedaḥ | sa ca pratyakṣapratibhāsanādeva bhedavyavahārahetuḥ |

[31,5]

tena yaducyate "vastvasaṃkarasiddhiścābhāvapramāṇāśrite"ti tadapāstaṃ | kiñca | bhāvābhāvayorbhedo nābhāvanibandhano'navasthāprasaṃgāt | atha svarūpeṇa bhedastathābhāvānāmapi sa syāditi kimabhāvena kalpitena | nāpi prāgabhāvābhāve kāryasyānāditvaṃ prasajyate | hetvabhāvenānutpatteḥ |

[31,6]

nanu"prāgabhāve" sati hetoḥ sakāśādutpattiḥ syānnāsati prāgabhāve vidyamānatvāt |

[31,7]

yadyevanna kadācanāpi kāryotpattiḥ syād virodhinaḥ prāgabhāvasya sannihitatvāt |
na ca tadvināśāt kāryotpattiḥ prāgabhāvamantareṇa kāryotpattyabhyupagamaprasaṅgāt |
nāpi kāryotpattireva prāgabhāvavināśastadutpattereva virodhisannidhānenāsambhavāt |
kāraṇasattākāle prāgabhāvasyāvināśāt | kāryotpattikāle ca tadvināśāt kāraṇavināśavat | tasmādutpatteḥ pūrvaṃ kāryasya na bhāvo nāpyabhāvo dharmosattvāt |
niraṃśatvācca vastunaḥ | kintu yadotpadyate tadā sattvamasyānyadā nāstīti vyavahriyate |
tenāsadutpadyata ityucyate |

[31,8]

"pra dhvaṃ sā bhā va sya" cāsattvaṃ svayamevā"cāryo"bhidhāsyate | yacca yasmādutpadyatetattasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ cocyate | teṣāṃ caikakṣaṇasthāyitvenotpatternāśitvaṃ svasvarūpeṇaivotpatteḥ parasparabhinnatā ca sidhyati | tena prāgabhāvādyabhāvepi kāraṇādivibhāgato vyavahāro bhavatyeva | na ca prāgabhāvādīnāmparasparambhedaḥ pratibhāsate |
yasmād ghaṭādeḥ pūrvampaścādanyatra ca nivṛttimātramabhinnaṃ pratibhāsate | yadi nāma kālabhedaḥ pratīyate | na hi gotvamanekakālādisambandhitvena pratīyamānamanekambhavati | nivṛtternīrūpatvācca kathamabhāvasya nānātvaṃ bhāvanivṛttirūpatvāccābhāvasya |
kevalaṃ yo mūḍha utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ paścādanyatra ca kāryasya bhāvamicchati taṃ pratīdamucyate | kāryasya pūrvampaścādanyatra cābhāva iti bhāvāropaniṣedhamātraṃ kriyate |

[32,1]

tena | "na cāva"stuna ete syurākārā ityādi yaduktantannirastaṃ |

[32,2]

itaścaitannirastaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ yato na prākpradhvaṃsābhāvābhyāmbhāvasya kaścit tadutpattilakṣaṇo virodhalakṣaṇo vā sambandho'sahabhāvitvenādviṣṭhatvāt | ata eva na viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ | nāpi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo'sahabhāvitvādeva |
viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyarūpatāyāśca vastuno'bhāvāt | kevalamanyasambandhadvāreṇāyaṃ kalpyate | daṇḍadaṇḍinoriva | yadi ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasambandhabalena bhāvasya prāgabhāva iti pratītistathā prāgabhāvāderbhāva ityapi pratītiḥ syāt sambandhasyāviśeṣāt | tasmāt prāgabhāvāderasambandhino bhāvasambandhitvena pratītirbhrāntireva |

[32,3]

na "cā nyo nyā bhā vo" bhāvānāmasti | na hi ghaṭasya nivṛttiḥ paṭasya nivṛttirbhavatyapratīteḥ na ca paṭe'vasthānātsā tatsambandhinī yuktā | evaṃ hi prāgabhāvādyapyanyonyābhāvaḥ syāt kāraṇādāvavasthānāt | tasmādanyābhāva evāsti nānyonyābhāvastenānyābhāvāt prāgabhāvādīnāṃ na bheda iti kathaṃ caturvidho'bhāva ucyate |

[32,4]

pratyakṣābhāvanirāśasaśca "nai rā tmya si ddhā" vabhihita iti nehocyate |

[32,5]

na tvabhāvasyāsattvenānubhūtatvāt kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa niścayaḥ | naiṣa doṣo ya smādekajñānasaṃsargiṇoḥ pratyakṣeṇaikasya grahaṇamevānyasyāgrahaṇantadagrahaṇameva ca tasyābhāvagrahaṇambhāve hi tasyāgrahaṇāyogād | yadāhānyahetusākalye tadavyabhicārāccopalambhaḥ sattā | tadabhāvonupalabdhirasattānyopalabdhiścānupalabdhiriti |

[32,6]

tenāyamarthaḥ | pratyakṣamabhāvanniścāyayatīti tāvanna niścāya yatītyarthaḥ | sa ca dṛśyasya bhāvāniścayo'bhāvaniścaya eva | evaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya pratyakṣaviṣayānusāritvaṃ samarthitambhavati | tadevamupalabdhyabhāvavyavahāravad arthābhāvavyavahārasyāpi pratyakṣasiddhatvānna liṅgenāsau sādhyate | evantāvadamūḍhaṃprati dṛśyānupalambho nābhāvaṃ vyabhicaratītyabhāvavyavahāraḥ pratyakṣasiddhaḥ |

[33,1]

na cāpyabhāvonupalabdhānāmapi sattvānnityaṃ śakyamānānupalaṃbhavyabhicāra iti kṛtvā vyavaharttumaśakya iti vaktuṃ yuktaṃ | evaṃ hyabhāvasya niścāyakamapi pratyakṣanna syāt | sandehānna cānyanniścāyakamanyad vyavahārāṅgaṃ yuktaṃ | tasmāt pratyakṣaniścāyakatvād bhāvavad dṛśyasyābhāvamapi vyavahārayati |

[33,2]

kathantarhyasadvyavahārasya sādhyatvamityāha | yadā punarityādi | evaṃvidhe hyupalambhayogyānupalabdhirevāsatāṃ padārthānāmasattā nānyā | tavā siddhepi pratyakṣeṇābhāvavyavahārasya "viṣaye | mohād viṣayiṇo"'sato"'"vidyamānasya jñānaṃ | nāstītyevamākāraṃ | nāstītyevambhūtaśca śabdaḥ niḥśaṅkāvagamanāgamanalakṣaṇā puruṣasya pravṛttirvyavahāraḥ | tānapratipadyamānaḥ pumān | viṣayapradarśanenāsadvyavahāraviṣayasya ghaṭaviviktapradeśasyopalambhamānasya pradarśanena | samaye'bhāvavyavahāre pravarttyate | dṛṣṭāntamāha | yathetyādi | sāsnādisamudāyātmaka eva gauḥ | tato na tatra gotvaṃ sādhyate kintu govyavahāraḥ | yadāyaṃ mūḍhamatiḥ śāvaleye pravarttitagovyavahāro bāhuleye śāvaleyarūpaśūnyatvād govyavahāraṃ na pravarttayati sa nimittapradarśanena govyavahāre pravarttyate | sāsnādisamudāyanimittako hi govyavahāro na śāvaleyarūpanimittikaḥ | bāhuleye'pi tannimittamastīti kathamasau na pravarttyate |
tadvad ghaṭaviviktepi pradeśenupalambhanimittapradarśanenāsadvyavahāre pravarttyate |

[33,3]

"tathā ce"ti yenaivaṃ vyavahāraḥ sādhyate tena "dṛṣṭāntāsiddhicodanāpi prativyūḍhā"
pratikṣiptā | anupalabdherliṅgādabhāve sādhye yenaiva liṅgo na sādhyadharmiṇyabhāvaḥsādhyastenaiva dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyapi tatrāpyaparo dṛṣṭānta ityanavasthā syāt | vyava hāre tu sādhye nānavasthā | pravarttitavyavahārasyaiva punaḥ samaye pravarttanāt |

[33,4]

nanu yo hi viṣayaṃ pratipadyate sa viṣayiṇamapi pratipadyata iti kathaṃ vyavahārasyāpi sādhyatvamityāha | "viṣaye"tyādi | dṛśyante hi loke tathāvidhā ye "viṣayapratipattāvapyapratipannaviṣayiṇaḥ" | yathā "sāṃkhyaḥ sattve" rajo nāstīti pravarttitāsa dvyavahāropi nimittaniścayābhāvānmṛtpiṇḍe na pravarttayatyanupalambhanimittapradarśane ghaṭābhāvavyavahāre pravarttyate |

[34,1]

evamityādinopasaṃhāraḥ | evamuktena prakāreṇānayoranupalabdhyordṛśyādṛśyayoḥ sadvyavahārapratiṣedhaphalatvantulyaṃ |

[34,2]

kathaṃ svaviparyayahetvabhāvabhāvābhyāṃ | svaśabdena sadvyavahārasya svarūpaṃ gṛhyate viparyayaśabdena sadvyavahāraviruddhosadvyavahāro gṛhyate | tayorhetū | svaviparyayahetū | tatra svaheturupalabdhirviparyayaheturdṛśyānupalabdhiḥ | tayorabhāvabhāvau |
svaviparyayahetvabhāvabhāvau | tābhyāṃ |

[34,3]

etaduktambhavati | adṛśyānupalabdhau sadvyavahāranimittāyā upalabdheḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttāvabhāvāt sadvyavahāranivṛttiḥ | dṛśyānupalambhe tu sadvyavahāraviruddhasyāsadvyavahārasya nimittasadbhāvāt pravṛttistena sadvyavahārasya nivṛttiriti sadvyavahārapratiṣedhaphalatvantulyaṃ |

[34,4]

nanūpalambhanivṛttāvapyarthasya sandehāt kathaṃ sadvyavahāro nivarttata ityāha |
ekatretyadṛśyaviṣayāyāmanupalabdhau sattvasya saṃśayāt tato niścayātmakaḥ sattvavyavahāro nivarttata eva | sandigdhastu sattvavyavahāro na nivarttate | anyatra tu dṛśyānṛpalabdhau viparyayāditi saṃśayaviparyayo niścayastasmāt | asattvasya niścayādityarthaḥ |

[34,5]

yadyadṛśyānupalabdhau saṃśayaḥ kathaṃ sā pramāṇamityāha | tatrādyetyādi | tatra dvayoranupalabdhyormadhye ādyā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ pramāṇamuktā sadvyavahāraniṣedhe upayogād vyāpārāt |

[34,6]

kva tarhi tasyā aprāmāṇyamityāha | na tvityādi | vyatirekasyābhāvasya darśananniścayaḥ | ādigrahaṇācchabdo vyavahāraśca gṛhyate | saṃśayād yato nābhāvaniścaya utpadyate | tasmānna pramāṇaṃ | dvitīyā tviti | dṛśyaviṣayānupalabdhiḥ |
atreti vyatirekadarśanādau niścayaphalatvānniśyaca eva phalamasyā iti kṛtvā | sā ca dṛśyaviṣayānupalabdhiḥ prayogabhedāccaturvidheti sambandhaḥ | viruddhaśca viruddhakāyaṃ ceti virūpaikaśeṣaḥ | siddhirupalabdhirdṛśyātmanorityatrāpi sambandhanīyaṃ |

[35,1]

etena svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhirviruddhakāryopalabdhiśca dve nirdiṣṭe | "asiddhirhetubhāvayoḥ dṛśyātmanoḥ"ityupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptayoḥ kāraṇasvabhāvayoranupalabdhirityarthaḥ |

[35,2]

etenāpi kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ svabhāvānupalabdhiśca dve nirddiṣṭe iti caturdhā bhavati | abhāvārthetyabhāvo'bhāvavyavahāraścārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā |

[35,3]

nanu viruddhakāryayoḥ siddhirityatrānupalabdhiriti na śrūyate | tatkathamanayoranupalabdhitvamityata āha | yāvān kaścidityādi | yāvān kaściditi vyāptā caitat kathyeta | na kaścit pratiṣedhavyavahāro liṅgajosti yonupalabdhimantareṇa śakyate karttu | na tu pratyakṣasādhyatvamabhāvavyavahārasya | nirākṛtametaccaprāgevoktantāmeva vyāptiṃ darśayitumāha | tathā hīti | sa iti pratiṣedhaḥ |
dvidhā kriyeta vyavahriyeta kasyacidarthasya vidhinā niṣedhena vā | kasyacidvidhāvapi kriyamāṇe | viruddho vā vidhīyetāviruddho vā'viruddhasya vidhau niṣidhyamānavidhīyamānayoḥ sahabhāvavirodhābhāvādapratiṣedho niṣedhyābhimatasya | viruddhasyāpītyādi | evaṃ hyasau viruddhaḥ syād yadi tatra svaviruddhasyānupaladhiḥ | tathā hītyādinaitadevāha | aparyantakāraṇasyetyakṣīṇakāraṇasya bhavataḥ santānenotpadyamānasya śītasparśāderagnyādisannidhānāt pūrvamiti draṣṭavyaṃ | anyabhāve'gnyādibhāve'bhāvādanutpādād virodhagatiḥ | na tvabhāvādahetukatvād vināśasya |

[35,4]

etaduktambhavati | pūrvapūrvasya śītasparśasya svarasanirodhe satyuttarottarasyacāgnitāratamyena śītasparśasyāpacayatāratamyayoginaḥ krameṇotpadyamānasya yāvatsarvasarveṇānutpattiruṣṇasparśalakṣaṇo bhavati | tena nirhetukepi vināśe'gnisannidhānāt pūrvaṃ prabandhapravṛttasya śītasparśasya svarasanirodhe'nyasya ca prabandhenotpitsoragnisannidhāne satyanutpatteragniśītayorvirodhāvagatirloke na tu paramārthato virodhaḥ | ata eva virodhagatirityāha | yatpunarucyate | na kāraṇanivarttanamantareṇa kasyacidagnyādirnivarttako nāmeti |

[36,1]

tadayuktaṃ | nirhetukatvād vināśasya kathaṃ kāraṇasya nivarttakaḥ | atha sahetukavināśamabhyupagamyaivamucyate tadā yathāsau kāraṇaṃ nivarttayati kāryaṃ kinna nivarttayati | yadi ca kāraṇanivarttanamantareṇa na kāryaṃ nivarttayituṃ śakyate tadā tatkāraṇasyāpi kathannivarttakaṃ yāvattatkāraṇaṃ na nivarttayati tatkāraṇasyāpyevamityanavasthayā na kaścit kasyacinnivarttakaḥ syāt | na ca santānāpekṣayaitadvaktuṃ yujyate sahetuke vināśe santānasyaivābhāvāditi yatkiñcidetat | sa cetyanyabhāve satyabhāvonutpattilakṣaṇo virodhaheturanupalabdheḥ sakāśād vyavahriyate |

[36,2]

anena sahānavasthālakṣaṇo virodho vyākhyātaḥ ||

[36,3]

dvitīyaṃ virodhandarśayannāha | "anyonyopalabdhī"tyādi | "anyonyopalabdhiḥ"
parasparapratipattistasyāḥ "parihā"ro vivekastena"sthitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ" svarūpaṃ yayostau tathoktau | tayorbhāvonyonyopalabdhiparihāra"sthitalakṣaṇatā" | sā vā virodhaḥ |
vā śabdaḥ samuccaye | "nityānityatvavadi"ti dṛṣṭāntaḥ |

[36,4]

nanu prathamavirodhepyastyeva parasparaparihāraḥ | dvitīyepi sahānavasthānaṃ |
tathā hi yayoreva dharmayorekatrānavasthānantayoreva dvitīyo virodhaḥ | tathā hi rūparasayorayaṃ neṣyate | tatkasmād virodhadvayamuktamiti cet |

[36,5]

satyaṃ viṣayavibhāgārthantūktaṃ | pūrvo virodho dṛśyavastuviṣaya eva | dvitīyastvavastuviṣayopyadṛśyaviṣayaścetyeke | yadvā pūrvakonyatonyasyābhāvapratipattyānyena saha virodhaḥ | dvitīyastvanyena sahaikatvābhāvena svarūpaviṣaya ityanayorvirodha yormahān bhedaḥ | tathā hi nityatvanivṛttirūpamanityatvamanityatvanivṛttirūpañcānityatvamityevamanyonyaparihāra eva virodhaḥ svarūpaniṣṭhaḥ | na ca nīlanivṛttirūpampītampītanivṛttirūpaṃ ca nīlamanayorbhāvarūpatvānnīlābhāve pītasya bhāvaprasaṃgācca | tasmānnānayorayaṃ virodhaḥ | nāpyanayoranyonyābhāvāvyabhicāreṇāyaṃ virodho'pratīteḥ | ata evāviruddhasya vidhānamucyate | nīlasyāpi nīlanivṛttirūpeṇānīlenāyaṃ virodho na nīlābhāvaniyatenānīlena tathābhūtasyānīlavastunaḥ pītādivyatiriktasyābhāvāt | kathantarhi nīlādau dṛśyamāne pītādestādātmyaniṣedhaḥ |

[37,1]

naiṣa doṣo yasmāt | nīlasyaikasyopalambhenyasyādṛśyasyāpyupalambhamānasvabhāvatve sati tathaivopalambhaḥ syādityevamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvamparāmṛśya tādātmyaṃ svabhāvānupalambhānniṣidhyate | atrāpi ca virodhe sa cānupalabdherityapekṣaṇīyantenāyamarthaḥ | sa cānyonyaparihāro virodhonupalabdhereva niścetavyaḥ | tathā hi | virodhināmvirodha ekapratibhāse satyanyāpratibhāsanamevocyate | bhāvasya ca rūpe pratibhāsamāne tadabhāvo na pratibhāsate | tasmād bhāvābhāvayostādātmyenāpratibhāsanād virodho niścīyate | evaṃ nityānityādāvayanniścetavyaḥ |

[37,2]

apratibhāsanaṃ caikapratibhāsanamevocyate | tadāha | "tatrāpī"tyādi | tatrāpyanantarokte virodhe | "ekopalabdhyā" | ekasya virodhina upalabdhyā"nyānupalabdhireva"
niṣedhyānupalabdhire"vocyate | anyathe"ti yadyekopalabdhyānyānupalabdhirnocyate | tadā"'niṣiddhā upalabdhi"ryasya niṣedhyasya tasyaikopalabdhāvapya"bhāvāsiddheḥ" | tataścopalabhyamānasya virodhitvameva na syāt | tasmād virodhadvayasyāpyanupalabdhikṛtatvād viruddhopalabdhyādayo vidhimukhena prayuktā apyanupalabdhisvabhāvā bhavanti ||

[37,3]

nanu virodhinorvirodhalakṣaṇasambandhagrāhikānupalabdhirdṛṣṭānte | na ca sambandhagrāhakasya pramāṇasya rūpaṃ sambandhinorbhavati | na hyagnidhūmayoḥ sambandhagrāhakasya pratyakṣasya rūpaṃ dhūmasya bhavati nāgneḥ | tatkathamviruddhopalabdhiranupalabdhirbhavatyupalabdhirūpatayā pratibhāsanāt | tasmād dṛṣṭānte gṛhītavirodhamagnyādikamanyatra pradeśe dṛṣṭvā śītādyabhāvonumīyata iti |

[37,4]

atrocyate | yadi virodhasambandhadvāreṇa gamyagamakabhāvo virodhināntataścāgnidarśanācchītasya pratītiḥ syāttayoreva virodhasambandhena samutthi"ta"tvāt |
na śītābhāvasyāsambandhitvāt | yadā cāgninā śīto nivarttyate tadā kathaṃ virodhaḥ sambandho dviṣṭhatvābhāvāt | na ca śītābhāvena sahāgnervirodhaḥ sahāvasthānāt | nāpyagneḥ śītābhāvāvyabhicāritvāttataḥ śītābhāvādyanumānaṃ | agnibhāvepi śītabhāvadarśanāt | tasmād yathā yathāgnisadbhāve śītasyānupalambhastathā tathā dṛṣṭānte tadabhāvasya pratipannatvāt | anyatrāpyagneḥ śītābhāvastathaivānu mīyate | tenāyamartho bhavati | sādhyadharmiṇyapyagnisadbhāve yadā śītasyānupalambhastadaivāgnervirodhitvaṃ nānyadā | virodhitvena ca gamakatvamityanyānupalambhena gamakatvamityuktambhavati | ato viruddhopalabdhiranupalabdhiniyatatvādanupalabdhirūpatvaṃ | kevalabhūtalopalabdherghaṭānupalabdhirūpatvavat | evaṃ parasparaparihārepi viruddhopalabdhiranupalabdhireva | yathārhatāṃ syād | anityoghaṭaḥ syānnitya ityatra hyanityopalabdhireva nityānupalabdhirato na nityānityarūpamvastu ||

[38,1]

evamarthāntaravidhāvapi niṣedhyasyānupalabdhiṅgamikāṃ pratipādyārthāntaraniṣedhepi pratipādayitumāha | "ekasye"tyādi | kasmāt | "niṣedhasye"tyādi | na cārthāntarābhāvādarthāntaraniṣedhetiprasaṅgaḥ | yata"statrā"pītyanyaniṣedhe sādhye"kāryakāhaṇayo"rniṣedho hetuḥ syāt | "anubhayasyā"kāryasyākāraṇasya "vā" niṣedho hetuḥ syāt | "tatra" teṣu | "anubhayas"yākāryakāraṇātmakasya niṣedhyena saha "pratibandhābhāvāt tadabhāve"'pratibaddhasyābhāve | "anyene"ti pratiṣedhyābhimatena | na "bhavitavyamiti kuta eta"t | "kāryānupalabdhāvapi" kutastadabhāva iti sambandhaḥ | "tadabhāva" iti kāraṇābhāvaḥ | "yato nānākāraṇāni tadva"nti kāryavanti"vaikalya"pratibandhasambhavāt |
etacca kāraṇamātra gṛhītvoktamapratibaddhāsāmarthyasya kāraṇasyābhāvaḥ kāryābhāvād gamyata eva | yatonubhayasya kāryasya cānupalabdhirgamikā | "tasmāt kāraṇānupala""bdhirevābhāvaṃ gamayati" | kāryasyeti sambandhād gamyate ||

[39,1]

svabhāvānupalabdherapyabhāvahetutvādavadhāraṇamayuktamiti cedāha | "svabhāvānupalabdhistu svayamasattaiva" | "nātrārthāntarasyābhāvaḥ sādhyate" | svabhāvāntarasya ca niṣedhe sādhye kāraṇānupalabdhirevetyavadhāraṇamato na vyāghātaḥ |

[39,2]

kintarhi tatra sādhyata ityāha | "kevala"mityādi | "tatre"ti svabhāvānupalabdhau"viṣayī" asajjñānādiḥ | "asyāma"pīti svabhāvānupalabdhau "yadā vyāpa"ko "yo dharma"stasyā"nupalabdhyā vyāpyābhāvamāha" | yathā nātra śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvāditi | "tadā'bhe"dopi vyāpyasya sādhyate | apiśabdād vyavahāropi | yadā hi samunnatayoḥ parvatapradeśayorekasmin pradeśe taruvanaṃ dṛśyamānamatigahanatvādanavadhāritavṛkṣaviśeṣambhavati |
tatrāparasmin parvvatoddeśe śiṃśapābhāvo na niścetumpāryate śiṃśapāyā adṛśyatvād"vṛ"kṣastūpalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta iti śakyate'bhāvaniścayaḥ karttuntasya | tadā vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyasyābhāvaḥ sādhyate ||

[39,3]

"iyami"tyādinā'"bhāvārthe"tyādikārikābhāgaṃ vyācaṣṭe | "viruddha"siddhyeti |
svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyā | "yathetyā"di | yatra dharmiṇi śītasparśaḥ parokṣaḥ | vahniśca dṛśyate | dūrāttasmin viṣaye'yaṃ prayogaḥ | "etene"ti svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyudāharaṇena "vyāpakaviruddhasiddhiruktā veditavyā | yathe"tyādyudāharaṇaṃ | śītasparśaviśeṣa eva | himānugatastuṣārastasya vyāpakaḥ śītastasya viruddhogniḥ | tatrāgnirviruddhaṃ śītaṃ nivarttayan tadvyāpyantuṣārasparśamapi nivarttayatītyarthataḥ svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhāviyamantarbhavati | yatra ca vahniḥ pratyakṣaḥ śītasparśastuṣārasparśaścāpratyakṣastatrāyamapi prayogo draṣṭavyaḥ | "viruddhasya yatkāryantasyāsiddhyā | yathe"tyādi | "na śītasparśotra dhūmāditi" śītaviruddhognistasya kāryaṃ dhūmaḥ sogniṃ sannidhāpayati sa ca śītamapanayati | yatra ca śītasparśaḥ parokṣo vahnirapi dhūmaśca pratyakṣastatrāyaṃ prayogo draṣṭavyaḥ | evantāva"dviruddhakāryayoḥ siddhi"rityetad vyākhyātaṃ |

[39,4]

adhunā |

[40,1]

"asiddhirhetubhāvayoḥ | "

[40,2]

ityetadudāharaṇākhyānenācaṣṭe | "hetvasiddhye"ti kāraṇānupaladhyā | "yathe"tyādi | yadā mahāhradasyopari vāspādau dhūmādirūpatayā sandeho bhavati tadā'yaṃ prayogo draṣṭavyaḥ | tatra hi niṣkampe mahāhrade yadyagniḥ syāt prabhāsvaratayā pratyakṣa eva syād | apratyakṣatvādeva vahnerabhāvāt kāryābhāvaḥ sādhyate | "svabhāvā"siddhyeti svabhāvānupalabdhyā na tatra dhūmo'nupalabdheriti |
upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyeti draṣṭavyaṃ | "etene"ti svabhāvānupalambhaprayogeṇa | "vyāpaka"ścāsau "svabhāva"śca tasyā"siddhi"ranupalabdhi"ruktā | yathā nātra śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvāt" | svabhāva eva vṛkṣatvaṃ śiṃśapātvasyāto vṛkṣatvena śiṃśapā vyāptā ||

[40,3]

nanu ca svabhāvānupalabdhāveva dṛśyaniṣedho na tu viruddhopalabdhyādau | tathā hyadṛśyasyaiva śītasparśasya kāryasya cādṛśyasyaiva niṣedhaḥ sādhyate | dṛśyatve hi svabhāvānupalabdhireva syāt | tena yathā'dṛśyasya śītasparśāderniṣedhastathā "piśā"cāderapi syādityata āha | "sarvatre"tyādi |

[40,4]

etaduktambhavati | yathā svabhāvānupalabdhāvanyatropalabdhasya ghaṭādeḥ pradeśaviśeṣe'bhāvaḥ sādhyate tathānyatra pratipannavirodhasya śītasparśasya pratipannakāryatvasya ca kāryasya viruddhopalabdhyādinā sādhyadharmiṇyabhāvaḥ sādhyate na tu sarvadā'dṛśyasyeti | "sarva"treti vidhimukhena pratiṣedhamukhena ca prayuktāyāmabhāvasādhanyāmityabhāvaścābhāvavyavahāraścābhāvaśabdenoktaḥ |

[40,5]

"teṣāmapi" yeṣāmabhāvenābhāvaḥ sādhyate teṣāṃ kāraṇādīnāṃ "dṛśyātmanā"mevā"siddhi"ranupalabdhiḥ | "tadviruddhānāṃ ca" pratiṣedhyārthaviruddhānāñca svabhāvaviruddhādīnāṃbdhiliṅgatvena "veditavyā" | atra ca "dṛśyātmanāṃ siddhi"riti na sambadhyate upalabdhivacanādeva dṛśyātmatāyā labdhatvāt | kintvevaṃ sambandhaḥ karttavyaḥ | "dṛśyātmanā"nniṣedhyābhimatānāṃ ye viruddhāsteṣāṃ siddhiriti | kiṃṅkāraṇam | "anyeṣā"madṛśyātmanāṃ kāraṇādīnā"mabhāvāsiddheḥ" | adṛśyānāṃ niṣedhyābhimatānāṃ svabhāvaviruddhāditi virodhādyasiddhiḥ || "yadī"tyādi paraḥ | śīta"viruddha"syāgneḥ "kāryaṃ" dhūmasyo"palabdhyāpyabhāvasiddhiḥ" śītasya | tatkāraṇopalabdhyā | "tasya" śītaviruddhasyāgneryat "kāraṇaṃ"
kāṣṭhādistasyo"palabdhyā kinna sidhyati" śītābhāvaḥ |

[41,1]

"tadviruddha"syetyā"dyācāryaḥ" | tena śītasparśena viruddhasya vahne"rnimittaṃ" kāṣṭhādi"stasya yopalabdhiḥ prayujyate sā vyabhicāriṇī" | kadā | "nimittayorviruddhatvā""bhāve" sati | agniśītanimittayorvirodhābhāve sati | udāharaṇamāha | "yathe"tyādi | atra hi kāṣṭhamātrasya dahanahetoḥ śītanimittena tuṣārādinā virodhābhāvāt | yatpunarapratibaddhasāmarthyamagnijanakaṃ kāṣṭhantasya yadyapi śītanimittena virodhastathāpi tathābhūtasya kāṣṭhasya kāryadarśanādeva niścayāt kāryavirodha eva syāt | "nimittayoḥ" puna"rviro"dhe "gamikai"va ca kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ | "yathā nāsya puṃ"saḥ"romaharṣādiviśeṣāḥ" | ādiśavdād dantavīṇākampādayaḥ | viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ śītakāryāṇāṃ parihārārthaṃ | piśācādivikārakṛtā api hi te sambhavanti | "sannihito dahanaviśeṣo" yasya puruṣasya sa tathā tadbhāvastasmāt | atrāpi viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ yathābhūto dahano romaharṣādyapanayanasamarthastathābhūtasya parigrahārthaṃ | atra hi paritāpanimittasya dahanasya romaharṣādinimittena śītena virodhosti | tasmād dahanaḥ svaviruddhaṃ śītamapanayaṃstatkāryamapi romaharṣādikamapanayatīti | śītasparśasya tatkāryasya ca romaharṣādeḥ parokṣatve sati vahnidarśanācchītakāraṇanivṛttyā yadā romaharṣādernivṛttiḥ sādhyābhipretā tadā'yaṃ prayogo draṣṭavyaḥ |

[41,2]

"etena" kāraṇaviruddhodāharaṇena "tatkāryāda"pīti viruddhasya yatkāryantasmādapi | "tadviruddhakāryābhāvagatirukteti" | yasya viruddhasya kāryamupalabhyate tena viruddho yo dvitīyaḥ pratiyogī sa tadviruddhastasya yat kāryantasyābhāvagatiruktā | "yathe"tyudāharaṇaṃ | "romaharṣādiviśe"ṣo yaḥ śītakṛtastena "yukto" yaḥ "puruṣaḥ" sa yasmin pra"deśe"vidyate sa tathā | pradeśopādānaṃ dhūmādityasya pakṣadharmatvapratipādanārthaṃ | puruṣe hi dharmiṇi na pakṣadharmo hetuḥ syād dhūmasya pradeśadharmatvāt | ayaṃ ca prayogaḥ |
yatra vahniḥ śītasparśo romaharṣādiviśeṣaśca parokṣastatrābhāvasādhane draṣṭavyaḥ |
tatra hi śītaviruddhāgnikāryasya dhūmasyopalabdhyā agniviruddhaśītakāryasya romaharṣāderabhāvaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭastena tathābhūta eva sādhyaḥ | dhūmo hi dahanaṃ sannidhāpayati sa śītannivartayati | sa nivarttamānaḥ svakāryaṃ romaharṣādikannivarttayatītyarthāt kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhiriyaṃ |

[42,1]
