"iyantadviruddhopalabdhi"1 | 32riti sambandhaḥ | kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhirityarthaḥ | "hetvasiddhyai"va kāraṇānupalabdhyaiva "prāgeva nirdiṣṭā" | yasmādanayorapi prayogayoḥ kāraṇānupabdhereva kāryābhāvagatistasmādiyaṃ kāraṇānupalabdhyaivoktā |

[42,2]

"itīya"mityādi | maulena prabhedena caturvidhāpi satī avāntarapra"yogabhedād aṣṭavidhā" bhavati | tathā hi svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhervyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ prabheda uktaḥ | svabhāvānupalabdhervyāpakānupalabdhiḥ | kāraṇānupalabdheḥ kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhiḥ kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhiśca | viruddhakāryopalabdhistvekaprakāretyaṣṭavidhā bhavati ||

"tatre"tyādi | "tatra viruddhakāryepīṣṭaṃ deśakālādyapekṣaṇaṃ" | nātra śītaḥ kasmiṃścit kāle yadā'gnirvartamānībhūta iti kālāpekṣaṇaṃ | vyomni dhūmāt kutraciddeśe nāsti śīto yatra sannihito vahniryatoyaṃ dhūma utthita iti deśāpekṣaṇaṃ | ādiṃśabdād avasthāviśeṣāpekṣaṇaṃ | yovasthāviśeṣo dhūmasya sannihitāgnerdṛṣṭastamapekṣya varttamānepi kāle śītābhāvonumīyate | agniratra dhūmāditi kāryahetāvapi deśakālādyapekṣaṇamiṣṭaṃ | asyaivārthasya samuccayārtho'piśabdaḥ |

[42,5]

nanu deśakālādyapekṣitvasya kāryahetuviśeṣaṇatve'siddho hetuḥ syād dharmiṇo'bhāvāditi cet | na | pradeśa eva dharmiṇi deśakālādyapekṣitvena gamakatvādityuktatvāt | "anyathe"ti yadi na deśādyapekṣaṇantadā "vyabhicāri" viruddhakāryaṃ "syāt" | yathā "bhasmā"napekṣitadeśakālaṃ "aśītasādhane" śītābhāve sādhye vyabhicāri | tadvat evantāvad viruddhādyupalabdhiranupalabdhiriti pratipāditaṃ ||

"yastarhī"tyādi paraḥ | "samaguṇe"ti sannihitānupahitena yathā kṣitivījodakādi"kāraṇakalāpaṃ" dṛṣṭvāṃkuraḥ kāryonumīyate | "sa kathaṃ" kāraṇākhyo hetu"strividhe" svabhāvakāryānupalambhākhye "hetāvantarbhavati" | na tāvadanupalabdhau vidhisādhanatvāt | kāraṇasvabhāvatvānna kāryahetau | arthāntareṇārthāntarasyānumānānna svabhāvahetau ||

antarbhāvamāha |

"hetu"netyādi | "samagreṇeti" yāvataḥ kāraṇakalāpāt kāryamutpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭantāvatā nāntyāvasthāprāptena tatra liṅgigrahaṇāt prāgeva kāryasya pratyakṣatvāt | apratyakṣatve vā'ntyāvasthāniścayāyogādanumānaṃ | na ca yastān niścetuṃ śakṣyati tasyānumānamantyakṣaṇānāmarvāgdarśanenāniścayāt | "yaḥ kāryotpādonumīyate" sa hetoḥ "svabhāvo varṇitaḥ" | kuto"rthāntarānapekṣatvāt" | tenāyamarthaḥ kāryotpādanayogyatā"mātrā"nubandhi"tvāt svabhāvabhūtā" ||

[43,4]

nanu yadā'ntyāvasthāpekṣaḥ kāryotpādastadā kathamanyānapekṣa ityāha | "asāva"pīti kāryotpādaḥ | yathāsannihito yādṛśaḥ sannihitaḥ | kāraṇakalāpaḥ | tādṛśāt sannihitā"nnānyamarthamapekṣata iti tādṛgmātrānubandhī svabhā"vaḥ | kasya bhāvaḥ |

[43,5]

yadyapyanapekṣaḥ kāryotpādastathāpyarthāntaratvāt kathaṃ svabhāva ityāha | "tatre"tyādi |
yasmāttatra samagreṣu kāraṇeṣu samagrāt kāraṇālliṅgāt "kāryotpatti"stathā"numīyate" | sambhavatyasmāditi sambhavaḥ | kāryotpādanayogyatānumīyata ityarthaḥ |
etadeva vyanakti | "samagrāṇāṃ kāryotpādanayogyatānumānā"diti | "yogyatā ca""sāmagrīmātrānuvandhinī" kāraṇāntarānapekṣatvāt |

[44,1]

yadi tarhi kāryotpādanaśaktistanmātrānuvandhinī niyatastarhi kāryotpāda iti sa eva kasmānnānumīyata iti paraḥ pṛcchati | kiṃ punaḥ sāmagryāḥ sakāśāt kāryamevānumīyata ityatrāha | sāmagrītyādi | sāmagryāḥ phalañca tāḥ śaktayaśceti sāmagrīphalaśaktayaḥ | tathā hi pūrvasmāt samagrāduttarasyasamarthasya kṣaṇasyotpattistasya cātmātiśayaḥ śaktiriti sāmagrī phalaṃ śaktistāsāṃ pariṇāmaḥ | uttarottaraprabandhenotpattistadanuvandhini tadapekṣiṇi kārye | kāraṇenānumātavye'naikāntikatā |
kiṅkāraṇaṃ | pratibanadhasya sambhavāt |

[44,2]

tadvyācaṣṭe | na hītyādi | samagrāṇītyeva sannihitānītyeva kāraṇadravyāṇi svakārya janayanti | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | sāmagrītyādi | sāmagryāḥ sakāśājjanma yāsāṃ śaktīnāntāsāmuttarottarapariṇāmaḥ | pūrvvapūrvvakṣaṇāduttarottaraviśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādo yastadapekṣatvāt kāryotpādasya | atrāntare ceti santānapariṇāmakāle |
pratibandhasambhavāt |

[44,3]

nanu yogyatāpyuttarottarakṣaṇapariṇāmaprativaddhā tatrāpi ca pratibandhasambhavāt kathantadanumānamapītyāha | yogyatāyāstvityādi | dravyāntarānapekṣatvāt sannihitakāraṇakalāpavyatirekeṇa kāraṇāntarānapekṣatvānna virudhyate'numānaṃ |

[44,4]

tadevānumānamāha | uttarottaretyādi | pūrvapūrvakṣaṇamupādāyottarasamarthakṣaṇotpāda uttarottaraśaktipariṇāmaḥ | tena hetubhūtena kāryotpādanasamartheti sādhyanirdeśaḥ |
iyaṃ kāraṇasāmagrīti dharmī | "śaktipariṇāmapratyayasyānyasyāpekṣaṇīyasyābhāvā"diti hetuḥ śakteḥ pariṇāmasya yo'paraḥ sahakāripratyayastasyāpekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt |

[45,1]

kutastarhi śakteḥ prasava ityāha | pūrvetyādi | pūrvasajātiḥ sadṛśaḥ pūrvaḥ kāraṇakalāpastāvanmātraṃ heturyasyāḥ śaktiprasūteḥ sā tathā | tadbhāvastasmāt |
ataḥ kāraṇāt sā yogyatānanyāpekṣiṇītyucyate ||

[45,2]

nanu kāryaṃ prati kāraṇasya yogyatā yadi śaktirucyate tadā kāryavyabhicāre yogyatāyā api vyabhicāra iti kathametadanumānaṃ | atha yogyatāsambhava ucyate tadāyamarthaḥ syāt kāryaṃ syādvā na veti | tathāpi kathamasyānumānaṃ sandehāditi |

[45,3]

atrocyate | pareṇa hi kathametadanumānantrividhahetujanyamiti codyate | yadyetadanumānampareṇa samarthyate tadā trividhaliṅgajamevetyā cā rye ṇa pratipādyate | na tvetatparamārthatānumānamityevamparametadityeke | athavā yadyekāntena kāryotpādanayogyatānumīyate | tadā vyabhicārādanumānaṃ na syāt | yadā tu kadācit kāryaṃ syādityevaṃrūpaḥ sambhavonumīyate tadā kathamasya vyabhicāraḥ | tenāyamartha uttarottarapariṇāme yadi prabandhābhāvastadā kāryaṃ syādanyadā tu nāstīti | parokte tvekāntenakāryānumāne vyabhicāra eva |

[45,4]

anye tu pariṇāmavatyāṃ sāmagryāṃ pratibandhakābhāve satyekāntena kāryotpādanayogyatā bhavatīti saivānumīyate | kāryotpādanayogyatāpratītiśca kāryamapi viśeṣaṇatvenākṣipatīti na pṛthak kāryānumānaṃ kriyata iti manyante | kevalaṃ sāmagrīmātrāt kāryānumāne vyabhicāra ucyate pratibandhakābhāvaḥ kathampratipanna iti cet |
satyaṃ | yo hi taṃ jñātuṃ śaknoti tasyaitadanumānaṃ yo hi dhūmasyāgnijanyatvaṃ jñātuṃ śaknoti tasya dhūmādagnyanumānaṃ nānyasya tadvat ||

[45,5]

"yā tarhī"tyādinā punarapi tridhaiva sa ityasya vyāghātamāha | "akāryakāraṇabhūtena" | anumeyādarthā"danyenā"svabhāvena "rasādinā" | ādiśabdād gandhādi"nā rūpādigatiḥ" | atrāpyādiśabdāt sparśādigrahaṇaṃ | andhakāre hi mātuluṅgādirasamāsvādya | campakagandhamāghrāya | vahneśca sparśamanubhūya | teṣāṃ rūpasāmānyamanumīyate | tathā vahnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsparśaḥ | sā kathantrividhe hetāvantarbhavatīti prakṛte |

[46,1]

na cāpramāṇamiyantato liṅgāntaraprasaṃga ityāha | "sāpī"tyādi | sāpi gatiriti sambandhaḥ | "rūpādeḥ" kimviśiṣṭa"syaikasāmagryadhīnas"ya | rasasya janikā yā sāmagrī tasyāmeva sāmagryāmāyattasya "rasato" liṅgādyā "gatiḥ" | sā hetudharmānumānena | rasasya yo "hetuḥ" pūrvamapādānantasya yo "dharmoṃ" rūpajanakatvantasyā"numānena" |
tenāyamartho rasāt sakaśāt taddhetorasasamānakālabhāvi rūpajanakatvanniścīyate |
evaṃ hi tasya rasasamānakālabhāvi rūpajanakatvaṃ niścīyate | yadi samānakālabhāvino rūpasyāpi niścayaḥ syāttenātītaikakālānāmekaiva gatiḥ kāryaliṅgajā |

[46,2]

nanvanabhihitād rasahetoḥ sakāśāt paścātsamānakālasya rupasyānumānaṃ hetoḥ kāryānumāne vyabhicārāt | kāryotpādanayogyatānumāne ca na rasasamānakālasya rūpasyānumānaṃ syāt | anumitānumānapratīterabhāvācca | tena yaducyate |
yadātītānāṃ gatistadā kāryaśca talliṅgaśca | tasmājjāteti kāryaliṅgajā |
yadā tu samāna"kālānāṅga"tistadā kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ yasya hetudharmānumānasya tatkāryaliṅgantasmājjātā kāryaliṅgajeti tadapāstaṃ | tatra pare mā... cāvayavidravye rūpādayo guṇā vyavasthitāstena tatra rūpāderasato gatiryuktā | na "bau ddhā nāṃ" rūpādivyatirekeṇāvayavino'nabhyupagamāt na dharmiṇo'bhāvāt | dharmiṇamantareṇa cānumāne rasato rūpādeḥ sarvatrānumānaprasaṅgāt | asamudāyaśca sādhyaḥ syāt | apakṣadharmaśca hetuḥ syāt | nāpi hetudharmānumānaṃ yujyate rūpādikāryatvena rasāderapratipannatvāt |
na ca kṣaṇikapakṣamaniścityaivamucyate | kṣaṇikatve hi rūpādeḥ samānajātīyakāryatvaṃ syānna rasādikāryatvaṃ pratibandhagrāhakābhāvāt | na kṣaṇānāmanumānānumeyavyavahāraḥ sambandhāniścayāt | santānāśrayeṇa tvanumānādivyavahāre rūpādisantānānāṃ na parasparaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratipanna iti kathamanumānānumeyavyavahāra iti |

[46,3]

evammanyate | na sarvatrarasāde rūpādyanumānamapi tvāmrādau dharmiṇi | tatra ca rūpādīnāṃ parasparāvinirbhāgarbhāganiyamaḥ pratīyata eva | sa ca pratibandhahetuko'nyathā ghaṭapaṭādīnāmapi parasparāvinirbhāganiyamaḥ syāt | pratibandhaśca teṣāṃ na tādātmyaṃ bhedena pratīter | nāpi tadutpattiḥ samānakālatvāt | na caikārthasamavāyasteṣāṃ yato na tāvadasamavetānāṃ samavāyabalādekārthasamavāyaḥ samavāyasyaivābhāvāt | atiprasaṅgācca | samavetānāmapi kiṃ samavāyena svahetubhya eva tathā niṣpatteḥ | tathā niṣpattyaiva vācyābhidhānād gamakatvam | tasmādekasāmagryadhīnatvaṃ pratibandhaḥ | niścitapratibandhasya cānyasmin kālenumānaṃ | yadyapi cātrāvayavī ma vidyate tathāpyāmrādipratyayaviṣayasya dharmitvantena tatra rasato rūpādigatiḥ |

[46,4]

nanu tathāpi kathameṣāmekasāmagryadhīnatvaṃ | yato "ye"naiva svabhāvena rūpaṃrūpaṃ janayati na tenaiva rasādikaṃ janayati teṣāṃ parasparābhedaprasaṃgāt | nāpyanyenānyaṃ janayati tasya svabhāvabhedaprasaṃgāt |

[47,1]

naiṣa doṣo yasmāt | na tatra rūpasya pūrvvamekakāryajanakatvaṃ yenāyandoṣaḥ syāt | kintvekakālamanekakāryajanakatvameva | tatastasyaivotpattidarśanāt |
na ca kāraṇasya kāryābhāva eva kāraṇatvaṃ yenānekamekasmādutpadyamānamekaṃ prasajyeta kintu kāryotpattau prāgbhāva eva tasya kāraṇatvaṃ loke | yathā caikakāryotpattau tasya prāgbhāvakāraṇatvantathā kalāpotpattāvapi dṛṣṭatvāt | yadvā yenaiva svabhāvena rūpaṃ rūpaṃ janayati tenaiva rasādikamapi svarūpabhedastveṣāmupādānabhedakṛto na sahakārikṛtaḥ |
tathā hi vāyau sparśasadbhāvepi rūpādyabhāvād rūpādyanutpattiḥ | agnau ca rūpādisadbhāvepi rasābhāvād rasānutpattiḥ | apsu rasādibhāvepi gandhābhāvād gandhānutpattistena rasāderniyataṃ kāraṇaṃ rasādirevāvasīyate | niyataṃ ca kāraṇamupādānakāraṇaṃ samānajātīyamabhinnasantānavartti vā | tasmādupādānakāraṇabhedād rūpādīnāṃ svabhāvabhedaḥ |

[47,2]

yatpunarucyate | tatrānekaśaktīnāṃ samuccayaḥ | tena rūpamekayā śaktyā rūpaṃ janayatyanyānyayā rasādikamiti |

[47,3]

tadayuktam | anekaśaktidvāreṇāpyekasyānekakāryakāraṇābhyupagame'nekatvaprasaṅgo'nivārita eva bhāvasyānekaśaktīnāmevānekasvabhāvatvāt | abhinnatvācca śaktīnāṃ śaktibhede rūpasya bhedaprasaṅgaḥ | bhede vā śaktīnāṃ rūpasyākārakatvaprasaṅgāt | na ca śaktiyogāt kārakatvamaśaktasya śaktiyogābhāvāt | śaktasyāpi kiṃ śaktiyogena svarūpeṇaiva kārakatvācchakteśca kārakatvaṃ na syācchaktiyogābhāvāt | atha śaktitvānna sā śaktimapekṣate | bhāvopi tarhi śaktatvāt kimiti śaktimapekṣate |

[47,4]

yopi mī māṃ sa ko manyate | bhāvasya svarūpātiśaya eva "śa ktiḥ" sā ca bhinnābhinnā | yato bhāve gṛhyamāṇe śaktirna gṛhyate'to bhāvād bhinnā | kāryānyathānupapattyā tu sā bhāvasyābhinnā'nyathā bhāvasya kārakatvanna syāt | taduktaṃ |

[47,5]

"śaktayaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ kāryārthāpattikalpitā iti | "

[47,6]

sopi nirastaḥ | ekasyāḥ śakterbhinnābhinnarūpatvavirodhāt | kiṃ cārthāpattyā kāryāt prāgbhāvina eva bhāvasyābhinnā śaktiḥ kalpyatāṃ iti prāgbhāva eva śaktiḥ | sa ca pratyakṣasiddha iti kathaṃ na śaktiḥ pratyakṣā | kevalaṃ sā kāryadarśanānniścīyate | tasmāt kāryād rasādeḥ kāraṇadharmānumānād asya kāryahetāvanta"rbhāvaḥ | dhūmeradhanavikāravadi"ti | yathā dhūmādagnyādisāmagryanumitau bhasmāṅgārādīndhanavikārānumitiḥ tadvat ||

[48,1]

nanu ca rasakāryeṇānumitāt kāraṇāt sakāśāt samānakālinaḥ kāryasyānumānamidaṃ na tu hetudharmānumānamityata āha | "tatre"ti | rasād rūpe pratipattau "hetureva tathābhūta" iti rūpajananasambandho"numīyate" | yasminnanumīyamāne kāryāntaramapi tadviśeṣaṇanniścitambhavati | na tvanumitāt kāraṇāt paścāt kāryāntaramanumeyaṃ |
kuta ityāha | "hi" yasmāt | pravṛttā na pratibaddhā śaktiryasya tat "pravṛttaśakti" |
tathābhūtaṃ ca "tadrūpopādānakāraṇaṃ" ceti tathoktaṃ | tasya "sahakāripratyayaḥ" san | rasahetū "rasaṃ janayati" | tathābhūte ca hetāvanumiterthād rūpānumānaṃ rūparasayorekasāmagryadhīnatvāt | "indhanavikāraviśeṣo" bhasmāṅgārādiḥ | tasyo"pādānaṃ" kāṣṭhaṃ tasya "sahakāripratyayo"gniḥ |
tasya yathā "dhūmajananantena tulyantadvad" rūparasayorekasāmagryadhīnatvaṃ |

[48,2]

"tathā hī"tyādinā samarthayate "śaktipravṛtte"ti sūtraṃ | asya vyākhyānaṃ "svakāraṇasye"tyādi | "svakāraṇasyeti" rasasya yat svakāraṇantasya "phalotpādanaṃ" pratītirasotpādanaṃ pratyā"bhimukhyenā"nuguṇyena "vinā na rasa utpadyate | saive"ti śaktipravṛttaḥ | "anyakāraṇa"mityasya vyākhyānaṃ "rūpopādāne"tyādi | "rūpa"sya ya "upādānahetavaḥ" pūrvalakṣaṇasaṅgṛhītā rūpaparamāṇava"steṣāṃ" rūpajananampratyābhimukhyaṃ "pravṛtti"stasyāḥ "kāraṇaṃ" | rasahetunaiva sahakāriṇā rūpopādānasya svakāryaṃ pratyābhimukhyāt | sāpi "rasopādānakāraṇapravṛttī rūpopādānakāraṇa"sya rūpajananamprati yā "pravṛttistayā" saha karttu śīlaṃ yasyā "rasopādānakāraṇapravṛtteḥ" sā tathoktā | yata eva"ntasmād yathābhūtāddheto"riti pravṛttaśaktirūpopādānakāraṇasahitāt pūrvakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītād rasālliṅgatvenābhimato rasa "utnnastathābhūta"meva hetuma"numāpayan" gamayan samānakālaṃ"rūpaṃ" gamayati | tenāyamartho hetuniścaya evedṛśo nānyaḥ |

[49,1]

na punaranumitāt kāraṇāt paścāt kāryānumānaṃ | yataśca kāryajanakatvenaiva hetudharmaniścayo nānyathā tenaivāha | "iti tatrāpī"tyādi | iti anena dvāreṇa | tatrāpi rasāde rūpādyanumāne'"tītānāmekakālānāṃ ca gatiḥ" | rasopādānasamānakālabhāvino'tītāḥ | liṅgabhūtarasasahabhāvina ekakālāsteṣāṅgatiḥ | "nā'nāgatānā"mvarttamānena liṃgenānumānaṃ "vyabhicārā"t | anāgataṃ hi kāraṇāntarapratibaddhantatra pratibandhavaikalyasambhavānna bhavedapi | yaccādyodayāt śvaḥ sūryodayādyanumānanna tadanumānaṃ niyāmakaliṅgābhāvāt | adya gardabhadarśanāt śvaḥ sūryodayānumānavat | "tasmādiyamapi" rasāde rūpādigatiḥ "kāryaliṅgaje"tyanumānaṃ | yataśca sādhyāyattatvena heturgamaka"stena" kāraṇena trividhāddheto"rnānyo" hetuḥ saṃyogyādi"rgamako"sti | kasmāttādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ liṅginya"pratibaddhasvabhāvasyāvinābhāvaniyamābhāvāt" ||

[49,2]

etaduktambhavati | na tāvadaśliṣṭānāṃ saṃyogosti | śliṣṭānāmapi kiṃ saṃyogena svahetubhyaḥ eva śliṣṭānāmutpatteḥ | tasmānna saṃyogavaśād gamakatvamapratibaddhatvāt | ghaṭaghaṭayoriva | tathā pṛthaksiddhānānna samavāyaḥ | apṛthaksiddhānāmapi kiṃ samavāyena svahetubhya evoparyuparibhāvena niṣpattestena na samavāyenāpi gamakatvaṃ | sādhyāyattatvābhāvānna ca samavāyostīti vakṣyati | ata evaikārthasamavāyinorabhāva iti pūrvamevoktaṃ rasādyanumāne | virodhī cānupalabdhāvantarbhāvitaḥ |

[49,3]

yacca nai yā yi koktaṃ "pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ cānumānaṃ"nyāyasūtraṃ 1 | 1 | 5 | tatra pūrvavat kāraṇāt kāryānumānaṃ | tacca vyabhicārīti pratipāditaṃ | śeṣavadanumānaṃ ca kāryāt kāraṇānumānaṃ tadiṣṭameva śāstrakṛtā | sāmānyato dṛṣṭantvanumānaṃ yadanyatra dharmiṇi sādhyasādhanayorvyāptindṛṣṭvānyatrānumānaṃ |
yathā devadattasya deśāntaraprāptiṃ gatipūrvikāṃ dṛṣṭvā'dityasyāpi deśāntaraprāptyā gatyanumānaṃ | "etadapi kāryaliṅgajameva" | deśāntaraprāptergatikāryatvāt | sarvamevānumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭameveti svayamevā cā ryaṃstṛtīye paricchede vakṣyati |

[49,4]

yadapyu dyo ta ka re ṇa sāmānyato dṛṣṭamudāhṛtaṃ | yathā valākātastoyānumānantadapi kāryaliṅgajameveti pra mā ṇa vi ni śca ye'bhihitaṃ |

[50,1]

"tasmā"ddhetutrayavyatirekeṇa "nānyo heturgamakos"tīti sthitaṃ ||

[50,2]

"ete"neti rasāde rūpādyanumānasya kāryaliṅgajatvakathanena | "pipīlikotsaraṇa"ntāsāṃ gṛhītāṇḍānāmanyatra sañcaraṇaṃ | "matsyā"nāmu"dvartta"nammatsyavikāraḥ | "ādi"śabdād vidyudvikāsamaṇḍūkarutādiparigrahaḥ | "varṣādyanumānami"tya"trāpi" ādiśabdād vātādyanumāna"muktaṃ" | yathā tadapi kāryaliṅgajahetudharmānumānāt |

[50,3]

etadevāha | "tatrāpī"tyāda | tatrāpi pipīlikotsaraṇādau | bhūtapariṇāma eva varṣaheturiti | evakāro bhinnakramaḥ | "varṣahetureva bhūtapariṇāmaḥ" | pipīlikāsaṃkṣobhāderutsaraṇādilakṣaṇasya hetuḥ | tasmād yathābhūtād bhūtapariṇāmād varṣahetuḥ "pipīlikādī"nāmvikāro jātaḥ | tathābhūtasya hetoranumānāt samānakālavarṣādyanumānaṃ | anyatra tu yogyatānumīyate na tu varṣa eva pratibandhasambhavena"vyabhicā"rāt | tasmāt samagrādapi kāraṇakalāpānnāsti kāryānumānaṃ kevalaṃ yogyatānumānameva ||

[50,4]

ye tu mī māṃ sa kā dayo'samagrādapi kāraṇāt kāryamanumimate | te'tyantanyāyabahiṣkṛtā ityetad darśayannāha |

[50,5]

"hetunā tvasamagreṇetyādi" | asamagreṇeti vikalena | "śeṣavadanu"mānamanaikāntikamityarthaḥ | kutosāmarthyāt || asya vyākhyānaṃ "samagrāṇyeva" hītyādi | kāryasya tāvat sarvathā nānumānaṃ | "yogyatāmapyanumāpayanti" samagrāṇyevānumāpayantītyetadapiśabdenāha | "asamagrasyaikāntenāsāmarthyādi"tyuttarottarapariṇāmenāpyasāmarthyānna pākṣikamapi kāryānumānaṃ | "dehād rāgānumānavad" ityasyodāharaṇasya vyākhyānaṃ | yathetyādi |
dehaścendriyāṇi ca "buddha"yaśceti dvandvaḥ | rāgādimānayaṃ puruṣo dehavattvādindriyavattvāt buddhi"mattvāt" | evandehādibhyo "rāgādyanumānaṃ" | ādiśabdād dveṣamohādiparigrahaḥ | "sūtre" tu deharāgagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ | na hīndriyādyeva kāraṇaṃ rāgādeḥ || yasmā"dātmātmīyābhiniveśapūrvakā rāgādayaḥ" | ātmanyātmīye cāhammameti yobhiniveśaḥ sa pūrvaḥ kāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ rāgādīnāntena tathoktāḥ | "ayoniśa" ityādyasyaiva samarthanaṃ | yoniḥ padārthānāmanityaduḥkhānātmādi | samyagdarśanaprasatihetutvāt | taṃ śaṃsatyālambata itiyoniśaḥ | yoniṃ yoniṃ manaskarotīti "saṃkhyaikavacanācca vīpsāyā"miti śas pratyayo vā | tathābhūtaścāsau manaskāraśceti yoniśomanaskāro nairātmyajñānaṃ | tadviruddhamātmādijñānama"yoniśomanaskāra"stat"pūrvakatvāt sarva"rāgādi"doṣotpatteḥ" ||

[51,1]

nanu dehendriyabuddhayopi rāgādināṃ hetavastadrahiteṣu rāgādyadarśanādityāha | "dehādīnāṃ hetutvepī"ti "kevalānā"mityayoniśomanaskārarahitānāṃ | rāgādau sādhye |
rāgādirahitā upalakhaṇḍādayo "vipakṣa"statra heturdehādimattvasya yā "vṛtti"stasyā"adṛṣṭāvapi" | viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāc"cheṣavadanumā"namasmā"cca saṃśayo bhavati"
na niścayaḥ || yathā caitadanantaroktaṃ na pramāṇa"ntathā vipakṣe" hetora"dṛṣṭimātreṇa kāryasāmānya"sya kāryamātrasya "darśanāt" | "hetujñāna"mviśiṣṭakāraṇānumānaṃ"pramāṇābhaṃ" pramāṇābhāsamanaikāntikamiti yāvat | kimiva | "vacanādrāgitādivat" ||

[51,2]

nanu sarvameva vacanaṃ"rāgādikārya"miti kathantatkāryasāmānyamityata āha | "na hī"tyādi | oṣṭhayoś"calanaṃ" spando "vacana"kāle ca tasyāvaśyaṃbhāvāt | "ādi"śabdād anyasyāpi vacanakālabhāvino mukhavikārādergrahaṇaṃ | aviśiṣṭavivakṣāmātraṃ vaktukāmatā sāmānyantadeva "heturye"ṣāṃ spandādīnānte tathoktāstadbhāvastasmāt || "saiva" vaktukāmatā "rāga iti cet" | āsaktirūpatvād rāgasyeti manyate || ā cā rya āha | "iṣṭatvānna kiṃcid bādhitaṃ" | vaktukāmatā kāryasya vacanasyeṣṭatvānna kiñcid aniṣṭaṃ | na ca vaktukāmatā rāgaḥ, api tu "nityasukhātmātmīyākāraṃ yaddarśana""mabhiniveśastenākṣiptaṃ" janitaṃ | "sāsravadharmaviṣayami"ti pañcopādānaskandhālambanaṃ cetasobhiṣvaṅgaṃ "rāgamāhu"rvidvāṃsaḥ ||

[52,1]

syānmataṃ | vītarāgābhimatānāṃ maitrīkaruṇādaya iṣyante | te ca satvālambanatvād ātmādidarśanapravṛttāḥ sattvānunayapravṛttyā cābhiṣvaṅgasvabhāvāstato vītarāgā api rāgiṇaḥ prasaktā ityata āha | "naivaṃ karuṇādaya" iti | na sattvālambanā vītarāgāṇāṃ karuṇādayaḥ | "anyathāpi sambhavāt" | dharmālambanānāmapi sambhavātetaccānantarameva "nivedayiṣyāmaḥ" | atra vacanād rāgānumāne kriyamāṇe vacanamātrādapratipattirityanena sambandhaḥ | yasmād "yathā rakto bravīti tathā viraktopī"ti prakṣīṇarāgopi | "na vacanamātrād" rāgānumānaṃ kintarhi vacanaviśeṣāt |
yo rāgeṇaiva janyata ityāha | "nāpi viśeṣā"diti | kiṅkāraṇam | "abhiprāyasya durbodhatvāt" | virakto hi raktavacceṣṭate | raktopi viraktavadityabhiprāyo durbodhaḥ |
tataśca "vyavahārasaṃkareṇa sarveṣā"miti vacanānāṃ | vacanamātrasya vacanaviśeṣasya ca rāgāderliṅgatvenopanītasya "vyabhicārāt" | na viśeṣādapi rāgādyanumānaṃ || yaduktantathā virakto bravītīti tatrottaramāśaṃkate | "prayojane"tyādi | vacanoccāraṇaṃ vyava hāraḥ | na hi vītarāgasya vacanoccāraṇe phalamasti tathā cāvyabhicāro rāgavacanayoriti bhāvaḥ | netyā cā ryaḥ | "na" prayojanābhāvaḥ "parārthatvād" vyāhārasya |

[52,2]

"na yukta" ityādiparaḥ | vītarāgo hi pareṣṭavyāsakto na ca saktimantareṇa parārthapravṛttirastīti bhāvaḥ | naitadevaṃ | "karuṇayāpi pravṝtteḥ || saiva karuṇā rāga iti cet" | tadeta"diṣṭaṃ" karuṇā rāga iti nāmakaraṇaṃ || sattvadarśana"viparyāsāyātatvāt"
karuṇāpi rāgātmako "doṣa" iti cedāha | "aviparyāse"tyādi | "aviparyāsodbhavatva" mevāha | "asatyapyātma"grahaṇa ityādi | "duḥkhaviśeṣadarśanamātreṇe"ti saṃskā"raduḥkhatā"nirūpaṇamātreṇa | "abhyāsabalotpādite"ti pūrvapūrvasajātīyakṣaṇotpannā bhavatyeva karuṇā | āgamenāpi saṃsyandayannāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | ādiśabdād anālambanā gṛhyante | "sattvā"lambanā pṛthagjanānāṃ | "dharmālambanā" āryāṇāṃ | anālambanā grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśavigatānāṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ | "maitryādayo" maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣā"iṣyante" siddhānte |

[53,1]

nanu ca sattvālambanā eva pṛthagjanenābhyastāstāstatkathaṃ dharmādyālambanā ucyanta ityata āha |

[53,2]

"etāśca" maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāḥ | "sajātīyābhyāsavṛttayaḥ" pūrvapūrvasadṛśakṣaṇabalenotpatteḥ | etāvāṃstu viśeṣo yāvat sattvampaśyati tāvatsattvālambanāḥ | yāvaddharmantāvad dharmālambanāḥ | "na rāgāpekṣiṇya" iti nānuśayena sattveṣu pravarttanta ityarthaḥ |

[53,3]

nanu duḥkhaviśeṣadarśanamātreṇābhyāsabalotpādinītyanantaramevāyamartha uktaḥ |

[53,4]

satyaṃ | karuṇāmevāśrityādhunā sarvāṇyeveti viśeṣaḥ | ātmadarśananivṛttāvapi tarhi karuṇāvadabhyāsād rāgādayaḥ pravarttanta ityāha | "naivaṃ rāgāda"yassajātīyābhyāsavṛttayo yenātmadṛṣṭinivṛttāvapi pravartteran | ātmādi"viparyāsābhāve'bhāvāt" ||

[53,5]

"kāruṇikasya niṣphalaḥ" parārtha "ārambho'viparyāsādā"tmādyabhiniveśābhāvena svārthasyaivābhāvāt | nāyandoṣaḥ "parārthasyaiva phalatveneṣṭatvāt" || iṣṭo nāma parārthastathāpi kathaṃ phalatvamiti cet || āha | "icche"tyādi | "icchayā" lakṣyata itīcchālakṣaṇamicchāviṣayatvādityarthaḥ | yadiṣṭantatphalamiti yāvat ||

[53,6]

nanvahamiti buddhirahitasya kathaṃ parārthāpi pravṛttiriti cet | na |
akliṣṭā jñānasadbhāvāt pravṛttirityeke | yogabalena śuddhalaukikacittasammukhīkaraṇādityapare | vineyānāṃ tathā pratibhāsanādityanye ||

[53,7]

"sarvathe"tyupasaṃhāraḥ | yadi vacanād vītarāgasya vaktukāmatā sādhyate atha karuṇā tena sarāga ityucyate | "sarvathā'bhūtāsamāropād" vītarāgādi"rnirdoṣaḥ" | doṣasvabhāvasya rāgāderavaśyabhāvāt | "tadanyena" rāgādibhyonyena vaktukāmatādinā "vītarāgasya""doṣavattvasādhane na kiṃcid aniṣṭaṃ" ||

[54,1]

syānmatiḥ | vaktaryātmani rāgādirdṛṣṭastataḥ sapakṣe sattvadarśanamātreṇa vītarāgābhimateṣvapyanumānambhaviṣyatītyāha | "vaktaryātmanī"tyādi | "anyatra tadanumāna"
iti vītarāgābhimate rāgādyanumāne"'tiprasaṃgaḥ" | vaktaryātmani yāvān kaścid viśeṣo dṛṣṭastasya sarvasyānyatrānumānaprasaṅgaḥ | ātmani dṛṣṭasya śyāmagauratādilakṣaṇasya viśeṣasya "vyabhicārāt | ananyānumāna" iti rāgādanyasyātmagatasya viśeṣasyānumāne | "iheti" sādhyābhimate rāgādāvapya"vyabhicāra iti ko niścayaḥ" | naiva kaścit |
pratibandhābhāvād rāgavacanayoḥ | yasmādātmanidarśanānnānumānantasmāt "karaṇa" | karaṇaguṇastālvādīnāmpāṭavādiḥ sa ca vaktukāmatā ceti dvandvaḥ | dvitīyādvivacanamevaitat || "rāgotpādanayogyatārahite"
pāṣāṇādau "vacanādarśanāt" | saiva vacanādavasīyata ityāha | rāgetyādi | "tadanumāna"
iti yogyatānumāne"'tiprasaṃgaḥ" | tathā hi yathā pāṣāṇādau rāgotpādanayogyatāvirahastathā sarvapuruṣadharmairapi tatastathābhūte vacanādarśanād yadi rāgotpādanayogyatānumānamevaṃ sarvapuruṣadharmasya ||

[54,2]

atha mataṃ | rāgotpādanayogyatā hi rāgavacanayorekaṅkāraṇantadanumāne ca rāgopyarthatonumito bhavati tena yogyatā evānumānaṃ na sarveṣāṃ puruṣadharmāṇāmityatrāha | "rāgasyetyā"di | "rāgasyānupayoge" vacanaṃ prati tālvādivyāpārādeva śabdaniṣpateḥ | "kathantacchaktiḥ" rāgaśaktirvacanaṃpratyu"payujyate | atha" tālvādivyāpārakāle rāgaśakterapi vacanampratyupayoga iṣyate | tataścādyavarṇṇaniṣpattikāle rāgasyāpi niṣpattirekasāmagryadhīnatvāt | tasya ca rāgasya santānavā"hitva"ntathā ca dvitīyādivarṇṇaniṣpatau rāga evopayuktassyāt | tadāha | "śaktyupayoge hi sa evopayuktaḥ syādi"ti | "na" ca rāgasyopayogostī"tyuktaṃ"
prāk |

[54,3]

athavātmātmīyābhiniveśarahitānāṃ rāgasyānupayoge vacanaṃprati | kathaṃ tacchaktī rāgaśaktirvāsanākhyātmātmīyābhiniveśalakṣaṇā vacanampratyupayujyate | vītarāgāṇāmātmādyabhiniveśasyābhāvāt | śaktyupayoge hi vacanaṃ prati | sa eva rāga upayuktaḥ syādātmādyabhiniveśavatāṃ sarveṣāmeva rāgitvāt | tacca rāgasya vacanaṃpratyupayogitvannāstītyuktaṃ | vaktukāmatā sāmānyahetutvādityatrāntare ||

[55,1]

"tasmā"dityādi nigamanaṃ | nāntarīyakameveti kāraṇenā"vinābhāvyeva" | tatpratibandhāt | "tatra" kāraṇe "āyattatvāt | nānya"dapratibaddhaṃ "vipakṣe" hetora"darśanepi" |
arvāgdarśanasyādarśanamātreṇāniścayāt | "sarvadarśinastu darśananivṛttyā" syā"nniścaya"stasya hi sarvajñeyavyāpi jñānaṃ | etadevāha | "sarvadarśana" ityādi | kimpunaradarśanamātrānnābhāvaniścaya ityāha | "kvacittathe"tyādi | tena prakāreṇa "dṛṣṭānāṃ"
prāk | "punardeśakālasaṃskārabhede"neti bhedaśabdasya pratyekaṃ sambandhaḥ | saṃskāraḥ kṣīrāvasekādiḥ | pūrvadṛṣṭaprakārāda"nyathā" syāt | kimivetyāha | "yathāmalakya"
iti | saṃskārabhedasyaitadudāharaṇanna "caivambahula"miti na madhuraphalā bahula"ndṛśyante" |
kaṣāyaphalānāṃ bāhulyena darśanāt | na cedānīṃ bahulaṃ madhuraphalānāmadarśanāt |
kvacitsambhavino madhuraphalasya pratikṣepaḥ | tathā deśabhedena piṇḍakharjjūrasya sambhavaḥ |
kālabhedena puṣpādeḥ | āmalakīdṛṣṭāntena caitadāha | yathāmalakyaḥ kṣīrādisaṃskārādanyathā bhavanti | tathā rāgādiyogyaścittasantānastattvābhyāsābhisaṃskārād yogyo bhavati | abhyāsācca nairātmyālambanameva vijñānaṃ spaṣṭābhamvairārāgyamucyate | nairātmyadarśanādātmādyabhiniveśavigamena rāgādyanutpatteḥ | sarvadharmakṣaṇikatvādyālambanaṃ ca jñānaṃ spaṣṭābhaṃ "sarvajñatvaṃ" cocyate | sarvājñānavigamāt |
tasmāt tattvābhyāsanimittā sphuṭābhatvabṛddhireva tattvasākṣātkaraṇena pratyakṣatvakāriṇī rāgādiyogyasvabhāvatāṃ jñānasya bādhate | tataścānyathādṛṣṭamapi hetubalādanyathā bhavedapi | tena yadi nāma rāgārahite kvacid vacanaṃ na dṛṣṭantāvatā sarvatra vītarāge vacanena na bhāvyamiti nāsti niścayaḥ | "tata"ścāniścitavyatirekād vacanamātrānna rāgadyanumānaṃ | yata evantena kāraṇe"naitadyuktamvaktuṃ mādṛśo vaktā" |
yohamivāyoniśomanaskārān | tadevāha | "rāgotpattī"tyādi | kaḥ punarasāvityāha | "ātme"tyādi | "ātmadarśanaṃ" sa tkā ya dṛ ṣṭiḥ | nityasukhādiviparyāso'yoniśo manaskāraḥ | dvandvasamāsaścāyaṃ | ātmadarśanamevāyoniśomanaskāra iti viśeṣaṇasamāsovā | "tade"ti mādṛśo "vakte"ti viśeṣaṇepya"pārthako vacanodāhāraḥ" | vacanādityasya hetorudāharaṇamanarthakamityarthaḥ | tadā hi yo mādṛśo rāgotpattipratyayaviśeṣeṇa yuktaḥ sa rāgī | yathāhamityayameva hetuḥ syāt | yata evamadarśanamātrānnāsti niścayasta"smād vipakṣe'dṛṣṭi"rvipakṣe hetoradarśanama"hetu"rliṅgasya vyatirekaniścayaṃ prati ||

[56,1]

syānmatiḥ | vipakṣadṛṣṭyā hetorvyabhicāro na ca vītarāge vacanaṃ dṛṣṭantasmādadarśanāt sādhyābhāve vyatirekaḥ siddha ityata āha |

[56,2]

"na cādarśanamātreṇe"ti "vipakṣe" hetora"vyabhicāritā" | kasmāt | "mambhāvyavyabhicāratvāt" | sambhāvyo vyabhicāro yasya sa tathā tadbhāvastasmāt | yadyapi na dṛṣṭo vipakṣe tathāpi tatra sambhavo na viruddha iti saṃmbhāvyate vyabhicāraḥ |
sthālyantargatāstaṇḍulāḥ "sthālītaṇḍulāsteṣāṃ pākavat" |

[56,3]

etameva dṛṣṭāntaṃ samarthayitumāha | "na hī"tyādi | "bāhulyena" sthālyantargatānāṃ"pakvānāndarśane"pi na "sthālyantargatatvena kevalena pākaḥ sidhyati" | mātragrahaṇantu viśeṣanirāsārthaṃ | yad vakṣyatyevantu syāditi | kuto'siddhi"rvyabhicārasya darśanāt | evaṃ"svabhāvā iti ye pakvā dṛṣṭāstaistulyasvabhāvāḥ | etaireva pakvaiḥ "samānaḥ"
pākaheturyeṣānte pakvā iti | "anyathā tvi"tyasatyetasmin viśeṣaṇe | "śeṣo"stīti"śeṣavada"nirṇṇīto viṣayostīti yāvat | tacca "vyabhicāri" ||

[56,4]

kinnai yā yi ko ktaṃ kāryāt kāraṇānumānarūpaṃ śeṣavadanumānamihābhipretamutānyadeveti pṛcchati | "kiṃpunari"tyādi | śeṣavatsvarūpamāha | "yasye"tyādi | "yasya" hetora"darśanamātreṇā"pramāṇakena vipakṣa"vyatirekaḥ prasādhyate | tasya" hetoḥ "saṃśayahe"tutvāt saṃśayakāritvā"ccheṣavattada"numānamu"dāhṛtaṃ" | kiṅkāraṇa"ntasya" hetoḥ "sa vyatireko'niścita iti vipakṣepi vṛttirāśaṃkyeta" | kiṃpunarna niścita ityāha | "vyatireke"tyādi ||
anupalambhepi kathaṃ saṃśaya ityāha | "na sarve"tyādi | dṛśyānu"palabdhireva na gamikā" |
yata evannādarśanamātrād vyatireka"stasmādekanivṛttyā" sādhyanivṛttyā"nyanivṛttiṃ"sādhananivṛtti"miccha"tā "tayoḥ" sādhyasādhanayoḥ "kaścit" svabhāvena "pratibandha"stādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇo"pyeṣṭavyaḥ" | na kevalamadṛṣṭimātraṃ | "anyathā" pratibandhāniṣṭāva"gamako hetuḥ syāt" | vyāpteraniścitatvāt ||

[57,1]

yata evantena kāraṇena "hetostriṣvapi rūpeṣu" pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekeṣu "niścayo varṇṇitaḥ" | ācārya di gnā ge na pra mā ṇa sa mu cca yā diṣu | "asiddhastu" dvayorapi sādhanamityādinā | kasya nirāsenetyāha | a"siddhe"tyādi | "ādyā"ditvāt tṛtīyārthe tasi vipakṣeṇetyarthaḥ |

[57,2]

tatrāsiddhavipakṣeṇa pakṣadharmatvaniścayo varṇṇitaḥ | "viparotārthā"viruddhastasya vipakṣeṇānvayaniścayaḥ | "vyabhicāryanai"kāntikastasya vipakṣeṇa vyatirekaniścayaḥ ||

[57,3]

anvayavyatirekaniścayaṃ ca varṇṇayatā pratibandhopyarthato darśita eva | yasmānna"hyasati pratibandhe'nvayavyatirekaniścayosti | tena" kāraṇena "tameva" tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ pratibandha"ndarśaya"nnākṣipa"nniścayamāha" | yasya doṣasya nirāsena yo niścaya uktastaṃ vyācaṣṭe | "tatre"tyādi | "viruddhatatpakṣyāṇā"miti viruddhānāṃ viruddhapakṣyāṇāṃ ca | viruddhapakṣyā yeṣāṃ sattvaṃ vipakṣe niścitaṃ sapakṣasattvaṃ sandigdhaṃ |
sandigdhānaikāntikā evaite paraprasiddhyā tvevamabhidhānaṃ | "vyatirekasyāniścaye"neti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ | anaikāntikasya nirāsa iti sambandhaḥ | tenāyamarthaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikasyeti | "tatpakṣa"sya ca | anaikāntikapakṣasya ca | "śeṣavadādeḥ" | ādiśabdāt sapakṣavipakṣayossandigdhasya nirāsaḥ | yasya sapakṣasattvaṃ vipakṣe cādarśanamātrād vyatirekastaccheṣavat |

[58,1]

"prasiddhastu dvayo"rityā cā rya granthamidānīṃ vyācaṣṭe | "dvayo"rityādi | dvayoritya"nenaika"sya vādinaḥ prativādino vā yaḥ "siddhastasyapratiṣe"dhaḥ | "prasiddhavacanena" sandigdhayoḥ "śeṣavadasādhāraṇayoḥ" pratiṣedha iti sambandhaḥ | kva sandigdhayorityāha | "sapakṣavipakṣayorapī"ti "śeṣavato"'sapakṣasandehaḥ | "asā"dhāraṇasya tu sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ |
tasmānniścayavacanādā cā rye ṇā pi pratibandha iṣṭa eva ||

[58,2]

"anyathā'sati pratibandhe" sādhyasādhanayoḥ | "vipakṣe'darśanamātreṇa vyatireke"
ācāryeṇeṣyamāṇe | "vyabhicārivipakṣeṇā"naikāntikapratipakṣeṇa "vaidharmyavacanaṃ ca yat"
pratijñātantadapārthakamityākūtaṃ |

[58,3]

kva punarācāryeṇaṃ pratijñātamityāha | "yade"tyādi | nyā ya mu khe caitaduktaṃ | "yadubhayaṃ vaktavya"miti sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ca | kasya pratipakṣeṇa kimuktamityāha | "viruddhe"tyādi | sādhanasya vacanaṃ "viruddhapratipakṣe"ṇa vaidharmyavacana"manaikāntikapratipakṣeṇa" |
yadyadṛṣṭiphalantacca | adarśanamātraphalantacceti "vaidharmyavacanaṃ" |

[59,1]

etadeva vyācaṣṭe | "yadī"tyādi | teneti "vaidharmyavacanena vipakṣe" hetora"darśanaṃ "tyadarśanama"nuktepi" vaidharmye "gamyate" | darśanābhāvalakṣaṇasyādarśanasya vaidharmyavacanāt prāgapi siddhatvāt | tasmādapārthakamvaidharmyavacanaṃ |

[59,2]

hetordarśanabhrāntirvipakṣesti tannivṛtyarthamvaidharmyavacanamiti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | "tasye"ti pratipādyasya vaidharmyavacanāt "prāk" | hetorvipakṣe "darśanabhrānti"rasti "yā" vaidharmya"vacanena nivarttyate" || tasmādetad yathā sapakṣe hetordarśane na bhrāntiḥ kintu tadvismṛtamiti sādharmyavacanena smaryate | tathā "smṛtirvācā" vaidharmyavacanenā"darśane kriyata iti cet" | dṛṣṭāntameva vighaṭayitumāha | "darśana"mityādi | "darśanamapratīyamāna"masmaryamāṇaṃ "na" sādhyapratipattya"ṅgamiti yuktantatreti" darśane "vācā smaraṇādhānaṃ" smṛtijananaṃ | adarśanārthantu na yuktaṃ | yasmāda"darśanantu darśanābhāvo"
hetorvipakṣe | "sa darśanena bādhyate | tadabhāve" vipakṣadarśanābhāve "siddha eva" darśanābhāva "ityapārthakantatsiddhaye" darśanābhāvasiddhaye vaidharmya"vacanaṃ" | ayamabhiprāyo darśanamparokṣatvād vismaryeteti tatsmaraṇārthamvacanaṃ yuktaṃ | darśanābhāvastu darśananivṛttirūpaḥ sa ca darśanānubhavābhāvādeva pratibhāsate | pratibhāsamānasya ca kiṃ smaraṇena | "tatsi"ddhaye'pārthakamvacanaṃ ||

[59,3]

na vai anupalabhamānasya puṃsastāvatetyadarśanamātreṇa vipakṣe heturnāstītyevaṃ niścayo bhavati deśādiviprakṛṣṭānāmanupalambhepi sattvāt | tadarthannāstīti niścayotpādanārthamvaidharmyavacanamiti cettanna | yasmānna ca nāstīti vacanādapramāṇakāt tatpratikṣipyamāṇaṃ nāstyeva | kathantarhi nāstīti gamyata ityāha | "yathe"tyādi |

[59,4]

etaduktambhavati | hetoḥ svasādhye pratibandhagrāhakameva pramāṇaṃ sādhyāyattatāgrāhakantacceha darśanamabhipretaṃ yacca sādhya eva hetordarśanamidameva sarvatra vipakṣe'darśanaṃ |
tena yasya sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhagrāhakaṃ darśanaṃ pravṛttamvismṛtaṃ ca tasyaiva puṃsaḥ darśanādarśanayoḥ pratītayoḥ sādharmyavaidharmyavacanābhyāṃ smaraṇaṃ kriyate nānyasyetyarthaḥ |
yadāha | pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntābhyāmupadarśyata iti | yathā yadi nāsti sa khyāpyataiti | yathā yena prakāreṇa svasādhyapratibandhena vipakṣe heturnāsti yadi sa nyāya iti pratibandhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ khyāpyate smaryate tadā nāstīti gamyate | na tu pratibandhamantareṇa |

[60,1]

"yadī"tyādi prathamaṃ kārikābhāgamāha | "yadyanupalabhamānonupalambhamātrānnāstīti"
na pratyeti tadā vaidharmyavacanādapyapramāṇakānna pratyeṣyati | yasmāttadapi vaidharmyavacanaṃ |
tvatā "tenā"nupalambhameva "khyāpaya"ti nādhikamviśeṣaṃ |

[60,2]

syānmataṃ | sādhyābhāvakṛto hetvabhāvo vaidharmyavacanena khyāpyate | tatosti viśeṣa ityata āha | "na caike"tyādi | "ekānupalambha" iti sādhyānupalambhaḥ | "anyābhāvaṃ" sādhanābhāvaṃ | asati pratibandha iti bhāvaḥ | "atiprasaṃgādi"ti pratibandhamantareṇa nivṛttau gonivṛttyāpyaśvasya niyamena nivṛttiḥ syāt |

[60,3]

atha matam | ācāryadi gnā ge na "vipakṣe heturnnāstī" tyuktamata eva niścaya ityata āha | "na ce"tyādi | "tenā" cā rye ṇa "nāstīti" yad vaidharmya"vacanaṃ" kṛtaṃ ta"smāttathā bhavati" vastuno nāstitvameva bhavatya"tiprasaṅgāt" | tadvacanasya hi prāmāṇye pratijñāmātrādapi sādhyasiddhiḥ syāt | "tadi"ti tasmāt "kathamvaidharmyavacanenānaikāntikaparihāraḥ" | naiva | "tasmād" vipakṣāddheto"rvyāvṛttimiccha"tā tatra vyāvṛttau "nyāyo vaktavyaḥ" |
sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ "yata" iti nyāyāt | "asye"ti pratipādyasya |
sādhanaṃ "vyāvṛttimiti niścayo bhavati" ||

[60,4]

"nan"vityādi paraḥ | "tadabhāve" sādhyābhāve'"nupalambhāt"ttirhetorayameva nyāya iti manyate | "yadyadṛṣṭyā" hetorvipakṣā"nnivṛttiḥ syātta"dā "śeṣavada"numānaṃ"vyabhicāri kiṃ" | naiva vyabhicāri syāt | kīdṛśaṃ punastadityāha | yathetyādi | "etāni phalānī"tyupayuktādanyāni | ayaṃ ca dharminirddeśaḥ | "pakvānyevaṃ rasāni" ceti sādhyadharmaḥ | evaṃrasāni madhurāṇyamlāni vā | "rūpāviśeṣādi"ti hetuḥ | upayuktasya phalasya yadrūpaṃ raktatādi | tena tulyatvāt | "ekaśākhāprabhavādve"ti hetuḥ | "upayuktavadi"ti dṛṣṭāntaḥ | kasmādadarśanamātrād vyatireka iṣyamāṇe śeṣavatovyabhicāritvaṃ syādityāha | "atrāpī"tyādi | atra śeṣavadanumāne "vivakṣitaṃ"
rūpaviśeṣādiyuktamupabhuktādanyatphalantasyā"śeṣasya" pa"kṣīkara"ṇe | "heto" rūpādiśeṣādikasya "sādhyābhāvenupalaṃbhostīti" vipakṣāvyāvṛttirataścā"vyabhicāritā" syāt |
tathā hi yat pakṣīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ yaccopayuktaṃ sapakṣatvenopāttantadvyatirekeṇa vipakṣabhūte tṛtīye rāśau nāsti yathoktasya hetorvṛttiḥ |

[61,1]

"pratyakṣabādhe"tyādi | kadācidekaśākhāprabhavasyāpi phalasyāpakvasyātadrasasya vā pratyakṣeṇānubhavasambhavāt "pratyakṣabādhāśaṅkā eva" śeṣavato "vyabhicāra ityeke" ī śva ra se na prabhṛtayaḥ | tadayamartho na kevalābhyāmanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ heturgamakaḥ, api tvabādhitaviṣayatve satīti | netyādinā pariharati | "pakṣīkṛto"
yo"viṣa"yaḥ parokṣastatra pratyakṣabādhāyā "abhāvāt" | na pravṛttena pratyakṣeṇa bādhāśaṅkā kintu kadācid gandhapratyakṣabādhāpakṣaṃ iti cedāha | "tathe"tyādi | "tathā" kadācit pratyakṣabādhā bhavedityāśaṅkāyāmatiprasaṃgaḥ | yasmā"danyatrā"bhimate hetau pratyakṣabādhāyā "abhāvaniyamābhāvāt" | na hi sambandhābhyupagame parasya bādhāśaṅkā nivarttata iti bhāvaḥ | tasmāt pratibandhānabhyupagamavādinā "vṛttaṃ pramāṇaṃ bādhakame"ṣṭavyaṃ | "avṛttabādhane"'pravṛttenaiva pramāṇena bādhane "sarvatrānāśvāsaḥ" sarvatra hetau na syādāśvāso gamakatvaniścayaḥ | bādhakasya śaṃkyamānatvāt | naivaṃ pratibandhavādinaḥ sarvatra hetāvanāśvāsaḥ sādhyapratibaddhe hetau bādhāśaṃkāyā apyabhāvāt | hetuprayogāttu pūrvaṃ syād bādhāśaṃkā | ata eva sandigdhe hetuvacanamucyate | na ca vṛttaṃ pramāṇaṃ śeṣavato bādhakamasti | tasmāt sthitametad adarśanamātrād vyatireke śeṣavatopyavyabhicāritvaṃ syāditi ||

[62,1]

nanu pratibandhabalāt sādhyābhāve hetorvyatireke sati sattāmātreṇa vyatireko gamakaḥ syādityata āha | "vyatirekastvityādi" | hetoryo vipakṣād "vyatirekaḥ"
sa "siddha eva" niścita eva "sādhanaṃ | iti" hetosta"thābhāvaniścayaṃ" sādhyābhāve yo hetvabhāvastanniścaya"mapekṣate" | etadāha | nāsmākambhavatāmiva darśanābhāvamātrād vyatirekaḥ | kintu sādhyasādhanayoḥ sati pratibandhe sādhyābhāve hetorvipakṣādvyāvṛttatvaṃ svagato dharmaḥ | hetośca yadrūpantadavaśyaṃ svaniścayamapekṣate jñāpakatvāditi |
kathaṃ tvanmatena śeṣavato vyabhicāritvamiti cedāha | "anupalambhā"ttvityādi | "kvaci"dvipakṣaikadeśe heto"rabhāvasiddhāvapyapratibaddhasya" hetoḥ sādhye | "tadabhāve" sādhyābhāve"sarvatra" vipakṣe'"bhāvāsiddheḥ" kāraṇāt "saṃśaya"stato vipakṣā"davyatireko" yaḥ sa "eva vyabhicāraḥ śeṣavataḥ" ||

[62,2]

"kiṃce"ti doṣāntarasamuccayaḥ | yadyadarśanād vyatirekastadā "vyatirekyapi hetuḥ syāt" | kīdṛśaṃ "nedaṃ nirātmaka"mityādi | prasaṅgamukhena cedamuktama"prāṇādimattvaprasaṅgāt" | prāṇādimatvācca sātmakaṃ | ayaṃ ca hetuḥ sātmake kvacinna dṛṣṭonirātmakebhyaśca vyāvṛtta iti sādhyanivṛttau nivṛttidharmāvyatirekī kathyate |
tathā hi "nirātmake"ṣvātmarahiteṣu "ghaṭādiṣu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeṣu prāṇādyadarśanāt" prāṇāpānonmeṣanimeṣādarśanāt | dṛṣṭeṣu svabhāvānupalambhenaivādarśanaṃ prāṇādīnāmupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvāt | adṛṣṭeṣvapi tajjātīyatayā | tena nairātmyaṃ prāṇādyabhāvena vyāptaṃ |
jīvaccharīre tu "tannivṛ"ttyā prāṇādimattvābhāvanivṛttyā nairātmyasya nivṛtte"rātmagatiḥ"
syāt || tava tarhi kathaṃ saṃśayaheturiti cedāha | "adṛśye"tyādi | adṛśyasyātmano"nupalambhād" ghaṭādiṣva"bhāvāprasiddhau ghaṭādī" kāraṇānnirātmakāt "prāṇāderanivṛttiḥ" | prāṇādyabhāvena sandigdhasya nairātmyasyāpyasiddhiriti yāvat ||

[63,1]

"bauddhena" nairātmyamabhyugatamato"bhyupagamā"nnirātmakatvaṃ ghaṭādeḥ "siddhamiti cet" |
yadi bauddhābhyupagamaḥ pramāṇaṃ "kathamidānīmātmasi"ddhirjīvaccharīre | tadapi bauddhena nirātmakamiṣṭaṃ || jīvaccharīre nairātmyābhyupagamo'pramāṇakastatosyātmā sādhyata iti || yadyevaṃ parasyāpi jīvaccharīrā"danyasyā"pi ghaṭāde"rapramāṇikā kathaṃ nairātmyasiddhiḥ" | na hi bauddhasyābhyupagamaḥ kvacitpramāṇaṃ kvacinneti | kiṃ cābhyu"pagamena ke"valena "sātmakānātmakau vibhajya" ghaṭādayaḥ pareṇāsmābhiścānātmakā abhyupagatāḥ | tenānātmakāḥ | jīvaccharīraṃ sātmakamasmābhirabhyupagatantvayā tu nirātmakamevamvibhajya "tatra" nirātmakeṣu prāṇādīnāma"bhā"venātmaviṣaye "gamakatvaṃ kathayatā"
pareṇā"gamikatvamātmani pratipannaṃ nānumeyatvaṃ | tasmā"dātmano ghaṭādāva"darśanepya"dṛśyasvabhāvasyā"tmano nivṛttyasiddhernāsti kutaści"nnirātmakāt prāṇādernnivṛttirityagamakatvaṃ | etattāvannaivātmanaḥ kutaścinnivṛttiḥ siddhā | abhyupagamya tūcyate | tannivṛttāvapyātmanivṛttāvapi kvaciditi dṛṣṭe ghaṭādau "nivṛttāvapi prāṇādīnā"mapratibandhādātmanā saha "sambandhābhāvā"t | "sarva"trādṛṣṭeṣvapi ghaṭādiṣvātmanivṛttyā prāṇādīnāṃ "nivṛttyasiddheḥ" sandigdhavyatirekitvād na "gamakatvaṃ" |

[63,2]

adarśanamātrād vyatirekābhyupagame satyayamaparo doṣa ityāha | "yāpī"tyādi |
kā punaḥ setyāha | "tathā sapakṣe sanni"tyādi | ā cā rya sya cāyaṅgranthaḥ | tatra sandihyuktampakṣadharmo vādiprativādiniścito gṛhyate | tenobhayoranyatarasya cāsiddhasya gdhasyāśrayāsiddhasya ca vyudāsaḥ | yathā ca pakṣadharmaniścayena caturvidhasyāsiddhasya vyudāsastathā "sapakṣe sannasannityevamā"diṣvapyanvayavyatirekaniścayena nirastamasiddhajātamanyatarāsiddhādīnāṃ sapakṣādiṣvasambhavāt | "yathāyogamudāhāryamit"yāha | "sāpi na vācyā" asiddhiyojanā |

[64,1]

tadva"yācaṣṭe'nupalambha eve"tyādi | apramāṇake"nupalambha eva sati" hetorvipakṣe saṃśayāt | kathamupalambhe tadasambhavāt | vipakṣe heto"rupalambhe sati" tasya saṅaśayasyā"bhāvāt" | tasmā"danupalambhā"ddhetoḥ vipakṣād "vyatireka" ityarthāt sandigdhavyatireko heturiṣṭa eva | tasmāt "saṃśayito'nivāryaḥ" | saṃśayena viṣayīkṛtaḥ saṃśayito vyatireko na vāryaḥ syāt |

[64,2]

"yathāyogamudāhārya"mityato "yathāyogavacanāt" saṃśayito"'nivārita eveti ceta" |
naitadevaṃ | tadanantarameva "ya eva tūbhayaniścayavācītyā"di vacanāt | ya eva śabda ubhayaniścitasya trairūpyasyāsiddhatvādervācakaḥ sa eva sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ "na cānyataraprasiddhasandigdhavācī punaḥ sādhanāpekṣaṇādi"tyayaṃ grantha ihodāharaṇaṃ | anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādino vā | yosiddhaṃ sandigdhamvā vakti na sa sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vā |
sandigdhavyatirekaniścayaheturubhayorapi vipakṣe sandigdhastasmāttadabhidhānamasādhanam |
yasmādubhayaniścita eva heturuktaste"nānupalambhepi" sati nivṛtti"saṃśayād" vipakṣāddhetora"nivṛttiṃ manyamānasta"sya sandigdhavyatirekasya hetutva"pratiṣedhamāha" asiddhiyojanayā ||

[64,3]

"kiñca" | yadyadṛṣṭyā nivṛttiriṣyate tadā "viśeṣasyā"sādhāraṇasya śrāvaṇatvā"dervyavacchedahetutā syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | nittyānityayo"radarśanāt" | tad vyācaṣṭe | "śrāvaṇatvasyāpī"tyādi | tathā hyadarśanamātrād vyāvṛttiriṣṭā | asti ca "nityānityayoradarśanaṃ | śrāvaṇatvasya tadvyavacchedahetutā syāt" | nityānityapratiṣedhahetutvambhavet | yadi nāmādarśanāt tato vyāvartteta śrāvaṇatvantadvyavacchedahetutvantu kuta ityāha | "na hī"ti | "na tadvyāvṛtteranyad vyavacchedanannityā"nityavyavacchedanam || tavāpi kathaṃ śrāvaṇatvanna vyavacchedaheturiti cedāha | "avyavacche""dastvi"tyādi | "kutaści"nnityādanityāccādarśanamātreṇa "vyāvṛtterevāniścayāt" |
aniścayaścānyataratra pratibandhāniścayāt | avaśyaṃ caitadevamanyathā yo hi dharmo"yatra nāstīti niścitaḥ" sa bhavan kvacid dharmiṇi "kathantadabhāvaṃ yatra" nāstīti niścitastasyābhāvaṃ "kathaṃ na gama"yet ||

[65,1]

nityānityād vyāvṛttasyāpi śrāvaṇatvasyobhayavyavacchede sādhye "pramāṇāntarabādhā ce"cchaṃkyeta | "athāpī"tyādyasyaiva vyākhyānaṃ | śrāvaṇatve"nobhayavyavacchede"
nityānityavyavacchede sādhye "pramāṇāntaraṃ bādhakamasti" | tadāha | "anyonyetyādi" |
anyonya"vyavacchedo rūpaṃ" yeṣānte tathā | tathā hi nityavyavaccheda evānityatvantadvyavaccheda eva ca nityatvantathā bhāvavyavaccheda evābhāvo'bhāvavyavaccheda eva ca bhāvaḥ | "teṣāmekasya vyavacchedenānyavidhānāt" | dvitīyasya viruddhasyavidhānā"dapratiṣedhaḥ" |

[65,2]

etaduktambhavati | yadā hi śrāvaṇatvaṃ nityād vyāvṛttamiti tad vyavacchidyāt |
tadevānityatvamvidadhyāt | tadeva ca tadanityād vyāvṛttamityanityaṃ vyavacchidyāt |
nityaṃ ca vidhatta ityekasyaikadaiva vidhipratiṣedhau syātāṃ taccāyuktamiti "vidhipratiṣedhayo"ryugapadvi"rodhānna" kasyacidapi pratiṣedhaḥ | pratiṣedhavinivṛttilakṣaṇo hi vidhiḥ |
vidhinivṛttireva ca pratiṣedhastau ca parasparaviruddhau yugapadekasya kathaṃ syātām | ato na kutaścidapi vyāvṛttiniścayaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt |

[65,3]

"nedānī"miti siddhāntavādī | idānīmiti bādhāsambhave sati | "adṛśo'"darśanād vipakṣe heto"rnāstitā" | tasmā"devaṃ satyadarśananna pramāṇambādhāsambhavāt" ||

[65,4]

śrāvaṇatva evāpramāṇaṃ bhavatu nānyatra bādhā'bhāvāditi cedāha | "tathetyā"di |
anyatrāpi hetorvyatirekasādhanasyādarśanasya "sambhāvyaṃ pramāṇāntarabādhanaṃ" | kutaḥ | "lakṣaṇe"tyādi | hetorvipakṣādarśanavyāvṛttinibandhanamiti yallakṣaṇantena yuktaṃ śrāvaṇatvasya yadadarśanantasmi"nbādhāsambhave" sati "tallakṣaṇameva" tasya vyatirekasādhanasyādarśanasya sarvaviṣayameva lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ "dūṣitaṃ syādi"ti "sarvatrā"darśane vyatirekasādhane"nāśvāsaḥ" | na gamakatvaniścayaḥ ||

[66,1]

"yadyevamanumānaviṣayepi" kvacit pratya"kṣānumānavirodhadarśanā"t | tathā hi nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavaditi kṛte nityatvamanumānena bādhyate | evamaśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ sattvād ghaṭavaditi pratyakṣeṇa | tataśca sarvatra tadavaśiṣṭalakṣaṇenānumānepyanā"śvāsaprasaṃga iti ce"t |

[66,2]

"naitadevaṃ | yathokta" iti kāryasvabhāvānupalambhajeṅgajenumāne pratyakṣānumānavirodhasyā"bhāvā"t | pratyakṣādivirodha"sambhavinaścātallakṣaṇatvāt" tadanumānālakṣaṇatvāt || "yadi" yathoktalakṣaṇe'numāne nāsti bādhā tadā hetulakṣaṇayuktaṃ parasparaviruddhārthasādhakaṃ hetudvayamekasmin dharmiṇyavatīrṇṇamviruddhāvyabhicāryuktamā cā rye ṇa tasyāvacanamiti cet | anenābhyupetahānimāha || "anumānaviṣaye" viruddhavyabhicārya"vacanādiṣṭameve"ti kutobhyupetahānaṃ | kva tarhyācāryeṇokta ityāha | "viṣayaṃ"
cetyādi | asya viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaḥ || "kiṃce"tyādi | iha "vai śe ṣi" ke ṇa vāyoḥ sattvasādhanārthaṃ "sparśaśca na ca dṛṣṭānāmi"ti sūtramuktaṃ | asyāyamarthaḥ |
yo guṇaḥ sa dravyāśrayī tadyathā rūpādiḥ | apākajānuṣṇāśītasparśaśca guṇastasmāttasyāśrayabhūtena dravyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ | na cāyaṃ dṛṣṭānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ guṇasteṣāṃ pākajānuṣṇāśītasparśādiguṇatvāt | tato yasyāyaṃ guṇaḥ sa vāyurbhaviṣyatītyukte vaiśeṣikeṇa | tatrācārya di ṅ nā ge noktaṃ | yadyadarśanamātreṇa dṛṣṭebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate na ca sopi yukta iti | yadetaduktantad virudhyata iti vā rtti ka kā ro darśayannāha | "daṣṭe"tyādi | yadyadṛṣṭyā nivṛttiḥ "syāt" tathā'dṛṣṭeradarśanāt kāraṇādapākajasyānuṣṇāśīta"sparśasya dṛṣṭā'yuktiḥ" | dṛṣṭeṣu pṛthivyādiṣvasaṅgatiryā varṇṇitā vaiśeṣikairyasyā ācāryeṇāyuktatvamuktaṃ sā syād "avirodhinī" yuktaiva syādityarthaḥ |

[67,1]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "yadī"tyādi | yadāhācāryaḥ | vāyuprakaraṇe "yadyadarśanamātreṇa dṛṣṭebhyaḥ" pṛthivyādibhyaḥ sparśasya "pratiṣedhaḥ kri"yate vai śe ṣi ke ṇa "na ca sopi yukta"
iti | yadyācāryasyāpya"darśanamātreṇa" vyatirekobhimatastadā "kathamayuktaḥ" sparśasya pratiṣedho yukta eva syāt | kiṃ kāraṇam | atrāpi heto"ranupalambhādabhāvasiddhera"bhyupagamāt ||

[67,2]

"nanvi"tyādi paraḥ | upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ kāraṇād apākajasyānuṣṇāśīta"sparśasyā"nupalabhyamānasya pṛthivyādiṣu "yukta eva pratiṣedhaḥ" |

[67,3]

"na yukta" iti siddhāntavādī | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | yaḥ pṛthivyādiranuṣṇāśītādanyena sparśena yuktaḥ pratyakṣaḥ sa dṛśyaḥ | anyatra ca deśādāvapratyakṣopi tathābhūtasparśayukta eva pṛthivyādistatsvabhāvaḥ | dṛśyaśca tatsvabhāvaśceti dvandvaḥ | tadeva "viṣayaḥ" sa eva tanmātraṃ "supsupeti" samāsaḥ | tasminna"pratiṣedhāt" sparśasya | tatra hi pratiṣedhe syādeva "niścayaḥ yāvatā pṛthivyādidha"rmibhūtaṃ "sāmānyenā"viśeṣeṇaiva "gṛhītvā'yamvai"śe ṣi kaḥ sparśasya "pratiṣedhamāha" | yatkiṃcit pṛthivyādi tatsarvamanuṣṇāśītasparśarahitamiti | na ca pṛthivyādimātre sparśasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirasti | na caikasparśaniyamaḥ pṛthivyādīnāṃ | yatastatra pṛthivyādisāmānye "tūlopalapallavā"diṣu bhedeṣu "tadbhāvepi" pṛthivyādibhāvepi "sparśabhedadarśanā"t | tathā hi tūlasyānyaḥ sparśaḥ ślakṣṇatvalakṣaṇonyaścopalādeḥ karkaśatvādilakṣaṇaḥ | "asyā"pītyanuṣṇāśītasparśasya"kvacit pārthivadravyaviśeṣe sambhavāśaṃkayā bhavitavyami"ti kṛtvā sarvatra pṛthivyā"dāvadarśanamātre"ṇānuṣṇāśītasparśasyā"yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ" |

[68,1]

yattūcyate | sarvatra pṛthivyādestulyatvāttulya evānuṣṇāśītasparśo yastu pṛthivyādibhāvepi ślakṣṇatvādibhedaḥ sa pṛthivyādiparamāṇusaṃyogasya niviḍāniviḍakṛtatvāditi ||

[68,2]

tadayuktam | aniviḍānāṃ hi nairantaryābhāvāt saṃyogābhāvaḥ | tena yathopalaparamāṇūnāṃ saṃyogasya niviḍatvantathā tūlaparamāṇūnāmiti kathaṃ ślakṣṇatvādibhedaḥ syāt | tasmād satyapi saṃyoge svarūpeṇānyādṛśā evopalaparamāṇavonyādṛśāśca tūlaparamāṇavastatkṛta eva ca ślakṣṇatvādibhedaḥ | na saṃyoganiviḍāniviḍakṛtaḥ |
tathā ca yathā pṛthivyādibhedāt sparśasya ślakṣṇatvādibhedastathānuṣṇāśītabhedopi sambhāvyeta ||

[68,3]

nanu mābhūd adṛṣṭaviṣaye vāyvanunaṃ dṛṣṭaviṣaye tvanuṣṇāśītasparśasya dṛśyasya pathivyādisambandhitvenānupalabhyamānatvāt tato vāyvanumānaṃ syāt |

[68,4]

evammanyate | yadi sparśāderguṇarūpatā siddhā syāt tato vāyudravyānumānaṃ syāt saiva tvasiddhā | svātantryeṇa pratīteḥ | sparśaviśeṣa eva cāsmākamvāyurucyate |
ācārya di gnā ge na tu sparśavyatiriktaṃ vāyuṃmabhyupagamya tatra parakīyamanumānamayuktamuktamityadoṣaḥ |

[68,5]

tasmāt sthitametad | anvayavyatirekayorniścayamadarśanamātrācca pratiṣedhābhāvaṃ bruvatācāryeṇeṣṭaḥ pratibandha iti ||

[68,6]

kastarhyevamupālabdha iti cedāha | "evami"tyādi | evamityanantaroktābhirupapattibhiḥ | ācāryasya śiṣya ā cā ryī yaḥ kaścidācāryagranthānabhijñaḥ "anupalambhād abhāvaṃ bruvāṇa upālabdhaḥ" ||

[68,7]

api cetyadarśanamātreṇābhāvābhyupagame pratyakṣabādhāṃ darśayitumāha | "deśā"dibhedāt | ādiśabdāt kālasaṃskārabhedāt | "bhinnā" nānārūpā "dṛśyante dravyeṣveka"jātīyeṣvapi "śaktayo" rasavīryavipākādilakṣaṇāḥ | tatretyanekaśaktiṣu dravyeṣvekadṛṣṭyā ekasvabhāvasya dravyasya kvacid darśanānnānyatrāpi deśādau "yuktastadbhāvaniścayaḥ" | yathāparidṛṣṭadravyasvabhāvaniścayaḥ |

[69,1]

"yadī"tyādinaitadeva vyācaṣṭe | "yadi vipakṣe" heto"radarśanamātreṇāpratibaddha"sya svasādhye "tadavyabhicāraḥ" sādhyāvyabhicāra iṣyate | tadaikatra dṛṣṭasya dravyasya yad rūpamupalabdhantattasyānyatrāpi dravyasāmānyādanumeyaṃ syāt | asti hi tatrāpi tatkālaṃ hetorvipakṣe'darśanamātraṃ |

[69,2]

na cedaṃ yuktaṃ | yasmāt "kvacid deśe kānicid dravyāṇi kathaṃcid dṛṣṭāni"
pratiniyatarasāditvena | punaranyatheti yathādṛṣṭākāravaiparītyenā"nyatra" deśe "dṛśyante |
yathe"tyādinā viṣayamāha | vīryandoṣāpanayanaśaktiḥ | pariṇāmo vipākaḥ | "viśiṣṭā rasavīryavipākā" yāsāmiti vigrahaḥ | "nānya"treti kṣetraviśeṣādanyatra | "yathā" deśa"viśeṣāt tathā kālasaṃskārabhedād viśiṣṭarasavīryavipā"kā bhavanti | saṃskāraḥ kṣīrādyavasekaḥ | "na ca taddeśai"riti pradeśo yeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāntai"stathā"viśiṣṭarasādiyuktā "dṛṣṭā iti" kṛtvā "sarvā" ataddeśā api "tattvena" tulyarūpāditvena "tathā"bhūtā yathāgṛhītasvabhāvatulyāḥ "sidhyanti" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "guṇāntarā"ṇāṃ rasādiviśeṣāṇāṃ"kāraṇāntarāpekṣatvāt | viśeṣahetvabhā"ve "tu syāde"kasvabhāvatā"numānaṃ || adṣṭaḥ karttā" yasya vaidikasya tattathā | ta"dapi puruṣasaṃskārapūrvakaṃ" puruṣaprayatnahetukaṃ | etacca sādhyaphalaṃ | "vākyeṣu" pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyatvenābhimateṣu "viśeṣābhāvāda"nena hetuḥ kathitaḥ |
prayogā punaryadvastu yadabhinnasvabhāvantattatsamānaheṃtukaṃ | yathaiko dhūmo dhūmāntarasamānajātīyaḥ | pauruṣeyavākyābhinnasvabhāvāni cāpauruṣeyābhimatāni vākyānīti svabhāvahetuḥ | na cāsiddho hetuḥ | tathā hi yaiḥ prakārairviṣādyapanayanāditi vaidikānāṃ viśeṣa iṣyate | teṣāṃ "sarvaprakārāṇāṃ puruṣaiḥ kāraṇadarśanāt" | tathā hi śa ba rā dimantrāṇāmipi viṣādyapanayanādayo dṛśyante ||

[69,3]

yadi śabdasvabhāvasāmyādadṛṣṭakarttṛkasyāpi pauruṣeyatvamanumīyate | evantarhi svacittasantatidarśanāt sarve cittadharmā jñātāḥ | tena yāvad bodharūpantāvatpañcendriyāśritaṃ savikalpakaṃ ca sarvaṃ ca rāgādijananavāsanāgarbhaṃ yathedānīntathānāgatāvasthāyāmapi yathā ca mama tathā pareṣāmapi | tena cittatvenendriyāśritatvena vacanādihetutvena ca sarvasya puṃsaścittaṃ sarvadā rāgādiyuktanniyatavastugrāhitvādasarvaviṣayaṃ kinnānumīyata ityāśaṃkyāha | "naiva"mityādi | yathā vākyānyasambhavadviśeṣahetūni "naivaṃmasambhavadviśeṣahetavaḥ puruṣāḥ" yena viśeṣahetvasambhavena |
vacanāderādigrahaṇenendriyāśritatvacittatvādigrahaṇaṃ | "vacanā"dereva "kiṃcinmā"treṇaikadeśena "sādharmyā"ttasmālliṅgāt puṃsāṃ rāgādimatvena niyataviṣayatvenānyena vā"sarvākāreṇa sāmyamanumīyeta" |

[70,1]

viśeṣahetusambhava eva kuta ityāha | "sarveṣveva" cetogu"ṇeṣu viśeṣasya darśanāt" |
rāgaprajñādayo hi svaviṣayagrahaṇaṃprati mandamandavṛttayopi kālāntareṇa paṭutarā bhavanti |
svaviṣayaścaiṣāṃ spaṣṭataro bhavatīti viśeṣo dṛśyate | sa punaḥ kuto bhavatītyāha | "saṃskāro"bhyāsastasya "viśeṣeṇa" prajñādīnāṃ "viśeṣapratīteḥ" || bhavatu prajñādīnāṃ manoguṇānāmabhyāsāt prakarṣo dṛṣṭatvāt | sarvajñādayastu na dṛṣṭā iti kathanteṣāmbhāvaityata āha | "tadvadi"tyādi | "anyasyāpi" sarvajñatvāderviśeṣasya "sambhavāt" | abhyāsavaśācca nairātmyākārasya sarvapadārthagrāhiṇaśca sāmānyavikalpasya yatsphuṭābhatvantadeva vairāgyaṃ sārvajñaṃ ca padaṃ | tena tribhiḥ prakārairvairāgyasarvajñatvaviśeṣāsambhavānumānaṃ syāt | yadi nairātmyaviṣayasya sarvaviṣayasya vā vikalpasyāsambhavaḥ |
sambhave vā yadi manoguṇānāṃ na viśeṣaḥ syāt | sati vā viśeṣe viśeṣaheturyadi na jñātaḥ syāt | yāvatā nairātmyādiviṣayasya vikalpasya sambhavosti viśeṣahetuścābhyāso vijñātaḥ | tasmād yathā'sati pratibandhavaikalye samartheyaṃ bījakāraṇasāmagrī aṅkurotpādāyeti sāmarthyānumānaṃ | tadvadasati pratibandhavaikalye cirakālānnairantaryavataścābhyāsaviśeṣācca nairātmyaviṣayasya sarvapadārthaviṣayasya ca jñānasya sphuṭābhatvaṃ sambhavatīti vairāgyasarvajñatvayoḥ sambhavānumānaṃ | evantāvat sambhavānumānamasmākaṃ |

[70,2]

"asambhave tvanumātavye" bhavatāṃ na tasyadharmasya bādhakaḥ kaściddheturvidyate | tada"bhāvān"nāsaṃbhavadviśeṣahetavaḥ pumāṃsa iti sambandhaḥ | kathaṃ punarbādhakasyābhāva ityāha | "vairāgyasyādṛṣṭatvād" | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitatsarvajñasyāpyadṛṣṭatvāt | "adṛṣṭena ca vairā"gyeṇa saha heto"rbādhyabādhakabhāvā"siddheḥ ||

[71,1]

syānmataṃ | na vacanādervairāgyādīnāṃ sākṣād asambhavonumīyate yena bādhako heturmṛgyate | kintu vītarāgābhimateṣu rāgādayonumīyante | teṣvanumiteṣvarthato vītarāgādipratiṣiddhamadṛṣṭenāpi vairāgyeṇa rāgitvasya virodhādityata āha | "rāge"tyādi | "na hi rāgādīnāmavyabhicāri kārya"masti | ādigrahaṇād asarvajñaparigrahaḥ | tathā hi vyavahāravyutpattimārabhya yathā yathārthaparijñānantathā tathā tadviṣayamvaktṛtvambhavatīti tena yadi sarvaviṣayaṃ kasyacid vijñānaṃ syāt tadviṣayamapi vaktṛtvaṃ kena vāryate ||

[71,2]

syādetad | yadi vairāgyādilakṣaṇantasya viśeṣosti kathamasmābhirnopalabhyata ityāha | "sambhavepi" teṣāṃ vairāgyādilakṣaṇānāṃ "viśeṣāṇāṃ" parasantāne "draṣṭumaśakyatvāt" | na ca tathābhūtānāmanupalambhāt pratikṣepa ityāha | tādṛśo ca viprakarṣiṇāmapratikṣepārhatvāt ||

[71,3]

syādetad | yathā puruṣā apratikṣepārhāstadvad vākyānītyāha | "naivamit"yādi | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "dṛśyaviśeṣatvāt" | tathā hi vaidikānāṃ vākyānāmviśeṣo dṛśya eveṣyate | atha neṣyate | evama"dṛśyatvepi" viśeṣasyābhyupagamyamāne |
tenānupalabdhena viśeṣeṇā"dṛṣṭaviśeṣāṇāṃ" vaidikavākyānāṃ laukikavākyebhyo "vijātīyatvopagamavirodhāt" ||

[71,4]

syānmataṃ | dṛśyā eva viśeṣā vaidikānāṃ duḥśravaṇatvadurbhaṇatvādayastaiḥ pauruṣeyebhyo bhinnāni bhaviṣyantītyata āha | "tadviśeṣāṇāmi"tyādi | "anyatre"ti pauruṣeyeṣu | na kevalamadṛṣṭaviśeṣāṇāṃ vijātīyatvopagamavirodhādadṛśyatvaṃ viśeṣāṇāmayuktamitaśca "pratyakṣāṇāmapratyakṣasvabhāvavirodhāt" | na hyekasya svabhāvadvayaṃ viruddhaṃ ghaṭate || viśeṣāḥ pratyakṣā eva kevalaṃ bhrāntinimittasadbhāvāt | viṣādiśaktivannāvadhāryanta iti cedāha | "bhrāntinimittābhāvādi"ti | rūpasādharmyadarśanaṃ hi bhrāntinimittaṃ viṣādiṣu | naivaṃ vaidikeṣu || kathaṅgamyata iti cedāha | "bādhakā"bhāvāt"bhrāntyasiddheri"ti | yadi vaidikānāṃ viśeṣe bhrāntyānupalakṣyamāṇe punarviśeṣāvalambipramāṇamutpadyeta bhrānterbādhakantadā bhrāntestannimittasya ca bhavati niścayastacca nāsti | tasmāllaukikaiḥ śabdaiḥ vaidikānāmaviśeṣe sādhye nāsti sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ ||

[72,1]

puruṣeṣu tarhi kiṃ bādhakaṃ yena sarvākāraguṇasāmyasādhane doṣa ityāha | "puruṣe"ṣvityādi | prajñādiviṣayasyātiśayasyābhyāsapūrvakasya yad darśanantadeva bādhakaṃ |
yadyasambhavadvairāgyaṃ puruṣasya cittambhavet | nābhyāsādheyaviśeṣambhaved | bhavati ca | tato "viśeṣadarśanasya bādhakatvād asamā"naṃ || vedavākyānumāne yaduktaṃ pratyakṣāṇāṃ śabdānāmapratyakṣasvabhāvābhāvāditi | syādayandoṣo yadi viśeṣaḥ svabhāvabhūtaḥ syāt | kintu parabhāvabhūta ityāha | "parabhāvabhūtasye"ti | parabhāvaṅgataḥ parabhāvabhūtaḥ | anyasvabhāva ityarthaḥ | "atadviśeṣatvā"dityavākyaviśeṣatvāt | "yato nāsti viśeṣo vākyānā"ntattasmāda"bhinnasvabhāvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ" pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyābhimatānāṃ"puruṣakri"yā | puruṣaiḥ karaṇaṃ | "na vā kasyacit" | laukisyāpi na puruṣakriyetyarthaḥ ||

[72,2]

evamācāryīyasyādarśanamātreṇa vipakṣāddhetorvyatirekamicchataḥ granthavirodhaṃ pramāṇavirodhaṃ cokttvā tī rthi kā nāṃ parasparavyāghātamāha | "kiṃce"tyādi | mṛdaścetanā | etacca lo kā ya ta darśanaṃ | "ātmā" ca "mṛccetanā" ceti dvandvaḥ | "ādi"śabdāt kṣīrādiṣu dravyādi | teṣā"mabhāva"sya sādhanāyānupalambhaḥ pareṇoktopi"ya"stasyā"bhāvasyāprasādhaka" iṣṭa ātmādivādibhiranupalambhamātrasyāpramāṇatvāditi | "sa evānupalambha" ātmādiniṣedhe pramāṇatvenāniṣṭaḥ "kiṃ hetvabhāvasya" hetovipakṣād vyatirekasya "sādhakaḥ" || hetvabhāve cā"nupalambhaṃ" cā"sya" vai śe ṣi kā deḥ "pramāṇayataḥ ātmavādo nirālambo" nirāśrayaḥ "syā"t | tatrānupalambhasyābhāvasādhanasya sambhavāt | tathā hi na "pratyakṣeṇātmana upalambho" nityaparokṣatvābhyupagamāt | atha syādātmanonumānamevopalambhostyevetyata āha | "tatkārye"tyādi | apratyakṣatvādevātmanastatkāryasvabhāvarūpasya liṅgasyāniścayānnānumānamupalambhaḥ |

[73,1]

yathā nityaparokṣāṇāmapīndriyādīnāmanumānantathātmano bhaviṣyatīti ce dāha | "indriyāṇāmi"tyādi | ādiśabdāt smṛtibījādīnāṃ | "vijñārna"meva "kārya"ntasya "kādācitkatvā"t | tathā hi satsvapi rūpālokamanaskāreṣu nimīlitalocanādyavasthāsu vijñānasyābhāvāt | punaśconmīlitalocanāvasthāsu bhāvāt | vijñānakāryaṃ kāraṇāntarasāpekṣaṃ sidhyati tatosya "sāpekṣyasiddh"yā indriyādīnā"mprasiddhirucya"te |

[73,2]

etaduktambhavati | yatsāpekṣamidaṅkādācitkaṃ | vijñānanta"tkimapyasya" vijñānasya"kāraṇamastī"tyanumīyate | tadeva cendriyamiti vyavahriyate | "na tvevaṃbhūtamiti" na rūpaviśeṣeṇa mūrttatvādinā yuktamindriyamanumīyata ityarthaḥ || "eva"miti yathā kādācitkavijñānakāryānyathānupapattyendriyānumānaṃ | tathā sukhādikāryaṃ | yasya"sukhādikārya"ntatkimapyastītyanumānena taccātmasvarūpamiti "prasādhitaṃ kañci"tmavādino "na puṣṇā"ti | "yena kenacida"nirdiṣṭaviśeṣeṇa kāraṇena "kāraṇavattvābhyupagamāt" sukhādīnāṃ | na caivaṃbhūta ātmā | nityakarttṛbhoktṛtvādilakṣaṇatvenābhyupagamāt | yataśca yathābhyupagatasyātmano nāsti kāryaliṅgaṃ | "tathā ca satyanupalambha evātmanaḥ syā"t | "tasmāt tamā"tmānantenā"nupalambhena" pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇena "pratyācakṣāṇaḥ kimi"ti "prativyūḍhaḥ" pratikṣipta ātmavādinā |
anupalambhamātrānnāstyasattvamātmana iti | "katha"masādhanaṃ sad vipakṣāddhetoḥ prāṇādimatvāde"rvyatirekaṃ sādhayet" || bhūtānāmeva śaktiścaitanyamiṣyate cā rvā kaiḥ |
bhūtasvabhāvā ca mṛdityevaṃ "mṛdaḥ" khalvapi "caitanyamanupalabhyamānamapīcchan" lo kāya ti kaḥ | yadāha | "tebhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyammadaśaktivadvijñānami"ti | punastata evāpramāṇakādanupalambhāt | "adarśanād vacanā"derasarvajñatvādisādhanāya liṃgatvenopanītasya vipakṣād "vyāvṛttimā"ha || "dadhyādikaṃ kṣīrādiṣ"vanupalabhyamānamapīcchan |

[74,1]

"apara" iti sāṃ khyaḥ punaḥ sa eva | parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṅghātatvādityabhidhāyā"parārtheṣu" śaśaviṣāṇādiṣu "saṅghātatvasyādarśanād vyatireka"māha | evantāvadasya parasparavyāghātaḥ | na cādarśanamātreṇāsya hetorvyāptiḥ sidhyati | "ko hyatra niyamaḥ saṅghātairavaśyaṃ parārthairbhavitavyaṃ" yataḥ saṃghātatvāccakṣurādīnāṃ pārārthyasiddhyātmārthatvaṃ sāṃ khya sya sidhyet || yaduktaṃ dadhyādikaṃ kṣīrādiṣvapyanupalabhyamānamapīti |
tanna | yasmādastye"vopalambho dadhyādīnāṃ kṣīrādi"ṣu | kosāvityāhā"numānami"ti | anumānaṃ cāhā"śaktādanutpatte"riti | yadi hi kṣīrādau dadhyādiśaktirna syāttato 'śaktāt kṣīrāderdadhyādi notpadyeta | prayogastu yadyajjanane na śaktaṃ na tasya tata utpattiryathā śālibījād yavāṅkurasya | utpadyate ca dadhyādiḥ kṣīrādibhyastasmādasti dadhyādiśaktiḥ kṣīrādāviti kāryahetupratirūpako vaidharmyaprayogaḥ | śaktereva ca dadhyādiḥ kāryakāraṇayorabhedāditi manyate |

[74,2]

"athetyādi" siddhāntavādī | yosau dadhyādiko bhāvaḥ paścādupalabhyate "kiṃ sa eva bhāvaḥ śaktirutānyadeva kiñci"d dadhyāderarthāntaraṃ | "tathai"veti niṣpannarūpadadhyādivat kṣīrāvasthāyā"mupalabhyeta | viśeṣābhāvāt | anyacce"diti | dadhyādibhyorthāntaraṃ cecchaktiḥ | tadā "kathamanyabhāve"nyasya śaktyākhyasya bhāve | "tadda"dhyādikamasti |
naivetyabhiprāyaḥ | dadhyādijananasāmarthyāt kṣīrādau dadhyādītyu"pacāramātraṃ syāt" |
anupalambhamapramāṇīkṛtya punastasyaiva pramāṇīkaraṇa"mayamparasparavyāghāta eṣāmātmā"divādināmityupasaṃhāraḥ ||

[74,3]

yataścādarśanamātrānnāsti vyatirekas"tasmāttanmātrasambandhaḥ" | hetusattāmātrasambaddha"svabhāvaḥ" sādhyatvenābhimataḥ svayannivarttamāno "bhāvameve" svabhāvabhūtameva hetutvenopanītaṃ "nivarttaye"t | "vā" śabdo vakṣyamāṇavikalpāpekṣī || "yathā vṛkṣo" nivarttamānaḥ"śiṃśapā"nnivarttayati | kasmā"cchākhādimadviśeṣasyaiva tathā" śiṃśapeti "prasiddheḥ sa"vṛkṣas"tasya" śiṃśapākhyasya "svabhāvaḥ | svañca svabhā"vaṃ vṛkṣaṃ "parityajya kathaṃ" śiṃśapākhyo"bhāvo bhavet" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "svabhāvasyai"va vṛkṣasvātmana eva bhāvatvācchiṃśapā"rūpatvā"t | "iti" hetostasyātmabhūtasya sādhanasya śiṃśapādeḥ svabhāva"pratibandhādeva" svabhāve sādhyābhimate vṛkṣādau yathoktena prakāreṇa pratibandhādevā"vyabhicāraḥ || kāraṇaṃ vā"
nivarttamānamityadhyāhāraḥ | "kāryanni"varttayediti prakṛtaṃ | kasmād | "avyabhicārataḥ"
kāryasya kāraṇāvyabhicārādityarthaḥ || "kāraṇamityā"dinā vyācaṣṭe |

[75,1]

"anya"theti | yadi kāraṇe nivarttamāne kāryaṃ na nivartteta | tadā "tat"kāryābhimataṃ"tasya" kāraṇasya "kāryameva na syāt" | tasmāt "kāraṇaṃ nivarttamānaṃ kāryama"vaśyaṃ"nivarttayati" | yadyapi vāsagṛhādāvagnikāraṇanivṛttāvapi na dhūmasya nivṛttistathāpi dṛṣṭakāraṇavyatirekeṇa nānyasmādasyotpattirabhipretetyarthaḥ | ata evāha | "siddhastvi"tyādi | "siddhastu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ" kāryasya "svabhāvaṃ" kāraṇe "niyamayati" | sati tasminbhavatyasati na bhavatītyevantadavyabhicāriṇaṃ karoti | "ubhayathe"ti tādātmyena tadutpattyā vā yaḥ "svabhāvapratibandha"stasmā"deva" | sādhyanivṛttyā heto"rnivṛttiḥ" |

[75,2]

"anya"theti yadi pratibandho neṣyate | "eka"syāpratibandhakasya sādhyasya "nivṛttyānyanivṛttiḥ" | apratibaddhasya sādhanadharmasya "nivṛtiḥ kathambhavet" | naiva | yasmā"nnāśvavāni"tyaśvarahita iti kṛtvā "marttyena" manuṣyeṇa "na bhāvyaṃ gomatāpi kiṃ |
sannidhānāttathaikasye"ti svabhāvenāsambaddhasya hedoḥ sannidhānāt "kathamanyasya" sādhyasya"sannidhi"rnaiva sannidhānaṃ | yasmād |

[75,3]

"gomānityeva marttyena bhāvyamaśvavatāpi kiṃ | "

[76,1]

yata evanta"smāt svabhāvapratibandhādeva" sādhyābhimate vastuni pratibaddhatvādeva"hetuḥ svasādhyaṅgamayati" | na tu sambandhāt | kāryakāraṇayorasahabhāvena vyāpyavyāpakayoścaikatvena dviṣṭhasambandhābhāvāt | "sa ceti" svabhāvapratibandhaḥ | "tadbhāvalakṣaṇa" iti sādhyasvabhāvalakṣaṇa"stadutpattilakṣaṇo vā" || sa eva svabhāvapratibandho"'vinābhāvā"khyaḥ sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭā"ntābhyāṃ pradarśyate" ||

[76,2]

etaduktambhavati | sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhagrāhakameva pramāṇaṃ vyāptigrāhakantenaiva sādhanasya sādhyāyattatāgrahaṇāt sādhyābhāve'bhāvo gṛhīta eva kevalantadavinābhāvagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vismṛtatvād dṛṣṭāntābhyāmupadarśyate | yataśca pramāṇakhyāpanādevāvinābhāvasmṛtyā sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvo niścito bhavati |

[76,3]

"tasmād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte" | tadviṣaye"'vaśyaṃ" niyamena iha hetau kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇa"āśrayo" vastubhūto dharmī "neṣṭaḥ" svabhāvānupalambhe tviṣṭa eva |

[76,4]

tatra hi viparyayeṇopalambhaḥ khyāpanīyaḥ | kiṅkāraṇam | "āśrayo neṣṭa" ityāha | "tadabhāve ce"tyādi | "tadabhāve" vyāpakakāraṇayorabhāve tadvyāpyakāryākhyaṃ liṅgaṃ "neti"
na bhavatītyevaṃ vaidharmya"vacanād" apyāśrayarahitā"ttadgate"rvyatirekagateḥ || 28 ||

[76,5]

kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "yata" ityādi | svabhāvahetau sādhyasya "tadbhā"vaḥ sādhanavyāpakatvaṃ | kāryahetau sādhyasya "hetubhāvaḥ" kāraṇatvaṃ "khyāpyate | tadavedina" iti tadbhāvahetubhāvāvedinaḥ puṃsaḥ ||

[76,6]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "dṛṣṭānte hī"tyādi | "sādhyadharmasya tadbhāvaḥ" sādhana"svabhāvatvaṃ khyāpyate tanmātrānubandhena" | sādhanamātrānubandhena | "kṛtaka"
niṣpannasyānityatvasya kṛtakamātrānubandhena yā "tatsvabhāvatā" sādhanasvabhāvatā tayā | evaṃbhūtayā tadbhāvaḥ "khyāpyate" | na tu nimittāntarāt paścād utpadyamānenānityatvena | "yathaike" vipratipannā iti | tanmātravatvameva darśayannāha | "ya"
ityādi | "yo" hetuḥ "kṛtakaṃ svabhā"veṃ "janayati so'nityarūpameva santaṃ janayatīt"yarthaḥ |
iti anena dvāreṇāvinābhāvaviṣayaṃ "pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena khyāpyate" | na tu darśanārśanamātraṃ | "anyatheti" yadyevaṃ pramāṇaṃ nopadarśyate | ta"daikadharmasadbhāvāt" sādhanadharmasadbhāvāt | "tadanyenāpi" sādhyadharmeṇāpi "bhavitavyamiti niyamābhāvā"t sādhanasya sādhya"vyabhicārāśaṃkā syāt" |

[77,1]

yadi nāma dṛṣṭāntena pramāṇamupadarśanīyantathāpi kiṃ siddhamityāha | "tena ca pramāṇena" tan"mātrānubandha" iti sādhanamātrānubandhaḥ | kathaṃ khyāpyata ityāha | "kṛtaka"sya yat"kāraṇa"ntasmā"deva" kṛtaka"stathā jāto" jāto yo "naśvaraḥ" kṣaṇasthitidharmā |
kṣaṇikatvenaiva naśvaro na tu kālāntaraṃ sthitvetyarthaḥ |

[77,2]

kathaṃ punaḥ svahetoreva tathotpanna ityāha | "anyata" iti svahetoranyasmādvināśahetoḥ | tasya kṛtakasya "tadbhāvaniṣedhād" anityatāsvabhāvaniṣedhād vakṣyamāṇakāt || "hetubhāvo" vā | tena ca pramāṇena khyāpyata iti sambandhaḥ | sādhyadharmasya sādhanaṃprati "hetubhāvo vā" kāraṇatvamvā khyāpyate | tasmin "satyeva" sādhanasya "bhā"vā"ditya"nena prakāreṇa pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena "pradarśyate" | kasya punaḥ sādhyasya hetubhāvaḥ pradarśyata ityāha | "arthāntarasya" sādhanād vyatiriktasya | "tathā" dṛṣṭāntopadarśitena pramāṇena prasiddhe "tadbhāvahetubhāve" | svabhāvasya sādhyasya tadbhāve | sādhanasvabhāvatve |
kāraṇasya hetubhāve "prasiddhe sati | dahanābhāve dhūmo" na bhavatīti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ | "sa" ityanityasvabhāvo vahniśca | tasyeti kṛtakatvasya dhūmasya ca yathākramaṃ "svabhāvo"
heturvā | vā śabdaḥ samuccaye | yata evaṃ "katha"masau kṛtako dhūmo vā "svaṃ svabhā"vamanityaṃ"hetuṃ cāgnimantareṇa" bhavet | naiva "bhave"dityevamanuddiṣṭarūpe viṣaye vyatirekekathyamāne "āśrayamantareṇāpi vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte prasidhyati vyatirekaḥ" ||

[78,1]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭo dyo ta ka rā bhyāṃ | "vyatirekopi liṃgasya vipakṣānnaiva labhyate | abhāve sa na gamyeta kṛtayatnairabodhanādi ti | "
tannirastaṃ ||

[78,2]

evantāvat | tadbhāvahetubhāvakhyāpanāya tadavedinaḥ dṛṣṭānto vaktavyaḥ ||

[78,3]

"yeṣāṃ" punaḥ pūrvaṃ "prasiddhāveva tadbhāvahetubhāvau" yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena pakṣadharmamātratvaṃ niścita"nteṣā"ntadbhāvahetubhāvaṃprati "viduṣāṃ hetureva || yadartha"mityanvayavyatirekaniścayārthaṃ | pratipādyasya svayameva "sorthaḥ siddha iti" kintadvacanena | "tadeti" niścitānvayavyatirekakāle |

[78,4]

yada"pi" mūḍhaṃ prati dṛṣṭāntapradarśanaṃ kriyate tadā "tatpradarśane"pi dṛṣṭāntapradarśanepi vaidharmyaṃ | vināpyāśrayeṇa yathoktavidhinā sidhyatyeva vyatirekaḥ | tataḥ "kimvaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāśrayeṇeti manyamāna" ā cā rya "āśrayaṃ pratikṣipati" nyā ya mu khā dau |
tathā hi tatraivaṃ coditaṃ "yadā tarhyākāśādikaṃ nityantāvadabhyupaiti prativādī | tadā kathannityāt kṛtakatvasya vyatireka" iti | tatrā "cā rya" āśrayaṃ pratikṣipannāha | "tadā sandeha" eva nāsti tadabhāvāttatrāvṛtteriti |

[78,5]

etaduktambhavati | gṛhītapratibandhasya tatrākāśādau vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddheḥ | anityābhāvaśca nityasyāsatvāt siddha iti yāvat || yasmāda dṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ pratibandhaḥ kathyate | "tena" kāraṇena "jñātasambandhe" hetau sati "dvayoḥ" sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāntayo"ranyataroktitaḥ | dvitīyepi" tābhyāmevānyatarasminnanuktepi"smṛtiḥ samupajāyate'rthāpattyā" |

[79,1]

etadapyācāryavacanena saṃsyandayannāha | "yadāhe"tyādi | nyā ya mu khe cāyaṃ granthaḥ | vāśabdastatraiva pūrvavikalpāpekṣī | "anyatare"ṇeti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntena vā | "ubhayapradarśanā"d anvayavyatirekapradarśanāt | "tatrāpi" granthe | "dṛṣṭāntena"
svabhāvahetau kāryaṃhetau ca yathā krama"ntadbhāvahetubhāvapradarśanaṃ" kriyata iti "manyamāna"
ācā"ryorthāpatt"yā "eka"syānvayasya vyatirekasya vā "vacanena" dvitīyasya yathākramaṃ vyatirekasyānvayasya vā "siddhimā"ha | etadevāha | "tathā hī"ti | "ya"tkiñcit "kṛtakantadanityamevetyukte vyaktama"vaśya"maya"manityatvākhyo dharmo"sya" kṛtakasya "svabhāvastanmātrānubandhī" kṛtakamātrānubandhī "pramāṇadṛṣṭa iti" pramāṇena "niścitaḥ" |

[79,2]

nanu kāryepi kāraṇamavaśyambhavati | na ca tattasya svabhāva ityata āha |
anarthāntara iti | kathantanmātrānubandhītyāha | "tadbhāvaniya"māditi | kṛtakabhāve'vaśyamanityatābhāvādityarthaḥ ||

[79,3]

nanu na kṛtakamātrānubandhī svabhāvo nityatvasya pratyakṣaniścitaḥ kṣaṇikoyamityaniścayāttatkathamucyate pramāṇadṛṣṭa iti | atha kṛtako vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvāttadbhāvaniyata ityanumānadṛṣṭaḥ |

[79,4]

tadayuktaṃ | yato nirhetukepi vināśe yadaiva ghaṭādernāśaḥ pratīyeta tadaivāhetukaḥ syānnānyadā | tatkathaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ | athaikakṣaṇasthāyitvena ghaṭasyotpatteḥ pūrvamapi nāśaḥ |

[79,5]

nanu yathaikakṣaṇasthāyitvenotpattiḥ svahetubhyastathānekakṣaṇasthāyitvenāpyutpattiḥ syāt | vicitraśaktayo hi sāmagryo dṛśyante | na ca yadi vināśaḥ kvacit kadācid bhavet | tatkāladravyāpekṣatvād asyānapekṣatvahāniḥ | vināśakahetvanapekṣatvād anyathā dvitīyepi kṣaṇe vināśo na syāt tatkālādyapekṣatvāt | atha kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ sāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ vyāptaṃ | nityeṣu ca kramākramanivṛttau sattvaṃ nivarttamānaṃ kṣaṇikeṣvevāvatiṣṭhata iti sattvayuktasya kṛtakasya gamakatvaṃ |

[79,6]

tadapyayuktaṃ | kṣaṇikatve sati kramāpratipatteryena hi jñānakṣaṇena pūrvakamvastu pratipannaṃ na tenottaraṃ yenottaraṃ na tena pūrvakamiti kathaṃ kramapratītiḥ | yo hi pūrvavastupratipatyanantaramaparasya grāhakaḥ sa kramagrāhī syāt tathā vā kṣaṇikatvamasya syāt | yasya ca bau ddha sya kāla eva nāsti tasya kathaṃ kramagrahaḥ | bhinnakālavastvagrahāt | kālābhāve cānekavasturūpa eva kramaḥ | tathā ca nityasyāpi kramakarttṛtvaṃ na virudhyate | yathā ca nityasya kramakarttṛtvādanekarūpatvantathā kṣaṇasyāpi syāt ||
atha kṣaṇavad dvitīye kṣaṇe nityasyāpyabhāvaḥ syāt | kāryābhāvāt |

[80,1]

tadayuktaṃ kālābhāvāt | bhavatu vā kramagrahastathāpi kathaṃ kramākramābhyāṃ sattvasya vyāptiḥ | kramayaugapadyavyatirekeṇānyena prakāreṇārthakriyāsambhavāt | na ca prakārāntarasya dṛśyānupalambhādabhāvaniścayaḥ | evaṃ hi viśiṣṭadeśādāvevābhāvaniścayaḥ syānna sarvadā | nāpyadṛśyānupalambhād abhāvaniścayaḥ sandehāt | tasmānnityeṣu kramākramāyogepi sattvānivṛtteḥ kathaṃ sattvasya kṣaṇikasvabhāvatvamiti śaṃ ka ra prabhṛtayaḥ |

[80,2]

bhavatu vā prakārāntarābhāvāt kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ sattvasya vyāptistathāpi nityeṣu na pratyakṣādinā kramākramāyogaḥ siddho nittyānāmatīndriyatvāt | tadasiddhau ca na teṣu sattvanivṛttisiddhistadasiddhau ca na satvasya kṣaṇikasvabhāvatvasiddhiḥ |

[80,3]

kiñca | sattvāt kramayaugapadyānumānaṃ syāt tenaiva vyāptatvānna tu kṣaṇikatvānumānantatra kramakarttṛtvāsambhavāditi |

[80,4]

atrocyate | kramayaugapadye pratyakṣasiddhe eva | sahabhāvo hi bhāvānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ kramastu pūrvāparabhāvaḥ sa ca kramiṇāmabhinnastatpratibhāsaścaikapratibhāsaḥ | sa tvekapratibhāsānantaramaparasya pratibhāsaḥ | kramapratibhāso na tvekasyaivātiprasaṅgāt |

[80,5]

satyaṃ | tatrāpi yadaikasya pratibhāso na tadāparasya tadbhāve hi yaugapadyapratibhāsaḥ syāt | tasmāt kramiṇoḥ pūrvottarābhyāṃ jñānābhyāṃ grahe kramo gṛhīta eva tato'bhedāt | kevalaṃ pūrvānubhūtavastvāhitasaṃskāraprabodhenedamasmādanantaramityānupūrvīvikalpotpattyā kramagraho vyavasthāpyate | kramiṇāṃ grahepi kathaṃcidānupūrvī vikalpānutpattau kramāgrahavyavasthāpanādata eva kramiṇāmekagrahepi na kramagraha ucyate |

[80,6]

kiṃ ca kālābhyupagamavādinopi kathaṃ kramagrahaḥ | ekakālatvāt sarvakāryāṇāṃ |
atha bhinnakālakāraṇopādhikramāt kāryakramastadayuktaṃ kālasyaikatvāta | ata eva na nityaṃsya bhāvaḥ |

[80,7]

atha pūrvāpararūpatvāt kramavān kālaḥ |

[80,8]

nanu tasyāpi kramo yadyaparakālāpekṣastadānavasthā syāt | atha tasya svarūpeṇā kramastathā sahāyarahitānāmbahūnāṃ kāryāṇāmapi kramaḥ syāt | asmākantu pūrvādipratyayaviṣayo mahābhūtaviśeṣaḥ kālo lokapratītostyeva | tasya ca bhedāt kramādipratītiryujyata eva | nāpi prakārāntareṇa nityasya kartatvaṃ sambhavati | yataḥprakārāntareṇaikadaikakāryakaraṇe'nekakaraṇe vānyadā'vastutvaṃ syāt kāryābhāvāt |
punaḥ punaḥ kāryakaraṇe ca krama eva na prakārāntarasambhavaḥ | atha prakārāntareṇa naikadā kāryaṃ karoti punaḥ punaśca na karoti tadāsyāvastutvaṃ syāt | sarvadā'karttṛtvāt |

[81,1]

tasmāt kramākramābhyāṃ ghaṭādirarthakriyākārī pratyakṣasiddhaḥ sa evāyamiti jñānādakṣaṇikaśca pratīyata eva | tasya ca yadaikakāryakaraṇaṃprati sāmarthyantattadaiva na pūrvaṃ na paścāttatkāryābhāvāt | sāmarthyaṃ ca tadavyatiriktamevamuttarottarakāryotpattāvapi draṣṭavyaṃ | sāmarthyabhedena ca padārthabhedāt kṣaṇika eva kramākramayorniyamaḥ |
tena yatra sattvantatra kramākramapratītāvapi kṣaṇikatvapratītireva | ya eva kṣaṇike kramākramayorniyamoyameva nityeṣu tayorayogaḥ | tasmād yadetad ghaṭādau nityatvaṃ pratītaṃ tat sattvaviruddhamiti nityasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhaḥ siddha ucyate |
yathā ca dṛṣṭe ghaṭādau sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvavyāptaṃ tathā'dṛṣṭeṣvapyaviśeṣāditi vyāptiṃ sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratipadya yathā yathā teṣu sattvaṃ niścīyate tathā tathā kṣaṇikatvānumānaṃ | sattvāniścaye tu śaśaviṣāṇavatteṣvasattāśaṃkayā kṣaṇikatvāpratītiḥ syāt | na ca tatrāpi bādhakapramāṇenaiva kṣaṇikatvasya siddhatvādanumānasya vaiyarthyaṃ | gṛhītavyāptikasya puṃsaḥ sattvaniścayamātreṇaiva sādhyārthāvagaterbādhakotthānavaiyarthyāt | vistaratastvayaṃ vyāptigrahaṇaprakāro "nairātmyasiddhā"vabhihita iti tatraivāvadhāryaḥ |

[81,2]

ye tu sattvasya vipakṣād abhāvena sarvatra kṣaṇikatvavyāptiṃ pratipadya sattvāttatraiva kṣaṇikatvamanumāpayanti | teṣāmanumānotthānameva na syāt | vyāptigrahaṇādeva pramāṇāt sarvatra kṣaṇikatvasya siddhatvāt | na ca dharmī siddhaḥ sarvasya trailokyasya pratyakṣatvāddhetuścāsiddhaḥ | pakṣīkṛte ca sarvasmin dharmiṇi bādhakavaśād yadi vipakṣābhāvaḥ siddhastadā sādhyasyāpi siddhatvānnānumānasyotthānaṃ syāt |

[81,3]

nānyaśca dharmī siddha iti kathaṃ bādhakasya pravṛttiriti yatkiñcidetat |
tasmāt sthitametadasya sattvaviśiṣṭasya kṛtakatvasya kṣaṇikatvākhyo dharmaḥ svabhāvastanmātrānubandhī asya vā kṣaṇikatvasya svabhāvastanmātrānubandhī kṛtakamātrānubandhī pramāṇadṛṣṭa iti |

[81,4]

yadvā sattvaviśeṣaṇarahitasyāpi kṛtakatvādeḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye nānaikāntikatvaṃ | yatastasya prathame kṣaṇe ya eva svabhāvaḥ sa eva cet dvitīye kṣaṇe tadā'bhūtvā bhavanameva syāt prathamakṣaṇavat | tataśca kṣaṇikatvaṃ | atha prathamakṣaṇe kṛtakasya janmaiva na sthitirdvitīye tu kṣaṇe sthitireva na janma | evamapi kṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt | janmajanminorabhedāt | sthitisthitimatośca | na ca dvitīye kṣaṇe janma vinā sthitiryuktā | janma cenna tadā sthitistasyādvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvitvāt | tatrāpyevamiti sarvatrotpattireva na sthitiriti kṣaṇikatvameva | utpattiśca hetukṛteti tatraiva kṛtakatvaṃ |
na sthitau | tasmāt kṛtakatvasyākṣaṇikatvaviruddhatvānnānaikāntikatvaṃ | vistareṇa cāsya kṛtakatvasya kṣaṇikatvavyāpti"rnai rā tmya si ddhā" vabhihiteti tatraivāvagantavyā |

[82,1]

tasmāt sattvānantarbhūtasyāpi kṛtakatvasya vyāptiḥ pramāṇadṛṣṭā | tadāhāsya svabhāvastanmātrānubandhī pramāṇadṛṣṭastadbhāvaniyamāt | kṛtakabhāve'vaśyamanityatābhāvaniyamāditi |

[82,2]

"evaṃ jñātatadbhāvas"yānityasvabhāvaṃ kṛtakaṃ jñātavataḥ puṃso"rthāpattyā" sādhyasyā"nityatvasyābhāve kṛtakanna bhavatī"tyevaṃniścayo "bhava"tīti | yasmā"nnahi" svasyātmabhūtasyānityatvasyā"bhāve bhāvo bha"vati | tadātmabhūtaṃ kṛtakatvambhavati | kiṃ kāraṇam | "abhedāt" sādhyasādhanayoḥ | "anyathe"ti yadyanityatvābhāve kṛtakatvambhavet |
tadā "tadbhāve" kṛtakatvābhāve'vaśyamanityatva"mbhavatītyeva na syāt || tathe"ti yathā sādharmyaprayoge vaidharmyagatistathā vaidharmyaprayogenvayasmṛtirbhavatīti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ | tadabhāva iti nityatvābhāve kṛtakatvanna bhavatyavaśyamityukte | tata eva vaidharmyaprayogāt "tadbhāvatāvedinaḥ" | sādhanasya sādhyasvabhāvatāvedinaḥ puṃsaḥ |
kathantadbhāvatāṃ vettīti cedāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | "aya"manityatvākhyo dharmosya kṛtakatvasya "svabhā"vo yena "tadabhāve" kṛtakatvanna "bhava"ti | "anya"theti | anityatvaṃ yadi kṛtakasya svabhāvo na bhavet | tadā tadabhāve kṛtakatvanna bhavedityasyā"yogāt |
iti" hetostatsva"bhāvatāpratipattyā" kṛtakasyānityasvabhāvatopratipattyā"nvayasmṛtirbhavati" |

[82,3]

etaduktambhavati | ya eva hetoḥ sādhya eva bhāvaḥ sa eva vipakṣe'bhāva ityanvayavyatirekayostādātmyamanyonyavyāptiścāto hetāvanvayapratītyā vyatirekapratītirvyatirekapratītyā cānvayapratītiranumānameva |

[82,4]

tena yaducyate |

[83,1]

"sāmarthyamicchataḥ kī rtte rna ṣṭaṃ dvitvāvadhāraṇami"tinyāyamaṃjarī ?tadapāstaṃ |

[83,2]

yadvā naivaitat pramāṇaṃ kevalaṃ saṃketavaśād anvayamukhena vyatirekamukhe"na" vā prayuktamekaṃ vākyamubhayaṃ gamayatītyadoṣaḥ |

[83,3]

svabhāvahetāvanyataraprayogādubhayagatimuktvā kāryahetāvāha | "tathe"tyādi |
yatreti sarvanāmnā sarvopasaṃhāra"statrāgni"ravaśya"mityukte"'smādevānvayavacanāt"kāryandhūmo dahanasye"tyevanniścayo bhavati | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | yena "dhūme'vaśyamagni"rbhavati | "anyathā" yadi na kāraṇamagnidhūrmasya tadā"rthāntara"syāgnes"tadanubandhaniyamābhāvāt" |
dhūme yonubandho vyāpanaṃtanniyamasyābhāvāt | tataśca "svātantryambhāvasya" dhūmasvabhāvasya "syāt | ata" iti svātantryāt "tadabhāvepya"gnyabhāvepi dhūmasva"bhāvasyāvaikalyānnābhāvaḥ syā"nna caivantasmāt kāryo dhūma eṣṭavyaḥ | yataḥ "kārye" tu dhūmebhyupagate"'vaśya"ntatra "kāraṇa"magni"rbhavati | ida"mityasyaiva samarthanaṃ | "arthāntarabhā"va iti kāryābhimatasya bhāve "svabhāvopadhānaṃ" svarūpapratyupasthānaṃ | "kāryasyā"pi "tadbhāva eva" kāraṇabhāva eva "bhāvaḥ" kāryatvaṃ | "tacca" kāraṇabhāva eva bhāvitvama"sti dhūme |
tasmāt kāryaṃ dhūma ityevamanvayena viditatatkāryatvas"ya puṃso "dahanābhāve dhūmo na bhava"tītyarthād bhavati |

[83,4]

adhunā vaidharmyeṇānvayagatimāha | "tathe"tyādi | "asatyagnau dhūmo na bhavatītyukte"'smād vyatirekavacanād viditatatkāryatvasya "dhūme'vaśyamagnirbhavatītyevamarthād anvayapratipattirbhavati | anyathā" yadi vaidharmyavacanenāgneḥ kāryaṃ dhūma ityetanna kathyate"tadabhāve"'gnyabhāve "kinna bhaved" dhūmo | bhavedeveti vyatirekaniścaya eva na syāt |
tasmāt sthitametat | satyarthāntaratve yadabhāve yadavaśyanna bhavati | tattasya kāryamataśca vyatirekakathanādanvayo gamyata iti ||

[84,1]

atra paro vyabhicāramāha | "nanu" cetyādi | "nityānityārthayoḥ kā"ryannityānityārthakāryantadbhāvastattvaṃ | tasyā"bhāve"pi | tathā hi "śravaṇajñānaṃ" śabdasyaiva gharmatvādasādhāraṇantatra na jñāyate kinnityasya sataḥ śabdasya kāryaṃ śravaṇajñānamutānityasyeti | tataśca na nityārthakāryatvaṃ śravaṇajñānasya nāpyanityārthakāryatvantathāpi"śravaṇajñānanna bhavati" tadabhāvepi nityānityārthābhāve | tadvyatireke vyatiricyata iti yāvat | nityārthābhāve tāvanna bhavatyanityeṣu ghaṭādiṣvabhāvāt | anityābhāvepi na bhavati nityeṣvākāśādiṣvabhāvāt | "na vai na bhava"tīti si ddhā "ntavādī" | na vai tacchrāvaṇatvannityānityābhāve na bhavatītyevaṃ śakyamvijñātuṃ | yadi tu tadabhāvena bhavatītyevanniścayaḥ syāt tadā tatkāryatvanniyamena syāt | kintu tadabhāve na bhavatītyeva nāsti | kiṅkāraṇa"ntayoreva" nityānityatvayo"stataḥ" śrāvaṇatvāt "saṃśayāt | anyathā"
nityānitye vastu"nyabhāvena niścitā"cchrāvaṇatvātka"thantadbhāvaparāmarśena śabde saṃśayaḥ syāt" | tasmānnityānityābhyāṃ vyāvṛttireva nāsti śrāvaṇatvasya |

[84,2]

kathantarhyasādhāraṇatvācchrāvaṇatvaṃ nityānityayornāstītyucyata ityāha | "kevala"ntvityādi | nityānityeṣu śrāvaṇatvasya "bhāvaniścayābhāvāt" | śrāvaṇatvaṃ nityānatyayo"rnāstītyucyate" |

[84,3]

nanvanityādike sādhye yadi śrāvaṇatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayordṛṣṭaṃ syāt | syācchabde śrāvaṇatvāt sandehaḥ | prameyatvādiva | na caitat sapakṣāvipakṣayordṛṣṭamato 'pratipattiriti bha ṭṭo dyo ta ka rau | atha śabdavastu kadācinnityamanityamvā vastu dharmaśca śrāvaṇatvantenātaḥ sandeha ucyate |

[84,4]

tadayuktaṃ | evaṃ hi vastudharmatvasyaiva sandehahetutvaṃ syānna śrāvaṇatvasyeti |
atrocyate | yadi hi yatra yatra śrāvaṇatvantatra tatra nityānityayorabhāva iti pratipannaṃ syāt tato nityānityayorapratipattiḥ syāt | na cānityādiyukte ghaṭādau śrāvaṇatvasyābhāva iti śabdepyabhāvastena śrāvaṇatvāt tatra sandeha eva |

[84,5]

nanu śrāvaṇatvaṃ śravaṇajñānaṃprati sāmarthyanna ca nityasya sāmarthyamastyarthakriyāvirodhāt | tatkathamataḥ sandehaḥ | anityatvasyaiva niścayāditi |

[84,6]

evammanyate | yadi sāmarthyamātraṃ hetustadā sattvameva taditi na kācit kṣatiḥ || tasya sapakṣasādhāraṇatvādevaṃ prameyatvādiṣvapi draṣṭavyaṃ | atha śravaṇajñānaṃprati yatsāmarthyantaddhetustacca na kvacidanityatvavyāptaṃ siddhamiti kathamato'nityatvasiddhirasādhāraṇatvādayaṃśabda eva tadanityatvavyāptaṃ siddhaṃ | tenaiva hi bādhakenapramāṇenānityatvasya tatra siddhatvācchrāvaṇatvasya vaiyarthyaṃ syāt | evaṃ sa cāsādhāraṇahetūnāmagamakatvaṃ boddhavyaṃ |

[85,1]

tasmāt sthitametat | kāryahetau dṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ sādhyasādhanayo"rhetuphalabhāvaḥ"
kathanīyo na tu darśanādarśanamātraṃ | evaṃ hyarthāpattyā'nyatareṇa dvitīyapratītirbhavet |
anyathā na syādityāha | "yadā puna"rityādi | "tadā yatra dhūmastatrāgnirityeva na syā"dityanvaya eva na syāt "pratibandhābhāvāt" | yadā cānvaya eva na siddhastadā kuto"gnyabhāve dhūmo nāstī"tyarthād v"yatirekasiddhiḥ | tathā vaidharmye"ṇādarśanamātrasya khyāpanāt sādhyābhāve het"vabhāvāsiddheḥ" kutastadvāreṇā"nvayasmṛ"tiḥ || "yathokta" iti tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaḥ | "ekasadbhāve" kāryasvabhāvaliṅgasya sadbhāve"'nyaprasiddhyarthaṃ" kāraṇasya svabhāvasya ca liṅginaḥ prasiddhyarthaṃ | "tadabhāve yathoktapratibandhābhāve" satyekasadbhāve'nyaprasiddhe"rasambhavāt" ||

[85,2]
