"hetusvabhāvā"bhāva iti hetvabhāvo vyāpakasvabhāvābhāvaśca | ata ityanantaroktāt kāraṇāt "kasyaci"t kāryasya vyāpyasya "ca pratiṣe"dhe | cakārāt pratiṣedhavyavahāre ca sādhye | "hetu"rliṅgaṃ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | yasmāt "tāveva hi" kāraṇavyāpakau"ni varttamānau svapratiba"ddhaṃ kāryaṃ vyāpyaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ "nivarttayata iti kasyacidarthasya" kāryasya vyāpyasya vā "pratiṣedhamapi sādhayitukāme"na | "api"śabdād vyavahāramapi | "hetoḥ" kāraṇasya v"yāpakas"ya ca "svabhāvasya nivṛttirhetutvenākhye"yā | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "apratibandhe hīt"yādi | na ca tābhyāmanyaḥ pratibandhostīti bhāvaḥ || "yukto" nyāyya "upalambho" yasya sa tathādṛśyasyetyarthaḥ | "tasya"ti svabhāvasy"ānupalambha"naṃ "pratiṣedhahetuḥ" | na cāyaṃ pratiṣedhasyaiva hetuḥ kintu"pratiṣedhaviṣayo vyavahārasta"sya "heturiti" kṛtvā taddhetuḥ pratiṣedhahetu"rityuktaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | na pratiṣedhahetus"tathābhūtānupalambhas"ya dṛśyānupalambhasya "svayaṃ pratiṣedha" | heturvyāpakānupalabdhiriti "kāraṇā"nupalabdhi"rvyāpakānupalabdhi"śca | "ubhayasyāpī"ti pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhavyavahārasya ca ||

[86,1]

"iti" eva"miyama"nupalabdhiḥ | saṃkṣipya "tridhāpyuktā" satī puna"ranekadho"ktā | yathātraivā'ṣṭadhā prāg vibhaktā | kena prakāreṇetyāha | "tattadviruddhe"tyādi | tacchabdena prakrāntaṃ svabhāvakāraṇavyāpakatrayaṃ gṛhyate | tena svabhāvaditrayeṇa viruddhanta dviruddhantrividhameva bhavati | svabhāvaviruddhakāraṇaviruddhavyāpakaviruddhabhedāḥ |
tadviruddhamādiryasya "tattadviruddhādi" | ādiśabdena viruddhakāryasya kāraṇaviruddhakāryasya ca parigrahaḥ | tacca tadviruddhādī | tayo"ragatigatī" | tadagatistadviruddhādigatiścetyarthaḥ | tayo"rbhe"dastena "prayogastasmā"t prayogabhedatonekadhoktā | tatra tadagatyā tisronupalabdhayaḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ vyāpakānupalabdhiśca | tadviruddhagatyā tisra eva | svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhiḥ kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhiḥ vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiśca | ādiśabdāt viruddhakāryopalabdhiḥ kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhiśceti | evamaṣṭavidhasya prāguktasyānupalambhasya saṃgraho bhavati |

[86,2]

"trividha eva" hītyādinā kārikārthamāha | "upalabhyasatt"vasyetyupalambhayogyasya heto"ranupalabdhiri"ti sambandhaḥ | "vyāpakasya svātmanaścopalabhyasattvas"yeti varttate | "soya"ntrividhapratiṣedhahetuḥ "prayogavaśenā"nekaprakāra ukta iti sambandhaḥ | kathaṃ "prayoga"
vaśenetyāha | "tattadviruddhādyagatigatibhedaprayogata" iti | "etadeva tasyāgatyetyā"dinā vibhajyate | "tasyāgat"yeti svabhāvakāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyā | "tadviruddhagatye"ti svabhāvakāraṇavyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyā | "viruddhakāryagatye"ti viruddhakāryopalabdhyā | "ityādibhedaprayogai"riti kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhyādibhedaprayogaiḥ | "yathoktaṃ prāga"nu pala bdhi pra bhe da ci ntā yāṃ 1 | 6 ||

[87,1]

yata evaṃ pratibandhavaśād gamakatvāttasmāt | kārya"kāraṇabhāvādvā niyāmakāt"
sādhyasādhanayoravyabhicārasādhakāt "svabhāvā"dvā tādātmyalakṣaṇā"nniyāmakā"t |
kāryasya svabhāvasya ca liṅgasyā"vinābhāvaḥ" sādhyadharmaṃ vinā na bhāva ityarthaḥ || na cāsādhāraṇasya sādhyāvinābhāvosti sandehahetutvāt | avinābhāve tu tanniścāyakenaiva pramāṇena tatra dharmiṇi sādhyasya siddhatvāt kathamasya gamakatvaṃ |

[87,2]

tena bha ṭṭe na yaducyate ||

[87,3]

"avinābhāvaśabdopya...sakalārthabhāk | nānumā yogyasambandhapratipatti karoti naḥ || yadi tāvad vinābhāvo na sa paścād viśiṣyate | tato'sādhāraṇepyasti sa iti syādakāraṇaṃ || yo hyasādhāraṇo dharmaḥ sa tenaivātmasātkṛtaḥ | vinā na bhavatītyeva jñāto hetuḥ prasajyata iti | "

[87,4]

tadapāstaṃ | avinābhāva eva hi niyamaḥ | sādhyaṃ vinā na bhavatīti kṛtvā |

[87,5]

yadyevaṃ kimarthaṃ punarniyamagrahaṇaṃ | sattyaṃ | paramatanirāsārthaṃ | sa hyavinābhāvavyatirekeṇānyaṃ niyamamicchati | yadāha bha ṭṭaḥ || "evamanyoktasambandhapratyākhyāne kṛte sati | niyamo nāma sambandhaḥ svamatenocyate'dhunā || kāryakāraṇabhāvādisambandhānāṃ dvayī gatiḥ | niyamāniyamābhyāṃ | syānniyamasyānumāṅgatā || sarvepyaniyamā hyete nānumotpattikāraṇaṃ || niyamāt kevalādevanna kiñcinnānumīyate || tasmānniyama evaikaḥ sambandho'trāvadhāryate | gamakasyaiva gamyena sa ceṣṭaḥ prāṅ nirūpitaḥ || niyamasmarataḥ samyag niyamyaikāṅgadarśanāt | niyāmakāṅgavijñānamanumānantadaṅgiṣviti | " tadapāstaṃ ||

[88,1]

kāyakāraṇabhāvādisambandhābhāve niyama eva na syāt | apratibaddhānāṃ sahabhāvaniyamābhāvāt | pāṇḍutvādimātrasya cāgnyakāryatvāt | deśakālādyapekṣayā ca liṅgasya gamakatvānniyama eveti kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādisambandhepi dvayī gatirucyate | atha syāt | kāryakāraṇabhāvādisambandhamabhyupagacchatāpi yāvat sādhanasya sādhyeniyamo na niścitastāvanna sādhyapratipattyaṅgatvantena kāryakāraṇabhāve satyapi niyama eva sambandhobhyupagamyate | tasyaiva pratipattyaṅgatvāttadvaktuṃ sa evaikonumānāṅgaṃ śeṣāstadvyaktihetava iti | tadayuktaṃ | niyamo hi tadāyattataiva | sā ca tādātmyatadutpattisvabhāvaiva | tena tādātmyatadutpattiniścaya eva niyamaniścayo na punardarśanādarśanābhyānniyamaniścayo vyabhicārāt |

[88,2]

nanu yathā darśanādarśanayorniyamaniścayaṃprati vyabhicārastathā kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayepi syāditi |

[88,3]

tadayuktaṃ | viśiṣṭābhyāmeva darśanādarśanābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayābhyupagamāt | etaccātraiva vakṣyati |

[88,4]

yadapyu mve ke nocyate | "śataśo yadagnau dhūmadarśanantadanyathānupapattyā niyatoyaṃ dhūmognāviti yanniyamajñānamutpadyate | tasyānagnau dhūmadarśanambādhakaṃ |
na ca tadastīti dhūmasyāgnau niyama" iti |

[88,5]

tadayuktaṃ | agnikāryatvābhāve hyanagnau dhūmādarśanasyānupalabdhimātratvenāpramāṇasyābādhakatvādanagnau dhūmasya śaṃkyamānatvena kathamagnau niyamaḥ | stasmāt sthitametat |

[88,6]

"kāryakāraṇabhāvādvā svabhāvādvā niyāmakād | avinābhāvaniyamaḥ" | kāryakāraṇabhāvādiniścayāccāvinābhāvaniyamaniścayo "'darśanānna na darśanāt" | sādhyābhāve hetoradarśanamātrānnāvinābhāvaniyamaniścayaḥ | na darśanāt | nāpi sādhyasādhanayoḥ sahabhāvadarśanāt |

[88,7]

tasmāttadutpattyaivārthāntarasyārthāntareṇāvinābhāvaḥ |

[88,8]

"anyathe"tyāsatyāntadutpattau "paraiḥ" sādhyābhimataiḥ parasyānātmābhūtasya liṃgasya"ko'vaśyambhāvaniya"maḥ | "anarthāntare" tu liṅge tanmātrānubandhitvaṃ sādhyadharmasyeṣṭavyamanyathā kṛtakatvasya ya"nnimitta"ntasmā"darthānta"ramudgarādi"nimittaṃ" yasyā nityatvasyeṣyate | tasmin vā "dharme"'vaśyambhāvaniyamaḥ kaḥ | kimiva "vāsasi rāgavat" |
niṣpanne vāsasi kusumbhādinimitto yo rāgaḥ paścādbhāvī ||

[89,1]

tatra yathā nāvaśyambhāvaniyamastadvadanityatvasyārthāntarahetutva iṣyamāṇe na kevalamayandoṣo'yamaparo doṣa ityāha | "api" cetyādi | "arthāntaranimitto" nityatvākhyo dha"rmaḥ syādanya eva" | tasmāt svabhāvabhūtāt kṛtakādestathāhi sādhyadharmasyārthāntaranimittatvābhyupagame dvayamiṣṭaṃ sādhananiṣpattāvaniṣpattirbhinnahetukatvaṃ ca | etacca nāntareṇa svabhāvabhedaṃ ghaṭate | yasmā"nna hi tasmi"n sādhanasvabhāve"niṣpannepyaniṣpanno bhinnahetuko vā" sādhyadharmas"tatsvabhāvo yuk"taḥ | pūrvaniṣpannasya bhinnahetukasya ca liṅgasya svabhāvo yukto yasmāda"yameva" khalu lokapratīto "bhedo bhāvānāṃ" yo viruddhadharmādhyāso viruddhadharmayogaḥ | niṣpattyaniṣpattī cātra viruddhau dharmau | tathāyameva bhedaheturbhedasya janako yaḥ kāraṇabhedaḥ | sāmagrībhedaścātra "kāraṇabhedo" draṣṭavyaḥ | etena bhedasvarūpabhedakāraṇañcoktaṃ ||

[89,2]

bhedapratibhāsastu bhedagrāhakaḥ || "tau ced biruddhadharmādhyāsakāraṇabhe"dau na bhedakāvi"ṣye"te | "tadā na kasya"cidvastunaḥ ku"taścidarthā"d "bheda ityekandravyamviśvaṃ"
samastañjagat "syāt" || traiguṇyasyāviśeṣādaikyaṃ sarvasyeṣṭameveti cedāha | "tataśce"tyekatvāt "sahotpattivināśau" | ekasyotpāde sarvasyotpādo vināśe ca vināśaḥ syādityarthaḥ | "sarvasya ca sarva"tra kārya "upayogaḥ" kāraṇatvaṃ "syād" | sahotpatyādyanabhyupagame | sarvamvast"vekamityeva na syā"t | athopayogādibhedena parasparabhinnātmateṣyate bhedā "nāṃ" syāt | bahūnāmekamiti saṃjñā kṛtā syāt |
kiṅkāraṇama | "arthaṃ" parasparabhinna"mabhyupagamya tathābhidhānāt" | ekamityabhidhānāt ||

[90,1]

atha syāt prākpradhvaṃsābhāvāntarvartisattāsambandho'nityatā | sā ca kṛtakaniṣpattikāle niṣpannaiva kevalaṃ pradhvaṃsennottarakālamabhivyajyata iti |

[90,2]

tadapyayuktaṃ | yato yāvat pradhvaṃso notpadyate tāvat kathamantarālavarttyanityatā |
pradhvaṃsotpattāvapi kathamantarālavarttitvamasyāḥ | kṛtakasvabhāvatvamvā | bhāvasyaivābhāvāt ||

[90,3]

"nanvi"tyādi paraḥ | "anarthāntarahetutvepi" vināśakāraṇānapekṣatvepi tvanmatenānityatāyāḥ | "bhāvakāle'nityatāniṣpatteḥ" | bhāvasya sattākāle tasyā anityatāyā aniṣpatte rbhāvāduttarakālamanityatā bhavatīti manyate | tulyā'tatsvabhāvā |
yathārthāntarahetutvepi niṣpattiḥ syāt | tayornānātvantarthā'narthāntarahetutvepīti"tulyā'tatsvabhāvatā" |

[90,4]

"netyā"dinā pratividhatte | "apūrvasvabhāvalābho niṣpattirucyate'nityatā" ca bhāvanivṛttirūpā | tato niṣpatterevābhāvāt kathaṃ viruddhadharmasaṃrgaḥ | yadi tarhi nānityatā vastu satī kathaṃ sādhyasādhanayostādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandha ityāha | "sa eva hi bhāva" iti | kṣaṇe "sthi"tiryā "saiva dharmo" yasyeti | nivṛttidharmā svabhāva "evānityato"cyate sa eva sādhyaḥ | tena tādātmyaṃ hetusādhyayorvyatiriktārthatvanityatā nīrūpā | tena bhāvasyānityatā bhavatītītyevamādibhirvākyairbhāvasya na kiṃcidrupaṃ vidhīyate'pi tu dṛṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ nāstītyayamarthobhidhīyate dharmāntarābhidhāne bhāvanivṛttyapratipādanaprasaṅgāt |

[90,5]

yadi bhāva evānityatā kathantarhi śabdasya dharmiṇo nityatā dharma iti vacanabheda ityata āha | "vacanabhede"pītyādi | "dharmadharmitayā" yo "vacanabhedo vācakānyatva"ntatr"āpi nimittamuttaratra vakṣyā"maḥ ||

[90,6]

etena yadapyucyate 'dhya ya nā vi ddha ka ṇ rṇo dyo ta ka rā di bhiḥ | yadi tulāntayornāmonnāmavatkāryetpattikāla eva kāraṇavināśaḥ | tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvo na syād yataḥ kāraṇasya vināśaḥ kāraṇotpādaḥ | evaṃ bhāva eva nāśa iti vacanādevañca kāraṇena saha kāryamutpannamiti prāptaṃ | yadi ca bhāva eva nāśaḥ prathamepi kṣaṇe bhāvasya na sattā syāt | vināśād bhāvanivṛttiśca vināśo lokapratīto na bhāva eva | sarvakālaṃ ca nāśasadbhāvād bhāvasya satvaṃ syāt | atha kāraṇotpādāt kāraṇavināśo bhinnastadā kṛtakasvabhāvatvamanityatvasya na syāt |
vyatirikte ca nāśe jāte tasya kṣaṇasya na nivṛttiriti kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti |

[91,1]

tadapāstaṃ | dvividho hi vināśa iṣyate bhāvanivṛttirūpo bhāvaśca |
tenotpanno bhāvaḥ kāryaṅkaroti kāryakāle ca kāraṇanivṛttirupo vināśo lokapratīta eva | nāyambhāvasvabhāva iṣyate | nāpi kāraṇotpādād abhinno bhinno vā nīrūpatvāt kevalamasya bhedābhedapratiṣedha eva kriyate | tathā ca vakṣyati |

[91,2]

"bhāve hyeṣa vikalpaḥ syād vidhervastvanurodhata"1 | 281 iti |

[91,3]

tena vyatirikte nāśe jāte kṣaṇasya na nivṛttirityapāstaṃ | yataśca dvitīyakṣaṇotpattikāla eva prathamakṣaṇe nivṛttistenaikakṣaṇasthāyī bhāvo vināśaśabdenocyate'yaṃ ca vināśo bhāvarūpatvātsādhanasvabhāva eva | kāryotpattikāle ca nivartteta iti kāryabhinnakālabhāvī na cāsya sarvakālambhāvo bhāvasyāsatvāt |

[91,4]

yadvā vinaśvaro'yaṃ vināśo'syeti dvābhyāṃ dharmadharmivācakābhyāmavināśivyāvṛttasyaivaikasya bhāvasya bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepābhyāmabhidhānād bhāva eva nāśa ucyate iti sarvaṃ susthaṃ |

[91,5]

yadi tarhi bhāva evānityatā tadā bhāvapratyakṣīkaraṇe sāpi pratyakṣaiveti kasmānna tathaiva niścīyata ityata āha | "tāmi"tyādi | "kṣaṇasthitidharmatāṃ svabhāva"manityatākhyaṃ"paśyanna"pi pratyakṣīkurvāṇopi "na vyavasya"ti | na niścinotīti sambandhaḥ |

[91,6]

kasmāt kṣaṇasthitidharmatāsvabhāva ityāha | "svahetoreva" sakāśā"ttathā kṣaṇasthita"dharmatayo"tpatteḥ" | kiṃ punaḥ paśyannapi na vyavasyatītyāha | "mandabuddhi"riti |
anādisaṃsārābhyastayā nityādirūpāvidyāvāsanayā mandā buddhiryasya sa tathā'nyathā dṛṣṭe vastuni sarvātmanāṃ kimiti na niścayaḥ syād | anena tu yogināṃ satyapi sadṛśadarśane mandabuddhitvābhāvāt kṣaṇikatvaniścayo bhavatītyuktambhavati |

[91,7]

yadi tarhyavidyayā nānityatvādhyavasāyo vinaśyatyapi bhāve mābhūdanityatādhyavasāya ityāśaṃkya bāhmamapi bhrāntibījamāha | "sattopalambhe"netyādi | yaḥ sattāyā evopalambho nābhāvasya tena sattopalambhena |

[91,8]

etaduktambhavati | uttarakṣaṇotpādakāla eva pūrvakṣaṇavināśāt pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorabhāvenāvyavadhānānnairantaryeṇānyatvāgrahāt "sarvadā" dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣvapisattāyā evopalambhena "tathābhāvaḥ" pūrvadṛṣṭasya bhāvaḥ sadbhāvastasya yā "śaṅkā" kadācitsa evāyamityevaṃrūpā bhūtā bhrāntasyāpi sa evāyamiti darśanācchaketyāha | tayā "vipra"labdho vaṃcito "na vyavasyati" |

[92,1]

agnidhūmayorapi tarhi kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayo na syādabhāvāvyavadhānenānyatvāgrahādityāha | "sadṛśāparotpatte"rityādi | dṛṣṭaṃ ca sadṛśāparadarśanaṃ śuktikādau satyapi bhedabhrāntinimittaṃ | etacca "nai rā tmya si ddhau" vibhaktamiti tatraivābadhārya |

[92,2]

tena sarvātmanā pūrvakṣaṇasadṛśasyāparasyotpattistayā vipralabdho na pūrvakṣaṇāduttarakṣaṇamanyatvenādhyavasyatyapi tu sa evāyamityata eva na pūrvakṣaṇasya vināśapratītiruttarasya cotpattipratītiḥ | agnidhūmayostvekāntena visadṛśatvānnairantarye satyapyanyatvagrahād bhavati kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayaḥ | vā śabdastvanavakḷptisūcanārthaḥ |

[92,3]

tenāyamartho yadi sattopalambhe vyabhicāraḥ sadṛśāparotpattyā vā "vipralambhaḥ"
sarvadāstyeva vipralambha ityevaṃ paraḥ |

[92,4]

athavā kiṃ punaḥ paśyannapi na vyavasyatītyāha | sattopalambhena | pūrvaṃ yaḥ sattopalambhena pratīyamāne tadbhāvaśaṅkā pūrvadṛṣṭabhāvāropastena vipralabdhaḥ na vyavasyati | evantarhyādikṣaṇadarśana evādhyavasāyaḥ syāt | pūrvaṃ sattopalambhābhāvādityāśaṃkyāha | "sadṛśāparotpattivipralabdho" veti | vā śabdaścārthe | prathamakṣaṇasadṛśasya dvitīyakṣaṇasyotpattyā ca vipralabdho na vyavasyati | yogināmapi tarhi "niścayo"
na syādityāha | "mandabuddhiri"ti | tena bāhyādhyātmikavipralambhanimittasadbhāvāt pṛthagjanānāṃ niścayaḥ | yogināntu satyapi sadṛśadarśane paṭubuddhitvānniścayo bhavatyeva |

[92,5]

tasmāt sthitametat | kṣaṇasthitidharmatāṃ paśyannapi sadṛśāparotpattyā vipralabdho na vyavasyatīti ||

[92,6]

nanu bhāvasya kṣaṇikatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇānāṃ vibhāgena pratibhāsaḥ syāt |
apratibhāsanācca kathampaśyannapi na vyavasyatītyucyate | atha nīlādyavyatirikta tvāt kṣaṇiṃkatvasya nīlagrahe grahaḥ |

[92,7]

yuktametat | kintvidamatra nirūpyate | kimidaṃ nīlamakṣaṇikamuta kṣaṇarūpamatha santānaḥ | tatra yadyakṣaṇikantadā nīlapratibhāse kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvapratibhāsaḥ |
atha kṣaṇarūpaṃ | nanvidamevāsiddhamiti kathaṃ nīlapratibhāse kṣaṇapratibhāsa ucyate | kṣaṇāpratibhāsanācca na santānarūpasya nīlasya pratibhāsaḥ | atha nīlamātrapratibhāse sati kṣaṇikatvapratibhāsaḥ | tadayuktaṃ | pratibhāsāpratibhāsābhyāṃ hi pratyakṣasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe | nānyathā | tadāha | tad yadapi gṛhṇāti tatpratibhāseneti |
na ca kṣaṇānāṃ pratibhāsa ityuktaṃ |

[93,1]

yadi ca nīlādyavyatiriktaṃ kṣaṇikatvantadā nīlaniścaye kṣaṇikatvasya niścitatvādanumānasya vaiyarthyaṃ syāt | yastvāha | ekajñānaviṣayatvameva kṣaṇikatvaṃ pūrvottarajñānaviṣayatvavyāvṛttasyaiva cedānīntanajñānaviṣayatvasya pratibhāsanāt |
pūrvāparakṣaṇavilakṣaṇa eva kṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣeṇānubhūtaniścitonumānena tu pratyakṣavṛttameva parāmṛśyata iti nānumānasya vaiyarthyamiti |

[93,2]

tadayuktaṃ | yato yadyekajñānasyākṣaṇikatvantadārthasyāpyakṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt | atha tasya kṣaṇikatvantatkuto'vagataṃ | tasyāpyekajñānaviṣayatvāditi cedanavasthayaiva pratipattiḥ kṣaṇikatvasya | atha jñānakṣaṇasya pratibhāso'bhyupagamyatesāvarthakṣaṇasya kinnābhyupagamyate | anyathaikasyāpi kṣaṇasyānekajñānaviṣatvādanekatvaṃ syāt |

[93,3]

bha ṭṭa vā su de va stvā ha | "pūrvottarakṣaṇānāṃ vināśenāpratibhāsanamevākṣaṇikatvapratibhāsanamatokṣaṇikatvagrāhakameva sarvampratyakṣaṃ kevalaṃ kṣaṇikatvānumānena bhrāntaṃ sādhyata" iti |

[93,4]

etadapyayuktaṃ | pratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣabādhitatvenānumānasyotthānābhāvāt |
nirvikalpakasyāpi pratyakṣasya bhrāntatve sambandhagrahaṇācca | paśyannapīti granthavirodhaśca | tasmādayuktamuktaṃ | paśyannapi na vyavasyatīti |

[93,5]

atrocyate | yathā hyarthakṣaṇānāṃ paurvāparyantathā jñānakṣaṇānāmapi tena pūrvakeṇa jñānakṣaṇena pūrvaka evārthakṣaṇo gṛhyate nottaraḥ | uttareṇāpyuttara eva na pūrva iti |
ekasmin jñāne tayorapratibhāsanāt kathampūrvasmādayamanya iti vibhāgena pratibhāsaḥ syāditi codyate | svarūpapratibhāsa eva ca bhāvasyānyasmād vivekapratibhāsaḥ sumerubhinnapratibhāsavat | sa ca kṣaṇasyāpyastye veti kathaṃ na vivekapratibhāsaḥ |
dṛṣṭo dṛśyata iti pratīteśca | anyo hi dṛṣṭaḥ svabhāvonyaśca dṛśyamānaḥ | tathā hi prathamadarśī dṛśyamānameva svabhāvambhāvasya paśyati na tu dṛṣṭamityanayorbheda eva |
kevalamekāntasadṛśayoḥ pūrvāparakṣaṇayorabhāvenāvyavadhānād ghaṭapaṭādivad vibhāgapratipattirna bhavati | nāpi vibhāgenāpratibhāsādabhedopi | na hi śuktikāyāntadevedamasmadīyaṃ rajatamiti pravarttamānasya śuktikārajatayorvivekapratibhāsābhāvādabhedopi | tasmād yathātra nirvikalpake jñāne śuktikāyāḥ svarūpapratibhāsa evānyasmāda vivekapratibhāsaḥ | tathaikasyāpi kṣaṇasya syāta | kevalaṃ pūrvaḥ kṣaṇaḥkasmānna vibhāgena smaryata iti yadi paraṃ codyaṃ syāttatra coktameva sadṛśāparotpattivipralabdhairna smaryata iti |

[94,1]

nanu tathāpi kṣaṇo na pratibhāsate | ekāṇvatyayakālatvenaiva bhāvasyāpratīteḥ |
na tu yadyekasmin kṣaṇesyāpratibhāsaḥ kathamakṣaṇikasya pratibhāsaḥ pratikṣaṇamapratibhāsanāt | utpadyamānasya ca bhāvasya pūrvāpararūpaviviktasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvagrahaḥ | nāpyakṣaṇikaḥ pratīyate pūrvāparakālayorapratibhāsādeva tatsambandhitayedānīṃ pratyakṣe'pratibhāsanāt pūrvakālasambandhisvabhāvasyedānīmapratibhāsa eva vināśo'nyasvabhāvasya pratibhāsa evotpāda iti kathamucyate pūrvottarakṣaṇānāṃ vināśotpādāpratibhāsanād akṣaṇika iti | nāpyanekakṣaṇarūpa idānīntanaḥ kālonekakṣaṇasambhave gṛhītādirūpatā'sya syāt na vyarthatā |

[94,2]

na hi pratyakṣabhāvinā niścayenedānīmevedamastīti niścīyate | kintarhīdānīmastīti | anumānena tvidānīmevāstīti sādhyate |

[94,3]

tasmāt sthitametat | paśyannapi na vyavasyatītyādi |

[94,4]

nanu yadi nityaṃ sadṛśa iti pratyakṣeṇa niścayaḥ syātsa evāyamiti buddhirbhrāntiryāvatā sarvadā sa evāyamiti pratītirdṛḍharūpotpadyata iti kathaṃ bhrāntistadāha bhaṭṭaḥ ||

[94,5]

"nityaṃ sadṛśa eveti yatra rūḍhā matirbhavet | sa iti pratyabhijñānaṃ bhrāntistatrāvakalpate || iha nityaṃ sa eveti vijñānaṃ jāyate dṛḍhaṃ | tadastitvātirekācca prāmāṇyantasya yujyate || deśakālādibhedena tatrāstyavasaro mitaḥ | idānīntanamastitvaṃ na hi pūrvadhiyo gataṃ || "

[94,6]

na ca sarvadānumānena sadṛśaniścayaḥ | pratyakṣapratyabhijñābādhitatvāt pratyabhijñāyā anumānotthānābhāvāt | na ca pratyabhijñāyā aprāmāṇyamitaretarāśrayadoṣāt |
yato na yāvadaprāmāṇyamasyāstāvannānumānasyotthānaṃ yāvacca nānumānotthānantāvannāsyā aprāmāṇyamanyonyāśrayadoṣa iti |

[94,7]

atrocyate | sa ityanena pūrvakālasambandhī svabhāvo viṣayīkriyate | ayamityanena ca varttamānakālasambandhī | anayośca bhedo na ca kathaṃcidabhedo varttamānakālabhāvirūpaikasvabhāvatvād vastunaḥ | tasmād bheda eva pratyabhijñāne sati bhāsata iti kathamanena kṣaṇikatvānumānabādhā |

[95,1]

yadvā vastunaḥ pūrvakālasambandhitvamidānīmasadeva | pūrvakālābhāvāt | sattve vāsya varttamānakālasambandhitvameva syānna pūrvakālasambandhitvaṃ virodhādityuktaṃ |
tasmāt pūrvakālasambandhitvasyāsato grāhakaḥ sa iti jñānāṃśo bhrānto'nyathā vastunaḥ spaṣṭabālādyavasthā grāhakaḥ syānna ca bhavati | tasmād bhrāntāt pūrvadṛṣṭarūpāropeṇa sa evāyamiti jñānāt kathamanumānabādhā | yatra cākṣavyāpārastadgrāhakaṃ pratyakṣamutpadyate | na ca pūrvakālāstitve'dhunā kva vyāpāro'sannihitatvāt | nāpi tadabhedena tatkathaṃ pūrvottarakālāstitvayoraikyagrāhakaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt | yadā ca bālādyavasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ vṛddhāvasthāyāṃ pratyabhijñāyate | na tatra vā pratyabhijñāne nityatvaṃ pratibhāsate | kevalaṃ sa evāyamiti tattvamadhyavasīyate | na ca tattvambālavṛddhāvasthayorbhedāt | nāpi tattvagrahaṇānyathānupapattyā nityatvādikalpanā |
sadṛśāparotpattibhrāntinimittādapyutpattisambhavāt | lūnapunarjāteṣviva keśeṣu |
na cātra keśatvasāmānyād bhinnāt pratyabhijñānaṃ | tadiheti buddhyutpādaprasaṅgāt |
nāpyabhinnādanyatrānugame vā'nugatavyāvṛttarūpayoḥ | paramparāsaṃśleṣeṇaikāntabhinnatvāt | tataśca ta evāmī keśā iti pratyabhijñā sadṛśāparotpattinimittaivāta eva bhrāntiḥ | tathā ghaṭādiṣvasyābhrāntatvāśaṃkayānumānasyotthānaṃ yujyata eva |
nāpītaretarāśrayatvaṃ yato nānumānena pratyabhijñāyā aprāmāṇyaṃ kriyate'pi tu jñāyate svahetuta evāpramāṇarūpāyā niṣpatteḥ | dṛṣṭo dṛśyata iti grahāt |
dṛṣṭatvaṃ hi na pūrvambhāvasyāsti | tadā dṛśyamānaikarūpatvāt | nāpyadhunā'ta eva |
nāpi pūrvakālasambandhitvaṃ dṛśyamānasyedānīṃ pūrvamabhāvāt | tasmād dṛṣṭatvamāropya grāhikā pratyabhijñā bhrāntatvādapramāṇaivotpadyate | nāpyasyā aprāmāṇyanimittamanumānasyotthānamapi tu sādhyapratibandhanimittamataḥ pratyabhijñāyā bādhakaṃ |
vistarastvayaṃ pratyabhijñābhaṅgavicāro nai rā tmya si ddhau kṛta iti tatraivāvadhāryaḥ ||

[95,2]

tasmāt sthitametat | tāṃ punaḥ kṣaṇasthitidharmatāṃ svabhāvampaśyannapi sadṛśāparotpattivipralabdhaḥ pūrvakṣaṇavināśāviniścayānna vyavasyatīti ||

[95,3]

kathaṃ punargamyate sadṛśāparotpattyā vipralabdho na vyavasyatītyata āha | "antye"tyādi | sadṛśakṣaṇāntarāpratisandhāyī kṣaṇo"'ntyakṣa"ṇasta"ddarśināṃ" naṣṭa iti "niśca" | avagamyate prāgapyayampratikṣaṇameva naśyati kevalaṃ yathoktādeva vipralambhahetorna niścīyate ||

[96,1]

nanvantyakṣaṇadarśinopi kathannaśvaratvaniścayo yāvatā tadāpi sattopalambho'sti | na hi sattāyāmevopalabhamānastadabhāvamavaitītyāha | "paścā"dityādi | na brūmontyakṣaṇadarśanamātrānniścayo bhavatīti kintvantyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā paścād vibhavati | tadā nopalabhyate "tattasya kāryaṃ" | na cāgnikāṣṭādisannidhāne bhavato dhūmasyāpanīte'śvādau anupalambhosti | agnyādau tvanīte bhavatyanupalambhaḥ | evamparasparasahitau pratyakṣānupalambhāvabhimateṣveva kāraṇeṣvasandigdhaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ sādhyata iti | "tacce"ti yathoktaṃ kāryalakṣaṇaṃ "dhūmesti" tasmādagnereva dhūmo bhavati |
sarvakālaṃ cāgnisannidhāne bhavato dhūmasyānagnijanyatvaṃ kadācitsadasatorajanyatvādahetutvādadṛśyahetutvādvocyate | tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣa iti tṛ tī ye pa ri cche de"aśaktaṃ sarvamiti cedi" tyatrāntare pra0 vā0 3 | 4 vakṣyāmaḥ | nāpyahetutvamiti tatraiva vakṣyati | nāpyadṛśyahetutvaṃ dhūmasya | agnyādisāmagryanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt ||

[97,1]

atha syād | adṛśyasyāyaṃ svabhāvo yadagnyādisannidhāna eva dhūmaṃ karpūrādidāhakāle sugandhādiyuktaṃ ca karoti nānyadeti | tatkimagnimantareṇa kadā cid dhūmotpattirdaṣṭā yenaivamucyate | neti cet | tatkathannāgnikāryo dhūmastadbhāve bhāvāt | dhūmotpattikāle cāgniḥ sarvadā pratīyamānopi kākatālīyanyāyenāvasthita ityalaukikoyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ |

[97,2]

athavā sa evādṛśyasya svabhāvo yadyagninā nopakriyate tatkimagnyādisannidhāna eva dhūmaṃ karoti na pūrvanna paścāt | tasmādagnyādisannidhāna evāsvabhāvo dhūmajanako bhavati nānyadeti tatrāpi pāramparyeṇa dhūmasyāgnijanyatvameva syāt |

[97,3]

kiñca | yathā deśakālādikamantareṇa dhūmasyānutpattestadapekṣā pratīyate tathā sarvadāgnimantareṇānutpattidarśanādagnyapekṣā'sya kena vāryeta | tadapekṣā ca tatkāryataiva | yathā cādṛśyabhāva eva dhūmasya bhāvāttajjanyatvamiṣyate tathā sarvakālamagnibhāve bhāvadarśanādagnijanyatvaṃ kinneṣyate | yāvatāṃ ca sannidhāna evotpadyamāno bhāvo dṛśyate tāvatāmeva hetutvaṃ sarveṣāṃ prāgbhāvasya tulyatvāt | tathā cāgnyadṛśyādisāmagrījanyatvaṃ dhūmasyeti kutognivyabhicāraḥ ||

[97,4]

anyastvāha | bhavatvagnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvatastathāpi na tayorekena jñānena grahaṇambhinnakālatvāt | nāpyanena pūrvakeṇa hi nirvikalpakena pūrvakamvastu mātraṃ gṛhītaṃ na tu kāraṇarūpaṃ kāryasya bhāvitvenāpratyakṣatvāt | uttareṇāpyuttaramvastumātraṃ gṛhyate na tu kāryarūpaṃ kāraṇasyātītatvenāgrahāt | nāpi savikalpakena tatrāpyasya codyasya tulyatvāt | tenedamasmādutpannamiti na kenacid gṛhītamata eva na smaraṇenāpi gṛhyatenubhavābhāvāditi |

[97,5]

atrocyate | kāryasya tāvadanutpannāvasthāyāmasattvādeva na kāraṇasambandhitvaṃ niṣpannāvasthāyāmapyevaṃ | nirapekṣatvāt | tathā kāraṇamapi kāryaniṣpattyaniṣpattyavasthāyāṃ kāryāsambandhyeva | nāpyanayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambandho bhinnakālatvāt | kevalamasyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti kalpitoyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ | tena hetoḥ sakāśāt svarūpalābha eva kāryatvaṃ | kāraṇasyāpi kāryaṃ prati prāgbhāva eva kāraṇatvaṃ sa cātmalābhaḥ prāgbhāvaśca bhāvasyābhinnatvāt pratyakṣagṛhīta eva ceti kathaṃ na pratyakṣagrāhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kevalaṃ kāryadarśane satīdamasya kāryakāraṇaṃ ceti vyavahriyate |
yato nākāryakāraṇayoḥ kāryakāraṇa bhāvaḥ sambhavati | nāpi kāryakāraṇabhāvayogāttayoḥ kāryakāraṇatā'bhinnā karttuṃ śakyate virodhāt | nāpi bhinnā tayoḥ svarūpeṇākāryakāraṇatā prasaṅgāt | svarūpeṇa kāryakāraṇayorapi kiṃ kārya kāraṇabhāvenārthāntareṇa kalpitena svarūpeṇaiva kāryakāraṇarūpatvāt | tasmāt pūrvottarabhāva eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ | tena pūrvake vastuni gṛhyamāṇe kāryaṃpratyānantaryakāraṇātmakaṃ gṛhītameva | uttareṇa ca jñānenottaramvastu kāraṇānantaraṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ kāryātmakameva gṛhyate | tadānantaryasya tadabhinnasvabhāvatvāt | ata evāsmādanantaramidambhavatīti smaraṇamapi bhavatyānantaryasyānubhūtatvāditi |

[98,1]

a vi ddha ka rṇṇa stvāha | "avinābhāvitvaṃ ekaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvitīyādidarśane sati sidhyati | na ca kṣaṇikavādino draṣṭurara?vasthānamasti | na cānyenānubhūterthenyasyāvinābhāvitvasmaraṇamastyatiprasaṅgādi"ti |

[98,2]

tadayuktaṃ | prathamāderarthakṣaṇasya prathamādijñānakṣaṇena grahaṇādekasantatipatitānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvena smaraṇasambhavācca | yathā ca kṣaṇikapakṣe kāryakāraṇabhāvastathoktameva vakṣyatica |

[98,3]

nanvevamapi kṣaṇānāmaniścayena kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayo na ca santānena tanniścayastasya santānibhyo bhinnasyābhāvāt kevalaṃ santānina eva pūrvāparakālabhāvinaḥ | tatra ca yadaikaḥ kṣaṇo na tadānya iti ekakṣaṇāvabhāsa eveti kathaṃ santānāvabhāsaḥ | tadabhāvāt kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti |

[98,4]

tadayuktam | ekaparamāṇvātmakasya vastuno bhāvāt sthūlātmanāṃ santānināṃ nairantaryapratibhāsa eva santānapratibhāsastatra ca kṣaṇavivekānavadhāraṇena sādṛśyena caikatvādhyavasāyādekasantativartināṃ kṣaṇānāṃ na kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayaḥ | bhinnasantānavartināṃ tu santānapravṛttyā vijātīyatvād bhavati tanniścayastenāgnisantānapūrvakasya dhūmasantānasya pratīteragnidhūmasantānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścaya ucyata iti yatkiñcidetat |

[98,5]

a dhya ya na stvāha | "svalakṣaṇayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇe sati kathaṃ sāmānyayorgamyagamakabhāvo bhinnatvādi"ti |

[98,6]

tadapyayuktam | anekasvalakṣaṇātmakasya sāmānyasyābhyupagamāt | taduktam |

[99,1]

"atadrūpaparāvṛttavastumātraprasādhanāt | sāmānyaviṣayaṃ proktaṃ liṅgaṃ bhedāpratiṣṭhiteriti || pra0 sa0"(pava.144)

[99,2]

tena svalakṣaṇānāṃ sambandhagraha eva sāmānyānāṃ sambandhagraho na tvanyaḥ |

[99,3]

nanvanumānavādinā bau ddhe na yāvanti svalakṣaṇāni trailokye | tāni sarvāṇyagnivyāptāni gṛhītavyānyekasyāpyagrahīte naivānaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt | na caivaṃ pratyakṣaṃ karttuṃ śaknoti sannihitaviṣayatvāt | na vānyeṣāṃ svalakṣaṇānāmanumānataḥ sādhyadharmeṇa vyāptigrahaṇamanavasthāprasaṅgāditi |

[99,4]

tadayuktaṃ yataḥ | pratyakṣamagnibhedasannidhāna eva dhūmabhedāt pratipat |
eṣvadhūmavyāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ dhūmamanagnivyāvṛttāgnimātrakāryamevetyavadhārayati |
yathātra tathānyatrāpi deśā dāvetad rūpamagnijanyameveti cāvadhārayatyanyathātrāgnisambandhitayā na pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate | evamagnyanagnikāryatvesyobhayasambandhitayā pratītiḥ syānnāgnisambatdhitayaiva | pratīyate ca | tasmādanyatrāpyetadrūpamagnereva bhavatīti niścayāt kuto dhūmasyāgnivyabhicāraḥ | yaśca tadrūpamvāṣpādivilakṣaṇamavadhārayituṃ śaknoti tasyaivaitadanumānaṃ nānyasya | sāmānyavyāptigrahaṇavādināpi gopālaghaṭikādāvagnimantareṇa dhūmasāmānyadarśanāvyabhicāraśaṃkayāgniniyatadhūmasāmānyāvadhāraṇenaiva tadanumānam | agniniyatadhūmasāmānyāvadhāraṇañcāgnisaṃmbaddhadhūmāvyaktyavadhāraṇapurassarameva | na ca sarvatra deśādāvāgnisambaddhadhūmavyaktiviśiṣṭasya dhūmasāmānyasya grahaṇaṅkenacit pramāṇena sambhavati |
nāpi mahānasādāvagnisambaddhadhūmavyaktiviśiṣṭaṃ dhūmasāmānyaṃ pratipannamanyatrānuyāyivyakterananvayāt | yacca dhūmasāmānyamanuyāyi tannāgnyavyabhicāri |
tasmāt sāmānyavyāptigrahaṇavādinopi kathaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dhūmasāmānyaṃ sarvatrāgninā vyāptaṃ pratipannamiti tulyaṃ codyaṃ |

[99,5]

atha dhūmasyānyatrāgnijanyatve na kiṃcid bādhakamasti tadevedamiti ca pratītestatsāmānyampratipannamiṣyate'smākamapi tadevedamiti pratyayasyotpattestatpratipannamiṣyata ityāvayoḥ ko bheda iti |

[99,6]

yatkiñcidetat | etamevārthandarśayannāha | "sa" dhūmo bhavaṃsta"dabhāve"'gnyabhāve"hetumattāmbilaṃghayeda"hetukaḥ syāt | yadvā sa dhūmognisambandhitayā pratītasta"dabhāve"gnyabhāve "bhavan hetumattā"magnisambandhitayā na pratyakṣeṇa pratīyeta | pratīyate ca |
tasmāt "sakṛdapi" na kevalaṃ bhūyasta"thādarśanādi"tyanantaroktāt pratyakṣānupalambhāta || kiṅkāraṇam | "akāraṇā"dagneḥ "sakṛdapi" na kevalaṃ bhūyo'"bhāvāt" | na hi bālukābhyaḥ sakṛdapi tailambhavati | "kāryasye"tyādinā kārikārthamāha | "na hītyā"dyasyaiva samarthanaṃ |

[100,1]

etena vyāptiḥ kathitā bhavati ca dhūmognimantareṇa vyabhicāravādinaḥ | anena ca pakṣadharmaḥ kathitaḥ | "tadi"ti tasmā"dagnimantareṇa bhāvānna taddhetu"rnāgnihetustathā cāhetuḥ "syā"diti bhāvaḥ ||

[100,2]

"anyahetukatvādi" vahneryadanyacchakramūrddhādi | taddhetukatvād dhūmasya "nāhetukatvaṃ iti cet" |

[100,3]

"naitadevantatrāpya"rthāntare hetau kalpyamāne "tulyatvāt" | tathā hi | "tadabhāve"pyanyakāraṇābhāvepi punara"gnau bhavatī"ti "tadapyanyat"kāraṇaṃ na hetuḥ "syā"t | api ca yosau vahniryacca tatonyatkāraṇantatkiṃ dhūmajananasvabhāvamāhosvinna | yadyajananasvabhāvantadā kathantatogneranyato vā "śakramūrddhā"dera"tajjananasvabhāvatvāt" adhūmajananasvabhāvāddhūmo bhavannaiva "bhavet" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "atatsvabhāvasya" svayamadhūmajananasvabhāvasyā"jananāttasya" dhūmasyāhetu"tā syāt" |

[100,4]

atha dhūmajananasvabhāvonyastadā dvayorapi vahnitvaṃ dhūmajananasvabhāvalakṣaṇatvād vahneḥ | etaccottaratrābhidhāsyate ||

[100,5]

"na vai sa eve"tyādi vyabhicāravādī | athavāgnijanito dhūmaḥ sa evānyato bhavatītyevaṃ nocyate | yadi sa evānyataḥ syād bhavedahetutva"ntādṛśasya" vahnijanitadharmasvabhāvatulyasyānyato "bhāvāt" |

[100,6]

"anyā"dṛśādityādi si ddhā nta vā dī | tatkiṃ kāryasadṛśaṃ kāraṇamiṣyate yenaivamucyatenyādṛśād "bhavan kathantādṛśa iti" | nānyārthatvāt | yo hi dhūmajanako vahnirdṛṣṭastato visadṛśād bhavan dhūmaḥ kathantādṛśo bhavati vahnijanitadharmatulyasvabhāvo bhavati |

[100,7]

etaduktambhavati | yathā dhūmabhedānāntārṇṇaparṇṇādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣayā tādṛśatvantathāgnibhedānāmapi tārṇṇapārṇṇādīnāṃ dhūmajanakānāntādaśatvaṃ parasparāpekṣayaiva | tena yādṛśo dhūmabheda ekasmādagnibhedādutpadyamāno dṛṣṭastādṛśasya dhūmabhedasya tādṛśādevāgnibhedādutpattiḥ | yastvanagnerutpannaḥ sonyādṛśa eva | vāṣpādivat |

[101,1]

nanvagnijanyena dhūmakṣaṇena tādṛśo dhūmakṣaṇajanyo dhūmakṣaṇastenānyādṛśādapi tādṛśo bhavatīti cet | na | agnijanyasya hi dhumakṣaṇasyāgnijanya evānyo dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśo bhavati nānyaḥ | na hi vāṣpādīnāntādṛśatvādhyavasāyepi tādṛśatvambhavati | dhūmakṣaṇajanyasyāpi dhūmakṣaṇasyānyo dhūmakṣaṇajanya eva dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśo bhavati nānyaḥ | tasmāttādṛśādeva tādṛśotpattiriti kuto vyabhicāraḥ | tena |

[101,2]

"kṣaṇikatve kathambhāvāḥ kvacidāyattavṛttayaḥ | prasiddhakāraṇābhāve yeṣāmbhāvastatonyataḥ || tataścānagnito dhūmād yathā dhūmasya sambhavaḥ | śakramūrdhnastathā tasya kena vāryeta sambhava iti || "

[101,3]

nirastaṃ | prathamasya hyagnijanyasya dhūmakṣaṇasyāparognijanya eva dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśo dhūmakṣaṇajanyasya dhūmakṣaṇasya dvitīyasyānyo dhūmakṣaṇajanya eva dvitīyo dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśo bhavati | tathā tṛtīyādikṣaṇeṣvapīti kṣaṇāpekṣayāpyavyabhicārastādṛśasya |
etamevāha | "tādṛśāddhi bhavaṃstādṛśaḥ syāt | anyādṛśādapya"vahnisadṛśādapi "yadi tādṛśo bhaved" vahnijanitadhūmatulyasvabhāvo bhavet | "tacchaktiniyamābhāvāt" |
sadṛśāsadṛśayoḥ kāraṇayoryā śaktistasyā yo niyamaḥ sadṛśī sadṛśameva janayatyasadṛśī vilakṣaṇamiti tasyābhāvāt kāraṇānna "hetubhedaḥ" kāryasya "bhedaka iti" kṛtvā'"kāraṇamviśvasya vaiśvarūpyaṃ" syāt | yataḥ kutaścitkāraṇādutpatternāhetukatvamiti cedāha | "sarvaṃ vā sarvasmā"dityādi | aśaktādapi cedutpattiḥ "sarva sarvasmājjāyeta" |
na caivaṃ | "tasmā"dityādi | tanna dhūma iti | taditi tasmād | yata utpadyamāno "dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ" sa "dṛṣṭākāro" vahniḥ | tadvi"jātīyā"davahnerityarthaḥ ||

[102,1]

"tathā ce"tyahetukatve sati "nityaṃ sattvamasattvamvā" dhūmasya syāt | kiṅkāraṇam | "aheto"rbhāvasya svaniṣpattāva"nyānapekṣaṇā"t | kāraṇāntarānapekṣaṇāt | kāraṇāntarānapekṣatvepi kādācitkaṃ svabhāvato bhaviṣyatīti cedāha | "apekṣāto" hīti |

[102,2]

etaduktambhavati | aniṣpannasyāsattvādeva kathaṃ svabhāvataḥ "kādācitkatvaṃ" |
niṣpannasya tvasti svabhāvaḥ kevalaṃ saiva niṣpattiḥ kathaṃ kvacid bhavatīti codyate | "sa hī"tyādimaitadeva vyācaṣṭe | "na kadācinna bhave"t sarvakālambhavet |
kiṅkāraṇa"ntadbhā"ve dhūmasvabhāvasya bhāve | kāraṇānapekṣatvena "vaikalyābhāvāt |
iṣṭakāla"vat | "tadāpi ce"ti dṛṣṭakālepi dhūmo na bhavet | dhūmā"bhāvakālāviśeṣāt" |

[102,3]

paścādarddhamvibhajannāha | "apekṣayā hī"ti | yogyadeśakālāpekṣayā | yasmāt kāryasya yau "bhāvābhāvakālau tayo"ryathākrama"ntadbhā"vasya kāryotpādasya ye "yogyatāyogyate" tābhyāṃ "yogāt" | kālagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaparamevaṃ deśadravyayorapi vācyaṃ | athaivaṃ neṣyate | tadā tulye yogyatāyogyate yayoḥ kāryabhāvābhāvavato"rdeśakālayo"stayo"stadvattetarayorniyamāyogāt" | kāryakālasyaiva tadvattā | kāryavattā | tadanyasyetarā |
akāryavattetyasya niyamasyāyogāt | dvāvapi tau kāryabhāvābhāvakālau kāryavantau syātāṃ yogyatāsādṛśyāt | na vā | tulyatvādayogyatāyāḥ | tasmāt tadbhāvakālasyaiva yogyatā | tāṃ vāpe"kṣamāṇa" ||

[102,4]

bhavatu nāmeṣṭasya deśakālāderyogyatā | na tāvatā hetubhāva ityata āha | "sā ce"tyādi | yata evamahetutve nityaṃ sattvāsattvaṃ syānna ca bhavati |

[102,5]

"tasmādi"tyādi | yat"parihāreṇa" pravarttate tadanapekṣaḥ | yatra ca varttate tatsāpekṣaḥ |
yadi nāma kvacid deśādau vṛttastathāpi katha"ntatsāpekṣa iti" cedāha | "tathā" hīti | "tathā vṛtti"rityekaparihāreṇānyatra vṛttiḥ || deśādikama"pekṣata eva" bhāvaḥ | tena tu deśādinā na tasyopakāraḥ kriyata iti cedāha | "tatkṛtopakāre"tyādi | tanniya"yamāyogāditi" | tasminnaiva deśādau tena na bhāvyamiti niyamāyogāt | "tadi"ti tasmād | deśakālagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ dravyasyāpi parigrahaḥ | "yatre"ti deśādau "dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛ"diti | yathoktena pratyakṣeṇa yeṣāṃ "sannidhā"ne dṛṣṭasteṣāmevānyata"ravaikalye ca" punarna "dṛṣṭaḥ |
anya"theti yadi tajjanyosya svabhāvo na syāt | "sa" iti dhūmastatpratiniyatognyādikasāmagrī — hi yataḥ | agnera"nyatra kathambhavennai"va bhavet | "bhavan vā na dhūmaḥ syāt" |
yasmāt "tajjanito" hyagnijanito hi "svabhāvaviśeṣo dhūma" iti | "tathā heturapi"
vahnista"thābhūtakāryajananasvabhāvo" dhūmajananayogyatāsvabhāvo | dhūmarahitāvasthāyāmapyastyeva yogyatā kāraṇabhūteti | tena nā'vyāpi lakṣaṇaṃ | evamagnidhūmayoḥ parasparāpekṣayā niyatasvabhāvatve pratyakṣavyavasthāpite |

[103,1]

"yadi tasya" dhūmasyāgne"ranyatopi bhāva" iṣyate "tadā na sa" dhūmajananaḥ "svabhāvastasyā"vahneḥ | tathā hyanagneryadā dhūmasyotpattistadānagnereva dhūmajananaḥ svabhāvo jātaḥ |
yaścānagneḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kathamagneḥ syāt | tataścādhūmajananasvabhāvatvādagneḥ"sakṛdapi na dhūmaṃ janayet" | dhūmasyāpi dhūmasvabhāvatā na syādityāha | "na ce"tyādi | agneranyato bhavanna vā sa "dhūmaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "adhūmajananasvabhāvā"danagne"rbhāvā"dutpatteḥ | "tatsvabhāvatve cā"nagnerapi dhūmajananasvabhāvatve cābhyupagamyamāne | "sa evā"gnirdhūmajanakarūpatvādasya ityanena dvāreṇā"vyabhicā"ro dhūmasya ||

[103,2]

sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ "agnisvabhāva" ityādi ślokadvayamāha |

[104,1]

"agnisvabhāva" iti dhūmajananasvabhāvo "yadī"tyarthaḥ | "agnireva sa śakramūrddhā"
dhūmajananasvabhāvatvāt | "athānagnisvabhāvosau" śakramūrddhā | "tatre"ti śakramūrddhani |
kasmānna bhavedityāha | "dhūme"tyādi | hi yasmāt | "dhūmahetusvabhāvo" yasyeti vigrahaḥ |
kuta etat taccha"ktibhedavā"n | tayā dhūmajanikayā śaktyā karaṇabhūtayā vastvantarāt khadyotāderbhedavān visadṛśaḥ | "adhūmaheto"rityavahnisvabhāvād "dhūmasya bhāve"
utpāde'bhyupagamyamāne "sa" dhūmaḥ "syādahetukaḥ" | yathoktaṃ prāk ||

[104,2]

"kathami"tyādi paraḥ | "idānī"mityekasya dhūmādervijātīyādutpattyanabhyupagame | "kathambhinnāt" parasparavijātīyāt | "sahakāriṇaḥ" sakāśādekasya "kāryasyotpattiḥ" |
kathamityāha | "yathetyā"di | ādiśabdād ālokamanaskārādayaḥ | evañca sati cakṣuḥsvabhāvādapyutpadyate "vijñā"namacakṣuḥsvabhāvādapi rūpamanaskārāderna cedamahetukaṃ |
evaṃ dhūmopyagnerutpadyatāmanagneśca śakramūrdhnaḥ | na cāhetuko bhaviṣyatīti codako manyate |

[104,3]

"na vai kiṃci"dityādinā pratividhatte | cakṣurādiṣu "tatsvabhāvaṃ" janakasvabhāvaṃ sade"kaikaṃ" parasparānapekṣaṃ na vai "janakaṃ" | yadi hi syāt tadā pratyekaṃ kāraṇavyabhicārādahetukaṃ syāt | "kintu sāmagrī janikā | tatsvabhāvā" janakasvabhāvā | sāmagrī janiketyetāvataiva tatsvabhāvatvaṃ labdhamatatsvabhāvasyājanakatvāt tatkiṃ svabhāveti pṛthagucyate || satyaṃ kintvavadhāraṇārthamuktaṃ | sāmagryavasthāyāmeva tatsvabhāvatā | na pūrvanna paścānna pṛthagiti | svahetusāmarthyaniyatasannidhītyekasmin kārye samastāvanye kāraṇāni heturiti samudāyārthaḥ |

[104,4]

kecittu vā śabdaṃ paṭhanti | sāmagrī janikā tatsvabhāvā veti | atra tu vāśabdasya na kiṃcit prayojanamityapapāṭha evāyaṃ | yadi sāmagrītyuktvā sāmagryantarādapi cakṣurvijñānaṃ syāttadā bhinnādutpāderahetukatvambhavet | saiva sāmagr"yanumīyate" | kāryeṇa na pratyekaṃ kāraṇādanyato nāsti vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ |

[104,5]

syādetada agnyādisāmagrayā ādya eva dhūmakṣaṇo janito na ca tasya liṅgatvantasyāniścayāt | yaśca dhūmapratibandho gṛhyate sa pūrvadhūmahetureva |
kathantatognyādisāmagryā anumānamityata āha | "saiva ce"tyādi "kārya"prabandhasya"svabhāvasthiteḥ | āśraya" ādyaṃ kāraṇaṃ | sāmagrīmantareṇa dhūmasantānasyaivābhāvāt |
tato dhūmasantānamagnikāryatvenaikīkṛtya dahanādisantateḥ kāraṇabhūtāyā anumānaṃ |
na hi kṣaṇavibhāgenārvāgdarśanasya vyavahāraḥ sambhavatīti |

[105,1]

syādetad | atīva eva vahniranumīyate | na ca tenārthakriyārthinaḥ kiṃcit prayojanamityetadapi codyamānenaiva parihṛtaṃ | tadā cāyamarthaḥ | saiva ca sāmagrī prabandhena pravarttamānā kāryasvabhāvasthiteḥ kāryaprabandhavṛtterhetuḥ pūrvapūrvamagnyādikṣaṇaṃ pratītyottarottarasya dhūmakṣaṇasyotpatteḥ | na hyayaṃ niyamo yadeka eva dhūmakṣaṇogninā janyo nāpara iti | yāvadindhanasya na sarvathā bhasmībhavanantāvad dhūmakṣaṇānāmutpattiraviruddhā | tasmāduttarottaradahanakṣaṇajananamarthenaprabandhapravṛttenāgninā yathābhūto dhūmaprabandho janitaḥ pratyakṣāvadhāritastathābhūtamanyatrāvadhāryārthakriyāsamarthadahanasantānasyānumānantadarthino na viruddham | anya eva ca svabhāvo vicchinnadahanasantānasya dhūmasyānya eva vicchinnadahanasantatervāsagṛhādisthasya | sphuṭaśca tayorbhedamavadhārayati loka iti kuto vyabhicāraḥ ||

[105,2]

athavā'nyathā vyākhyāyate |

[105,3]

nanu sāmagrī samagrebhyonyā | tasyāścaikatvād ekameva kāryamutpadyate'nyathā samagrāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthyāt kāryabahutvamparyāyeṇa caikakāryajanakatvaṃ syānna ca bhavati | tasmāt kathamekajanakatvamityāśaṃkyāha |

[105,4]

"saiva ce"tyādi | saiva ca "sāmagrī"ti samagrā eva sāmagrī śabdenocyante | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "svabhāvasthityā" svarūpasannidhānena "kāryasyāśrayo" bhavati yataḥ |

[105,5]

evammanyate | yadi sāmagryā eva kāryotpattistadā samagrāṇāmakārakatvaṃ syāt |
tathā ca pratītibādhā | samagrāṇāmapi kārakatve sutarāṃ kāryabahutvaṃ syāt | paryāyeṇa caikakāryajanakatvaṃ syāt | na ca sāmagrībalātteṣāmekarūpatā | sāmagryā evābhāvaprasaṅgāt | tasmāt te samagrāḥ svahetubhya evaikakāryakaraṇe niyatā utpannāḥ sāmagrīśabdenocyante | na ca bahūnāmekakāryakaraṇe bādhakamasti | na cāsmākaṅkāraṇameva kāryo bhavatīti mataṃ yenānekasyaikakāryatvamvirudhyeta | yathā caikakāryaṃ tyeprakasya prāgbhāva eva kāraṇatvandṛṣṭatvāt tathānekasyāpi | yathā vā ta eva samagrāḥ saṃyogalakṣaṇāmekāṃ sāmagrīñjanayanti | tathaikamapi kāryaṃ kinna kurvantīti |

[106,1]

yatkiñcidetat | yataśca sāmagrījanikā"'ta eva sahakāriṇāmaparyāyeṇa jananaṃ" |
paripāṭyā jananaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ |

[106,2]

"yadapī"tyādinā "vijātīyā"dutpattimāśaṃkya pariharati | nānyādṛśāttādṛśantasyo"tpatti"riti yaduktantadevātra darśayatītyarthaḥ | ādiśabdād gośṛṅgāccharo gomayād vṛścikaḥ | "tatrāpī"ti vijātīyāt kāryotpattāvapi | "tathābhidhānepī"ti vijātīyotpannasya śālūkādeḥ śālūkādirityabhidhānepi "svavījā"cchālūkādilakṣaṇāt "prabhava" utpattirya"sya" tasmāt svavījaprabhavācchālūkādeḥ sakaśāda"styeva svabhāvabhedaḥ" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "hetusvabhāvabhedāt" | hetoḥ sāmagrīdvayalakṣaṇasya svabhāvabhedāt | "bījā"t "kandā"ccod"bhavo" yasyāḥ kadalyāḥ sā tathā | sā ca hetutvabhedāt parasparabhinnā |

[106,3]

na cāyambhedaḥ sādhanīya ityāha | "sphuṭa"mityādi | vivecayati bhede vā bhāvasyeti || "suvivecitākāraṃ" bhrāntihetubhyaḥ sadṛśākārebhyo vibhāgena niścitākāraṃ ||

[106,4]

tadbhāva eva bhāvo'nvayaḥ | tadabhāve cābhāva eva vyatirekaḥ | anvayo vyatirekaścā"nvayavyatirekantasmā"t | yaḥ kāryasvabhāvo "yasyā"nuvarttanīyasya kāraṇasyānuva"rttako dṛṣṭastasyā"nuvarttakasya "svabhāvastaddhetuḥ" sonuvarttanīyaḥ kāraṇāt — sā heturyasyeti vigrahaḥ | yadā tu kāraṇāpekṣayocyate tadā svabhāvastasyānuvarttanīyasyāgnyādestaddhetustasya kāryābhimatasya dhūmāderhetuḥ | yataścaivaṃ paramparāpekṣayā kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvaniyamaḥ | "ataḥ" kāraṇād "bhinnā"d vijātīyānna "sambhavaḥ" |

[106,5]

"tasmāt sakṛdapi darśanādarśanābhyāmi"ti yathoktābhyāṃ | pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ"kāryakā"raṇa"bhāvasiddheḥ" kāraṇād bhavati | "tataḥ" kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhitaḥ "tatpratipa"ttiranvayaṃ vyatirekapratipatti"rnānyatheti" kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayantyaktvā kevalābhyāndarśanādarśanābhyāṃ nānvayavyatirekayoḥ pratipattiḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "niḥśeṣidarśanādarśanāyattatvād" darśanamātrapratibaddhāyā anvayavyatirekapratipatteḥ | evaṃ hi darśanamanvayaṃ sādhayati yadi niḥśeṣe sapakṣe hetordarśanaṃ syāt | evamadarśanamapi vyatirekaṃ sādhayet |
yadi "niḥśeṣe" sādhyavyatireke hetoradarśanaṃ syāt || yathaikatra dhūmavyaktau sakṛdapi kāryatvasiddhyā sarvatra tathābhāvaḥ | evaṃ kvacit sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanādarśanāt sarvatrānvayavyatirekaniścayo bhaviṣyatītyapi mithyā | yasmāt "kvacid" amūrtatve ākāśādigate "nityatvasya darśane" | paraprasiddhyā caitaducyate | "anyatra" sukhādau | "anyathetya"nityatve hetoramūrttatvasya "dṛṣṭeḥ" kāraṇādekatra darśanaṃ na sarvatra tathābhāvasādhanamato darśanamanvaye vyabhicāri | tathā "kvacid" ghaṭādau "nityatvābhāvepyadṛṣṭa"syāmūrttatvasya punarnityatvābhāva eva sukhādau "dṛṣṭe"rato vipakṣaikadeśādarśanamasādhanaṃ vyatirekaniścaye tasmāddhetuphalabhāvaniścayādevānvayavyatirekayorniścayaḥ ||

[107,1]

"svabhāva" ityādi paraḥ | idānīmiti kāryahetāvavinābhāve sādhite saṃprati"svabhāva"hetau "kartha" sādhyenā"vinābhāvaḥ" |

[107,2]

nanu "svabhāve" bhāvopi "bhāvamātrānurodhini" heturityādinā prāgeva svabhāvahetāvavinābhāvaḥ sādhitaḥ |

[107,3]

satyaṃ | evantu manyate | yathābhūte svabhāve tanmātrabhāvinyavinābhāvo varṇṇitastatra pratijñārthaikadeśatā prāpnotīti | siddhāntavādyapyanantareṇānyāpohaprasādhanena pratijñārthaikadeśatāparihārammanyamānaḥ tanmātrānurodhinyevāvinābhāvaṃ pūrvoktamanuvadati | "svabhāvepyavinābhāva" ityādi | svabhāvepi svabhāvahetāvapyavinābhāvaḥ | kasmin sādhye | bhāvamātrānurodhini | "yo hī"tyādyasyaiva vyākhyānaṃ | "avinābhāvo bhāvasye"ti kṛtakatvādeḥ | yasmāt "tadabhāve bhāvamātrānurodhi"sādhyadharmā"bhāve bhāvas"ya hetutvenopāttasyā"bhāvaḥ syātḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | sādhyasādhanayo"rabhedataḥ" | abhedameva ya "eve"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "ya evā"nityādiko"bhāvaḥ" kṛtaka"bhāvamātrānurodhī — svabhāva ityucya"te "sa eva sva"yamanyanimittānapekṣatayā "vastutaḥ" paramārthato "bhāvaḥ" kṛtakatvaṃ "sa ca" bhāva "ātmānaṃ" svabhāvabhūtamanityatva"mparityajya kathambhavet" |

[108,1]

"ya eva tarhī"ti paraḥ | "pakṣanirdeśaḥ pratijñā" | tasyā "artho" dharmadharmisamudāyastasyai"kadeśaḥ" sādhyadharmātmako "hetuḥ syāt" | tathā hi yāvaduktamanityaḥ śabdo'nityatvāditi tāvad anityaḥ kṛtakatvāditi tathā cāsiddho heturiti bhāvaḥ |

[108,2]

naiṣa doṣa iti si ddhā nta vā dī | "yasmāt sarve bhāvā" ityādi | atra prathamayā kārikayā dharmakalpanābījaṃ | dvitīyayā dharmakalpanā | tṛtīyayā pratijñārthaikadeśatāparihāraśca kathyate iti samudāyārthaḥ | "sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtti"mbhajanta iti ghinuṇ | sarvabhāvāḥ "svabhāvena" svarūpeṇa na pararūpeṇa sajātīyād vijātīyācca vyāvṛttāḥ | "svasvabhāvavyavasthiteḥ" | svasmin svabhāve'vasthānāt |

[108,3]

nanvaśvādibhyo gaurjātyā bhinnaḥ | viṣāṇī gaurdravyeṇa govyaktyantarād bhinnaḥ |
śuklo gaurguṇena viṣāṇino govyaktyantarād bhinna iti | evamādiparamāṇvanto bhedo jātyādiviśeṣaṇakṛtaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ na svabhāveneti |

[108,4]

atrocyate | na jātyādinā tāvad bhāvānāmabhinnānāmbhedaḥ kriyate | bhinnābhinnabhedakaraṇe tatra tasyākiñcitkaratvāt | nāpi bhinnānāmvaiyarthyāt | nāpyeṣāmbhedavyavahāraḥ kriyate svarūpabhinnānāmpratyakṣe'vabhāsādeva bhedavyavahārasiddheḥ |

[108,5]

kiñca | jātyādīnāmanyonyantadvataśca sakāśād bhedo nānyato jātyāderanavasthāprasaṅgāt | svarūpeṇa ca bhede bhāvānāmevāsau kinnābhyupagamyate kiṃ jātyādikalpanayā |

[109,1]

yopi di ga mba ro manyate | "sarvātmakamekaṃ syādanyāpohavyatikrame" |
tasmād bheda evānyathā na syād anyonyābhāvo bhāvānāṃ yadi na bhavediti |

[109,2]

sopyanena nirastaḥ | abhāvena bhāvabhedasya karttumaśakyatvāt | nāpyabhinnānāṃ hetuto niṣpannānāmanyonyābhāvaḥ sambhavati | bhinnāścet niṣpannāḥ kathamanyonyābhāvaḥ sambhavati | bhinnāścen niṣpannāḥ kathamanyonyābhāvakalpanetyuktaṃ |

[109,3]

nanu sarve bhāvā bhinnā iti yadyetadanumānavṛttantadāśrayāsiddho hetuḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ pratyakṣāviṣayatvād | ata eva naitat pratyakṣavṛttaṃ parāmṛśyate |

[109,4]

anyastvāha | yadyapi bhāvāḥ svabhāvena bhinnāsteṣāntu jātyādayo dharmāssantyeva pratīyamānatvāt | tathāpi nirvikalpakantu vijñānaṅgavādiṣu sattāmātraṃ gṛhvāti na bhedaṃ | anyasmād viśeṣagrahaṇameva hi bhedagrahaṇamviśeṣaśca nāvikalpya gṛhyata iti savikalpakasya viṣayo na nirvikalpasya | taduktaṃ ||

[109,5]

"viśeṣāstu pratīyante savikalpakabuddhibhiḥ | te ca kecit pratidravyaṃ kecid vahuṣu saṃsthitāḥ || tānakalpayadutpannaṃ vyāvṛttānugamātmanā | gavāśve copajātantu pratyakṣanna viśiṣyata iti | "

[109,6]

tasmānna nirvikalpake pratyakṣabhedāvabhāsa iti |

[109,7]

yopyāha | savikalpakenāpi bhedo na gṛhyate'nyonyābhāvagrahaṇanimittako hi bhāvānāṃ bhedagrahonyonyābhāvaśca bhedo na cābhāvaḥ | pratyakṣagrāhyo | na hi gavyaśvostīti pratyakṣaṃ paricchinattyataḥ sattāmātrasyaiva grāhakaṃ pratyakṣamiti |

[109,8]

taduktaṃ ma ṇḍa ne na ||

[109,9]

"āhurvidhātṛ pratyakṣaṃ na niṣeddhya vipaścitaḥ | naikatva āgamastena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyata iti | "

[109,10]

tadetadubhayamapyayuktaṃ | sattāmātrasyāpratibhāsanāt | gavāśvādīnāṃ svasvarūpeṇaiva pratibhāsanāt | taduktaṃ ||

[109,11]

"tattvayuktampratidravyaṃ bhinnarūpopalambhanāt | na hyākhyātumaśakyatvād bhedo nāstīti gamyata iti | "

[109,12]

yopyāha | bhāvānāmbheda eva nāsti | tathā hi goraśvānutpāde yādṛśaṃ svarūpamaśvotpādepi tādṛśameva nāparamadhikaṃ kiñcijjātamiti kathamato bhedaḥ | bhavatu vā bhedo nāsau pratyakṣagrāhyo'smādayambhinna iti | evaṃrūpasya vyāpārasya pratyakṣe'bhāvāt | yadāha | na hīdamiyato vyāpārān karttuṃ samarthamiti |

[110,1]

sopi nirastaḥ | gavāśvādīnāṃ svasvarūpeṇotpattireva bhedaḥ | te ca svasvarūpeṇa pratyakṣevabhāsante | tathāvabhāsaśca loke bhedāvabhāsa iti yatkiñcidetat | tasmāt purovasthiteṣu svasvabhāvavyavasthiterityasya hetoḥ | pratyakṣeṇa bhedaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratipadyate'taḥ sarvabhāvā vyāvṛttibhāgina iti vyāptigrahaṇapramāṇaphalamiti | yataśca jātyādayorthāntarabhūtā na santīti pratipādayiṣyate | ataḥ pāramārthiko dharmadharmibhāvo nāstītyuktambhavati |

[110,2]

nanu sāmānyayogāt sajātīyā ucyante | yadi ca sāmānyannāsti kathaṃ sajātīyād vyāvṛttirityucyate |

[110,3]

naitadasti | na samānānāmutpannānāmbhāvānāṃ sāmānyayogāt samānarūpatā svahetubhya eva tathāniṣpannatvāt |

[110,4]

tena yadu dyo ta ka re ṇo cyate | "na gavi gotvaṃ yena gotvayogāt prāg gaurevāsāviti vyarthaṃ gotvaṃ syād | api tu yadaiva vastu tadaiva gotvenābhisambadhyate |
gotvayogāttu prāg vastu na vidyate | na cāvidyamānaṅ gauriti vā'gauriti vā śakyaṃ vyapadeṣṭumi"ti |

[110,5]

tannirastaṃ | yadaiva vastu tadaiva tasya gorūpatayā niṣpannatvāt kiṃ gotvayogena |
nāpyasamānānāṃ sāmānyayogāt samānarūpatā | teṣāṃ sāmānyasyaivābhāvāt | samānānāṃ ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyamityabhyupagamyate | sāmānyācca samānarūpatve bhāvānāmabhyupagamyamāne yāvanna sāmānyayogastāvanna samānā bhāvāḥ | yāvacca na samānāstāvanna sāmānyayoga ityanyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāt | tasmāt svahetubhya eva samānā utpannāḥ | tena |

[110,6]

"śāvaleyācca bhinnatvaṃ bāhuleyāśvayossamaṃ | sāmānyaṃ nānyadiṣṭaṃ cet kvāgopohaḥ prakalpyatāmiti | "

[110,7]

nirastaṃ | sāmānyeṣvevāgopohaprakalpanāt | asamānānāṃ cāpohyātmatayā prakalpanāt |

[110,8]

yadapyuccate | samānā iti pratibhāsādeva nirvikalpake jñāne sāmānyapratibhāsonyathā bāhuleyāśvavat | śāvaleyabāhuleyayorapi vailakṣaṇyapratītiḥ syāt sarvātmanā bhedād | bhavati ca samānā iti pratītistasmādasyaiva sāmānyamiti |

[110,9]

taduktaṃ | nirvikalpakabodhena dvyātmakasya vastuno grahaṇamiti | yadvā savikalpake na cet sāmānyaṃ gṛhyate | nirvikalpakenāpi gṛhītameva | savikalpābhinnapratibhāsatvāt | tathā hi | ya eva śāvaleyādayo gauriti jñānena gṛhyante |
ta eva nirvikalpake jñāne pratibhāsante kevalamekantānavikalpya gṛhṇātyanyad vikalpyeti tayoḥ svarūpabhedo na pratibhāsabhedaḥ | tasmānnirvikalpakepi jñāne sāmānyaṃ pratibhāsata iti |

[111,1]

tadapi nirastaṃ | svahetubhya eva keṣāñcit samānānāṃ pratibhāsanāt | sāmānyasya ca vyaktiparatantraṃ svarūpaṃ na ca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ pāratantryamvastuno gṛhṇāti |
svātantryeṇa vastugrāhitvāt tatkathaṃ sāmānyagrāhakamucyate | anugatasya ca rūpasya pratyekavad yugapad bahuṣvapratibhāsanāt | ata eva vikalpaḥ samāneṣvekāntabhinneṣu nirvikalpakapratyakṣabādhitamanugatākāraṃ gṛhṇan bhrānto bhavati | nirvikalpakagṛhītasāmānyagrāhī vā'pramāṇaṃ syād gṛhītagrāhitvāt | atha vikalpya grāhitvād agṛhītagrāhitvaṃ smṛtyāderapi tarhi smaryamāṇaviṣayatā gṛhītagrāhitvanna syāt | atha jātyādiviśiṣṭavastugrāhitayā vikalpasyāgṛhītagrāhitvamevamapi yadi jātyādiviśiṣṭatvamvastunaḥ pāramārthiko dharmastadā nirvikalpakenāpi gṛhītameveti kathamagṛhītagrāhitvam | atha kalpikastadā tadgrāhakasya kathaṃ prāmāṇyamāropitārthatvāt | tasmānnāstyeva jātyādiriti sthitaṃ |

[111,2]

kathantarhi bhāvā vyāvṛttibhāgina ityucyante | kalpitadharmadvāreṇāyaṃ vyapadeśa ityadoṣaḥ | ataḥ |

[111,3]

"agonivṛttiḥ sāmānyaṃ vācyaṃ yaiḥ parikalpyate | gotvavastveva tairuktamagopohagirā sphuṭamiti | "

[111,4]

nirastaṃ | pāramārthikasya gotvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate na tu kalpitasyeti vakṣyati |

[111,5]

yadi paramārthiko dharmadharmibhāvo nāsti kathantarhi kṛtakaḥ śabdo nitya iti buddhīnāmbhedaḥ śabdaikasvarūpaviṣayatvāt |

[111,6]

"atha nirviṣayā etā vāsanābījamātrataḥ | pratipattiḥ pravṛttiśca bāhyertheṣu kathambhavet | "

[111,7]

atha bāhyādhyavasāyāt pravṛttirevamapi kṛtakatvasya yovasāyaḥ sa evānityasyābhedāditi kathambuddhibhedaḥ | kṛtakānityayorabhedādeva tadanubhavāhitavāsanābhedasyābhāvānna tattvato buddhibheda ityatrāha |

[111,8]

yasmādityādi | yasmāt sarvasmāt sarvabhāvā vyāvṛttāsta"smād yato yato"
nityākṛtakādeḥ śabdādīnā"marthānāṃ vyāvṛttistannibandhanāḥ" | vyāvṛttyāvadhivyāvṛttinibandhanā "dharmabhedā" anityakṛtakādayaḥ "kalpyante" vikalpairāropyante | kimviśiṣṭās"tadviśeṣāvagāhinaḥ | tasya" svalakṣaṇasya ye "viśeṣā" akṛtakādivyāvṛttirūpalakṣaṇāstada"vagāhinaḥ" | tadavagāhanaśīlāstadabhedāvabhāsanaśīlā ityarthaḥ |

[112,1]

etaduktambhavati | akṛtako na bhavatītyanena dvāreṇa prabodhitāyā eva kṛtakavikalpavāsanāyā eṣā prakṛtiryatastato vikalpa utpadyamānaḥ kṛtaka iti svākārābhinnaḥ sa kṛtakavyāvṛttameva śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipadyate na tvanitya iti | tathā nityo na bhavatītyanenāpi dvāreṇa prabodhitāyā evānityavāsanāyāḥ sāmarthyaṃ yattato vikalpa utpadyamāno'nitya iti svākārābhinnaṃ nityavyāvṛttameva śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipadyate na tu kṛtaka iti | tena buddhibhedo bhavati | yataśca bādhyamānatvād vikalpapratibhāsyartho bāhyo na bhavatyato vāsanāvaśādeva bāhyāvabhāso vikalpastena vikalpasya bāhyarūpa eva pratibhāsamānorthaḥ svākāra ucyate | na tu svākāre bāhyāropaḥ sādṛśyāt | yadāha | nāmanimittaprakaraṇe |

[112,2]

sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttirarthe cet syānna sarvadā | deśabhrāntiśca na jñāne tulyamutpattito dhiyaḥ |

[112,3]

tathāvidhāyā bāhyārthapratibhāsāyā iti |

[112,4]

etena yaducyate | "yadvāhyātyantavisadṛśasya svākārasya tādrūpyagrahaṇantadanyanivṛttikṛtasādṛśyaparaṃ | yathā ghaṭavisadṛśopi paṭo vṛkṣābhāvaviśiṣṭo'vadhāryamāṇo yamapyavṛkṣa iti ghaṭasadṛśovadhāryate | vṛkṣavyāvṛtterghaṭapaṭayostulyatvāt | tathā vikalpaviṣayo'tyantaṃ vāme visadṛśopi vāme'vadhāryate'nyanivṛttikṛtasārūpya grahaṇādi"ti |

[112,5]

tadapāstaṃ | svahetuta eva bāhyābhāsāyā vikalpabuddherutpatteḥ | na cāsadṛśānāmanyanivṛttyā sādṛśyaṃ kriyate | tatra tasyā bhedābhedasādṛśyakaraṇe'kiñcitkaratvāt |
na cānyanivṛttiḥ sadṛśī vidyate | sadṛśānāmapi kathamanyanivṛttyā sādṛśyaṃ kriyate svarūpeṇaiva sādṛśyāt | nāpi pūrvaṃ svākārapratibhāsaḥ paścāt tatrānyanivṛttikṛtasādṛśyagrahaṇaparo bāhyāropaḥ pratibhāsate | na hi marīcikāyāṃ pūrvaṃ svarūpāpratibhāsesati sādṛśyagrahaṇahetuko jalāropaḥ sambhavati | bāhyāropācca pūrvaṃ na svākāro grāhyāroposti | vikalpasyaivābhāvāt | bhāve bodhaikarūpa evāsāviti na bāhyasadṛśaḥ |
tataścānyanivṛttikṛtasādṛśyābhāvāt kathambāhyarūpaḥ pratīyate | anumānasya tu nānyanivṛttigrahaṇapūrvikā pravṛttirliṅgasya tayā saha sambandhāt siddheḥ | yadā ca tadviśeṣāvagāhitvamvikalpānāṃ pratīyate tadā vidhirūpeṇaiva pravṛttirvastusvarūpasya vidhoyamānatvenādhyavasāyādarthādanyanivṛttiḥ pratīyate | tena vidhireva śabdārthosmākamapi | bāhyatayā'ropitasya ca vidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ sambandhaḥ |

[113,1]

nanu niyatarūpagrāhī vikalpaḥ pratibhāsate | tenetararūpaśūnyameva vikalpayanniyatamarthaṃ vikalpayati | tasmādyanniyatarūpāvadhāraṇantadanyanivṛttiviṣayantatkathamucyate vidhireva śabdārtha iti |

[113,2]

tadayuktaṃ | anyanivṛttimahaṃ vikalpayāmītyapratīteḥ | na ca sa vikalpaviṣayo yo na vikalpya pratibhāsate | yadi cetararūpanivṛttimeva vikalpayanniyatamarthamvikalpayati tadetaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ syāt | itararūpasyāpi niyatarūpatvenānyanivṛttidvāreṇa pratipattiprasaṅgāt | atha vidhirūpeṇetararūpaṃ vikalpayati na tarhi tadanyanivṛttyavadhāraṇapūrvakanniyatarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ |

[113,3]

na ca yathā sāmānyavantamarthampaśyāmīti nāsti jātitadvatorviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāve pratibhāsaḥ | atha ca viśiṣṭapratyayānurodhāt sāmānyaviśiṣṭavyaktidarśanannaiyā yi kā dayaḥ kalpitavantastathā'nyair nivṛttimahamvikalpayāmītyapratītāvapi bāhyasadṛśāropānyathānupapattyānyanivṛttiparaṃ vikalpākāre bāhyarūpamāropyata iti yuktaṃ | sādṛśyamantareṇa vāsanābalādevādhyavasitabāhyarūpasya vikalpasyotpatteḥ |
yadāha | tadanubhavāhitavāsanāprabhavaprakṛteradhyavasitatadbhāvasvarūpaṃ | tathā vikalpavāsanāyāśca tādṛśī prakṛtiryadevameṣā pratibhātīti |

[113,4]

nāpi bāhyarūpāropakasya jñānasyānyavittikṛtasārūpyanimittatvepyanyanivṛttiviṣayatvaṃ | na hi marīcikāyāṃ jalajñānasya sādṛśyaviṣayatvamāropitajalaviṣayatvāt | na ca niyataṃ rūpaṃ bhāvānāmanyanivṛttyā kriyate | tasyā avastutvenākārakatvāt | svahetubhya eva ca tata utpatte |

[113,5]

nāpi niyatarūpāvadhāraṇantadanyanivṛttiviṣayaṃ niyatarūpaviṣayatvādasya |
ata eva na tadanyanivṛttipurassarameva dhāryate pratyakṣeṇaiva |

[113,6]

na ca tadanyanivṛttirarthāntarabhūtā yujyata iti vakṣyati | nāpi sā tattvānyatvābhyāmavācyā yujyate | evaṃ hyabhāva evāsyāḥ syācchaśaviṣāṇavat | na ca syāt pratyakṣagamyā nīrūpatvāt | nāpyanumānagamyā | sambandhābhāvena liṅgasyāsiddheḥ | nāpi niyatarūpānyathānupapattyā tatkalpanā | aniyatarūpāṇāmanyanivṛtterabhāvāt | niyatarūpāṇāṃ ca kathamanyanivṛttyā niyatarūpatvaṃ svahetubhya eva niyatarūpāṇāmutpatteḥ |
tasmānniyatarūpāvadhāraṇapurassaraivānyanivṛttiḥ pratīyate | tathā hi ghaṭa ityukte'ghaṭo na bhavatīti sāmarthyāt pratīyate'to vikalpakalpitaiveṣā na paramārthatosti |

[114,1]

tasmāt sthitametacchadbaliṅgābhyāmvidhirūpeṇa vastu pratipādyaterthādanyaniṣeghaḥ |
taṃthā ca vakṣyati "tadgatāveva śabdebhyo gamyate'nyanivarttanami"tyādi 1 | 128 |

[114,2]

tena yaducyate ku mā ri le na ||

[114,3]

"na tvanyāpohakṛcchabdo yuṣmatpakṣenuvarṇṇitaḥ | niṣedhamātrannaiveha pratibhāseva gamyate || kintu gaurgavayo hastī vṛkṣa ityādi śabdataḥ | vidhirūpāvasāyena matiḥ śābdī pravarttate || tasmādyeṣveva śabdeṣu nañyogasteṣu kevalaṃ | bhavedanyanivṛttyaṅgaḥ svātmevānyatra gamyata iti | "

[114,4]

etatsiddhaṃ sādhyate | vidhirūpasyāpi śabdārthasyeṣṭatvāt | kathantarhi paramatād bau ddha matasya bhedaḥ | kathaṃ vā śabdaliṃgayorapoho viṣaya ucyate ||

[114,5]

nanvastyeva mahān bhedaḥ paraiḥ pāramārthikārthaviṣayatveneṣṭasya vikalpasya bau ddhaiḥ kalpitaviṣayatveneṣṭatvāt | kalpitaścākāro'pohāśritatvādapoha ucyate | apohyate'neneti vā | anyanivṛttimātraṃ tvarthādākṣiptamapohanamapoha ityucyate |
svalakṣaṇaṃ tvapohyatesminnityapoha ucyate |

[114,6]

tasmādanyānyavyāvarttyavastuvyapekṣayā dharmāḥ kalpitabhedā vikalpairviṣayīkriyante | ato bhinnaviṣayā vikalpāstatsamānaviṣayāśca śabdā apyaparyāyā iti darśayitumāha | "tasmā"dityādi | yataścaivaṃ dharmabhedāḥ kalpyante "tasmādyaḥ" svalakṣaṇavi"śeṣo" vyāvarttanīyanityavyapekṣayā vyavasthāpito'nityalakṣaṇaḥ | "yena dharmeṇa"
yena śabdena | yathā'nityaśabdena | śabdopi dharmavācakatvād dharma ucyate | na sa "śakyastatonyena" | anityaśabdādanyena kṛtakādiśabdena | vyāvarttanīyāntaravastvadhikena pratyetuṃ | "tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ" | tena kāraṇena vikalpānāṃ naikaviṣayatvaṃ | śabdānāṃ ca na paryāyatvaṃ |

[115,1]

tena yaducyate | yayostādātmyanna tayorgamyagamakabhāvo yayośca vikalpitarūpayorgamyagamakabhāvo na tayoḥ sambandha iti |

[115,2]

tadapāstaṃ | akṛtakavyāvṛttasyaiva svalakṣaṇasya jñāpakahetvadhikārāt | kṛtaka iti jñātasya gamakatvāt tasya ca nityavyāvṛttavasturūpatvāt tādātmyaṃ |

[115,3]

"sarva eva" hītyādinā'dvai ta vā daṃ nirākurvan kārikārthamāha | svarūpe svātmani sthitiryeṣānte tathā | "sarva eva hi bhāvāḥ svarūpasthitayo nātmānaṃ pareṇa miśrayanti" |
ekīkurvanti | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tasya" miśrīkriyamāṇasya parasyā"paratvaprasaṅgāt" |
ātmatāpatteḥ |

[115,4]

syānmataṃ |

[115,5]

"sarvavastuṣu buddhiśca vyāvṛttānugamātmikā | jāyate dvyātmakatvena vinā sā ca na yujyate || "

[115,6]

ataḥ sāmānyātmakā viśeṣā viśeṣātmakañca sāmānyamityubhayarūpamvastvityatrāpyekasya vā rūpasya bhinnebhyo'bhedo bhinnasya caikasmādabhedaḥ | tatra prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ nirākarttumāha | "teṣāmiti" bhāvānā"mabhinna"mitye"kātmabhū"tamityavyatiriktaṃ "yadrūpaṃ"
svabhāvo "na tatteṣā"mbhāvānāmiti śakyamvaktuṃ | kasmātta"dānīnta"syetyapekṣyate |
tasyābhinnasya rūpasya "teṣāmabhāvāda"bhedādeva |

[115,7]

atha punarekasmād bhinnasyābhedastatrāpyāha | "tadeva hi syādabhinnasya bhāvāt" |
ekaṃ cedrūpaṃ pratipannābhāvastadevābhinnaṃ rūpanteṣāṃ syānna bhinnaṃ | kuta etat | tasyaivābhinnasya rūpasya bhāvāt |

[115,8]

atha syāt | teṣāmbhedopīṣyata evetyatrāha | tasmādabhinnātmanorthāntarasya"bhinnasya" nānārūpasyā"bhāvāt" |

[115,9]

atha syād | viśeṣasya yo bhedassa eva sāmānyasyābhedād | yadāha |
sāmānyasya tu yo bhedaṃ brūte tasya viśeṣato darśayitvābhyupetavya ityatrāpyāha | "taṃsyaiva ca punarbhedavirodhā"t | tasyaivaikasyānekatvāyogāt |

[115,10]

atha syād | viśeṣadvāreṇa sāmānyasya bhedo na svarūpastadānugatavyāvṛttarūpayoḥ parasparāsaṃśleṣādekāntena bhedaḥ syāt | tadāha | taccaikarūpaṃ "svātmani"
svasvabhāve "vyavasthitamamiśrameva" vyaktirūpeṇa | amiśre ca miśrarūpatayāpratītermithyātvameva |

[116,1]

atha kathaṃcit sāmānyasya vyaktyabhinnatvānnaitanmithyātvaṃ | tadāha |

[116,2]

"naitadaśvādibuddhīnāmadhyāropādyasambhavāt | sthitaṃ naiva hi jātyāderbhinnatvaṃ vyaktito hi na iti | "

[116,3]

tadayuktam | ekatvena yenaiva rūpeṇa bhinnantenaivāsyābhedo virodhānna caikasmin pramāṇe bhedābhedaṃ pratibhāsate | ekena ca bhedagrahaṇe sati yadyanyenābhedo gṛhyate kathantadgrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhrāntaṃ na syād | anyathā grahaṇāttasya caikarūpatvāt |

[116,4]

yadvā'miśraṇādevaikasya rūpasya sāmānyarūpatā na syādarthāntaratvād ghaṭavat |

[116,5]

u dyo ta ka rastvāha | "gavādiṣvanuvṛttipratyayaḥ piṇḍādivyatiriktanimittabhāvī | viśeṣattvānnīlādipratyayavat | tacca nimittaṃ samānavyaktikaraṇāta sāmānyamityucyate" |

[116,6]

atrāpi na tāvatsamānānāmarthāntareṇa samānarūpatā kriyate tathaiva niṣpannatvādapyasamānānāmiti darśayannāha | "arthāntaramiti sattā" gotvādikaṃ "na teṣāṃ"
vyaktibhedānāṃ "sāmānyamatadrūpatvāt" | teṣāṃ bhedānāmasamānarūpatvāt | samānānāṃ ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyamiṣyate |

[116,7]

athavā'tadrūpatvād vyaktibhyorthāntaratvādekatvavat | athārthāntaramapi "bahuṣu"
samavetamiti yadi tatteṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ | tadā "dvitvādikāryadravyeṣvapi prasaṃgo" dvitvamapi hyanekadravyasamavetam | ādigrahaṇād bahutvādiḥ | tathā saṃyogonekadravyasamavetaḥ |
kāryadravyaṃ cāvayavisaṃjñitamārambhakadravyeṣu samavetamato dvitvādiṣu sāmānyarūpatāprasaṃgaḥ | yasmin nārthāntare sati samānā bhedā bhavanti tadeva sāmānyaṃ na sarvamityatrāha | "na hi" | yasmāt "sambandhinānyenā"rthāntareṇaikatvalakṣaṇenā"nye'samānā" bhinnā na samānā naikīkriyante bhinnābhinnasamānabhāvakaraṇe tadanupayogāt | bhinnadeśādīnāṃ pratibhāsanācca kathaṃ samānā eva bhavanti | kevalaṃ"tadvanta" eka dharmavantaḥ "syu"rbhedāḥ | "bhūtāni" grahanakṣatrāṇi teṣāṃ "kaṇṭhe" dīrghā "guṇo"rccanārthaṃ nibadhyate | tenaikena kaṇṭhe guṇena yathā bhūtāni tadvanti na tvekībhavanti tadvadvyaktayopi |

[117,1]

nanu guṇasya mūrttatvād tadvattā pratītiryuktā | na vyaktiṣu sāmānyasyāmūrttatvāditi cet | na | tatsamavetatvasyeṣṭatvādarthāntarabhāvasya ca | yataścaikasambandhepi na samānā vyaktayastata eva "nābhinnapratyayaviṣayāḥ" ekākārajñānasyābhrāntasya na viṣayāḥ | "bhūtavat" | yathā bhūtānyaguṇasvabhāvāni naikaguṇākārapratyayaviṣayaḥ | tadvat | evantāvadanekasambandhepyarthāntaraṃ na teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃdvitvādiṣa prasaṅgaditi sthitaṃ | pratīyante ca samānā iti | tasmāt "tadātmā"na"meva" hi tayorbhedayorātmānameva | "ekarūpamidaṃ dvya"mityekāṃśena svagatena "saṃsṛjantī buddhiḥ sāmānyaviṣayā pratibhāsa"te | "naikasambandhināvitye"kena sāmānyena sambandhināvetāviti naivambuddhiḥ pratibhāsate yena sāmānyamarthāntarampramāṇasiddhaṃ syāt | "bhūta"vaditi vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ | yathā buddhirbhūtānyekena guṇena sambaddhāni gṛhṇāti naivamityarthaḥ |

[117,2]

yadvā yathā bhūtānyekasambandhīni tathā bhinnāvekasambandhināviti sāmānyaviṣayā buddhiḥ pratibhāsata iti naivaṃ |

[117,3]

atha syāt | sāmānyaṃ hi vyaktīnāmviśeṣaṇaṃ | viśeṣaṇaṃ ca viśeṣe svānuraktāṃ buddhiṃ janayatyato nāsya vyaktibhyorthāntarabhāvena pratibhāsaḥ |

[117,4]

nanu viśeṣaṇatvepi tasya na viśeṣyeṇa sahaikyaṃ daṇḍasyeva daṇḍinā tatkathamabhedapratibhāsaḥ | abhedāṃśenāpyekatvānna viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ | tasmāt sāmānyasya vyaktyabhedapratītirbhrāntireva |

[117,5]

atha sarvadaivaṃ pratīterabhrāntiḥ | tadāha |

[117,6]

"yo hyanyarūpasaṃvedyaḥ samvedyetānyathā punaḥ | sa mithyā na tu tenaiva yo nityamavagamyata iti | "

[117,7]

tadayuktaṃ | tasya vyaktyabhinnatvameva syāt | gorgotvamiti pratītibhedābhyupagamācca | na ca lākṣāsphaṭikayoriva jātitadvatoḥ saṃsargāvagatirabhrāntiḥ |
alākṣārūpasya sphaṭikasya lākṣārūpeṇa gaterbhrāntatvāt | evaṃ jātitaṃdvatorekatvagraho bhrāntiḥ | sāmānyaṃ kevalaṃ paśyatyeva buddhiḥ | tasyāstu "tarddarśinyāḥ" samavāyasya sūkṣmatvāt "sā bhrānti"ryadetad vyaktīnāṃ sāmānyābhedena grahaṇamiti cet | "taddarśinīti kutaḥ" | pāramārthikasāmānyadarśinī sā buddhiriti kuto niścayaḥ sarvadāsyā vyaktyabhedaviṣayatvāt | "nāsyā bījamastīti nirbījā" tathā cāsau "bhrānti"śca tasyā "ayogā"t | na hi bhrāntirutpadyamānā nirnimittā ghaṭate | jalādibhrāntivat | bhrāntiśceyamasaṃsṛṣṭānapi bhāvān saṃsṛjantī buddhiratosyā nimittena bhavitavyaṃ | yattannimittantat sāmānyamityatrāha | "ta eva" bhedāstatsāmānyajñānādyekaṅkāryaṃ yeṣānte "tadekakāryā bījaṃ bhrānteḥ" | etacca pratipādayiṣyate |

[118,1]

na ca sāmānyaṃ dṛṣṭātadāropeṇa vyaktiṣvekākārā bhrāntiryujyate | tathā hi | sādṛśyaṃ bhrāntikāraṇamatyantavilakṣaṇaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ vyaktibhyastasyāvarṇṇasaṃsthānākāratvād vyaktīnāṃ ca varṇṇasaṃsthānākāratvāt |

[118,2]

atha syāt | na sāmānyasya sādṛśyanimitto bhedeṣvāropopi tvekāntena bhinneṣu sa evāyamityekatvāvasāyavibhramo naikarūpamantareṇeti brūmaḥ | yadyevamekena sambandhina ityeva kṛtvā vināpi bhrāntinimittena yadyekākārabhrāntiviṣayā bhavanti | tadā "saṃkhyā ca saṃyoga"śca "kāryadravyaṃ" cādiśabdād vibhāgādi caika"mvastu"
vidyate yeṣānte ta"dvanta"steṣu "bhūte"ṣu caikaguṇena yukteṣu syādekākārā bhrāntiḥ | na ca bhavati | ato vyaktīnāmapi naikatvanimittā bhrāntiriti | "tadi"ti tasmād yathā vyaktibhyo bhedeneṣṭaṃ sāmānyaṃ "tathā sāmā"nyabuddhau "niveśābhāvā"t pratibhāsābhāvān"na sāmānyaman"yat | "sati vā" sāmānye "tasyā"pi sāmānyasya "svātmani"
svasmin svabhāve'"vasthānādamiśraṇamanye"na vyaktirūpeṇa | vyaktiṣvanavasthānānna dharmarūpatvantasyetyarthaḥ | "tasmādi"ti svasvabhāvavyavasthānād "ime bhāvā" ghaṭādayaḥ"sajātīyābhimatā"t tulyākāratvenābhimatād "anyasmācce"ti vijātīyādi"vyatirik"tāḥ pṛthagbhūtāḥ "svabhāvena" prakṛtyai"karūpatvāt | svasvabhāvavyavasthi"teriti yāvat ||

[118,3]

dvitīyakārikārthamāha | "yato yato bhinnā"ste bhāvāstasmād bhedastadbhedaḥ |
tasmād bhinnāḥ svabhāvāstasya "pratyāyanā"ya pratibhinnasvabhāvaṃ "kṛtasannive"śaiḥ "śabdaiḥ"kṛtasaṃketaiḥ śabdaiḥ karaṇabhūtaira"nekadharmā"ṇaḥ kṛtakatvādi"dharmma"vantaḥ "pratīyante" svabhāvā bhedepi | na hyekasya svalakṣaṇasya svabhāvanānātvamasti | kathantarhyanekadharmatvamityāha | "tatastato bhedamupādā"yeti | yato yato vyāvṛttāstatastato bhedamupādāyāśritya tepi śabdā ye tasya tasya bhedasya bhinnasvabhāvasya khyāpanāya "kṛtasaṃketā"steṣvasmin bhinne svabhāve vācakatvena niyatāḥ | tato naikaḥ śabdaḥ sarvān bhinnasvabhāvānākṣipatyatas"tepi śabdāḥ" pratyekantaiḥ "sarvabhedānākṣepepi | ekabhedacodanā"dekaikasya bhinnasya svabhāvasya codanātta"tsvalakṣaṇaniṣṭhā eva bhavanti" | yasya svalakṣaṇasya sa svabhāvonyasmād bhinno yaḥ śabdenādhyaṃvasīyate | tacca tatsvalakṣaṇaṃ ca | tanniṣṭhā eva tadviṣayā eva bhavanti |

[119,1]

nanu bāhyatayādhyavasitorthaḥ śabdapratibhāsī sādhāraṇonya evānyacca sādhāraṇaṃ svalakṣaṇantatkathantanniṣṭhā ityatrāha | "tadekasmādapi" yato yato vyāvṛttorthaḥ śabdairviṣayīkriyate tasmāttasmādatatkāraṇādatatkāryāccaikasmādapi "tasya" svalakṣaṇasyānakavyāvṛttasya "bhedostīti" kṛtvā tadviṣayā ucyante na tu tadviṣayā eva | yadvā tasya vyāvṛttyāśrayasya dharmasya yat svalakṣaṇantanniṣṭhā eva tatprāptiparyavasānā eva bhavanti | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tadekasmādapi tasya bhedostīti vyākhyātameva |

[119,2]

upasaṃharannāha | "tasmā"diti | yasmāt sajātīyavijātīyād vyāvṛttista"smādekasya bhāvasya yāvanti pararūpāṇi tāvatyastadapekṣa"yā | pararūpāpekṣayā | pararūpebhyo vyāvṛttayaḥ kalpitā dharmabhedāḥ | vyāvarttate vijātīyamebhiriti kṛtvā |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tasmin vyāvarttye'vadhibhūte dharmiṇyasambhavi kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca yasya vivakṣitasya dharmiṇaḥ "sa tadasambhavikāryakāraṇastasya tadbhedāt" | tasmādatatkāryādatatkāraṇācca bhedād vyāvṛttatvāt | "yāvatyaśca vyāvṛttayastāvatyaḥ śruta"yo niveśitā "atatkāryakāraṇaparihāreṇa vyavahārārthāḥ" | tadvivakṣitaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca yasya sa tatkāryakāraṇaḥ | "yathā" śrotravijñānakāryaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnakāraṇaśca sa tathā yo na bhavati so'tatkāryakāraṇastasya parihāreṇa vyavahārārthāḥ pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇo vyavahārorthaḥ phalaṃ yāsāmiti vigrahaḥ |

[120,1]

viṣayamāha | prayatnaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya sa prayatnānantarīyaka ucyate | tenā'tatkāraṇasyā'prayatnakāraṇasya vidyudādeḥ parihārārthaḥ "prayatnānantarīya"kadhvaniḥ | śrotrajñānaṃ kāryaṃ yasya "tachrāvaṇa"ntena "śrāvaṇa"dhvani"ratatkāryaparihārārthaḥ" | sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ cārthakriyānimittatvāt | hetuphalabhāvalakṣaṇatvāccārthakriyāyā ghaṭādiśabdeṣvapi tadatatkāryakāraṇaparihārthatvaṃ yojyaṃ ||

[120,2]

"tasmādi"tyādinā tṛtīyaślokaṃ vyācaṣṭe | yasmād bhinnā vyāvṛttibhedāḥ śrutayaśca yathāsvambhede niyatāstasmādekasya "dharmiṇaḥ svabhāvā'bhedepi | dharmiṇe"tyasya vivaraṇaṃ nāmneti śabdenetyarthaḥ | "yo viśeṣa" ityasyārtho "bhedaḥ" kṛtakādilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ kalpitaḥ "pratīyate | na sa śakyastatonyena" | tasmād vivakṣitāt kṛtakādiśabdādanyenānityādiśabdena pratyāyayitunta"smānna pratijñārthekadeśo" heturanityakṛtakaśabdayorbhinnārthatvāt ||

[120,3]

"kathami"tyādi paraḥ | śabdaśca liṅgaśca tābhyāṃ | yadyapīha liṅgaṃ prakṛtantathāpi śabdasyopādānaṃ liṅgavat nirviṣayatvakhyāpanārthantena ve da sya prāmāṇyaṃ nirākṛtambhavati |

[120,4]

nanu vidhirūpeṇa śabdaliṃge arthaḥ pratipādyata ityuktantatkathamidamāśaṃkitaṃ vyavacchedaḥ pratipādyata iti kathaṃ gamyata iti |

[120,5]

naitadasti | vyavacchidyateneneti vyavacchedo bāhyarūpatayāropita evākāra ucyate | tena sa eva śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ vidhinā pratipādyate na vasturūpamiti kuto gamyate | yadvā vyavacchidyatesminniti vyavacchedaḥ | svalakṣaṇamucyate | "sa eva" vidhirūpeṇa "pratipādya"te'dhyavasīyate "na" puna"rvastuno rūpaṃ"
pāramārthikadharmadharmibhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyata "iti" kuto "gamya"te |

[121,1]

"pramāṇāntara"syetyādi prativacanaṃ | tenāyamartho yadi tāvat pāramārthiko dharmadharmibhāvaḥ sarvātmanā'bhinnastadaikena pramāṇena śabdena vādhigaterthe sarvātmanā paricchedādanyasya "pramāṇāntarasya" śabdāntarasya vā pravṛttiḥ syād gṛhītagrāhitvenāprāmāṇyāt | bhavati ca śabdāntarādeḥ "pravṛttirataḥ" kalpita eva dharmadharmibhāvaḥ |

[121,2]

yadyapi pūrvasāmānyanirākaraṇādeva kalpito dharmadharmibhāvaḥ prasādhitastathāpi prakārāntareṇānenāpi prasādhyata ityadoṣaḥ | etameva pratipādayannāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | "ekasye"ti | dharmadharmivibhāgarahitatatvānniraṃśasyā"rthasvabhāvas"yārthātmanaḥ "svayaṃ"svarūpeṇa"pratyakṣasya sataḥ konyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syāt" pratyakṣadṛṣṭāt svabhāvāt konyaḥ svabhāvo na dṛṣṭaḥ syād "yaḥ pramāṇaira"numānasaṃjñakaiḥ "parīkṣ"yate | vyaktibhedād bahuvacanaṃ | sarva eva dṛṣṭo niraṃśatvād bhāvasya tasmānna pramāṇāntaraparīkṣyaḥ syāditi | "eka" ityādi vivaraṇaṃ | "eko hyarthātmā" niraṃśaḥ "sa tāvat pratyakṣo"bhyupagantavyaḥ yatrānumānaṃ pravarttate | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "pramāṇe"na prāga"siddhe dharmiṇi sādhanāsambhavāt" |
āśrayāsiddhatvena liṃgasyāsambhavāt tasmāt prasiddhena dharmiṇā bhāvyaṃ ||

[121,3]

etaduktambhavati | liṅgasyaiva pravṛttirna syāt kiṃ punarliṃginiścitā pramāṇā ntarasya pravṛttirbhaviṣyati | "yathā'nitye sādhye śabdaḥ" pratyakṣasiddhas"tasya pratyakṣeṇaiva"
pramāṇena svarūpasiddheḥ kāraṇāt "sarvākārasiddhiḥ" | kasmāt "tadanyasyāsiddhasya"
śabdasvabhāvādanyasya svabhāvasyāsiddhasyā"bhāvāt | bhāve vā"'siddhasya svabhāvasya"atatsvabhāvatvama"śabdasvabhāvatvaṃ | siddhāsiddhayorekasvabhāvatvavirodhāt |

[121,4]

tadevāha | "na hī"tyādi | alabdhadharmānuvṛttiryogaḥ | labdhadharmānuvṛttiḥ kṣemaḥ |
eko yogaḥ kṣemaśca yasya sa tathā | tulyadharmeti yāvat | "yaḥ" svabhāvo "yena" sadaika"kayogakṣemī na bhavati sa" bhinnayogakṣemaḥ | tatsvabhāvo yato bhinnayogakṣemas"tasya"taḥ | "tanmātranibandhanatvād bhedavyavahārasya" nānātvaṃ vyavasthāyāḥ |

[122,1]

"anya"theti yadyetad bhedakāraṇaṃ neṣyate tadābhedavyavahārasyā"bhāvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ" |
eṣa hi bhedābhedaheturvetyatra prastāve | yata evanta"smāt pratyakṣe dharmi"ṇi śabdādau | "tatsvabhāvasākalyaparicchedā"t | dharmisvabhāvasya sākalyenāvagamāt "tatra" dharmiṇi | "anavakāśā" nirviṣayī "pramāṇāntarasyā"numānasya "vṛttiḥ" ||

[122,2]

tavāpi tulyo doṣa iti cedāha | no "cetyā"di | "bhrāntinimitte"na sadṛśāparotpattyādinā kāraṇabhūtena vikalpabuddhyā "saṃyojyeta" samāropyeta "guṇāntaraṃ |
sthira"tvādi | vā śabda ivārthe | "śuktāviva rajatākā"raḥ saṃyojyeta | kathaṃ | rajatarūpeṇa śuktikā"rūpasya" yat"sādharmya" caikacikyādi | tasya "darśanā"t | anavadhāritaviśeṣaṃ śuktikārūpameva sadṛśapratyayanibandhanatvād rūpasādharmyamuktaṃ na tu sādharmyaṃ nāma dvayoḥ sādhāraṇamasti |

[122,3]

etaduktambhavati | "yadi bhrāntinimittena guṇāntaranna saṃyojyeta" bhavet mamāpi doṣaḥ kintu samāropyeta | tataḥ samāropavyavacchedārthampramāṇāntaraṃ pravarttate | tenāyamarthānubhūtaniścite pramāṇāntarasya gṛhītagrāhitvenāpravṛttiḥ syāt | samāropeṇa tvanubhūtāniścite tatsamāropavyavacchedārthaṃ pramāṇāntaramanumānaṃ pravarttata ityeke |

[122,4]

tadayuktaṃ | liṅgasya vyavacchedene saha sambandhāsiddheḥ | nāpi yāvaddhetunā pūrvaṃ pakṣavyavacchedo na kriyate tāvat sandigdhā sādhyapratītiḥ syāddhetoḥ sādhyena sambandhāt |
yatra ca na sādhyaṃ na tatra tadvipakṣo virodhāt | tasmālliṅgaṃ svavyāpakaṃ vidhirūpeṇa niścinvadarthādanyasamāropaṃ niṣedhati ||

[122,5]

nanvevamapi kathantanniṣedhaḥ kṣaṇikatvānumānepi pravṛtte'kṣaṇikāropāt |

[122,6]

satyaṃ | kevalamanumānenākṣaṇikārthaniṣedhe kṛte nāyamakṣaṇikākāraḥ pratyayastajjanyopi tu sadṛśāparotpattijanyatvenāropita iti pratipādyate | tasmāt tasyaivānubhūtāniścitasya kṣaṇikatvāderniścayānumānaṃ pravarttate | yatrāpi viparīta samāropo nāstyabhyāsāderaṃbhāvācca nānubhavo niścayajananasamartho na tatrāpi niścayārthā pramāṇāntaravṛttirekāṃśaniścayena sarvātmanā niścitatvāt | na ca tadvastu pratibhāsate yasya na kaścidapi svabhāvo niścitaḥ | tasmāt tatrāpyekapramāṇapravṛttāvaparasyāpravṛttiḥ syādeveti |

[123,1]

"yadī"tyādinā vivaraṇaṃ | "dṛṣṭaṃ sarvantattvaṃ" svarūpaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ | tathā"niścayapratirodhinā" yathādṛṣṭaniścayavibandhakena "bhrāntinimittena" sadṛśāparotpattilakṣaṇena | "guṇāntara"sthiratvādi | "na saṃyojyeta" | nāropyeta | yathā śuktau viśiṣṭarūpeṇa gṛhītāyāmapi śuklasādharmyād rajatākāraḥ saṃyojyeta | tadā syādanavakāśā pramāṇāntaravṛttiḥ |

[123,2]

syānmataṃ | na śuktau viśiṣṭarūpagrahe rajatasamāropaḥ kintu yadrajatarūpasāmānyantaddṛṣṭerevamadhyavasāya ityatrāha | "na hī"ti | na hi "śuktau dve rūpe sambhavataḥ" |
ekaṃ rajatena "samānaṃ" rūpaṃ aparamvi"śiṣṭa"mavadhāraṇaṃ "ca" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tathā" sāmānyaviśeṣarūpeṇa śavalābhāsāyāḥ pratipatteḥ "sarvadā prasaṅgāt | apratipattau vā vivekene"ti |
idaṃ sāmānyamayaṃ viśeṣa ityevamvivekena vibhāgenāpratipattau "dvitvavikalpāyogāt" |
śuktau dve rūpe iti kalpanāyā ayogāt | pratibhāsabhedamantareṇa dvitvakalpanāyā"matiprasaṅgāt" | anyatrāpyekatvābhimate dvitvakalpanā syāt | nedaṃ rajatamiti bādhakasyānutpādaprasaṃgācca | tasmācchuktau rūpadvayāyogāta |

[123,3]

"paśyan śuktirūpaṃ" puruṣo "viśiṣṭameva" svalakṣaṇameva "paśyati" na sāmānyaṃ |
abhyāsādayo "niścayapratyayā"steṣāmvaiphalyāt tvaniścinvan dviviśiṣṭaṃ śuktikārūpa"ntatsāmānyaṃ" rajatarūpasāmānyam"paśyāmīti manyate" | tata iti rajatarūpasāmānyagrahaṇābhimānā dasya draṣṭuḥ śuktau rajatasamāropaḥ | yadvā śuktikārajatayoryatsāmānyaṃ tulyaṃ rūpantatpaśyāmīti manyate | "tato" rūpadarśanā"dasya" draṣṭū"rajatasamāropaḥ" | tathā hi yādṛśameva mayā rajatasya rūpaṃ pratipannantādṛśamevāsyāpi rūpantasmāttadevedaṃ rajatamiti pratītiḥ | yathā śuktau rajatasamāropastathā dṛṣṭe śabdādau dharmiṇi "sadṛśāparāparotpattyā" sadṛśasya dvitīyasya kṣaṇasyotpattyā bhrāntinimittena pūrvottarakṣaṇayo"ralakṣitanānātva"sya puṃsas"tadbhāvasamāropā"t sattāsamāropāt "sthitibhrāntiḥ" | tasmād "yāvantosya" śabdādeḥ kṣaṇikānātmādisvabhāvasya"parabhā"vā nityādayas"tāvanta eva yathāsvanimittabhāvinaḥ" yasya yadanurūpaṃ nimittantadbhāvinaḥ "samāropā iti | tadvyavacchedakāni" tasya samāropasyārthād vyavacchedakāni "bhavantī"tyutpadyamānāni "pramāṇā"nyanumānasaṃjñitāni | vyaktibhedād bahuvacanaṃ | "saphalāni syuḥ" sārthakāni syuḥ | "teṣāntu vyavacchedaphalānāṃ" samāropapratiṣedhaphalānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ | "nāpratītasya vastvaṅaśasya" vastubhāgasya "pratyāyane" prakāśane "pravṛttiḥ" |
tasya vastvaṃśasya "niraṃśe" dharmiṇi dṛśyamāne dṛṣṭatvāt | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anaṃśasyekadeśena darśanāyogāt" ||

[124,1]

yata evanta"smāt" pratyakṣeṇa "dṛṣṭasya bhāvasya dṛṣṭa evākhilo guṇaḥ"
samastaḥ svabhāvastathāpi "bhrāntteḥ" sadbhāvā"nniścīyate neti" kṛtvā tanniścayārthaṃ"sādhana"manumānaṃ vidhirūpeṇaiva "pravarttata" iti spaṣṭamevoktaṃ |

[124,2]

"tasmānnādṛṣṭagrahaṇārthā dṛṣṭe" pratyakṣeṇa "pramāṇāntarasya" | kintarhi dṛṣṭaniścayā caiva "pravṛtti"rityanenāpi vidhyarthaḥ | spaṣṭa evoktonyaniṣedhastvarthāt ||

[124,3]

"vastugraha" ityādi | cakāraḥ pratyakṣāpekṣayā samuccayārthaḥ | anumānena ca"vastugrahe"ṅgīkriyamāṇe | śabdādidharmiṇo "dharmasyaikasya" kṛtakatvādilakṣaṇasya "niśca"yena niraṃśatvād dharmiṇaḥ "sarvadharma"niścayastadā nityatvādyanumānāntaravaiphalyamityākūtaṃ |

[125,1]

apoho bāhyatayā āropita ākāropohyate'neneti kṛtvā | tasminnanumānena pratipādyeṅgīkriyamāṇe yadvāpohyatesminnityapohaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ | tasmin svākārābhinnatayā'numānagrāhye'bhyupagamyamāne "nāyama"nantarokto "doṣaḥ prasajyate" |

[125,2]

"na kevalami"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | "kvacit" pratyakṣadṛṣṭe dharmiṇīti sambandhaḥ |
kasmiṃścit "pratyakṣadṛṣṭe" dharmiṇītyarthaḥ | na sarvo dharmī pratyakṣo bhavatīti kvacid grahaṇaṃ | anantaroktena nyāyena "pramāṇāntarāvṛttiḥ" |

[125,3]

"tadānumānamapi vastu" śabdādikaṃ "vidhinā pratyāyatīṣyate" vastvadhyavasāyenārthānna samāropa"vyavacchedakṛt | tade"ti vidhirūpeṇa vastusvarūpagrahaṇe | "ekadharmaniścaye" sati"tadavyatirekā"nniścitadharmāvyatirekāt "sarvadharmaniścaya iti pramāṇāntarāvṛtti"ranumānāntarāpravṛttiḥ | satyapyavyatireke | na sarvadharmaniścaya iti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | "tasmi"nniti prathamānumāna"niścite" dharme | "tadātme"ti | niścitadharmātmā sanna"niścito" na hi yuktaḥ |

[125,4]

apohe nāyandoṣaḥ prasajyata ityetadvivṛṇvannāha | "yadā puna"rityādi | yadā puna"ranumānena" vastvadhyavasāyaṃ kurvatā'rthāt "samāropavyavacchedaḥ kriyate" na tu sākṣājjñāpakatvādasya | tenaitannirastaṃ samāropavyavaccheda eva vyavahārādanyārthapravṛttirna syādanumānenāniścitatvāditi | "tadaikena" kṛtakānumānenaikasyākṛtaka"samāropasya vyavacchedādanyasya" nityasamāropasya "vyavacchedaḥ kṛto na bhavatī"ti kṛtvā | "tadartha"manyasamāropavyavacchedārtha"manya"dityanityatvādyanumānaṃ "pravarttate" | tasmānna vikalpānāṃ svarūpeṇa bāhyo grāhyo'pi tu svākāreṇa sahaikīkṛta eva bāhyo viṣayaḥ | sa cāsatyo'pohyate'nyadaneneti apoha ucyate ||

[125,5]

sthite caivamparonavagatābhiprāyaḥ prāha | "nanvi"tyādi | "pūrvanta"dviparītākārasamāropī viparyāsaḥ pravarttate | tatasta"dviparyāsapūrvakopratītasyā"rthasya liṅgānni"ścayo bhavatīti nāyanniyamo" viparyāsarahitepyanumānasambhavāt | tadāha | "yathe"tyādi | "akasmādi"tyatarkkitopasthitāt | sahasaiva kvacitpradeśe dhūmāda"gnipratipattiḥ | na hi tatre"tyakasmādagnipratipattā"vanagnisamāropaḥ sambhāvyate | tadi"ti tasmānna "sarvatra vyavacchedaḥ kriyate"'rthā"ditya"numānena |

[126,1]

"ukta"mityā cā ryaḥ | "atra" hi vastusvarūpagrāhakatvenānumānasya pravṛttāvuktamuttaraṃ | pratyakṣeṇa "dharmipratipattau" taddharmāṇāṃ dharmiṇaḥ sakāśāda"bhedāt sarvaprapitattera"numānavaiphalyamiti | dharmiṇaḥ sakāśād dharmasya bhede vābhyupagamyamāne dharmiṇā saha na tādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho bhedābhyupagamāt | na cānityatvādīnāṃ dharmisvarūpādutpattirna cānityatvādibhyo dharmiṇa utpattiḥ | "tataścāsambaddhasya" dharmasya tatra rmiṇya"pratipattiri"tyeta"dapyuk"taṃ | ahetuphalabhūtasya tatrānumānāsambhavādityatrāntare |
yata eva"ntasmāt tatrā"pyakasmād dhūmadarśanādagnipratipattau | "taddarśinaḥ" pradeśadarśinaḥ paṃsas"tatsvabhāvāniścayo"gnimattvasvabhāvāniścayostyeva | sa cāniyataḥ "kṛto viparyāsādevā"nagnimatā pradeśena tulyatvagrahaṇādeva |

[126,2]

etadevāha | "sa" cetyādi |

[126,3]

yadvā tatsvabhāvāniścayaḥ kutaḥ | kintu niścaya eva syādaviparyāsāt |
bhavati cāniścayaḥ | tasmānna dharmipratipattirvastusvarūpagrāhiṇītyapohaviṣayā |

[126,4]

kiñca | "sa ce"tyādi | "sa ce"ti puruṣa"stadvivikte"neti vahnivivekena "taṃ pradeśa"magnimantamapi "tadviviktena rūpeṇa niścinvan buddhyā" | kimbhūtayā | "agnisattābhāvanāvimuktayā" | agnisattāsambhāvanārahitayā | "kathamaviparyasto" nāmaviparyasta evātasmiṃstadgrahāt | tathā hi | yāvattatra pradeśe dhūmanna paśyati tāvadanyenāgnirahitena pradeśena sadṛśantamapyadhyavasyati | yadi nāma kvacidanubhava yoge sati yadīha niścayastathāpi tatra saṃśayena bhāvyaṃ saṃśayaścobhayāṃśāvalambī |
sa ca pakṣe tadviparītaṃ saṃspṛśatyevātaḥ saṃśayavyudāsepyanyavyavacchedaḥ kuto bhavatyeva liṅgena | avaśyaṃ ca liṅgādevānumeyaṃ pratipadyamānastaṃtrānumeye viparyāsasaṃśayābhyāṃ yukto bhavati | yasmāt "tadākārasamāropasaṃśayarahitaśca" | anagnyākārasamāropeṇasaṃśayena ca rahitaśca puruṣa"statpratipattau" agnipratipattau "na liṅgamanusaret" | na pakṣadharmaṃ samāśrayet | tathā "na tasya" liṅgasyā"nvayavyatirekayorādriyeta" | yāvatānusaredādriyate ca | tasmāttadākārasamāropasaṃśayavān pratipattā liṅgabalena samāropamapanayati kvacitsaṃśayamataḥ sarvatra svavyāpakapratipattidvāreṇa samāropavyavacchedaḥ kriyate |

[127,1]

"tasmādapohaviṣaya"manyavyavacchedaviṣayaṃ | ityuktena prakāreṇa na tu sākṣāt | "anyathe"ti yadi samāropamantareṇānumānasya pratipattiriṣyate | tadā kenacit pramāṇena"dharmiṇaḥ siddhau kimasiddhanta"sya dharmiṇo rūpa"mataḥ" siddhāt svabhāvāt "parama"nyadasti yasya pratyāyanāya liṅgaṃ pravartteta ||

[127,2]

nanu saṃśayaviparyayotpāde sati bhāgaḥ syāt | yadāha | na cemāḥ kalpanā apratisamviditā evodayante vyayante ceti | nāpi tatpratipattau liṅgānusaraṇena tadākārasamāropasaṃśayaḥ śakyate kalpayitunniścayānutpattipakṣepi | sādhyaniścayārthaṃ liṅgānusaraṇasya sambhavāt |

[127,3]

"anyathā dharmiṇaḥ siddhāvasiddhaṃ kimataḥ param | "

[127,4]

ityanenāpi dharmiviṣayasya jñānasya kalpitaviṣayatvaṃ syāt | na tu dharmiṇi samāropaḥ sidhyatīti kathantadanumānasyārthāt samāropavyavaccheda iti |

[127,5]

sattyaṃ | kintvayamabhiprāyaḥ | na yāvat pakṣadharmatvaniścayo na tāvadanumānasyotthānamasti hetorasiddhatvāt | agnimati ca pradeśe pradeśamātrasambandhitayā yo dhūmasya niścayo'yameva viparyāso'nyathāvadhāraṇāt | na hyatrāgnirnāstītyevaṃ rūpa eva viparyāsaḥ sāgneḥ pradeśādayamanya ityevaṃ rūpasyāpi"rṣi"pratyayasya viparyāsāttenātrāpyanumāne sāgnirayaṃ pradeśo na pradeśamātramiti samāropaniṣedhostyeva |

[127,6]
