bhavatu tāvat samārope tadvyavacchedāya svaviṣaye pravarttamānaṃ liṅgamanyāpohakṛt |
yatpunaridaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vikalpavijñānantadasati samārope bhavat kathamanyāpohakṛt | avaśyaṃ ca tadanyāpohaviṣayameṣṭavyaṃ sāmānyaviṣayatvādanyāpohalakṣaṇatvācca sāmānyasya bhavatāndarśaneneti |

[128,1]

ata āha | "kvacidi"tyādi | kasmiṃścidrūpādau "dṛṣṭe"pi pratyakṣeṇa | tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi yaj"jñānaṃ sāmānyārthaṃ sāmānyaviṣaya"mata eva vikalpakaṃ | "asamāropitaḥ"
anyā"ṅśaḥ" pratiyogyākāro yasmin viṣaye sa tathā tatra pravarttamānantadapi "tanmātrāpohagocaraṃ" | tenāyamartho bhavati | samāroparahitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ svākārabhedena gṛhṇan vikalpakaṃ jñānambhrāntatvāt tatsamāroparahitabāhyādhyavāsāyakameva na tu bāhyasvarūpagrāhakam | atastanmātrameva niyatabāhyāvasāya evānyasya samāropasyāpohagocaramvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ |

[128,2]

yadvā asamāropitaścāsāvanyāṃśaśca tasmin sati vikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ pravarttamāna ntanmātrāpohagocaraṃ | yosāvasamāropitonyāṅśastanmātravyavacchedaviṣayambhavati |

[128,3]

etaduktambhavati | yatrāpi samāropaḥ pravṛtto na tatrāpi samāropaniṣedhaḥ śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ pratipādyate sambandhābhāvādata evāyaṃ na kriyate'hetutvācca nāśasya | kevalaṃ pūrvakasya samāropasya svarasanirodhāt | śabdaliṅgābhyāmanityādiniścaye satyanyasya samāropasyānutpāde sati samāropaniṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati | tathā pratyakṣadṛṣṭepyanyavikalpasya samāropavyavacchedaḥ kena vāryate | tena na pūrvatrānyādṛśa eva samāropavyavaccheda ukto'dhunānyādṛśa evocyata iti bhinnavākyatā |

[128,4]

tenedaṃ ca nirastaṃ |

[128,5]

"prāgagauriti vijñānaṃ gośabdaśrāviṇo bhaved | yenāgovyavacchedāya pravṛtto gauriti dhvaniriti | "

[128,6]

yadā śabdaliṃgayoḥ svaviṣaye niścayajananenānyaniṣedhe vyāpāraḥ kalpyate |
tadā vidhirūpeṇaiva pravṛttiriti siddhaṃ | tena | "yadi gaurityayaṃ śabdaḥ samarthonyanivarttane | janako gavi gobuddhermṛgyatāmaparo dhvaniriti || "
nirastaṃ |

[128,7]

tathā yadapyucyate |

[128,8]

"yadyappoha vinirmukte na vṛttiḥ śabdaliṃgayoḥ | yuktā tathāpi bodhastu jñāturvastvavalambata iti || "

[129,1]

tadiṣṭamevāsmākaṃ | śabdaliṃgapratipāditasya cārthasyānyaniṣedhe vyāpāro na śabdaliṅgayoḥ |

[129,2]

tena yaducyate ku mā ri le na | niṣedhasya nirūpatvād bhedābhāvācca na liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ nāpi śabdavācyatvaṃ |

[129,3]

"na gamyagamakatvaṃ syādavastutvādapohayoḥ | bhavatpakṣe yathā loke khapuṣpaśaśaśṛṅgayoḥ | niṣedhamātrarūpaṃ ca śabdārtho yadi kalpyate | abhāvaśabdavācyā syācchūnyatānyaprakārikā | 36bhinnasāmānyavacanā viśeṣavacanāśraye | sarve bhaveyuḥ paryāyā yadyapohasya vācyatā || 42"

[129,4]

tathā yadi cāpohyabhedenāpohasya bhedastadaupacārikaḥ syāt | yasya cāpohasya nīrūpatve dharmibhedena na bhedaḥ | kathantasya bahirbhūtairapohairbhedaḥ kriyate | tadāha |

[129,5]

"nanu cāpohabhedena bhedopohasya setsyati | na viśeṣaḥ svatastasya parataścaupacārikaḥ || 47saṃsargiṇopi cādhārā yanna bhindanti bhāvataḥ | apohyaiḥ sa vahiḥsaṃsthairbhidyetetyatikalpaneti || 52 || "

[129,6]

nirastaṃ | vyavacchedamātrasya śabdādyaviṣayatvāt |

[129,7]

"yadi"tyādinā ślokaṃ vyācaṣṭe | ādiśabdācchabdādiparigrahaḥ | nāsya liṃgamastītyi"liṅgarūpādikametaditi niścayajñānaṃ | asati samārope" bhavati | "na hi"
pratyakṣa"dṛṣṭe rūpādau" tadānīmviparītākārasamāroposti | "tatkathaṃ vyavacchedaviṣayambhavati" |

[129,8]

iyatā ślokasya pūrvārddho vyākhyātaḥ | uttarārddhaṃ vyākhyātumāha | "samāropaviṣaye tasya" niścayajñānasyā"bhāvāt" | tadvyavacchedaviṣayambhavatīti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ | etadevāha | "yatra" bhedesya puṃsaḥ "samāropo na tatra" bhede samāropaviṣaye"niścayo bhavatya"sthiro nirātmaka iti vā ||

[130,1]

kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "niścayāropamanasorbādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ" | niścayajñānasya tadviparītasamāropajñānasya ca bādhyabādhaka"bhāvataḥ" | bādhyabādhakabhāvameva sādhayannāha | "na hī"ti "sarvataḥ" sajātīyādvijātīyācca "bhinno dṛṣṭopi bhāvastathaive"ti yathādṛṣṭena sarveṇākāreṇa "pratyabhijñāyate" | niścīyate na hīti sambandhaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "kvacid bhede" kṣaṇikatvādike "vyavadhānasambhavā"t | bhrāntinimittagataḥ "yathā śukteḥ"
sarvato vyāvṛttāyā darśanepi śuktikāditve rajatasādharmyasya bhrāntinimittasya sambhavānna niścayaḥ | "yatra" tvākāre "bhrāntinimi"ttaṃ nāsti "tatraivāsya pratipattu"ranubhavo ttarakālabhāvī "smārtto niścayo bhavati" | ta"ddarśanāviśeṣe"pi sarvasvākāreṣu pratyakṣasyāviśeṣepi smārtta iti smṛtirūpaḥ |

[130,2]

nanu tadityullekhenānutpatteḥ kathaṃ smṛtirūpaḥ |

[130,3]

satyaṃ | nirvikalpakaviṣayasya svākāreṇaikīkṛtya viṣayīkaraṇāt smṛtirūpa ucyate | yataśca pratyakṣāviśeṣepi samāroparahita eva viṣaye niścayo bhavatitasmāt samāropaniścayayorbādhyabādhakabhāvo gamyate | tato "bādhyabādhakabhāvāt"
kāraṇāt "samāropaviveke" samāropavirahaniścayasyā"sya pravṛttiriti gamyate" |

[130,4]

bhavatu nāma samāropaviveke pravṛttistathāpi nānyāpohaviṣayatvamvidhirūpeṇa pravṛtterityāha | "tadviveka evānyāpohaḥ" samāropaviveka eva cānyāpohaḥ | "tasmāt"
samāroparahite vṛttivaśāt "tadapī"ti na kevalamanityaḥ śabda iti niścayajñānaṃ pūrvoktena nyāyena "tanmātrāpohagocarantadapi" pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāviniściyajñānamapi"tanmātrāpohagocaraṃ na vastusvabhāvaniścāyakaṃ svarūpeṇa" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tathā hi" kasyacidākārasya rūpatvāde"rniścaye"pyanyasya kṣaṇikatvādyākārasyā"pratipattidarśa"nāt |

[131,1]

yadi tu pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinā niṣcayena vastusvabhāvasya niścayaḥ kriyate tadā"tatsvabhāvaniścaye ca" niraṃśatvād vastunasta"syāyo"gādanyasyākārāntarasyāniśca"yāyogāt" ||

[131,2]

yataśca vastvadhyavasāyenaiva niścayasya pravṛttiḥ śabdasya vā na vastusvarūpagrāhakatvena | tasmād "yāva"nta ekas"yāṃśasamāropā" rūpāntarasamāropāḥ pravṛttā apravṛttāśca "tannirāse" samāropanirāsārtha"ntāvanta eva niścayāḥ śabdā"śca tāvanta eva svaviṣaye pravarttante | "tena" kāraṇena "te" niścayāḥ śabdāśca "bhinnagocarā"
bhinnaviṣayāḥ | svasvahetutodhyavasitasvasvākārābhinnabāhyaviṣayatvāttenaitad |

[131,3]

"buddhyāropitabuddhistho nārthabuddhyantarānugaḥ | nābhipretārthakārī ca sopi vācyo na tattvataḥ | pratibhāpi ca śabdārtho bāhyārthaviṣayā yadi | ekātmaniyate bāhye vicitrāḥ pratibhāḥ kathaṃ | atha nirviṣayā etā vāsanāmātrabhāvataḥ | pratipattiḥ pravṛttiśca bāhyārtheṣu kathambhavet | svāṃśe bāhyādhimokṣeṇa pravṛttiścetsadā matā | śabdārtho'tāttvikaḥ prāptastathā bhrāntyā pravarttanāditi | "

[131,4]

nirastaṃ | kalpitaviṣayatveneṣṭatvād vikalpasya ||

[131,5]

"anyathe"ti buddhiśabdābhyāmvastusvarūpagrahaṇe | "ekena śabdena vyāpte" sarvākāreṇa "viṣayīkṛ"te | "ekatraika"smin "buddhyā" vā niścayātmikayā vyāptenānyaviṣayaḥ | "anya"ścāsāvākāro "viṣa"yaścetyanyaviṣayaḥ | tasya vastuno nāpara ākāro viṣayabhūto vidyate pratyāyyaḥ | athavā tadvastupratyāyakasyānyasya śabdasya jñānasyavā na viṣayaḥ | "iti" hetoḥ śabdānāṃ pratīte viṣaye paścāt pravarttamānānāṃ "paryāyatā syā"t | vṛkṣapādapādiśabdavat || madhuro rasaḥ snigdho guruḥ śīta ityevamādibhinnaviṣayānupātinyāśca buddheḥ pravṛttirna syādityekaviṣayatvaprasaṃgaḥ ||

[132,1]

bhinnaṃ dharmadharmibhāvaṃ pāramārthikandūṣayitumupanyasyannāha | "yasyāpī"tyādi |
yasyāpi vai śe ṣi ka sya "parasparamāśrayācca" bhinnatvā"nnānā upā"dhayo viśeṣaṇāni dravyatvādayo yasyārthasya ghaṭādeḥ sa nānopādhistasya tata evopādhibhedād "bhedinorthasya" vidhinaiva buddhi"grāhikā" niścayātmikā "dhīḥ" sā ca pratyupādhi bhinnā ||
dhiyaśca viṣayabhedandarśayatā śabdānāmapyarthato darśita eva |

[132,2]

tadvyācaṣṭe "yopī"tyādinā | "upādhayo" dravyatvādayaḥ "parasparama"nyonya"mbhinnā āśrayācce"tyupādhimato bhinnāḥ | "tannibandhanā" bhinnopādhinibandhanāḥ śrutigrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamevaṃ buddhayopi | "tadādhāre" sthityupādhīnāmādhāreṣu | "tatraiva" cetyupādhiṣveva | "varttante" vācakatayā pravarttante | "tadi"ti tasmād | "aya"miti śabdajñānāntarāṇāṃ paryāyatālakṣaṇo'"prasaṃgaḥ" |

[132,3]

uttaramāha | "tasyāpī"tyādi | "nānā"prakārāṇāmu"pādhīnāmupakārasyāṅgaṃ" kāraṇaṃ yāḥ śaktayaḥ | tābhyo'"bhinnātma"na upādhimata "ekena" niścayajñānena "grahe" niścaye"sarvātmanā" kṛte sati | "upakārya"syopādhikalāpasya "ko bhedaḥ" ka upādhiviśeṣaḥ"syādani"ścitaḥ | sarva eva niścitaḥ syāt |

[132,4]

nanvagnidhūmayoḥ satyapi sambandhe nāgniniścaye dhūmasya niścayo dṛśyate tathā dharminiścaye dharmāniścayo bhaviṣyati |

[132,5]

nanvidamevādarśananna syāt | niścayapratyayena sarvātmanā'gnisvarūpagrahe satidhūmādikāraṇatvenaiva niścayāt | dhūmādīnāmapi niścitatvāt | tasmānna niścayena tatsvarūpagrahaṇaṃ | nirvikalpakenāpi tarhi sarvātmanā graho na syād dhūmāpratibhāsādeva tatkāryatvāgrahāt |

[133,1]

naitadasti | agnerhi dhūmajananaṃprati kāraṇatvaṃ pūrvabhāva evocyate | sa ca pratyakṣe pratibhāsata iti kathaṃ nāgnestatkāryatvagrahaḥ | tenāyamarthaḥ | nāgnidhūmayoḥ paramārthataḥ parasparāpekṣitā vidyate | niṣpannāniṣpannāvasthāyāṃ sambandhābhāvāt | kevalamagnau satyeva dhūmo bhavatīti tau kāryakāraṇe ucyete | dharmadharmiṇostu parasparāpekṣitvāddharmiṇaḥ sarvātmanā niścaye sarvadharmāṇāṃ sākṣānniścayaḥ syānnārthādākṣepaḥ | yadā tu bāhyādhyavasāyako vikalpo bhavati na tu grāhakastadādhyavasitasyārthasyānyavyāvṛttisambhavenārthādanyadharmākṣepo yujyate | parasparāpekṣatve ca yāvanna dharmaniścayo na tāvaddharminiścayo | yāvacca na dharminiścayastāvanna dharmaniścaya ityanyonyāśrayatvañca syāt |

[133,2]

nanu copādhyupādhimadbhāva āśrayāśrayibhāva evocyate | sa ca samānakālabhāvinoreva | na ca tayorupakāryopakārakabhāvo bhinnakālatvādasya | tatkathamucyate | ekopādhiviśiṣṭagrahe sarvagraha iti |

[133,3]

sattyaṃ | kintu parairanya eva janyajanakabhāvonyaścopakāryopakārakabhāva iṣyate | tathā hi | vadaradravyaṃ svahetujanyamapi kuṇḍenopakriyate'ta evaṃ samānakālabhāvinorayamupakāryopakārakabhāva iṣyata iti tadabhiprāyādidamuktaṃ | yadvā dharmo niścīyamānaḥ dharmyāśritatvādevāśrayasya pratītimākṣipati sa cāśritānāṃ dharmāṇāmiti sarvaniścayaḥ | tasmācchabdapramāṇāntaravṛtteḥ kalpita eva dharmadharmibhāvaḥ | na cāsmin pakṣe dharmabhedābhedakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇāntaravaiyarthyamavastutvena teṣāṃ bhedābhedasya paramārthato'bhāvāt | pramāṇāntaraireva ca dharmāntarāṇāṃ kalpanīyatvāt tadabhāve kathaṃ dharmabhedābhedakalpaneti yatkiñcidetat ||

[133,4]

"yadyapī"tyādinā kārikārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe | "śabdāntarā"ṇāṃ jñānāntarāṇā"martha" upādhimati pratipattau prati"nimittaṃ bhinnā evopādhayo" yadyapyabhyupagamyante | "sa tu tadvānupādhimānarthaḥ śabdajñānairupalīyate" viṣayīkriyate | "tasya" tadvato "nānopādhīnāmupakārāśrayā yāḥ śaktayastatsvabhāvasya svātma"ni svarūpe "bhedo nāsti" | tataścaikopādhidvāreṇāpi "grahe sarvātmanā" grahaṇantasminsati "ka evopādhibheda"stasyā"niścitaḥ"
kintu sarva eva niścitaḥ syāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sarvopādhyupakārakatvena grahaṇāt" |

[134,1]

ekopādhidvāreṇopādhimataḥ svarūpameva grahītaṃ na tūpādhyupakārakatvamiti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | na hyupādhyupakārakatvamanyadevāgṛhītamityanena sambandhaḥ | "tasye"tyupādhimataḥ "svena rūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇasya" svarūpā"dupakārakatvasyābhedāt" | yata evamataḥ kāraṇā"dasye"tyupādhimataḥ | "yadeva svabhāvena" svarūpeṇa "grahaṇantadevopakārakatvenāpi" grahaṇamiti |

[134,2]

bhavatvekopādhidvāreṇopādhimataḥ sarvopādhyupakārakatvasya svabhāvabhūtasya grahaḥ |
upādhīnāntu tasmād vyatiriktānāṃ kathaṃ grahaṇamityata āha | "tayori"tyādi |
upādhikalāpasyopādhimataśca upakāryopakārakabhūtayo"rātmani" svabhāvenyonya"sambandho"
sambandhādupakāryopakārakasambandhasyātmabhūtatvāditi yāvat | tataścopakārakasvabhāva"syaikasya jñāne sati" sambandhād "dvayagrahaḥ" | upādhyupādhimatorgrahaḥ |

[134,3]

stadvyācaṣṭe | "ātmabhūtasye"tyādi | tathā hyupādhimati gṛhīte tasyātmabhūta upakārakabhāvastāvad gṛhītastasmin gṛhīte upādhīnāmapyu"kārya"bhāva ātma bhūto gṛhītastadgrahaṇanāntarīyakatvā"dupakārakabhāva"grahaṇasya | "ataḥ" kāraṇā"dekajñāne dvayo"rapyupādhyupādhimato"rgrahaṇa"miti kṛtvā "ekopādhiviśiṣṭepi" tasminnupādhimati "gṛhyamāṇe sarvopādhīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ | tadgrahaṇanāntarīya"katvādityupādhigrahaṇanāntarīyakatvāt | anyathetyupādhīnāmagrahe "tathāpi na gṛhyeta" | upādhīnāmupakāraka upādhimānityevamapi na gṛhyeta |

[134,4]

ya eva tadānīṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittamupādhistaṃ pratyevopakārakatvamupādhimato gṛhītaṃ na tūpādhyantaropakārakatvamiti cedāha | "na hyanya" evetyādi | "anyopakāraka"
ityanyasyopādherupakārakaḥ svabhāvo "yo na gṛhītaḥ" kintu sarva eva gṛhīto niraṃśatvāda vastunaḥ |

[135,1]

syānmatam | upādhimatonapekṣitasambandhina upakāraka ityeva grahaṇaṃ na tvasyopakāraka iti tato nopādhīnāṃ grahaṇamityata āha | "na cāpī"tyādi | "tathā gṛhīta" ityupakāraka ityevaṃ gṛhīte "upakārakāryasyo"pādhera"grahaṇaṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyā"pyukārakasya upakāraka itye"vamagrahaṇaprasaṃgāt" | etat kathayati | sambandhitvādupakārakasyāntareṇa dvitīyasambandhigrahaṇamupakāraka ityapi grahaṇaṃ nāstīti |
tathābhūtañca dṛṣṭāntamāha | "svasvāmitvava"diti | na hi svagrahaṇamantareṇāsti svāmitvasya grahaṇaṃ | yata evamekopādhidvāreṇa pravṛttepyekasmin jñāne śabde ca sarvopādhīnāṃ grahaṇamupādhimataśca sarvātmanā | "tasmādarthāntaropādhivādepi"
arthāntarabhūtā upādhaya ityevaṃvādepi "samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ" | śabdajñānāntarāṇāṃ paryāyatā prāpnotīti |

[135,2]

"athā"pītyādinā paramāśaṅkate | "yābhiḥ" śaktibhiḥ śaktimā"nupādhīnupakaroti tāḥ śaktayaḥ" śaktimataḥ sakāśād "bhinnāḥ | tata" iti bhedāt | "nāyaṃ prasaṃga" iti |
ekopādhyupakārakaśaktyabhedagrahe sarvaśaktīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ | tadgrahaṇācca sarvopādhīnāmityayaṃ prasaṅgo nāsti |

[135,3]

uttaramāha | "dharmopakāre"tyādi | dharmā upādhayasteṣāmupakārasya yāḥ "śaktayastāsāṃ"
śaktimataḥ sakāśād "bhede"'bhyupagamyamāne "tāḥ" śaktaya"stasya" śaktimataḥ kimbhavanti |
na kiṃcid bhavanti na tatsambandhinya ityarthaḥ | yadā "yadi nopakārastataḥ" | śaktimataṃ"stāsāṃ" śaktīnāṃ | atha sambandhasiddhyarthamupakāra iṣyate | tadā śaktyupakāriṇyo parā vyatiriktāḥ śaktayoṅgīkarttavyāḥ | yābhiḥ śaktīrupakaroti | tāsāṃ ca sambandhatvasiddhyarthamupakāraḥ kalpanīyaḥ | tatrāparā śaktikalpaneti "tathā syādanavasthitiḥ" |

[136,1]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "yadī"tyādi | upādhimupādhimprati "pratyupādhi | upakārakatvā"ni śaktaya"stasyo"pādhimataḥ "na svātmabhūtāni" | na svabhāvabhūtāni | kintu vyatiriktāni |
nāpi tata upādhimataḥ "upakāramanubhava"nti | ātmasātkurvanti | "kintasya tā ucya"nte |
upādhimataḥ śaktaya iti kasmāducyante | sambandhābhāvāt | sambandhasiddhyarthamupādhi mataḥ sakāśāt tāsāmupādhyupakāriṇīnāṃ śaktīnāmupakārevāṅgīkriyamāṇe yābhiḥ śaktibhirupādhyupakāriṇīḥ śaktīrupakarotyayamupādhimān | "yadi" tāstasyātmabhūtā iṣyante tadā "svātmabhūtābhiḥ śaktibhirayamu"pādhimān "eka" ityanaṃśaḥ | upādhyupakāriṇīḥ śa"ktīrupakurva"n |

[136,2]

"tathā hī"tyādinā "sarvātmanā graha"ṇaṃ sādhayati | ekopādhi"grahaṇe tadupakāriṇyo" upādhyupakāriṇyo vyatiriktāyāḥ "śaktergrahaṇaṃ | tadgrahaṇa" iti |
upādhyupakāriśaktigrahe | "tadupakārī" upādhyupakāriśaktyupakārī | kiṃbhūtaḥ"svātmabhūtasakalaśaktyapakāraḥ" svātmabhūtāḥ sakalā upādhyupakāriṇīnāṃ śaktīnāmupakārāḥ śaktayo yasya sa tathābhūto "bhāvo gṛhītaḥ sarvā" upādhyupakārikāḥ śa"ktīrgrāhayati | tāśce"māḥ śaktayo gṛhītāḥ svopakāryā"nupādhīn grāhayantīti tadavasthaḥ prasaṃgaḥ" ko bhedaḥ syādaniścita iti ya uktaḥ ||

[136,3]

"atha" mābhūdeṣa doṣa iti "tā api śaktyupakāriṇyaḥ śaktayo bhinnā evo"pādhimato "bhāvā"diṣyante | tadā tadupakāriṇyopi śaktayo vyatiriktāḥ kalpanīyāstathā tadupakāriṇya ityevamanavasthānāt | "upādhīnāṃ" ta"cchaktīnāṃ" ca | "upādhyupakāraśaktīnāṃ cāparāparāsveva śaktiṣvaparyavasānenāniṣṭhayā" yad ghaṭanantasyodghaṭanāt sambandhanāt | tathā hyupādhayo vyatiriktāsu śaktiṣu sambaddhāstā api vyatiriktāsveva | evamuttarottarā śaktiḥ pūrvapūrvāsu śaktiṣu vyatiriktāsvevānavasthānena sambaddhā | na tūpādhimati | tataśca "sa eka" upādhimān | "tābhi"rupādhyupakārikābhiḥ śaktibhissaha "kadācidapyagṛhītastadupakārātmā" | śaktyupakārātmā |
upādhyupakārikāṇāṃ śaktīnāṃ yāḥ śaktayastadātmeti yāvat | śaktīnāntato vyatirekāt | "tadvattve"na upādhyupakāraśaktimattvena | "tadagrahā"dupādhimattvenāpyato vyarthaivopādhikalpaneti bhāvaḥ |

[137,1]

evantāvad yadopādhimati jñānaśabdayorvṛttistadokto doṣaḥ | yadopādhiṣveva tadānyo doṣo vaktavyaḥ | tadabhidhānāyopādhipakṣamupanyasyati | "yadi puna"rityādi | "kevalā"nityāśrayarahitān u"pādhī"n viśeṣaṇabhedān "śabdajñānānyupalīyera"n |
pratyāyakatvena samāśrayeyuḥ | tasyopādhimataḥ śabdajñānairasamāveśādaviṣayīkaraṇāt | "tatprati"pattimukhenopādhimatpratipattimukhena | ekenāpi śabdajñānena sarvasyopādheḥ pratipattiḥ |

[137,2]

atrāpi doṣamāha | "tadāpī"tyādi | tasyopādhimataḥ | "anākṣepā"dityapratipādanāt | "tatre"tyupādhimati | kathaṃ vyartha ityāha | "arthakriye"tyādi | arthakriyāṃ purodhāya pravṛtterarthakriyā "āśraya" ālambanaṃ yasya vyavahārasya sa tathā | "sarvo" yāvān kaścit prekṣāpūrvakāriṇāṃ "vyavahāro" hitāhitaviṣayaḥ | sa ca dvābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ"vidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ" tṛtīyaprakārābhāvāt | "itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇā "pāṇiniḥ ceyaṃ tṛtīyā | "upādhaya"śca gotvādaya"statrā"rthakriyāyāma"samarthāḥ | samartha"śca vyaktibhedaḥ śabdenai"vocyata iti kima"phalaiḥ "śabdaprayogaiḥ" | yataścaivamarthakriyāsamartho vyaktibhedo na cocyate śabdaiḥ | "tataś"cābhimatā u"pādhayo" gotvādaya "upādhayo" na syurna viśeṣaṇāni syuḥ | yasmāt "kvaci"dupādhimatyupādhidvāreṇa śabdasya jñānasya vā"pravṛttau" satyāṃ | "kasya"cidupādhimataḥ | "pradhānasye"ti viśeṣyasyā"ṅgābhāvād" viśeṣaṇabhāvāt "tadapekṣayā" pradhānāpekṣayā | "tathocya"nte | upādhaya ityucyante | iyaṃ nyāyopādhivyavasthā | yadā tūpādhaya eva śabdenocyante | tadā tasyopādhimataḥ"śabdenā'nākṣepāda"pratipādanānna "te" upādhayaḥ "kasyaci"t pradhānasyā"ṅgabhūtā iti kimupādhayo" naiveti yāvat | "yadyupā"dhimātraṃ codyate tathāpi śabdai"rlakṣitā" ye upādhayastairupādhimato "lakṣaṇāt" paricchedā"dadoṣaḥ" | śabdaprayogavaiyarthyadoṣo "neti cet" |
sa "samānaḥ" sarvopādhigrahaṇa"prasaṅgaḥ" | tamevāha | "sa tāvadi"tyādi | sa ityupādhimān | "nāntarīyakataye"tyupādhyupādhimatoravyabhicāreṇa "upalakṣyamāṇa ekenāpyupādhi"nā niraṅśatvāt "sarvātmanopalakṣita iti tadavasthaḥ" sarvopādhigraha"prasaṃgaḥ" |

[138,1]

syānmataṃ | yatra śabdena sākṣādupādhimataścodanantatrāyaṃ prasaṃgaḥ | na tu yatrārthavaśādityata āha | "ko hyatra viśeṣa" iti | "śabdā" vā "enamu"pādhimantaṃ sākṣāt pratipādayeyuḥ | "tallakṣi"tā vā śabdalakṣitā vopādhaya upādhimantaṃ "lakṣaye"yuriti ko viśeṣo na kaścit | tathā hi | "sa tā"vadupādhimān "tadā"nīmupādhibalena lakṣaṇakāle niścīyate | "sarvopakārakaḥ" sarveṣāmupādhīnāmupakāraka "iti" | tathā ca pūrvavat sarvopādhigrahaṇaprasaṃgo'to lakṣitalakṣaṇāditi yaduktame"tanna kiñcit"
pūrvoktadoṣaduṣṭatvāt | yasmādupādhyupakārikāṇāṃ śaktīnāmvyatireke'navasthā syādato na vyatiriktāḥ śaktayaḥ ||

[138,2]

"tasmādekasyo"pādheru"pakāra"ke tasminnupādhimati "grāhye"bhyupagamyamāne upādhyantarāṇā"mupakārakāḥ" śaktibhedāḥ | "tata" ekopādhyupakārakasvabhāvā"dapare"'nye "na" bhavanti"ye" dṛṣṭe "tasmi"nnupādhimatya"dṛṣṭā" bhavanti | kintvananye | ataḥ kāraṇāttadgrāhye |
tasyopādhimato grahe "saka"lopādhyupakāraka svabhāvasya "grahaḥ" |

[139,1]

yopi bha ṭṭo manyate | bhinnā bhinnā eva dharmāstenaikadharmeṇa dharmiṇyavadhāryamāṇena sarvadharmāvadhāraṇaṃ bhedāt | tadāha | "āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmakeṣvanuyāyi yat | taddharmi yatra vā jñānaṃ prāgdharmagrahaṇād bhavet || 152anantadharmake dharmiṇyekadharmāvadhāraṇe | śabdobhyupāyamātraṃ syānna tu sarvāvadhāraṇa 178 iti | "
sopyubhayapakṣabhāvidoṣaprasaṃgādeva nirastaḥ ||

[139,2]

"yadī"tyādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | ekena niścayajñānena sarvātmanā "gṛhītepi"
vastuni "bhrāntinivṛttyarthaṃ | anyadi"ti pramāṇāntaraṃ |

[139,3]

"syādeta"dityādinaitadeva vyācaṣṭe | "nirbhāgasya" niraṃśasya vastuno "grahaṇe" sati"konyo" bhāgaḥ "tadā" nirbhāgavastugrahaṇakāle | "na gṛhī"to nāma sarva eva gṛhītaḥ | "sa tu" gṛhītopi "bhrāntyā nāvadhāryata iti pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartta"te |

[139,4]

"yadyevami"tyādinā siddhāntavādī | yattad "bhrānti"nivṛttyarthamuttarampramāṇa"miṣyate""tadvyavacchedaviṣaya"manyāpohaviṣayaṃ "siddhaṃ" pūrvoktena nyāyena | "tadvadu"ttarapramāṇavat | "tata" uttarakālabhāvi pramāṇāda"parama"pi pūrvakālabhāviniścayajñānantadapi vyavacchedaviṣayaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "asamāropaviṣaye vṛtteḥ" |

[140,1]

"tattarhī"tyādinā ślokaṃ vyācaṣṭe | "anya"syākārasya yaḥ "samāropa"sta"dvyavacche"da"phalamiti" kṛtvā "siddhamanyāpohaviṣaya"mutpitsusamāropaniṣedhadvāreṇa | "tadvadanyadapi"
pūrvamapi niścayajñānamanyāpohaviṣayaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "avidyamānasamārope viṣaye vṛ"tteḥ | etadevāha | "yatrākāresya pratipatteḥ | iti" hetoḥ "samāropābhāve varttamānaḥ" paurastyo niścayo"nyāpohaviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ" ||

[140,2]

kiñca | niścayagṛhītepyarthe bhrāntinivṛttyarthaṃ pramāṇāntaramicchatā niścayaviṣayaśca na ca niścita ityabhyupagataṃ syād | anyathā bhrānterayogāt | taccāyuktamityāha | "api ce"tyādi | "yadrūpaṃ niścayairna niścīyate tadrūpante"ṣāṃ niścayānāṃ "viṣayaḥ kathannai"va | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | yasmā"diyameva niścayānāṃ svārthapratipattiryatta"syārthasya niścayanaṃ | "tacce"nniścayaviṣayābhimatamā"kārānta"ra"vadaniści"taṃ | yanniścayaviṣayatvenānabhimatantadvattairniścaye gṛhītaṃ ||

[140,3]

"kathamityā"di paraḥ | pratyakṣagṛhīte samāropavyavacchedārthaṃ pramāṇāntaramicchatā'nyāpohavādināpyaniścīyamāna ākāraḥ pratyakṣagṛhītatveneṣṭo yadi vā niścayavaśādeva grahaṇaṃ | "kathamidānīmaniścīyamānaṃ" rūpaṃ "pratyakṣeṇāpi gṛhīta"miti tulyaḥ prasaṃgaḥ |

[140,4]

"ne"tyādinā pariharati | kalpanāviviktatvādityabhiprāyaḥ | "tadi"ti pratyakṣaṃ | "yamapi" nīlādyākāraṅgṛ"hṇātī"tyucyate | "tad" grahaṇaṃ "na niścayena |
kintarhi | pratibhāsena" | niraṅśasya vastunaḥ sarvathā pratibhāsanamiti sarvathāgrahaṇaṃ | "tadi"ti tasmā"nna niścayāniścayavaśād" yathākramaṃ "pratyakṣasya grahaṇāgra"haṇe kiṃtu pratibhāsanāpratibhāsanavaśāt | tasmādaniścaye sati pratibhāsanamātreṇa pratyakṣagṛhītavyavasthāpananna virudhyate | "naivaṃ niścayānāṃ" pratyakṣavadaniścitasyāpyākārasya pratibhāsanamātreṇa grahaṇamapratibhāsamātreṇāgrahaṇamiti sambandhaḥ |
kasmāditi cedāha | "kiñcidi"tyādi | yathā puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣatva"nniścinva"to"pyanyatra"
taskarādāva"niścayena pravṛttibhedād" vyavahārabhedāt | tathā hi puruṣatvaniścayena puruṣonurūpo viśvāsādivyavahāro dṛśyate | cauratvāniścayācca tadanurūpo bhayādivyavahāro na dṛśyate | tataśca yanniścayānurūpaḥ pravṛttibhedastasya niścayena grahaṇaṃ | yadaniścayānurūpaścāpravṛttibhedastasyāgrahaṇamiti | "yata evantasmā"dityādi | "asye"tyākārasya | "anyathe"ti yadi niścayavaśāttasya grahaṇaṃ na vyavasthāpyate | "tadaikā"kārepi | niścitatvenābhimatepyākāre | "tadi"ti niścayena grahaṇaṃ"na syā"t |

[141,1]

"kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇa"miti paraḥ | "sarvato bhinna" iti sajātīyavijātīyādvyāvṛtteḥ | "tathaive"ti yathānubhavaṃ sarveṣveva bhedeṣu "na smārtto niścayo bhavati" | yato bhedāntarenyākāravyavacchedārthamanyāpohavādinā pramāṇāntaravṛttiriṣyate |

[141,2]

"sahakārivaikalyā"diti siddhāntavādī | na hyanubhavamātraniścayahetuḥ kintvabhyāsādayopi sahakāriṇaḥ | te yatraiva santi tatraivākāre niścayo nānyatra |

[141,3]

nanu kṣaṇikākārepi sarvadā darśanādabhyāsostyeveti niścayaḥ syāt | nānubhūtaniścitaviṣayotrābhyāsobhipreto na ca kṣaṇikaṃ bhrāntinimittasambhavādanubhūtaniścitamiti kathantatrābhyāsaḥ | tasmāt sthitametat yatraivākāre'bhyāsastatraiva niścaya iti ||

[141,4]

tadevāha | "tataśce"tyādi | "viśeṣe" sarvato vyāvṛtte nīlādilakṣaṇe | "aṅśavivarjite" nirvibhāge sarvātmanā "pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītepi" sati "ya"sya "viśeṣasyārvasā"ye niścaye"sti" sahakāri"pratyayaḥ sa pratīyate" niścīyate |

[142,1]

"yadyapītyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "sarvabhedeṣu" kṣaṇikatvādiṣu "tāvatetyanubhāvamātreṇa" |
niścayotpādanaṃpratyanubhavajñānasya "kāraṇantarāpekṣatvāt" | taṃdevāha "anubhavo hīt"yādi | "yathāvikalpābhyāsami"ti yasya yādṛśo vikalpābhyāsastena sahakāriṇā "janayatī"tyarthaḥ | udāharaṇamāha | "yathetyā"di | mṛtastrī"rūpadarśanāviśeṣepi"
parivrāṭkāmukaśunāṃ yathākramaṃ "kuṇapakāminībhakṣyavikalpā" yathāvikalpābhyāsañjāyante | na ca vikalpābhyāsa eva sahakārī | kintvanyopyastītyāha | "tatre"tyādi | tatrāpi rūpadarśanāviśeṣepi | "buddheḥ pāṭa"vantīkṣṇatā | yathā yogināṃ buddhipāṭavād darśanamātreṇa kṣaṇikatvādiniścayaḥ | ādiśabdādarthitvasāmarthyādiparigrahaḥ | "ityādaya" ityevamādayaḥ | "anubhavāt" pratyakṣādupādānakāraṇātsakāśād"bhedaniścayasyotpattau sahakāriṇaḥ" | yadā tarhi bahuṣu niścayeṣu yathoktāni kāraṇāni na bhavanti tadā teṣāṃ niścayānāṃ kathaṃ kramabhāva ityāha | "teṣāmeva" cetyādi |
teṣāmiti niścayakāraṇānāṃ"pratyāsa"ttitāratamyabhedāt | yasya niścayasya pratyāsannatamanniścayakāraṇantattāvadādāvutpadyate | "ādi"śabdādadhimātratāratamyasya bhedā nniścayānāṃ "paurvāparyaṃ | yathe"tyādinodāharaṇamāha | piteva yadopādhyāyo bhavati | tadaikasya puruṣasya ja"nakatvādhyāpakatvāviśeṣe"pi | "pitaramāyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitā me āgaccha" iti | pitṛtvaniścaye kāraṇasya pratyāsannatāmatvāt ||

[142,2]

nanu satyapi kṣaṇikatvanairātmyavikalpābhyāse sahakāriṇī tattvādārśināṃ naṃ pratyakṣāt kṣaṇikatvādiniścayo bhavatītyata āha | "sopī"tyādi | "asati bhrāntikāraṇe bhavati" na tu niścayapratyayamātrāt | yata evamasati bhrāntikāraṇe sahakāripratyasākalye ca sati pratyakṣānniścaya utpadyate na kevalāt | "tasmānnānubhūta" ityādi |

[143,1]

tataśca sthitametad | anyavyavacchedaḥ śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ pratipādyata iti |

[143,2]

nanu vyavacchedopi yadi padārthādabhinnastadaikena pramāṇena śabdena vāsya viṣayīkaraṇenyasya vaiyarthyaṃ syāt sarvātmanā niścitatvāt | atha bhinnastadāpi tasyāśritatvādekavyavacchedopādhike padārthe pramāṇenaikena niścīyamāne pūrvoktena nyāyena sarveṣāṃ vyavacchedānāṃ niścitatvādanyeṣāṃ pramāṇādīnāmapravṛttiḥ syād | ataḥ samānaḥ prasaṃga iti |

[143,3]

tanna | yato na bhāvānāmanyonyavyavacchedo'bhinno bhinno vā'sti | kevalaṃ svahetubhya eva bhinnāḥ samutpannā ityuktamvakṣyati ca ||

[143,4]

kathantarhyanyavyāvṛttirityādi vyapadeśo buddhiśca pravarttata ityatrāha | "tatrāpī"tyādi | "tatrā"pi canyāpohe śabdārthe | "anya"smād "vyāvṛttiranya"smād "vyāvṛ"ttoya"mityapi" | ye "śabdā" dharmadharmivacanāḥ "niścayā"ścobhayaviṣayāste "saṃketamanurundhate" |
saṃketānuvidhānenaiṣāṃ dharmadharmiviṣayavibhāgaḥ kalpitaḥ paramārthatastu vyāvṛttireva nāstītyarthaḥ |

[143,5]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "tatrānyāpoha" ityādinā goraśvād "vyāvṛttiranyā" dharmabhūtā "anya"
evāśvād "vyāvṛtto dharmī" | vyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭo gaurityeta"nnāsti" | kintu yaiva vyāvṛttiḥ sa eva vyāvṛtta iti vakṣyati |

[143,6]

yadi cāśvād vyāvṛttiranaśvatā godravyasyānyā syāt tadāśvavyāvṛtterapi godravyeṇa nivarttitavyambhedāt | tataśca "tadvyāvṛtterana"śvatāyāḥ sakāśā"nnivarttamā"nasya gostad"bhāvaprasaṅgāt" | aśvabhāvaprasaṅgādaśvavat | evaṃ hyaśvavyāvṛtteranaśvatvalakṣaṇāyā gaurvyāvṛtto bhavati yadyasyāśvatvaṃ syāt | "tathā" ca goraśvabhāvāpatteḥ |
aśvād go"rvyāvṛtti"stasyā "abhā"vaḥ | gavāśvayorekatvāt |

[143,7]

tena yaduktañjainajaiminīyaiḥ |

[143,8]

"sarvātmakamekaṃ syādanyāpohavyatikrama iti | "

[143,9]

tānpratīdamuktaṃ | yadyanyavyāvṛttirarthāntaraṃ syād gavāśvādīnāmekatvaṃ syāditi |

[144,1]

nāpi gorabhinnāśvavyāvṝttiraśvavyāvṛttau gaurityapratītiprasaṃgāt | govināśe cāśvasyotpattiprasaṅgādaśvanivṛttervinaṣṭatvāt | tasmānnāstyeva vyāvṛttiḥ |

[144,2]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭo dyo ta ka rā bhyāṃ | "yoyamagopohaḥ sa kiṃ gavi bhinne'rtho bhinnaḥ | yadi bhinnaḥ kimāśrito'thānāśritaḥ | yadyāśritastadāśritatvād guṇa iti gośabdena tadā guṇyabhidhīyate na godravyamiti | gaustiṣṭhatīti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt | athānāśritaḥ kenārthena ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ | gorapoha iti | athābhinno gaureva syāditi na kiñcidaniṣṭhaṃ | ayaṃ cāpohaḥ prativastu yadyekonekasambandhī ca tadeva gotvami" ti |

[144,3]

tannirastaṃ | anyavyāvṛtterevābhāvāt kevalaṃ svahetutaḥ svakīyena rūpeṇotpanno bhāvonyasmād vyāvṛttastasya cānyasmād vyāvṛttiḥ kalpyate | yataśca na paramārthato vyāvṛttirasti | "tasmād yaiva vyāvṛttiḥ sa eva vyāvṛttaḥ" | dvābhyāmaikasyaiva viṣayīkaraṇāt | tasyaiva cānyavyāvṛttasya liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ sambandho vikalpaviṣayatvañca | vikalpo hyanyavyāvṝttaṃ svākārābhinnamadhyasya puruṣantatra pravarttayatītyatyarthakāritvād | ataḥ sa eva bāhyaḥ śabdārthonyavyāvṛttaḥ |

[144,4]

yadapyucyate ku mā ri le na | kadācidekasmādeva bhāvasyāpohaḥ syāt |
sarvāsmādvā | yadyekasmādeva tadā yathāśvāpohadvāreṇa godravyasya gaurityabhidhānanantathā siṃhāderapi syād aśvāpohasya gośabdapravṛttinimittasya bhāvāt | tadāha |

[144,5]

"tatośvāpoharūpatvāt siṃhādiḥ sarva eva te | tannimittamagopohaṃ vibhraducyeta gauritī ti | "

[144,6]

atha sarvasmādapoho godravyasya | tatrāpi yadi pratyekamapohyaṃ aśvādayastadāpohyānāmānantyādapoha eva na sidhyet | apohyānāṃ ca bhinnatvādapohabhedaḥ prasajyate | tathā caikasminnapi piṇḍe jātibahutvājjātyantarabuddhiḥ syāt | jātyantareṣvivāśvādiṣu |

[144,7]

"tato gauriti sāmānyaṃ vācyamekaṃ na sidhyati | "

[144,8]

nāpi te samudāyarūpeṇa sarve'pohyāḥ sambhavanti | samudāyo hyekadeśatvena vā syānna cāpohyānāmekadeśāditvaṃ sambhavati | nāpi teṣāṃ samudāyo vyatirikto'styavyatireke cānantyaṃ tadavasthaṃ | na cāpi sāmānyarūpeṇa te'pohyāḥ sāmānyasyāvastutvāt | apohyatve ca vastutvaṃ syāditi |

[145,1]

tadayuktaṃ yataḥ | sarvabhāvānāṃ svenaiva svenaiva rūpeṇotpadyamānānāṃ sarvasmādapohaḥ svahetubhyaḥ siddha eva |

[145,2]

atha kathamasau jñāyata iti codyate | tatkiṅgauratītānāgatavarttamānā'rśvādisvabhāvaḥ pratyakṣe pratibhāsate | neti cet | kathaṃ na tatra sarvāpohaḥ pratyakṣasiddhaḥ |
na hi pramāṇaṃ hastābhyāṅgṛhītvānyadapohatyapi tu niyatarūpārthaprakāśanamevāsyānyāpohaṃ | tasmānniyatarūpārthapratibhāsa eva pratyakṣasya sarvasmādapohagrahaḥ | tacca svaviṣayanniścāyayad yadevaṃ na bhavati tatsarvamanyatvena niścāyayatyato yugapatsarvasyānyasya sāmānyenāviśeṣeṇa niṣedhaḥ kriyate | sāmānyasyānirddhāritaviśeṣarūpatvāt | taduktam |

[145,3]

"atadrūpaparāvṛttavastumātraprasādhanāt | sāmānyaviṣayaṃ proktaṃ liṅgabhedāpratiṣṭhiteriti | pra0 sa0"(pava.2.144)

[145,4]

tenāpohyasya kasyacid vastutvamiṣyata eva |

[145,5]

na cāpohyatvād vastutvamityatra kiñcid pramāṇamastyabhāvasyāpyapohyatvānna cāsya vastutvamityuktaṃ | tasmād yugapat sarvāpohalakṣaṇenāgopohenaikasminnapi piṇḍe gotvaṃ | pratyekāśvādyapohenānaśvatvāsiṃhatvāmahiṣatvādayo jātibhedāḥ kalpitāstaddvāreṇa ca tadabhidhāyakāḥ pravarttanta iti yatkiñcidetat |

[145,6]

yadi vyavṛttivyāvṛttā'bhidheyārthasya na bhedaḥ | kathaṃ vyāvṛttivyāvṛtta iti śabdajñānabhedaḥ | tathā hi vyāvṛttirityanyaḥ śabdo vyāvṛtta ityanya eva śabdaḥ |
tathā jñānabhedopi | vyāvṛttirityukte dharmamātrampratīyate | vyāvṛtta iti dharmīti |
tata āha | "śabde"tyādi | śabdād dharmadharmivācino yā pratītiḥ sā śabdapratipattiḥ |
śabdaśca "śabdapratipatti"śceti virūpaikaśeṣaḥ | śabda"bhedaḥ" śabdācca yā pratipattistasyābheda ityarthaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhikaraṇaṃ "saṃke"tastasya "bhedā"t | saṃketabhedaṃ cānantarameva1 | 63"bhedāntarapratikṣe"petyādinā pratipādayiṣyate | "na vācyabhedosti" dharmadharmiśabdayorvastuta ityadhyāhāraḥ ||

[145,7]

"nanu cetyādi" paraḥ | kiṃ punarvācyāviśeṣe "saṃketabhedo na yukta" iti cedāha | "dvayori"tyādi | karttari ceyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī | "karttṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛtīti"" ubhayaprāptau karmaṇīti"niyamasya śeṣe vibhāṣeti vikalpanāt | dvābhyāṃ dharmadharmiśabdābhyā"meka"syārthasyā"bhidhānā"dityarthaḥ | ekaṃ ced dvābhyāmabhidheyantato vyarthaḥ saṃketaḥ | "tathā ce"ti dharmadharmiṇorabhede "vyatirekiṇyā" iti vyatirekābhidhāyinyāṃ gorgotvamiti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ | "tasyā" iti vyatirekavibhakte"rbhedāśrayatvād vastubhedamāśri"tya pravṛtteḥ | yathā devadattasya kamaṇḍaluriti | evaṃ saṃketābhāve vyatirekavibhaktyabhāve ca codite |

[146,1]

vibhaktyabhāvadoṣantāvatpariharannāha | "dvayo"rityādi | dharmadharmivācinoḥ śabdayo"reka"syārthasyā"bhidhānepi vibhaktirvyatirekiṇī" | vyatirekasya vācikā ṣaṣṭhī | iva śabdo bhinnakramaḥ | "bhinnamivārthamanveti" darśayati | "vācye" saṃketabhedakṛtena "le"śena mātrayā yo "viśeṣasta"taḥ kāraṇānna tu paramārthato vastubhedāt |

[146,2]

yadvyācaṣṭe | "na vai śabdānāmi"tyādinā | "viṣayasvabhāvāyatte"ti bāhyasvalakṣaṇāyattā | kiṃ kāraṇam | "icchātaḥ" puruṣecchāvaśāda"bhāveṣvapi" vṛttyabhāva"prasaṅgāt | ta" iti | icchāpratibaddhavṛttayaḥ śabdā "yathā" yena prakāreṇa bhedapratipādanena vyatirikte yathā rājñaḥ puruṣa iti | avyatirikte yathātmaiva hyātmano draṣṭeti | "tathā niyuktā" ityabhinnepyarthe bhedamivopādāya prayuktā"stamarthama"pratibandhena "bhinnamiva prakāśaya"nti | vastutaḥ svalakṣaṇasyābhedepi yata evantena kāraṇena | "gauriti" dharmivācinamāha | "gotva"miti dharmavācinaṃ | ābhyā"mekābhidhāne"pyagovyāvṛttasya gorabhidhānepi "kasyacid" viṣayasya "pratyāyanārtha"miti | agovyāvṛttinimittasya gotvasya prakāśanārthaṃ | agovyāvṛttimātraṃ gotvaśabdena pratipādyamityevaṃkṛte saṃkete bhede | vyatiriktārthā na vibhaktirasya gotvamiti bhavati ṣaṣṭhī | vyatirikto'rthosyā iti vigrahaḥ | dharmiṇassakāśād dharmama"rthāntaramivādarśayantī pratibhāti | ana"pītyavyatiriktepi dharme | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tathā prayogadarśanābhyāsāt" |
vastubhede sati ṣaṣṭhyāḥ prayogadarśanābhyāsād devadattasya kamaṇḍalurityādau |

[147,1]

etaduktambhavati | vastubhinnambhavatu mā vā bhūt sarvathā vyatirekavibhaktiricchāmātrānurodhinī kevalaṃ prayogadarśanābhyāsācchabdārthambhinnamiva darśayatīti | "tāvate"ti vibhaktiprayogamātrāt | "sarvatre"tyarthābhedepi | gaurgotvamityādau na dharmadharmiṇoḥ paramārthato "bhedaḥ" | tasmā"danyatrā"pyarthābhedepi "puruṣecchāvaśāt pravṛttasya"
vyatirekābhidhāyinaḥ śabdasya "pratibandhābhāvāt" | dṛṣṭā ca puruṣecchāvaśācchabdānāṃ pravṛttirasatyapi tathābhūte bāhye vācya ityāha | "yathetyā"di | "ekam"vastu"kvaci"t prakaraṇe "ekavacane"na "khyāpya"te | yathā tvamiti | "tadaviśeṣepi" ekatvāviśeṣepi tadeva vastu "bahuvacanena" yūyamiti | ataścaikasminnapi bahuvacanadarśanānna yathāvastu śabdānāmpravṛttiriti gamyate | yuṣmadi gurāvekeṣāmityatideśavākyād ekasminnapi bahuvacanamiti cet | cintyametat | kimatideśavākyeṃnaikasya bahutvaṃ kriyate kimvā bahuvacanamātramaprāptaṃ vidhīyata iti | na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣo vacanamātreṇa vastūnāmvidhānāsambhavāt | dvitīyepi pakṣe siddhaivecchāmātreṇa śabdānāṃ pravṛttiriti | evantāvadvibhaktyabhāvadoṣaḥ parihṛtaḥ |

[147,2]

saṃketābhāvadoṣantu pariharttuntamevopanyasyati | "prayojanābhāvā"t tvityādi |
dharmidharmaśabdābhyāmekasyābhidhānāt prayojanābhāvaḥ | "tadapi" prayojanama"stye"va |
gotvāpekṣayā "bhedānta"rāṇi dravyatvapārthivatvādīni | "teṣāṃ" pratikṣepo'svīkāraḥ |
tau "pratikṣepāpratikṣepau" yathākramantayo"rdvayo"ddharmadharmivācinoḥ śabdayoryaḥ "saṃketabheda"stasya | kimviśiṣṭasya "jñātṛvāñchānurodhinaḥ" pratipattricchānuvidhāyinaḥ padaṃ prayojanaṃ ||

[147,3]

etaduktambhavati | yadānyavyāvattarūpanirākāṅkṣaḥ pratipattāśvādevaikasmādvyāvṛttaṃ gopiṇḍaṃ jijñāsate tadā yāvadaśvād vyāvṛttimarthāntarabhūtāmāropya tathaiva saṃketapūrvakaṃ laukikena dharmavācakena śabdena na kathayati | tāvanna parasya jijñāsitorthaḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyate | atastaṃ pratyanaśvatvamasyetyucyate | evaṃ hi dharmiṇo'prādhānyādanyavyāvṛttarūpānākṣepaḥ kṛto bhavatyaśvādevaikasmād vyāvṛttiśca |
na tadaivamucyate'naśva ityanena hyanyavyāvṛttasyāpi rūpasyākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt |
na caivampareṇa jijñāsitamajijñāsitaṃ ca kathayan kathannonmattaḥ syāt |

[148,1]

yadā punaranyavyāvṛttarūpasākāṃkṣe'śvād vyāvṛttaṃ gopiṇḍaṃ jijñāsate | tadāpi yāvadaśvavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭaṃ piṇḍaṃ dharmisvabhāvatayā'ropya tathaiva saṃketapūrvakaṃ laukikena dharmivācakena na kathayati tāvanna parasya jijñāsitorthaḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyate' tastaṃ pratyanaśvoyamityucyate | evaṃ hi dharmiṇaḥ prādhānyādanyavyāvṛttarūpākṣepaḥ kṛto bhavatyaśvavyāvṛttaśca gopiṇḍaḥ kathito bhavati | na tadaivaṃ khyāpyate'naśvatvamasyeti parajijñāsitānyavyāvṛttarūpānākṣepaprasaṅgāt | ajijñāsitaṃ cārthaṃ kathayan kathannonmattaḥ | sarvaśca śābdo vyavahāraḥ saṃketapūrvakaḥ saṃketaśca vikalpakalpitārthapūrvaka eveti vikalpairapyanenaiva dvāreṇa dharmadharmibhāvapratītiryuktā |

[148,2]

tena yaducyate | bhavatu dharmadharmivācakānāṃ bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepārthapravṛttiḥ | dharmidharmavikalpānāntu kathaṃ pratipattirityapāstaṃ |

[148,3]

etadeva vṛttyā spaṣṭayannāha | "yadāya"mityādi | "pratipatte"ti śrotā | tasmād aśvādyo'"nyo" mahiṣādistasmād "vyavacche"do mahiṣādivyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvastasya "bhāvānapekṣaḥ" sattānapekṣaḥ | "piṇḍaviśe"ṣe gavi | "aśvavyavacchedamātraṃ jijñāsate" | kimasyāśvād vyāvṛttaṃ rūpamastīti | "tathābhūtajñāpanārtha"miti yathā pratipattrā jñātumiṣṭantadanurodhena tathābhūtasyāśvād bhedamātrasya jñāpanārthanta"thākṛtasaṃke"tenetyaśvavyavacchedamātre pratikṣiptabhedāntare kṛtasaṃketenānaśvatvaṃ "śabdena prabodhyate" prakāśyate'naśvatvamasya piṇḍasyāstīti | aśvādyo vyavacchedastadapekṣayā mahiṣādibhyo vyāvṛttayor"vyavacchedānta"rāṇi | teṣvani"rākāṃ"kṣaḥ pratipattā | "tami"ti piṇḍaṃ |
apratikṣiptabhedāntareṇāśvavyavacchedena yuktaṅ godravyaṃ jñātumicchatīti yāvat |
aparityaktāni mahiṣādivyavacchedāntarāṇi yena | tasminna"parityaktabhedāntare" |
tatraiva vāśvavyavacchede | dharmivācinaṃ śabdaṃ "prayuñjate" vaktāro'"naśvoyamiti" |
kathaṃ prayuñjata ityāha | "tathā prakāśanāye"ti | apratikṣiptabhedāntarasyāśvavyavavacchedasya prakāśanāya | "apratikṣiptabhedānta"ramevāśvavyavacchedantathā prakāśanāyetyanye paṭhanti | tadāpyayamarthaḥ | apratikṣiptabhedāntarantamevāśvavyavacchedamaśvavyāvṛttirūpaṃ prayuñjate abhidadhatyanaśvoyamityanena dharmivacanena śabdena | kimartham | tathāprakāśanāyāpratikṣiptabhedāntarasya prakāśanāyeti | yenaiva dharmavācī śabdaḥ pratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ | "ata eva pūrva"treti dharmavācini śabde "pratikṣiptambhedāntaraṃ" yeneti | sāmānyenānyapadārthaṃ kṛtvā bhāvapratyayaḥ karttavyaḥ | paścā"cchabdavṛtterit"yanena sambandhaḥ | anyathā pratikṣiptaṃ bhedāntaratvāditi syāt | evamanyatrāpyevaṃjātīyeṣu śabdeṣu vyutpattirdraṣṭavyā |

[149,1]

bhinnanimittayoḥ śabdayorekasminnadhikaraṇe vṛttiḥ "sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ | viśeṣ"ya"viśeṣaṇabhāvo" vyavacchedyavyavacchedakabhāvaḥ | udāharaṇaṅ "gotvamasya śuklamiti" |
guṇaśabdasyābhidheyavalliṅgavattvena napuṃsakatvaṃ | śukla ityanye paṭhanti | evaṃ cācakṣate | guṇaśabdo hi pratikṣiptabhedāntareṇa guṇamātre varttamāna upātto guṇamātravṛttīnāṃ śuklādiśabdānāṃ pulliṅgatvaṃ | tadvati tu varttamānānāmabhidheyavalliṅgatā | evaṃ cānayorddharmamātravṛttyorna sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nāpi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti |

[149,2]

kasmānna sāmānādhikaraṇyamityāha | "tanmātre"tyādi | etatkathayati buddhipratibhāsinyevārthasāmānādhikaraṇyādi | na bāhye svalakṣaṇe tasyāvācyatvāt | kevalamadhyavasāyād bāhyepyucyate | yadi ca dharmadvayayuktaikadharmipratibhāsinī śabdadvayajanitā buddhirekārthotpadyeta bhavetsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ | iha tu "tanmātraviśeṣeṇa" pratikṣiptabhedāntareṇa gotvamātraviśeṣaṇoparaktāyā "buddhestadāśrayabhūtāyā"
iti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāśrayabhūtāyā "ekatve"na dharmyabhedenā"pratibhāsanāt" | gotvaśuklatvābhyāṃ yuktamekandharmiṇaṃ gṛhītvā buddherapratibhāsanādityarthaḥ |

[149,3]

yadvā tadāśrayabhūtāyā iti tadeva gotvamāśrayabhūtaṃ yasyāstasyā buddhestanmātraviśeṣeṇa pratikṣiptadharmāntareṇa gotvamātreṇa viśeṣeṇa saha gopiṇḍasyaikatvenāpratibhāsanāt | tathā hyasya gotvamiti prayoge niṣkṛṣṭarūpaṃ dharmaṃ pratiyatībuddhirutpadyate | tato na sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti | dharmāntarapratikṣepādeva tadanyeṣu bhedeṣu "nirākāṃkṣatvā"cca buddherna viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ |

[150,1]

"dvitīye tu" dharmivāciśabdapakṣe "bhavati" sāmānādhikaraṇyamviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vā śuklo gauriti | sāmānādhikaraṇye kāraṇamāha | "tathe"tyādi | "tathā saṃketānusāreṇe"tyapratikṣiptabhedāntare vastuni dharmiśabdasya saṃketānusāreṇa hetunā | ekasmin dharmiṇi yojanaṃ saṃhāraḥ | vyavacchedahetukā dharmā vyavacchedadharmāḥ saṃhṛtāśca te "sakalavyavacchedadharmāśce"ti karmadhārayaḥ | "tai"rdharmaiḥ karaṇabhūtai"rvibhāgavataḥ" | vibhaktānekadharmavato dharmi"ṇa ekasyeva" śabda"sandarśanena" pradarśanena buddheḥ "pratibhāsanāt" | anekadharmavantandharmiṇamekamiva sandarśayantī buddhiḥ pratibhāsata iti yāvat | na tu buddhipratibhāsasandarśito dharmī vastuta ekaḥ | vikalpanirmitasya dharmadharmivibhāgasyālīkatvāt | "ekasyaive"tyapi paṭhanti | tatrāpi pratipattradhyavasāyavaśādeva yuktamiti boddhavyaṃ | tataḥ siddhaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ | yataśca bhedāntarāpratikṣepeṇa dharmmiśabdaḥ pravṛttastata eva tajjanitāyā buddherapratikṣiptabhedā"ntarāpekṣatvād"
bhavati viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo yad gauḥ śuklo nīlo veti | caśabdaśca pūrvavadatītahetvapekṣaḥ ||

[150,2]

idameva vyāpakaṃ sarvavyavahārasya nāparasparaparikalpita sāmānyaguṇādikāntasya pramāṇabādhitatvādityāha | "bhedoyameve"tyādi | "dravyabhāvābhidhāyinoḥ śabdayora" dharmāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇaḥ | sarvatreti | sāmānyasāmānyavati |
guṇaguṇavati | kriyākriyāvati | sarvasmin viṣaye dharmivacano dravyābhidhāryā |
dharmavacano bhāvābhidhāyī | yata eva"ntena" kāraṇena na "tayo"rdravyabhāva"śabdayorvācye viśeṣaḥ" paramārthataḥ "kaścanā"sti |

[150,3]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "tasmā"dityādi | "niścayapratyayaviṣayatvena" karaṇena | "na kaścidviśeṣaḥ" | tathā hi yathā gotvamityukte tatraivāgovyavacchede niścayastathā gaurityukte yadyapyapratikṣiptabhedāntarasyāgovyavacchinnasyābhidhānantathāpyagovyavacchedamātre niścayonyeṣāntu bhedānāmapratikṣepamātraṃ | sa eva ca śabdārtho yatra śābdo niścayo bhavatīti nāsti bhāvadravyābhidhāyinoḥ śabdayorvācye viśeṣo bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepamātrantu bhidyate | tadevāha | "ekastame"vetyādi | eka iti dharmaśabdastamityagovyavacchinnaṃ | "pratikṣiptaṃ bhedāntaraṃ" yena dharmaśabdena sa tathoktaḥ | "anya" iti dharmiśabdo'"pratikṣepeṇa" tameva piṇḍaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena "gamayatīti" nāsti dravyaniścayamprati "bhedaḥ" pratikṣepāpratikṣepamātrantu bhidyate | evaṃ gamanandevadattasya gacchati devadatta iti na kaścana bheda ityanyatrāpyevaṃ yojyaṃ ||

[151,1]

yāpi jātiguṇakriyāsambandhabhedena catuṣṭhayī śabdānāṃ vṛttiḥ sāpyanenaiva vastugatadharmabhedena saṃgṛhītetyāha | "jijñāpayiṣu"rityādi | jñāpayitumicchura"rthanta"mbhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇaṃ | "taddhitena" taddhitapratyayāntena | "kṛtāpi vā" | kṛtsaṃjñakapratyayāntena vā | "anyena vā" kṛttaddhitavyatiriktena tiṅntenā'vyutpannena vā śabdena śuklādinā "yadi brūyāt | tato" bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇād viśeṣā"daparo bhedo nāsti" |

[151,2]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "etāvantami"tyādinā | etāvantamiti pratikṣiptabhedāntaralakṣaṇaṃ |
kṛtāpi vā | "darśaye"diti sambandhaḥ |

[151,3]

yadā vādhiśrayaṇādikriyāyāṃ karttṛsthāyāmpacirvarttate | tatraiva ca ghañ pratyayastadā pācakatvaśabdena kriyākārakayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyobhidhīyata iti pācakatvaśabdena samānārthaḥ pākaśabdaḥ | dvāvapyetau pratikṣiptabhedāntaramapācakavyavacchinnamarthaṃ pratipādayataḥ | yadā tu karmasthaiva kriyā vikḷttiḥ pacerarthastadā pācakatvaśabdasya kathaṃ sambandhābhidhāyitvaṃ | pācakatvapākayorbhinnārthatvāt ||
anyena vā kṛttaddhitavyatiriktena tiṅādinā | "tathābhūtajñāpanāya" | pratikṣiptabhedāntarajñāpanāya svayaṃ kṛtena samayena darśayediti sambandhaḥ | yathā devadattena śayyate paṭasya śuklatvamiti | atrāpi śāyakaśabdasya ya evārthaḥ sa eva pratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ |
śayyata ityasyāpi | tathā śuklaḥ paṭa iti ya evāśuklavyavacchinno pratikṣiptabhedāntarorthaḥ sa eva pratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ paṭasya śukla ityasyāpi | "tathābhidhāna"ṇeti pratikṣiptāpratikṣiptabhedāntarasyaikadharmigatasya vyavacchedasyābhidhānamātreṇa tadeva vastva"rthāntarameva" paramārthato dharmadharmirūpeṇa vibhaktameva | na punarbhavatīti sambandhaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | tathābhūtasyaiva pratikṣiptāpratikṣiptabhedāntarasyaivaikasya jñāpanāya dharmadharmiśabdasya kṛtasaṃketatvāt |

[152,1]

yadvā "tathābhidhānamātreṇe"ti | arthāntarabhūtadharmābhidhānamātreṇa taddharmasvarūpamparamārthato"rthāntarameva bhavati | tathābhūtas"yaiva bhedāntaranirapekṣasyaiva tasyaikavyāvṛttasya "jñāpanāya" dharma"śabdasya kṛtasaṃketatvāt" ||

[152,2]

"nanu ce"tyādi paraḥ | "sambandha" ucyata iti pākakriyāyāḥ pācakasya ca karttuḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ | tathā hi kṛdantād bhāvapratyayaḥ sambandhasyābhidhāyako dṛṣṭo yathāha | samāsakṛttaddhiteṣu sambandhābhidhānamiti | kṛdantaśca pācakaśabdaḥ | na pāka eva kriyātmakaḥ pācakatvaśabdenocyate |

[152,3]

etaduktambhavati | anyaiva karttṛvyatiriktā kriyānyaśca tayośca sambandhonya eva | tataśca karttṛsthakriyābhidhāne satyapi pacaterna pākapācakatvaśabdayostulyortha iti | "na vai pākene"tyādinā pariharati | "pākena" kartṛsthe na vastubhūtena vyāpāreṇa yukto"nya eva" pākakriyā vyatiriktaḥ "pācako" nāma karttā"bhidhīyate"
pācakaśabdena | yādṛśo varṇṇyate vai śe ṣi kā dibhiḥ kriyā vyatiriktaḥ svatantraḥ kartā yatra kriyākārakasambandho vastubhūtaḥ syāt | tasya svatantrasya karttuḥ kriyāvyatiriktasya niṣetsyamānatvāt | na ced vyatiriktā kriyā karttā vā kutassambandhaḥ yasya bhāvapratyayenābhidhānamiti bhāvaḥ | "yatpunarasye"ti pācakaśabdasyāsyā"bhidhe"yamapācake vyavacchinnamapratikṣiptabhedāntaraṃ vastumātrantadeva pācakaśabdā"bhidhe"yaṃ pā"cakatvenāpyabhi"dhīyata ityadhyāhāryaḥ | tasyaiva pratikṣiptabhedāntarasyābhidhānāt | na tu sambandhobhidhīyate | tasyāsattvāt | tadeva yathoktaṃ pācakaśabdābhidheyaṃ pākaśabdenāpītyapiśabdāt |

[153,1]

aparaṃ vyākhyānaṃ | "na vai pākene"ti pākaśabdenānyāpohavādipakṣe "anya" eva vyatiriktaḥ kriyāśrayabhūtaḥ "pācako"bhidhīyate | yādṛśo varṇṇyate pareṇa | yaḥ kriyākārakasambandhasyāśrayaḥ syāt | tasyāsiddhatvāt | kintvapācakavyāvṛttirbhedāntarapratikṣepeṇābhidhīyate | tadevāha | "yatpunari"tyādi | yadityapācakavyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ pratikṣiptabhedāntaramabhidheyaṃ | "asye"ti pākaśabdasyānantarameva darśitaṃ tadeva pākaśabdābhidheyampā"caka"tvaśabdenāpya"bhidhīyate" | na sambandhaḥ | tasyāsiddhatvāt | "apratiṣṭhi"tairavastubalāyātairata eva "mithyāvikalpāḥ" ||

[153,2]

kathampunargamyate kriyā vyatiriktā nāsti tatsamavāyo vetyata āha | "yathe"tyādi | "tatsamavāyo" veti kriyākārakasamavāyaḥ | yataśca vyāvṛttivyāvṛttimatorabhedastena kāraṇenā"nyāpo"ha"viṣayo" jātimān śabdairabhidhīyata iti | tadvatpakṣastatra yo doṣaḥ sonyāpohepi syāditi "tadvatpakṣopavarṇṇṇanaṃ pratyākhyā"taṃ |
yasmāt "pṛthakatve hi jātitadvato"rabhyupagamyamāne "syāt" tadvatpakṣodito "doṣaḥ" |

[153,3]

"tadviśiṣṭa"syetyanyāpohaviśiṣṭas"yārthasya śabdaira"bhidhānāt "tadvatpakṣodita" iti tadvatpakṣe ya uktaḥ | yathā kila sāmānyamabhidhāya tadvati varttamānaḥ śabdo'svatantraḥ syāttataśca śabdapravṛttinimittabhūtena sāmānyena vaśīkṛtasya śabdasya vyaktigataparasparabhedānākṣepāttaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt | upacaritā ca tadvati śabdapravṛttirityādiko doṣa ityevaṃ vyāvṛttimabhidhāya tadvati varttamānosvatantro dhvaniriti "sarvaḥ prasaṃgaḥ syāt | tadapi" tadvatpakṣopavarṇṇanaṃ | "anene"ti vyāvṛttivyāvṛttimatorananyatvena"prativyūḍhaṃ" pratyākhyātaṃ | yasmāt "tatra hi" tadvatpakṣe | "arthāntaramupādā"yeti vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyamupādāyānyatrārthāntare tadvati | sākṣāt sāmānyavato'nabhidhānādasvātantryaṃ | ādiśabdādasamānādhikaraṇyopacāradoṣaparigrahaḥ |

[153,4]

anyāpohapakṣe tu vyāvṛttivyāvṛttimatoraikyānnārthāntaramupādāyārthāntare śabdapravṛttistato nāstyasvāta"ntryā"didoṣa ityāha | "na ce"tyādi | "anyasmād"
vastunoryā vyā"vṛttiḥ" sā "vyāvṛttānnānyā | dvayo"rdharmadharmivācinoḥ śabdayo"rekasya"
vyāvṛttibhedasyā"bhidhānādityukta"manantarameva |

[154,1]

"katha"mityādi paraḥ | "idānī"miti vyāvṛttitadvatoraikye | "ekasya vyāvṛttasya"
svalakṣaṇasyā"nanugamā"t | arthāntarāsaṃsargāt | kathantasya svalakṣaṇasyātmabhūtā"vyāvṛttiḥ" svalakṣaṇavadananvayinī "sāmānyaṃ" syāt | naiva | dṛṣṭā ca sāmānyaṃ |

[154,2]

"tadbuddhā"vityādinā siddhāntavādī | sāmānyabuddhau vikalpikāyāṃ "tathai"kākāreṇa"pratibhāsanāde"kākāra eva vyāvartyateneneti vyāvṛttiḥ | sāmānyamucyate | etadāha | na vyāvṛtteṣu svalakṣaṇeṣvātmabhūtā vyāvṛttirekā sāmānyaṃ kevalaṃ vyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇānubhavottarakālabhāvī vikalpaḥ prakṛtyā | ekakāryeṣu bhāveṣvekamākāramādarśayannivotpadyate | tadvikalpavaśāt sāmānyamāsthīyate | niḥsāmānyeṣvapyanena ca sākṣācchabdādiviṣayo darśitaḥ |

[154,3]

etadeva sphuṭayannāha | "na vai kiṃci"dityādi | vastubhūtamityabhiprāyaḥ | kathantarhi sāmānyasāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahāra ityāha | "śabde"tyādi | "śabda āśrayaḥ" sahakārikāraṇatvena yasyāḥ sā vikalpikā "buddhiranādivāsanāsāmarthyāt | dharmānasaṃsṛṣṭānapi saṃsṛjantī" ekākārāniva kurvāṇā "jāyate" | tasyā buddherekā"kārapratibhāsavaśena sāmānyaṃ" | dharmadvayayuktaikadharmipratibhāsavaśena "sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca vyavasthāpyate" | ayaṃ ca sāmānyādivyavahāro'sadvyāpi vyavasthāpyate | kathamasadartha ityāha | "arthānāmityā"di | svalakṣaṇāṃnāṃ saṃsargābhāvāt sāmānyavyavahāro'sadarthaḥ | "ekasya ca" svalakṣaṇasya "bhedābhāvāt" sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahārosadarthaḥ |

[154,4]

nanu virūpatayā'yaṃ sarvavyavahāraḥ pravṛtta iti kathamanyāpohaviṣaya ityata "āha |
tasya sarvasya" sāmānyādivyavahārasyārthāḥ "samāśra"ya ityanena sambandhaḥ | "tatkāryantacca"manurūpaṃ yeṣānteṣāmbhāva"stayā" | karaṇabhūtayā | "anyebhya" ityatatkāryakāraṇebhyo"bhidyamānā arthāḥ" sarvasya sāmānyādivyavahārasyā"śrayo bhava"ntyataḥ kāraṇād anyāpohaviṣaya uktaḥ | na tvanyāpohastatra pratibhāsate bāhyasyaivaikākārasya vidhirūpatayā pratibhāsanāt | yasmācca niścayaprayuktaḥ puruṣamaniṣṭaparihāreṇā"niṣṭād vyāvṛtte" svalakṣaṇe "pravartta"yatya"topi" kāraṇād "anyāpohaviṣaya ukto" na tu pratibhāsāpekṣo vidheḥ pratibhāsanāt |

[155,1]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭo dyo ta kā rābhyāṃ | gośabdasyārthaḥ kimbhāvothābhāvaḥ |
yadi bhāvo kiṃ gaurathāgauḥ | yadi gaurnāsti vivādaḥ | athāgaurgośabdasyāgaurartha iti atiśabdakauśalaṃ | athābhāvastadayuktaṃ | na hi gośabdaśravaṇādabhāve preṣyasaṃpratipattiḥ | śabdārthaśca pratipattyā pratīyate na ca gośabdādabhāvaṃ kaścitpratipadyate tathā'gaurna bhavatītyayamapohaḥ kiṃ goviṣayothā'goviṣayaḥ | yadi goviṣayaḥ kathaṃ gorgavyevābhāvaḥ | athāgoviṣayaḥ | kathamanyaviṣayād apohād anyatra pratipattiḥ |
na hi khadirecchidyamāne palāśecchidā bhavati | athā gaurgavi pratiṣedho'gaurna bhavatīti | kena goragotvaṃ prasaktaṃ yatpratiṣidhyata iti |

[155,2]

apāstaṃ | goviṣayatvād gośabdasya kevalaṃ kalpitaviṣayatvād vivādaḥ |
yathā vā gopratiṣedho'satyapi samārope tathoktaṃ prāgiti yatkiñcidetat |

[155,3]

tasmāt sthitametadvidhireva śabdārtha iti ||

[155,4]

etadeva darśayannāha | "tatre"tyādi | "anapekṣi"taṃ svarūpeṇa "bāhyatatt"vaṃ yena vikalpabuddhipratibhāsinā dharmiṇā sa tathoktaḥ | "buddhipratibhāsavaśādekonekavyāvṛtta" iti |
anekasmād vyāvṛttasyaikasya dharmiṇaḥ sandarśanena buddheḥ pratibhāsanāt | tadvaśenaiko dharmī anekavyāvṛtto vyavasthāpyate | yaścānekasmād vyāvṛttastasmāt tatra vyāvṛttayo dharmabhedāḥ kalpyanta iti bhāvaḥ | sa eva bhūto dharmī śabdairviṣayīkriyate | tathābhūtavikalpapratibhāsajananāya vaktṛbhiḥ śabdasyoccāraṇāt | yataścānyavyāvṛtto vikalpapratibhāsaḥ śabdairviṣayīkriyate | tato vidhiviṣayatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ |

[156,1]

na kevalaṃ śabdairvikalpairapi viṣayīkriyata ityāha | "tadanubhave"tyādi | tasya tasya svalakṣaṇasyānubhavasta"danubhavastenāhitā vāsanā" śaktistasyāḥ prabodhaḥ kāryotpādānugaṇyantato janma yeṣāṃ vikalpānāntai"rviṣayīkriya"ta iti sambandhaḥ |
kiṃ viśiṣṭai"radhyavasitatadbhāvā"rthaiḥ | adhyavasitastadbhāvo bāhyabhāvo yasmin vikalpapratibhāse sodhyasavitatadbhāva evaṃ bhūtortho viṣayo yeṣāmvikalpānānte tathā | dṛśyavikalpāvekīkṛtya pravṛtteriti yāvat |

[156,2]

adhyavasitatadbhāvārtha iti pāṭhāntarantadādhyavasitatadbhāvaścāsāvarthaśceti karmadhārayaḥ | ekopyanekavyāvṛttodhyavasitatadbhāvārtha iti "sambandhaḥ" |
tasmād buddhipratibhāsavaśāt | sāmānyādivyavahāraḥ | "tatraiva ca" buddhipratibhāse'yamiti bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇe | vyavahriyata iti vyavahāraḥ karmasādhanaḥ | "dharmadharmiṇā"veva "vyavahāraḥ" |

[156,3]

etaduktambhavati | buddhipratibhāse yau dharmadharmiṇo vyavasthāpyete | tau"parasparantattvānyatvābhyāmavācyāditi pratanyate" | paramārthatastena pāramārthikadharmadharmitattvānyatvapakṣe yo doṣaḥ pramāṇāntarādivaiyarthyaṃ svātantryādilakṣaṇa uktaḥ sa iha na bhavatītyuktambhavati |

[156,4]

tattvānyatvapakṣayordoṣāntaramapyāha | "na hītyā"di | "dharmiṇaḥ" sakāśānnā"nyodharmaḥ" | kiṅkāraṇam | "anarthāntarābhidhānāt" | dharmadharmiśabdābhyāmekasmādeva vyavacchinnasyābhidhānāt | "nāpi" ya eva dharmī "sa eva" dharmaḥ | kasmāt | "tadvāci"nā"miva" | dharmivācināmiva śabdānāṃ | "dharmavācināmapi vyavacchedāntarākṣepaprasaṃgā"t | "tathā ceṣṭāpratyāyanāt" | dharmaśabdeneṣṭasya pratikṣiptabhedāntarasya bhedasyāpratyāyanāt | "saṃketabhedākaraṇaṃ" | pratikṣiptabhedāntaraṃ vyavacchedaṃ pratyāyayati dharmaśabda ityasya saṃketabhedasyākaraṇaṃ | etadanantaroktantattvānyattvābhyā"mavācyatvaṃ dharmadharmiṇoḥ śabdā"rthe buddhipratibhāsinyarthe uktaṃ | "vastunī"ti bāhyasvalakṣaṇe | "avidyamānatvāde"va tattvānyattvābhyā"mavācyaṃ" yathāpratibhāsantu śabdādiviṣayo vyavasthāpyate |

[157,1]

"nanu ce"tyādi paraḥ | dṛṣṭā prayogeṣūpalabdhā | gorgotvamiti "ṣaṣṭhī | ādi"śabdād gavi vyavasthitaṃ gotvaṃ | gotvena nimittena gavi gośabdo varttata ityādi vibhaktiparigrahaḥ | gotvadravyatvādīnāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ bahutvāt | "tatra bahuṣu dharmeṣu" |
gotvadravyatvapārthivatvānīti "dṛṣṭo" yo "vacanabhedaḥ sa" na syād | "dharmadharmiṇorabhede" pāramārthikabhedābhāve dharmāṇāṃ ca paraspararam |

[157,2]

"uktama"treti siddhāntavādī | "na vai śa bdānāṃ" kācid viṣayasvabhāvāyattā vṛttirityādinoktatvāt ||

[157,3]

bhūyaścādhikārthavidhānena pratipādayitumāha | "api cetyādi | yeṣāṃ" vādināṃ"vastuvaśā vāco" vastvāyattāḥ | "na vivakṣāparāśrayāḥ" | vivakṣaiva paraḥ pradhānamāśrayo yāsāṃ vācāntā vivakṣāparāśrayāḥ ṣaṣṭhī na syād vacanabhedādayaśca na syurityevaṃ ṣaṣṭhīvacanabhedādiṣu codyaṃ "ṣaṣṭhīvacanabhedodi codyaṃ" | ādiśabdāt |
gorbhāvo gotvamityādi | taddhitapratyayābhāvacodyaṃ | "tān" vastuvādinaḥ "prati |
yuktimat | ete" śabdāḥ ṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ "kvaci"diti vastvabhedepi "praṇinīṣitāḥ" praṇetumiṣṭāḥ | "vastupratibandhāt" | vastvāyattatvāt | "dhūmādivat | na hya"gnipratibaddho dhūmo vahnipratyāyanasamarthastadvaiparītyena jalapratyāyane "niyoktuṃ pāryate | tadā" vastupratibaddhatve śabdānā"mayamupālambhaḥ syā"dasativyatireke "kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhyādaya iti" ||

[157,4]

etadeva nāstītyāha | "yadā punari"tyādi | "yad" vaco "yathā" yena prakāreṇa bhedasyābhedasya vā pratipādanāya | kiṃ viśiṣṭama"napekṣitabāhyārthaṃ vācakatvena" rūpeṇa "vaktṛ"theti tadvacanaṃ yathāyogaṃ "vāca"kaṃ |

[158,1]

tadvyācaṣṭe || "na hī"tyādi | "vyatireke" vastubhede sati "ṣaṣṭhī"vibhakti"rbāhulye"
jasādayo bahuvacanapratyayā bhavantīti vai yā ka ra ṇā nāṃ vyavasthāna"metadapi puruṣābhiprāyanirapekṣamvastusannidhimātreṇa na svayaṃ pravṛttaṃ" | saṃketabalenaiva pravṛttamiti yāvat | etadevāha | "te tu tatre"tyādi | te tu vaiyākaraṇādayastatra vyatireke bāhulye ca "tathe"ti | ṣaṣṭhī bahuvacanaṃ ca yathāsaṃketaṃ "prayuñjata iti" kṛtvā "tataḥ" ṣaṣṭhyādes"tathā pratīti"rbhavati | vyatirekādipratītiranyeṣāmapi bhavati | tathābhūtavyavahāropalambhāt |
na tu tāvatā vastubalena vyatirekabāhulye ca ṣaṣṭhyādīnāṃ niyamaḥ | "evamanyatrāpīti" |
dharmadharmiṇoravyatirekepi ekatve ca vastunaḥ kṛta katvānityatvādīnāṃ "kathaṃci"diti bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇaṃ dharmadharmiṇorbhedamupādāya | kṛtakatvādiṣu vyāvṛttibhedopalakṣitanānātvamupādāya | yathākramaṃ ṣaṣṭhī bahuvacanādayaste prayoktṛbhiḥ"prayuktāstathaiva" yathāyogaṃ "pratītihetavo bhava"nti | "tatrai"vamicchāmātranibandhanatve śabdānāṃ sthite sati | "puruṣāyattavṛttīnā"ntadicchāvaśena pravṛtte"ravastusandarśināṃ śabde"bhyaḥ svalakṣaṇasyāpratibhāsanāt | "yathābhyāsaṃ" yasya yathā saṃketābhyāsastathā "vikalpaprabodho" vikalpodayastasya "hetū"nāṃ | saṃketānurūpasya śrotṛsantāne vikalpasya kāraṇānāmityarthaḥ | evaṃ "bhūtānāṃ śabdānāṃ vācye"ṣvartheṣu yeya"mpravṛttici"ntā vyatireke ṣaṣṭhyādaya ityādikā | nai yā yi kā dīnā"ntadvaśādi"ti śabdavaśād "vastuvyavasthānaṃ" | vyatiriktasya vastunoṅgīkaraṇaṃ | gorgotvamiti yasmāt ṣaṣṭhī tasmāt sāmānyaṃ vyatiriktamityādi | "jāḍyakhyāpanaṃ" śabdārthavyavasthā'nabhijñatvakhyāpanameva "kevalaṃ" |

[158,2]

"tathe"tyādi paraḥ | "tathākṛtavyavasthā dharmadharmyādiṣvi"ti dharme dharmiṇi ca bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepābhyāṃ dharmadharmiśabdāḥ kṛtavyavasthāḥ | ādiśabdād dravyatvapārthivatvānītyādibahuvacanaśabdā "vyāvṛttibhedena" kṛtavyavasthāḥ | "na punarvāstavādeva" dharmadharmiṇorvyatirekāt ṣaṣṭhīvastubhedād dravyatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paramārthata eva bhedādvahuvacanamiti | "kuta eta"t | "tathe"tyādi prativacanaṃ | "tathā vyavahārā"ti | vyavahāraviṣayayordharmadharmiṇorvāstave vyatireke | dharmāṇāṃ ca parasparaṃ paraparamārthato bhede sāmānyādivyavahārāyogāt |

[159,1]

etadevagrahaṇakavākyaṃ "na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | vyavahāraviṣayayordha"rmadharmiṇo"rvastutve parasparaṃ tattvamanyatvaṃ vābhyupagantavyaṃ vastunaḥ prakārāntarābhāvāditi dvayamupanyastaṃ | "bhede tattvarūpatve ce"ti pakṣadvayepi doṣodbhāvanārthamanyathā pareṇa vyatirekavastubhedāditi bhedapakṣe'valambite tattvapakṣopanyāso na prakaraṇānurūpaḥ syāt |
tatsambaddha iti sāmānyatadvatoḥ sambandhaḥ | "śabdānāmvā yathāvastu pravṛttā"vabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ "sāmānyādayo yujyante | etaccāntarameva vakṣyāmaḥ | vastukṛ"tamiti vastūnāmekānekatvādikaṃ "śabdapravṛttibheda"mekaṃvacanabahuvacanādīnāṃ pravṛttibhedaṃ | dārāḥ śabdo nityabahuvacanāntaḥ pulliṅgaśceṣyate | yatra yadaikastrīviṣayo"dārā" iti śabdastadā bhedavyavasthiteḥ | "ṣaṇṇagarīti" bahūnānnagarāṇāmekavacane"nābhidhānādabhedavyavasthiteḥ" kinnibandhanaṃ | bāhyaṃ naiva kiṃcit | "ādi"śabdātmikatā prāsādamāletyādau bhedābhedavyavasthiteḥ | "khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvaṃ ceti" khasya svabhāva"ityatra" vyatirekaṣaṣṭhyāḥ "kinnibandha"naṃ | atha tattvamityanenoktena kiṃ yadi khasya svabhāva ityasya vākyasya khatvamitīyantaddhitavṛttirbhavatītyetkathyate tannāsti | na hi svabhāva ityasminnarthe bhāvapratyayaḥ kintarhi bhāvārtha | na ca taddhitavṛttipradarśanena kiñcit prayojanamastyanyatareṇa vyatirekapradarśanāt |

[159,2]

atraike vṛttivākyābhyāṃ sarvo vyavahāro vyāpta iti tadvyāptipradarśanārthaṃ dvayamuktamiti |

[159,3]

anye'nyathā vyācakṣate | khasya svabhāva iti vyatireke kinnibandhanaṃ | tathā khatvamiti vyatirekābhidhāyino bhāvapratyayasya kinnibandhanamiti |

[160,1]

"yadetyādinā" vyācaṣṭe | yadā yasmin kāle | yacchabdamanye paṭhanti yasmādityarthaḥ | "yenaivambhavatoti" dārā ityādi bahuvacanambhavati | ekatvādekavacanameva prāpnotīti bhāvaḥ | "ekasyā api striyaḥ sikatā"nāṃ ca bahvyaḥ śaktayastataḥ"śaktibhedo" bahuvacanakāraṇamiti | "sarvatre"ti yatrāpyekavacanamiṣṭamvṛkṣa ityādau |
ekaśakterarthasyābhāvāt | sarvasya nā"nā śaktitvāt | evaṃ" satye"kasminnekavacana"mityayaṃ "yatnaśca vyarthaḥ syā"t | satyapi śaktibhede "vastvabhedāt" | śaktyāśrayasyābhedāt | anyatraikavacanaviṣayerthe vṛkṣaḥ paṭa ityādāve"kavacanamiti ce"t | "ihāpi" dārādāvekavacanamekasyāḥ striyā vastvabhedāt | yata evaṃ na vastvaśaktyāśrayo vā śabdapravṛttibhedaḥ | "tasmāda"yaṃ śabdapravṛtti"niya"mo "nirvastuko" bāhyavastvanāśrayaḥ "kriyamāṇaḥ" puruṣe"cchāyāḥ svātantr"yaṃ "śabdaprayoge khyāpayati" |

[160,2]

ṣaṇṇāṃ nagarāṇāṃ samāhāraḥ kriyātmako guṇātmako vā | ekosti tata ekavacanamiti cedāha | "na hi nagarāṇyeva kiṃciditi" nagarāvayavidravyasyānabhyupagamāt"kutaste"ṣānnagarāṇāṃ "samāhāraḥ" kriyātmako guṇātmako vā yata evamabhidhīyeta kriyāguṇayordravyāśritatvāt | kiṃ punardravyamityāha | "prāsā"detyādi | gṛhādisamudāyo nagaraṃ | "vijātīyā"nāṃ ca prāsādīdānāṃ dravyā"rambhā"nabhyupagamāt kutastatsamudāyaḥ prāsādādisamudāyo nagaraṃ dravyaṃ syāt | yāvatā prāsādatoraṇapuruṣādīnāṃ samudāyo nagaramiṣyate | "teṣāṃ" prāsādādīnāṃ samastānā"masaṃyogācca" kāraṇānnagara"ndravyaṃ" |
saṃyogasahāyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ dravyārambhakatvamiṣyate | "na" prāsādapuruṣakuḍyādīnāṃ viśliṣṭānāṃ "saṃyogosti" | yena prāsādādijanyaṃ nagarandravyaṃ syāt |

[160,3]

syānmataṃ | yadyapi sākalyena prāsādādīnāṃ nāsti saṃyogastathāpi yeṣāṃ tāvat prāsādapuruṣādīnāṃ parasparaṃ saṃyogastatsaṃyogātmakaṃ nagarambhaviṣyatyevamapivastutvaṃ nagarasyāsiddhaṃ saṃyogasya guṇapadārthatvādityata āha | "na saṃyoga" ityādi |
na saṃyogasvabhāvannagaraṃ | tathā kāṣṭheṣṭakādīnāmvijātīyānāṃ kāryadravyānārambhāt prāsādopi na dravyātmakaḥ kintu "saṃyogasvabhāva" iṣyate | saṃyogaśca guṇo nirguṇāśca guṇā iti kutaḥ prāsādasya saṃyogo yena tatsaṃyogātmakaṃ nagaraṃ syāt |

[161,1]

etadevāha | "prāsādas"yetyādi | "pare"ṇetyarthāntareṇā"saṃyogāc"ca na saṃyogo nagaraṃ | "ca"kāreṇānantaranirdiṣṭāt prāsādādīnāṃ viśliṣṭānāmasaṃyogācca na saṃyogo nagaramityetat samuccīyate | tadevaṃ prāsādādīnāmubhayathā saṃyogābhāvena |
nagarasya saṃyogasvabhāvatā nirastā |

[161,2]

prāsādādīnāṃ yā saṃkhyā tadātmakaṃ nagarambhaviṣyatīti cedāha | "tata eva saṃkhyābhāva" iti | yasmāt saṃyogātmakaprāsādastata eva kāraṇāt prāsādasya saṃkhyāyā abhāvo nirguṇatvād guṇānāṃ | saṃkhyāpi hi guṇasvabhāvā | sa cāsau saṃyogaśca tatsaṃyogaḥ | prāsādātmakaḥ saṃyoga ityarthaḥ | "tatsaṃyogena puruṣaiśca" viśiṣṭā yā "sattā" sā "nagaramiti ce"t | "kimasyāḥ sattāyā ekatvā"nnityatvācca "nira"ti"śayāyā viśeṣaṇaṃ" | na hi prāsādapuruṣādayassattāṃ viśiṃṣanti | anādheyātiśayatvāt | tasmāt sattā nirviśeṣaṇā | tasyā nagaratve sarvatra nagaratvaṃ syādityabhiprāyaḥ | "sattāyāścaikatvā"diti | dravyaguṇakarmasvekaiva sattā vyāpinī | "nagarabahutvepi"
nagaravyavasthāśrayāṇāṃ prāsādādisamudāyānāṃ bahutvepītyarthaḥ | anyathā sattātmake nagare prakṛte nagarabahutvaṃ kathaṃ syāt | "dvayas"yeti prāsādapuruṣādeḥ sattāyāśca yā "parasparasahitatā" sā "nagaramiti ce"t | evaṃ hi sati na sarvatra nagarabuddhiḥ |
prāsādādīnāṃ sarvatrābhāvāt | prāsādādibahutvād bahuvacanaṃ ca siddhamiti paro manyate |

[161,3]

uttaramāha | "anupakā"ryetyādi | "anupakāryopakārakayoḥ" sattāprāsādayoḥ"kassahāyībhāvaḥ" | tathā hi dvividhaḥ sahakārārthaḥ parasparātiśayādhānena santāne viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādanalakṣaṇaḥ | pūrvasvahetoreva samarthānāmutpannānāmekakāryakriyālakṣaṇaśca | na tāvatpūrvaḥ sattāyā anādheyātiśayatvāt | nāpi dvitīyo yasmād yathā sattā kevalā nagarabuddhijananaṃ pratyasamarthā tathā prāsādādisahitāpi sāmarthye vā kevalāpi janayet | yadi ca dvayasya parasparasahitatā nagaraṃ | tadaikamapi nagaramanekātmakaṃ prāsādādyātmakatvāt | tataḥ "puruṣasaṃyogasattānāmbahutvā"t | "nagaramityekavacanaṃ syā"t | saṃyogaśabdena prāsādātmakaḥ saṃyoga uktaḥ | "tathābhūtānā"miti parasparasahitānāṃ puruṣasaṃyogasattānāṃ "kvacida"rtha iti nagaramiti vijñāne | śabde ca niṣpādye | "abhinnai"kā "śaktirasti" | "se"tyabhinnā śakti"rnimitta"mekavacanas"yeti cet | na" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "śaktervastu svarūpāvyatirekāt" | puruṣādibhyo vasturūpebhyo'vyatirekāt |
tadvadevānekatvamiti kutastadāśrayamekavacanaṃ | vastusvarūpād vyatireke vā śakterabhyupamyamagāne puruṣasaṃyogasattābhiranupakāryasya śaktirūpasya puruṣādipāratantryanna syāt | tataśca puruṣādīnāṃ śaktiriti sambandho na syāditi bhāvaḥ |

[162,1]

"atha vyatiriktāyā api" śakteḥ puruṣādipāratantryasiddhyarthaṃ puruṣādikṛta "upakāra"
iṣyate | "tadā śakterupakāre" vā puruṣādikṛte iṣyamāṇe | yayā śaktyā puruṣādayaḥ prathamaṃ śaktimupakurvate | tasyāḥ prathamaśak"tyupakāriṇyā" api śakte "śaktervyatirekenavasthā" syāda"vyatireke vā | ādyāyāmapye"kavacananibandhanatveneṣṭāyāṃ śaktāva vyatireka"prasaṃgaḥ" | avyatireke ca vastuvadeva bāhulyamiti "tadavastho bahuṣu bahuvacana(paā.1.4.21)"
prasaṃga iti "yatkiñcideta"t | śaktiparikalpane "khasya svabhāva" iti "vyatirekāśrayā ṣaṣṭhī" na syāt | ṣaṣṭhīkāraṇatvād bhāvapratyayopyupacārāt ṣaṣṭhīśabdenoktaḥ |
tenāyamaparorthaḥ "khatva"miti vyatirekāśrayā taddhitotpatti"rna syāditi" khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvamityanayā vyutpattyā bhāvapratyayasyotpattervyatirekāśrayatvaṃ |

[162,2]

athavā yathāyogaṃ sambandho granthacchedaśca kāryaḥ | "khatvamiti vyatirekāśrayā"t taddhitotpattirityadhyāhāraḥ | khasya svabhāva iti ṣaṣṭhī na syāditi | na hi khaśabdavācyād arthādanyaḥ svabhāvosti bhāvo vā | yo yathākramaṃ vyatirekaṣaṣṭhyāstaddhitasya vā nibandhanaṃ syāt | khatvaṃ nāma sāmānyamasti tadvyatirekanibandhanamiti cedāha | "na tatre"tyādi | ekātmakatvāt khasya nāsmin khatva"sāmānyaṃ" | yadyapi sattvaṃ dravyatvaṃ cākāśesti | tathāpi na tat khasya svabhāvaḥ | ghaṭādisādhāraṇatvāt | nāpi sattvadravyatve khatvamityatra bhāvapratyayasya nibandhanaṃ | tayoḥ śaśabdapratyayākāraṇatvāt | svānurūpajñānābhidhānanibandhanasvabhāvapratyayasya kāraṇamiṣṭaṃ | "nāpi vibhutvādayo guṇā" iti | ādiśabdādekatvaparatvādiparigrahaḥ |
tathocyata iti khasya svabhāva iti | dravyā"darthāntarasya" vibhutvāderguṇasya "tatsvabhāvatvāyogād" ākāśasvabhāvatvāyogāt | na hyarthāntaramarthāntarasya svabhāvo yuktaḥ |
yadi ca vibhutvādaya ākāśasvabhāvāḥ | tadā "teṣāṃ ca" vibhutvādīnāmākāśasvabhāvatve"niḥsvabhāvatvaprasaṃgāt" | tathā hi yasteṣāṃ guṇasvabhāvaḥ satyākāśameva jātaṃ na"cā"parasvabhāvostīti niḥsvabhāvatā syāt | teṣāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatve ākāśasya vyatiriktaḥ svabhāvo na syāditi bhāvaḥ | vibhutvāde"rapyarthāntarasvabhāvatvamiti ce"dāha | "tasyāpī"tyādi | "tasye"ti vibhutvāde"rathāntaraṃ svabhā"vo'syeti vigrahaḥ | "atiprasaṃga" iti yattadarthāntaraṃ vibhatvādeḥ svabhāvatveneṣṭantasyāpyarthāntarasvabhāvatvena bhāvyaṃ | anyathā tasyāpi vibhutvāvyatirekāt tadvadeva niḥsvabhāvatā syāt | "tathā" cāparāparasvabhāvaparimārgaṇenānavasthānādekasyāpi pratiṣṭhitasvabhāvasyābhāvāt | ādyasyākāśasvabhāvasyā"pratipatti"stataśca sa eva vyatirekābhāva ityabhiprāyaḥ |

[163,1]

"evaṃ""dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ""ṣaṇṇāṃ padārthānāṃ vargaḥ | ādi"śabdāt prāsādamāletyādayo "vācyāḥ" |

[163,2]

kathamasati vyatireke ṣaṣṭhīti | "na hi tatra" ṣaṭpadārtheṣu "sāmānyaṃ sambhavati" | yadvargaśabdenocyate | dravyaguṇakarmasveva sāmānyābhyupagamāt | tathā "saṃkhyā saṃyogo vā" na "sambhavati" tayorguṇapadārthatvena dravya eva bhāvāt |

[164,1]

"kathami"tyādi paraḥ | "idānī"mityarthāntarasvabhāvānabhyupagame khaśabdavācyasya bhāvaśabdavācyasya cārthasyāsatyaniścaye kathaṃ "svabhāva iti" bhedena nirdeśaḥ | "na punaḥ khamityeva" | bhedanibandhābhāvādabhedenaiva nirdeśo nyāyya ityarthaḥ |

[164,2]

"khasye"tyādinā pariharati | khasyeti khaśabdavācyasyārthasyā"rthāntara"syeti pṛthivyāderya"tsādhāraṇaṃ rūpama"nupāttaviśeṣāntarasyā"parāmarśena" | tyāgena | khaśabda"pravṛttinibandhanaṃ rūpa"manyadravyāsādhāraṇaṃ "tathā jijñāsāyā" atrārthāntarāsaṃsargi..."...mevamucyate" khasya svabhāva iti | tathā khatvamiti | yathā gamyeta khasyāyaṃ svabhāvo nānyasyeti |

[164,3]

anena bhedāntarapratikṣepeṇaika"vyāvṛttarūpānabhidhānā"danyadeva vyatirekābhidhānanimittamuktaṃ | tena ghaṭasyābhāva ityādivyapadeśaḥ siddho bhavati |

[164,4]

anye punarāhuḥ | khasya svabhāvaṃ pratipādayan svabhāvaśabdo svabhāvavyāvṛttimātreṇa pratipādayati na tu svabhāvāntarāpratikṣepeṇa | khaśabdastu tameva rūpāntarāpratikṣepeṇa | tataḥ svabhāvāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇena bhedaleśena khasyāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ khatvamiti bhedena nirddiśyata iti tadetannātiśliṣṭaṃ bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratipatteḥ |

[164,5]

"arthāntarasādhāraṇarūpāparāmarśena khaśabdapravṛttinibandha"naṃ rūpame"vamucyata" iti bruvatā svalakṣaṇameva vācyamuktamiti matvā paro brūte ityādi | na "tu sarva" ityādi |

[164,6]

"ne"tyādi siddhāntavādī | yat "sarva"smād "vyāvṛ"ttaṃ svalakṣaṇātmaka"ntadeva rūpaṃ"
śabdotthāyāṃ "buddhau" śabdaiḥ sa"marpyate | ne"ti sambandhaḥ | kasmāt tasya svalakṣaṇasyendriyabuddhāviva | śābde vijñāne pratyavabhāsane satya"matīndriyatvaprasaṅgā"t | pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgāt | kintarhi śabdena kriyata iti cedāha | "kevala"mityādi | "aya"miti pratipādakaḥ |
dṛśyavikalpayorekatvādhyavasāyavipralabdhastathābhūtamasādhāraṇamarthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyāmītyeva"mabhiprā"yaḥ "śabdena" karaṇabhūtena "śrota"ri yo "vikalpa"stasya "prativimba"bāhyatayā'"dhya"mākārama"rpayati" | kiṃ bhūta"masaṃsṛṣṭatatsvabhā"vaṃ | agṛhītavasturūpaṃ | ācāryadi ṅ nā ga syāpyetadabhimatamityāha | "yadāhe"tyādi | adṛṣṭārthe svargādiśabde uccari"terthavikalpamātraṃ" śroturbhavatyadhyavasitabāhyārthasvabhāvo vikalpo bhavati na tu bāhyasvarūpagrāhakaṃ |

[165,1]

anena cā cā rye ṇā pi vidhyarthaḥ śabdārtho'bhipreta iti darśayati | "naivaṃ" vikalpaprativimbe śabdena śrotari janite "pratipādyapratipādakābhyāṃ" yathāsaṃkhyaṃ "svalakṣa"ṇaṃ"pratipannaṃ pratipāditaṃ vā bhavati" |

[165,2]

yadi hi śabdena svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyate | tadā "svargā"diśabda"śravaṇepi | tadanubhavināmiva" | svargādipratyakṣavedināmiva "pratibhāsābhedaḥ" syāt | śroturapi svargādisvalakṣaṇākārapratipattiḥ syāt | yataśca na śabdāt svalakṣaṇapratipatti"stasmādayaṃ" śrotā śabdāda"pratipadyamānopi bhāvasvabhāvastathābhūta e"vāsaṃsṛṣṭavastusvabhāva eva "vikalpapratibimbe tadadhyavasāyī" svalakṣaṇādhyavasāyī svalakṣaṇameva mayā pratipannamiti "santuṣyati" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tathā bhūtatvādeva" | svalakṣaṇasyāgrahepyadhyavasitasvalakṣaṇarūpatvādeva śabdārthapratipatteḥ | yataśca svalakṣaṇādhyavasāyena"śabdārthasya pratītistenaitadevamucyate" śabdaḥ "svarūpamāhe"ti | arthāntarasādhāraṇarūpāparāmarśena khaśabdapravṝttinibandhamasādhāraṇaṃ rūpamucyata iti vacanāt | "na punaḥ svarūpapratibhāsasyaiva vijñānasya jananāt" |

[165,3]

tasmāt sthitametad vidhyarthaḥ śabdārtholīkatvāt paramatād bheda iti |

[165,4]

"kathami"tyādi paraḥ | "ekāntavyāvṛttaṃ" rūpaṃ yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | "teṣāmbhāvānāmasaṃsargādanyasya ce"ti bhāvebhyo vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya |

[165,5]

"ukta"miti siddhāntavādī | kīdṛśamuktamityāha | "asaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ" parasparavyāvṛttānāme"kena" vijātīyenā"saṃsargaḥ" | yathā govyaktīnāmekenāgosvabhāvenāsaṃsargaḥ "sa evā"saṃsargaḥ | "tadvyatirekiṇān"tasmādagosvabhāvād vyāvṛttānāṃ gobhedānāṃ "samānatā" gotvaṃ | evamanyadapi sāmānyaṃ boddhavyaṃ |

[166,1]

etaduktambhavati | samānāmiti karttari ṣaṣṭhī tena samānānāmbhāvaḥ sāmānyamiti vijātīyavyāvṛttāḥ samānākārotpannā bhāvāḥ sāmānyamityarthaḥ | asyaiva ca sāmānyasya liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvantatsambandhaśca vastutvāt | arthakriyākāritvācca pravṛttiviṣayatvaṃ vikalpaviṣayatvaṃ ca yathā'dhyavasāyaṃ na tu jñānākārasya |
etadviparītatvāt ||

[166,2]

tadevaṃ samāropapakṣe parokṣaṃ dūṣaṇamparihṛtyānyavyāvṛttipakṣe parokṣaṃ dūṣaṇamanyavyāvṛttyanabhyupagamādeva nirasyānyavyāvṛttā eva bhāvā ekatvenādhyavasīyamānāḥ sāmānyamiti ca pratipādya buddhyākārepi sāmānye paroktaṃ dūṣaṇamapanetumāha | "api ce"tyādi | "bhāvānāśritya bhedina" iti vyāvṛttāni svalakṣaṇamvāśritya dhīre"kārthapratibhāsinyu"tpadyate | "yayā svarū"peṇa svākāreṇaikena rūpeṇa | "pararūpaṃ" | parasparavyāvṛttaṃ valakṣaṇaṃ "samvriyate" pracchādyate | diti | dhi | kimviśiṣṭayā yā | "saṃvṛtyā" |
saṃvriyate'nayā svalakṣaṇamiti kṛtvā | "samvṛtanānārthā" sthagitanānārthāḥ"svayambhedino"pi "kenacid rūpeṇa" vijātīyavyāvṛttyupakalpitena gotvādirūpeṇā"bhedina ivābhānti" saṃsṛṣṭa iva | tena | "buddhyākāraśca buddhistho nārthabuddhyantarānugaḥ | nābhipretārthakārī ca sopi vācyo na tatvata" ityādi nirastaṃ ||

[166,3]

tasmād buddhe"rabhiprāyava"śāt | ekākārādhyāropavaśāt "sāmānyaṃsa" kesna"prakīrtitaṃ" | buddhyāropita evākāraḥ sāmānyamuktamiti yāvat | "yathā" tayā "saṃka"ropitaṃ "tathā tat" sāmānya"masat paramārthena" |

[167,1]

nanu yadyabhinnaḥ pratibhāso'bhyupagamyate kathaṃ sāmānyamasadityucyate | na |
vyaktibhyo bhinnasyābhimatasyābhedena pratibhāsanāt | sarvātmanā cābhede vyaktivadananvayādanugatasya pratītirbhrāntireva | bhedābhede ca tathaivobhayarūpatayā pratibhāsaḥ syāt | na ca yatra pratyaye yadaiva gauriti pratibhāsaḥ tadaiva tatra gotvamasyeti pratibhāsaḥ |

[167,2]

atha syād | yadananugame yasyānugamastattato bhinnaṃ yathā nīlādanīlaṃ |
śāvaleyānanugame ca gotvasyānugamo vyaktyantare | tasmāt tato bhinnaṃ śāvaleyābhinnagotvagrāhakantarhi pratyakṣaṃ bhrāntaṃ syād bhinnasyānyapramāṇagṛhītasyābhedena grahaṇāt | na caikasya yenaiva rūpeṇa bhedastenaivābhedo virodhāt | nāpi vastūnāṃ viśeṣarūpatayā bhedaḥ | sāmānyarūpatayā'bhedaḥ | evaṃ hi viśeṣāṇāmekadeśāditvaṃ syānna ca syāt | sāmānyaviśeṣayośca pratibhāsabhedo na syāt sarvātmanā'bhinnatvād |
bhede vānugatavyāvṛttarūpayoḥ parasparāsaṃśleṣeṇaikāntabhinnatvaprasaṅgāt |

[167,3]

yadi ca prativyakti tadabhinnantadaikaṃ sāmānyamastīti kutaḥ | na ca tatra prathamavyaktidarśane'gṛhītamapi dvitīyādivyaktau sa evāyamiti pratīterekaṃ sāmānyamastīti yuktaṃ | sa iti smaraṇāṃśasyānubhūtasāmānyaviṣayābhāvenotpattyasambhavāt | tataśca yathā prathamavyaktau na gṛhītantathā dvitīyādivyaktāvapi pratyekaṃ gṛhītamiti kathaṃ sa evāyamiti jñānasyotpattiḥ syāt | na ca sa iti smaraṇānyathānupapattyā prathamavyaktau nirvikalpakenānyena vā jñānena sāmānyagrahaṇakalpanā yuktā'nugatarūpapratibhāsābhāvāt | nāpi dharmarūpatayā tatrāsya grahaṇaṃ yuktamanugataikarūpatvāt sāmānyasya | nāpi pūrvāparavyaktisambandhitayāsya pratyabhijñāpratyakṣeṇa grahaṇamiti śakyate vaktuṃ | idamevetyevaṃ pratyakṣasyotpattiprasaṃgāt | pūrvavyakterasannihitatvācca sannihitārthaniścayalakṣaṇaṃ ca pratyakṣamiṣyate |

[167,4]

tasmādagovyāvṛttaikaviśeṣānubhavapūrvakamanyasminnagovyāvṛtte'nubhūyamāne sati sa evāyamityekākārasya bhrāntasya pratyayasya vāsanāsāmarthyenotpattestadevāsya nimittaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktannānyad | bhrāntatvācca buddherayaṃ sāmānyākāro vyavasthāpyate na vāhyasya | yathāpratibhāsaṃ tu bāhyānāmevārthānāṃ sāmānyamucyate |

[167,5]

"buddhiri"tyādinā kārikārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe | buddhi"rvikalpike"tyanena sambandhaḥ |
tebhyaḥ sajātīyebhyonyastasmād vyatirekaḥ sa yeṣāmasti | te "tadanyavyatirekiṇaḥ" |
vijātīyavyāvṛttānityarthaḥ | "svavāsanāprakṛtiṃ" vikalpa"vāsanāsvabhāva"mbhinneṣvabhinnapratyayajananasāmarthyantadanu"vidadhatī" | anukurvatī | evaṃ hi tayā svakāraṇamanukṛtambhavati | yadi bhinneṣvapyekākārotpadyate | "eṣā"miti padārthānāṃ | "adhyasye"ti padārtheṣvāropya bhāvānāmevaikaṃ rūpamiti | "tān" bhāvān "sṛjantī | abhinnāniva"
kurvāṇā "sandarśayati" | ekarūpāniva darśayatīti yāvad |

[168,1]

nanu vikalpasyānubhūtārthāhitavāsanābalotpattāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ kathaṃ sāmānyākārasya vikalpasyotpattiḥ sāmānyasyānanubhūtatvādityata āha | "sā ce"tyādi |
ekaṃ sadṛśaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhanañca yeṣāmbhāvā"nāṃ" | yathā ghaṭādīnāmekamudakādidhāraṇādi sādhyaṃ | sādhanaṃ ca mṛtpiṇḍādi | te "ekasādhyasādhanā"stadbhāva"stayā" | karaṇabhūtayā | "anye"bhyotatsādhyasādhanebhyo "vivekināṃ bhāvānā" sā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ bhinnānāmapi prakṛtyā ekākāravikalpajananalakṣaṇaḥ | tathābhūtasya "vikalpasya"
heturyā "vāsa"nā | tasyāśca sā tādṛśī "prakṛti"ryadevaṃ svarūpaṃ paratrāropayantī | eṣā buddhiḥ pratibhāti | vyaktyabhinnasāmānyagrāhiṇī pratibhāsata iti yāvat |

[168,2]

tena yaducyate |

[168,3]

"smārttametadabhedena vijñānamiti yo vadet | nūnambandhyāsutepyasti tasya smaraṇaśakyatā ||"

[168,4]

iti nirastaṃ | bhinnānāmevānubhūtānāmekakāryakarttṛtvena svaviṣayābhinnākāra pratyayajanane sāmarthyādanubhūtaspaṣṭākārasyārthasya svaviṣayospaṣṭasmaraṇajananasāmarthyavat | "tadudbha"veti varṇṇavikalpavāsanāyā vivekibhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa codbhavo yasyāḥ sā tathā | "sā ceya"miti buddhiḥ "saṃvṛti"rityucyate |
samvriyate'nayā buddhyā "svarūpeṇa" svapratibhāsena "pararū"pamvasturūpamiti karaṇasādhanaṃ ktinaṃ vidhāya | "te ca" bhāvā"staye"ti buddhyā | "saṃvṛtabhedāḥ" pracchāditanānātvāḥ | "kenacid rūpeṇe"ti vikalpabuddhyāropitena | "pratibhānti" vikalpabuddhau |

[169,1]

"tadeṣā"mityādi | "buddhipratibhāsaṃ" vikalpabuddhyākāraṃ | "anurundhānaiḥ" puruṣaistad"buddhyupasthāpita"mekaṃ "rūpaṃ sāmānyamucyata" ityanena sambandhaḥ | keṣāṃ sāmānyamucyate | "buddhiparivarttināmeva | eṣāṃ" buddhiparivarttināmiti sambandhaḥ | svalakṣaṇānyanubhūya yathānubhavamasau śuklo ghaṭaḥ kṛṣṇonyo vetyevaṃ vikalpabuddhiṣvaspaṣṭāḥ ghaṭākārāste buddhiparivarttino bhāvā ye "teṣā"meva sāmānyaṃ sambandhi | na svalakṣaṇānāṃ sāmānyabuddhāvapratibhāsanādasambandhitvācca | buddhiparivarttināmeva viśeṣaṇaṃ "bahiriva parisphuratāmi"ti bahiriva pratibhāsamānānāmityarthaḥ | bahiḥsphuraṇe ca kāraṇamāha | "ākāraviśeṣaparigrahā"diti |

[169,2]

bāhyārthavikalpasaṃsthānasya spaṣṭasyānukārād bāhyādhyavasāya ityeke |

[169,3]

etaccāyuktaṃ | na hi sādṛśyanimitto bāhyatvāropa iti niveditametat |
tasmādākāraviśeṣo ghaṭādyākārastasya parigrahonubhavastasmād bahiriva parisphuraṇaṃ |

[169,4]

etaduktambhavati | ghaṭādyanubhavāhitavāsanāsāmarthyena vikalpa utpadyamānaḥ svākāraṃ bāhyaghaṭādyabhedenādhyavasyati na tu gṛhṇāti | tena śabdavihiterthe kvacit saṃśayo bhavatyagrahaṇāt | tatra tu vikalpaḥ svahetuta eva bāhyābhinnaṃ svākāramadhyavasyati |
na tu sādṛśyāt sadṛśasyārthasyābhāvādagrahaṇācca |

[169,5]

nanu buddhiparivarttināmapi svarūpe vyatirekeṇa konya eva ākāraḥ pratibhāsate yatsāmānyaṃ syāt |

[169,6]

satyaṃ | tatra tāvat kecidāhurekajñānāvyatirekādekatvanteṣāmiti | anye tvāhuḥ pratyekanteṣāṃ svavyaktyapekṣayā sāmānyarūpateti | tadetadubhayamapyayuktamekapratibhāsābhāvāt | kevalamekarūpatayā teṣāmadhyavasāyāt paraiḥ sāmānyamiṣṭamiti tadabhiprāyādevamucyate | ā cā rya sya tu samānā iti pratibhāsobhipreto naika iti tathā ca vakṣyati |

[169,7]

athavā | astu "pratibhāso dhiyāmbhinnaḥ samānā iti tadgrahaṇādi"1 | 109 ti | yadi buddhiparivarttināmeva vikalpabuddhisandarśitaṃ rūpaṃ sāmānyantasya ca vidhirūpatvāt "kathamidānīmanyāpohaḥ sāmānya"mityucyate |

[170,1]

"sa eve"ti siddhāntavādī | sa eva vikalpabuddhivyavasthāpitaḥ pratibhāsamāno"'nyāpoha" ucyate | anyaviviktapadārthadarśanadvārāyātatvāt |

[170,2]

yadi vikalpākāraḥ sāmānyaṃ kathaṃ bāhyānāṃ samānarūpatayā pratītiḥ | yadāha |

[170,3]

"atha nirviṣayā etā vāsanāmātrabhāvataḥ | pratipattiḥ pravṛttiśca bāhyārtheṣu kathambhaved | "

[170,4]

ityata āha | "tame"vetyādi | tamiti vikalpabuddhipratibhāsaṃ "gṛhṇatī" sā vikalpikā buddhi"rvastugrāhiṇīva pratibhāti" | kasmād "vikalpānāṃ prakṛtivibhramāt"
svabhāvenaiva svākārābhedenārthagrahaṇavibhramāt |

[170,5]

kathantarhyapohaviṣayetyucyata ityāha | "sā hi" vikalpikā buddhiradhyavasāyavaśāt "tadanyavivekiṣu bhāveṣu" svalakṣaṇeṣu "bhavantī vivekaviṣayeti gamya"te | kāryato na tu vivekasvabhāvaviṣayīkaraṇāt |

[170,6]

parastvaviditābhiprāyaḥ prāha | "nan"vityādi | sāmānyād bā"hyāḥ" svalakṣaṇānītyarthaḥ | evaṃ hi bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ kṛto bhavati | "vivekinaḥ" parasparavilakṣaṇā | "na ca teṣvi"ti svalakṣeṇeṣu | "kathanteṣu vikalpabuddhirbhava"tītyucyate | "vyākhyātāra" ityādinā pariharati | te hi yathāvasthitamvastu vyavasthāpayanta eva"mvivecayanti" | anyo vikalpabuddhipratibhāso nyatsvalakṣaṇamiti | "na vyavaharttāra"
evaṃ vivecayanti | "te tu" vyavaharttāraḥ "svālambanameve"ti vikalpapratibhāsame"vārthakriyāyogyaṃ" bāhyasvalakṣaṇarūpa"mmanyamānāḥ" | etadeva spaṣṭayati | dṛśyorthaḥ svalakṣaṇa"mvikalpyorthaḥ" sāmānyapratibhāsastā"vekīkṛtya" svalakṣaṇamevedamvikalpabuddhyā viṣayīkriyate śabdena codyata ityevamadhimucyārthakriyākāriṇyarthe "pravarttante |
tadabhiprāyavaśā"d vyavaharttṛṇāmabhiprāyavaśā"devamucyate" vivekiṣu bhāveṣu vikalpabuddhirbhavatīti dṛśyavikalpyāvekīkṛtya pravṛtteriti vadatā | na svākāre bāhyāropa ityuktambhavatyanyathā svākāra eva pravṛttiprasaṅgāt | marīcikāyāṃ jalāropādiva | nāpi bāhye svākārāropaḥ | āropyamāṇaphalārthitvenaiva pravṛttiprasaṃgāt |
jalārthina iva jalabhrāntau |

[171,1]

nanu dṛśyavilpayorekīkaraṇaṃ kimucyate | yadi dṛśyasya vikalpyādabhedaḥ bāhyerthe pravṛttirna syāt | vikalpyasya dṛśyādabhedaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdārthaḥ syāt | na ca dṛśyavikalpyayorekīkaraṇaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tasya vikalpyāviṣayatvāt | nāpi vikalpena tasya dṛśyāviṣayatvāt | atītādau ca dṛśyābhāvāt kathantayorekīkaraṇaṃ |

[171,2]

atrocyate | arthānubhave sati tatsaṃskāraprabodhena tadākāra utpadyamāno vikalpaḥ svākārambāhyābhinnamadhyavasyati na tvabhinnaṃ karoti | tena vikalpaviṣayasya dṛśyātmatayādhyavasāyād dṛśyavikalpayorekīkaraṇamucyate | darśanārho dṛśyaḥ śakyate"vā" draṣṭumiti vikalpakadarśanasyāpi yo viṣayaḥ sa dṛśyastenānāgatasyāpyarthasyāgamopadarśitasya dṛśyatvaṃ siddhantathā'bhāvasyāpi | ata evābhāvaḥ pratyayaḥ svākārambhāvarūpamapi padārthābhāvāvyatirekeṇādhyasya pratyetītyabhāvaviṣaya ucyate na tvabhāvaṃ gṛhṇāti | sarvavikalpānāṃ nirviṣayatvāt |

[171,3]

"tatkāritayetyādi" | na kevalantadabhiprāyavaśād vikalpabuddhiḥ svalakṣaṇeṣu vivekeṣu bhavatītyucyate | "tathā tatkāritayā" karaṇenā"tatkāribhyo bhinnāna"rthān"śabdena" vaktāraḥ "pratipādayantītyucyate" | vyākhyātāropi dṛśyavikalpayoraikyaṃ kimiti na pratipadyanta iti cedāha | "pratibhāsabhedādibhya" iti dṛśyasya hi spaṣṭaḥ pratibhāso na vikalpasya | vikalpānubaddhasya spaṣṭatvāyogāt | ādiśabdānniruddhepi dṛśye vikalpasyānirodhāt | arthakriyāyāḥ karaṇādakaraṇācca | "tattvacintakā" nyāyānusāriṇaḥ vyākhyātāraḥ | śeṣaṣaṣṭhī ceyantattvasya cintakā iti | tattvasya te cintakā nātattvasyeti sambandhyantaravyavacchedamātrāpekṣāyāṃ kriyākārakabhāvasyāvivakṣitatvāt || cintayatervā pacādyajantasya tattvaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvā svārthikaḥ kanpratyayaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatotra "tṛjakābhyā(paā.2.2.15)"mityādinā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedho nāśaṃkyaḥ | "nābhedamanusandhatte" | dṛśyavikalpayoriti prakṛte |

[171,4]

"yadītyā"di codakaḥ | "pratipattrabhiprāyonuvidhīyate" bāhyeṣu sāmānyavyavasthānaṃ | "tadā'nyāpohopi sāmānyaṃ mā bhūta" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "na hyeva"miti | anyāpohaḥ śabdena codyata ityevaṃ vyavaharttṝṇāṃ nāsti "pratipattiḥ" | ā cā ryo pi tulyatāṃkhyāpayannāha | "na vai kevalami"tyādi | "evamapratipatti"rityanyāpoharūpeṇa |
tvayā yathā "vyaktivyatiriktādibhirākārai"riṣṭaṃ sāmānyantathā"pi naiva pratipattiḥ" |
āśrayād vyatiriktaṃ vai śe ṣi kā dīnāmavyatiriktaṃ sāṃ khyā dī nā mādiśabdāt pratyekaparisamāptatvādiparigrahaḥ | tatra bhedastāvatsāmānyasya na pratibhāsata eva |
iha sāmānyamiti buddhyanutpatteḥ abhedepi vyaktīnāmeva pratibhāsaḥ syānna sāmānyasya | bhedābhede cobhayapakṣabhāvī doṣaḥ syāt | nāpi tatpratyekaparisamāptaṃ yujyate | yata ekavyaktāvekasambandhyeva tat syānnānekasambandhi | na caivaṃ sāmānyamanekasambandhitvādasya samānānāmbhāvaḥ sāmānyamiti vacanāt |

[172,1]

atha vyaktyantareṣu tasya pratyabhijñānāt tatsambandhitvamevamapi bhūtaguṇavadekamanekasambandhi syānna pratyekaparisamāptaṃ | ekaikasyāṃ vyaktāvanekasambandhitvenāpratīteḥ | pratītau vā tatrānekavyaktipratibhāsaḥ syāt | atha vyaktyantarāle'pratibhāsanāt pratyekaparisamāptantaducyate | tatkimetāvatā tasyānekasambandhitvamekatra sidhyati | na ca sāmānye pratyabhijñānaṃ yujyata ityapyuktaṃ | tasmānna tasya pratyekaparisamāptirnāpi nityatvamekatvaṃ vyāpitvaṃ ca pratibhāsata iti sthitaṃ |

[172,2]
