yadi vastubhūtasya sāmānyasyāpohasya ca tulyaḥ pratipattyabhāvo vyavahāre | kastarhyasyā "āśraya" ityata āha | "kevala"mityādi | svalakṣaṇānāṃ vijātīyarahitatva"manyāpohaḥ" so'"bhinnākārāyā" buddhernimittatve"nocyate" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" vijātīyavirahalakṣaṇasyānyāpohasya bhinneṣvapi sarvatra "vastuṣu bhāvāt" tathābhūtasya cānyāpohasya sāmānyabuddhihetutvampratya"virodhāt" | tathā hi yathaikamvṛkṣamavṛkṣād vyāvṛttaṃ paśyatyevamanyamapyatastatraikākārā buddhirutpadyate | na cātra bādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti |

[172,3]

tṛtīyakāraṇamāha | "vyavahārasya ce"tyādi | "tathā darśanā"diti | anyāpohanibandhanatvena darśanāt | etacca tadanyaparihāreṇa pravarttata iti ca dhvanirucyata ityādinā pratipādayiṣyate | "yathe"tyekākārā "iyaṃ" vikalpa"buddhiḥ pratibhāti" | tathā bāhyantatsāmānyannāstīti vākyārthaḥ | ta"to na vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ" vikalpadarśanāśraya ityabhiprāyaḥ ||

[173,1]

sāmānyābhāve ca kāraṇamāha | "yasmā"dityādi | "vyaktayaḥ" svalakṣaṇāni | "nānuyanti" na miśrībhavanti | etenāvyatiriktasāmānyābhyupagamo nirastaḥ |

[173,2]

vyatiriktanirākaraṇārthamāha | "anyadanuyāyī"ti | anuyāyi yadiṣṭaṃ bhedebhyonyat sāmānyarūpantatpratyakṣabuddhau "na bhāsate" |

[173,3]

nanu vikalpapratibhāsepi sāmānye bhedābhedapakṣayorayamananvayādidoṣastulya eveti kathaṃ sāmānyamiṣyate | samānākārastāvat pratibhāsata eva | yāvadasau na budhyate bhedābhedarahita iti tāvadasyālaṅkāra evāvastutvapratipādanād |
ata eva yathāpratibhāsaṃ tvasāvastītyucyate |

[173,4]

"anvāviśanti" miśrībhavanti | yadi "paraspara"manvāveśaḥ syāttadaikarūpāpatte"rbhedābhāvaḥ" | tena kāraṇena "sāmānyasyaivābhāvaprasaṅgāt" | tena bhedānāṃ samānānāmekākārapratyayanibandhanatvaṃ dharmaḥ sāmānyaṃ | tadbhedābhāvena bhavedityarthaḥ | "anyacce"ti vyaktibhyaḥ anyadityasya vivaraṇaṃ "vyatirikta"miti | "tathā" tena rūpeṇa sāmānya"buddhau" | anenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sāmānyasyābhāvavyavahāre sādhye svabhāvānupalambha uktaḥ | na cānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyamabhyupeyaṃ | yasmāda"pratibhāsa"mānaṃ "ca"
sāmānyaṃ "kathamātmanā" svena sāmānyarūpeṇa | "anya"miti sāmānyavantaṃ "grāhaye"t | "vyapadeśayedvā" | svena rūpeṇa | kathamanyamiti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ | sāmānyabalād vyaktiṣvabhinnābhidhānajñānavṛttiriṣṭā | tasmāt sāmānyamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptameveṣṭamiti samudāyārthaḥ | evantāvad grāhyalakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalambhānnāstyekamanekasambandhi |

[173,5]

bhavatu nāmaikamanekasambaddhantathāpi sāmānyarūpatā na yuktetyāha | "na ce"tyādi | "tairi"ti vyaktibhedaiḥ "ukta"miti dvitvādi | saṃyogakāryadravyeṣvapi sāmānyasvabhāvatvaṃ prāpnotītyaprasaṃgasyoktatvāt | ekamanekasambaddhamityeva kṛtvā na sāmānyaṃ kintva"bhinnābhidhānapratyayanimittamekasāmānyaṃ na sarva" dvitvādyapi | tasya yathoktaśabdajñānānimittatvāditi cet | "kathamanyataḥ" sāmānyā"danya"tra vyaktibhede sāmānyenaikarūpatāmanāpādite | "pratyayavṛttire"kākārajñānavṛttiḥ |

[174,1]

"tatsambandhādi"ti paraḥ | tābhirvyaktibhiḥ sambandhādanyatopi sāmānyādanyatra pratyayavṛttiḥ |

[174,2]

"saṃkhyetyā" cā ryaḥ | bhāvalakṣaṇā ceyaṃ saptamī | saṃkhyāyāṃ satyāṃ "kāryadravye'vaya"vini "sati | ādi"śabdāt saṃyogādiṣu sannapratyayavṛttestepi sāmānyaṃ prāpnuvantīti samudāyārthaḥ | "asāmānyātmakatvāt" saṃkhyādīnāntadvalena dravye naikākārapratyayavṛttiriti "cet" |

[174,3]

nanu sa evāyaṃ sāmānyātmā vicāryate | "koyaṃ sāmānyātme"ti | saṃkhyādibhyo vivekena sāmānyalakṣaṇasyaivāpratītatvāt | naitad vyaktamiti yāvat | tadevāha | "tatre"tyādi | "tatra" koyaṃ sāmānyātmeti pṛṣṭe tvayoktamekasyānekena "sati sambandhe"
vyaktiṣvabhinna"pratyayavṛttiḥ | tata" iti pratyayavṛtteḥ kāraṇādanekasambaddhamekaṃ"sāmānyami"ti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ |

[174,4]

atra sāmānyalakṣaṇe'smābhirucyate | "anekasambandhi"no vidyante yeṣāṃ kāryadravyādīnāṃ | ādiśabdāt dvitvādiparigrahaḥ | tebhyopi tadāśrayadravyeṣvekākārapratyayotpattiḥ syāt | kiṅkāraṇam | "nimittasambhavāt" | tathā hyanekasambandhādeva nimittāt sāmānyādekapratyayotpattiriṣyate | asti cānekasambandhitvamekapratyayanimittandravyādiṣvapi | "tata"ścetyekapratyayapravṛtteḥ saṃkhyādīnāṃ "sāmānyātmatā |
anya"theti | yathoktasāmānyalakṣaṇayogepi saṃkhyādiṣu sāmānyātmatā yadi neṣyate | "anyatrāpi" sāmānyābhimate "mā bhūt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "viśeṣābhāvāt | tathā ca"
dravyādīnāmapi sāmānyarūpatāpattau "dravyaguṇādīnāṃ rūpasaṃkaraḥ | buddhereva pratibhāsa"iti vikalpabuddherekākārapratibhāsaḥ "sāmānya"miti sambandhaḥ | sa ca jñānarūpatvāt |
jñānavat sanneva | taduktaṃ |

[175,1]

"sāmānyaṃ vastu rūpaṃ hi buddhyākāro bhaviṣyati | vasturūpā ca sā buddhiḥ śabdārtheṣūpajāyate | tena vastveva kalpyeta vācyaṃ buddhyanapohakamiti | "

[175,2]

"tanne"tyādinā pratiṣedhati | yattajjñānarūpaṃ sāmānyamiṣyate | tajjñā"nādavyatiriktaṃ"
jñānasvalakṣaṇavat "kathamathantara"mbāhyaṃ "brajet" | na teṣāṃ sāmānyamiti yāvat |

[175,3]

tad vyācaṣṭe | "jñānasye"tyādi | "tasya" jñānarūpasya "teṣvartheṣvabhāvāt" |

[175,4]

satyaṃ | na jñānarūpasya vyaktiṣvanvayaḥ kintu tasmin buddhipratibhāse "tadbhāvādhyavasāyā"t | bāhyabhāvādhyavasāyāt | "tathā bhrāntyā" samāna"vyavahāra"
iti cet |

[175,5]

etacceṣṭameva si ddhā nta vā di naḥ | kevalaṃ prakṛtyaikakāryāḥ vyaktayo'tatkāryād vyāvṛttāḥ | tathābhūtāyā vikalpabuddhernimittamityanyāpohāśrayā sā buddhirityabhimataṃ śāstrakārasya |

[175,6]

parastvevaṃbhūtaṃ nimittaṃ necchati | ata eva siddhāntavādī nimittameva paryanuyuṃkte | "tatre"tyādi | "tatra" vyaktibhedeṣvavastubhūteṣu vyaktīnāṃ ca prakṛtyā vijātīyavyāvṛttānāmekakāryatvānicchatatojñāno"tpatteḥ kinnibandhanaṃ" | naiva kiñcit | tathā hi paro vijātīyavyāvṛttānāṃ bhedānāmekapratyayahetutvannecchati |
na cāsti vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ | "anāśrayasye"tyanimittisya sāmānyajñānasyo"tpattau sarvatra syā"diti gaurityekākāraḥ pratyayo vṛkṣeṣvapi syāt |

[175,7]

"jñānādavyatirikta"mityāderaparamarthamāha | "athave"tyādi | pūrvamarthāntaraśabdenabāhyamuktamadhunā jñānāntaraṃ nirdiśyate | ata evāha | "kathamanyasya punarjñānasyeti" |
kimviśiṣṭasya jñānasya | "vyaktyantarabhāvi"naḥ | ekasyāṃ govyaktau yadvikalpavijñānantatonyatra govyaktyantareṇa samutpannasya vikalpajñānasyetyarthaḥ | tathā hyanekajñānavyāpanādvā sāmānyambhavet | bāhyavyaktivyāpanādvā | jñānapratibhāsasya tu dvayamapyasat | tadāha | "tataśce"tyādi | "vyaktyantara"miti bāhyaṃ ||

[176,1]

"tasmā"dityupasaṃhāraḥ |

[176,2]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "kenaci"diti sāmānyarūpeṇa | "tathaiṣāṃ grahaṇa"mityarthānāṃ samānā iti grahaṇaṃ ||

[176,3]

nanu si ddhā nta vā di nā pyasya vikalpasya nibandhanaṃ vācyamanāśrayasyotpattau sarvatra prasaṃgādityāha | "itaretarabheda" ityādi | "saṃjñā" saṃketakriyā "yadarthikā" |
ya itaretarabhedaḥ | arthaḥ phalaṃ pratyāyyatvena yasya iti kṛtvā sa evambhūta itaretarabhedo bhāvānāmanyonyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇosya mithyāvikalpasya "bījaṃ saṃjñā" saṃketakriyā | "yadarthikā" | yasyetaretarabhedasya pratyāyanaphalā |

[176,4]

"yasye"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | yasye"taretarabheda"sya "pratyāyanārthaṃ saṃketaḥ kriyate |
atatsādhyebhya" ityatatkāryebhyo "bhinnāsādhyānbhāvā"nbhedena"jñātvā" ta"tparihāreṇe"tyetat kāryaparihāreṇa tatkāryeṣu "pravartte"teti kṛtvā "saṃketaḥ kriyate | soyaṃ" yathokta itaretarabheda"stasyaikātmatāpratibhā"sina ekākārasya mi"thyāvikalpa"sya "bījaṃ" kāraṇaṃ | "tameva gṛhṇa"nniti bhedaṃ bhinnamityarthaḥ | etaccādhyavasāyavaśāducyate | na punarvikalpasya vastugṛhaṇamasti | "eṣa vikalpa" iti sāmānyākāro vikalpaḥ "svavāsanāprakṛte"riti vikalpavāsanāsvabhāvāt | "e"vamityekākāratayā "pratibhā"ti || 74 ||

[176,5]

"kathaṃ punarbhinnānāṃ" svalakṣaṇānā"mabhinnaṃ kārya"mekākāravikalpātmakaṃ | "ye"netyekakāryatvena | "tadanyebhyo"'tatkāryabhyo "bhedā"ddhetorvyaktīnā"mabheda ityucte" |
ekāsaṃsargastadvyatirekiṇāṃ samānateti vacanāt |

[177,1]

"prakṛti"rityādinā pariharati | prakṛtiḥ svabhāva ekākāraṃ pratyabhijñāna"mekapratyavamarśaḥ" | anubhavajñānamarthajñānaṃ | "ekapratyavamarśaścārthajñā"naṃ ceti dvandvaḥ |
pūrvanipātalakṣaṇasya vyabhicāritvāt | "alpājtara"tvepyarthajñānaśabdasya na pūrvanipātaḥ kṛtaḥ | te "ādī" yasyeti vigrahaḥ | ādiśabdād dahanagṛhādikāryagrahaṇaṃ |
ekapratyavamarśādirevaikortha iti karmadhārayaḥ | "tasya sādhane" siddhau "bhedepi" nānātvepi"niyatāḥ" kecit | "svabhāvena" prakṛtyā | "indriyā"divat | athavaikāntena "bhede"pi svahetubhyaḥ "keci"t samānā utpannāḥ kecidasamānā ityetaccoktantatra ye samānā utpannāste tena svabhāvenaikākāraṃ pratyayañjanayanti vināpi "sāmānyenendriyādiva"t | tatraikapratyavamarśajñānasādhane "niyatā" ityetad dārṣṭāntikatvenopanyastamarthajñānādyekārthasādhana ityetattu dṛṣṭāntatvenobhayasiddhatvāt |

[177,2]

ata evādau vibhajyate | "yathendriye"tyādi | "yathendriyālokamanaskārā rūpavijñānamekaṃ janayantīti" sambandhaḥ | etadvastubalasiddhamudāharati | "ātme"tyādi parasiddhāntāśrayeṇa | nityamaṇu manaḥ śīghraṃ cetyaṇusvarūpammanaḥ | "tatsannika"rṣāityā"tmendriyamanorthasannikarṣāḥ" | "ātmā manasā saṃyujyate mana indriyeṇendriyamarthene"ti vacanāt | ātmendriyamanorthāśca tatsannikarṣāśceti dvandvaḥ | ātmendriyamanorthāḥ | yathāsvaṃ sannikarṣasahāyā vijñānaṃ janayantīti parābhyupagamaḥ | "asatyapi" ta"dbhāvani"yata ityekakāryatvaniyate | na hi cakṣurādīnāṃ cakṣurvijñānajanakatvaṃ nāma sāmānyampareṇeṣṭaṃ |

[178,1]

adhunā dārṣṭāntikamvyācaṣṭe | "śiṃśapādaya" iti śiṃśapākhadiranyagrodhādayaḥ"parasparānanvaye"pi | vṛkṣatvasāmānyavirahepi vṛkṣa it"yekākāraṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ janayanti" | pratyabhijñānā"danyāmvā dahanagṛhādi"kāṃ "kāṣṭhasādhyāmarthakri"yāṃ śiṃśapādayo"janayantī"ti prakṛtaṃ | "yathāpratyaya"miti yāvad | agnisahakāripratyayalābhastadā dahanaṃ janayanti | gṛhānukūlapratyayasaṃpāte gṛhaṃ | ādiśabdād rathādikāryaparigrahaḥ | "na tu bhedāviśeṣepi jalādayaḥ" kāṣṭhasādhyārthakriyāsamarthāḥ prakṛtyā teṣāmatatkāryatvāt | atrāpi dṛṣṭāntamāha | "śrotrādivad rūpajñāna" iti | yathā śrotraśabdādayo rūpavijñāne karttavye na samarthāḥ | ādiśabdād rasādivijñāne ||

[178,2]

syādetad | bahūnāṃ pratyekamekakāryakarttṛtvaṃ sāmānyamantareṇa na sidhyatītyata āha | "jvarā"dityādi | "sahe"ti vyaktyantarasahitāḥ | "pratyeka"mityekaikarūpā jvarādiśamane ekasmin kārye "dṛṣṭā yathauṣadhayaḥ | vā" śabdaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭāntāpekṣayā | "na cāparā" dadhitrapu"ṣā"dayaḥ |

[178,3]

"yathe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na tatra" jvarādiśamane karttavye "sāmānya"moṣadhitvaṃ nāmā"pekṣante" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "bhedepi tatprakṛtikatvā"t | jvarādiśamanakāryasvabhāvatvāt | yadi bhedānāmasāmarthyaṃ syāt | bhavetsāmānyāpekṣā | "na tadavi" bhedāviśeṣepi "dadhitrapusādayaḥ" | dadhyeva mandajātandadhitrapusaṃ | dadhi ca trapusaśceti dvandva"manye" vyācakṣate ||

[178,4]

tāsu guḍūcīvyaktyādiṣu "tathābhūtāsve"kakāryakāriṇīṣu | "kiṃcidi"ti vyatiriktamavyatiriktaṃ ca | taduktaṃ |

[179,1]

"nirvarttyamānaṃ yatkarma jātistatrāpi sādhanaṃ | svāśrayasyābhiniṣpattyai sā kriyāyāḥ prayojiketi | "

[179,2]

"tata eva" sāmānyāt "tadekaṃ" jvarādiśamanalakṣaṇaṃ "kāryan"tataścāsiddho dṛṣṭānta iti bhāvaḥ |

[179,3]

"tadayuktami"ti si ddhā nta vā dī | "aviśeṣāt sāmānyas"yeti | ekatvānnityatvācca aviśiṣṭaṃ "sāmānyan"ti śamanakāryakṛt | anyathā sāmānyasyāviśeṣā"ttāsāṃ" gūḍūcyādivyaktīnāṃ "kṣetrādibhede"pi tasyāpi jvarādiśamanakārya"syāviśeṣaprasaṃgataḥ | ciraśīghre"tyādi | viśiṣṭakṣetrotpannānāṃ śīghrapraśamanaṃ viparītānāṃ cirapraśamanaṃ | "ādi"śabdāccirataraśīghratarādiparigrahaḥ | kṣetrasaṃskārādibhinnānāṃ gūḍūcyādīnāmupayogāddehe ārogyādilakṣaṇasya "guṇasya tāratamyaṃ ca na syāt" | sāmānyasyaikyāt | "atha" kṣetrādibhedena "sāmānyasya viśeṣa" iṣyate |
tadā viśeṣe vā sāmānyasyeṣyamāṇe "svabhāvabhedaḥ" syād viśeṣalakṣaṇatvād bhedasya | "tata"śca "svarūpahānaṃ" | sāmānyasvarūpamekaṃ hīyate | "dhrauvyācca" kāraṇāt "sāmānya"sya vyaktibhyo"nupakārato" na sāmānyaṃ kāryakṛditi varttate | "yadi hi sāmānyamupakuryāt"
tadā nityatvāt sahakāribhi"ranādheyaviśe"ṣasyā"nyānapekṣaṇatvāt" sahakāryanapekṣaṇāt tat sāmānyaṃ "svakārya sakṛjjanayet" | atha na janayet tadā "tajjananasvabhāvaṃ na bhava"ti | ajananāvasthāyā aviśeṣāt kāryakālepi na janayediti yāvat |
vyaktīnāṃ tvanityānāṃ kāryakṛttve nāyaṃ doṣa ityāha | "vyaktayas"tvityādi | "saṃskāro" jalāvasekādi | "viśiṣṭā utpa"ttiryāṃsāntāstathā | viśeṣosyāstīti"viśeṣavat kāryaṃ" jvarādiśamanalakṣaṇaṃ | na ca tāsu vyaktiṣu yacchīghrakāritvādilakṣaṇamavāntarasāmānyamavasthintadeva viśeṣavat kāryakārīti yuktamvaktuṃ |
oṣadhyanupayogepi puṃsaḥ tatkāryodayaprasaṅgāt | "tadvadi"ti viśiṣṭavyaktivat | "keci"diti sajātīyā "ekapratyabhijñānā"dikaṃ | "ādi"śabdād ekodakādyāharaṇādi | "tadakāribhya" iti | pratyabhijñānādyakāribhyo "bhedāda"bhinnā ityucyante | na tvekasāmānyayogāt |

[180,1]

kāryadvāreṇābhedaṃ pratipādya kāraṇadvāreṇāha | "ekena ve"tyādi | yathā prayatnena ghaṭabhedā "atajjanyebhya" ityaprayatnajanyebhyo "bhedādabhinnā" ityucyante | yadyapi pratighaṭaṃ prayatnasya bhedastathāpyekapratyabhijñānahetutvena tasyāpyekatvaṃ | etaccottaratra niścāyayiṣyate |

[180,2]

"kimpunari"tyādi paraḥ | "bhedo" vyāvṛtti"rlakṣaṇaṃ" nimittaṃ yasya "tena" sāmānyenā tatkāryebhyo'tatkāraṇebhyaśca vyāvṛttaṃ "svalakṣaṇaṃ samānamiti pratye"yaṃ | "anyathānyadeve"ti svalakṣaṇādanyad vikalpabuddhiparivarttirūpamanarthakriyākāri | "tena" bhedalakṣaṇena sāmānyena samānamiti pratyeyaṃ |

[180,3]

"nanu" tadeṣāṃ buddhipratibhāsamanurundhānairbuddhiviparivarttināmeva bhāvānāmākāraviśeṣaparigrahād bahiriva parisphuratāṃ sāmānyamucyata iti pūrvamuktatvāt sandehānuvṛttireva |

[180,4]

satyaṃ | kintvadhikasya doṣasya vidhānārthaṃ upanyāsaḥ | doṣavijñānārthamāha | "kiṃcāta" iti | itaro "yadī"tyādinā praśnābhiprāyamāha | "yadi svala"kṣaṇaṃ pratyeyaṃ"kathaṃ vikalpaviṣayaḥ" | tathā hi vikalpabuddhyabhiprāyavaśād bhedalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ vyavasthāpyate tasyā abhiprāyavaśāt | "sāmānyaṃ satprakīrti"tamiti vacanāt |
tathābhūtena cet sāmānyena svalakṣaṇaṃ samānaṃ pratyeyaṃ | tadā vikalpasya viṣayaḥ syāt |
na caitad yuktamathānyadeva buddhiparivartti rūpaṃ samānamiti pratyeyaṃ | atrāpi doṣamāha | "anyato vā kathamarthakri"yā | na hi buddhipratibhāsirūpād arthakriyā sambhavati | tataścātatkāribhyo bhedādabhinnā ityucyanta iti kāryadvāreṇa sāmānyavyavasthā na ghaṭate | yataśca buddhiparivartti rūpaṃ samānantataḥ "svalakṣaṇe cānityatvādi"sāmānyasyā"pratīteratādrūpyama"nityādirūpatvaṃ svalakṣaṇasya na bhavet | svalakṣaṇe cānityatvādīnāmapratīte"steṣāṃ cā"nityatvādīnā"mavastudharmatā" |

[181,1]

"ne"tyādinā pariharati | buddhipratibhāsinyeva rūpe sāmānyādivyavahāra ityayaṃ pakṣo gṛhītaḥ | tadāha | "jñānapratibhāsinyartha" ityādi |

[181,2]

etacca grahaṇakavākyaṃ | asyaiva vyākhyānaṃ | "yadetajjñānaṃ vikalpaka"mityanena sambandhaḥ | "atadviṣayama"pi vastusvabhāvaviṣayamapi "tadviṣayamiva" svalakṣaṇaviṣayamiva | "adhyavasitatadbhāvamāropitabāhya"bhāvaṃ svarūpaṃ yasya tattathā | yataścādhyavasitatadbhāvamataḥ svalakṣaṇaviṣayameveti manyate | "adhyavasitatadbhāvasvarū"patvameva kathamiti cedāha | "tadanubhavāhitavāsanāprabhavaprakṛte"riti | tasya svalakṣaṇasya yonubhavastenāhitā vāsanā tataḥ prabhava utpādastasya sāmānyasya sā prakṛtiḥ svabhāvo yenādhyavasitabhāvasvarūpambhavatītyarthaḥ | "abhinnakā"ryā ye "padā"rthā ghaṭādayaḥ | ekākārapratyayajñānahetava"stebhyaḥ" paramparayā "prasū"tera"bhinnārthagrāhī"va pratibhāti | na tu sāmānyavastubhūtaṃ kiṃcid vyatiriktamavyatiriktamvā'sti yat tad gṛhṇīyāt | "paramārthatastu tadanyabhedasamākā"raṃ tebhyaḥ sajātīyābhimatebhyo'nye vijātīyāstebhyo bhedaḥ bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva paramārthena samāna ākāro yasyeti vigrahaḥ | tata eva tasyotpattestannivarttanatvācca "tadanyabheda"stasya "samāna ākā"ra ityucyate |

[181,3]

"tatrā"nantarokte jñāne "eka ive"ti sarvavyaktyanugata iva | "tatkārīve"tyarthakriyākārīva | kiṃ punastathā pratibhātīti cedāha | "vyavahāriṇā"mityādi | "tathādhyavasā"yeti vikalpāṃśameva "bāhyatvenaikatvenārthakriyākāritve"nādhyavasāyavyavahāriṇāṃ "pravṛtteḥ | vyavahāribhi"rityanye paṭhanti | vyavahāribhirityadhyavasāyetyanena pūrvasambandhāt tṛtīyaiva kṛtā | na tu ṣaṣṭhī | "na lokāvyayaniṣṭhe(paā.2.3.69)"tiṣaṣṭhī pratiṣedhāt | "anyatheti" yadi vikalpāṃśe bāhyādhyavasāyo na bhavettadā tathābhūte vikalpe jātepyarthakriyākāriṇī "pravṛttirna syāt" | tadapi vikalpapratibimbakaṃ vyavaharttṛpuruṣādhyavasāyavaśā"darthakriyākārita"yā "pratibhā"sate | tataśca "tadatatkāribhyo bhinnamiva" | vikalpaprativimbakameva tattvaṃ kasmānneti cedāha | "na ce"tyādi | tadvikalpaprativimbakanna "tattvaṃ" na vastu | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | anarthakriyākāritvena pa"rīkṣā"yā vyabhicārasyā"naṅgatvā"t | etaccānantarameva pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ |

[182,1]

tatra ye svalakṣaṇadvārā yātā arthākārā vikalpabuddhau pratibhānti "te'rthā"
vikalpabuddhipratibhāsinas"tena" bhedalakṣaṇena sāmānyena "samā"nā "iti gṛhyante | kutaścid vyāvṛttā" iti vijātīyavyāvṛttyā | tathā hi | vikalpapratibhāsinopi vṛkṣabhedā adhyavasitabāhyarūpatvād avṛkṣebhyo vyāvṛttā iva bhāsante | tathānyeti | "na svalakṣaṇa"ntena samānamiti gṛhyata iti liṅgavacanavipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ |
kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tatra" sāmānyapratibhāsini vikalpe svalakṣaṇā"pratibhāsanāt" |

[182,2]

evantāvad buddhipratibhāsinyarthe sāmānyavyavahāra uktaḥ | saṃprati sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāramāha | "ta eve"tyādi | "ta eva" vikalpapratibhāsinorthāḥ | "kutaścid vyāvṛttā" iva santo yathānutpalād vyāvṛttā utpalabhedāsta eva puna"ranyatopya"nīlād"vyāvṛttimantaḥ pratibhānti" | tataśca vyāvṛttidvayānugatasyaikasyaiva dharmiṇaḥ pratibhāsanāt sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ |

[182,3]

ayaṃ cānantarānukrānto buddhipratibhāsiṣvartheṣu sāmānyasāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāro mithyārtha eva kriyate | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "svayamasatāma"pi vikalpākārāṇāntathā ekākārānugatatvena | vyāvṛttidvayānugatena dharmmasvarūpeṇa | vikalpa"buddhyopa" | ekākāreṇa pratibhāsanāt "sāmā"nyavyavahāraḥ | anekākāreṇa caikasya pratibhāsanāt "sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāraḥ" |

[183,1]

yadi mithyārtha eva sarvo vikalpaḥ kasmāt kṛtakatvādidvārāyātā anityānātmādivikalpāḥ pramāṇaṃ nityā vikalpāstu netyata āha | "sarvaścāya"mityādi | "sarvo viplava" iti sambandhaḥ | "viplavo" bhrāntiḥ | "aya"miti sāmānyādirūpaḥ | "svalakṣaṇānāmeva" yaddarśanantenāhitā yā vāsanā tatkṛtaḥ | paramparayā sarvavikalpānāmvastudarśanadvārāyātatvāt | tathā hi nityādivikalpā api vastudarśanenaivotpannāḥ sadṛśāparāparotpattidarśanāyātatvāt | tatra tulye sarvavikalpānāmvastudarśanadvārāyātatve | "tatpratibaddhajanmanāma"nityādi"vikalpānāmatatpratibhāsitvepi"
svalakṣaṇāpratibhāsitvepi "vastunya"visamvādaḥ | adhyastasyānityādirūpasya vastuni vidyamānatvāt kevalaṃ svalakṣaṇarūpeṇa na pratibhāsata iti vikalpo vibhrama ucyate | "maṇiprabhāyāmiva maṇibhrānte"rmaṇisvarūpāgrahepyavisamvādo maṇiprabhāyā maṇau pratibaddhatvāt | prabhāśrayeṇa ca maṇibhrānterutpatteḥ |

[183,2]

na tvevannityādivikalpāsteṣāmvastudarśanadvārāyātatvepi vastunyavidyamānasyaivākārasya samāropāt | tadāha | "nānyeṣā"mityādi | anyeṣāṃ nityādivikalpānāṃ vastuni samvāda ityanena sambandhaḥ | "tadbhedaprabhave satyapī"ti | arthābhedād utpādepi satītyarthaḥ | "yathā dṛṣṭo" yo "viśeṣaḥ" kṣaṇikatvādilakṣaṇastasyā"nusaraṇaṃ" niścayaṃ "parityajya kiñcitsāmānya"miti vyatiriktasyāvyatiriktasya vā sāmānyasya "grahaṇena" viśeṣāttasya sthiratvādeḥ "samāropāt | dīpaprabhāyāmiva"
bhāsuratvādisāmyāt pravṛttāyā "maṇibuddherna" maṇivastusamvādaḥ | pāramparyeṇāpyadhyavasite maṇāvapratibaddhatvāt | yataśca mithyārthā eva vikalpās"tena na vikalpaviṣayeṣvartheṣvarthakriyākāritvaṃ" | tataśca yaduktamanyato vā kathamarthakriyeti tatsiddhaṃ sādhyate |

[183,3]

kathantarhyatatkārivyavacchedalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ vikalpaviṣayeṣvartheṣu vyavasthāpyata iti cet | na | bahiriva parisphuratāmekārthakriyākāritayā tadakāribhyo bhinnānāmiva pratibhāsanāt | yaccoktaṃ | svalakṣaṇe cānityatvādyapratīteratādrūpyamiti tatparihārārthamāha | "nāpītyādi | calād vastuno" yasmā"nnānityatvannāma kiñcadasti" | yenāsambaddhāt svalakṣaṇasyānityatvenāyogaḥ syāt | kintu calameva vastu nityaṃ svalakṣaṇasyaivānityarūpatvādevamanātmādyapi draṣṭavyaṃ | tena pratyakṣeṇa svalakṣaṇe gṛhyamāṇe'nityatvaṃ gṛhītameva kevalaṃ bhrāntinimittasadbhāvādaniścitam | atastanniścayamātre'numānavyāpārastena tanniścaya eva svalakṣaṇe'nityatvapratītiriti siddhaṃ |

[184,1]

yadi svalakṣaṇamevānityaṃ kathamanityoyamartho'nityatvamasyeti vā dharmidharmarūpatayā pratītirityata āha | "kṣaṇe"tyādi | svalakṣaṇasya "tathābhūtasye"ti calarūpasya kṣaṇāpratyupasthānatayā | eka"kṣaṇasthāyitvena grahaṇād" uttarakālamantyakṣaṇadarśināmetadevambhavatyanityoyamityādi | bhedāntarāpratikṣepavivakṣāyā"manityoyamiti" bhedāntarapratikṣepavivakṣāyā"manityatvamasyetye"vaṃ dharmidharmabhāvapratītirbhavati |

[184,2]

vikalpakalpitatvāt kathaṃ bāhye dharmadharmibhāva ityata āha | "taddharmatā"mityādi |
taddharmatāṃ svalakṣaṇadharmatāme"vāvatarantaḥ" svalakṣaṇamadhyavasyanto "vikalpā" ityarthaḥ |
vyāvṛttibhede kṛtasaṃketaśabdānusāreṇa "nānā"rūpā "eka"rūpāśca "dharmā"ste ca "vyatire"kāśceti dvandvaḥ | nānādharmān anityakṛtakatvādīn | ekaṃ dharmaṃ bahūnāṃ ghaṭādīnāmanityatvaṃ vyatirekaśca ghaṭādīnāmanityatvamiti "darśaya"nti | vastunītyadhyāhāraḥ | na ca vikalpavyavasthāṃpitannānaikadharmādikantattvamvikalpasyāvastugrāhitvād | ata evāha | "darśayantī"ti |

[184,3]

avastugrāhitvāttarhi "te nirāśrayāḥ" prāpnuvantīti cedāha | "na ca ta" iti | na iti nānādharmādidarśakā vikalpavastu"bhe"dasyānityādirūpasya svalakṣaṇasya yad"darśa"namanubhavastadā"śrayatvād" vikalpānāṃ | tathā hi paramārthato'nityādirūpaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā darśanasāmarthyabhāvino vikalpā dṛṣṭākārādhyavasāyena pravarttante |
yataśca yathādṛṣṭasyaivābhilapanena pravarttante vikalpā anityākārā nārthāntarannityatvādivikalpavadanusaranti | tato yaduktaṃ | teṣāṃ cāvastu dharmateti parihṛtambhavatītyāha | "ne"ti | teṣāmanityatvādīnāṃ "nāvastudharmatā" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tatsvabhāvasyaiva tathā"'nityādidharmatayā khyāteḥ "pratibhāsanā"dadhyavasāyāditi yāvat | yadivastudharma evānityatvādikaṃ khyāti | kastarhi vikalpakṛto vibhrama ityāha | "vastunastvi"tyādi | ekasya vastuno "nānā"rūpeṇa grahaḥ | bahūnāṃ "caika"tvena | dharmadharmiṇośca "vyatirekeṇa graho vibhramo" bhrānta ityarthaḥ | kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamekatvādigraho vibhrama ityāha | "tasyaikāne"ketyādi | ekakāryakāriṇo ghaṭādibhedasyaikodakādyāharaṇādikāryakāriṇaḥ | "tathā bhāvajijñāsā"su | ekakāryakarttṛtvajijñāsāsu | "tathābhāvakhyāpanā"yaikakāryakāritvakhyāpanāya | tathākṛtasthititvāt | ghaṭādinā ekarūpeṇa vyavahāralāghavārthamvyavasthāpitatvāt | tathakasyāpyanekāryakāriṇaḥ | yathā ghaṭasya cakṣurvijñānodakadhāraṇakādācitkajñānādikāryakāriṇastathābhāvajijñāsāsu tathābhāvakhyāpanāya | anekakāryatvakhyāpanāya tathākṛtasthitatvāt | cākṣuṣapārthivānityādirūpeṇa "vyavasthāpitatvā"t | evamanyatrāpi yathāyogaṃ vācyaṃ | "na vastubhedād"
ekasmin padārthe'nekadharmavyavasthāpanaṃ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tasyaivaika"sya vastuno'"nekatvāyogā"t | tataścaikasyānekatvagraho vibhrama ityākhyātaṃ | tathānekasyāpyekatvavyavasthāpanantadakāryavyāvṛttidvāreṇaiva na vastvabhedādityāha | "anekasya caikatvāyogā"diti | tathā cānekasyaikatvagraho vibhramaḥ | evaṃ dharmadharmiṇorvyatirekagrahopi bhrānta eva | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "vyatirikta"sya ca sāmānyasya prāgeva "niṣedhāt |
vyaktayo nānuyantyanyadityādinā" |

[185,1]

dharmiṇaḥ sakāśād vyatiriktā eva dharmāstataśca yathāvastu śabdārtho bhaviṣyatītyāha | "teṣā"mityādi | "teṣā"manityatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ "prakṛteḥ" svabhāvasya"bhedāt" kāraṇād "yathāvastu śabdārthābhyupagame" nīlotpalamanityaḥ śabda ityādi"sāmānādhikaraṇyāyogāt" | nīlādiguṇānāmutpalādijātīnāñca parasparaṃ svabhāvabhedāt | tadvācināṃ śabdānāmekasminnadhikaraṇe vṛttirnāstīti sāmānādhikaraṇyāyogaḥ | tasmānna yathāvastu śabdārthavyavastheti bhāvaḥ |

[186,1]

"tadupādhe"rityādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | te nīlādayo dharmā upādhiryasya dravyasya tasyai"kasya" dvābhyāṃ guṇajātibhyāma"bhidhānā"d "adoṣaḥ" | sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvadoṣo nāsti | uttaramāha | "anupakāriṇī"tyādi | upādhitvenābhimatānāṃ nīlādīnāṃ dharmāṇāmanupakārakandravyaṃ | na hi nīlaguṇasyotpalatvajātervā dravyeṇopakāraḥ kaścid kriyate | tataścā"nupakāriṇi" dravye tadanādheyavṛttīnāṃ nīlādīnāṃ"pāratantryāyogā"t | nīlādayo dharmā anupādhiḥ | pāratantryābhāvāt | anyathā'syāyamupādhirityeva na syāt | atheṣyate dravyaviṣayaṃ pāratantryaṃ dharmāṇāntadā "pāratantryepi"
dravya"janya"tvamaṅgīkarttavyamanyathā dravyapāratantryāyogāt | "janakaṃ" ca kṣaṇikameṣṭavyamakṣaṇikasyārthakriyāyogāt | tataśca kāryābhimatānāmupādhīnāṃ kāraṇābhimatasya ca dravyasya "sahānavasthiteḥ" kāraṇāt | "dvayo"rviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayorvasturūpayoryugapa"danabhidhānaṃ" | kāraṇābhimatasya viśeṣasya tadānīṃ nirodhāt | "ekasye"ti viśiṣṭasyāpyupādhimataḥ | "adhyāhāra" upadarśanantadā "na vastuviṣayaḥ śabdārthaḥ syāt" | buddhyāropitasyaiva viśeṣasya śabdenābhidhānāt |

[186,2]

syānmataṃ | yadvinaṣṭaṃ viśeṣyantadviṣayasya śabdasya bhavatu buddhipratibhāsaviṣayatvaṃ | yaḥ punaḥ sannevopādhistadvācinaḥ śabdasya vastuviṣayatvamevāstviti cedāha | "buddhipratibhāse"tyādi | buddhipratibhāso viṣayo yasyābhidhānasya tattathā | tadbhāvastasmin sati "sarvaṃ" viśeṣaṇaviṣayābhimatamapyabhidhānanta"thaiva"
vikalpabuddhipratibhāsaviṣayamevāstu | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tathā bhinnopādhimato"
nānāviśeṣaṇavata "ekasya grahaṇe" buddhāvabhā"sanāt" | tathā hyupādhimato vinaṣṭasyādhyāhārikā vikalpabuddhiraṅgīkarttavyā | tadā copādhimato'bhāve upādherapyabhāvaḥ pāratantryābhāvāt | "bhinnopādhimata ekasyāpratibhā"sane kutaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ |

[186,3]

yadā tu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayordvayorapi vikalpabuddhipratibhāsitvamiṣṭantadā kalpita dharmadvayagṛhītaikadharmipratibhāsinyekaiva buddhirjāyata ityaviruddhaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ |

[186,4]

"upakāryetyā"dinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | "adoṣo" yoyamekasya buddhyādhyāhāra ityādinoktaḥ | "upādhimatā samakāla"sya niṣpannarūpasyopādheḥ "pāratantryābhāvādanupādhitvaṃ" | prāk pāratantryantadevopādhitvamiti cedāha | "ne"tyādi | na hyaniṣpannasya śaśaviṣāṇatulyasya pāratantryamupādhitvamvā | sarvathā sato'sataścāsatpāratantryamiti hetoḥ kalpanāropitamupādhīnāmpāratantryaṃ kṛtvā pāratantryavyavahāre | "sarvathe"ti sarveṇa prakāreṇa yathā pāratantrya"vyavahāre" buddhiranuvidhīyate tathā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyavyavahāre "saivā"ropikā "buddhiḥ kinnānuvidhī"yate | tadanuvidhānaṃ hi nyāyyaṃ buddhisandarśitārthapratibhāsamanāśritya vyavaharttumaśakyatvāt | "vastuna ekena śabdena pramāṇena ca viṣayīkaraṇe vastubalā"dvastusvabhāvabhūtā"śeṣadharmākṣepāt tadanyasya" śabdādervai"yarthyaṃ ca" yatprāguktamekasyārthasvabhāvasya pratyakṣasyetyādi |

[187,1]

va stu vā di pakṣe tadbuddhipratibhāsānurodhena syāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "buddhipratibhāsasya nirvastukatvād vastusāmarthyabhāvinā"ndoṣāṇāma"prasaṅgaḥ" | bahuvacanenaitadāha |
na kevalaṃ tadanyavaiyarthyadoṣasyāprasaṅgastathā vyatiriktasya sāmānyasyābhāva upādhīnāṃ ca pāratantryāyogāt |

[187,2]

viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvābhāvaḥ bhinnopādhimata ekasya buddhāvapratibhāsanāt |
sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvaśca ya uktasteṣāmapyatra sambhavo nāstīti tadevāha | "tadabhinnami"tyādi | tathā hi tadbuddhipratibhāsi rūpamabhinnampratibhāti | tasmāt sāmānyaṃ yathā pratītirna virudhyata iti vacanapariṇāmaṃ kṛtvā vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ | nīlamityukte'nīlavyāvṛttyā nīlatvasyai"kasyākārasya viṣayīkaraṇepi" vikalpabuddhyā tatraiva nīlākāre saṃśayavyāvṛtti"rnākārāntare" | tatastadbuddhipratibhāsi rūpamaniścitādyākāramanutpalavyāvṛttotpalākārasyā"niścayā"t | yasminnākāre niścayo notpannasta"dākārānta"rantatra "sākāṃkṣa"yotpalaśabdaprayogād utpannayā "buddhyā grāhyaṃ"
pratibhātīti sambandhaḥ |

[187,3]

etena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasya nimittamuktaṃ | sāmānādhikaraṇasyāha | "bhinne"tyādi | "bhinnasya śabdārthasya" nīlotpalalakṣaṇasyopasaṃhāre "pratipādanepi" | dharmadvayopagṛhīta"mabhinname"kadharmitayā buddhipratibhāsarūpaṃ vikalpa"buddhau pratibhātīti"
kṛtvā "sāmānyā"dīni "yathāpratīti na virudhyante" |

[188,1]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭe na | "anyanivṛttimātramapohaṃ gṛhītvā anīlādivyāvṛttāvanutpalādivyāvṛtterabhāvādanutpalādivyāvṛttau cānīlādivyāvṛtterabhāvācca na viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvastayordharmayostadabhāvācca na tadābhidhāyakayoḥ śabdayoḥ śabdayorapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ | nāpi sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ śabdavācyayorbhinnatvāt | nāpi yatrārthe'pohayorbhāvastaddvārakaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamavastutvenāpohasyādheyatvābhāvāt | na ca svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdaviṣayonyaccādhikaraṇaṃ neṣyate | na ca svalakṣaṇepohayorbhāvepi śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyamekaviṣayatvasyāpratīteri"tyapāstaṃ |

[188,2]

bāhyabhinnasya svākārasya śabdādiviṣayatveneṣṭatvāt tena nīlotpalādiśabdeṣu śabdārthābhidhāyitvamiṣyata eveti sarvaṃ susthaṃ |

[188,3]

"dharmadharmibhedopyasya" buddhipratibhāsasya yathā pratītirna virudhyata iti vacanapariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | tamevā"neketyā"dināha | "anekasmādarthād" buddhipratibhāsasyālīkatvāt | kutonekārthabhedaḥ kevalaṃ puruṣādhyavasāyavaśādevamucyate | "ta"sya buddhipratibhāsas"yaikasmāda"rthād yo "bheda"stasya "vidhipratiṣedhajijñāsāyāṃ" | kimanityaḥ śabdo bhavati cākṣuṣo na bhavatīti "tadeva" buddhipratibhāsabhūta"mvastu" pradarśyata iti sambandhaḥ | kena prakāreṇetyāha | "pratikṣi"ptetyādi |

[188,4]

yadvā dharmadharmibhedopyasya vastuno na virudhyata iti sambandhaḥ | kuta ityāha |
anekasmādarthād bāhyasya bhedasambhave sati tasyaikasmād yo bhedastasya vidhipratiṣedhajijñāsāyāṃ kimanityaḥ śabdo bhavati cākṣuṣo na bhavatīti tadeva bāhyamvastu pradarśyata iti sambandhaḥ | kena pradarśyata ityāha | "pratikṣipte"tyādi | "dharmaśabdena saṃco"dya vya"tiriktaṃ dharmamiva vyavasthā"pyeti sambandhaḥ | tathā hyanityatvanna cākṣuṣatvamiti dharmaśabdena codane kṛte vyatirikta ivānityatvādiko dharmo vyavasthāpito bhavati | kiṅkāraṇamityāha | ta"thā buddheḥ pratibhāsanā"t | dharmaśabdena codane vyatiriktasyaiva dharmasya grāhiṇyā buddheḥ pratibhāsanāt | "aviśeṣeṇe"ti sarvabhedāpratikṣepeṇ"āparamasya" bāhyasyāpratikṣiptabhedāntaraṃ "svabhā"vaṃ "dharmitayā vyavasthāpya" śabdena pra"darśyate" |

[189,1]

etaduktambhavati | "dharmaśabdena saṃcodya vyatiriktaṃ dharmami"va pradarśya pu"narddha"miśabdena saṃcodyā"paraṃ svabhāvaṃ dharmita"yā "vyavasthāpya" tadeva bāhyaṃ vastu pradarśyate |
anityatvaṃ śabdasya na cākṣuṣatvam | anityo na cākṣuṣaḥ śabda iti | bhāvabhāvā'ṅśeneti | bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepeṇa "dharmadharmiṇorbhedād bhedavatīva buddhi"rvikalpikā"pratibhāti" bhinnākāreva | na tu vastuno bhedaḥ | "na vastubhedād" bhedavatī buddhiḥ |
kutaḥ | "yathoktadoṣād" anupakāriṇi dharmiṇi dharmāṇāṃ pāratantryāyogāt |

[189,2]

tathā sādhyamanityatvaṃ sādhanaṃ kṛtakatvamiti | sādhyasādhanabhedaścetyata āha | "tathābhūte"tyādi | "tathābhūtānā"mpratikṣiptabhedāntarāṇāṃ "dharmabhedānāmbāhulya"codanayā"vacanabhedaḥ sādhyasādhanabhedaśca" kriyata iti sambandhaḥ |

[189,3]

"tasya" tatastato vyāvṛttasya vastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ "samāśrayo" yeṣāntai"rddharmapratibhāsabhedai"rvikalpabuddhiprativimbairddharmātmakaiḥ pratibhāsabhedairityarthaḥ | kimarthaṃ kriyata ityāha | "tatsvabhā"vetyādi | tasyaiva vyāvṛttasya vastu"svabhāva"sya "pratipattaye" prāptaye vā ||

[189,4]

praṇālikayā teṣāmvastupratibandhāt prakṛtasyaivārthasya sukhagrahaṇārthaṃ saṃgrahaślokamāha | "tatsvabhāve"tyādi | tasya vastusvabhāvasyānubhavādūrddhvaṃ yā dhīḥ prajñāyate "vikalpikā" | apiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ | a"narthikā"pi "tadartheva" | vastuviṣayeva | adhyavasāyavaśādatatkāryebhyo yo "bheda"sta"nniṣṭhā" | tadanubhavabalotpattervyāvṛttasya ca vastunaḥ samvādāttanniṣṭhetyucyate ||

[189,5]

"tasyā"mitthaṃ bhūtāyāmbuddhau yorthākāraḥ dṛśyavikalpayorekīkaraṇād "bāhyamiva" | sajātīyāsu vyaktiṣu samampratibhāsamāname"kamivānyato" vijātīyād vyāvṛttami"vābhāti" | tattu "vyāvṛttame"va buddhirūpasyālīkatvāt | tadbuddhirūpaṃ "nistattvaṃ"niḥsvabhāvaṃ | "kiṅkāraṇaṃ | parīkṣānaṅgabhāvataḥ" | arthakriyāsamarthameva parīkṣāṅgamataḥ "parīkṣānaṅgabhā"venārthakriyāṃ pratyasamarthatvādityuktambhavati | yataśca buddhipratibhāsi rūpannistattvamatastadviṣayo vyavahāro mithyārtha eva pravarttate ityāha ||

[190,1]

"arthā" ityādi | "jñānaviśiṣ"ṭā iti vikalpabuddhyārūḍhāste jñānaviśiṣṭāssantaḥ yato vijātīyād "vyāvṛttirūpiṇo" vyāvṛttirūpavantaḥ | yathānutpalād vyāvṛttirūpiṇa utpalārthāḥ | "tene"tyantato vyāvṛttirūpeṇotpalatvenābhinnā ivābhānti na paramārthato buddhirūpasyālīkatvāt | etena sāmānyavyavahārasya nimittamuktaṃ | "vyāvṛttāḥ punaranyatasta eve"ti | ta eva jñānaviśiṣṭā arthā anyato vyāvṛttirūpiṇaḥ santaḥ punaranyataḥ sajātīyādapi vyāvṛttā bhānti | yathā ta eva nīlabhedā anīlāt | ataśca vyāvṛttidvayopagṛhītasyaikasyārthasya bhāsanāt ||

[190,2]

sāmānādhikaraṇyabījamuktaṃ | tadevāha | "teṣā"mityādi | teṣāmiti buddhipratibhāsināmarthānāṃ "vyavahāraḥ pratanyata" iti sambandhaḥ | teṣāmiti "vyavahā"rāpekṣā karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī | kiṃviśiṣṭo "mithyā"rthaḥ | kaiḥ karaṇabhūtairityāha | "sāmānye"tyādi |
samānādhāratvaṃ sa"mānādhā"raḥ | bhāvapradhānatvānnirdeśasya | sāmānya"viṣayaiḥ" sāmānādhikaraṇyaviṣayaiśca jñānābhidhānaiḥ "sāmānyagocaraiḥ" sāmānyavyavahāraḥ pratanyate |
itaraiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyavahāraḥ ||

[190,3]

yadyapi śabdajñānātmaka eveha vyavahārastathāpi savyāpāratāmupā"dāya jñā"naśabdayoḥ karaṇarūpatā | tayorevārthaprakāśalakṣaṇā kriyā vyavahāratvena vivakṣitetyadoṣaḥ |
yathā jñānasya pramāṇatvaṃ phalatvaṃ veti | "sa ca sarvaḥ" jñānābhidhānalakṣa"ṇo" vyavahāraḥ"padārthānāṃ" svalakṣaṇānāṃ yo"nyonyābhā"vaḥ parasparavyacchedastat"saṃśrayaḥ" | vyāvṛttapadārthānubhavadvāreṇotpatteḥ | "tene"tyanyonyābhāvasaṃśrayatvena sa vyavahāro"nyāpohaviṣaya" ucyate na tvanyavyāvṛttiviṣayatvāt | vidhiviṣayatvādasya vyavahārasya ||

[191,1]

"vastulābha"sya ca vastuprāpteś"cāśrayo" na bhavati vyavahāraḥ | na ca sarvaḥ kintu"yatra" vyavahāre'"sti" pāramparyeṇa tathābhūta"vastusambandhaḥ" | udāharaṇamāha | "yathoktānumitau yathe"ti | "yathoktānumi"tiḥ pūrvoktānumānavikalpaḥ | "nānya"tra sthirādivikalpe tatra pāramparyeṇāpi vastusambandhābhāvāt | vastuno'sthirādirūpatvāt |
anumānavikalpasyetarasya ca svapratibhāsenarthe'rthādhyavasāyad "bhrāntisāmyepi | dī"pa"tejo maṇau yathe"ti | yathā maṇitejasi maṇibuddhirbhrāntā | tathā dīpatejasyapitulyepi bhrāntatve maṇiprabhā maṇitvena gṛhītā maṇāvadhigantavye samvādikā | na tu dīpatejaḥ | tadvat sthirādivikalpo samvādaka ityarthaḥ ||

[191,2]

yadi jñānaniviṣṭānāmevārthānāṃ sāmānyādivyavahāraḥ bāhyeṣvartheṣu tarhi sāmānyādivyavahārābhāvāt pravṛttirna syādityata āha | "tatre"tyādi | "tatra" śabdo vākyopanyāse | nirddhāraṇe vā | tatra vyaktiṣvekakāryā vyaktayo nirddhāryante | "anekopyekakāryo" yathā ghaṭabhedā evodakāharaṇādikāryāstadakāryāya tathābhūtakāryanukurvate |
tebhyonyatāvyāvṛttiḥ sā āśrayo yeṣāṃ "jñānābhidhānā"ttairanekopi padārtha "ekatvena vyavahārampratārya"te | sāmānyavyavahāraṃ prāpyata iti yāvat ||

[191,3]

tathetyanantarasāmānyavyapekṣayā | "ekopyanekakārya"kṛt | yathā ghaṭaśca cakṣurvijñānodakāharaṇādikāryakṛt | "tadbhāvadīpane" | anekakāryakarttṛtvaprakāśane | "atatkārye"bhyo "bhedena" hetunā | "nānādharmā" ghaṭaścākṣuṣaḥ pārthiva ityādi | tena sāmānādhikaraṇyaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavyavahāraśca bāhyeṣveva darśitaḥ ||

[191,4]

yadi bāhyeṣu sāmānyādivyavahāraḥ pāramārthikastarhi prāpta ityāha | "yathāpratītikathitaḥ" iti | vikalpabuddhyanurodhena "śabdārthaḥ" sāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ paramārtha"tosāvasanna"pi yathāpratītikathitaḥ | "sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ" ca yathāpratītikathitaṃ |
yasmād "vastunyasya" śabdārthasya sāmānādhikaraṇyasya ca "na sambhavaḥ" ||

[192,1]

dharmadharmivyavahāraśca jñānapratibhāsinyartha iti yat prakṛtantatsaṃgrahārthamāha | "dharme"tyādi | ayaṃ "dharmo"'yaṃ "dharmī"ti "vyavasthāna"ntayośca "bhedo"'syāyaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtakatvādilakṣaṇaḥ | a"bhedaḥ" kṛtakoyamiti "yādṛśaḥ" | ayaṃ ca vikalpāropitatvāt | "asamīkṣitatattvārthaḥ" | anapekṣitastattvārtho vastvartho yeneti vigrahaḥ | "yathā loke" buddhyārūḍhopyadhyavasitatadbhāvatayā "pratīyate" ||

[192,2]

"taṃ dharmādi"vibhāga"ntathai"veti yathālokapratītiḥ "sādhyasādhanasaṃsthitirvidvadbhiravakalpyata" iti sambandhaḥ | kimarthaṃ | "paramārthāvatārāya" | anityādivastusvabhāvasyāvagāhanāya ||

[192,3]

kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamekatvādivyavahārasya vastunyasambhava ityāha | "saṃsṛjyanta"
ityādi | "pāramārthikā arthāḥ svato na saṃsṛjyante" | tato na sāmānyavyavahāro vastuni | "na bhidyante" kṛtakatvādidharmaiḥ pratyekaṃ tasya vastunonekatvāyogāt | ataśca "teṣva"rtheṣu bahuṣu rūpa"meka"mekaṃsminnarthe"'nekaṃ rūpaṃ" yadadhyavasīyate tadbuddhervikalpikāyā "upaplavo"
bhrāntiḥ | yataśca na saṃsṛjyante na bhidyante pāramārthikā arthāḥ ||

[192,4]

tataḥ kāraṇāt "sāmānya"midaṃ bahūnāṃ | tathā dharmāṇāṃ dharmiṇāṃ ca "bheda ityapi"
yoya"mbhedo" nānātvavyavahāraḥ sa "bauddherthe" | na bāhye svalakṣaṇe | buddhipratibhāsasyālīkatvāt | kathantarhi tatra svalakṣaṇe kṛtakatvādidharmabheda iti cedāha | "tasyaiva ce"tyādi | "tasyaiva" svalakṣaṇasyā"nyavyāvṛttyā dharmabhedaḥ prakalpyate" ||

[192,5]

kasmāt kalpitadharmabhedadvāreṇa gamyagamakabhāvo na vastudarśanamātreṇetyata āha | "sādhye"tyādi | idaṃ "sādhya"midaṃ "sādhana"mityasmin "saṃkalpe vastudarśanahānitaḥ" | yadvā pratyakṣavadanumānena sāmānyaviśiṣṭaṃ svalakṣaṇameva kasmānna gṛhyata ityata āha | "sādhyetyādi" | sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpe vastudarśanahānitaḥ | kutaḥ svalakṣaṇasya sāmānyaviśiṣṭasya grahaṇaṃ | "bhedaḥ sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭo grāhya" ityācārya di gnā ga prabhṛtibhiḥ sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭasya svalakṣaṇasya grahaṇaṃ pratijñātamityāśaṅkāmapanayannāha | "bheda"
ityādi | "bhedaḥ sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ pratīyata" it"yatrā"pi vacane grāhyaṃ na "svalakṣaṇame"va nirdiṣṭamiti naivamboddhavyamityarthaḥ | kintu bāhyā eva bhedāstenānyāpohalakṣaṇena sāmānyena saṃsṛṣṭā adhyavasīyante na tu gṛhyanta iti tatrāpi boddhavyaṃ |

[193,1]

anye tu "bhedaḥ sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭo grāhya" iti pulliṅgena paṭhanti | tatrāyamartho bhedaḥ | "sāmānyasaṃsṛṣṭo" grāhya ityatrāpi vacane | na svalakṣaṇaṃ boddhavyaṃ ||

[193,2]

kimpunaḥ kāraṇantatraiva boddhavyamiti cedāha | "samāne"tyādi | anekasminnekākāraḥ "samānā"kāraḥ | ekasminnanekadharmatva"mbhinnā"kāraḥ | "ādi"śabdād dharmadharmyākāraparigrahaḥ | "na tat" svalakṣaṇaṃ "grāhyaṃ kathaṃcana" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tatraikasmin svalakṣaṇe kṛtakatvānityatvādirūpeṇa "bahubhedā"nāndharmāṇāṃ kimviśiṣṭānā"mbhedānā"mvasturūpāṇā"ntatraikasmin" svalakṣaṇe'"yogāt" | na hyekasya vasturūpāṇi bahūni yujyante niraṅśatvāt svalakṣaṇasya ||

[193,3]

upasaṃharannāha | "tadrūpa"mityādi | "tatta"smād "rūpaṃ" svalakṣaṇaṃ "sarvato bhinna"masādhāraṇa"ntathā" tenāsādhāraṇena rūpeṇa "ta"sya svalakṣaṇasya na"pratipādikā śrutiḥ"
śabdo "nā"sti | "kalpanā vāsti" | neti prakṛtaṃ | asādhāraṇena svarūpeṇa svalakṣaṇasya grāhako nāstītyarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sāmānyenaiva" śabdasya kalpanāyāśca"vṛttitaḥ" ||

[193,4]

tatpratipādikā na śrutirastīti bruvatā svalakṣaṇe śabdā na niyujyanta ityuktamataścodayati |

[193,5]

"kimpuna"rityādi | saṃketena viṣayīkṛtāḥ "saṃketinaḥ" | tamā"huḥ" śabdāḥ | vyava"hārāya" saṃketaḥ "smṛtaḥ | tadā" vyavahārakāle ta"tsvalakṣaṇannāsti" yatra saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ | ekasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya kṣaṇikatvāt kālāntare tenaiva rūpeṇānugamo nāstyakṣaṇikatve vā saṃketaḥ jñānābhāvādeva tadviṣayatvasya kālāntarenugamo nāsti kimuta deśakālabhinneṣu svalakṣaṇeṣu | "tena" kāraṇena "tatra" svalakṣaṇe "saṃketo na" kriyata ityadhyāhāraḥ |

[194,1]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe |

[194,2]

"api nāme"ti kathannu nāma | "prā"giti saṃketakālakṛtasambandhasya śabdasyeti sambandhaḥ | ekatraikassiman "svalakṣa"ṇe "paścā"diti vyavahārakāle | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "na yukta"mityāha | "tasye"tyādi | "tasye"ti saṃketakāladṛṣṭasya vyavahārāvasthānādiṣu de"śakālabhedeṣvanāskandanā"t | anugamāt | na hyekatra dṛṣṭo bhedonyatra sambhavati ||

[194,3]

"vyatirikta"miti vai śe ṣi ka darśane"nāvyatiriktaṃ" sāṃ khya darśanena | samānajātīyavyakti"vyāpanād" vyāpi sāmānyaṃ | "tatta"smā"nna vyavahārakālābhāvadoṣaḥ" |
vyavahārakāle śabdārthasyābhāvadoṣo nāsti | sāmānyasya śabdārthatvāttasyaivaikatvena saṃketavyavahārakālayorvidyamānatvāt |

[194,4]

kathaṃ nāmetyasminnarthe "api"śabdaḥ | vyavahārakāle śabdāduccaritā"darthakriyākṣamā"n arthān "vijñāya tatsādhanāyā"rthakriyāsādhanāya kathannāma pravarttata"pumā"nityanenābhiprāyeṇā"rtheṣu saṃyojyante'bhidhāyakāḥ" śabdāḥ |

[194,5]

"na kha"lvityādinā vyācaṣṭe | phalanirapekṣaṃ kvacit tātparya "vyasanaṃ | yadayaṃ"
loko saṃ"ketayan" saṃketamakurvāṇaḥ saṃketiterthe śa"bdān prayuñjāno" vā | "sarva eveti"śābdonyo vā"vadheyo" grahaṇārha "ārambho" vyavahāraḥ "phalārthaḥ" | na tu niṣphalaḥ | kiṅkāraṇa | "niṣphalārambhasya" prekṣāpūrvakāribhi"rupekṣaṇīyatvā"dagrāhyatvāt | taditi tasmāt | "ayaṃ" pratipattā "kvacida"bhimaterthe "niyuñjā"naḥ saṃketayan "phalamevehituṃ yukta" iti prayojanamevāpekṣitumarhatīti yāvat | "tacce"ti phalamiṣṭasyāptilakṣaṇamaniṣṭasya ca tyāgalakṣaṇamiti yathāyogaṃ sambandhaḥ | yene"ṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiparihāra"rūpa eva puruṣārthobhipreta"stenāyaṃ" puruṣastayo"riṣṭayoḥ" phalayoḥ "sādhanamasādhanaṃ" cārthaṃ jñātvā "tatre"ṣṭasādhane "pravṛtti"maniṣṭasādhane ca "nivṛttiṃ kuryāṃ kārayeyamvā" parānityanenābhiprāyeṇa "śabdānniyuñjī"ta prayoktā śrotāpi "niyoge vādriye"ta |

[195,1]

yuktantāvat paraṃ vyavahārayeyamiti śabdaniyogaḥ | śabdaniyogasya parāṅgatvāt |
svayantu pravṛttinivṛttikāraṇe kaḥ śabdasyopayogaḥ |

[195,2]

satyaṃ | kevalaṃ śabdaprayogābhyāsāt svayamapi pratipadyamānaḥ kadācidevaṃ pratipadyata ityupanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ | "anyathopekṣaṇīyatvādi"ti phalamantareṇa śabdaniyogasyopekṣaṇīyatvāt | "tatrai"vaṃ vyavasthite nyāye "jātiranarthakriyāyogyā"'to na śabdaviṣayā |

[195,3]

tadvyācaṣṭe "na hī"tyādi | "na jātirvāhadohādikaṃ" karttuṃ samarthā | tataśca vāhadohādyarthino jāticodanā niṣphaleti na tadarthaḥ "śabdaprayogaḥ" |

[195,4]

yāpi svapratipattilakṣaṇārthakriyā jāterupavarṇṇyate | na tadarthampuruṣaḥ pravarttate śabdaprayogādeva tasyāḥ siddhatvāt | jātimātrapratipattyarthaṃ śabdaprayogo bhaviṣyatīti cedata āha | "na ve"tyādi | "tādṛśa"miti vāhadohādi"prakaraṇaṃ" niṣphalasya śabdaprayogasyopekṣaṇīyatvādityuktatvāt | jātau ca vācyāyāṃ satyāṃ | gāmānayetyatra vākyena vākyārthapratītiḥ syāt | gotvasya kriyātvenvayābhāvāt | nāpi lakṣitalakṣaṇayā vākyārthapratītirapratīterna hi padebhyastāvat sāmānyānāṃ pratītiḥ |
punastebhyo viśeṣāṇāṃ viśeṣebhyaścānvayasyetyevaṃ vilambitarūpā vākyārthapratītiḥ |

[195,5]

nanvapohepi vācye kathaṃ bāhyārthapratītirnīrūpatvādapohasya | na ca jñānāṃśeśabdaniveśo yukto'narthakriyākāritvāt |

[196,1]

sattyaṃ | kevalamarthakriyākāritvenaiva pratibhāsanāttatra śabdaniveśo yukta iti pratipādayiṣyate |

[196,2]

na tvevamapi tasya jñānāṅśasya svalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ śabdavācyatvaṃ |

[196,3]

atrocyate | bāhyābhinnastāvat svāṅśo vikalpe pratibhāsata eva | na tāvadasya vikalpagrāhyatvāt pratibhāsaḥ sarvātmanā niścayaprasaṅgādanabhyupagamācca |

[196,4]

nāpi vikalpena bāhyātmatayādhyavasāya evāsya grahaṇaṃ yathāvasthitena svarūpeṇāgrahaṇādagrahaṇe ca kathantatra pratibhāsaḥ | jñānasvalakṣaṇatve tu svāṃśasya samvitsvabhāvatvāt pratibhāso yuktaḥ | tenāvidyārūpasya svāṃśasya vikalpasya ca yadi jñānasvalakṣaṇatvaṃ neṣyate tadā pratibhāsa eva na syādevamajñānarūpeṇa ca vikalpena kathaṃ svāṅśasya paricchedosya jñānadharmatvāt | tasmājjñānasvalakṣaṇatvādeva svāṃśasya vikalpe pratibhāsaḥ sa bāhyābhinno vikalpaviṣayo vyavasthāpyate | tasya samviditarūpasyaiva bāhyābhedena vikalpenādhyavasīyamānatvādata eva vikalpaḥ sāmānyaviṣaya ucyate na svalakṣaṇaviṣayo'rthasvāṃśayorekasyāpi svarūpeṇāgrahaṇāt | tena svāṃśasya jñānasvalakṣaṇasyāpi bāhyātmatayādhyastasya sāmānyarūpatvaṃ | tathā ca vakṣyati |

[196,5]

"jñānarūpatayārthatve sāmānye cet prasajyate | tatheṣṭatvādapohyartharūpatvena samānateti | pra0 vā0 3 | 9"(#pava.2.9ca)

[196,6]

tasya ca śabdavācyatvaṃ yuktameva |

[196,7]

"lakṣitalakṣaṇetyā"di paraḥ | satyaṃ na sāmānyamarthakriyākāri kintu vyaktireva kevalaṃ vya"kteraśakyacodanatvā"t kāraṇāt sāmānye niyuktaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyaṃ lakṣayati | tena sāmānyena śabdalakṣitena sambandhād vyaktirapi lakṣyata iti |

[196,8]

tadetadapratītikaṃ | na hi gośabdāduccaritād gotvaṃ pratīyate gaurapi tu gaurevāvasīyate | na nāmaivantathāpyucyate | "aśabdacodi"tetyādi |

[196,9]

yadi nāma jātitadvatossambandhastathā"pyaśabdacodite" vyaktiviśeṣe "kathaṃ pravarttate" | naiva | daṇḍadaṇḍinossatyapi sambandhe "na hi kaści"t prekṣāpūrvakārī"daṇḍañchindhītyukte daṇḍinañchinatti" | aśabdacoditatvāttathā jātau coditāyāṃ"vyaktau pravṛttirna" yuktetyarthaḥ |

[196,10]

jātau vāhadohādīnāmasambhavādaśabdacoditāyāmapi vyaktau pravṛttirbhaviṣyatīti cedāha | "nāpī"tyādi | kevalamarthāntarasambhavi kāryamasambhavinyarthe codayan vaktā pratipādyasyā"sambaddhapralāpī syāt" | na punastatosamarthāccoditāt samarthe pravṛtti"rbalīvardadohacodanāvat" | na hi kenacid balīvardandogdhītyukte tatra dohā"sambhavā"t | balīvardā"danyatra" sambhavāyāṃ gavi dogdhuṃ "pravarttate" śrotā |
kevalanta"syaiva"mbhavatya "saṃ" vakteti |

[197,1]

syānmataṃ | valīvardacodane sambandhābhāvāt mā bhūt strīgavyāṃ pravṛttiḥ | jātau tu coditāyāṃ sambandhāt tadvyaktau pravṛttirbhaviṣyatītyāha | "na ce"tyādi | "arthānta"rasya sāmānyasya sambandhasyāpi "codanenārthānta" |

[197,2]

nanvaśabdacodite satyapi sambandha ityādinokta evāyamarthaḥ |

[197,3]

satyam | adhikavidhānārthantu punaḥ prastāvaḥ | tadeva pūrvapakṣayati | "aniyate"tyādi | "aniyataḥ samban"dho yasya daṇḍasya sa tathoktaḥ | tathā hi daṇḍinamantareṇāpi daṇḍe vidyate tadbhāvastasmāt | "tatre"ti daṇḍini | "neti ce"diti daṇḍe codite "pravṛtti"rna bhavatītyarthaḥ | jātau tu coditāyāṃ niyatasambandhād vyaktau pratītirbhavatīti bhāvaḥ |

[197,4]

"tadityā"di si ddhā nta vā dī | "tadi"tyaniyatasambaddhatvaṃ "tulyaṃ jātāvapi" |

[197,5]

kathamiti cedāha | "vyaktīnā"mityādi | syādetad | yathā bhrātrādiśabdāḥ svārthamabhidadhānā dvitīyamākṣipanti tathā jātiśabdā ityata āha | "bhrātrādiśabdāstvi"tyādi | ādiśabdāt putrādiśabdāḥ | "sambandhiśabda"vācya"tvāt" sambandhyantarāpekṣaiva teṣāṃ vyavasthāpitatvāditi yāvat | "ākṣipeyuḥ paramiti" dvitīyaṃ bhrātrādikaṃ | ākṣepaśca dvitīyasambandhākāravikalpajananaṃ | na tūpasthāpanameva vinaṣṭepi sambandhini vikalpotpatteḥ | "na tathe"ti vaidharmyakathanaṃ | yadi sambandhivācinyaḥ syustadāyandoṣaḥ syādityāha | "apete"tyādi | "ape"tā vinaṣṭā "vyakta"yassambandhitvena yāsāṃ pā ṇḍa vā di "jātī"nāntāsāmapi "tacchrutibhyo" jātivācakebhyaḥ śabdebhyo"nityama"petavyaktisambandhitvenāpya"nugamaprasaṃgaḥ" | evaṃ hyapetavyaktisambandhitvena tāsāmanugamo yadyapetānāmapi vyaktīnāmanugamaḥ syāt | yadvā jātīnāṃ sambandhibhyo yā apetā vyaktayastāsāṃ tacchabdebhyo nityama"nugamanaprasaṅgāt" |

[198,1]

"sarvade"tyādi paraḥ | "sarvade"ti vyaktyapāyānaṣāyakālayo"statsambandhayogyatāpratīteriṣṭameva" vyaktyanugamana"miti cet" | etatkathayati | yathā bhrātrādiśabdāḥ svārthamabhidadhānāḥ sambandhinamaviśeṣaṇāt kṣipanti tathā jātiśabdā apīti |

[198,2]

uttaramāha | "sarvade"ti | "sarvade"ti vyaktyapāyā'napāyakālayo"rgośabdādapravṛtti"rvāhadodādiyogye vyaktiviśeṣe | kiṅkāraṇaṃmiti cedāha | "sahite"tyādi |
saptamīdvivacanametat | jātervyakti"sahitāsahitāvasthayorviśeṣeṇā"rthakriyākṣamasya viśeṣasyā"nākṣepā"t | etaduktambhavati | yathā'tītānāgatavyakteḥ śabdārtharūpatayā jātiśabdenākṣepastathā varttamānāyā vyakterubhayatra śabdārtharūpatayā pratibhāsanasyāviśeṣaṇāditi |

[198,3]

vya"ktisambandhinyā jāteścodanā"d vyaktau pratītirna prāpnotītyaya"madoṣa iti cet" ||

[198,4]

bhavatvevaṃ kintu "sāpi" vyakti"stadviśeṣaṇatvena" jātiviśeṣaṇatvena jāticodanāyāmā"kṣiptaiveti" na jātiḥ kevalābhidheyā | kintu "tadvānabhidheyaḥ syā"diti pakṣāntaraparigrahaḥ syāt | tatra cānantarameva doṣamvakṣyāma ityākūtaṃ ||

[198,5]

"jātitadvatoḥ" sambandhamabhyupagamyaitaduktaṃ | "sambandha eva" tu nāstītyāha | "na ce"tyādi | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anyonya"mparasparama"janyajanakatvenānupakārāt |
tata" iti sambandhābhāvājjāticodanayā vyakterla"kṣaṇamapyuktaṃ | phalābhāvā"dityarthakriyāyā abhāvāt |

[198,6]

vyaktyabhinnasāmānyavādinopi pratyakṣavacchābde jñāne vyaktipratibhāsaḥ syāt |
bhedāṃśena tu tasyāpi lakṣaṇamayuktaṃ | "eva"mityādinā pakṣāntaramāśaṅkate | "tadvāni"ti jātimān | "alami"ti samarthaḥ | "tatre"ti tadvati | "sa ce"ti si ddhā nta vā dī |

[198,7]

asyaiva vyākhyānaṃ "sa ca śabda" ityādi | "tatre"ti vyaktau "kimanyena" sāmānyena"vyavadhinā" vyavadhāyakena kalpitena |

[199,1]

"ānantyācce"ti paraḥ | "idamānantyaṃ sama"mityuttaraṃ |

[199,2]

etadeva vyācaṣṭe | "syādeta"dityādinā | "tadvatya"pīti jātimatyapi | yasmā"jjātyā"divi"śiṣṭāḥ" satyo v"yaktaya eva" va"ktav"yā "iti" hetora"vaśyantatre"ti vyaktiṣu śabdasya "sambandhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ" | kasmād | "akṛtasambandhasyānabhidhānā"t |
karttari ṣaṣṭhī | kṛtaḥ sambandho yasya śabdasya | tenānabhidhānādityarthaḥ | karmaṇi vā ṣaṣṭhī | akṛtasambandhasya vārthasya śabdenānabhidhānāt | "sa ce"ti sambandhaḥ |
tadvatā saha "na" śa"kyaṃ" karttumānantyāt | tasmādayuktoyampakṣaḥ |

[199,3]

"tatsambandhini" | vyaktisambandhini sāmānye śabdasya sambandha"karaṇā"ddhetosta"trāpi" jātisambandhibhyāṃ vyaktau sambandhaḥ "kṛta eveti ce"t |

[199,4]

"uktamatro"ttaraṃ | sāmānyasya "satyapi sambandhe ekatra" jātau "kṛtāt" saṃketā"danyatra" vyaktā"vapratīti"rna ca jātitadvatoḥ sambandhostītyetaccoktaṃ | na hi satyapi sambandhe daṇḍaśabdād daṇḍini pratipattiḥ | tathā "na ca" jātitadvatoḥ kaścit"sambandhostīti" sampratyuktatvāt ||

[199,5]

evantāvat "sarvabhāvā" ityādinā vā rtti ka kā raḥ svābhimataṃ vidhiśabdaliṃgaviṣayamākhyāya saṃprati yenābhiprāyeṇācārya di gnā ge na bhedalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyamuktantaddarśayituṃ pṛcchati | "api ce"tyādi | evammanyate | yathā gośabdādapratīyamāne gotve gośabdaḥ saṃketyate tathā | "tatkāriṇāṃ" vivakṣitārthakriyākāriṇāma"tatkāri"bhyo ye vivakṣitārthakriyākāriṇo na bhavanti tebhyo yo "bheda"stena "sāmā"nyaṃ sarveṣāntatkāriṇāmatatkāribhyo bhinnatvādatastasmi"nbhedasāmye" anyāpohalakṣaṇe "kinna kṛtaḥ" kasmāt saṃketo na kṛta iti pṛcchati paraṃ | etadevāha | "yāmarthakriyā"mityādi | dāhapākādilakṣaṇasyārthasya kriyāṃ niṣpatti"madhikṛtyā"bhipretyāyaṃ puruṣortheṣvabhipretārthakriyākāriṣa"śabdānniyuṅkte" prayuṅkte | "tatkāriṇā"mabhipretārthakriyākāriṇā"manyebhyo"'tatkāribhyo"bhedā"t kāraṇāt tatkāriṇaḥ sarvavijātīyavyāvṛttā abhinnā bhavanti | tata"eṣā"marthānā"ntatraivābheda iti" anyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇe "kinna śabdaḥ prayujyate" | vyāvṛttiviśiṣṭasyāpi saṃketavaśāt pratītiḥ syāditi praśnābhiprāyaḥ |

[200,1]

"tadvadit"yādi | jātimatpakṣe yo doṣa ācārya di gnā ge no kta"stadvato nāsvatantratvādi"tyādinā yastadvad"doṣa"sta"sya sāmyā"ttasya doṣasyāvatārād bhedenyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇe śabdo na niyujyate | "astvayandoṣa" ityabhyupagacchati | naivāyandoṣostīti pratipāditamabhyugamya tvevamuktaṃ | "jātiralamparā" | jātistvanyā na yuktetyarthaḥ |

[200,2]

"syādi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "anyasmād" atatkāriṇo "vyāvṛttepi" vastuni "śabdārthe"bhyupagamyamāne | "tadvata" iti vyāvṛttimataḥ | na "ta"dva"tpakṣāda"sya vyāvṛttimatpakṣasya"viśeṣaḥ" | etadevāha | "ko hī"tyādi | tvayā vyāvṛttirityuktaṃ pareṇa jātirityādi | "atra" vācye "ko viśe"ṣaḥ | naiva kaścidanyatra śabdabhedāt ||

[200,3]

"astu nā"meti si ddhā nta vā dī | "jātira"nyeti vastubhūtā | kimpunastulye doṣe vyāvṛttiraṅgīkriyate na vastubhūtā jātirityāha | "jātimapi hī"tyādi | "tadabhāva"iti vyāvṛttyabhāve "asyā" apīti vastubhūtāyā jāteḥ | bhāvānāṃ bhedābhāve satyanekārthasamavetarūpāyā jāterabhāvāt | na ca jātyābhedaḥ kriyata ityuktaṃ |
tasmādavaśyambhedobhyupagantavyaḥ | sa "caikasmā"datatkāryāt "bheda"sta"danyeṣā"ntasmādatatkāryādanyeṣāntatkāryāṇā"mabheda"sta"dviśiṣṭe"ṣvabhedaviśiṣṭeṣu "pratipattirastu" |
pratipattyālambanatvāt pratipattirityuktaḥ | na punaḥ sa eva pratipattiḥ | karaṇasādhano vā pratipattiśabdaḥ pratipadyante'nayā vyāvṛttyā karaṇabhūtayā bhāvāniti kṛtvā |

[201,1]

"sarvathe"ti | yadi vyāvṛttiviśiṣṭo jātiviśiṣṭo vārtho vācyastadvatpakṣodito yathānantyādi"doṣa"stat"parihārasya karttumaśakyatvāt" | tulyaśceddoṣo jātireva kasmānnābhyupagamyata iti cedāha | "arthānta"retyādi | "arthāntara"mvastubhūtā jātiḥ |
bhinneṣvabhinnapratyayajananaṃ jāteḥ prayojanamiti cedāha | "tadartha"syeti jātisādhyasya | "anyene"tyatatkāryavyāvṛttilakṣaṇenābhedena | jātyāpi hi sorthaḥ sādhyata iti kasmājjātityāge vyāvṛttyabhyupagama ityata āha | tadityādi | "tadabhyupagamasye"ti vyāvṛttyabhyupagamasya | tadanabhyupagame hi jātikalpanaiva na syādityuktaṃ ||

[201,2]

adhunā śabdenāvaśyaṃ vyāvṛttiścodanīyetyata āha | "api ce"tyādi | vivakṣitādarthā"danya"stasya "parihāreṇa" śrotā "pravarteteti" kṛtvā "dhvanirucyate" pratipādakena |
cakāra evaśabdasyārthe bhinnakramaśca tadanyaparihāreṇetyasyānantaraṃ draṣṭavyaṃ | "tene"ti dhvaninā | "tebhya" ityanabhimatebhyastasyābhimatasyārthasyā"vyavacchede"'vyavacchedenābhidhīyamāna ityarthaḥ | "kathaṃ" śrotā "pravartte"teti |

[201,3]

"śabda"mityādinaitadeva vyācaṣṭe | "eṣa" vaktārtheṣvabhimatārthakriyākāri"ṣvaniṣṭaparihāre"ṇānabhimatārthavyavacchedena "pravartteta" kathaṃ nāma śrotetyanenā"bhiprāyeṇa prayuṅkte" |

[201,4]

yadi śabdenānyavyavacchedo na codyeta tadā "tatra" pratyāyyābhimate'"nyatra ce"tyanabhimatepravṛttiranujñātā bhavati | tasyāṃ ca satyāntasyābhimatasyārthasya ya"nnāma abhidhāna"ntasya "grahaṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt" | tathā hyānayetyukte vastumātramākṣiptantatrānabhimatavyavacchedāyāgniśabdaḥ prayujyate'gnimānayeti | yadi tu tasminnapi prayukte'nagnyānayanaṃ na vyavacchinnantadāgniśabdenoccāritena na kiṃcit prayojanaṃ | ānayetyanenāpyanānayanasya pratikṣepādānayanamanānayanaṃ cānujñātaṃ syādataḥ pravṛttinivṛttyānujñāyāṃ ca satyānta"nnāmagrahaṇavaiyarthyaprasaṃgādi"ti pūrveṇaiva sambandhaḥ | evaṃ ekasyābhimatasyāgnyāde"reka"sya cānayanādilakṣaṇasyānuṣṭhānasya yā "codanā" tasyā "anādarādavacaname"va śabdānāṃ "syāt | anyavyāvṛttyanabhidhāne" sati |

[202,1]

athavā "pravṛttinivṛttyanujñāyā"miti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhanīyaṃ | yathoktavidhinā pravṛttinivṛttyanujñāyāṃ "caikacodanā'nādarā"t | ekasya pravṛttilakṣaṇasya nivṛttilakṣaṇasya vā vyāpārasya codanā'nādarāditi | śeṣaṃ pūrvavad vyākhyeyaṃ |

[202,2]

evaṃ ca śabdavyavahārocchedaḥ syānna caivanta"smādavaśya"mityādi | "sa ce"tyanyavyavacchedaḥ | "tadanyeṣ"viti tasmādatatkāryādanyeṣvekakāryeṣva"bhinnaḥ" | sarveṣāmatatkāryād vyāvṛttatvāt | iti kṛtvānekārthavyāvṛttitvaṃ "jātidharmopyasti" vyavacchedasya | "tami"ti vyavacchedaṅakimviśiṣṭaṃ "niyata"mabhyupagamo yasya sa tathā | tadanabhyupagame jāterabhāvaprasaṅgāt | "niyataṃ codanama"bhidhānaṃ yasya tattathā | tadacodane śabda prayogasya naiṣphalyaṃ syāt | vyaktiṣu buddhiśabdayoranugamalakṣaṇo "jātya"rthastasya "prasā" prasādhyate'neneti kṛtvā | evaṃbhūtaṃ vyavacchedaṃ "parityajyārthānta"rasya sāmānyasya"kalpanaṃ kevalamanarthanirbandha" evā'vastvabhiniveśa eva kevalaṃ nānyat kiñcita kāraṇamastītyarthaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ || yathā kalpanaṃ nityavyāpitādyakārairasya sāmānyasyā"yogā"dityanyavyāvṛttyabhidhāne'yamabhiprāya ācārya di gnā ga sya ||

[202,3]

"netyā"di paraḥ | "na vai na kriyata eva" śabdena "vyavacchedaḥ" kintu kriyata eva |
kimarthantarhi jātiruktetyata āha | "pravṛttī"tyādi arthakriyārthino hi yā "pravṛtti"stasyā "viṣa"yo jātiḥ | taṃ "kathayadbhi"rasmābhirjātiruktā |

[202,4]

"vyavacchede"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | asya śabdasyābhidheyo "vyavacchedosti cet" | asya vā jātimato vyavacchedaḥ śabdavācyosti cet | "nanvetāvada"nyavyavacchedeneṣṭapravarttanaṃ "prayojanaṃ śabdānāmi"ti kṛtvā | "tatre"ti vyavacchedeneṣṭapravarttane karttavye |
tatra vā pravṛttiviṣaye "kiṃ sāmānyenāpareṇa vaḥ" prayojanaṃ ||

[203,1]

"nanvi"tyādi paraḥ | "ukta"mityā cā ryaḥ | "tathā hī"tyayuktatvapratipādanaṃ | seti jātiḥ | arthakriyāṃ pratyasāmarthyā"nna pravṛttiyogyā" jātiḥ | nāpi gośabdājjātiḥ pratīyate | "niveditameta"diti "tatrānarthakriyāyogyā jātiri" pra0 sa0tyādinā |
jātidvāreṇa ca dravye'rthakriyāsamarthe puruṣasya pravṛttirbhaviṣyatīti cedāha | "taddvāre"ṇetyādi | aśabdacodite sat"yapi" sambandhe kathaṃ pravarttetetyādinā |
jātidvāreṇa tadvāneva codyata iti cedāha | "tadvaccodana" ityādi | vyavadhānamuktamiti liṅgapariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | sāmānyena tatra vyavadhānamityuktaṃ |
sa ca sākṣānna yojyate kasmāt | kintatrānyena vyavadhānetyādinā |

[203,2]

syānmataṃ | na jātiḥ kevalā vyaktirvā śabdāśrayāḥ pravṛtterāśrayaḥ kevalāyā jātarerthakriyāyāmasāmarthyaṃ | vyakteśca kevalāyā aśakyacodanatvāt | tasmājjātitadvantau sahitau pravṛttiviṣayastayoreva samastayoḥ śabdārthatvamityata āha | "jātitadvato"rityādi | "pravṛttiviṣa"yatva iti śabdāśrayāyāḥ pravṛtterviṣayatvebhyupagamyamāne | "vyāvṛttitadvantau kinneṣye"te pravṛttiviṣayatvenetyadhyāhāraḥ | pramāṇasiddhau hi vyāvṛttitadvantāviti bhāvaḥ | "vyāvṛtteḥ" śabdabhūtāyāḥ buddhiparikalpitatvā"davastutva"mato vāhadohādyarthakriyāṃprat"yasādhanatvā"nna pravṛttiviṣayatvamiti cet | "tadeta"dasādhanatvaṃ"jātestulyaṃ" sāpi vāhadohādāvasamarthā |

[203,3]

"tadva"ta iti jātimatorthakriyā"sādhanā"t pravṛttyabhāvalakṣaṇo "doṣo na bhavatīti cet" |

[204,1]

"tulyamityādi" si ddhā nta vā dī | "tadi"ti arthakriyāsādhanatvaṃ |

[204,2]

evantāvatpratibandhakanyāyenāvidyamānāyā api vyāvṛtteḥ sadbhāvamabhyupagamya śabdārthatvamuktamācārya di g nā geneti vyākhyāya punarvidhimeva śabdārthamāha | "ava" cetyādi | yadyavastuviṣayaḥ kathamarthakriyārthinaṃ puruṣaṃ pravarttayatīti cedāha | "sa vibhrame"tyādi | sa iti śābdapratyayaḥ | "vibhramavaśā"t puruṣaṃ pravarttayati | vibhrama eva kathamityāha | "akārakepi" svapratibhāserthakriyāyogyatvāt "kārako" bāhyortha"stadadhyavasā"yī yataḥ | kathantarhyanumānādervastusamvāda ityata āha | "vastusamvāda" ityādi |
tasmin sādhye "pratibandhe sati" | pratibandha eva kutaḥ | "vastūtpattyā" sādhyavastūtpattyā hetubhūtayā "anyathe"tyasati pratibandhe | "nai"vāsti samvādaḥ śabdādeḥ pratyayasya | "vastūtpatterabhrāntiriti ce"t | syādetad yadi vastunaścotpadyate vastusamvādi śābdādijñānamiti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhimmanyate | "naitadevaṃ" | satyapi vastūtpattā"vatatpratibhāsino" vasturūpāpratibhāsina"stadadhyavasāyā"d vastvadhyavasāyād bhrāntitvaṃ | tato vasturūpotpattibhrāntyorvirodhābhāvāt sandigdhavyatirekitā hetoriti bhāvaḥ |
maṇi"prabhāyā"mmaṇibhrāntirmaṇiṃ samvādayatyeva | vyabhicārameva samarthayannāha | "vitathe"tyādi | etadāha | "yadi bhrānteḥ" sa"mvā"dasya ca virodhaḥ syāt tadā bhrānteravastusamvādanaṃ sādhyaṃ pratyavyabhicāraḥ syāt | sa ca nāsti | yasmād "vitathapratibhāso bhrāntilakṣa"ṇaṃ na visamvādane | "tannāntarīyaka"tayeti vastunāntarīyakatayā tata utpatteriti yāvat | ayaṃ "samvādo na pratibhāsāpe"kṣī | na vastugatampratibhāsamapekṣate | vastupratibaddhatvenaivātatpratibhāsasyāpi samvādāt |

[204,3]

tasmāt sthitametad vitathapratibhāsyapi śābdaḥ pratyayaḥ sati vastupratibandhe tasya samvādaka iti |

[205,1]

atha punaryathāvastveva śābdaḥ pratyaya iṣyate | tadā "vastuni" bāhye | "yathābhā"vaṃ yathāvastu "arpitacetasaḥ" āropitajñānasya śabdabalādyanyathā vastūtpannajñānasyeti yāvat |
evaṃ "pravṛttā"vabhyupagamyamānāyāntasya śābdasya jñānasya sāmānyaṃ "grāhya"meṣṭavyaṃ svalakṣaṇe śabdena codanābhāvāt | tasya ca grāhyasya "sāmānyasyānarthakriyāyogyatvā"ddheto"rapravṛttistasmi"n vikalpavijñānaviṣaye sāmānye | "anyatre"ti sāmānyādanyatra vyaktāvaśabdacoditāyāmapi pravṛttā"vatiprasaṅgaḥ" | gośabdādaśvavyaktāvapi pravṛttiḥ syād gotvasāmānyasyāśvavyakteśca sambandhābhāvānnaivamiti cennāśabdacodite satyapi sambandhe pravṛttyayogādityādyuktaṃ |

[205,2]

atha na kevalā jātiḥ śabdena coditeti kintu tadvāniti | tadā "tadṛ"bhyupagamyamāne "sāmānyavaiyarthyādayaḥ proktāḥ" | vyaktiṣveva sākṣācchabdo niyujyatāṃ kiṃ sāmānyeneti sāmānyavaiyarthyamuktaṃ | ādiśabdād ānantyādidoṣaparigrahaḥ | jātireva śabdena codyate | sā tu jātirvyaktisamavetatvānna śakyate kevalā gṛhītumato vyaktirūpeṇaikībhūtā gṛhyate | tadevāśaṅkate | "jātī"tyādi | "śliṣṭābhā"seti svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhyāṃ sambhinnābhāsā "buddhira"rthakriyākāriṇyāṃ vyaktau "pravarttayatīti ce"t | tadā "na jātirna tadvā"n | svena rūpeṇa gṛhyata ityadhyāhāraḥ |
kiṅkāraṇam | "ekasyāpi" sāmānyasya tadvato vā yā "svabhāvasthi"tirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ tasya śliṣṭābhāsayā bhrāntayā buddhyā | "agrahaṇā"t | tataśca bhrāntāyā buddheḥ pravṛttyabhyupamagāt "paravāda evā"nyāpohavādidarśanameva ||

[205,3]

"evami"tyādi paraḥ | "anvayina" ityanekavyaktigamyasya sāmānyasya |

[205,4]

"naiṣa doṣa" iti si ddhā nta vā dī | ādiśabdādudakāharaṇāntāntām"bhedepi" parasparavyāvṛttatvepi vastudharmatayā "tāṃ tāṃ jñānādikāṃ" sadṛśīma"rthakriyāṃ kurvato dṛṣṭ"vā tadanyebhyotatkāryebhyo yo "viśleṣo" vicchinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ "sa viṣa"yo yeṣāṃ "dhvanī"nāntairdhvanibhirantarjalparūpaiḥ "saha saṃyojyārthā"n sa evāyamiti kuryādapi pumān | "api" śabdo bhinnakramonyadarśanepītyarthaḥ | pūrvadṛṣṭādarthādanyasya vilakṣaṇasya darśanepi sadṛśārthakriyākāritvena vipralambhādekatvamāropya "pratyabhijñānaṃ" kuryāditi samudāyārthaḥ |

[206,1]

kathaṃ punarbhinnā abhinnāmarthakriyāṃ kurvantītyata āha | "uktameta"dityādi |

[206,2]

"ekapratyavamarśārthajñānādyekārthasādhane"1 | 75

[206,3]

ityādinā prāguktatvāt | "ekā"miti sadṛśīnteṣviti bhinneṣvanyeṣu pa"śyataḥ"
puṃsaḥ | anyebhya ityatatkāṃribhyo vyāvarttamānā bhāvā "vastudharmatayaiva" vastusvabhāvenaiva | "tade"vedamityevamākāraṃ mithyā"pratyayaṃ janayantī"ti sambandhaḥ | kimviśiṣṭamityāha | tadityādi | tebhyo'tatkāryebhyo yā "vyāvṛtti"rekārthakriyākāriṇāmarthānāṃ sā "viṣa"yo yasya "dhva"nestena "saṃsṛṣṭaṃ" saṃsaktaṃ "sābhilāpa"miti yāvat |

[206,4]

yadi vastudharmmatayā "janayanti" kinna sarvadetyāha | "svānubhave"tyādi | teṣāmbhāvānāṃ yaḥ svonubhavaḥ pūrvamutpannastena yā pratyabhijñānotpattaye "vāsanā" śaktilakṣaṇāditā | tasyāḥ "prabodhaḥ" kāryotpādanaṃpratyābhimukhyantasyāśca prabodhaḥ punastajjātīyapadārthānubhavāt | evaṃlakṣaṇaśca prabodho na sarvakālamato na sadā pratyabhijñānasambhava iti | "saṃsṛṣṭabheda"miti pūrvapaścāddṛṣṭayorvyaktyorbhedaḥ saṃsṛṣṭa ekīkṛto yena sa tathā | "anyathe"ti yadyekakāryatvena sādṛśyenaikatvamāropya bhinneṣvapi bhrāntaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ neṣyate | api tvekasāmānyayogāt tadā "na bhedasaṃsargavatī" | bhedānāṃ saṃsarga ekarūpatāpādanantadvatī buddhirna syāt | bahuṣvekarūpā "buddhirna" syādityarthaḥ |

[206,5]

na "hyekena daṇḍena yuktā" api daṇḍina ekatvena gṛhyante | tadevāha | "yathā daṇḍiṣvi"ti | na hītyetadeva vyanakti | "tatre"ti daṇḍiṣu | "anya"treti ekasmād daṇḍinonyasmin daṇḍini | taddaṇḍadravyaṃ yadekadaṇḍini dṛṣṭantadiha dvitīye daṇḍinītyevaṃ syāt | na tu taddvāreṇa "sa e"vāyandaṇḍīti | yadvā yathā bahuṣvekadaṇḍayogāt |
pratyekamayamapi daṇḍastathā sa evāyandaṇḍa iti na bhavati "pratī"tistadvat | vyaktīnāmapyekasāmānyayogānna sa evāyamiti pratītiḥ syā"dapi tu tadi"heti |

[207,1]

bhavatvevamiti cedāha | "naivami"tyādi | "tadi"tyādinopasaṃhāraḥ | "eka"miti samāna"maneka"tra vyaktiṣu "paśyato'"pi puṃso "bhedasaṃsargava"t | bhedānāṃ saṃsarga ekākāratā tadvajjñānaṃ "na yuktaṃ" | anyāpohavādinastvayamadoṣa ityāha | "vibhra"metyādi |
bhrāntisāmarthyādityarthaḥ | "tathe"tyekarūpatayā vastubhūtamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratyabhijñānasya"nimitta"ntasyā"bhāvā"d "vibhramo na yuktamiti ce"t | "ta eve"ti vyāvṛttā "bhāvāsta"sya jñānāde"reka"syārthasya "kāri"ṇaḥ karaṇaśīlāḥ | "anubha"va eva "dvāraṃ" hetustena "prakṛtyā"
svabhāvena "vibhramaphalāyā" bhrāntiphalāyā "hetutvānnimittaṃ" |

[207,2]

nanu "marīcikādi"ṣu "jalādibhrāṃteḥ" sādṛśyamantareṇotpattāvatiprasaṃgaḥ |
sādṛśyaṃ cediṣyate sāmānyamapi kasmānneṣyata ityāha | "marīcikādiṣvi"tyādi |
prathamenādiśabdena rajvādiparigrahaḥ | dvitīyena sarpādibhrānteḥ | "tāveveti" jalamarīcikā"rūpau" bhāvo a"bhinnākā"rasya tadevedaṃ jalamityevaṃ rūpam"parāmarśapratya"yasya"nimitta"bhūto yo"nubhavastasya janakau kāraṇaṃ bhinnāva"pi |

[207,3]

etaduktambhavatyasadṛśānāntāvanna sādṛśyamasti | sadṛśānāmapi sadṛśameva svarūpaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ | na tu sādṛśyaṃ | tathā hi jalānubhavajñānantāvat jalākāraparāmarśavāsanāmādhatte | sā ca vāsanā yathā punarjalasvalakṣaṇānubhavena prabodhyate |
tathā marīcikākhyapadārthānubhavenāpi prakṛtyā | tasya tatsvabhāvatvāt | tato yathā jalānubhavājjalākāraparāmarśapratyaya ucyate | tathā marīcikānubhavādapi | ataśca tau jalamarīcikākhyau bhāvānubhavadvāreṇa jalabhrānternimittaṃ bhavataḥ | na cātiprasaṅgaḥ |
tulyepyajalarūpatve marīcikāsvarūpasya svahetubhya eva sādṛśyotpannatvānna tu sādṛśyayogāt sadṛśo bhavatīti sāmānyaprastāve nyāyasyoktatvāt |

[207,4]

evantāvad u dyo ta ka rā dimataṃ nirākṛtya mī māṃ sa ka mataṃ nirākarttumāha | "na hī"tyādi | tathā hi jalajñāne dvayaṃ pratibhāsate jalasāmānyantasya ca deśādisambandhitvantato neti bādhake pratyaye na deśādisambandhitvaṃ bādhyate na jalasāmānyamato jalajñānaṃ sāmānyālambanamevetyata ucyate | "na tatra marīcikāsu anyade"veti bhinnaṃ"kiṃci"t "sāmānyaṃ" jalasāmānya"ntathe"ti jalarūpeṇa | "sattve vā" jalasāmānyasyābhyupagamyamāne vastubhūtasāmānyagrāhitvena "sadarthagrāhiṇī buddhiḥ" |

[208,1]

atha syād | anyadeśādyavasthitajalasāmānyālambikaiva jalabuddhirna bhrāntistaduktaṃ |

[208,2]

"sarvatrālambanaṃ bāhyaṃ deśakālānyathātmakamiti | "

[208,3]

kathantarhi marīcikāyāṃ jalapratītirbhrāntiranyadeśādyavasthitasya jalasāmānyasya tatra samāropāditi cet | etadevāha | "abhūte"tyādi | marīcikāsvavidyamānasya jalā"kāra"sya sa"māropā"d "bhrāntiḥ" |

[208,4]

"netyā"di si ddhā nta vā dī | "tat"sāmānyagrāhiṇī anyadeśāvasthitajala"sāmānyagrāhiṇī sā" jalabuddhir"na bhavati" | kasmādityāha | "yameva ce"tyādi | "yamevākā"ramityabhūtaṃjalākāra"miyaṃ" jalabuddhistatra marīcikāsvā"ropayati" | āropyamāṇasyāpi kasmād viṣayatvamityata āha | "aviṣayīkṛ"tasyetyādi | etadāha |
vikalpotpattikāle yatsāmānyaṃ na viṣayīkṛtantena na tasya samāropaḥ | ākārā"ntarava"t | na hyākārāntaramagnyādi tatra samāropyate tasya tadānīmaviṣayatvāt |
yaścākāro bāhyābhedenāropyate tasyaiva viṣayatvena pratibhāsanaṃ | "sa ce"tyāropyamāṇo jalākāras"tatra" marīcikāsu "nās"ti bādhyamānatvā"dato sāmān"yaṃ jalajñānanna vidyate sāmānyamasyeti kṛtvā | "tathā" marīcikāvat sattyajaleṣvapi jalākārādhyāropakaṃ jalajñānamasāmānyaṃ |

[208,5]

"satīt"yādi paraḥ | anyadeva jala"sāmā"nyaṃ sati tasya "grahe tadāropo" jalāropaḥ"nānyathā" | yadi jalasāmānyamantareṇa satyajale jalāropaḥ syāt tadā"'tiprasaṃgaḥ" |
agnyādāvapi jalāropaḥ syāt |

[209,1]

"satī"ti si ddhā nta vā dī | "ekaṃ kāryaṃ" pānāvagāhanādi ta"tkaraṇaśīlānāṃ" sattyajalānāṃ "grahe sati kinneṣya"te jalāropaḥ | sāmānyamantareṇa bhinnānāmekakāryakaraṇaśaktireva nāstīti cedāha | "avaśyaṃ ce"tyādi | pratipāditaṃ caitad |

[209,2]

"ekapratyavamarśārthajñānādyekārthasādhana"3 | 72

[209,3]

ityatrāntare |

[209,4]

anye tu "na hi tatrānya"deva kiṃcit sāmānyamastītyādikaṃ granthaṃ sāmānyaśabdaṃ sādṛśyārthaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate | tatteṣāṃ vyākhyānannātiśliṣṭaṃ yattathā pratīyata ityāderavācakatvāt | na hi sādṛśyaṃ jalarūpatayā pratīyata iti |

[209,5]

"tata" ityekakāraṇaśakteḥ | "ta eve"ti yathoktaśaktiṣu yuktā vyaktaya eva na tu sāmānyaṃ | "anyebhya" ityatatkāryebhyaḥ | "tādṛśa"mityekākāraṃ | "yathābhāva"miti padārthānativṛttāvanvayībhāvaḥ | yathā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyavirahi sthitaṃ |
tadativṛttyā "kinna pratyeti vikal"papratyayaḥ | kasmāttatrābhūtaṃ sāmānyamāropayati | "yathābhāva"mityasyaivārtho"saṃsṛṣṭe"tyādi | asaṃsṛṣṭa ekarūpatāmanāpannaḥ | "bhedaḥ" parasparaṃ viśeṣo yasya bhāvasya sa tathā | aśaktireṣā | yathāvasthitagrahaṇaṃprati "vikalpā"nāṃ | kasmāt "avidyāprabhavā"t | bhūtārthagrahaṇaṃ vidyā | tadvirodhād vikalpa evāvidyā | prabhāva eva prabhavaśabdenoktaḥ |
vikalpasāmarthyādityarthaḥ | yathāsthitavastvagrahaṇaṃ hi vikalpasya svabhāvaḥ prakṛtyā bhrāntatvāt tasya vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ vināśa eva vikalpasya vibhramo na yukta iti cedāha | "na ce"tyādi | vikalpasvarūpamevātrāntaro viplava uktaḥ | vikalpasyaiva tatsvarūpaṃ yenāsau "bāhya"sādharmya"manapekṣya vibhramo bhavatī"tyarthaḥ | keśādyākārā bhrāntiḥ "keśādivibhramaḥ" | sa yathā bāhyārthānapekṣaḥ sannabhūtākāropagrahaṇamā"ntaramviplava"māśritya bhrānto bhavati | tadvad vikalpopyabhūtasāmānyākāragrahaṇādityayamatrārthobhipretaḥ | bhrāntibījamāntaro viplavastasmādutpatterityayantāvadarthotra nābhipretaḥ | etaccottaratra vyaktīkariṣyate |

[210,1]

codakastvavidyāprabhavādityatrāvidyāśabdenāprahīṇāvaraṇasantatau dvayanirbhāsabījamevoktaṃ | tataścodbhava utpattistathā āntaropi viplavastadaiva bījamevaṃbhūtaṃ cāvidyodbhavatvaṃ sarvavijñānānāmastītyata āha | "avidyodbhavād viplavatva"
ityādi | avidyāyā udbhavādutpādād viplavatve bhrāntatve "cakṣu"rvijñānā"diṣvapi"
viplava"prasaṃgaḥ | ne"tyādinā svābhiprāyamāha | "tasyā" ityavidyāyāḥ sāmānyākārāropakaṃ jñānam"vikalpa"sta"llakṣaṇatvā"t | tadāha | "vikalpa eva hī"tyādi | "set"yavidyā | "svabhāve"neti prakṛtyā | "naiva"mityādinā prasaṃgaṃ pariharati | teṣāṃ svalakṣaṇākāratvenāvikalpakatvāt | tasmānna tāni vikalpavat svabhāvena viparyastāni "indri"yādivikāreṇa tu keṣāṃcid bhavati bhrāntatā |

[210,2]

bāhyārthanayenoktā'dhunāntarjñeyanayenāha | "na ce"tyādi | etadāha | bhavatunāma yādṛśaścodyākāreṇāvidyāśabdasyārthaḥ kalpitastathāpyatiprasaṅgadoṣo nāstīṣṭatvāditi | "na vā teṣvapi" cakṣurādijñāneṣ"veṣa" bhrāntatva"doṣa"steṣāmapi viplutatvāt | tadevāha | "advayānā"mityādi | cakṣurādivijñānānāmātmasamvedanamevādvayannātra dvayamastīti kṛtvā | tathā hi vijñānasamānakālamvicchinnapratibhāsi |
grāhyatvenābhimataṃ nīlādi | ekānekavicārākṣamatayā na paramārthaṃsat | tadapekṣayā ca yadvijñānasya grāhakatvaṃ karttṛrūpantadapyasat | na tu samvedanantasya pratyakṣatvāt | bhrāntagrāhakākārāvyatiriktatvātsvasamvitterapi bhrāntatvamiti cenna tasyāḥ svarūpeṇāsattve pratibhāsa eva na syācchaśaviṣāṇavat | bhrānterapi ca svarūpeṇa sattyatvamanyathā bhrāntitvāyogāt | svarūpavijñānaikarūpaṃ jñānañca svasa mvidrūpameveti kathanna saṃvitteḥ sattyatvaṃ | yadvā dvayapratibhāso bhrāntirbhrāntiśca tattvādhiṣṭhānā | dvicandrādibhrāntivat | tattvaṃ ca dvayaviparītamadvayantacca svasamvidrūpameva | na tu dvayābhāvatāsyāsattvāditi kathaṃ na sā samvitteḥ...tadevaṃ yathoktacodya... ... ... ...yāni ca.........syād grāhyagrāhakarūpeṇa pratibhāsanāt tānyapi bhrāntānīti vakṣyāmaḥ tṛtīye paricchede | ata eva dvayanirbhāsavatāṃ svasaṃvitteḥ pratyakṣatvepi na tattvadarśitvaṃ vyavasthāpyate pramāṇāpramāṇavibhāgaḥ | kathamiti cedāha | "sarveṣāmi"tyādi | "vipla"vo bhrāntatvaṃ | "tadābhāsaḥ" | pramāṇābhāsaḥ | tayo"rvyavasthā"vibhāgaḥ | āśrayo bhrāntibīja"mālaya"vijñānantasya parāvṛttirāvaraṇavigamaḥ | āṅ maryādāyām | "āśra"yaparāvṛtteḥ sarvadā"rthakriyāyogyā'bhimatasamvādanā"t prāmāṇyavyavastheti sambandhaḥ | "arthakriyā" dāhapākādinirbhāsavijñaptilakṣaṇā | tasyāṃ "yog"yaṃ ca tada"bhima"taṃ puruṣasyeṣṭatvāt | tasya "samvādanā"diti vigrahaḥ | abhimatasyeva samvādanādityavadhāraṇaṃ na punassamvādanādeveti pramāṇādapi kadācit pratyayavaikalyena samvādāsambhavāt | arthakriyāyogyābhimatasamvādanādityupalakṣaṇaṃ | tathābhimatāsamvādanādityapi draṣṭavyaṃ |

[211,1]

evaṃ hi pramāṇābhāsavyavasthāyāḥ kāraṇamuktambhavet | vijñānavāde bāhyābhāvāt kathamarthakriyāyogyābhimatasamvādanaṃ | nāyandoṣognirjalanirbhrāsasyaiva jñānasya dāhapākādinirbhāsajñānotpādanasamarthasya yogyaśabdenābhidhānāt | evantāvaccakṣurādivijñānasya dhūmādiliṅgajanyasya cāgnyādinirbhāsinaḥ pramāṇavyavasthoktā | kṛtakādiliṅgajanyasya tvanātmādijñānasyāha | "mithye"tyādi |
sāmānyākārāropapravṛttatvādanātmādijñānasya "mithyātvaṃ" | tathāpi "praśamānukū"la"tvāt" prāmāṇyaṃ praśamo rāgādiprahāṇaṃ | anātmādisāmānyākāreṇa vastu gṛhītvā bhāvayatāmbhāvanāniṣpattāvanātmādisvalakṣaṇapratyakṣīkāreṇa rāgādiprahāṇāt | kasya punarmithyātvepi praśamānukūlatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityata āha | "mātṛsaṃjñe"tyādi | amātari mātṛsaṃjñā mithyāpi satī | rāgānutpattikāraṇaṃ | iyatā ca sādharmyeṇāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ | na tu mātṛsaṃjñādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ | ādiśabdād bhaginyādisaṃjñāparigrahaḥ |
ṣaṣṭhyarthe cāyamvatiḥ |

[211,2]

bāhyārthadarśanepi vastubhūtasāmānyābhāvād yadi sarvo vikalpo bhrāntastatra yathā jalasāmānyarahitāt "ma"lakṣaṇādutpanno "jalavikalpo" bhrāntastathā sattyajalādapi jalatvaśūnyājñāto jalavikalpastasyāpyatasmiṃstadgrahapravṛttatvād bhrāntatvaṃ | tatkuta etadekasyārthasamvādo parasya netyāha | "marīci"ketyādi | "anyasya ce"ti sattyajale jalajñānasya jalatvasāmānyasyābhāvānmarīcayo jalaṃ ca "bhinno bhāvas"tata u"tpatti"stasyā "aviśeṣepī"ti sambandhaḥ | "vibhrasmaya cāviśeṣe"pīti jalarahite marīcidravye yathā jalasāmānyādhyāropājjalavikalpo vibhramastathā sattyajalepi tasyāpyatasmiṃstadgraharūpatvādana"bhipretārthakriyā pānā"diḥ | tasyāṃ "yogyaṃ" jalasya svalakṣaṇa"mayog"yaṃ marīcikānāṃ | tata "utpatte"rhetoḥ sattyajale marīcikāsu ca jalavikalpasya | "yathākramaṃ samvādeta"rau itara ityasamvādaḥ | "ayo"gyamarīcikāsvalakṣa"ṇāt" | na hyajalarūpaṃ jalākārasya yogyamiti manyeta |

[212,1]

"vikalpe"tyādinā parihāraḥ | "arthapratibaddho"rthākārānuvidhānenotpattiḥ |
tadeva vyācaṣṭe | "na hī"tyādi | "yathārtha"miti padārthānativṛttāvavyayībhāvaḥ | evakāraśca bhinnakramaḥ | naiva hi padārthānurūpaṃ grāhakamutpadyata ityarthaḥ ||

[212,2]

kathantarhi jalajñānasya marīcikābhya utpattirukteti cedāha | "satī"tyādi |
marīcikāsu cakṣurvijñānādau bhrāntamupajāyate tasmin satyanubhūtākārādhyāropiṇī"jalabhrānti"riti pāramparyeṇa "tadudbhavā" marīcikodbhavetyucyate | "yathāsvabhā"vamiti pūrvavadavyayībhāvaḥ | jalabhrāntijananāsamarthaṃ ghaṭā"dyajala"mityuktaṃ | tato "viveki"nā jalabhrāntijananasa"marthe"neti yāvat | evaṃbhūtena marīcikākhyenārthena | "na yathāsvabhāvaṃ jananā"t tadudbhavetyucyate iti sambandhaḥ | yathā svabhāvamityasyaivārthaḥ | "svabhāvānukā"retyādi | svabhāvamanukarotīti svabhāvānukāraḥ | svalakṣaṇānurūpaṃ prativimbakantas"yārpaṇena" jñāne samāropaṇena | sā punaḥ kena sākṣājjanyata ityāha | "sā tvi"tyādi | "se"ti jalabhrāntirjalāt marīcikāyā yo "viśe"ṣasta"sya lakṣa"ṇambhedenāvadhāraṇantatrā"pāṭavā"ddhetoḥ | "svavāsanā" | jalabhrāntibījantasyāḥ"prabo"dha ānuguṇyaṃ tena "janyate" | kimviśiṣṭena "pratyayāpekṣiṇā" pratyayo marīcikādarśanaṃ jalasādharmyasmaraṇaṃ ca | "tasmā"dityupasaṃhāraḥ | vijātīyād "bhinno bhāvaḥ"svalakṣaṇamātrantato "jan"ma yasya vikalpavibhramasya sa tathā vikalpa eva vibhrama iti vigrahaḥ | "na vyatiriktasya sāmānyas"ya "darśanāt | ihe"ti pratītiprasaṅgāt |
nāvyatiriktasya sāmānyasya darśanāt | "pratyabhijñā"namiti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ | "vyaktivadana"nvayāditi | vyaktyātmake tadvadeva tasyānanvayāt sāmānyarūpameva nāstīti ||

[213,1]

"parasye"ti sāmānyavādinaḥ | seti sāmānyākārā | "kevalā"diti vyaktinirapekṣatvāt || 101 ||

[213,2]

"na hī"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ |

[213,3]

kasmānnāhetītyāha | "nitya"mityādi | "tanmātravijñāna" iti sāmānyamātragrahe |

[213,4]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "anaye"ti sāmānyākārayā | "anena jñānene"ti sāmānyālambinā |

[213,5]

"tade"ti vyakteragrahe | "samba"ddhasya sāmānyayuktasya "tadva"taḥ sāmānyavataḥ ||

[213,6]

"tadvattā" sāmānyavattā | yadi sāmānyantadāśrayaśca tena jñānena gṛhyeta tadobhayagrahaṇapūrvakasta"dvattāniścayo" na bhavet | "tataḥ" sāmānyagrahād "vyavahāro" vyaktau pravṛttiḥ "kathan"naiva |

[213,7]

"yade"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na tāvi"ti sāmānyatadvantau | "idamasya" bhedasya "sāmānyaṃ | tathā ce"ti sāmānyatadvatoḥ sambandhāpratipattau | "tatpratipattyā" sāmānyapratipattyā | "tadvati" sāmānyavati | "arthāntarava"diti na hyaśvapratipattikāle tadrūpeṇā gṛhīte godravye'śvapratipattyā pratipattirasti | ekavastusahāyā iti sāmānyasahāyāḥ |

[214,1]

"syādeta"dityetasyaiva vyākhyānaṃ | "tasye"ti jñānasya | "ekaṃ sahakā"ryastīti sāmānyaṃ sahakāri bhavatītyarthaḥ | "tadā tatsahi"tāḥ sāmānyasahitāḥ | evaṃ ca sāmānyatadvatordvayo"rgrahaṇāt" sāmānyapratipattyā tadvati pratipattiḥ siddheti bhāvaḥ ||

[214,2]

"tadi"tyā cā ryaḥ | "ekamvastu" sāmānya"ntāsāṃ" vyaktīnāṃ "nānātvaṃ samapoha"tyapanayati | kiṃ punastāsāṃ nānātvāpoha iṣyata ityāha | "nānātvāc"cetyādi | hyarthaḥ ca śabdaḥ | "tā"sviti vyaktiṣu | "ki"mityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "tenaikena" sāmānyena |
bhedeṣu ya"nnānātvantadekavijñānākāraṇa"tve bhedānāṃ "kāraṇamucyate" | nānātvādvyaktayo naikaṃ vijñānaṃ janayantīti | ekasāmānyasambandhepi yadi bhedānānnānātvādapracyutirna teṣ"vekā"kāraṃ "vijñā"namiti pūrvavadvyaktīnāmagrahaṇaṃ ||

[214,3]

"anekamapi" vyaktirūpaṃ | "eka"miti sāmānyaṃ | "net"yādinā vyācaṣṭe | yadi"bhedājananavirodhī" syāt tadā satyapi sāmānye "bhedānna janayaṃtyevaikaṃ vijñānaṃ" |

[214,4]

"tābhi"riti vyaktibhiḥ | kiṃ punaḥ samastābhireva "vinā | ne"tyāha | "pratyekami"ti | tathā hi śāvaleyābhāve bāhuleye gobuddhistathā tadabhāvenyatrāpyevampratyekaṃ sarvāsāṃ vyaktīnāmabhāvepi | "tenaike"na sāmānyena "kriyamāṇāṃ" ghiyaṃpratyabhijñānātmikāṃ prati "sāmarthyantāsāṃ" vyaktīnāṃ nāsti | iti hetora"graho dhiyā"
sāmānyajñānena "tāsāṃ" vyaktīnāṃ |

[215,1]

tadevāha | "katha"mityādi | "tatra" jñāne sāmānyākāre | "tadbhāvādi"ti sāmānyapratyayasya bhāvāt | etena vyatirekābhāva uktaḥ | prayogastu yo yadabhāvepi bhavati na tattannimittaṃ yathā śālibījābhāvepi bhavan yavāṅkuraḥ | bhavati ca pratyekaṃ śāvaleyādyabhāvepi bāhuleyādau gobuddhiriti vyāpakaviruddhaḥ | tannimittatāyāstadabhāvena vyāptatvāt | sāmānyasya tu tatra śaktirityāha | "asatī"tyādi | asati "sāmānye" sāmānyabuddhe"rabhāvāt" | anena vyatireka uktaḥ | "itarathā ce"ti sati sāmānye sāmānyabuddhe"rbhāvā"t | anenānvaya uktaḥ ||

[215,2]

yadi sāmānyasahitānāmeva vyaktīnāṃ sāmānyabuddhiṃ prati sāmarthyamiṣyate |
tadā tathoktanyāyena sāmānyasyaiva śaktirna vyaktīnāmiti |

[215,3]

"naiṣa doṣa" ityāha paraḥ | "ekāpāyepī"tyekaikasyāpāyepītyarthaḥ | tathā hi yathā nīlādisamudāyālambanaṃ "cakṣurvijñāna"mutpadyate | tatra caikaikasmin nīlādāvapanīte bhavatyeva pariśiṣṭe ca varṇṇasa"samū"he cakṣurbuddhi"rna" ceyatā nīlādīnā"masāmarthya"
samūhe kintu sāmarthyameva | pratyekaṃ nīlādīnāṃ samūhajñāne | "tathehāpi" vyaktiṣ"vekaikāpāyepi" bhavati sāmānyavijñānamiti | neyatā pratyekaṃ "sarvadā" vyaktīnā"masāmarthya"miti sambandhaḥ | tataśca yo yadabhāvepi bhavatītyādi prayoge'nekānta iti |

[215,4]

"viṣama" i tyā cā ryaḥ | upanyasyata ityupa"nyā"so nīlādidṛṣṭāntastasya prakrāntena sāmyannāstītyarthaḥ | naivaṃ vyakteḥ kathaṃcaneti | na pratyekaṃ samastānāṃ vyaktīnāṃ sāmarthyamityarthaḥ |

[216,1]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "nīlādīnāmi"tyādi | "pratyekama"pi "sāmarthya dṛṣṭamiti" |
nīlādayo hi yathā svena svena rūpeṇa bhinnāstadvaccakṣurvijñānānyapi |
svākārabhedāt | tatra nīlasahitena samūhena yajjanyate cakṣurvijñānanna tattadvikalena yacca tadvikalena na janyate tadanyadeva | tasmāt samūhākāroparaktasya vijñānasya "pratye"kanna nīlādīnpratyanvayavyatirekānuvidhānād gamyate teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthyamiti "samūhepi śaktiraviruddhā | tathe"ti nīlādivat | "na kadāci"diti pratyekaṃ saṃhatā vā |

[216,2]

etadāha | yadi śāvaleyasahitasāmānyajanyaṃ gojñānamanyadanyacca bāhuleyasahāyajanyaṃ syāt | tadā vyaktīnāṃ pratyekaṃ svāśrayadvārabhāvijñāne śaktirgamyeta |
kintvekameva sarvāsu vyaktiṣu pratyabhijñānantasya sarvatraikākāratvāt | pratyekaṃ vyaktīnāṃ cābhāvepi sāmānyādevāsyotpatteḥ | "tasmādasamarthā eva vyaktayastatra" sāmānyajñāne | "iti" hetos"tena" sāmānyajñānena "na gṛhyeran" ||

[216,3]

"tāsām"vyaktīnāmmadhye'"nya"ta"māpekṣa"miti kāṃcidvyaktimapekṣyetyarthaḥ | "tadi"ti sāmānyaṃ "kevalaṃ" vyaktinirapekṣaṃ |

[216,4]

"athe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "kuvinda"stantuvāyaḥ | bahūnāṃ vemānāmmadhye "pratyekaṃ vemābhāve"pyekenānyatamena "paṭaṃ ka"rotīti | yadyapi sarveṣāṃ vyabhicārastathāpi "na tata" eva "kuvindāde"va vemarahitāt "paṭotpattiḥ" śakyā vaktuṃ | yasmānna vemarahitaḥ kuvindaḥ paṭaṃ karoti kevalasya paṭakaraṇāśakteḥ | "tathā ca na sāmānyaṃ kevalantaddhe"turvijñānahetuḥ |

[216,5]

"evami" tyā cā ryaḥ | "tāsā"manyatamāpekṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ śaktamiti bruvatā vyaktyupakāryaṃ sāmānyamiṣṭamanupakāriṇyapekṣāyogāt ||

[217,1]

evaṃ ce"ttadekaṃ" sāmānya"mupakuryustā" vyaktayaḥ "kathamekāṃ dhiyaṃ ca na" | evaśabdārthe caśabdaḥ | ekāṃ pratyabhijñānātmikāndhiyameva kathaṃ nopakuryastāmevopakuryuriti yāvat |

[217,2]

"bhinnetyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | bhinnānāṃ vilakṣaṇānāmekārthopakriyā | pratyabhijñādyekārthakriyāvirodhinyasati sāmānya iti "sarvoyaṃ" sāmānyasiddhyarthaṃ "ārambhaḥ |
āsā"miti vyaktīnāṃ vi"jñāne"na pratyabhijñānākhyenāparādhaḥ kṛto yat tadvijñānanna kurvanti | na kaścitkṛtastasmāttadeva kurvantīti bhāvaḥ | tathā ca "kimatrāntargaḍunā" | ghaṭāmastakayorantarālavarttī māṃsapiṇḍontargaḍustena tulyastathoktaḥ |
tadvanniṣphalenetyarthaḥ ||

[217,3]

syānmataṃ | "bhinnānāmekasāmānyopakāraśakti"rastyataste sāmānyameva sākṣādupakurvate na tu vijñānamityata āha | "yathe"tyādi | "evantade"kamiti sāmānyajanyaṃ yadvi"jñāna"ntadeva kurvantu | kiṃ sāmānyopakāreṇa niṣphalena | evammanyate | vijñāne vyaktayo na svākāropadhānena vyāpriyante | sāmānyajñāne svalakṣaṇasyāpratibhāsanāt | kiṃtvādhipatyamātreṇa | tacca yathā sāmānye tathā tadvijñānepi tulyamiti |

[217,4]

kiṃ ca yadi vyaktayaḥ sāmānyamupakurvate tadā "tāsāṃ" vyaktīnāṃ "kāryaścāsau"
sāmānyātmā prāptaḥ | yasmāj"jananamevopakriyā" ||

[217,5]

tadeva sphuṭayannāha | "na hī"tyādi | atiśayo viśeṣastadabhāvādanatiśayamātmānaṃ svabhāvamasya | sāmānyasyopakārakāsannidheḥ pūrvavadupakārakasannidhānepi vibhrataḥ ka"ścidupakārako" na hīti sambandhaḥ | "atiprasaṅgāt" | evaṃ hi sarvaḥ sarvasyopakārakaḥ syāt | tasmādupakārakeṇaivopakāryasyātiśayo janyata ityabhyupeyaṃ | sa cātiśaya upakāryasyātmabhūta iti jananamevopakriyā | sāmānyādarthāntarabhūta evātiśayo vyaktibhirnānyata ityāha | "arthāntara" ityādi | tasyopakāryasya sāmānyasya "kintenā"rthāntareṇopakāreṇa "kriya"te | tasya copakārasyārthāntarasya kintena sāmānyena yena tasya sāmānyasyāsāvupakārasambandhī syāt |
sāmānyasya sambandhina upakārasya karaṇād vyaktayopyupakāriṇyaḥ syuḥ | upakārasya sāmānyamāśrayastata āśrayāśrayibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhastayorityata āha | "tasye"tyādi | tasyopakārasya "tadāśrayatve" | tatsāmānyamāśrayo yasyeti kṛtvā |
