tasya vā sāmānyasya tadāśrayatve | tasyopakārasyāśraya iti kṛtvā | upakarotītyupakārī tadabhāvādanupakāri sāmānyamupakāraḥ sāmānyakṛto'styasyopakārasyetyupakārī | tatpratiṣedhādanupakārī | anupakārya ityarthaḥ | arthadvayaṃ caitattantreṇopāttam | tenāyamarthaḥ | anupakārakasya sāmānyasyānupakāryasya copakārasya yathākramaṃ "ka āśrayāśrayibhāva" iti | "atiprasaṅgo ve"ti | anupakāriṇa āśrayāśrayibhāve sarvatra tatprasaṅgāt | "upakāre vā" sāmānyakṛte upakārasyābhyupagamyamāne | "tatraiva" sāmānye tasyopakārasya "pratibandha iti kimanyo" vyaktibheda"stasyo"pakārasya "karaṇā"t "tas"ya sāmānya"syopakārī" naiveti cet | "tadapekṣa"syeti vyaktyapekṣasyā"śraya"syeti sāmānyasya | upakāraṃ pratyāśrayatvāt | "tadupayoge" tasminnupakāre | upayoge kalpyamāne nityatvādanupa"kāryatve" sāmānyasya "keyaṃ" vyaktiṃ pra"tyapekṣā nāma" | naiva | kastarhyapekṣata ityata āha | "tadutpattī"tyādi | tasmādapekṣaṇīyādutpattiḥ sā dharmaḥ svabhāvo yasya sa "tadutpattidharmma"bhāvaḥ | svabhāvasya "prativandhādā"yattatvā"dapekṣate nāma"
upakāriṇaṃ | nāmaśabdaḥ prasiddherdyotakaḥ | anutpattidharmakamapi sāmānyamapekṣata iti cedāha | "anādheyetyā"di | yattairupakārakairanādheyonutpādya ātmā"tiśayo" yasya sa tathā | evaṃbhūta ātmīyasyeti punarbahubrīhirevambhūta"tve" sāmānyapadārthaḥ"apekṣate ca parāniti vyāhatametat" | vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhyā | tathā hyapekṣādheyātiśayatvena vyāptā | tadviruddhamanādheyātiśatvamiti |

[219,1]

"yaḥ kaści"d bhāvaḥ pratibandhaḥ kasyacid vastunaḥ "kvaci"dāśraye "sa sarvo janyatāyāṃ"
kāryatāyāme"vodbhavati" | āśrayeṇāśritasyānātmabhūta evopakāraḥ kriyata iti cedāha | "parabhāvetyā"di | "tadanupakārātta"syopakāryasyānupakārāt | na hyanyasminnupakṛtenya upakṛto nāma | tasya tadāśrayatve'nupakāriṇaḥ koyamāśrayāśrayibhāva iti sarvamvācyaṃ |

[219,2]

na ca paunaruktyadoṣaḥ | pūrvaṃ sāmānyatadvatorupakāryopakārakabhāvadvāreṇoktamadhunā sarvaviṣayaṃ vāstavaṃ sambandhamupādāyeti | tasmādarthāntarakaraṇādāśrayābhimatokiṃcitkaraḥ | tathābhūtopyupakāraka iti cedāha | "akiñcitkara"syetyādi | yata eva"ntasmād vijñānajanana" ityanvayivijñānajanane | "vyakta"mavaśya"masya" sāmānyasya | "tatkārya"tā vyaktikāryatā |

[219,3]

yathoktadoṣabhayāt "kevala"sya vyaktyanapekṣasyānvayivijñānajananaṃ prati "sāma"rthyebhyupagamyamāne "vyaktīnāṃ kvacida"pi kāle | "atre"tyanvayivijñāne "sāmarthyāsi"ddheḥkāraṇāda"grāhyatvaṃ vyaktīnāṃ" | akāraṇasya viṣayatvāyogāt | "vijñāne pratibhāsanā"diti | na hyasamarthasya śaśaviṣāṇāderanvayivijñāne pratibhāsanamasti | "vyaktayastu" pratibhāsante | tasmāt sāmānyavattā api "samarthā" iti | asiddhaḥ sāmānyavijñāne upakāro yāsāṃ vyaktīnāntā "asiddhopakā"rāstā"sāṃ kathaṃ" sāmānyavijñāne "pratibhā"saḥ | naiva | upakāra eva kathamasiddha "iti cedā"ha | "sa eve"tyādi | "sa" ityupakāraḥ "sāmānyābhyupagame" hi tasyaiva tatra sāmarthyanna vyaktīnāṃ | yathoktaṃ |

[219,4]

"tābhirvināpi pratyekaṃ kriyamāṇāṃ dhiyaṃ pratī" tyādi 1 | 105 |

[219,5]

mābhūd vyaktīnāmupakāraḥ sāmānyavijñāne pratibhāsastu kasmānna bhavatītyāha | "yasmā"dityādi | "atiprasaṃ"gāditi | "anupakārakasya viṣayatve" sarvasya vijñānasyasarvo viṣayaḥ syāt | mābhūd viṣayaḥ pratibhāsastukasmānneti "cedāha | nāviṣayasye"tyādi | "anupakārakasye"tyādi | anupakārasyeti pāṭhāntaraṃ | tatra na vidyate vijñānakāryasyopakāro yasmādarthāt sonupakāra iti vyākhyeyaṃ | tasyā"viṣayatve'tītānāgatā"dīnāṃ | ādiśabdāt pradhāneśvarādīnāṃ yathāgamakaṃ kalpitānāṃ "grahaṇaṃ |
asatā"mityasāmānyahetuḥ | "bhavantvit"yādinā siddhasādhyatāmāha | "tadviṣayāṇī"tyatītaviṣayāṇi | "nirviṣayatve" kathanteṣvantarbhaviṣyati cetyevamādyarthānukārī pratibhāsa ityata āha | "nirviṣayatve"pītyādi | "tadanupakārī"ti yosāvarthonubhūto'tītaśca tadanupakārī | aspaṣṭena rūpeṇātītasyaivārthasyānukārānnātītā dikannāma kiñcidasti yasya rūpamanukuryāt | sa ca pratibhāso"vijñānasyātmabhū"ta "evā"spaṣṭarūpasya bahiravidyamānatvāt | tadrūpānukāritve kāraṇamāha | "tadrūpānubhave"tyādi | yadrūpo varttamānārthānubhavo jātastena yā "vāsanā āhitā" tata "utpadyamānaṃ" jñānamanubhūtārthākāreṇotpadyata ityarthaḥ | yuktamatīte tadrūpārthānubhavotpattirvarta mānāvasthāyāmarthasyānubhūtatvād anāgatādau kathaṃ | na hi tatrānubhavosti | tatrāpyevambhūtortho bhaviṣyatītyevaṃbhūtācchabdād yobhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭo vikalpaḥ sa eva svasaṃviditatvāt tadrūponubhavastenāhitavāsanotpatteradoṣaḥ |

[220,1]

evaṃ pradhānādivikalpeṣvapi yathāgamaṃ śabdārthākāravikalpānubhavavāsanotpattirvyākhyeyā | evamatītādīnāmaviṣayatve prasaṅgādanupakārako viṣaya iti yaduktantadaikāntikameva | tathā vyaktīnāmasiddhopakārāṇāmaviṣayatvānnāsti sāmānyajñāne pratibhāsaḥ | tataśca yaduktaṃ | samarthā vyaktayo vijñāne pratibhāsanāditi | tasyāsiddhatvamuktaṃ |

[220,2]

adhunā pratibhāsamaṅgīkṛtyānaikāntikatvamāha | "bhāvābhāvet"yādi | arthabhāve bhāvastadabhāve cābhāvo vijñānasya "bhāvābhāvānuvidhānaṃ" | ta"smā"ddhetorarthasya vijñāne "sāma"rthyaṃ gamyate | "na tu pratibhāsanāt" | yasmād vastusthityā sāmānyasyāsatyapi pratibhāsane vikalpavijñāne sāmarthyābhyupagamāt | tadevāha | "apratibhāsino"pītyādi | "na hi vyaktivyatirekeṇa sāmānyaṃ pratibhāsate" | yadapi sāmānyapratibhāsi vikalpavijñānantadapi varṇṇasaṃsthānādyākārameva | na hi tatrāpi varṇṇādyākāraviviktonyaḥ sāmānyākāro lakṣyate | na ca varṇṇasaṃsthānādyātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ | tasmānna vastusthityā sāmānyaṃ pratibhāsate | tathāpi tasyāpratibhāsino bhavanmatena bhāvāt | vijñāne sāmarthyāt | bhāvyate janyate kāryamaneneti bhāvaḥ sāmarthyamucyate | satyapi ca pratibhāsane nāsti sāmarthyamiti darśayannāha | "pratibhāsinā"mityādi | viplavante vastutvādapagacchantīti "viplavāḥ keśādaya" eva |
viplavā iti vigrahaḥ | te hi taimirikādidarśane pratibhāsante tathāpi te"ṣāmabhāvāt" |
pūrvavad bhāvaśabdavyutpatterasāmarthyamabhāvaśabdenocyate | vijñānajananaṃ pratyasāmarthyamityarthaḥ | tadeva sāmarthyepi pratibhāsadarśanāt pratibhāsanāt sāmarthyamityasyānekānta ukto bhavati |

[221,1]

"tadaikamupakuryustāḥ kathamekāndhiyaṃ ca neti 1 | 107"(#pava.3.105)

[221,2]

yaduktantatra parasyottaramāśaṃkate | "abhinne"tyādinā | "abhinnapratibhāsā"
ekākārā | "bhinneṣu" svalakṣaṇeṣu | teṣāṃ svalakṣaṇānāmākārastadākāraḥ sorpita āhito yasyāmbuddhau sā tathā | evaṃbhūtā cāsā"vabhinnapratibhāsinī ca na hi syād" yadi vilakṣaṇebhya evotpadyeta | bhavati cābhinnapratibhāsinī | tasmānna vilakṣaṇebhya evotpadyate kintu sāmānyapadārthāditi |

[221,3]

"ne"tyādinā pratividhatte | etatkathayati | yadi svalakṣaṇāni svākārā vā tena sāmānyākārāṇāṃ buddhīnāṃ janakānīṣyante tadetad yujyate | "bhinneṣu"
kathamabhinnapratibhāsā buddhiriti | tacca nāsti yato "na sāmānyapratibhāsinīṣu"
buddhiṣu "svalakṣaṇapratibhāsaḥ" | yasmāt "sāmānyagrāhiṇīṣu" buddhiṣu svalakṣaṇapratibhāsābhyupagame tisraḥ kalpanāḥ | <1>yena rūpeṇa cakṣurādibuddhiṣu vyaktayo bhāsante tenaiva sāmānyabuddhiṣvapi | <2> sāmānyabuddhau vā yadrūpamābhāti tadeva svalakṣaṇānāṃ | <3> rūpadvayaṃ vā ekasya bhedasyābhyupagantavyaṃ | yena kena cakṣurādibuddhiṣu bhāsate'nyena vikalpabuddhiṣviti |

[221,4]

<1>tatrādye pakṣe cakṣurādibuddhivat svalakṣaṇābhāve sāmānyubuddhīnāmapyabhāvaḥ syānna caivaṃ | ta"dabhāvepi" tasya svalakṣaṇasyābhāvepi "tāsāṃ" sāmānyabuddhīnāṃ"bhāvā"t | <2> dvitīyasya pakṣasyābhāvamāha | "ākārā"ntaretyādi | sāmānyākārā"dākārāntare"ṇāsādhāraṇena "svajñāne" cakṣurādijñāne pratibhāsanānna sāmānyākāra eva rūpaṃ vyaktīnāṃ | <3> tṛtīyampakṣaṃ nirākarttumāha | "anekākārāyogāditi" |
ekasyānekatvamayuktamekānekatvayorvirodhāt | "atiprasaṅgācce"tyekasyānekatvakalpanāyāṃ na kvacidekatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ | svalakṣaṇaṃ ca sāmānyabuddhau na pratibhāsate |

[222,1]

yata eva"ntasmānneyaṃ" sāmānyākārā buddhiḥ | "bhinnārthagrāhiṇī" | āhitasvalakṣaṇākārā sat"yabhinnākārā bhāti | tadudbhavā" bhinnapadārthodbhavā | kintu svala kṣaṇagrāhiṇonubhavenāhitāṃ vāsanāmāśritya prakṛtyā bhrāntaiveyamutpadyate | pāramparyeca vyaktayastasyāḥ kāraṇaṃ kathyante |

[222,2]

yadi sāmānyabuddhirna svalakṣaṇapratibhāsinī kathaṃ svalakṣaṇe lokaṃ pravarttayatīti cedāha | "atatpratibhāsinyapī"tyādi | asvalakṣaṇapratibhāsinyapi svapratibhāse'narthe'arthā"dhyavasāyavibhramā"ddheto"rvyavahārayati lokaṃ" dṛśyavikalpyāvekīkṛtya pravarttayatīti yāvat | yadi sāmānyabuddhiḥ sāmānyākārā sa eva pāramārthikantarhi sāmānyambhaviṣyatītyāha | "sa tu" tasyāmityādi | "sa pratibhāsamānaḥ" sāmānyā"kāro nārtheṣvasti" | tasya vyatiriktasya vyatirekeṇānupalambhanāt | avyatiriktasya ca vyaktivadananvayāt |

[222,3]

kathantarhi vyaktiṣvabhinnākārapratibhāsa ityāha | "anyatra bhedādabhedina" iti |
bhedonyāpohaḥ sa eva prativyaktyabhedī | tathā hi yathaikā govyaktiragovyāvṛttā tathānyāpi | tadanena prakāreṇa svalakṣaṇānyeva vijātīyavyāvṛttānyabhedīni bhedaityucyante | anyatra śabdaścāyamvibhaktyantapratirūpako nipātaḥ | anyaśabdasamānārthaḥ | na tvayantralpratyayāntaḥ saptamyarthasyāvivakṣitatvāt | tenāyamartho yathoktena prakāreṇa svalakṣaṇātmakād bhedādabhedinonyaḥ pratibhāsamāna ākāro rtheṣu nāsti kintu svalakṣaṇātmaka eva bhedo vijātīyavyāvṛtterabhedī sarvatra vidyate'bhedādhyavasāyāt | abhedādhyavasāyasya ca sa eva bhedaḥ pāramparyeṇa nimittaṃ |

[222,4]

nanu buddhāvabhinnākāraḥ pratibhāsate kathamartheṣu nāstītyucyata ityāha | "sa cārūpa" iti | hyarthe ca śabdaḥ | sa hi vikalpapratibhasyākāro niḥsvabhāvastattvānyatvena paramārthato vyavasthāpayitumaśakyatvāditi saṃpratyevoktatvāt | "tamevākāraṅgṛhī"tabuddhistadākārotpattirevāsyāḥ grahaṇa"ntathe"tyarūpasyākārasya grahaṇād"viplavate" bhrāntā bhavatī"tyuktamprāk" | aśaktireṣā vikalpānāmavidyāprabhavatvādinoktatvāt |

[223,1]

doṣasya parihāramuktvā'dhunā tulyadoṣatāmāpādayannāha | "api" cetyādi | "na tulyami"ti paraḥ | "tatreti bhinnāsu" vyaktiṣu tata eva sāmānyāttulyākārād buddhiriti "na tulyaṃ codyaṃ" |

[223,2]

"nanvi"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | "tatra" vyaktiṣu tasya sāmānyasya "satopyābhāsa" ākāro "na" lakṣyate | yadvā tatreti vikalpikāvikalpikāyāṃ buddhau |
syādetad | vikalpikāyāntasyābhāsostītyāha | "sā hītyā"di | "sā hi"
vikalpikā buddhi"rvarṇṇasaṃsthānavatī vibhāvya"te'nubhūyate | varṇṇādyākārameva sāmānyamiti cedāha | "na ce"tyādi | īdṛśamiti varṇṇasaṃsthānākāraṃ guṇatvād varṇṇasaṃsthānādeḥ sāmānyasya ca guṇavyatirekāt | "na ca tata" iti varṇṇasaṃsthānādeḥ |

[223,3]

evaṃ tāvad bhinnaṃ sāmānyaṃ nirākṛtyābhinnaṃ nirācikīrṣannāha | "ākṛtī"tyādi | svalakṣaṇānāmātmabhūtameva sādṛśyamākṛtistadeva sāmānyantasya vādaḥ sa yasyāsti | tadvā vadituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sāṃ khya sya "sa tathā | viśeṣavat" svalakṣaṇavat "tasya" sāmānyasya svalakṣaṇā"davyatirekā"ddheto"rarthā"ntare dvitīyādivyaktiṣ"vavṛttiḥ | iti" hetostadapi sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇameva jātantato bhedāddhetorvidyamānasya"nābhinnaḥ pratibhāso yujyate" vyaktiṣvityadhyāhāraḥ |

[223,4]

tadevamu dyo ta ka rā dyabhihitamabhinnapratibhāsamabhyupagamya vyatiriktasyāvyatiriktasya ca sāmānyasyāyogād bhrāntirevāyaṃ vyaktiṣvekākārapratibhāsa ityuktaṃ |

[224,1]

adhunāstyekapratibhāso vyaktiṣvityāha | "athavāstvi"tyādi | yaduktam | "abhinnapratibhāsā dhīrna bhinne"ṣvityatadastu | iṣṭamevaitadityarthaḥ | yataḥ "pratibhāso dhiyāṃ" sāmānyabuddhīnāṃ "bhinnaḥ" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "samānā iti tā"sāṃ vyaktīnāṃ "grahaṇāt" |

[224,2]

"naivetyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "tāsvi"ti sāmānyabuddhiṣu"abhinna" ityekaḥ "pratibhā"sosti | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tāsāṃ" vyaktīnāṃ "samānā iti grahaṇāt" |

[224,3]

nanu "samānā" iti grahe satye"kapratibhā"saḥ kasmā"nna yujya"ta evetyata āha | "na hī"tyādi | "kintarhi tadeve"ti yatpūrvadṛṣṭantade"vedan"dṛśyata ityevaṃ syānna tu pūrveṇedaṃ samānamiti bhedādhiṣṭhānatvāt samānavyavahārasya | dvayasyetyādi | "yadi" sāmānyameva kevalantābhirbuddhibhirgṛhyate tadā bhavedayaṃ doṣaḥ | kintu sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca dvayamapi sāmānyabuddhyā gṛhyate | tato dvayasya grahaṇādadoṣaḥ | yatastenaiva sāmānyena yuktā viśeṣāḥ samānā iti gṛhyanta iti |

[224,4]

"tathāpī"tyā cā ryaḥ | dvayasya grahaṇepi kalpyamāne ta"diheti syāt" | tat sāmānyaṃ yatpūrvaṃ vyaktau dṛṣṭantadiha vyaktyantare dṛśyata ityevaṃ syānna tu samāna iti vyaktibhya ekāntabhinnatvāt sāmānyasya | "tadevetya"rthāntarabhūtaṃ gotvādikaṃ "tāsāṃ" vyaktīnāṃ sāmyaṃ yena "tāssamānā iti cet | anyaḥ" sāmānyāt "sā'nyasya" svalakṣaṇasya "kathaṃ"
kena prakāreṇa "sām"yaṃ | na kenacidityabhiprāyaḥ | tathā hi vyaktirūpānukārāt sāmānyaṃ vyaktīnāṃ sāmyaṃ kalpyeta | tacca nāsti vyaktibhyo'tyantaṃvilakṣaṇatvāt sāmānyasya | nāpyanenānye samānā yena tatsāmyaṃ syāt | na hi vyaktirūpānukārādinā sāmyaṃ kintu tatsa"mbandhāt" | vyaktibhiḥ sambandhāt | sāmānyaṃ vyaktīnāṃ sāmānya"miti cennai"tadevaṃ | kiṅkāraṇam | a"pratibaddha"sya vyaktāvanāyattasya tābhiranupakṛtasyetyarthaḥ | samavāyalakṣaṇena sambandhena sambandhāt sāmānyasya"sāmye"bhyupagamyamāne"'tiprasaṃ"gaḥ saṃkhyāsaṃyogakāryadravyāṇāmapi sāmānyarūpatā syāt |
tataśca tatsambandhāt saṃkhyeyādiṣu samānapratibhāsaḥ syāt |

[225,1]

"kathami"tyādi paraḥ | samānā iti grahaṇād vyaktiṣu pratibhāsabhedaḥ sādhyate | taccaitad "viruddhaṃ" | yasmāt "samāścetā" vyaktayaḥ ka"thambhinnadhīgrā"hyā eveti sāvadhāraṇaṃ | abhinnadhīgrāhyā api prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ | tathā hi yatra kiñcit sāmānyaṃ kaścicca viśeṣastatra samānā iti grahaṇaṃ yuktamanyathā ghaṭapaṭādivadabhedapratibhāsaḥ syānna samānā iti |

[225,2]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "nanvi"tyādi | "āsu vyakti"ṣvityanena viśeṣarūpamāha | "abhinnaḥ pratibhā"saḥ siddha ityadhyāhāryaḥ |

[225,3]

anena ca sāmānyasya rūpamuktaṃ |

[225,4]

tadevaṃ sādhāraṇā'sādhāraṇarūpagrahaṇād vyaktayaḥ samānā gṛhyanta iti samudāyārthaḥ | tatkiṃ samāneṣvekānekapratibhāso vidyate yenaivamucyate | yadi syādiheti buddhiḥ syādityuktaṃ | sāmānyātmakatvād viśeṣāṇāṃ "samānā iti pratibhāsa iti cet" | nanvanugatapratibhāsābhāve sāmānyamastīti kutaḥ | na ca samānarūpānyathānupapattyā sāmānyakalpanā yuktā | svahetubhya evaṃ keṣāṃcit samānāmevotpatteḥ keṣāṃcidasamānāṃ | na ca sāmānyāt teṣāṃ samānarūpatā yujyata ityuktaṃ |

[225,5]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭe na ||

[225,6]

"na cāprasiddhasārūpyānapohaviṣayātmanā | śaktaḥ kaścidapi jñātuṃ gavādīnaviśeṣataḥ || athāsatyapi sārūpye syādapohasya kalpanā | gavāśvayorayaṃ kasmādagopoho na kalpyate || śāvaleyācca bhinnatvaṃ bāhuleyāśvayossamaṃ | sāmānyaṃ nānyadiṣṭaṃ ca kvāgopohapravarttanaṃ || apohyānapi cāśvādīnekadharmānvayādṛte | na nirūpayituṃ śakyastadapoho na sidhyatīti | "

[226,1]

apāstaṃ | sāmānyamantareṇāpi svahetubhya eva gavādīnāṃ samānāmutpatteryadi nāma sārūpyamarthāntarabhūtaṃ neṣyate sarūpāstviṣyanta eva te | evaṃrūpāśca yena bhavantyaśvādayaste sarve'viśeṣeṇāgorūpatayā niṣidhyanta iti na kācit kṣatiḥ |

[226,2]

ā cā ryastu "na nāma svahetubhyaḥ samānā utpannāstathāpi na sāmānyabalāt samānā iti pratītiri" ti darśayannāha | "net"yādi | "taddarśana" iti vyaktigrāhiṇi jñāne | sāmānyajñāne vā | "bhinnābhinnayo"riti viśeṣasāmānyayoḥ | "ekakāryatāsādṛśya"miti | ekakāryataiva sādṛśyaṃ sāmyaṃ "tenaiva" samānā vyaktayaḥ "pratī"yanta ityarthaḥ | na tu pāramārthikena sāmānyena | tenaikakāryatā sādṛśyaṃ yeṣānta evāpohaviṣayā yeṣāṃ tvekakāryatā nāsti te'pohyā iti siddhaṃ | yathā caikāntabhinnā apyekakārya kurvanti tathoktaṃ prāk |

[226,3]

kasmānna sāmānyena samānā pratīyanta ityāha | "na hī"tyādi | "arthajñāna itya"nubhavajñāne "dvāvākārau" bhinnau | "arthadvayakalpanena" samānāsamānakalpanena | "kalpanāviṣayatā"mityekatvāropavikalpaviṣayatāṃ | "tathe"ti samānarūpatayā | "anayā"
vikalpabuddhyā |

[226,4]

"nanvi"tyādi paraḥ |

[226,5]

"tāsāṃ" vyaktīnāṃ "dhīḥ kāryaṃ sā ca vibhidyata" ityetāvān kārikābhāgaḥ | "pratibhāva"mityetadapekṣya paṭhitaḥ | evambhāvaṃ prati | "tadvadi"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | "tatpratibhāsinopi" vyaktipratibhāsinopi "jñānasya | tadvadvya"kti"bhedāt | kathamekakāryā vyaktayo" naiva || 110 ||

[226,6]

syādetat | nānubhavajñānenaikakāryāḥ vyaktayaḥ kintu yattadvikalpakamekarūpādhyāropeṇa tadapekṣayetyata āha | "taddhīt"yādi | taddhyanubhavajñāna"ntāsāṃ" vyaktīnāṃ"kāryaṃ" na vikalpavijñānantasya vyaktyabhāvepi bhāvāt | tasyaiva ca vikalpasya samānā ityevamutpadyamānasya vyaktiṣu kiṃ sāmyaṃ | paṭādīnāṃ śītāpanayanamityevamādiparigrahaḥ | "pratidra"vyamityavyayībhāvāt ṣaṣṭhyā ambhāvaḥ | dravyasya dravyasya yo bhedastasmād "bhedāt" kāraṇabhedād "bhidyata" iti yāvat |

[227,1]

"netyā cā ryaḥ | ekapratyavama"rśasyeti svaviṣayasyaikākārapratyayasya "hetutvād"
dhīrnirvikalpikā savikalpikā vā'"bhedinī" bhāti | "ekadhīhetubhāvene"tyadhyavasitaikarūpāyā buddherhetutvena "vyaktīnāmabhinnatā" bhāti |

[227,2]

etaduktambhavati | pratyekaṃ yadyapi vyaktisvarūpagrāhiṇyo dhiyo bhinnāstathāpi pratyabhijñayā tāsāmekatvamadhyavasīyate | anena caikakāryatāsādṛśyena vyaktīnāmekatvaṃ | na tvekaparāmarśahetutvenānubhavajñānānāmekatvamupacaryate | nāpi tathābhūtānubhavajñānahetutvena vyaktīnāmekatvamupacaryate | skhalitapratyayaviṣayatvābhāvādupacaritopacārābhāvācca | vṛttyarthānurūpaśca kārikārtho na vyākhyātaḥ syāt || 111 ||

[227,3]

nanu yadyekakāryatāsādṛśyena vyaktīnāmekatvādhyavasāyaḥ kathantarhi buddhīnāmekatvādhyavasāyaḥ | ekakāryatvābhāvāt | atha tāḥ svabhāvata ekatvāvasāyaṃ janayanti vyaktayopyevambhaviṣyantīti kimekakāryatāsādṛśyena |

[227,4]

sattyam | ācārya di gnā gā bhiprāyeṇaivamuktamityadoṣaḥ | tasmādekatvādhyavasādekatvamiṣyate | na paramārthata ityata āha | "nivedi"tamityādi | "sarvabhāvāḥ svabhāvena vyāvṛttibhāgina(#pava.3.39)"pra0 vā0 1 | 42 ityatroktatvāt | "tatre"tyasaṃsargiṣu bhedeṣu | "ekākārā buddhi"ratasmiṃstadgrahād "bhrāntireva" |

[227,5]

atha syāt | sāmānyamantareṇa bhrāntarevāyoga ityata āha | "tāntvi"tyādi |
tāmbhrāntimbhedinaḥ "padārthā vyāvṛttāni" svalakṣaṇāni "krameṇa" janayanti na sākṣāt | "svabhāva"ta iti prakṛtyā | cakāro niveditamityasyānukarṣaṇārthaḥ | "etadapi" tatraiva prastāve "niveditaṃ | krameṇe"ti yaduktantasya vyākhyānaṃ "vikalpahetavo bhavanta" iti |
vikalpakāraṇatvādanubhavajñānamvikalpaḥ | vikalpahetoranubhavajñānasya hetavo bhavanta ityarthaḥ | vyaktayonubhavajñānaṃ janayanti taccaikākārāṃ bhrāntimityayaṃ kramārthaḥ |

[228,1]

"sa tveṣā"mityādinā kā ri kā rthamāha | sarveṣāmbhāvānāmbhedonyāpohaḥ | kiṃ svabhāvo"'tatkārivivekaḥ" sa eṣā"mabhinna" ityucyate | kasmād | "jñānāde"rarthasyendriyasyodakāharaṇādeśca "kasyaci"dityātmānurūpas"yaikasya karaṇāt" |

yadvā | nanu buddherevāyamabhinnākāraḥ kathaṃ vyaktīnāmityata āha | "sa"

kiṅkāraṇam | "atatkārisvabhāvaviveko" yataḥ |

[228,3]

etaduktambhavati | prativyaktirgaurgauriti pratyayenātatkārisvabhāvavivekotatkārisvabhāvavivikta eva svabhāvo viṣayīkriyate | na tvarthāntarabhūtaṃ sāmānyantena bheda ityucyate | etatpaścārddhasya vyākhyānaṃ || 111 ||

[228,4]

nanu kathaṃ jñānāderekatvamityāha | "tadapī"tyādi | pūrvārddhasyaitad vyākhyānaṃ | "tadapi" jñānādikārya"mabhinnaṃ khyātīti" sambandhaḥ | "prakṛtye"ti svabhāvena | "abhedāvaskandina" ityabhedādhyavasāyinaḥ | "tathābhūtet"yādinā vyaktīnāmapi vikalpaṃ prati pāramparyeṇa kāraṇatvamāha | "abhedāvasāyo" vidyate yasmiṃstasya jñānāde rityanubhavajñānasyodakādyāharaṇādeścārthasya "hetutvāt" kāraṇāt krameṇa vyaktayopyekaṃ pratyayaṃ janayantīti sambandhaḥ | kimviśiṣṭamityāha | "saṃsṛṣṭākārami"tyādi | saṃsṛṣṭo vyaktiṣvāropita eka ākāro yena sa tathā | "svabhāvabhedo"nyavyāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ sa eva "paramā"rthonu"pacarito"'syeti vigrahaḥ | pāramparyeṇa vyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇadvārāyātatvād vikalpasya |

[228,5]

nanu ca tāntu bhedinaḥ padārthā ityādinā'yamartho'nantaramevoktaḥ |

[229,1]

sattyaṃ | kintu krameṇa vikalpahetavo bhavanta ityādyasyaivārtho'nena sphuṭīkṛtaḥ |
ekakāryabhedavastubhūtaṃ sāmānyambhaviṣyatītyata āha | "sā ce"tyādi | sā caikakāryatā | "atatkā"ryebhyo "viśleṣo" vyāvṛtta eva svabhāvo na vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇanta"danyasya" svalakṣaṇādanyasyā"nuvarttino"nvayino vastuno vyaktivyatirekeṇādṛṣṭeḥ"pratiṣedhācca" pūrvoktāt |

[229,2]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "dṛśyamu"palabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ "vibhāgena" vyaktibhyo bhedena | "sati vā" sāmānye nityatvādanādheyātiśayatvena "kvacid" vyaktyantare"anāśritaṃ kathaṃ jñānahetuḥ" | naiva | āśrayavyaṃgyasya tasya "jñānahetu"tvamiṣṭamityabhiprāyaḥ | etadapyuktamityanena sambandhanīyaṃ | asyāpi prāguktatvāt |

[229,3]

yata evambhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ nāsti | tasmāt "saṃketopī"tyādi | "tadi"tyanyāpohaḥ sambadhyate | tasyāsyāpohasya vikalpena svākārābhedenādhyastasya "vit" jñānaṃ |
tatpūrvako lābhaśca | tadvit | saivārthaḥ phalamiti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | sa mayasyāsti saṃketasyeti matvarthīyaṣṭhan | vikalpādhyavasitabāhyārthapratipattyarthamiti samudāyārthaḥ | sarvaścārambhaḥ phalārtha iti vidirlābhārthopyākṣipta evānyathā saṃketakaraṇasya vaiyarthyāt |

[229,4]

nanu tadvidartho yasyeti bahubrīhiṇā bhavitavyaṃ lāghavāt | bahubrīhiṇoktatvānmatvarthasya tadvibhāgānutpattirlāghavatvaṃ | tathā ca bhāṣya uktaṃ "karmadhārayād bahuvrīhirbhavatītyādi" |

naiṣa doṣaḥ | idamapi tatroktaṃ"kvacitkarmadhāraya eva sarvasādhanādyartha" iti |
ākṛtigaṇatvācca sarvasādhanādestatrāyantadvidarthikaśabdo draṣṭavyaḥ || 112 ||

[230,1]

"yoyami"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | "anyonyaṃ viveko"nyavyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvo "bhāvānānta tpratīta"ye tanniścayārthaṃ svapratibhāse'dhyavasitabāhyarūpe "saṃketopi kriyamāṇaḥ śobheta"
yuktiyuktatvāt | kimarthaṃ kriyata ityata āha | "atatkārī"tyādi | vivakṣitārthakriyākāriṇo ye na bhavanti teṣāṃ "viveke"na parihāreṇa "pravṛttyarthatayā" | atatkāriṣupravṛttirmābhūdityarthaḥ |

[230,2]

amumevārthaṃ vyatirekamukhe"na" draḍhayannāha | "yadīt"yādi | tasyānyaparihārasya "pratītyartho" yadi "na saṃke"tastatkāriṇī tadanyaparihārasya vyavahārakālepyasaṃsparśāt | yadvā yadi na tatpratītyarthaḥ saṃketa iti vijātīyavyāvṛttasvabhāva pratītyarthaḥ saṃketaḥ | "tadā" tasyānyavyāvṛttasya svabhāvasya "vyavahārakālepi" na kevalaṃ saṃketakāle'"saṃsparśā"cchabdenāviṣayīkaraṇā"nnānyaparihāreṇa pravartteta" |

[230,3]

etaduktambhavati | yadā vidhirūpeṇānyavyāvṛtortho viṣayīkṛtastadānyavyavacchedaḥ pratīyeta | etadevāha | "na hī"tyādi | "viveka" iti viviktaḥ svabhāvaḥ | "teṣānta"tkāriṇā"ntebhya" ityatatkāryebhyaḥ | yadi hi tasya viviktasya svabhāvasya pratītaye saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ syādevaṃ vyavahārepi "śabdena codyeta" | tathā cānyaparihāreṇa pravartteteti saṃketopi tadvidarthika eva yuktaḥ |

[230,4]

nanu ca śabdajanitā buddhiḥ svākārameva bāhyatayādhyasya grahaṇādalīkā |
tataśca tajjanakasya śabdasya kathamvastusamvādaḥ kathaṃ cānyāpohaviṣayatvamityata āha |

[230,5]

"sā cetyā"di | anyāpohapratipattyarthaṃ yā saṃketikā | "sā ca śrutiḥ | dhiyaṃ janayant"yapīti sambandhaḥ | kimviśiṣṭām | "akāryakṛti" | avāhyarūpe svākāre | "tatkāri tulyarūpe"ṇārthakriyākāri bāhyaikarūpe"ṇāvabhā"sodhyavasāya iti tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ sa yasyā vidyata iti paścāt matvarthīyaḥ |

[231,1]

etaduktambhavati | svākāramabāhyaṃ bāhyamivādhyavasyantīmiti yāvat |

[231,2]

etena pravṛttyarthatvaṃ śruterākhyātaṃ |

[231,3]

vastubhūtasāmānyamantareṇa kutastasyā utpattiriti cedāha | "vastvityā"di | "vastūnāmpṛthagbhāva" itaretarabhedasta"nmātraṃ bīja"ṅkāraṇaṃ pāramparyeṇa yasyāḥ sā tathoktā | yataścānugataṃ rūpaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ caikīkṛtya gṛhṇātyatona"rthikāṃ" janayantyapi śrutirarthe na visamvādikā | kasmād | "atatkāriparihārāṅgabhāvataḥ" | vijātīyāvyavacchedahetubhāvataḥ |

[231,4]

etaduktambhavati | yadyanyavyāvṛttavastvadhyavasāyinīṃ buddhiṃ janayecchrutistadā tadanyavyāvṛtta eva svalakṣaṇe puruṣaṃ pravarttayatīti samvādikā syāt | saṃketakāle ca śruteritaretarabhinna eva svabhāva āśrayastatrāsyāḥ saṃketitatvāt | tadevampāramparyeṇa "vastubhedāśrayācca" kāraṇā"darthe | na visamvādikā matā" | vyavahārakālepyanyavyāvṛttasyaiva vastunaḥ prāpaṇāt |

[231,5]

nanu vidhirūpeṇa vastvadhyavasāyātkathaṃ śruteranyāpohaviṣayatvamityata āha | "tata" ityādi | yataścā"tatkāriparihārāṃgabhāva"taḥ śrutervastubhedāśrayatvaṃ ca "tataḥ"
kāraṇāda"nyāpohaviṣayā" | etadeva dvayamāha | "tatkartrāśritabhāvata" iti | tasminnapohe karttṛbhāvataḥ | āśritabhāvaśca svārthābhidhānadvāreṇārthādatatkāriparihārāṅgabhāvatastasminnapohe karttṛbhāvaḥ śruteḥ | vyavahārakāle saṃketakāle ca vastubhedāśrayadvāreṇa pravṛttestasminnapohe śruterāśritabhāvaḥ |

[231,6]

"eke"tyādinā kārikārthamāha | "tamityekamākāraṃ" svapratibhāsina"māropyārthe"ṣvadhyasyo"tpadyamānāṃ" | sa ca svapratibhāso"mithyāvabhāsitvādakāryakārī" | tamevaṃbhūta"mapi kāryakāriṇamivādhyavasyantī" | anenā"kāryakṛtī"tyādi vyākhyātaṃ | "vastupṛthagbhāvamātra"manyavyavacchedamātraṃ yasyā buddheriti vigrahaḥ | "mithyā"buddhiṃ "janayantyapi" śrutiḥ | kasmānmithyābuddhirityata āha | "samānādhyavasāyā"mekākārādhyavasāyāṃ | "tadanyaparihārāṅgabhāvāt" | vivakṣitādarthādanyasya parihārāṃgabhāvatayā vyavacchedāśrayabhāvataḥ | "paramārthato" vastutaḥ | "tadvyatirekiṣva"tatkāryavyatirekiṣu"na visamvādike"tyucyate | tathā hyanityakṛtakādiśrutayo yathābhūtasya nityādivyāvṛttasya vastuno vyāvṛttimupādāya saṃketitatvād vyavahārepi tathā bhūtasyānyaparihārāṅgabhāvena prāptihetavo bhavanti | tena yathārthadarśanānyāyātatvācchruterapi samvādaḥ |

[232,1]

yadvā yathābhūte vyavacchede sā śrutiḥ saṃketitā tasya paramārthatosti vastuṣu sadbhāva itīyatā leśenāvisamvāditvaṃ na tu dhūmādivacchabdānāmāvaśyako vastuni pratibandhasteṣāmicchāmātrapratibaddhatvāt |

[232,2]

avisamvāditvameva samarthayannāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | "teṣu" bhāveṣu "sa vyatireko"
vyavacchedo "bhūtaḥ" satyaḥ | kutaḥ | "sarvathā" sāmānyābhyupagamepyavaśyaṃ vyavacchedasyā"bhyupagamanīyatvā"danyathā vyavacchinnasvabhāvābhāve sāmānyasyaivābhāvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ | sāmānyoktāpi tatra bhūta iti cedāha | "naika" ityādi | "ekaḥ" sāmānyapadārtho vyaktervyatirikto vai śe ṣi kā dīnāmavyatiriktaḥ sāṃ khyā nāṃ na teṣu bhūta iti sambandhaḥ | kasmāt | "sarvathā vyatiriktasyāvyatiriktasya" ca pramāṇabādhitatvenā"yogāda"sambhavāt | bādhakampramāṇaṃ prāguktaṃ vakṣyate ca |

[232,3]

yadi punaryathā pratibhāsamapi sāmānyaṃ śabdena codyeta tadā tasya sāmānyasya vastunyavidyamānasya samāveśane śabdena viṣayīkaraṇe | "tasya" vā sāmānyasya pramāṇabādhitasya "vastuni" bāhye "niveśane"'bhyupagamyamāne"dūrotsṛṣṭamevā"tyantaviprakṛṣṭameva "vastu syāt" | kutaḥ | "śabdajñānābhyāṃ" śabdāt taduktācca jñānādityarthaḥ | yadvā śabdajñānābhyāṃ dūramutsṛṣṭaṃ tyaktaṃ syāt | kutaḥ | "tadviṣayābhimatasya" śabdādiviṣayābhimatasya | "tasye"ti sāmānyasya vastusvabhāvāt | "anyasya" sāmānyavyatiriktasya "vastudharma"sya vastusvabhāvasya svalakṣaṇasyā"saṃsparśā"dagrahaṇāt | yataśca svalakṣaṇanna gṛhṇātyatha ca svākārābhinnamadhyavasyati | "tata eva sā śrutiranyāpohaviṣayetyucyate" |

[233,1]

nanu vidhirūpeṇa bāhyasyaivādhyavasāyāt kathamanyāpohaviṣayetyucyata ityāha | "anye"tyādi | vijātīya"vyāvṛtteṣvartheṣu vyāvṛttibhe"damvijātīyavyacchinnasvabhāva"maviśeṣeṇopādāya" vijātīyavyāvṛttamātraṃ rūpamāśritya sajātīyavyaktiṣu śabdasya "niveśanāt" saṃketakaraṇādityarthaḥ | anenānyāpohāśritatvaṃ śruterākhyātaṃ | "anya"dityanyāpohaṃ prati karttṛbhāvaḥ śruteruktaḥ || 115 ||

[233,2]

"avṛkṣetyā"dinā parasya codyamāśaṃkate | anyāpohavādinaḥ kila na vidhirūpeṇa vṛkṣārthasya grahaṇaṃ nāpyavṛkṣārthasya | kintvanyonyavyavacchedena | tatra | avṛ"kṣavyatirekeṇa vṛkṣārthagrahaṇe" vṛkṣaśabdasya yorthastasya grahaṇe'bhyupagamyamāne | dvayaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣagrahaṇa"manyonyāśrayaṃ" | tathā hyavṛkṣārthavyavacchedena vṛkṣārthagrahaṇe satyavṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakaṃ vṛkṣagrahaṇamaṃgīkṛtaṃ | agṛhītasyāvṛkṣasya vyavacchetumaśakyatvāt | avṛkṣasyāpi grahaṇaṃ vṛkṣārthavyavacchedeneti tatrāpi vṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakamavṛkṣagrahaṇamāpatitaṃ |
vṛkṣamagṛhītvā tadvyavacchedenāvṛkṣārthasya vyasthāpayitumaśakyatvāt | evaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣayormadhye "eka"sya vṛkṣasyāvṛkṣasya vā "grahābhāve dvayāgrahaḥ" |

[233,3]

yataśca dvayorapyagraha"stasmāt" kāraṇādanyavyavacchinnerthe śabdasya yaḥ "saṃketa"
uktastasyā"sambhava iti kecidācakṣate" | tathā cāho dyo ta ka raḥ | "sa yāvaccāgānna pratipadyate tāvadagavi pratipattirna yuktā | yāvacca gānna pratipadyate tāvadgavītyubhayapratipattyabhāva" iti |

[233,4]

etamevārtha mbha ṭṭo pyāha |

[233,5]

"siddhaścāgaurapohyeta goniṣedhātmakaśca saḥ | tatra gaureva vaktavyonanyo yaḥ pratiṣidhyate | sa cedagonivṛttyātmā bhavedanyonyasaṃśrayaḥ | siddhaśced gaurapohyārthaṃ vṛthāpohapravarttanaṃ | gavyasiddhe tvagaurnāsti tadabhāvepi gauḥ kuta iti | "

[233,6]

tasmād vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyameṣṭavyaṃ | tatra vidhirūpeṇaiva saṃketa iti te manyante |

[234,1]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "tasye"tyavṛkṣabhedalakṣaṇasya vṛkṣasya | evantāvanna vṛkṣasya grahaṇaṃ nāpyavṛkṣasyetyāha | "avijñā"tetyādi | "avijñāto vṛkṣo" yasya puṃsastena"tadvyavacchedarūpasye"ti vṛkṣavyavacchedarūpasya "buddhāvanārūḍhertha" iti | yadi vṛkṣāvṛkṣau buddhāvārūḍhau syātāṃ tadā'vṛkṣaparihāreṇa vṛkṣe saṃketaḥ syāt | anārūḍhe ca vṛkṣe'vṛkṣe cārthe kathaṃ saṃketaḥ |

[234,2]

"teṣā"mityādinā parasyāpyayandoṣastulya ityāha | tataśca yastasya parihāro mamāpi sa eveti bhāvaḥ || 116 ||

[234,3]

"ya e"kamityādinā vyācaṣṭe | anyavyavacchedena saṃkete kriyamāṇe ye vādina"ekamvastu sāmānyamabhyugamyetaretarāśrayadoṣaṃ codayan"ti | "teṣāntatrāpi" vastubhūte sāmānye vṛkṣatvalakṣaṇe "saṃkete kriyamāṇe" dvayī kalpanā avṛkṣā "vyavacchinnā na veti" | 117 ||

[234,4]

yadi "vyavacchi"nnāstadā te "jñātā" aṅgīkarttavyā | ajñātānāṃ vyavacchedābhāvāt |
tacca jñānanteṣu na yujyate | tadāha | "kathami"tyādi | "kathaṃ" jñātā "vṛkṣārthagrahaṇād ṛte" | ityetāvān "kārikā"bhāgaḥ | "prāk"chabdastu miśrakavyākhyānenopāttaḥ | vṛkṣārthagrahaṇamvinā prāg vṛkṣārthagrahaṇādavṛkṣāḥ | "kathaṃ jñātā" ityarthaḥ | ye tu prākśabdaṃ kā ri kā yāṃ paṭhanti tairarthaśabdo na paṭhitavyaḥ | na hyavṛkṣaniścayakāle vṛkṣārthagrahaṇamastyavṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakatvāt vṛkṣagrahaṇasya | na ca vṛkṣaniścayamantareṇa vṛkṣārthagraho yuktastasyāpi vṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakatvāt | etadevāha | "na hī"tyādi | "tade"ti saṃketakāle "pratipattā" | yasmai saṃketaḥ kriyate | kasmā"nna vettī"tyāha | "tadi"tyādi |
tasya vṛkṣāvṛkṣasya "jñānāyaiva tadarthitayā" saṃketārthitayo"pagamādu"pasthitatvāt | kathaṃ nāma saṃketottarakālaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣau jñāsyāmīti | yadvā tadarthitayopagamāditi saṃketārthitayā pravṛteḥ | ato nāsti saṃketakāle vṛkṣāvṛkṣajñānaṃ pratipattuḥ | "sa ca" vṛkṣāvṛkṣamajānānaḥ "kathamavṛkṣavyavacchedaṃ pratipadyeta saṃke"te | naiva pratipadyeta | avṛkṣavyavacche"dāpratipattau" ca satyā"maparihṛto" na vyavacchinnastadanyastasmād vṛkṣādanyo yasmin vṛkṣārthe so "parihṛ"tatadanyasta"sminniveśa"ssaṃketaḥ | saptamīti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ | sa yasmin śabdestīti matvarthīya iti | aparihṛtatadanyannirdeṣṭuṃ śīlamasyeti ṇinirvā | avṛkṣādavyavacchinnerthe saṃpramugdharūpe saṃketitāditi yāvat |

[235,1]

aparaḥ prakāraḥ | vṛkṣādanyastadanyastasminniveśaḥ saṃketaḥ | aparihṛtaścāsau tadanyaniveśaśceti karmadhārayaḥ | sa yasyāsti vṛkṣaśabdasyeti pūrvavat | avṛkṣādavyavacchinnatvād vṛkṣārthasya | tatra saṃketyamānasya śabdasyāvṛkṣepi niveśaḥ prasaktaḥ |
vṛkṣabhedeṣviveti samudāyārthaḥ || 118 ||

[235,2]

tasmādevaṃbhūtād vṛkṣaśabdād "vyavahāriṇāṃ" puṃsāṃ vyavahārakāle "tatparihāre"ṇāvṛkṣaparihāreṇa niyate śākhādimati "pravṛttirna syāt" | kintvaviśeṣeṇa vṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥ pravṛttirbhavet | kimvat | "vṛkṣabhedavat" | na hi vṛkṣaśabdāt prakaraṇādirahitād vṛkṣaviśeṣe khadirādau tadanyavṛkṣaparihāreṇa pravṛttirbhavati | "saṃketakā"le teṣā"mavyavacche"dāt |

[235,3]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "saṃketa"kālaḥ saṃketaśabdenoktaḥ"parārthavyavacchedeneti"
parasmādavṛkṣād vṛkṣād vṛkṣārthasyāvyavacchedena | dvitīye tu vyākhyāne |
parasminnavṛkṣe vṛkṣaśabdasya saṃketāvyavacchedeneti vyākhyeyaṃ | "niveśitā"diti saṃketitāt | "tatparihāreṇā"vṛkṣaparihāreṇa "vṛkṣava"dityasya vyākhyānaṃ "śiṃśapādibhedavadi"ti | śiṃśapādaya eva bhedā iti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ vatiḥ saptamyarthe | sūtre tu vṛkṣabhedā iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ | śiṃśapādayo hi bhedā vṛkṣasya bhedā bhavantītyanurūpaiva vṛttiḥ teṣu ca yathā vṛkṣaśabdānna parasparavyavacchedena pravṛttistathā sūtravibhāga eva vyākhyātaṃ |

[235,4]

"athe"tyādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | "avidhāyāniṣidhyānyadi"ti pratiṣedhadvayaṃkecit paṭhanti | saṃkete viṣayamabhidhāyātonyaccāniṣidhyeti | taccāyuktamiva dṛśyate vidhipratiṣedhau muktvā śabdapravṛttyasambhavāt | ekasya hi pradarśanamabhidadhatā vidheraṅgīkṛtaḥ | tataścāvidhāya pradarśyetipadadvayaṃ vyāhataṃ syāt | tasmādavidhāyetyatraiva nañ draṣṭavyaḥ | "avidhāya niṣidhyānyaditi" pāṭhaḥ | niṣidhyānyat pūrvantadvyavacchedenāparaṃ saṃketaviṣayamavidhāya | pratiṣedhapūrvakaṃ vidhimakṛtvā vidhimātrameva kevalaṃ kṛtvetyarthaḥ ata | eva "pradarśyaika"miti vṛttāvapi na kasyacid vyavacchedena kiṃcid vidhīyata ityanyaniṣedhapūrvakameva vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhati | kevalastu vidhiragīkṛta eva | "eka"miti sāmānyaṃ | etena sāmānye saṃketakaraṇāt sarvavyaktiṣu kṛta ityācaṣṭe | 119 ||

[236,1]

"vṛkṣoyami"ti "saṃketa"svarūpandarśayati | yadvastu pradarśya saṃketaḥ "kṛtastat pratipadyate vyavahārepi | tena" kāraṇenāyamanantarokto "vastusāmānyavādino'doṣaḥ | tathā dṛṣṭamevārtha"miti sāmānyaṃ yatra "saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatsambandhinaṃ" veti sāmānyasambandhinamāśrayaṃ | "tatrāpī"ti vidhinā kevalenāpi saṃkete kriyamāṇe dvau vikalpau vṛkṣoyamiti saṃketaṃ kurvāṇaḥ "tarurayama"pīti vidadhīta | tarurayameveti vā | ādye pakṣe tarutvamanyasyāpyaniṣiddhamiti vyavahāre niyamena pravṛttirna syāditi sa eva prasaṅgaḥ | atha tarurayameveti tadā sa evātaruravyavacchedoṅgīkṛtaḥ | tataśca saṃketakāle pratipadyamānena kathaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣau jñātāviti tadavasthaḥ prasaṅgaḥ | tadāha | "prasaṃgo na nivarttata iti" |

[236,2]

"eka"mityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "ayamapi vṛkṣo'yameva vṛkṣa iti | gatimiti"
prakāraṃ | "tayośce"ti dvayorapi prakārayoḥ | "na doṣa" ityādi paraḥ | "dṛṣṭopaṭākāro"nubhūta"stadviparīta"sya tato vilakṣaṇasya "sujñānatvāt" |

[237,1]

etadeva grahaṇakavākya"mekaṃ hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | ekaṃ hi "kiṃci"t sāmānyaṃ vṛkṣatvādika"mpaśyatonyatra" tatsāmānyarahite vilakṣaṇe vastuni"tadākāravivekinīṃ"
yathā paridṛṣṭākāravilakṣaṇākārā"mbuddhimanubhavataḥ" puṃso "yathānubhavantato" yathā paridṛṣṭā"danya"dityevaṃrūpo "vaidharmyaniścayo" vailakṣaṇyaniścayaḥ |

[237,2]

etena vaidharmyaniścayasya svabhāva uktaḥ || 120 ||

[237,3]

"tadvivecana" iti vyāpāraḥ pūrvadṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthavivecanaḥ pṛthagbhāvasya vyavasthāpayati | "tato"nyadityanenaiva tadvivecane siddhe yatpunastadvivecanagrahaṇantatspaṣṭārthaṃ |
tatraitasmin krame sati yathānubhavamvaidharmyaniścayavān "sa" pratipattā | "yaṃ" śākhādimantamarthamviśiṣṭasāmānyavantamākārāntarād "viveca"yati | taṃ purodhāyā"yameva vṛkṣa iti" pradarśya "vyutpādi"taḥ saṃketaṃ grāhito | "yatraiva taṃ" saṃketānurūpaṃ sāmānyātmānanna"paśyati | tamevāvṛkṣaṃ svayameva" śabdavyāpāramvinā "pratipa"dyate | tadevamākārāntarāt svayameva vivekenāvadhāritaṃ sāmānyātmānamupādāya saṃkete kṛte sarvāsu sajātīyavyaktiṣu kṛto bhavati | sāmānyasya sarvatrānvayāt | "ayame"veti cāvadhāraṇāt saṃkete kṛte dṛṣṭaviparītasya sujñānatvāt | tatonyatrāvṛkṣa iti niścayo bhavatīti na yathoktadoṣaḥ |

[237,4]

anyāpohavādinopyevamiti cedāha | "neda"mityādi | "ekatra" saṃketakāle "dṛṣṭa"syāsādhāraṇasya "rūpasya kvacid" vyaktyantare'"nanvayādana"nugamāt | tataśca saṃketakāle yo vṛkṣa ityeva gṛhīto bhedastasyānyatra darśanannāsti | tatra saṃketakāle dṛṣṭe paścād "dṛśyamāne" ca svalakṣaṇe yad bhinnapratibhāsi darśanamutpannantena hetunā | vṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥ "pratipattau" kriyamāṇāyāṃ vyaktyantarepya"nyasmin" vṛkṣabhede"pi na syāttathā" vṛkṣa iti "pratītiḥ" | tathā hi yo vṛkṣabhedaḥ saṃketakāle dṛṣṭastasmād ghaṭādayo vilakṣaṇāstathānyopi vṛkṣabhedaḥ | tatra yathā ghaṭādiṣu vṛkṣa iti pratipattirna bhavati tathā vṛkṣabhedepi na syāt kintvavṛkṣa ityeva pratipattirbhavedityarthaḥ |

[237,5]

"evantarhī"tyā cā ryaḥ ta"trāpī"ti vikalpākāropi sāmānye saṃkete kriyamāṇetu"lyame"taditītaretarāśrayapratividhānaṃ |

[238,1]

etaduktambhavati | sarvabhāvāḥ svahetuto bhinnā iti pūrvameva pratipāditaṃ | tena vṛkṣā avṛkṣāśca bhinnā eva nirvikalpake jñāne pratibhāsante | vṛkṣeṣu ca vidhirūpeṇaiva vṛkṣavikalpa ucyate | tathā'vṛkṣeṣu vṛkṣaniṣedhenāvṛkṣavikalpa utpadyata iti kuta itaretarāśrayatvaṃ |

[238,2]

nanu yadyapi vidhirūpeṇa vṛkṣavikalpasya pratipattistathāpyavṛkṣādivyāvṛttidvāreṇotpadyamānatvādavṛkṣādipratipattyapekṣatvantataśca sa evetaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ |

[238,3]

naitadasti | yato'vṛkṣādivyāvṛttirvṛkṣādisvarūpameva tadanubhavadvāreṇaiva vṛkṣādivikalpa utpadyate na tvavṛkṣādipratipattyapekṣa iti kuta itaretarāśrayatvaṃ | tatra vṛkṣavikalpe pratyekaṃ śiṃśapādyabhedena vṛkṣākāro'bhinnaḥ pratibhāsate | sa ca saṃketāt pūrvaṃ svasamvedanapratyakṣasiddhaḥ jñānarūpatvādatastatraiva śabdaḥ saṃketyate |

[238,4]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭe na ||

[238,5]

"saṃketāt pūrvamindriyairanyāpoho na gamyate | nānyatra śabdasaṃketaḥ kindṛṣṭvā sa prayujyatāṃ || anvayena vimuktatvānnānumāpyatra vidyate | sambandhānubhavopyasya tena naivopadyata iti"

[238,6]

nirastaṃ |

[238,7]

kasmāditaretarāśrayapratividhānantulyamityāha | "yasmā"dityādi | sajātīyavyaktiṣvekākārampratyabhijñāna"mekapratyavamarśa"stathā'"khyā" saṃjñā yasya "jñā"nasya tattathā |
anena bhinnāsvapi vyaktiṣvekākāraṃ pratyabhijñānamekatvamāropayatītyuktaṃ | tataśca vikalpavijñānāropitaikatvāsu vyaktiṣu yatra kvacit saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ sarvatra kṛto bhavatītyasya bījamākhyātaṃ | "ekatra hī"tyanena vijātīyapadārthaparāmarśaśūnyākārantena parāmarśasya pratiniyatākāratvamāha | vijātīyapadārthākāravyāvṛttyā sajātīyeṣu sarveṣu yadekapratyavamarśajñāna"ntatra sthita" ityarthaḥ | etenāpi sajātīyā'sajātīyāvastuvibhāgabījamuktaṃ | ata evāha | tadityanenaikaḥ parāmarśo gṛhyate'tacchabdena tadviparītaḥ | sa cāsaśca tadatau | tayorhetavas"tadataddhetavaḥ" | tān "vibhaja"te | ekaśākhādimadākāraparāmarśahetūn tadviparītāṃśca pṛthak karoti "svayame"va saṃketāt | "prāgapi" niveditametad | "ekapratyavamarśārthajñānādyekārthasādhanaṃ"1 | 75
ityatrāntare | vyatiriktasyāvyatiriktasya ca sāmānyasya niṣedhānniṣetsyamānatvācca | "bhāvāḥ prakṛtibhedinaḥ" svabhāvenaiva vilakṣaṇāḥ | "jñānādika"mityādiśabdād udakādyāharaṇādikaṃ "kecide"va "kurvanti nānye" || 121 ||

[239,1]

prakṛtyā tadatajjananasvabhāvatvātteṣāṃ | "tān"bhāvā"nayaṃ" pratipattā "svayameva" śabdavyāpāraṃ vinā "vibhajya" vibhāgaṃ kṛtvā "taddhetūnataddhetūṃśca pratyeti" | tena kuta itaretarāśrayatvadoṣaḥ | yo hi taddhetūnataddhetūṃśca bhāvātsvayameva pratipadyate | tasya pratipattustadbuddhiparivartina ityādi karmapadaṃ pratipadyetetyetat kriyāpadāpekṣaṃ | ataddhetubhyastaddhetūn vibhajya sthāpayati yā "buddhiḥ" sā | "tadbuddhistatpariva"rttinastadārūḍhān | vikalpikāyā "dhiyo hetuta"yā "bhāto" bhāsamānāt |

[239,2]

iva śabdasya vakṣyamāṇasya sambandhāddhetutayeveti draṣṭavyaṃ na tu te vikalpapratibhāsino hetavaṃsteṣāṃ bahirasatvāt | kevalampratipattustathādhyavasāyādevamucyate | "aheturūpavikalān bhā"ta ityatrābhisambandhaḥ | "iva" śabdayogaśca pūrvavat | ekākāraparāmarśabuddherye na hetavasteṣāṃ rūpeṇa vikalāniva | dṛśyavikalpayorekīkaraṇād bāhyena sa"haikarūpāni"va bhāta ityatrābhisambandhaḥ | "sva"yaṃ saṃketāduttarakālamapi |
atatkāribhyo "bhedena" tān bhāvān "pratipadyeteti" kṛtvā | "uktiḥ" śabdo "bhede" vijātīyavyāvṛtte svabhāve vikalpena svākārābhedenādhyaste "niyujya"te saṃketyate | "tam"bhedaṃ yathoktaṃ | "tasyāḥ" śruteḥ sakāśād vyavahāre "pratiyatī" pratipadyamānā pari"dhī"rbhrāntyā"ekamvastvivekṣate" | sajātīyavyaktiṣu tamvijātīyavyāvṛttaṃ svabhāvaṃ svākārābhedena pratiyatī dhīrekamiva vastu prekṣata ityarthaḥ |

[239,3]

tataḥ sarveṣvekaparāmarśahetuṣu vṛkṣa iti pratipattirato yaduktaṃ darśanena pratipattau vyaktyantarepi na syāditi tadapāstaṃ |

[239,4]

yaccāpyuktambha ṭṭe na ||

[240,1]

"gośabdānabhidheyatvamaśvādīnāṃ hi te kathaṃ | na dṛṣṭastatra gośabdaḥ saṃketasamaye yadi | ekasmāttarhi te piṇḍādyadanyat sarvamava tat | bhavedapohyamityevaṃ nahi sāmānyavācyateti | "

[240,2]

tadapi nirastaṃ | ekavyaktau gośabdasya saṃkete viṣayasya vyaktyaṃtarenugamāt sa evāyaṃ gauriti pratīteriti | tathāpi |

[240,3]

"teṣā"mityādinā kā ri kārthamāha | "teṣāṃ" vijātīyavastuvivekināmarthānāṃ"prakṛtyā" tathābhūtavikalpakāraṇānāmanvayāditi sambandhaḥ | "prakṛtyā" svabhāvena na punarekasāmānyayogāt | sarve tarhi parāmarśaṃ kasmānna janayantītyāha | "pratyayavaśā"diti | anubhavajñānaṃ pratyayastaddvāreṇa teṣāṃ vikalpajananāt | "tathābhū"tasyaikapratyavamarśātmakasya "vikalpasya kāraṇānāmanvayāt" sadbhāvād | yathaiko vṛkṣabhedaḥ prakṛtyā tathābhūtavikalpahetubhūtastathā dvitīyādirapītyanenākāreṇānvayo na punarekamvastu sāmānyātmakamasti | tasmādanvayāddhetorekakāryavattvenaikādhyavasāyayogyāniti vākyaśeṣaḥ |

[240,4]

"taddraṣṭu"riti vyaktiṣvekakāryakaraṇasya draṣṭu"rbuddhau viparivarttamā"nānārūḍhān |
tasmād draṣṭuriti bhavitavyaṃ | "kartari ce" ti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedhāditi cenna |
śeṣaṣaṣṭhyā vivakṣitatvāt | draṣṭṛśabdasya cātṛnpratyayāntatvāt | tatra tṛnniti ṣaṣṭhī pratiṣedhāt | tacchabdasya dvitīyāntasya "sādhanaṃ kṛte"ti samāsaḥ | anye tu "tatprayojaka"
ityādinirdeśāt pratiṣedhasūtrasyānityatvaṃ jñāpayanti | evamanyeṣvapi nirdeśeṣvevaṃjātīyeṣvevaṃrūpāḥ parihārā vaktavyāḥ | "tajjñānahetutayā" tasya vikalpajñānasya hetutayā | "tadanyavyāvṛttyā ce"tyekākārapratyabhijñānahetubhyo ye'nye tathābhūtavikalpā'hetavaḥ | tebhyo vyāvṛttyā ca | a"tathābhūtāna"pi na hi te vikalpārūḍhāstaddhetavo bahiravidyamānatvāt | ata evāheturūpavikalpatvamapyasatteṣāmavastusattvāt |
ta"thādhyavasitān" | tajjñānahetutayā tadanyavyāvṛttyā cāropitān | anena "bhātohetutayā dhiyaḥ" | aheturūpavikalāniveti vyākhyātaṃ |

[241,1]

"avibhaktabāhyādhyātmikabhedā"nityanenaikarūpānityetad vyācaṣṭe | avibhakto bāhyādhyātmikabhedo yeṣviti vigrahaḥ | dṛśyavikalpayorekīkaraṇena gṛhītānityarthaḥ |
yasmai saṃketaḥ kriyate sa "pratipattā | pratipattimanusṛt"ya | saṃketakāle yādṛśī tasya pratipattiḥ | aheturūpavikalā ekakāryā bhāvā ekarūpā yeṣvayaṃ vṛkṣaśabdaḥ saṃketitasta evāmī | tasmād vṛkṣā ityevamākārā | tāmanusṛtya | tāṃ smṛtvā | vikalpavijñāne sthitassan | tān yathoktān bhāvān "tadvijñānahetūna"tadviparītebhyo bhedena | "ete vṛkṣā iti" vyavahārakālepi vṛkṣaśabdaśravaṇāt kathannāma pra"tipadyetetyanenābhiprāyeṇā"kta"mataddhetubhyo bheda"vyavacchinne svabhāve "vika"lpena viṣayīkṛte ni"yuṅkte"
saṃketasya karttā || 123 ||

[241,2]

nanu vyāvṛttasya svalakṣaṇasya vyavahārakālenugamo nāsti | nāpi vikalpapratibhāsinaḥ sāmānyākārasya svajñānābhinnatvād vikalpāntarenvayosti | nāpi vaktṛsambandhinastasya śrotuḥ śrotṛsambandhino vā vaktuḥ pratītiranyacetodharmatvenātīndriyatvāt | na cāpratipanne samaṃ pratipādyapratipādakābhyāṃ saṃketaḥ sambhavatītyāha | "svapare"tyādi | svasya pratipādakasya parasya ca pratipādyasya "vikalpe"ṣvekakāryakaraṇalakṣaṇena bhrāntinimitte"naikapratibhāsān" bhāvān saṃketaviṣayān"ādarśya" |

[241,3]

etaduktambhavati | yathaikastaimiriko dvicandrandṛṣṭvānyataimirikāyopadiśan svadṛṣṭamevopadiśati na paradṛṣṭamapratyakṣatvāt | atha ca tasyaivambhavatyayameva mayā parasmai pratipādita iti | paropi ca svasantānabhāvinameva dvicandrākārampratiyan ya eva pratipādakena mama pratipāditassa eva mayā pratipanna iti manyate | tadvat pratipādyapratipādakayorbuddhyākārasyādhyavasitabāhyarūpasya bhedepyekatvādhyavasāyāt saṃketakaraṇaṃ vyavahārakāle ca tasyaiva pratītirekatvādhyavasāt | tamityanyavyavacchinnaṃ svabhāva svākāreṇābhinnama"dhyasya pratipadyamānā buddhiḥ | tasyā" iti śruteḥ | "ekavastugrāhiṇīva pratibhāti" |

[241,4]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭe na ||

[241,5]

"na cānvayavinirmuktā pravṛttiḥ śabdaliṅgayoḥ | tābhyāṃ na vināpohe dhīrna cāsādhāraṇenvayaḥ | apohaścāpyaprasiddho'vyabhicāraḥ kva kathyatāṃ | tasminnavidyamāne ca na tayoḥ syātpramāṇateti | "

[242,1]

apāstaṃ | yata ekasminnanyavyāvṛtte svalakṣaṇe śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ sambandhampratipadyamānopyanyatrāpyevaṃrūpeṣu sambandhaṃ pratipadyata evaikatvādhyavasāyāditi kutonvayarahitatvādidoṣa iti | vastubhūtantu sāmānyamāśritya vṛkṣāvṛkṣavibhāgo na ghaṭate |
tadāha | "na puna"rityādi | "ekamvastu" sāmānyaṃ dṛśyamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptantatra svalakṣaṇeṣ"vasti" | yathā vṛkṣabhedebhyo ghaṭādayo bhinnāstathā ghavādayopi |
parasparanteṣām"bhinnānāndarśanepi yasya" sāmānyasya "darśanādarśanābhyāṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣavibhāgaṃ kurvī"ta yatredaṃ sāmānyaṃ dṛśyate sa vṛkṣo yatra na dṛśyate so'vṛkṣa iti |

[242,2]

kasmānnāstītyāha | "tasye"tyādi | sāmānyasya v"yatiriktasya śākhādipratibhāsā"d vibhāgenāgrahaṇāt | na hi vṛkṣādiṣu dvau pratibhāsāvupalabhyete | ekaḥ śākhādyākāro'paraścāśākhādyākāraḥ | na ca śākhādyākāra eva sāmānyaṃ pratibhāsata iti śakyamvaktuntasya śākhādyākāratvāt | "daṇḍavaddaṇḍinīti" vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ | yathā"daṇḍini daṇḍasya" bhedena grahaṇaṃ | naivaṃ sāmānyasya | "aparasmā"cchākhādimataḥ "pravibhā" ca sāmānyasya vyaktiṣ"vanupalakṣaṇāt" | svarūpeṇa parasyopalambhanamupalakṣaṇantacca svayamagṛhītasya kathambhavet | anarthāntarasāmānyavādina"stvākṛterekatra" vyaktau "dṛṣṭāyāḥ" svalakṣaṇādavyatirekāttadvadevā"nyatra" vyaktyantare "draṣṭumaśakyatvāt" | tataśca ta"datadvato"riti saṃketakālaparidṛṣṭaikavṛkṣākṛtiryasyāsti sa tadvān |
paścād vyavahārakāle dṛśyamāno vṛkṣabhedaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭavṛkṣākṛtirahito'tadvān | tayoryathākramaṃ "vṛkṣāvṛkṣatve" nyāyaprāptatve sati "vyaktirekai"veti saṃketakāle dṛṣṭaiva "vṛkṣaḥ syā"nna tu vyavahārakāle dṛśyamānā | saṃketakāle dṛṣṭāyā ākṛteranyatrādarśanāt |

[242,3]

anyāpohe śabdārthaparairavyāpitvaṃ coditaṃ tatparijihīrṣavān pūrvapakṣadigmātrantāvat karoti | "bhavatu nā"metyādi | kasmāttatrārthāntaravyavacchedo nāstītyāha | "na hyajñeyami"tyādi | "yata" ityajñeyāt | ajñeyaṃ kasmānnāstīti cedāha | "tata"
ityādi | ajñeyād vijñeyasya "bhedena viṣayīkaraṇama"ṅgīkarttavyamanyavyavacchedavādinā'nyathā kathamajñeyāt jñeyasya vyavacchedaḥ | "tata"ścājñeyāt "jñeyasya" bhedena viṣayīkaraṇe satyeva tasyājñeyābhimatasya jñeyatvāt | na hyaviṣayīkṛtād vyavacchedaḥ śakyo darśayituṃ |
ādiśabdāt sarvasamudāyadvyādiśabdānāṃ grahaṇaṃ |

[243,1]

taduktambha ṭṭo dyo ta ka rā bhyāṃ | anyāpohaśca śabdārtha ityayuktamavyāpakatvāt |
yatra dvairāśyambhavati tatretarapratiṣedhāditaraḥ pratīyate yathā gauriti pade'goḥ pratiṣedhena gauḥ pratīyate |

[243,2]

na punaḥ sarvapada etadasti | na hyasarvannāma kiṃcidasti yatsarvaśabdena vinivarttyeta |
atha manyase ekādyasarvaṃ tat sarvaśabdena nivarttyate | tatra svārthāpavādadoṣaprasaṅgāt | evaṃ hi satyekādivyudāsena pravarttamānaḥ śabdaḥ | aṅgapratiṣedhādaṅgavyatiriktasya cāṅginonabhyupagamādanarthakaḥ syāt | evaṃ sarvasamudāyaśabdā ekadeśapratiṣedharūpeṇa pravarttamānāḥ samudāyivyatiriktasamudāyānabhyupagamādanarthakāḥ prāpnuvanti | dvyādiśabdānāṃ ca samuccayaviṣayatvādekādipratiṣedhe pratiṣidhyamānānāmasamuccayatvāt | dvyādiśabdānāmanarthakatvamiti |

[243,3]

"naiṣa doṣa" ityācāryaḥ | yasmādākāṃkṣāvatīṃ "buddhiṃ kutaścinnivarttya" tasyā "buddheḥ kvaci"dviniyate'rthe "niveśanāyā"kāṅkṣāvataḥ puṃsaḥ kaści"cchabdaḥ prayujya"te pratipādayitrā | "kvacinniveśanā"yetyanenānvaya uktaḥ | kutaścidvinivarttyetyanena vyatirekaḥ |

[243,4]

kiṅkāraṇaṃ kutaścinnivarttya kvacinniveśyate śabda ityata āha | "tadartha"syetyādi |
śabdārthasyā"vadhāraṇāt | anyathā" yadi tena śabdena na kaścidartho vyavacchidyeta "vyarthaḥ"
śabda"prayogaḥ syāt" | yata eva"ntasmājjjñeyādipade"ṣvityādiśabdāt sarvaviśvādipa deṣu | kimviśiṣṭeṣu | "vyavahāropanīte"ṣu | vidhipratiṣedhalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyavahārastadarthamupanīteṣu | laukikaprayogastheṣviti yāvat | teṣu vyavahārāṅgeṣu yathākathaṃcid "vyavacchedyosti kaś"cit |

[244,1]

etaduktambhavati | yatparaśca śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vidhāyakasyāpi vākyasya vyavacchedaparatvād vyavacchedopi śabdārtha ucyate iti na kācit kṣatiḥ |

[244,2]

"śabdaṃ hītyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "sarvaḥ" pumān laukikaḥ parīkṣako vā kasmānnātivarttata ityāha | "tasye"tyādi | "tasya" śabdasya "pravṛttinivṛttiphalatvāditi" kutaścinnivarttya kvacit pravṛttyarthatvādityarthaḥ | itarathā śabdaprayogo viphalaḥ syāt | tadāha | "yadī"tyādi | "aya"mvaktā "kasyacit" pratipādyasya "kutaś"cidanabhimatā"nna nivarttayed buddhimanivarttyā"bhimate ca kvacinna pravarttayet tadā "yathābhūtānujñānā"diti śabdaprayogāt pūrvaṃ pratipatturyathā saṃpramugdharūporthastathābhūtasya śabdenānanujñānāt | yathākathaṃcid yādṛśasya tādṛśasyānujñānādityarthaḥ | "sarvavyavahāreṣu na kiṃci"dvacanaṃ v"yavaharedu"ccārayet | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | śabda"vyavahārasyāvadhāraṇanāntarīyakatvā"t |

[244,3]

etadeva sādhayannāha | "yathe"tyādi | "atra hyudakamānaye" tyukte śrotuḥ karaṇaviśeṣe'"vaśyamākāṃkṣā" bhavati tatra ca niyamārthaṃ "ghaṭene"tyucyate | soyaṃ ghaṭo neti śabdaḥ svārthābhidhānapurassarameva karaṇāntaravyavacchedākṣepāt phalavān bhavatyanyathā satyapi ghaṭaśabdaprayoge yadi "nāñjalinā" ta"thānyenā"pi karaṇenodakānayanaṃ "yathākathaṃcidi"ti | alpapramāṇaṃ bahupramāṇaṃ vā jalānayana"mabhipre"tamityarthaḥ | udakaśabdopi karmāntaravyavacchedena yadi viśiṣṭe karmaṇi na pravarttakastadā tasyāpi prayogonarthaka ityāha | "tathe"tyādi | "ānaye"tyeva "kevalamvacanaṃ syāt" | kiṃbhūtama"nākṣiptakaraṇakarmakaṃ" |
anākṣiptaviśeṣaṇānāśritaṃ karaṇaṃ ghaṭākhyaṃ karma codanākhyaṃ yasminnānayetyetāvati vacane tattathoktaṃ | tathānayetyasmin vyāpārebhimukhībhūtaḥ pumān | ānayetyanena yadyānayanādanyasmād vyāpārānna vyavacchidyeta tadā'nayetyapi na vācyaṃ syāt |

[245,1]

etadevāha | "evamānayana"mityādi | "anyadvā kiñcidanuṣṭhānami"ti | ānayanādanyat | kim | bhojanādyanuṣṭhānaṃ | "ananuṣṭhānaṃ" ceti vyāpārākaraṇamanānayanaṃ ca"yadyabhimataṃ syātadā" kriyāpa"damānayetyapi na brūyāt" | nayanamanyadveti kvacit pustake pāṭhaḥ "satva"yuktaḥ | ānayanaśabdasya prakrāntatvāt | tasmād vyavahāropanītānāṃ ghaṭādiśabdānāmasti "vyavacchedyo" yathā teṣā"ntathā vyavahāropanītānāṃ jñeyādiśabdānāṃ" kenacid vyavacchedyenājñeyādinā |

[245,2]

"ananyāśaṅkāyāmi"tyajñeyatvāderāśaṅkā'nyāśaṅkā | tadabhāvonanyā śaṃkā |
asatyāmajñeyatvādyāśaṅkāyāmityarthaḥ | tathā hyanityādirūpeṇājñeyaḥ śabda ityāśaṃkāyāmidaṃ prayujyate'nityādinākāreṇa jñeya iti | tatrānityādyākāreṇa yadajñeyatvamāśaṃkitaṃ tadeva vyavacchidyate | evaṃ jñeyāssarvapadārthāssarvajñajñānasyetyatrāpi sa rva jña jñānāpekṣayā yadajñeyatvamāśaṃkitantadeva vyavacchedyaṃ | tathā kaścidāha | nirupākhyānāmabhāvāttatra jñānasya vṛttirnāsti tasmādajñeyāsta iti | atrāpyajñeyatvamāropitantadeva vyavacchedyaṃ | sarvābhāvo na bhavatītyevamabhāvasyāpi viṣayīkaraṇāt |
evamanyatrāpi jñeyaśabdaprayoge vācyaṃ | tathā prameyaśabde | tathā "kṣaṇikāssarve saṃskārā"
ityatrāpi sarvasya dīpādereva kṣaṇikatvaṃ kaiścit kalpitanna sarvasya | tadvyavacchedena sarvasaṃskārāṇāmanityatvaṃ | evaṃ kaścidāgataḥ kimvā sarva evetyāśaṅkāyāṃ sarvo grāma āgataḥ | iti kasyacideva yadāgamanamāśaṃkitantadeva vyavacchedyaṃ | tathā samudāyālambanāḥ pañca vijñānakāyā iti caikadeśālambanā ityekadeśālambanatvaṃ niṣidhyate |
evamanyeṣvapi dvyādiśabdeṣu vyavahāropanīteṣu prakaraṇavaśād yathāyogaṃ vyavacchedo vaktavyaḥ |

[245,3]

ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ | na vastubhūtaṃ pratiyoginambhinnabuddhigrāhyaṃ rāśidvaye'vasthāpyā'nyāpohaḥ śabdena codyata ityucyate | kintu yaḥ śrotrā tathābhūtepyatathābhūta ākāra āropyate sopi vyavacchedya eva śabdeneti |

[245,4]

etadeva sphuṭayannāha | "tatra hītyā"di | "yadeva mūḍhama"teḥ pratipādyasyā"śaṃkāsthā"namāśaṃkāviṣayaḥ | "tade"va jñeyādiśabdānāṃ "nivarttyaṃ" | śrotrā naiva kaścidāśaṅkita iti cedāha | "anāśaṅkamāno ve"tyādi | yadyasau na kiñciṃdāśaṅkate | yathābhūtaniścayavān tadā parasmād vaktuḥ "kimupadeśamapekṣa"te | naivetyabhiprāyaḥ | ākāṃkṣāpanayanaṃ "śrotṛsaṃskā"rastad yatra vacane "nā"sti tadā śrotṛsaṃskāraṃ tathā"bhūtaṃ ca vacanaṃ kurvāṇo vaktā kathaṃ nonmataḥ syā"t | "tas"mād vaktā śroturākāṃkṣāvataḥ saṃskāramevādhitsamānaḥ śabdaṃ prayuṃkte | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tatsaṃskārāyai"va śrotṛsaṃskārāyaiva"śabdānāṃ kṛtasaṃketa"tvāt |

[246,1]

bhavatu nāma vākyasthānāṃ vyavahārārthamupanītānāṃ jñeyādiśabdānāṃ yathoktaṃ vyavacchedyaṃ | ye tvavyavahāropanītāḥ kevalā eva jñeyādiśabdāsteṣu kathaṃ | na hi tatra pratipatturāśaṅkāsthānamastītyata āha | "avyavahāropanītāśce"tyādi | vā kyeṣvanantarbhūto vācakaḥ śabdo nāstītyarthaḥ | yato vaktā phalārthī prathamantāvadimamarthamviśiṣṭakriyāsambaddhamanena śabdenāsmai pratipādayāmītyabhiprāyeṇa "devadatta gāmānaye" tyevaṃ prayuṃkte | tena kriyānvitānāmeva padārthānāmabhidhānaṃ | na tva bhihitānāmpadārthānāmpaścādanvayaḥ | gāmityādau karmādivibhakteranutpādaprasaṃgāt | tasmād vākyasthānāmeva prayogaḥ | tadevāha | "vākyagatasyetyā"di | tasyai"vārtha"pratipādakatvāditi bhāvaḥ |

[246,2]

ye tu vai yā ka ra ṇaiḥ sarvaviśvetyādigaṇeṣu paṭhyante | prakṛtipratyayavibhāgena vā saṃskriyante | tathā ni ru kta kāraiḥ | tepi rekhāgavayasthānīyā vākyasthānāmeva pratipattyupāyā draṣṭavyā na tu teṣāṃ laukikaḥ kaścidarthosti | tasmāt vākyasthānāmeva padānāmarthavattā | tatraiva cāvasthitānāmarthacintā kriyate | tadāha | "kva punari"tyādi | "eta" iti ye vākyasthāḥ "prayogaviṣayacintāyāṃ" pravarttamānāyā"manyāpo"haḥ śabdārtha"ucyate" | anyo'pohyate'neneti kṛtvā | ye tvaprayogasthā jñeyādiśabdāsteṣāmarthāsambhavāccintaiva nāstītyāha | "anirdiṣṭaprayo"gamityādi | nirdiṣṭa upāttastathā cāsau prayogaśceti karmadhārayaḥ | paścānnañā sahābhāvārthe'vyayaṃ vibhaktītyādinā'vyayībhāvaḥ | tataśca saptamyā"stṛtīyā saptamyorbahula(paā.2.4.84)mi"tyambhāvaḥ | upāttaprayogābhāve sati vākyenupanītasya kevalasya "jñeyaśabdasya kortha" iti "praśna" ityarthaḥ | kriyāviśeṣaṇametadityapare | praśnakriyā hi viśeṣyā | kriyāviśeṣaṇānāñca karmatvamiti | atra ca yadi karmmadhārayasamāsastasya svapadārthavṛttitvātkathantena praśnakriyāviśeṣiteti vaktavyaṃ |

[247,1]

athānirdiṣṭaḥ prayogo yasmin jñeyaśabda iti bahubrīhistadāpi śabdo viśeṣito na kriyā | yadā tvevamvigraho'nirdiṣṭaḥ prayogo yasmin praśna iti tadā bhavati kriyāviśeṣāt tadāpi praśnaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāt saptamyeva yuktā'nirdiṣṭaprayoge praśna iti | kiṅkāraṇaṃ kevalasya jñeyaśabdasyārtho neti cedāha | "tata" iti | tato jñeyaśabdāt "kvaci"d "api na" | vidhipratiṣedhaphale vyavahāre ca kevalasya jñeyaśabdasya prayogābhāvāt kutorthapratipattiḥ | yadādiśabdo'nityādirūpeṇa kiṃ jñeyo bhavatyathājñeya ityevaṃ prakrānte jñeya iti kevalaḥ prayujyate | tadāpi yārthapratipattiḥ sā prakṛtaṃ śabdādapadamapekṣya bhavantī vākyādeva jāyate | padāntarasahitasya padasya vākyatvāt | tasmānnāsti padāntaranirapekṣāt padārthapratipattiḥ |
yathā jñeyādipadānāṃ kevalānāṃ na kiṃcidvācyaṃ "tathā ghaṭādiśabdānāmapi kevalānāṃ" |

[247,2]

nanu ca kiṃ ghaṭenodakamānayāmyathāñjalineti prastāve | ghaṭeneti prayuṃkte |
tatra ca yaḥ prakaraṇaṃ na jñātavān tasyāpi pratipatturghaṭeneti kevalaśabdaśravaṇād ghaṭākārā pratipattirutpadyata eveti kathamucyate kevalācchabdāt na pratipattirityāha | "yāpī"tyādi | aparisamāptaḥ sa jijñāsitortho yasyāṃ pratipattau sā"'parisamāptatadarthā" | kathamaparisamāptatadarthatetyāha | "dṛṣṭaprayogānusāreṇe"ti | yāvatsu nayanānayanādikriyācodanāpravṛtteṣu | tena ghaṭaśabdasya "prayogo dṛṣṭastadanusāreṇa" tāvatsu pūrvavākyeṣvākāṃkṣāvatī pratītirbhavati kimayamartho vivakṣitaḥ kimvāyamityevaṃ"sākāṃkṣatvādu"paplavamānaṃ rūpatvenāsamāptārthā viplavabhrāntireva | etatkathayati |
naiva kevalaśabdamātraśravaṇādarthapratipattirasti kintu vākyeṣūpalabdhasyārthavataḥ padasya sādṛśyenopahṛtabuddheḥ kevalaśabdaśravaṇādarthapratipattyabhimāna iti | yathā dṛṣṭaprayogānusāreṇa kevala"ghaṭādipadaśravaṇādartha"pratipatti"rviplavastādṛśo jñeyādiśabdeṣvapi |
yathādarśanaṃ" | yathāprayogopalambhaṃ | yāvatsu vākyeṣu jñeyaśabdaḥ prayujyamāno dṛṣṭastadanusāreṇa kevalajñeyaśabdaśravaṇāda"styevā"rthapratipattiviplavaḥ | anena sarvathā ghaṭādiśabdairjñeyādiśabdānāntulyatāmāha |

[247,3]

yaccāpyuktam | "ekādivyudāsena pravarttamānaḥ sarvaśabdāṅge pratiṣedhādaṅgavyatiriktasya cāṅginonabhyupagamādanarthakaḥ syādi" ti |

[248,1]

tadayuktaṃ | yatonya evaikādibuddhiviṣayābhāvā anye ca samudāyādibuddhiviṣayāḥ pratibhāsante | ye ca viśiṣṭāvasthāḥ samudāyādibuddhiviṣayāsta evāṅgina ucyantenyasyāṅgino niṣedhāt | yādṛgbhūtāśca te pareṇa samudāyādidharmārambhakā iṣyante tādṛgbhūtā evāsmābhiḥ samudāyabuddhijanakatvena tadālambanā iṣyante virodhābhāvāt | tena sarvasamudāyadvitvādiśabdānāmekādiniṣedho ghaṭata eva |

[248,2]

"tasmā"dityādi | yataḥ sarvaṃ vākyaṃ sāvadhāraṇamvākyasthānāmeva padānāmarthavattā | "tasmā"t "sarvaśabdaprayo"ga ityupasaṃhāraḥ | "tatsāphalyāt" tasya śabdaprayogasya sāphalyāt | evaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ yathoktavidhinā'nyāpohe vācye |

[248,3]

yaduktambha ṭṭo dyo ta ka rā bhyāṃ |

[248,4]

"anyāpohaśca kimvācyaḥ kimvā'vācyoyamiṣyate | vācyopi vidhirūpeṇa yadi vānyaniṣedhataḥ || vidhyātmanāsya vācyatve tyājyamekāntadarśanaṃ | sarvatrānyaniṣedhoyaṃ śabdārtha iti varṇṇitaṃ || anapohavyudāsena yadyapohobhidhīyate | tatra tatraivamicchāyāmanavasthā bhavettava || athāpyavācya evāyamanyāpohastvayeṣyate | tenānyāpohakṛcchabda iti bādhyeta te vacaḥ || yasmād yeṣveva śabdeṣu nañ yogasteṣu kevalaḥ | bhavedanyanivṛttyaṃśassvātmaivānyatra gamyata iti || "

[248,5]

tadayuktaṃ | vidheḥ śabdārthasyārthādanyaniṣedhasyābhyupagamāt |

[248,6]

yadi tarhi vidhireva śabdārthorthādanyaniṣedhaḥ | kathantahyācārya di ṅ nā ge na"śabdorthāntaravyāvṛttiviśiṣṭāneva bhāvānāhe"tyādyuktaṃ |

[248,7]

na virudhyata ityata āha | "niveśanaṃ ce"tyādi | anena caitaddarśayati | saṃketepi tāvad vidhirūpeṇa śabdaḥ pravarttate kiṃ punarvyavahāra iti | "yo" vṛkṣārtho "yasmā"davṛkṣād ghaṭāde"rbhidya"te "vinivarttyeta" sa vṛkṣantyaktvetyarthaḥ | "niveśanaṃ" saṃketakaraṇaṃ vakṣaśabdasya draṣṭavyaṃ | "tamvinivṛtt"yetyanenāvṛkṣe vṛkṣaśabdo na saṃketyata ityuktambhavati | kva punastanniveśanamityāha | "bhede bhidyamānānāṃ" vṛkṣāṇāṃ yastadbhedastasmādavṛkṣād bhedaḥ | avṛkṣād bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ | yathaiva hyeko vṛkṣaviśeṣastasmād vṛkṣād bhinnastathā sarve vṛkṣabhedāḥ |

[249,1]

tatasteṣvasau tadbhedo vikalpabuddhyā sarveṣvekatvenāropyata iti samānākārabhāsī bhavati | tasmin "samānākārabhāsini" tadbhede bhinnasvabhāve niveśanaṃ śabdasya |
sa "cāyamiti" caśabdovadhāraṇārthaḥ | sa evāyamvikalpapratibhāsyākāro bāhyābhinnaḥ |

[249,2]

yadvā sa eva tadbhedo'vṛkṣād bhinnasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ prokta ācārya di ṅ nā ge na |
kathaṃ "prokta" ityāha | "anyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhā"ga ityanena |
asya cārthamvṛttau vyaktīkariṣyāmaḥ |

[249,3]

nanvanyavyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭo vastubhāgaḥ paramārthata eva kasmānna gṛhyata ityāha | "rūpaṃ svabhāvo nāsyāpi" bhedasya "kiñcana" nivṛttirūpasya bhedasyāsattvāt | vikalpapratibhāsinaśca buddhivibhramāt |

[249,4]

yadi bhedasya na rūpaṃ kiñcana kathantarhi śabdonyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭāneva bhāvānāhetyucyata ityata āha | "tadgatāvi"tyādi | tasya yathoktasya bhedasya vijātīyavyāvṛttasya svabhāvasya vidhirūpeṇa gatāveva "śabdebhyo gamyatenyanivarttanaṃ" || 127 |

[249,5]

tathā hi vṛkṣa ityukte'rthādavṛkṣanivarttanaṃ pratīyate | etāvanmātreṇa cānyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭatvamuktaṃ | na tu paramārthato viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ | tadāha | "netyā"di | "tatre"tyanyāpohe śabdārthe ā cā rya granthe vā | "kaści"t "para" ityanyasmād vyāvṛttorthaḥ | "kenaci"danyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇena "viśiṣṭo na gamyata" iti |

[249,6]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭe na |

[249,7]

"na cāsādhāraṇamvastu gamyate'pohavattayā | kathaṃ vā parikalpyeta sambandho vastvavastunoḥ || svarūpasattvamātreṇa na syāt kiñcidviśeṣaṇaṃ | svabuddhyā rajyate yena viśeṣyantadviśeṣaṇaṃ || na cāpyaśvādiśabdebhyo jāyate'pohabodhanaṃ | viśeṣyabuddhiriṣṭeha na cājñātaviśeṣaṇā || na cānyarūpamanyādṛk kuryājjñānaviśeṣaṇaṃ | kathaṃ cānyādṛśe jñāne taducyeta viśeṣaṇaṃ | abhāvagamyarūpe ca na viśeṣyesti vastutā | viśeṣitamapohena vastu vācyaṃ na testyata ||"

[250,1]

ityapāstaṃ |

[250,2]

nanvekasya śabdasya kathaṃ vidhipratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vyāpāradvayam | āha |

[250,3]

"na cāpi śabdo dvayakṛ"t | svārthābhidhānamanyavyāvarttanaṃ ca dvayaṃ karoti |
kiṅkāraṇam | "anyonyābhāva iti" | itiśabdo hetau | yasmādavṛkṣabhedābhāvo vṛkṣārthastadabhāvaścāvṛkṣārtha itaretarābhāvatvena | tasmād vṛkṣaśabdād vṛkṣārthapratipattyaivārthād avṛkṣanivṛttipratipattirapi bhavatīti na dvau vyāpārau sākṣācchabdasya | tena | "yadi gaurityayaṃ śabdaḥ samarthonyanivarttane | janako gavi gobuddhermṛgyatāmaparo dhvaniḥ || na ca jñānaphalāḥ śabdā na caikasya phaladvayaṃ | apavādavidhijñānaṃ phalamekasya vaḥ katham | "
iti nirastaṃ |

[250,4]

yadi śabdavācyo bhedassarvatrānuyāyī tadeva tarhi pāramārthikaṃ sāmānyambhaviṣyatītyata āha | "asāvi"ti śabdaviṣayonuyāyī bhedaḥ "arūpo" niḥsvabhāvaḥ | tasminnarūpe dṛśyavikalpayorekīkṛtya vaktṛśrotrorya"drūpavattvena darśanantadbuddhiviplavo" bhrāntirityarthaḥ |

[250,5]

"niveśyamāna" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | yasmād bhidyate "vṛkṣādikorthastannivarttya"tattyaktvā niveśyata iti sambandhaḥ | kutretyāha | "bhidyamānānā"mityādi | etacca kā ri kā vyākhyāne vibhaktārtha | "ākṣiptā" tadanyavyā"vṛtti"ryena śabdeneti vigrahaḥ | sa eva cāyaṃ "samānarūpapratibhāsī bhedo nirddiṣṭa" ācārya di ṅ nā ge na |
kathamityāha | "arthāntaravyāvṛttyā tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgo gamyata iti | tathā śabdorthāntaranivṛttiviśiṣṭāneva bhāvānāhetyā"dinā | ādigrahaṇācchabdārthāntarāpohaṃ kurvatī śrutirabhidhatta ityādi parigrahaḥ |

[251,1]

"sa hī"tyādyasyaiva samarthanaṃ | "sa hi" vṛkṣaśabdasta"mbheda"mavṛkṣavyāvṛttaṃ svabhāvaṃ "katha"yannārthāntarasyāvṛkṣārthasya "vyavacchedamākṣipanneva varttate" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "ekagatabheda"syetyādi | yathā hi vṛkṣabhedā eva khadirādayaḥ svabhāvenaivāvṛkṣebhyo bhinnā evamavṛkṣā api vṛkṣebhyaḥ bhedasya dviṣṭhatvāt | tatra vṛkṣaśabdenaikagatasya vṛkṣārthagatasya"bhedasya" bhinnasya svabhāvasyaikākārapratibhāsino yā "codanā tasyāstadanyavyāvṛtti nāntarīyakatvāt" | tasmād vṛkṣārthādanyasyāvṛkṣasya yā vyāvṛttistannāntarīyakatvāt | evaṃ hyavṛkṣād vyāvṛttarūpo vṛkṣārtho'bhihitaḥ syād yadyavṛkṣārthasya tatra nivṛttirgamyeta | "sa evā"nyasmād bhidyamānasya vikalpabuddhipratibhāsī "bhedo"
bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ | "tadvyāvṛtt"yā'rthāntaravyāvṛttyā yathoktanyāyenārthād gamyamānayā | "gato ca" buddho "bhā"go vastuna ityukta ityadhyāhāraḥ | vyāvṛttavastudarśanadvārāyātatvād vasturūpatvenādhyavasāyācca vastubhāgo gata ityucyata ityabhiprāyaḥ |

[251,2]

etaduktambhavati | atatparāmarśajananebhyo vyāvṛttarūpantatparāmarśajananeṣvāropitaikatvaṃ vikalpabuddhipratibhāsanamevākāramavibhaktabāhyādhyātmikabhedaṃ śabdaḥ pratipādayati śābde jñāne tasyaiva pratibhāsanāt | tañca pratipādayannanyavyāvṛttimarthādākṣipati | atonenābhiprāyeṇoktamā cā rye ṇānyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāga iti | na punaranyavyāvṛttyā śabdārthabhūtayā viśeṣaṇarūpayā bāhyasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāgo gṛhyate'nyavyāvṛtterevābhāvāditi | evantāvadanyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāga ityetatsamarthitaṃ |

[251,3]

adhunā śabdārthāntaranivṛttiviśiṣṭāneva bhāvānāhetyetatsamarthayannāha | "tadgate"rityādi | "tadgate"ranyanivṛttigates"tadupādhitvāda"sti bhedopādhitvāt | sa eva"bhedastadviśiṣṭo gata ityucya"te | ā cā rye ṇeti |

[252,1]

yadvā | tasya yathoktasya vastubhedasya śabdād "gateḥ" pratipatteḥ sāvadhāraṇatvena"tadupādhitvāt" | sā tadanyanivṛttirupādhirarthākṣepād yasyāstadgateḥ sā tathoktā |
tadanyanivṛttināntarīyakatvameva tadupādhitvaṃ |

[252,2]

etaduktambhavati | yārthāntaravyāvṛttirarthād gamyate tannāntarīyakatvātsa eva bhedaḥ śabdād gamyamānonyavyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭo gata ityucyata ā cā rye ṇeti |

[252,3]

nanva"rthāntaravyāvṛttiḥ" śabdapravṛttinimittabhūtā | "yayā viśiṣṭā" bāhyā arthā gavādi"śabdaiścodyante" apratīteḥ | "daṇḍiva"diti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ | yathā daṃṇḍadvāreṇa tadvān daṇḍītyucyate | naivaṃ vyāvṛttidvāreṇa vyāvṛttimāniti | kasmād vyāvṛttirarthāntarabhūtā netyāha | "dvayorhī"tyādi | yasmād dvayorvṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥ paraspara"mbhidyamānayo"ryo "bheda"stasyo"bhayagatatvā"t | vṛkṣāvṛkṣagatatvād vṛkṣāvṛkṣabhinnasvabhāvatvādityarthaḥ | tenai"kagatabhedābhidhānepi" | avṛkṣāpekṣayā vṛkṣagato yo bhedaḥ | bhinnaḥ svabhāvastasya śabdenābhidhānepi "nāntarīyakastadanyākṣepo bhavati" | avṛkṣāpekṣayā vṛkṣagatasya bhedasyāvṛkṣanivṛttilakṣaṇasya vṛkṣāpakṣayāpyavṛkṣagatasya vṛkṣanivṛttilakṣaṇasyākṣepo bhavati | "iti"śabdo hetau | asmāddhetostadupādhitvāt tadviśiṣṭo gata ityuktamityadhyāhāraḥ | "na tayo"rityekagatasya bhedasya tadanyavyāvṛteśca na"viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ" |

[252,4]

kaḥ punarayamekagato bhedaḥ kā ca tadanyavyāvṛttiryenānyavyāvṛttināntarīyakasyaikagatabhedasya śabdāt pratyayo bhavatīti cet |

[252,5]

ucyate | vṛkṣaśabdavācyastāvad vikalpabuddhipratibhāsī śākhādimadākāraḥ sarva vṛkṣeṣvabhinnarūpa ivātadrūpebhyo bhinna iva bhāsamāna eva gato bhedo bhinnaḥ svabhāva ityarthaḥ | evaṃ ghaṭādiśabdavācyopyekagato bhedo draṣṭavyaḥ | tambhedaṃ ca pratipādayan śabdo vijātīyanivṛttiṃ prasajyapratiṣedhalakṣaṇāmarthād gamayati sā tadanyavyāvṛttiḥ |

[252,6]

nanu yadyanyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭo vastubhāgo na gamyate kimarthantarhyanyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭa ityādyuktamityāha | "ekabhedābhidhāna" ityādi | yaścāyaṃ yathā vibhakta ekagato bhedaḥ sa eva śabdena codyate | tatpratītirevānvayagatiḥ | yā tvarthād"anyavyāvṛttigatiḥ" sā vyatirekagatiḥ | evamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdorthavān bhavati | "tenānvayavyatirekacodanayā"nvayasya sākṣādarthāttu vyatirekasya codanā draṣṭavyā | tayā codanayā "vyavahārāṅgatāṃ śabdānāṃ darśayannā"cārya di ṅ nā ga āha"tadvyāvṛttyā gamyate vastubhāga" iti | "tathā tadviśiṣṭo ve"tyāha | vyāvṛttiśabdena"vyatireka uktaḥ" | vastubhāgaśabdenānvayaḥ | anenaitadapi vyākhyātaṃ śabdāntarāpohaṃ kurvantī śrutiḥ svārthamabhidhatta ityarthaḥ | tatra yosāvekagato bhedo vikalpabuddhipratibhāsī vyākhyātaḥ sa eva svārthastatrārthāntaravyāvṛttirarthāntarāpohaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhalakṣaṇastaṃ kurvatītyarthād gamayantītyarthaḥ |

[253,1]

yadi cānyanivṛttipurassaraiva vṛkṣādiśabdapravṛttistadānvayavyatirekacodanayetyādivyākhyānaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt |

[253,2]

tasmādvidhireva śabdārthaḥ |

[253,3]

yata evaikabhedābhidhāne'rthādanyavyāvṛttigati"rata eve"tyādi | "svārtha"sya "bhedarūpatvādi"ti | yo vṛkṣaśabdasyārthaḥ śākhādimadākāraḥ | vikalpapratibhāsī sa bhedarūpaḥ |
bhinnasvabhāvo'bhedākāravyāvṛttatvāt svayaṃ | ato bhedarūpasya "svārtha"syā"bhidhānādevārthādanyavyāvṛttigati"revaṃ hyavṛkṣād bhedarūpasyaiva vṛkṣārthasya gatirbhavet |

[253,4]

yadyarthāt tatra vṛkṣanivṛttirbhavatīti | "tasmāt svārthābhidhā"nameva śabdasya vyāpāro"nyavyāvarttana"ntvarthā"diti na śabdasya" vyāpāradvayaṃ |

[253,5]

nanu vidhāyakena vākyenānvayamātrampratipādyate nānyasya vidhānaṃ pratiṣedho vā |
niṣedhakenāpi niṣedhamātrameva kevalaṃ pratīyate nānyasya vidhānaṃ pratiṣedho vetyata āha |

[253,6]

"na hyanva"ya ityādi | pratiniyatasyārthasya vidhānamanvayo yathā vṛkṣaṃcchindhīti |
tatrāvṛkṣasyārthānnivṛttirvyatirekaḥ | sa yatra na vidyate so"vyatire"ka evaṃ bhūto"nvayo na me sti" | kintu sarva eva sa vyatirekaḥ |

[253,7]

tena yaducyate bha ṭṭo dyo ta ka rā bhyāṃ |

[253,8]

"vidhirūpaśca śabdārtho yena nābhyupagamyate | na bhaved vyatirekopi tasya tatpūrvako hyasāviti"

[254,1]

nirastamiṣṭatvāt | ananvayo vānvayarahito vā vyatireko na hīti sambandhaḥ |
tatra viśeṣasya pratiṣedho vyatirekaḥ | tatrārthāccheṣagatiranvayaḥ | "ekān"vaya ityādinaitadeva samarthyate | "ekānvaya"syetyekasya vidhānasya "parihāryābhā"ve vyavacchedyābhāve niṣphalacodanatvāt |

[254,2]

yadi vṛkṣañchindhītyukterthādavṛkṣasya na tatra vyavacchedastadā vṛkṣaśabdaprayogo niṣphalaḥ syāt | yadvā kimvṛkṣañchinadmi utānyamiti śroturjijñāsāyāṃ satyāṃ vṛkṣañchindhītyuktenyaniṣedhaḥ pratīyata evānyathā parihāryābhāve niṣphalamabhidhānaṃ syāt | tathā yadāpyākāṃkṣārahitaḥ śrotā vṛkṣañchindhīti śabdena codyate tadāpi vṛkṣa eva pravarttate nānyatra | vaktā hi vṛkṣa evāyaṃ pravarttate nānyatretyanenābhiprāyeṇa śabdaṃ prayuṅkte | vivakṣānugamanaṃ ca dhvaneḥ | tasmānnāsti vyatirekarahitonvayasta"thaikaparihārasye"tyekapratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhasyaivaikasyetyarthaḥ | "kvaciditi" pratiṣedhena viṣayīkṛte vastuni "sthityabhāve niṣphalacodanatvāt" | tathā hi surāviṣayasya pānasya pratiṣedhe |
yadi surāyā anyatrāpi pānasya nāvasthānaṃ syāt | tadā sarvasmin viṣaye niṣiddhasya pānasya viśeṣe pratiṣedhonarthakaḥ | tatra surā'peyeti surāpānamātrasya pratiṣedhe caritārthatvād vākyasya yadyapyudakādipānaṃ śabdena na vidhīyate | tathāpi surāyā anyatra pānasyāvasthānanna nivāryata ityarthādanvayagatiranyathā surāgrahaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt | yadvā kimudakādivat surā pātavyā kimvā neti praśne surā na pātavyetyukte suraiveti pratīternodakādipānavidhānaṃ prakṛtanniṣedhyate | tena sarvatra vidhipratiṣedharūpasyaiva śabdārthatvaṃ |

[254,3]

kastarhi vidhipratiṣedhaparyudāsavākyānāmbhedaḥ | mahānbhedaḥ | vidhāyakaṃ hi vākyamvidhiṃ prādhānyenābhidhāyānyaniṣedhakamarthāt | niṣedhakaṃ ca niṣedhaṃ prādhānyenābhidhāyārthādanyavidhānamāha | paryudāsapratipādakantu vākyaṃ pratiṣedhapūrvakamanyavidhānaṃ prādhānyenāhetyastyeva viśeṣa iti |

[254,4]

nanu yadyanyanivṛttirarthāt pratīyate saiva tarhi pāramārthikī bhāvānāmasti yayā viśiṣṭā gṛhyanta ityevaṃ kasmānneṣyate | kiṃ punarevantadgatestadupādhitvāt tadviśiṣṭo gata iti vyākhyāyata ityata āha | "sa cāya"mityādi | yo "bhedo"
vyāvṛttilakṣaṇa ācārya di ṅ nā ge na viśeṣaṇatvenābhimataḥ sa cāya"marūpo" niḥsvabhāvaḥ | nāsya vyatiriktamavyatiriktamvā rūpamastīti kṛtvā | kathantarhi bhāvānāṃ vijātīyād bheda iti pratītiriti cedāha | "rūpavattvena" bhāvasambandhitvena tasya bhedasya "kevalandarśana"mpratīti"rviplavo" bhrāntiḥ | kevalamiti tathābhūtabāhyanirapekṣaṃ | kā ri kā yā mapyevaṃ vyākhyānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |

[255,1]

nanu yadi rūpavattvena darśanaṃ kathaṃ buddhiviplava ityata āha | "tenai"vetyādi |
rūpavattvena bhāvasambandhitvena yaddarśanambhedasya tenaiv"āparamārtho" na vastubhūto'sattvāt | "asā"viti bhedaḥ prasajyarūpaḥ | "anyathe"tyevamaniṣyamāṇe | "na hi vastunaḥ"
svalakṣaṇasya sambandhinī "vyāvṛttirvastu bhavati" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "bhedosyāsmāditīraṇāt" |

[255,2]

etaduktambhavati | yadi hi sā vastubhūtā syāt tadā vṛkṣebhyo'vṛkṣavyāvṛttirabhinnā bhinnā vā syāt | yadyabhinnā | asmādavṛkṣād vṛkṣasya bheda iti vyatirekapratītirna syāt | palāśāccaikasmādavṛkṣavyāvṛtterabhinnatvāt | dhavādīnāmavṛkṣavyāvṛttirna syāt | palāśavat tatsvabhāvāyā vyāvṛttesteṣvananugamāt | atha palāśād bhinnā sā | tatrāpyavṛkṣavyāvṛtteḥ sakāśāt palāśasya vyāvṛttiḥ syādavṛkṣavyāvṛtteśca vyāvarttamānasya palāśasyāvṛkṣarūpatā syādavṛkṣavat | tataścāsmādavṛkṣādasya vṛkṣasya bheda iti pratītirna syādiṣyate ca | tasmāttadvyāvṛttirna vastu | "bhedosyāsmāditīraṇā"duccāraṇādityarthaḥ | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat pratīterapi grahaṇaṃ |

[255,3]

"rūpaṃ hītyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | hi yasmāt | rūpaṃ kimucyate "paramā"rthaḥ | vastusvabhāvaḥ | bhedonyavyāvṛtti"ryadi rūpaṃ syād" yadi svabhāvo bhavet | tadityavṛkṣād vyāvṛttirūpaṃ | "tadrūpami"ti yattadvyāvṛttaṃ palāśasvalakṣaṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ | "atadrūpaṃ" veti tatonyadityarthaḥ | vastunastattvānyattvānatikramādityarthaḥ |

[255,4]

"tādrūpya" ityādinā prathamapakṣe doṣamāha | "tādrūpye" palāśādanyattve yayā vyāvṛttyā sāmānyabhūtayā sarve vṛkṣabhedāḥ vyāvṛttā dṛṣṭāstasyāstādrūpye palāśādananyatvebhyupagamyamāne tadeva palāśasvalakṣaṇameva vyāvṛttiriti kṛtvā palāśa evāvṛkṣād bhinnaḥ prāpnoti "nānyo" dhavādiḥ | "tata" ityavṛkṣād "bhidyeta" | kiṅkāraṇamityāha | "na hī"tyādi | avṛkṣāddhi vyāvṛttiḥ palāśasyaiva rūpaṃ | "na ca tasya rūpamanya"sya dhavādeḥ"syāt" |

[256,1]

"na tade"vetyādinā dvitīyapakṣopanyāsaḥ | "na tadeva" palāśasvalakṣaṇameva "tasya bhedasya rūpaṃ | rūpaṃ ca" svabhāvaścāsau "bheda iṣyate | tatonyadeva" palāśād vyāvṛtti"rūpaṃ syāt" | yadvā rūpaṃ cānyadeva bhedasya syāt | "tataścā"nyattvāt kāraṇāt | "bhāvaḥ" palāśātmakas"tasmāda"vṛkṣavyāvṛttirūpād "vyāvartte"ta | "tataḥ" kāraṇāt | "ūṣmādi"tyavṛkṣāt "tasya" palāśasya "bheda iti na syāt" | yasmād "yat" khalu vastu | "yato bhedo" yadbhedastasmād "vyāvarttate | tattadeva bhavati" | avṛkṣavyāvṛtterbhavati |
avṛkṣavyāvṛtteravṛkṣanivṛttirūpāyā nivarttamānampalāśasvalakṣaṇamavṛkṣamiva syādavṛkṣavat | mā vā bhūd vṛkṣāvṛkṣayorekatvantathāpi "sosya bheda iti ca na syāt" |

[256,2]

yadi cāyamavṛkṣād bhedaḥ palāśādanyaḥ syāttadayamavṛkṣād "bhedo"sya palāśasya"sambandhīti na syāt | na hī"tyādyasyeva samarthanaṃ | "anyaḥ" svatantronyasya "sambandhī bhedo" dharmarūpo "bhavati | sati ve"ti "sambandhit"vebhyupagamyamāne vā | "sambandhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo"ṅgīkarttavyaḥ | bhinnayoḥ kāryakāraṇamantareṇa sambandhāyogāt | tatra vyāvṛttimān kāraṇaṃ vyāvṛttiḥ kāryaṃ | "iti" heto "rūpaṃ" vastvantarameva "tajjanita"ntena vyāvṛttimatā svalakṣaṇena janitaṃ "bheda iti | padā"rthāntarasya nāma kṛtantasmāt kāryatvenābhimatād bhedākhyāt padārthād "aviśeṣāda"nyatrāpi "kāraṇānāṃ" yāni"kāryāṇi" tāni "sarvāṇi vyāvṛttayo" bhedāḥ "syuḥ" | na caivaṃ | tadānyatrāpi bhedābhimate bheda iti vyapadeśo mā bhūt |

[256,3]

atha kāryaṃ bheda iti nocyate kintu bhedaḥ kārya ityucyate | tadāpyāha | "arthāntaratve ca" bhedasyābhyupagamyamāne | "tatopi" vyāvṛttimato"pyasya" bhedasya "bhedosti" |
anyathā bhedasyārthāntaratvameva na syāt | "tata"śca palāśasyāvṛkṣād yo bhedastasya bhedasya palāśād bheda iti kṛtvā "sa bhedo bhedopādhiḥ" sa palāśād "bhedaḥ" |
upādhiviśeṣaṇaṃ yasya bhedasya sa "bhedopādhi"stadbhāvasta"ttvan"ta"smāda"sāvavṛkṣād bhedaḥ palāśasya "na bhedaḥ syāt | dravyāntarava"t | yathā hi dravyāntaraṃ ghaṭādikamapyaghaṭāpekṣayā yo "bheda"sta"dupā"dhitvānna palāśasya bhedastadvat | svatantratvādityabhiprāyaḥ |

[257,1]

nanu yadi nāmaṃ bhedopādhirbhedastathāpi kimiti palāśasya bhedo na bhavatītyata āha | "na hī"tyādi | "ayamata iti viśeṣanirdeśāt" | ayamavṛkṣād bhedaḥ | "ata" ityavṛkṣāt | asyetyetadapekṣaṇīyaṃ | asya palāśasyāyaṃ bhedo'smādavṛkṣādityevaṃ viśeṣanirdeśāt pāratantryeṇa nirdeśāt palāśasya sambandhī bhedo dharmaḥ sidhyati | pāratantryeṇa ca nirdeśo bhedasyābhede sati sidhyati bhedāntarapratikṣepeṇa | na tvarthāntaratve bhedasya | arthāntaratve hi bhedopādhitvād ghaṭavanna palāśasya bhedaḥ syāt | tataścāsmādasya bheda iti viśeṣanirdeśo na syāt | tadevaṃ vyatirekapakṣe'vṛkṣād bhedasyāpi palāśād yo bhedaḥ sopi rūpavāniti tasyāpi svāśrayād bhedena bhavitavyaṃ | tathā ca sarvabhedānāṃ bhinnasvabhāvatayā bhedopādhitvena svayanna rūpabhedateti na kaścid bhedaḥ syāt |

[257,2]

etadevāha | "tataśce"tyādi | "upādhyabhāva" iti vyāvṛttilakṣaṇasya dharmabhūtasyopādherabhāve sarvasya svabhāvāntaratvena dharmitvād "bhedasyaivābhāvaḥ syāt" tasya dharmirūpatvāt |

[257,3]

yopi manyate | yadi rūpavatī vyāvṛttiḥ syāt syāt tattvānyatvapakṣabhāvī doṣo yāvatā nīrūpā sāsti tayā ca bhāvā viśiṣṭā gṛhyanta iti |

[257,4]

tadayuktaṃ | "tadgatāveva śabdebhyo gamyate'nyanivarttanaṃ | na tatra gamyate kaścidviśiṣṭaḥ kenacitparaḥ || pra0 vā0 1 | 128"
iti granthavirodhāt | nīrūpasya cāstitvavirodhācchaśaviṣāṇavat | nīrūpatvādeva ca na tasyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ grāhakaṃ nāpyanumānaṃ | sambandhābhāvāt |

[257,5]

nāpi niyatarūpānyathānupapattyā tatkalpanā sambandhābhāvādeva | svahetubhya eva ca niyatarūpāṇāmutpannatvāditi "sarvabhāvā svabhāvena vyāvṛttibhāgina"1 | 42
ityatrāntare'bhihitatvāt |

[257,6]

nāpi ca sā'pratipannā viśeṣaṇambhavitumarhati | na hi daṇḍāpratītau daṇḍīti pratītirbhavati | nāpi sā kvacidāśritā nīrūpatvāt | na cāsambaddhamviśeṣaṇambhavati |
nāpyanyanivṛttigrahaṇapurassaraṃ vṛkṣādiṣu vṛkṣaśabdaḥ pravarttate'pratītirityuktatvāt |
nivṛtternīrūpatayā'pratipannatvena saṃketasyāpravṛtteśca | kathaṃ śabdaviṣayatvantasmādanubhavadvāreṇa vṛkṣo'yaṃ nāvṛkṣa ityevaṃ niścaya utpadyate | tenānyanivṛttiḥ pratiṣedha vikalpena kalpitā | yathāsaṃketaṃ ca vṛkṣādau śabdaḥ pravarttamānorthādanyanivṛttimākṣiti | anyanivṛttivikalpamākṣipatītyarthaḥ | tenānyanivṛttyā viśiṣṭo | vastubhāgo gamyata ityucyata iti |

[258,1]

yadi vyāvṛttayaḥ sāmānyabhūtā bahirvastutvena neṣyante | nāpi paraparikalpitaṃ sāmānyamevaṃ sati bāhyamvastveva vācyamāpatitaṃ | tatra ca doṣa ityāha | "kathantarhī"ti | "abhinnasya" niraṃśasya "vastunaḥ śabdena coda"ne upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat liṃgena pratipādane | "tasyaivā"bhinnasya vastuna ekasmād bhinnasya puna"ranyato"pi "bhedāt" | tathā hi yena svabhāveṃna na śabdo'kṛtakād bhinnastenaiva mūrttānityatvācca | tasyānaṃśatvāt | "anaṃśasya"
ca vastunaḥ kṛtakaśabdenai"kasyā"kṛtakād "bheda"sya bhinnasya svabhāvasya "codane" | tathā liṃgena pratipādane "sarvabhedagate"ssarvebhyo bhinnasya svabhāvasya pratipatteḥ | "tatrānaṃśe"
vastuni "kathaṃ śabdapramāṇāntarāṇi vyarthāni na syuḥ" | ekena śabdena codane śabdāntarāṇāṃ vaiyarthyaṃ syāt | ekena liṅgena pratipādane pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ vaiyarthyaṃ syāt |

[258,2]

"yasmādi"tyādinā pariharati | tasmād "yo yena dharmeṇa" viśeṣaḥ saṃpratīyata1 | 44 ityādinā prāgevedaṃ codyamparihṛtamadhikavidhānārthantu punarupanyāsaḥ |
artheṣvākārāntarasamāropo"rthaślaṣaḥ" | sa ca pratipattibhedenānekaḥ | "tatre"ti buddhipratibhāsini dharmiṇi bāhyabhinnatayā'khyeyāste | bāhyatayādhyastasyaiva buddhyākārasya śabdavācyatvāt | na punarbāhyambuddhyākāro vā kevalaḥ śabdavācyaḥ svalakṣaṇatvāt | "tatra" dharmiṇi "vidhirūpatayā" svārthapratipattidvāreṇai"kārthaśleṣavicchede"'panayana "eko dhvanirvyāpriyate" || 130 ||

[258,3]

"liṅgaṃ" caikārthaśleṣavicchede vyāpriyate | "tatra" svārthābhidhānadvāreṇa samāropavyavacchede śabdapramāṇāntarāṇāṃ sāphalyamiti yāvat | "na" punarjñānād vyatirikta"mbāhyamvastu" svalakṣaṇaṃ | svalakṣaṇād vā vyatiriktambāhyamvastu sāmānyalakṣaṇamvācyaṃ "kiñva"nāsti | "yasya" vastuno"'bhidhānato'khile" vastusvabhāve "gatirbhavet | " vastuvaśāt | yataśca śabdaḥ svābhidhānadvāreṇa vyavacchedaṃ karoti"tataḥ" kāraṇāt taṃ taṃ vyavacchedaṃ kurva"nnānāphalaḥ śabdo" bhavat"yekādhāraśca" | kathaṃ | "arthakriyāyogyamadhyavasāya" | anarthakriyākāriṇāpi svābhāsamarthakriyākāritvena svalakṣaṇarūpattvenādhyasyetyarthaḥ | "tatrai"veti buddhipratibhāse bāhyatayādhyaste | kiṃbhūte | "taistairbhrāntikāraṇaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭarūpa iva bhā"ti || 131 ||

[259,1]

sadṛśāparotpattyādibhi"rbhrāntihetu"bhirnityādyākāreṇa "saṃsṛṣṭarūpa iva pratibhāsamā"ne | "te"'nityādi"śabdāḥ" ya"thāsaṃke"taṃ yasya yasya samāropasya "vyavacchedārthaṃ" |
svapratibhāse saṃketaḥ kutaḥ | tasya tasya pratiyogino vyavacchedāya "vyāpriyan"te |
saṃketānurūpameva pratipādayannāha | "na cet"yādi | hyarthe caśabdaḥ | yato "yathāsaṃketaṃ""vyāpārastato na hye"kaśabda"sādh"yaṃ "vyavacchedamanyaḥ" śabdaḥ "karo"ti | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "saṃketapratiniyamā"t | ekaikavyavacchedārthambuddhyākāro'vibhaktabāhyarūpe śabdaniveśanāt | vyavahārakālepi svārthābhidhānadvāreṇa tantameva vyavacchedaṃ pratyāyayatītyarthaḥ |
śabdagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamevaṃ liṅgamapīti draṣṭavyaṃ |

[259,2]

nanvadhyavasitabāhyarūpatvācchabdārthasya tataśca śabdenanyalakṣaṇasya sarvātmanā viṣayīkaraṇāt kathaṃ na śabdāntarāṇāmvaiyarthyamityāha "na ce"tyādi | avadhāraṇaśca śabdaḥ | "naiva vicchinnaṃ" jñānāṃśād bhinnaṃ "kiñcid vastu" | svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇād vyatiriktaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇamanyanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ v"ākṣipyate" gṛhyate śabdena liṅgena vā | "yasyābhidhānād vastubalene"ti vastugrahe niraṃśatvād vastunaḥ "sarvathā gatiḥ syāt" |
dharmāṇāntato vyatirekāt | vyatirekepyupādhīnāṃ nānopādhyupakārāṅgaśaktyabhinnātmano graha 1 | 54 ityādinā sarvathāgrahaṇasyoktatvāt | kasmācchabdairvicchinnamvastunākṣipyata ityata āha | śa"bdānā"mityādi |

[259,3]

etaduktambhavati | yato buddhyākāramabāhyambāhyamadhyavasyanti śabdāstatovicchinnavastugrāhakā iva bhavantītyarthaḥ | buddherviplavaśca buddhyākārasya bahīrūpatayā grahaḥ | "tadviṣayatvācchabdānāṃ" | buddhiviplavepi vācya"vastusāmarthyāṃdakhile gatiḥ" |
kinneti cedāha | "tatra cet"yādi | "tatra" buddhiviplave"'vastuni vastusāmarthyābhāvāt" |

[260,1]

yadyapi buddhyākāro jñānasvalakṣaṇatvādvastu | tathāpyasau śabdairvikalpairvā bāhyābhinnatayādhyasto'vastveva | tena śabdo vikalpo vā na svalakṣaṇaviṣayo yathāvadekasyāpi bāhyasya jñānākārasya vā'grahaṇāditi |

[260,2]

yadi buddhiviplavaviṣayā eva sarvaśabdāḥ kathaṃ kṛtakānityādiśabdānāntathābhūte vastunyavyabhicāra ityata āha | "tathābhūte"tyādi | tatastato'kṛtakanityāderbhinnasyārthasyānubhava"dvāreṇe"tyarthaḥ | "ayaṃ vyavahā"ra iti sambandhaḥ | kimbhūtaḥ | "nānaike"tyādi |
nānā ekaśca nānaikaṃ | tacca "dharma"śceti karmadhārayaḥ | tato "bhedābhe"daśabdābhyāntripado dvandvaḥ | nānaikadharma"bhedābhedā" eva buddhau "pratibhāsa"nta iti pratibhāsāsta eva viplavo bhrāntatvāt | "tadanusārī" tenākāreṇa pravṛttaḥ | "iti" hetos"tasya" vyavahārasya "tatpratibandhe"
tamiṃstathābhūte svalakṣaṇe pāramparyeṇotpattipratibandhe sati "tadavyabhicāraḥ" |
vastvavyabhicāraḥ | yathā hi kṛtakādyākārāḥ śabdā viplavāstathāvastūnāmapi kṛtakādirūpeṇa paramārthatovasthānamityanenākāreṇāv"yabhicāro" draṣṭavyaḥ |

[260,3]

etadevāha | "tatopītyā"di | tato buddhiviplavaviṣayācchabdād vyavahārāt parārthānumānalakṣaṇād "vitathādi"ti bhrāntāt | "pravṛttasyānte" pravṛttiparisamāptau"tathābhūta eva" kṛtakādirūpa "eva vastuni" natvakṛtakādirūpe | anenāvyabhicārasvarūpamuktaṃ | "jñānasamvādāt" svalakṣaṇagrāhijñānotpatteḥ śabdasya vā jñānasya samvādāt |

[260,4]

asminnevānyāpohe śabdārthe sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ sidhyati na tu vastunītyāha | "na punarbhi"nnetyādi | "bhi"nnā "ā"kārā jātiguṇādayaḥ śabdapravṛttinimittabhūtāḥ |
tad"grāhiṇāṃ jñānaśabdānāmekavastuviṣayatvāt" | śabda ekādhāra iti sambandhaḥ |
yadi hi bhinnākāraṃ jñānamekavastuviṣayampravartteta tatastadanusāreṇa śabdopi tathā syāt | tathā ca "nānāpha"laḥ "śabda ekādhā"ra iti bhavetsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tacca "nāsti vyāghātāt" | tathā hi nīlotpalaśabdayorekaṃ vā vastuvācyaṃ syādanekamvā | ādye pakṣe ekenaiva śabdena niraṃśasya vastunaḥ sarvātmanābhidhānāt | dvitīyasya śabdasyāpravṛttiḥ syāt pravṛttau vā paryāyateti na nānāphalatvaṃ | dvitīye pakṣa ekādhāratā nāsti | ghaṭapaṭādiśabdavannānāviṣayatvāt |

[261,1]

atha mataṃ | nīlaśabdo nīlaguṇaviśiṣṭandravyamāha | utpalaśabdopyutpalajātiviśiṣṭantadeva dravyamāha | ato viśeṣaṇayorbhedānnānāphalaḥ śabdo viśeṣyābhedādekādhāra iti |

[261,2]

tadapyasat | yato nīlaguṇena viśiṣṭadravyannīlaśabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ sarvātmanābhidhīyate niraṃśatvāt | tataḥ koparo dravyasyotpalajātiviśiṣṭa ātmānabhihitosti yadutpalaśabdenābhidhīyeteti | tathaiva paryāyatā syādatha viśeṣaṇabhedād viśeṣyadravyasya bhedastadāpyekādhāratā na syāt | apohavādinastvayamadoṣa ityāha | "yathāvarṇṇita" ityādi | "buddhipratibhā"sa "āśra"yo yasya śabdārthasya sa tathoktaḥ |

[261,3]

yathā ca na doṣastathā pratipādayannāha | "viccheda"mityādi | eko nīlaśabda"ekaṃ" vyavacchedamanīlavyavacchinnaṃ nīlasvabhāvaṃ "sūcayannanya"manutpalavyavacchinnamutpalasvabhāva"mapratikṣipya varttate" na nirākārotītyarthaḥ || 132 ||
