[261,4]

"sa" ityanutpalavyavacchinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ | "tena" nīlaśabdena "vyāp"ta ākrāntaḥ ākṣiptaḥ sannutpalaśabdaprayoge buddhāve"katvena pratibhāsa"te | ekasyaiva dharmiṇaḥ vyavacchedadvayāyātanīlotpaladharmadvayayuktasya vikalpabuddhau pratibhāsanāt | yadā caiva"ntadā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syād buddhyanurodhataḥ" |

[261,5]

etaduktambhavati | nīlaśabdaprayogād buddhipratibhāsī dharmī nīlarūpa eva pratibhāsate | tatrārthādanīlaṃ vyāvarttyate na tvanutpalavyavacchinnaḥ svabhāva utpalaśabdaprayogādapyutpalarūpatayā pratīyamānonutpalaṃ vyāvarttyate na tvanīlavyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvaḥ | śabdadvayaprayoge tu nīlotpaladharmadvayayuktaikadharmipratibhāsinī vikalpabuddhirutpadyate tato nānāphalaḥ śabda ekādhāro bhavatīti bhaved buddhyanurodhena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti |

[261,6]

tena yadu dyo ta ka re ṇocyate | "yasya cānyāpohaḥ śabdārthastenānīlānutpalavyudāsau kathaṃ samānādhikaraṇāviti vaktavyaṃ | yasya punarvidhīyamānaḥ śabdārthasya jātiguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ nīlotpalaśabdābhyāṃ dravyamabhidhīyate jātiguṇau ca dravye varttete | na punaranīlānutpalavyudāsau | tasmāt samānādhikaraṇārtho nāstī"ti nirastaṃ |
vidhīyamānasya śabdārthasyābhyupagamāt || 133 ||

[262,1]

kiṃ ca punaḥ | "śabdas"ya svārthābhidhānadvāreṇa samāropav"yavacchedakaraṇe"bhyupagamyamāne | yadvā "vyavacchedakaraṇe" vyavacchinnasvabhāvaviṣayīkaraṇe | leśato "vastudharmasya"
vastusvabhāvasya vijātīyavyāvṛttasya "saṃsparśaḥ syāt" prāptilakṣaṇaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sattya"miti vidyamānaḥ "sa hya"dhyavasīyamānaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ | "tatra" vastunīti kṛtvā "naikavastvabhidhāyini" śabdebhyupagamyamāne vastudharmasya saṃsparśaḥ sāmānyasyaiva vastuno'bhāvāt |

[262,2]

kathamiti cet | "buddhā"vityādi | upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalambhādasattvamiti yāvat | yata evamvastuni śabdārthe doṣa"stena" kāraṇe"nānyāpohaviṣayā" vikalpabuddhipratibhāsaviṣayāḥ "śabdā buddhayaśca" proktā ācārya di ṅ nā ge na | kimbhūtā buddhayaḥ "sāmānyagocarā" vikalpikā ityarthaḥ | buddhīnāmevaitad viśeṣaṇaṃ na tu śabdānānteṣāṃ sāmānyaviṣayavyabhicārāt | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | va"stunyeṣāṃ" śabdānāṃ vikalpānāṃ ca "sambhavā"t |

[262,3]

"yadi hītyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "vastveva yadi viṣayīkriyeta" gṛhyeta na tu vidhirūpeṇādhyavasīyeta | "soya"mityanantaroktaḥ "sarvārthānāṃ sarveṇākāre"ṇa vastusāmarthyāt"pratītiprasaṃgaḥ | ādi"śabdād aviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvapramāṇāntarāpravṛtyādiparigrahaḥ | "praṇetā" ācārya di ṅ nā gaḥ | "etā"viti buddhiśabdau | anyopohyateneneti vikalpākāra ucyate tadviṣayau | tathā bhinnākārābhirbuddhibhirekamvastu yadi viṣayīkriyeta |
tathaiva śabdena cābhidhīyeta | tadā bhinnaphalayoḥ śabdayorekatra dravye vṛttatvāt syāt sāmānādhikaraṇyametattu na sambhavati | tathā hi tacchabdavācyaṃ sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇādabhinnaṃ bhinnamvā syāt | tatrādye pakṣe | "ekatvād vasturūpa"sya "bhinnarū"pā sāmānyaviśeṣākārā bhinnā "matiḥ kutaḥ" || 136 ||

[263,1]

svalakṣaṇācca sāmānyasyāvyatireke | śāvaleyātmako bhedo yato bāhuleyātmakād bhedād vyāvarttate | bāhuleye śāvaleyātmakaṃ gotvamanvetītyekasyārthasyaikādhikaraṇāvanvayavyatirekau prāpnutaḥ | taccāyuktamityāha | "anvayavyatirekā"vityādi | "ekortho goca"ro viṣayo yayoranvayavyatirekayostau tathoktau |

[263,2]

"tadeka"mityādinā vyācaṣṭe | ekatvādevā"naṃśa"mekasyāṃśābhāvāt | ākriyata ityākāro buddhipratibhāsaḥ | tasya "bheda"stad"āśrayā"d bhedasya | vastunānātvasya |
yadi bhinnākārābhirbuddhibhirgṛhyeta bhinnaṃ syāt | na caivantasya cābhāvād vastunaḥ |
sāmānyaviśeṣobhayātmakatvād vastuna ekasyāpi bhinnākārabuddhigrāhyatvamiti cedāha | "tadātmanopī"tyādi | svalakṣaṇātmanasta"dekayogakṣematvāt" | svalakṣaṇenaikayogakṣematvāt tadvadevābhinnatvaṃ | "tadi"ti tasmā"dayaṃ" sāmānādhikaraṇyādirna syāditi sambandhaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anyonyārthaparihāreṇa" parasparārthaparihāreṇa bhinnapravṛttinimittatveneti yāvat | śabdayo"rekaviṣayayo"rekadravyādhārayo"rvṛttyasambhavā"t |

[263,3]

"anvaye"tyādi ślokabhāgaṃ "na ce"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | ya"daika" eva va"stvātmā" svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ ca tadā śāvaleyasvalakṣaṇasya gotvasāmānyātmakatvāt | "tatrai"va bāhuleye "vṛttiḥ" punaḥ svalakṣaṇātmakatvāt tatrai"vāvṛ"ttistasmin kāle prayuktā | sā"cāyuktā | vyāghātāt" | pramāṇabādhitatvāt | svalakṣaṇādabhinnatvā"nnaiva" sāmānya"manyatra vartta"te | tato naikasyaikatra vṛttyavṛttī iti cedāha | "na cet"yādi | "sāmānyasye"tyādi | tato naikasya vṛttyavṛttī ityabhiprāyaḥ |

[263,4]

"net"yā cā ryaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ sāṃ khyādidarśanena "bhedābhāvāt | tadi"tyādyasyaiva samarthanaṃ | "taddhi" vast"vekarūpame"kātmakaṃ sat | "sāmānyamvā bhaved viśeṣo ve"ti |
sāmānyād viśeṣasyāvyatirekāt sāmānyameva syāt | viśeṣa eva vā viśeṣādavyatirekāt sāmānyasya | na tvekaṃ dvirūpaṃ | yato "na hyasa"ti "rūpabhede'yaṃ pravibhāga"
iti sāmānyaṃ viśeṣa iti ca | sati vā pravibhāge sāmānyaviśeṣayo"ravyatireko na syādityuktaṃ prāk | tadi"ti tasmā"dayam"vastvātmā | "avibhāga" ityanaṃśaḥ |

[264,1]

yadi sāmānyameva tadānviyād vyaktyantaraṅgacchet | atha viśeṣātmaka eva |
tadā na vānviyāt | ekasya tu viruddhadharmadvayāsambhava iti yāvat | tadevāha | "na puna"rityādi |

[264,2]

"yopī"ti vai śe ṣi kādiḥ | dravyād "bhinnameva sāmān"yaṃ śabdavācyamāha | vyakteḥ sāmānyān"āmbhe"de'bhyupagamyamāne"'bhedavyavahārāḥ" sāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahārāḥ"syuranibandhanāḥ | yathāsva"miti | vīpsāyāmavyayībhāvaḥ | tathā hi nīlotpalādi"śabdā yathāsva"nnīlotpalādimparasparabhinnaṃ sāmānyamāhuḥ | yadāpi nīlaśabdo nīlaguṇābhi dhāyīṣyate tadāpi bhinnārthābhidhānamastyeva | "e"ko dharmī "artho" viṣayo yasyā"bu"ddhessā | "ekārthā" cāsau "buddhi"śceti karmadhārayaḥ pumvadbhāvaśca | asyā "āśrayāḥ"
kāraṇaṃ "kathaṃ syuḥ" | tataśca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāditi bhāvaḥ |

[264,3]

yadi nīlotpalādiśabdā viśeṣaṇadvayayuktaikadharmiviṣayāṃ buddhiṃ janayeyuḥ | tadaikārthapratipādanena syāt sāmānādhikaraṇyantacca nāsti | vyakterarthāntaraṃ sāmānyantadabhidhāyinaścānākṣepakāstadgatānāṃ bhedānāntadaparityāgena vṛttirākṣepaḥ na tathā |
kasmāt | "nirākāṃkṣatvāt" | yadā vṛkṣaśabdo vṛkṣatvamevābhidhatte | tadā tasya nirviśeṣaṇatvāt tāvataivāsau nirākāṃkṣa iti kathandhavādīnākṣipet | anākṣiptāśca kathaṃ vṛkṣaśabdārthasya bhedā dhavādayo'tadbhedatvācca kathaṃ vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśapeti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ | tadāha | "katha"mityādi | sāmānyaviśiṣṭasya dravyasyābhidhānānnayathokto doṣa iti cenna | uktottaratvāt | viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasyāpi dravyasyābhidhāne vastusāmarthyādekasmādapi śabdādakhilagateḥ śabdāntarasya tatrāpravṛttiḥ pravṛttau cāparyāyateti | tadevaṃ vastuśabdārthavādino na kathaṃcitsāmānādhikaraṇyādisambhavaḥ |

[265,1]

sāmānyamapi teṣāṃ na sambhavatītyuktaṃ | tathā hi yadā tāvatsvalakṣaṇādavyatiririktaṃ sāmānyantadā svalakṣaṇavad vyaktyantarānanugamādasāmānyaṃ | vyatirekepi kathamanyasya samānyamatiprasaṅgādityādi prāguktaṃ |

[265,2]

vyāvṛttivādinastvayamadoṣa ityāha | "sarvatre"tyādi | ete doṣā iti sāmānyasāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvādayaḥ | "yathā" hītyādi | "eko" gobhedaḥ śāvaleyasta"smāda"gosvabhāvād bhinnas"tathānyopi" bāhuleyādiḥ | ato vijātīyavyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvatra tulya iti "bhedasya" vijātīyabhinnasya svabhāvasya vikalpabuddhyā sarvatra svākārābhedenādhyastasyā"sāmānyadoṣo nāsti | pariśiṣṭābhāva" iti sāmānādhikaraṇyādyabhāvaḥ prāgevoktaḥ | "vicchedaṃ sūcayannekamapratikṣipya varttata"1 | 133 ityādinā |

[265,3]

evantāvad vijātīyavyāvṛttaṃ svabhāvaṃ sarvatra buddhyā svākārābhedenādhyastamekaṃ śabdābhidheyaṃ pratipādyādhunā'bhinnākāramantareṇāpyekakāryeṣu bhāveṣvekaḥ śabdo niyujyata ityāha | "api ce"tyādi | "tatkāryaparicodane" ekakāryatāparicodanārthaṃ |
yadvaikakāryāṇāṃ paricodanārthaṃ | "ekakāryeṣu bhede"ṣvekasya bhāvarahiteṣvapi "samā" ekā śrutiḥ | "kṛtā" saṃketitā | "vṛddhai"rvyavahārajñaiḥ | "tatkāryā"ṇāmbhedānāmatatkāryebhyo yā yāvṛttista"nnibandhanā" vijātīyavyāvṛttatayaikakāryeṣvekā śrutirnibadhyata ityarthaḥ || 138 ||

[265,4]

nanu yadi na sāmānye śabdaniveśaḥ svalakṣaṇe tarhi śabdaniveśaḥ syādanyasyābhāvāt | na ca svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdavācyaṃ |

[265,5]

naitadasti | yataḥ pratipādakastāvat trikālasthān bhāvān ekakāryāt saṃketakaraṇābhiprāyeṇa viṣayīkṛtya teṣveva saṃketaṃ karoti vyavahārakāle paricodanārthaṃ | tena yadyapi buddhiparivarttino bhāvāḥ sāmānyarūpāstathāpi teṣveva bahuṣu bahiriva parisphuratsvekaḥ śabdo niveśyate | na tu teṣu sarveṣu bhinnarūpe sāmānye sthite prativyakti bhinneva śrutiḥ kasmānna saṃketitetyāha | "gaurave"tyādi | "gauravād"sāmānyaṃ"aśaktervaiphalyā"cca "bhedākhyāyā" bhinnāyāḥ śruteḥ | yadvā bhedākhyāyā bhedakathanasya | etacca vṛttau spaṣṭayiṣyāmaḥ | "na bhāve" vastubhūte sāmānye samā śrutiḥ kṛtā | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ "svabhāvasya" svarūpasya "vyavasthite"rasāṃkaryāt |

[266,1]

"yadrūpaṃ śāvaleyasye"tyādinā vyavasthitasvabhāvatvamāha | tato nāvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ | vyatiriktamapi svasmin svabhāvevasthitaṃ tadapi kathaṃ vyaktīnāṃ samānaṃ rūpaṃ | na hyanyenānye samānā ityuktaṃ | sāsnādyākārapratyayasya hetavo'"tatkāryā"stebhyo "vyāvṛtti"rvyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvaḥ | "dvayo"riti śāvaleyabāhuleyayoḥ | tasmādatatkāryavyāvṛttirbhinnānāmapyaviruddheti | saivārthābhedaḥ śabdābhedasya kāraṇameṣṭavyaṃ yato"rthādabhedena vinā śabdābhedo na yujyate" | kathantarhi bahuṣvekā śrutirarthābheda eva pravṛtterityata āha | "tasmādi"tyādi | yāpīya"ntatkāryatai"kakārya"teṣṭā" yasyāḥ paricodanārthambahuṣvekā śrutirityuktaṃ sāpya"tatkāryādeva bhinnatā" draṣṭavyā | bahūnāmatatkāryādeva bhinnaḥ svabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ |

[266,2]

na tu tatkāryatā nāma sāmānyamasti | vināpi ca sāmānye yathā vilakṣaṇeṣvekaśabdaniveśo na viruddhastathā darśayannāha | "cakṣurādāvi"tyādi | rūpavijñānamekaṃ phalaṃ yasya cakṣurāderitivigrahaḥ | "kvaci"diti yasmin kāle vijñānajananasamarthāste codayitumiṣṭāḥ | athavā kvacit kāle sāṃketikīṃ śrutiṃ kuryāditi sambandhaḥ |
kimarthaṃ kuryādityāha | "aviśeṣeṇa" sāmānyena | "tatkāryasya" cakṣurvijñānaikakāryasya kāraṇakalāpasya parebhyaḥ prakāśana"sambhave sati" | yadā tu cakṣurādīnāmasādhāraṇakāryatvaṃ codyate | tadā naikā śrutisteṣu saṃketyata ityarthaḥ | "sakṛde"kakālaṃ "sarvasya"
kāraṇakalāpasya "pratītyarthaṃ | ṛtepī"tyādi | teṣāṃ cakṣurādīnā"ntadrūpasāmānya"syetyekakāryatvalakṣaṇasya sāmānyasya vyatiriktasyābhāvepītyarthaḥ | sattaivaṃ teṣāṃ sāmānyamiti cenna tasyā aviśeṣāt sarvadā sarvatra cakṣurvijñānaprasaṅgāt | "abhinnamarthamantare"ṇeti sāmānyamvastubhūtamvinā | "bahuṣu" śāvaleyādiṣu | "teṣāmi"ti śāvaleyādibhedānāṃ | yadi teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ syāttadā tatra sāmānye śabdaniveśāt sarvatra bhede niveśitaḥ syāt | ekantu sāmānyaṃ vinā bahuṣvekaśabdasanniveśo na yuktaḥ | tataścāsau śabdaḥ saṃketyamāna ekatraiva bhede saṃketitaḥ syāt | tathā "caikavṛttere"katra bhede kṛtasanniveśasyānyatra bhede vilakṣaṇe prat"yayājananāt" | dvitīyā govyaktistataḥ śabdād gaurityevaṃ na pratīyeta | tatra pratyāsattinibandhanasya sāmānyasyābhāvāt | svabhāvānugamābhāvepi śāvaleye niveśito'pratyāsanne bāhuleye pratyayaṃ janayiṣyatīti cedāha | "apratyāsattike" cetyādi | "atiprasaṅgāt" | gośabdādaśvepi pratītiḥ syāt | evantāvadekaṃ sāmānyaṃ vinā bahuṣvekaśabdaniveśābhāva uktaḥ |

[267,1]

abhyupagamya vaiphalyamāha | "teṣu ce"tyādi | tathā hi bahuṣvekā śrutirniveśyate'nekavṛttimekamarthaṃ pratipādayituṃ | tāneva vā bhedān asaṃkareṇa | tatrādyasyābhāvamāha | "ekārthaniyogābhāvā"diti | yadyekasminnarthe śabdasya niyogaḥ syāt tadā bhavedekārthapratipādanaṃ | dvitīyābhāvamāha | "bhinne"tyādi | "bhinnasvabhāvānā"masaṃkīrṇṇānāṃ śāvaleyādīnāṃ pratipattaya ityadhyāhāraḥ | "pṛtha"gityekaikasmin bhede | ekasya śabdasya"niyoge" | saṃkete kṛte | paścād vyavahārakāle | "yathācoditānā"mityasaṃkareṇa pratipattyarthaṃ coditānāṃ "vibhāgāparijñānāt" tasmānna teṣu śabdaniyogaḥ phalavān |
evaṃ hi svalakṣaṇeṣu pṛthak pṛthakchabdaniyogaḥ phalavānbhavati |

[267,2]

yadi tasmācchabdādasaṃkareṇa svalakṣaṇāni pratīyeranniti | kriyate ca bahuṣvekaśabdaniyogastasmād vastubhūtena sāmānyena bhāvyamityabhiprāyaḥ |

[267,3]

"tasyāpī"tyā cā ryaḥ | ekamvastu sāmānyamastītyeva kṛtvāntareṇāpi prayojanaṃ | "lokena śabdo niveśanīya" ityeko vikalpaḥ | dvitīyamāha | "tadve"tyādi | taditisāmānyaṃ "vastuśaktyaive"ti | puruṣavyāpāramanapekṣya | ekāṃ "śrutiṃ" dhvanaya"tyutthāpayati |
nāstyeva tad" dvayamapi | antareṇa prayojanaṃ puruṣavyāpārañca prayogābhāvāt | tadeva"kintarhī"tyādināha | kenacitprayojananeti | ebhyaḥ śabdebhyo vyavahāre | tadatatsādhanamarthaṃ jñātvā pratipadyeteti | anena prathamavikalpābhāvamāha |

[268,1]

nirdeśyanta ityanena dvitīyasya | nirdeśyante saṃketyante vyavaharttukāmairityadhyāhāraḥ | "tatrai"tasmin nyāye'"nekaṃ" kāraṇa"mekatra" kārye "upayujyeta" vyāpriyeta | "tadi"tyanekaṃ |
kutaḥ kāraṇakalāpāt tadutpadyata ityeva | "tatrai"tasmin kārye vyavaharttukāmai"ravaśyanta"ccānekaṅkāraṇamatatkāryavyāvṛttilakṣaṇamekakāryatāmāśrityai"kenaiva śabdena codayituṃ yuktaṃ" | anekena codane doṣamāha | "tasyetyā"di | "pṛthak pṛtha"giti bhinnaiḥ śabdaiḥ |
etacca svalakṣaṇaśabdaniveśamabhyupagamyoktam |

[268,2]

etadeva na sambhavatītyāha | "na ce"tyādi | "asya" vastunaḥ | "ananyasādhāraṇaṃ rūpami"ti | nānyasādhāraṇamananyasādhāraṇaṃ svalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ | "nāpyasye"tyanekaśabdaniveśanasya |

[268,3]

"etacca gauravāśaktivaiphalyādi"tyasya yathākramaṃ vivaraṇaṃ | kasmād vaiphalyamiti cedāha | "kevaṃla"mityādi | "anena" prayoktrā tatraitasmin kārye | "terthāḥ" kāraṇabhūtā"ścodanīyā" ityetāvat prayojanaṃ | "te" tu kāraṇabhūtāḥ padārthā "ekena vā śabdena codyeran bahubhirveti svātantryamatra" codane "vaktuḥ" | yata evantaditi tasmā"diyamekā śrutirbahuṣu"
vācyeṣu "vakturabhiprāya"vaśād hetoḥ "pravarttamānā nopa" śakyā pravarttayitumiti cedāha | "na ceya"mityādi | iyamekā śrutiḥ | "aśakyaṃ pra"varttanamayasyā iti vigrahaḥ | kasmānnāśakyapravarttanetyāha | icchādhīnatvād icchāyā | adhīnamaśakyapravarttanaṃ | "yadi hyekatrāpī"tyādi | tathā hīcchayaiva tatra paraparikalpite sāmānye na vastusthityaiva ekasyāḥ śruteḥ pravattiḥ | kintarhivakturicchāvaśāt | tathā "na" yadi "prayokturicchā bhavet | katha"miyamekā śrutirekatrāpi"pravartteta" | naivetyabhiprāyaḥ | tathaikatrāpi pravarttayitumicchaiva kāraṇaṃ | na vastuśakti | tadā "bahuṣvapi" na kaścid "vyāghāta" ityāha | "icchāyāṃ" vetyādi | eka trāpi pravarttayitumicchāyāṃ kāraṇatvena kalpyamānāyāṃ | enāmekāṃ śrutiṃ | "prayojanābhāvādityādi" | na hyekamvastuvinā "bahuṣve"kaśabdaniveśanaṃ phalavat | "uktaṃ prāk" |
kimuktamityāha | "bhinneṣvi"tyādi | "bhinneṣu" śāvaleyādibhedeṣ"vekasmād" gośabdāt pratītira"tatprayojanebhyo bhedena" | tadgobhedasādhyaṃ vāhadohādikaṃ kāryaṃ prayojanaṃ na bhavati yeṣāmaśvādīnāntebhyo bhedeneti | kiṃ punarvastubhūtamevaikatvaṃ na codyata ityata āha | "na punaḥ svabhāvasyaikatvānna" punarvastubhūtasya sāmānyasyaikatvād bhinneṣvekā śrutiḥ | tasyaiva sāmānyavyatiriktasyāvyatiriktasya cāyogāt || 139 ||

[269,1]

bhavatu nāma sāmānyaṃ vyatiriktantadapi tasmin svabhāve vyavasthitamamiśrameva |
tadevāha | "yathāsvami"tyādi | yasya yallakṣaṇantena "vyavasthitasvabhāvānāmanyonyarūpāsaṃśleṣāt kathamekanimittaḥ" sāmānyanibandhanaḥ "śabdo bhinneṣu bhavet" | naivetyabhiprāyaḥ | na hyanyenānye samānā bhavanti | etaccoktaṃ prāk | "sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāvena svasvabhāvavyavasthi"terityatra 1 | 42 prastāve |

[269,2]

anyāpohavādinastvayamadoṣa ityāha | "atatprayojanetyā"di | atatprayojanebhyo"vyāvṛttistu bhinnānāmapyaviruddheti" kṛtvā sa "e"vātatprayojanebhyo bhedasta"tprayojanā"nāma"bheda"stadvyāvṛtteḥ sarvatra bhāvāt | "śabdābhedasya kāraṇambhavatu" | yataśca na kathaṃcid vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ ghaṭate | "teneme" gobhedāstat"prayojanā" vāhadohaprayojanā iti yaduktantat | atat"prayojanebhyo"'śvādibhyo "bhinnā evoktāḥ" || 140 ||

[269,3]

"na punareṣāmanyā tatkāryatānya"trānyato bhedāt | anyavyāvṛtta eva svabhāvaeṣāmabheda iti yāvat | etena "tatkāryatā"pītyādi kā ri kā bhāgo vyākhyātaḥ || 141 ||

[270,1]

"yathe"tyādinā cakṣurādau yathā rūpavijñānaikaphala ityādi vyācaṣṭe | "ātmendriya"rṣeṣviti paraprasiddhyoktaṃ | "rūpavijñānamekaṃ kārya" yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ || 142 || tadrūpavijñānaṃ kāryaṃ yeṣāntāni tatkāryāṇi teṣāṃ "sāmānyamaviśeṣeṇaikakārya"karaṇasāmarthyantasya "codanā" prakāśanā | tasyāḥ "sambhave" sati | kena punaḥ prastāvena codanāsambhava ityāha | "kuto rūpavijñā"namityaviśeṣeṇa sāmagrīgate praśne satītyarthaḥ | "vyavahāralāghavārtha"mekena śabdena bahūnāṃ pratipādanārthaṃ "rūpavijñāna"sya hetuścakṣurādikalāpaḥ saraḥ śaro "vetyevaṃ śrutinniveśayedi"ti sambandhaḥ |

[270,2]

"api nāme"tyādinā vyavahāralāghavameva vyācaṣṭe | "taddhetūnāṃ cakṣurvijñāna"hetūnāṃ | "na cātreti" cakṣurādau | yenā"nugāminā rūpe"ṇaikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ janayanti |
tathābhūtaṃ sāmānyañcakṣurādīnānnāsti | sattā vidyata iti cet | tasyāstarhi sarvatrāviśeṣāt sarvatra cakṣurādivijñānaṃ syāt | na ca sambandhibhedāt sattāyā bhedo nityatvenānādheyātiśayatvāt | kevalantadarthatayā rūpavijñānaikakāryatayā bhāvāścakṣurādayaḥ | "atadarthebhyo" rūpavijñānājanakebhyo "bhinnā" iti kṛtvā bheda "evātatkāryebhyo vyāvṛ"ttireva | eṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmabhedaḥ sarveṣāmatatkāryavyāvṛttestulyatvāt | yathā cakṣurādīnāmabhedaḥ sarveṣāmatatkāryavyāvṛttestulyatvāt | yathā cakṣūrūpādiṣvekaṃ sāmānyaṃ vināpyekakāryatvakhyāpanāyaikaḥ śabdo niveśyate | evaṃjātīyāḥ sarva ityādi | samūhasya santānasyāvasthāviśeṣasya ca vācakāḥ śabdāḥ "samūhasantānāvasthāviśeṣaśabdāḥ" | tatra samūhābhidhāyinaṃ śabdamadhikṛtyāha | "ye samastā"
ityādi | "ye" rūparasagandhādayassamastāḥ "kiñci"dekamudakādyāharaṇādi "kāryaṃ | teṣāṃ"
rūpādīnāṃ | "tatra" kārye kāraṇatayā "viśeṣābhāvāt" | sarveṣāṃ hyekaṃ kāryamiti kṛtvā tenaikakāryatvena viśeṣābhāva ucyate | na tu svalakṣaṇasyāviśeṣāt |

[270,3]

teṣāmekakāryakaraṇaśaktikhyāpanamātre karttavye'"pārthikā viśeṣacodanā" | pratirūpādibhinnena śabdena codanāniṣphaleti kṛtvā "sakṛde"kakālaṃ "sarveṣāṃ" kvacit kārye niyojanārthaṃ rūpādiviśeṣeṣūdakadhāraṇādikāryasameṣu "ghaṭa ityekaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṃkte"'yaṃ "loka"
iti vyavaharttā || 143 ||

[271,1]

nanu bhinnā eva rūpādayaḥ kathamekasmād ghaṭaśabdād abhedena pratīyanta iti cadāha | "tepī"tyādi | sajātīyād rūpāda"nyataśca" rasāde"rbhedāviśeṣepi | tatprayonāṅgatayā" | viśiṣṭodakādyāharaṇakāryāṅgatayā | "tadanyebhya" iti tatkāryakaraṇāsamarthebhyaḥ paṭādibhyo "bhidyanta iti" bheda evaiṣāmabhedastato'"bhedāt" | tasmādabhedāda"viśeṣeṇaiva" sāmānyenaivaikasmād ghaṭaśabdāt sarve rūpādayaḥ "pratīyante" |

[271,2]

yadi rūpādaya eva kevalā ghaṭo na tu tadvyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ | kathantarhi ghaṭasya rūpādaya iti vyatireka iti cedāha | "tatre"tyādi | "ghaṭasya rūpādaya ityapi" yo vyatirekastasyāyamartho "ghaṭasvabhāvā rūpādayo" na paṭādisvabhāvā iti |

[271,3]

etadeva vyācaṣṭe | "udake"tyādi | "udakāhāraṇas"ya viśeṣo ghaṭādanyenāsādhyatvaṃ | ādiśabdādanyasyāpi ghaṭasādhyasya "kārya"sya parigrahaḥ | tasmin "kārye samarthāḥ" saptamīti yogavibhāgātsamāsaḥ | ayamatrārthaḥ | rūpādiśabdā rūpādīn rūpasādhyakāryamātraśaktiyuktānaviśeṣeṇa pratipādayanti | ghaṭaśabdastu viśiṣṭakāryaśaktiyogena paṭādisvabhāvebhyopi rūpādibhyo bhedena viśiṣṭān rūpādīnāha | ato ghaṭasya rūpādaya iti śabdadvayavyāpāreṇa sāmānyaviśeṣākārabuddhyutpatteḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo vyatirekavimatiśca prayujyata iti | etameva "sāmānye"tyādināha | "sāmānyakāryaṃ" rūpādimātrasādhyantasya siddhiḥ "sādhanantasmin prasiddhenātmanā" svabhāvena | itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇā tṛtīyā | hetau vā | itthaṃbhūtena rūpeṇa hetunā vā "rūpādiśabdaiḥ" karaṇabhūtaiḥ "pra"siddhāssantaḥ"viśiṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ" ghaṭasādhyaṃ ghaṭasādhyamevodakāharaṇādi | tasya "sādhanaṃ" sādhyateneneti kṛtvā | tathābhūtā "ākhyā" saṃjñā "yasya" sa tathā tena viśiṣṭāḥ | ta iti rūpādaya "evamucya"nta iti |

[271,4]

"na punaratra" rūpādisaṃhatau hyatra vā ghaṭa iti vyavahāre "yathāvarṇṇitalakṣaṇami"tirūpādivyatiri"ktandravyaṃ" | tasyāvayavinastādṛśasyeti rūpādivyatiriktasya | upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaścāvayavī parairiṣṭo dārśanaṃ spārśanaṃ dravyamiti vacanāt | tenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvenābhyupagatasya rūpādivyatirekeṇānupalambhāditi vākyārthaḥ |
yathāvāntareṇāpyavayavinaṃ paramāṇava eva pratyakṣasya viṣayastathā dvitīye paricchede pratipādayiṣyate |

[272,1]

yadi rūpādaya eva saṃhatā ghaṭaḥ kathantarhi bahuṣu ghaṭa ityekavacanamiti cedāha | "ekavacanami"tyādi | yathā bahuṣvekaḥ śabda ekaśaktisūcanārthastathaikavacanamapi | teṣāṃ rūpādīnā"meka"sminnudakāharaṇakārye yā śaktistasyāḥ sūcanārtha | ekakāryakarttṛtvena teṣvekatvamāropyaikavacanamityarthaḥ | na punasteṣvekā śaktirvidyate | anapekṣitavāhyāryamakavacanaṃ "saṃketaparatantramvā" | etacca "yeṣāṃ vastuvaśā vāca(#pava.3.64)"1 | 66 ityādinā pratipāditaṃ | santānābhidhāyinaḥ śabdānadhikṛtyāha | "tathe"tyādi | "hetuśca phalaṃ ca"
hetuphale | tayo"rviśeṣa" upādānopādeyabhāvenaikasantāna......nāśrayatvaṃ | "tambhūtāḥ"
prāptāḥ prāptivacano bhavatiḥ sakarmakaḥ | sādhanaṃ kṛteti dvitīyātatpuruṣaḥ | "hetuphala"śeṣo vā bhūto niṣpanno yeṣāmiti bahavrīhiḥ | āhitāderākṛtigaṇatvād bhūtaśabdasya paranipātaḥ | "kiṃcidekaṃ sādhayantīti" | yathāṃkuranāḍapatrādayaḥ phalamekaṃ | "sādhyante cai"kena | yathā ta evopādānabhūtena bījena | tepyakurādayo naikakṣaṇātmakāḥ"sakṛtpratītyarthaḥ" | tenaikakāryatvenaikakāraṇatvena vā sāmyena "brīhyādiśabdaiḥ"
santānābhidhāyibhiḥ "kṛtasaṃketāḥ" saṃketakāle | paścād vyavahārakāle kathyante vyavahāralāghavārthaṃ | abhedena prabandhajijñāsāyāṃ bījāṃkurādibhedenānekaśabdaprayogasya vaiphalyāt | ādigrahaṇena manuṣyādiśabdagrahaṇaṃ | tairapi bālakumārādibhedabhinnasya prabandhasyābhidhānāt |

[272,2]

nanu brīhyādiśabdā api samudāyaśabdā eva rūpādisamudāyābhidhāyitvāt |

[272,3]

satyaṃ | kintu hetuphalaviśeṣaphalaprabandhābhidhānādevamucyate | tathā samudāyaśabdonekasamudāyāpekṣayā jātiśabdo bhavatyevamavasthāśabdopi | kevalaṃ viśiṣṭārthavivakṣayā kaścicchabda ityucyata ityadoṣaḥ | yathā ca ghaṭasya rūpādayaḥ ghaṭa iti caikavacanaṃ yena nibandhanenoktaṃ | tathā brīhe rūpādayo brīhiriti naikavacanaṃ draṣṭavyamata evāha | "pūrvavadvā"cyamiti | avasthāśabdānadhikṛtyāha | "yepī"tyādi | yepi nīlādiparamāṇavaḥ "pṛthagi"ti nīlapītādayaḥ parasparānapekṣāḥ "samastā" veti parasparasahitāḥ | "kvacidi"ti cakṣurvijñāne svadeśe parasyotpattipratibandhe vā "sakṛdeva pratyāyanārthaṃ" |
ekasmācchabdād bahūnāṃ niścayārthaṃ | tatra ye cakṣurvijñāne "upayujyante | tevasthāviśeṣavācinaḥ sanidarśanā" ityucyante | ye svadeśe parasyotpattiṃ pratighnanti |
te "sapratighā" iti |

[273,1]

nanu nīlapītādayo'tyantabhinnāste kathamekena sanidarśanādiśabdenocyanta ityata āha |

[273,2]

"tadanyebhyo bhedasāmānyene"ti | tadanyebhyo'nidarśanāpratighebhyo yo bhedasya eva teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ sarveṣāntato vyāvṛttatvāt | tena hetunā | sanidarśanādiśabdā api paramāṇusamudayā'bhidhānāt samudāyaśabdā eveti cet | na | ekasyāpi paramāṇoḥ sapratighādiśabdairabhidhānāt |

[273,3]

kāryadvāreṇa śabdapravṛttimuktvā kāraṇadvāreṇāha | "yathaikakāryā" rūpādayasta"tkāryacodanāyāṃ" | tadudakadhāraṇādyekaṃ kāryaṃ yasya rūpādisāmarthyasya tasya codanāyāmekaśakticodanāyāmityarthaḥ | "tadanyasmāt ghaṭāderbhedena" ghaṭādiśabdaiḥ | ādigrahaṇād brīhyādiparigrahaḥ | "kṛtasamayāḥ" khyāpyanta iti prakṛtaṃ | "tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā"pyane"korthaḥ ekena" śabdena kṛtasamayaḥ khyāpyata iti vacanapariṇāmena sambandhaḥ "vyavahārārthameva" lāghavenetyarthād draṣṭavyaṃ | "yathā śavalāyā" gorapatyāni sarvāṇyevaikakāraṇatvena śāvaleyaśabdenocyante "bahulāyāścāpatyāni" bāhuleyaśabdena | yāvāṃśca puruṣaprayatnena kāraṇena janitaḥ śabdaḥ sarvaḥ samānakāraṇajanyatvena "prayatnānantarīyakaḥ" kathyate |
kariṣyāmīti cetanā prayatnaḥ | tasyānantaramavyavadhānantatra bhava iti grahāderākṛtigaṇatvācchaḥ | deśagrahaṇantatra na smaryate | tasya svārthikaḥ kan | etacca kāraṇaviśeṣāpekṣayoktaṃ |

[273,4]

kāraṇamātrāśrayeṇāha | "kṛtako" veti | kāraṇāyattajanmanaḥ prayatnānantarīyakasyānyasya ca sarvasya kṛtaka ityabhidhānāt |

[273,5]

evantāvadvidhimukhenoktaṃ |

[274,1]

pratiṣedhamukhenāha | "tathe"tyādi | tasya cākṣuṣasya nīlāderyat kāryañcakṣurvijñānantasya "pratiṣedhenācākṣuṣaḥ śabdaḥ" | na samarthañcakṣurvijñānaṃ pratītyevamacākṣuṣaśabdena sāmānyenocyate | anityaśabdopi nityavyavacchedena vyavasthāpyamānaḥ | tatkāryapratiṣedhenaiva | tathā hi nityaṃ parairvastveveṣṭantaccāsādhyasādhanabhūtaṃ vyavahārapathaṃ nāvataratīti sādhyasādhanaṃ cāṅgīkartavyaṃ | nityakāryapratiṣedhenānityaḥ | ātmaśabdopi kvacit kārye svatantrasya khyāpanāya kṛta ityanātmaśabdo'tatkāryavyavacchedena syāt |

[274,2]

evaṃ kāryapratiṣedhenābhidhāya kāraṇapratiṣedhenāha | "tadi"tyādi | tasya sasvāmikasyāśūnyasya ca ya"tkāraṇa"ntasya "pratiṣedhe"nāyaṃ śabdādiko bhāvo"svāmikaḥ śūnya iti" vyavahārārthaṃ khyāpyata iti sambandhaḥ | tathā hi svatantreṇātmādinā yodhiṣṭhitassa sasvāmikaḥ parairiṣyate | evamaśūnyopi tathābhūtenādhiṣṭhātrādhiṣṭhitatvādevādhiṣṭhitā cādhiṣṭhātavyasvī"karaṇamanya"thādhiṣṭhātṛtvāyogāt | tasmāt sasvāmikādiśabdāḥ kāraṇadvārapravṛttāḥ pareṣāṃ | na pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu sāmagrīmātrapratibaddheṣu vyavasthitasvabhāvaḥ kaścidadhiṣṭhātāsti yatpratibaddhāssaṃskārāḥ pravarttante |
tatosvāmikāḥ śūnyāśca yathoktakāraṇapratiṣedhena vyavasthāpyanta iti | evamanyadapīti | duḥkhāśūnyānāthāpratiśaraṇādikamapi | "yathāyoga"miti kiṃcitkāryapratiṣedhena kiṃcitkāraṇapratiṣedhenetyarthaḥ | duḥkhāśūnyādikāryapratiṣedhena sukhaśūnyādīnāmaprātikūlyakāryatvena vyavasthāpyamānatvāt | sarvasya ca saṃskṛtasya vipariṇāmadharmitvena pratikūlatvāt | "anāthāpratiśara"ṇādi | kāryapratiṣedhena svatantrasya nāthāderabhāvāt |
tadevaṃ kāryakāraṇayorvidhipratiṣedhamukhena catuṣṭayī śabdānāmpravṛttirākhyātā bhavati |

[274,3]

nanu cāśūnyanityādervyavacchedyasyābhāvāt kathaṃ śūnyādiśabdeṣvanyavyavacchedābhidhānamiti cedāha | "śūnye"tyādi | "yathākathita"miti yasya yādṛśī siddhāntāśrayaṇakalpanā tayā "samīhito" racito śūnyanityādīnāṃ ya "ākā"rastaṃ "vikalpya" buddhāvāropya"tadvyavacchedena" paraparikalpitā'śūnyādyākāravyavacchedena śūnyādivyapadeśaḥ kriyate |
kasmādityāha | "buddhī"tyādi | buddhessamīhā imamarthamāropayāmīti saṃkalpaḥ | tathā sarvvaṃ... sāṃkaryaṃ yasya śabdasya sa tathā tadbhāvastasmāt | sarvagrahaṇādetadāha | "yatrāpi" vastubhūte......īti |

[274,4]

etaduktambhavati | na vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ śabdaiḥ svarūpeṇa vidhīyate'panīyate vā | kevalaṃ vikalpabuddhisandarśita eva sarvo vidhipratiṣedhavyavahāraḥ | tataścānityādiśabdeṣvanityādipratipakṣo nityādirvyavacchedyo nāstītya"pratipakṣadoṣa"stasyo"pakṣepa"
udbhāvanaṃ | ādiśabdānnāstyātmeti pratiṣedhe cāpratiṣedhadoṣa ityevamādyupakṣepaśca | "durmatīnāmu" dyo ta ka ra prabhṛtīnāṃ "vispanditāni" vijṛmbhitānyasambaddhānīti yāvat |
na hi nyāyānugatabuddhirasambaddhamudbhāvayet | ataśca te doṣopakṣepā "upekṣaṇīyā"
nāvadhānārhā ityarthaḥ |

[275,1]

"athe"tyādi paraḥ | apiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ | "eka"sya vastunaḥ sāmānyasya "vṛtte"rapi kāraṇādaneko vyaktibhedaḥ | ekā śruti"rekaśrutiḥ" | sā cādhikā asyā"neka"syāstīt"yekaśrutimān" | ekaśabdavācyo "yadi bhavedi"tyarthaḥ | ekakāryatvenaikaḥ śabdabahuṣvekena vā sāmānyeneti na kaścid viśeṣa iti manyate | ata eva vyācaṣṭe | na"kevalami"tyādi | "tadanyasmā"datatkāryādyo bhedassa eva sarveṣāṃ tatkāryāṇāma"viśeṣastasmādekaśabdenocyante | api tvekavṛttyāp"yekasya sāmānyasya varttanenā"pyanekaḥ padārtha"
ekaśabdenoc"yeta ko virodhaḥ syāt" | yathaikakāryatvena bahuṣvekaśabdapravṛttau nāsti virodhastathā vastubhūtenāpi sāmānyena | tasmād vastubhūtasāmānyakalpanāpi yuktaiveti bhāvaḥ |

[275,2]

"ukta"mityā cā ryaḥ | tasya vastubhūtasya sāmānyasya "upalabhyate" rūpeṇā"bhimataṃ" |
abhimatatve upalabhyatvaṃ karaṇatvena vivakṣitamiti karttṛkaraṇe kṛtetyeva samāsaḥ |
upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya vyaktivyatireke"ṇānupalabdherabhāvaḥ" sāmānyasyeti vākyārthaḥ | "anupalabhyamānatāyāmvā"'ṅgīkriyamāṇāyā"ntaddarśanāśrayā" iti sāmānyadarśanāśrayā"vyapadeśapratyabhijñānādayo na bhaveyu"riti | "ukta"miti sambandhaḥ | bahuṣvekaśabdo vyapadeśastulyākāraṃ jñānaṃ pra tya bhi jñā naṃ | "ādi"śabdāt sāmānyāśrayā vyaktau pravṛttirna bhavedityādeḥ parigrahaḥ |

[275,3]

na hi svayamanupalabhyamānamupalambhanibandhanaṃ vyapadeśapratyabhijñānamanyatra pravarttayati | na bhaveyurityādīnyanena cādiśabdenānyasyāpi pūrvoktasya doṣasya grahaṇaṃ | "na hyanye"nānye samānānāmatadvanto nāma syuḥ | tathā na jātirvāhadohādāvupayujyata ityādi | anenaitadāha | jātikalpanāyāmbādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti | tato na tannibandhano vyapadeśādiḥ | ekakāryatve tu virodhābhāvāt tatkṛtameva vyapadeśapratyabhijñānādikaṃ yuktamiti | dūṣaṇāntaramapyāha | "api ce"tyādi | vastubhūte sāmānyamicchatā svāśraye naikasmiṃstasya pravṛttireṣṭavyā | na hi tatrāvarttamānamāśraye vyapadeśādikāraṇaṃ yuktaṃ | sā ca sāmānyasya svāśraye "pravṛttirādheyatā" vā bhavet | tadbalenāvasthānāt | āśrayabalenopalabdhi"rvyaktiḥ" sā vā vṛttirbhavet | etad dvayamapi "tasminsā"mānye na "yujyate" || (144–45) ||

[276,1]

"yadetadi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yadetadekami"ti vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyama"nekatrāśraye" varttamāna"mekāṃ śrutiṃ varttaya"ti | tasya sāmānyasya svāśraye "keyaṃ vṛttiri"ti praśnayitvā svayameva vikalpadvayamāha | "ādheyatā ce"tyādi | athavā kiṃśabdaḥ pratikṣepe | "keyaṃ vṛttirna" kācidityarthaḥ | tathā hi vṛtteḥ svā"śraye" ādheyatā vā "syāt | yathā kuṇḍe" ādhāre "badarāṇi varttanta" iti | vyaktirvā tasya sāmānyasyā"śraye" vṛttiḥ "syāt"
tairāśrayairvyakteḥ prakāśanāt | tatra yadyādheyatā vṛttiriṣyate | tadā vyaktayastadādhāratvenaiṣṭavyāḥ | nityaṃ ca sāmānyamabhyupagataṃ vyaktyutpatteḥ pūrvvantadanādheyantato"nityasyā"śrayai"ranupakāryatvā"ddhetorāśrayābhimatā vyaktayo "nādhāraḥ" |

[276,2]

"nityaṃ" hītyādinā vyācaṣṭe | atha nityaṃ neṣyate tadāpya"nityatve'parāparotpatte"ranyasyānyasyotpatteranekaṃ sāmānyama"nekatvāt" kāraṇād "bhedeṣvi"va bhedavat tasmin sāmānye "ekapratyayāyogā"dekasya jñānasyāyogāt kāraṇāt | "nityaṃ sāmānyamiṣyata"
ityanena sambandhaḥ | "nityasya ca" sāmānyasya "kiṃkurvāṇa āśraya ādhāraḥ syānnaive"tyabhiprāyaḥ |

[277,1]

nopakārakatvādādhāraḥ kintu "tasya" sāmānyasya tatrāśraye "samavāyāt" |
yadā ho dyo ta ka raḥ | "kathaṃ tarhi gotvaṃ goṣu pravarttate | āśrayāśrayibhāvena | kaḥ punarāśrayāśrayibhāvaḥ samavāyaḥ | tatra vṛttimad gotvaṃ | vṛttiḥ samavāya iha pratyayahetutvāditi | " upakāryopakārakatvābhāve samavāyamasambhāvayannāha | "koyami"tyādi |

[277,2]

"apṛthagi"tyādi paraḥ | abhinnadeśatvena siddhā "apṛthaksiddhāḥ" | teṣāṃ yoyamā"śrayāśrayibhā"vassamavāyaḥ |

[277,3]

"tadi"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | "tadevedamāśrayatvamanupakārakasyāśrayasya na sambhāva"yāmaḥ | kasmād | "atiprasaṅgāt" | yadyanupakārakasyāśrayatvamiṣyate | tadā sarvaḥ sarvasyāśrayaḥ syāt | na bhavati | sarvasya sarvāsamavetatayā pratīteriti cet | nanūpakārakābhāve gotvavat sarvasyaiva sarvasamavetatvenaikasmānna pratītirbhavatītīdameva codyate |

[277,5]

ucyate | satyaṃ | kevalaṃ kvacit samavetasya samavāyo bhavati | tatsamavetatvaṃ ca tadāyattatayā | tadāyattatvañcārthāntarasya tadutpattireva | tenoparyuparibhāvenotpattireveha buddhernibandhananna samavāya ityarthāpattikṣayaḥ | uparyuparibhāve... i...syāt | nāpyasamavetānāṃ samavāyosti yena samavetatvaṃ syāt sarveṣāṃ sarvatra samavetatvaprasaṅgāt |

[277,6]

upasaṃharannāha | "tasmā"dityādi | apṛthaksiddhayoḥ samavāyo yathārabhyārambhakayordravyayoḥ pṛthaksiddhānāṃ saṃyogaḥ | yathāgnidhūmayorekasminnarthe samavāya "ekārthasamavāyaḥ" | yathā rūparasayorekasmin dravye | "ādi"śabdāta saṃyuktasamavetasya parigrahaḥ | vastubhūtāḥ sambandhā vastūnāṃ vā sambandhā iti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāso vā | vastugrahaṇaṃ kalpanākṛtanivṛttyarthaṃ | "kāryakāraṇabhāvānna vyatiricyante" na vathābhavanti | etadeva sādhayannāha | "paraspara"mityādi | "paraspara"manyonyamupakāriṇā"manyato" vā'śrayābhimatā"danupakāriṇāmapratibandhā"danāyattatvāt | "apratibadhannasya cāsambandhā"t kāraṇāt sarvavastusambandhāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvānna vyatiricyanta iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ |

[278,1]

nanu cāśrayāt satyupakāre āśritayoḥ parasparamupakāryopakārakabhāvo naivāstīti kimarthamanyato vetyasyopanyāsaḥ |

[278,2]

satyametat | kintu "yadyapi" sākṣā"danyonyaṃ nopakā"rastathāpyekakāraṇāyattatayā pāramparyeṇāpi sambandhaṃ kalpayedityupanyāsaḥ | "ekārthasamavāyinaḥ" parasparamupakāryopakārakabhāvo naiveṣyata iti cedāha | "yadyapī"tyādi | tata ekasmādāśrayādupakārasyā"bhāve yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgāt" | atiprasaṅgabhayādityukto doṣaḥ yataśca svāśrayāde"kārthasamavāyino"ravaśyamupakāro'taḥ svāśrayakṛtaḥ samavāyinoryaḥ "svopakāra" ātmopakārastena "dvāreṇa paramapi" dvitīyamapi samavāyinaṃ "saṃghaṭayya" pratipādayitrā "khyāpyate"
samavāyināviha sambaddhāviti |

[278,3]

etaduktambhavati | yathā parasyaikārthasamavāyinoḥ parasparāsambaddhepyekārthasamavāyāt sambandhastathāsmākamekakāryatvena tayoḥ "sambandhaḥ" | yata evanta"smāt tatrāpye"kārthasamavāyini "kāryakāraṇabhāvakṛta evā"śrayeṇa saha yaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvastatkṛta"eva" yaddvāreṇāropita eva sambandhaḥ | yasmādupakāradvāreṇaivādhārādibhāvaḥ | "tasmādayamāśrayaḥ" śāvaleyādiḥ | "svātmani" sāmānyasvabhāve"nupakurvāṇaḥ" sāmānya"syānapekṣasyādhāra iti yā ci ta ka ma ṇḍa na me tat" | maṇḍanamalaṅkāro maṇḍyateneneti kṛtvā | tasya yācitakaśabdena karmadhārayaḥ | kasmāt parasmād yācitakammaṇḍanandaridrasyātmanyavidyamānaṃ | tadvat sāmānyāśrayasyāpi sāmānyaṃ pratyādhāratvaṃ |
bhāvasādhano vā tṛtīyāsamāsaśca | yathā yācitakenālaṅkāreṇa maṇḍanakriyā |
tathā sāmānyāśrayasya parasmāt prārthitenādhārabhāvenādhāravyapadeśo na vastusthityā tata upakārābhāvāditi |

[278,4]

<1>"kathami"tyādiparaḥ | na hi "kuṇḍaṃ badarāṇāṃ janakaṃ" | teṣāṃ svahetorevaniṣpatteḥ | tataśca yaduktaṃ "sarvatra vastusambandhāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvānna vyatiricyanta" iti tadanekāntikamiti manyate | "pravisarppato" deśāntaravisarppaṇaśīlasya badarādestaddeśajananamupādānabhūtasya pūrvakasya badaralakṣaṇasya yo deśaḥ kuṇḍasambaddhastasminneva "deśe jana"namanyatrāgamanāt | iyaṃ "śaktiḥ kuṇḍāde"rādhārābhimatasya"badarādi"ṣvādheyeṣu |

[279,1]

"prakṛtyeve"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "prakṛ"tyā svabhāvenaivāsamāno "deśe" yasya tattathoktaṃ |
prakṛtiśabdamapekṣamāṇasyāpi gamakatvād bahubrīhiḥ | tathābhūtaṃ ca tatkāryaṃ ceti karmadhārayaḥ | kāryaṃ ca "badarādi"kamevottarottarakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ | tasyo"tpāda"naṃ tadeva dharmaḥ svabhāvo yasya "guruṇo dravya"sya badarādeḥ pūrvakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītasya | "samānadeśakāryotpādanabhāva ādhārakṛtaḥ" | ātmanā tulyadeśasyotpādakatvamādhārakṛtamityarthaḥ | yata eva"ntasmāt" pāścātyasya badarakāryasya yaḥ "pūrvakṣaṇaḥ" upādānabhūtasta"sya sahakāri kuṇḍaṃ |
tatrai"vopādānakṣaṇadeśa eva "badarakārya janayat" kuṇḍa"mādhā"ra ityucyate |

[279,2]

anena caikasāmagryadhīnayoḥ kuṇḍabadarakṣaṇayorādhārādheyabhāva ityuktambhavati | "anya"thā yadi "kuṇ"ḍena "badarā"ṇāṃ yathokta upakāro "na kri"yate tadeha "kuṇḍe badarāṇītyevaṃ vyāpadeśo na syāt" | niyatādhārasya vyapadeśasya nimittamantareṇāyogāt | "tadupakārakṛta" ityādhāropakārakṛ"toyaṃ vyāpade"śa iha kuṇḍe badarāṇīti | kintarhi kuṇḍabadarayoryaḥ saṃyogastatkṛtaḥ |

[279,3]

"kimpunari"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | pṛcchataścāyamabhiprāyo kṣaṇikatve sati saṃyogādīnāmbhavadbhiḥ kalpaneṣyate | akṣaṇikatvaṃ ced bhāvānāmabhyupagamyate saṃyogādīnāmevotpattirna syādi"tyarthaḥ | tayori"ti kuṇḍabadarayoḥ "saṃyoga" ityapi vyapadeśanimittaṃ nāstyupakāryopakārakatvābhāvādityabhiprāyaḥ |

[280,1]

"tābhyāmi"tyādi paraḥ | tābhyāṃ kuṇḍabadarābhyāṃ saṃyogasya "jananāttayoḥ" saṃyoga iṣyate | dvābhyāmeva saṃyogasya jananamubhayatra samavāyaḥ | pareṇokta ityavamṛśya si ddhā nta vā dyā ha | "sa" ityādi | sa saṃyoga "ekatraiva" kuṇḍe badare vā "kinna samavaiti"
janyate vā | ekena kuṇḍena badareṇa vā pṛcchataścāyaṃ bhāvo yadi tau kuṇḍabadarākhyau bhāvau saṃyogajanane | ādhārabhāvopagamane vā | pratyekaṃ samarthasvabhāvau tadā kimityanyonyamapekṣata iti | pṛthagarthantadubhayaṃ parasparasahitameva samarthamiti cedāha | "tadi"tyādi | yatkuṇḍabadaravastu"pṛthagasamartham" tatparaspara"sahitama"pi tādṛśamevāsamarthamevākṣaṇikatvāditi bhāvaḥ | kṣaṇikāstu pratyekaṃ pṛthagasamarthāḥ paścāt sahakārikṛtaviśeṣāssahitāssamarthā ityaviruddhaṃ | tataśca saṃyogaṃ pratyanu"pakārakatvāt" |
kuṇḍabadarākhyamvastu | "na saṃyogena" taddharmyāt |

[280,2]

"sahitasye"tyādi paraḥ | sahitasya kuṇḍasya badarasya ca tadanyopakārāt | tasmāt kuṇḍād yo "yo" badarātmā "tasmāt" kuṇḍasyopakārāt | tasmādvā badarād yadanyat kuṇḍantasmād badarasyopakārāt | "viśeṣotpa"tterhetoḥ kuṇḍabadarayoḥ saṃyogasya janane |
ādhārabhāvopagamane vā "sāmarthyaṃ" na kevalayoriti |

[280,3]

"koya"mityā cā ryaḥ | badarāṇāṃ kuṇḍādīnāṃ cā"janyajanakabhūtānāṃ koyamupakāraḥ" | naivāsti | ajanyajanakatvameva kathamiti cedāha | svarūpetyādi |
badara"svarūpa"syānyataḥ hetoreva "siddherakārya"tvānna badarāṇāṃ janyatvaṃ nāpi janakatvaṃ kuṇḍasyeti bhāvaḥ | na hi paro badarādīnāṃ kuṇḍādeḥ sakāśāt svarūpotpattimvāñchati | svahetoreva teṣānniṣpatteḥ | na kuṇḍena badararūpameva kriyate kintu tatonyadrūpamityata āha | "pararūpe"tyādi | "tatre"tyādheye | na hyarthāntare kṛterthāntaramupakṛtaṃ syāt | "ubhayatheti" svarūpapararūpakriyābhyāṃ | anantaroktena vidhinā"nupakārakasya"
kuṇḍādera"kiñcitkaratvāt" |

[280,4]

eta"ccoktaprāyaṃ" | prāyaśabdo bāhulyavacanaḥ | prāyeṇoktamuktaprāyaṃ | rājadantāderākṛtigaṇatvāt prāyaśabdasya paranipātaḥ | ayaṃ cārthaḥ "kāryaśca tāsāṃ prāptosau jananaṃ yadupakriye"1 | 108tyādi vistareṇoktaḥ | prāyaśabdaṃ sadṛśārthamanye prāhuḥ | uktena sadṛśamuktaprāyaṃ | prāguktenāśrayakṛtena sāmānyasya svarūpopakāreṇedaṃkuṇḍādikṛtamādheyasyopakārakaraṇantulyamityarthaḥ | "sarva eve"tyādinopasaṃhāraḥ | "sarva eva vastusambandhāḥ" kāryakāraṇabhāvāddhetorvyavasthāpyanta iti sambandhaḥ | vibhāgasteṣāṃ na syāditi cedāha | "janakasyai"vetyādi | yadvā "kāryakāraṇabhāvā"t sakāśāt "pravibhāgena"
bhedena "vyavasthāpyante" | kathambheda ityāha | "janakasyai"vetyādi | kāraṇakṛtaḥ kāryasya ya upakāraviśeṣastasya balādityarthaḥ | tathā hi pravisarppaṇadharmaṇo badarādeḥ svopādānadeśotpādanalakṣaṇenopayogenādhārādheyabhāvaḥ | pradīpakṛtena ca vijñānajananasamarthasvarūpotpādena ghaṭapradīpādīnāṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakalakṣaṇaḥ sambandha ityevamanyasminnapi sambandhe yathāyogaṃ vācyaṃ |

[281,1]

nanu "sarva eva vastusambandhā" ityādinā na saṃyogalakṣaṇasya sambandhasya kāryakāraṇabhāventarbhāvaḥ samānakālabhāvinorevāsya sattvāt | athākṣaṇikapakṣe saṃyogotpattirna yujyate | kṣaṇike tarhi bhaviṣyati saṃyuktāsaṃyuktāvasthayośca kuṇḍabadarayorna svarūpabhedaḥ pratīyate | tenākṣaṇikepi saṃyogostyeva pratīteḥ |

[281,2]

yadāho dyo ta ka raḥ | "yadi saṃyogo na nārthāntarambhavettadā kṣetrabījodakādayo nirviśiṣṭatvāt sarvadaivāṃkurādikāryaṃ kuryu rnacaivaṃ | tasmāt sarvadā kāryānārambhāt kṣetrādīnyaṅkurotpattau kāraṇāntarasāpekṣāṇi | yathā mṛtpiṇḍādisāmagrī ghaṭādikaraṇe kulālādisāpekṣā | yo sau kṣetrādinirapekṣaḥ sa saṃyoga iti siddhaṃ | kiṃ cāsau saṃyogo dravyayorviśeṣaṇabhāvena pratīyamānatvāttatorthāntaratvena pratyakṣasiddha eva | tathā hi kaścit kenacit saṃyukte dravye āharetyukto yayoreva dravyayoḥ saṃyogamupalabhate te evāharati | na dravyamātraṃ | kiṃ ca dūrataravarttinaḥ puṃsaḥ sāntarepi vane nirantararūpāvasāyinī seyaṃ buddhirudayamāsādayati mithyābuddhirmukhyapadārthānubhavamantareṇa na kvacidupajāyate | na hyananubhūtagodarśanasya gavaye gauriti vibhramo bhavati tasmādavaśyaṃ saṃyogo mukhyobhyupagantavyaḥ | tathā na caitraḥ kuṇḍalītyanena pratiṣedhavākyena na kuṇḍalaṃ pratiṣidhyate tasyānyatra deśādau sattvāt | tasmāccaitrasya kuṇḍalasaṃyogaḥ pratiṣidhyate | tathā caitraḥ kuṇḍalītyanenāpi vidhivākyena na caitrakuṇḍalayoranyataravidhānantayoḥ siddhatvāt | pāriśeṣyāt saṃyogavidhānaṃ | tasmādastyeva saṃyoga" iti |

[281,3]

atrocyate | <1> yathā kṣetrādīnāṃ viśiṣṭāvasthāpratilambhena saṃyogārambhakatvamiṣyate tathā saṃyogamaṃtareṇa kāryārambhakatvameva kinneṣyate | anyathā sarvadā saṃyogārambhakatvaṃ syāt | <2> nāpi nirvikalpakena pratyakṣeṇa saṃyukte dravye svarūpeṇa gṛhyamāṇe tṛtīyaḥ saṃyogaḥ pratibhāsate | <3> nāpi savikalpake jñāne saṃyukte dravye muktvā saṃyogaśabdaṃ cāparaḥ saṃyogo viśeṣaṇabhāvena pratibhāsate | <4> nāpi saṃyukta"pratyayānyathā"nupapattyā saṃyogakalpanā | utpannanirantarāvasthayoreva bhāvayoḥ saṃyuktapratyayahetutvāt | yāvacca tasyāmavasthāyāṃ saṃyogajanakatvena saṃyuktapratyayaviṣayo tāviṣyete tāvat saṃyogamantareṇa saṃyuktapratyayahetutvena tadviṣayau kiṃ neṣyete | kimpāramparyeṇa | <5> nāpi sāntare vane nirantarāvabhāsinī buddhirmukhyapadārthānubhavapūrvikā skhalatpratyayaviṣayatvenānupacaritatvāt | <6> tathā na caitraḥ kuṇḍalītyādau caitrasambandhikuṇḍalaṃ pratiṣidhyate vidhīyate vā | na saṃyogaḥ | tasmādekasāmagryadhīnayoreva saṃyutāviti pratītiḥ | yathā kuṇḍabadarayostasmāt saṃyogasyāpi kāryakāraṇabhāva evāntarbhāvaḥ | kevalaṃ bhedāntarapratikṣepeṇa saṃyuktāvetau saṃyogasyeti vā pratītirna punarvastubhūtasaṃyogabalāt | yataśca nāsti kāryakāraṇabhāvamantareṇa vāstavaḥ sambandhaḥ |

[282,1]

"tadayami"tyādi | "badarādiṣu jananaśaktireva kuṇḍādīnāmādhāra iti sambandhaḥ"
sāmānyasyāśrayo jananaśaktyaivādhārostviti cedāha | "netyā"di | seti jananaśaktiḥ | "atre"ti sāmānye |

[282,2]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | svopādānadeśa eva jananaṃ "jananaviśeṣaḥ sa lakṣaṇaṃ"
yasyā"dhārabhāvasya" sa tathā | "tasyājanya"tvāditi sāmānyasya nityatvenājanyatvāt | "tadabhāve"nyāśrayābhāvepi sāmānyasyā"vasthite"rhetorāśrayavaśena na "sthitiḥ" sāmānyasya |

[282,3]

"athetyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "tasye"ti sāmānyasya "tadabhāvepī"ti vyaktyabhāvepi vyaktiśanye deśe sāmānyasya "sthānā"t | yadi hi vyaktiśūnye deśe sāmānyaṃ na bhavettadā tatrāpūrvavyaktyutpāde sāmānyasambandho na bhaveta | na hi tasyānyata āgamanaṃ niṣkriyatvāt | na ca bhinnadeśāvasthitā vyaktistasya sāmānyasyādhāro bhinnadeśatvāt |
ekatvāt sāmānyasya nāsti bhinnadeśateti cet | sarvāstarhi vyaktaya ekajātimatya ekadeśāḥ prāpnuvanti | na ca sarvā jātimatyaḥ syuḥ | ekasya kathambhinnadeśāvasthitatvamiti cedayamaparosya doṣostu |

[283,1]

"patanadharme"tyādinopacayahetumāha | "hi" śabdaścārthe | "api"śabdobhyupagamasūcanārthaḥ | abhyupagamyāpyayaṃ prakāraḥ sāmānye vyavasthāpayitumaśakyaḥ | sāmānyasyāpatanadharmmatvādityevamarthamupanyāsaḥ | na "tvajanakasya sthāpaka"tvaṃ sa"mbhava"ti |
ata evāha | "atrāpī"tyādi | "atrāpi" pātapratibandhāt sthāpakābhyupagame "yadi" nyāyavādī kaścit "pātapratibandhaṃ na paryanuyuñjīta" | tadā bhavedajanakopi "sthāpakaḥ" |
svasamayānurodhenetyākūtaṃ | atrāpyayaṃ paryanuyogaḥ sambhavati | yaḥ "sthāpayitrā" kriyate"pātapratibandhaḥ" sa sthāpyasyātmabhūto vā syāt tato"rthāntaraṃ" vā pātābhāvamātramvā |
na tāvadātmabhūtastatsvabhāvasyānyato niṣpattyabhyupagamāt nāpyarthāntaramityāha | "aryāntaratvebhyupagamyamāne tatraiva" pratibandherthāntarabhūte'syādhārasyo"payoga iti kaḥ patato" badarādeḥ "pratibandho" vighātaḥ | naiva kaścit | tataśca kuṇḍādisthamapi badarādi patedeveti bhāvaḥ | ādhārakṛtenārthāntareṇa pātapratibandhena badarāderapātaḥ kriyata iti cedāha | "pratibandhādapātepī"tyādi | pratibandhākhyāt yadārthād badarāderapātebhyupagamyamāne "tulyaḥ paryanuyogaḥ" | yoyaṃ pratibandhākhyena padārthenāpātaḥ kriyate sa kiṃ badarāderātmabhūtorthāntaramvā | arthāntaratve tatraivāsya pratibandhasyopayoga ityādi | sarvamanantaroktaṃ tulyaṃ |

[283,2]

atha tenāpyapātākhyenārthena badarāderapātaḥ kriyate tatrāpi tulyaḥ paryanuyoga ityāha | "anavasthā" ceti |

[283,3]

"tasmādityā"dinā tṛtīyapakṣopanyāsaḥ | sa "pātābhāvaḥ kathaṃ kenacit kriyate" | naiva kenacit | abhāvasyākāryatvāditi bhāvaḥ | kathantarhya"bhāvaṃ karotīti" vyapadeśa iti "cedā"ha | "abhāva"mityādi | abhāvaṅkarotīti vyapadeśe "nābhāvo nāma kaścit kārya" iṣyate | kasmādityāha | "tasye"tyādi | "tasye"tyabhāvasya kāryatvād "bhāva eva syā"dityabhiprāyaḥ |

[284,1]

nanu yathā ghaṭavat kāryatvāt paṭasya na ghaṭarūpatā | tathā bhāvavannābhāvasya kāryatvādabhāvarūpatā bhaviṣyatīti cet | na | ghaṭāderapi hi bhāvarūpatvambhavanadharmatvādeva | taccābhāvepyastīti kathaṃ na bhāvarūpatvamabhāvarūpatvena pratibhāsanānna bhāvarūpateti cet | na | "abhāvasya" pratibhāsābhāvāt | abhāvānāmparasparavibhāgapratīterghaṭābhāvaḥ paṭābhāva ityatra paṭādīnāmbhedo nābhāvānāmekatvena pratibhāsanādityuktaṃ | yata eva"ntasmād bhā"vasya yā "kriyā" tasyāḥ"pratiṣedhanirdeśo"'bhāvaṃkarotīti |

[284,2]

ata eva spaṣṭayati | "bhāvaṃ na karotīti yāva"diti | yāvānevāsya vākyasyārthastāvānevābhāvaṃ karotītyasyāpītyarthaḥ | "tathā ce"ti | pātapratibandhasyābhāva mātratvenākāryatve | "ayami"ti kuṇḍādiḥ | tena kāraṇe"nāyami"ti badarādiḥ | "kena cit"kuṇḍādinādhāreṇa "pratiba"ddhaḥ | pātādanivārito "na kadācittiṣṭhe"t | sadaiva patedityarthaḥ | "tasmādityā"dinopasaṃhāraḥ | "api"śabdādādheya ityanenāpi vyapadeśena"kṣaṇikānāṃ" pūrvakṣaṇasaṃgṛhīteno"pādānena samānadeśasyo"ttarakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītasya kārya"syotpādana"mucyate | "tasmāt" sāmānye'yamapi prakāro na sambhavatīti khyāpanāyābhyupagamyaitaduktaṃ pātapratibandhāda"janakopi" sthāpaka iti |

[284,3]

tamevāsambhavandarśayitumāha | "astu nāme"tyādi | "pātinā"mbadasadīnānta"tpratibandhaḥ" pātapratibandhostu nāmājananasvabhāvaḥ | "tatkaraṇā"diti pātapratibandhakaraṇāt | "gatimato dravyasyeti" sakriyasya sāmānyasya punaramūrttatvāda"kriyasya kiṃ lakṣaṇāṃ sthitiṃ kurvāṇa" āśrayaḥ "sthāpakaḥ syāt" | na hi sāmānyasya pāto'sti yena tatpratibandhaḥsthitirbhavet | kintu "sthitirhi tasya" sāmānyasya "svarūpāpracyutirevo"cyate | "sā ca"
svarūpāpracyuti"rnāśrayāyattā" sāmānyasya "nityatvāt" | abhyupagamyāpyucyate | "sāpyā"śrayāyattā sāmānyasya sthiti"rayuktaiva" | sāmānyāt tasyāḥ sthite"rbhedābhedavivecane" | anyattvānanyattvavicāre kriyamāṇe |

[285,1]

"astu nāme"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "āśrayahetuke"tyāśrayāyattā | "seti" sthitiḥ |
tāmevāśrayādanyāṃ sthitiṃ sa āśrayaḥ karoti na sāmānyaṃ | sā sthitiḥ sāmānye pratibaddhā tataḥ sambandhasambaddhāt sāmānyamupakṛtamevetyata āha | "sā ce"tyādi |
setyarthāntarabhūtā sthitiḥ | na hi tasyāḥ sāmānye pratibandhakāraṇaṃ kiṃcidasti kiṃ sāmānyasyāśrayeṇa kṛtambhavatītyadhyāhāraḥ |

[285,2]

abhyupagamyata eva sthiteḥ sāmānye pratibandha iti cedāha | "pratibandhe ce"tyādi |
pratibandhe vābhyupagamyamāne | "sthitikaraṇaṃ cet" | āśrayeṇa janitā yā sthitistasyāḥ sthiteḥ sthitiḥ sāmānyena kriyate | tataḥ "sā"śrayajanitā sthitiḥ "sāmā"nye"pratibaddheti | tatrāpi" sthiteḥ sthitikaraṇe "tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ" | yā "sā cā"śrayapratibaddhāyāḥ sthiteḥ sāmānyena sthitiḥ kriyate sā āśrayahetukāyāḥ sthiterātma"bhūtā vā"
bhaved "vyatiriktā vā" | ātmabhūtatve āśrayeṇaiva sā kṛteti kathaṃ sāmānyena kriyate | "vyatiriktatve" ca saiva sthitiḥ sāmānyena kṛtā āśrayajanitāyā ādyāyāḥ sthiteḥ"kiṃ sāmānye"na "kṛtaṃ syā"t | atha sāmānyena dvitīyā sthitiḥ kriyate | sā āśrayeṇa janitāyāṃ sthitau pratibaddhā | "tadā kaḥ pratibandha iti vācyaṃ" | sāmānyajanitāyāḥ sthiterāśrayajanitayā sthityā'parā tṛtīyā sthitiḥ yata iti "tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ" ityana"vasthā syāt | tato"navasthānādāśrayajanitāyāṃ sthitau sāmānyakṛtasyo"pakāra"syā"navadhāraṇādasya" sāmānyasya sambandhinīyamāśrayeṇa janitā "sthitirityapratī"tiḥ"jananaṃ cet"pratibandha iti prakṛtaṃ | na sāmānyenāśrayajanitāyā sthiteraparā sthitiḥ kriyate | kintu saivādyā sthitirjanyata iti | tadā kevalaṃ sāmānyaṃ samarthaṃ sthitiṃkarotu "kimāśrayeṇa" śāvaleyādināṃ sthitikaraṇāyā"pekṣitena" | na "hyanupakārariṇyapekṣā"
yuktā | tasmāda"pekṣeti hi tatpratibandhaḥ" | asminvastunyasyāpekṣeti yeyamapekṣā sā tasminnapekṣye pratibandhastadāyattatā | "sa ca" pratibandho nityatvādanādheyātiśaya"syāyukta" iti "kevalaṃ" sāmānyaṃ sthitiṃ "janayediti nāstyanya āśrayaḥ sthitihetuḥ" |
tataśca sthitikaraṇādāśrayassāmānyasyādhāra ityetadayuktamiti bhāvaḥ | eva"mbhedābhedavivecana" iti yaduktantato bhedapakṣastāvadapanītaḥ |

[286,1]

dvitīyapakṣamāśrityāha | "abheda" ityādi | "sāmānyādabhede vā sthite"rabhyupagamyamāne "svarūpameva tatsthi"tirūpaṃ sāmānyasya | "tacca" svarūpaṃ sāmānyasya"nityamastīti na sthiti rasya" sāmānyasya "kena"cidāśrayeṇa "kriya"te | yata eva"ntasmādi"tyādi | "tadi"tyādinopasaṃhāraḥ | "tadi"ti tasmā"dasye"ti sāmānyasya |

[286,2]

tadevaṃ vṛttirādheyatā vyaktiriti yatpakṣadvayamuktantata ādyasya nirāsaḥ kṛtaḥ |

[286,3]

<2>dvitīyapakṣamā"śri"tyāha | "atha puna"rityādi | "avyaktasye"tyaprakāśitasya |
vyaktetyāśrayeṇa jñānasyākāraṇatvāt tadvyaktestenāśrayeṇa prakāśanaṃ yat | tadeva tatrāśraye sāmānyasya vṛttiḥ syāt || (146–47) ||

[286,4]

"ne"tyā cā ryaḥ | āṃtmani svaviṣaye "vijñānotpā"danaṃ | tatra "yogya"tvaṃ sāmānyantadartha"manyānurodhi" | kāraṇāntarasāpekṣaṃ "yatta"dvastu "vyaṅgyaṃ" pratītaṃ | tasyāśca svaviṣayajñānajanana"yogyatāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ" yatpradīpādi tadvyaṅgyasya "kārakameva" janakameva | pūrvamayogyasya paścād vijñānajananayogyasya ghaṭāderutpādanāt |

[286,5]

yadi punaḥ pradīpādisannidhānāt prāgapi ghaṭādi svākārajñānajanana"yog"yantadā "prāgevāsya ca" ghaṭāde"ryogya"tve "tadapekṣe"ti pradīpāpekṣā | "sāmānyasya" nityatvāda"vikārya"sya | "tadi"ti yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ "sāmānyava"ta ityāśrayātsakāśāt "kuto"
naivetyarthaḥ | "aparamiti" svasantānādanya"mbhāvameva janayan vyañja"ka ucyate | kimbhūtaṃ"svaviṣaya"sya "vijñānotpādanasama"rthaṃ | "sajātīyopādānāpekṣami"ti svasantānasaṅgṛhītapūrvakṣaṇasāpekṣaṃ | yathāndhakārāvasthitaghaṭādikṣaṇasāpekṣamvijñānajananasamarthamuttaraṃ ghaṭakṣaṇañjanayatprakāśakaḥ |

[287,1]

nanu pradīpakāryatve ghaṭasya pradīpoyacayepi ghaṭasyopacayopi syāditi cet |
na | upādānagatād vibhedāt kāryasya bhedo na sahakārigatāt | sahakārikāraṇaṃ ca pradīpādirvyaṅgyasya ghaṭasyeti kuto mahatvādiprasaṅgosya | yadvā'bhivyaktāvapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ tulyoyaṃ prasaṅga iti yatkiñcidetat | na ca vyaṅgyakṣaṇasadṛśasya kṣaṇasya mṛtpiṇḍādutpattirapi tu pradīpādeveti kutonyādṛśāt tādṛśasyotpattiḥ | "anapekṣaṃ ce"ti | yathā sajātīyopādānāpekṣaṃ svaviṣayavijñānajananasamarthaṃ śabdaṃ janayannabhighātaḥ | na hyabhighātāt prāk chabdosti yena samānajātīyāpekṣaḥ śabdo bhavet | śabdopi hi vyaṅgyaḥ parairiṣyata ityevamuktaṃ |

[287,2]

yadi tarhi kāraka eva vyañjakaḥ kastarhi kārakavyañjakayorhetvorviśeṣa ityata āha | "paratre"tyādi | vyañjakādanyasmin kārakatvenābhimata ityarthaḥ | "jñānajanaśaktiranākṣiptā janyasya" | na hi svaviṣayavijñānajananasamarthameva kāryaṃ kārakeṇa bījādinā janyate | tato "jananamātreṇa kārakatvaṃ" svaviṣayavijñānajananasamarthakāryotpādanalakṣaṇena tu viśeṣeṇa vyañjakatvamiti | (147–48) ||

[287,3]

yadyapi vyañjakād vyaṅgyo "vijñānotpādanayogyatāṃ" pratilabhate tathāpi na janyata iti cedāha | "yadi hī"tyādi | "yata" iti vyañjakāt | sa cet vyaṅgyaḥ | "tasye"ti vyañjakasya "sā yogya"tā'sya vyaṅgyasya vyañjakasannidhānāt "prāgevāsti" | yatovyaṅgyasya "svabhāvabhūtā sā" | yathāvyaṅgyaḥ prāgevāsti tathā tatsvabhāvabhūtāpi yogyatā | "tamapekṣata" iti vyañjakaṃ | vyaṅgyād vyatiriktaiva yogyatā vyañjakena kriyata iti cedāha | "pare"tyādi | "asyāmi"ti yogyatāyāṃ | "saiva" yogyatā | "tata" iti vyañjakāt "sthitivatprasaṅgaḥ" | yaduktam | anyā cet sthitistāmevāśrayaḥ karotītyādi tadihāpi prasajyeta | "ta"miti vyaṅgyaṃ | nāpi vyaṅgyādanyat tatkaraṇe vyaṅgyasya na "kiñci"diti "kṛtvā'pekṣyata" ityanenopakāritvamuktaṃ | akiṃcitkaratvena tatpratiṣedhas"tato vyāhatameta"t |

[288,1]

yaduktaṃ | janaka eva vyañjaka iti tasya tattvityādinā vyabhicāramāha |
na hi dhūmognerjanako'tha ca "kāryatvā"ttasya "vyañja"kaḥ | "ādi"śabdād balākādiḥ salilasya | "sattya"mityādinā pariharati | na tu dhūmaṃ liṅga"mapekṣyāgnirā"tmani svalakṣaṇe "jñānaṃ janaya"ti | kasmāt | "tathābhūtas"yānumeyatvenābhimatas"yāgneḥ sākṣādajanakatvāt" | anyathāgnisvalakṣaṇākāratvāt pratyakṣāt pratibhāsāviśeṣaḥ syāt | "kevalami"tyādinopādānakāraṇameva tasya sākṣājjanakamityādarśayati | liṅgajñānamupādānaṃ | "na viṣayabalenā"gnisvalakṣaṇabalena | kiṅkāraṇam | a"satya"pi tasmin vahnau pūrvadhvastepi bhāvādagnijñānasya | kathamityāha | "parampara"yetyādi |
liṅgānusārī liṅgānusmaraṇavikalpastena | tathā hi kasyacit puruṣasya kvacid"dhū"mandṛṣṭavato dhvaste dhūme vahnau ca kathamapi tatra dhūmānusmaraṇavikalpa utpanne paścādanvayavyatirekānusmaraṇādabhūdatra dhūmastasmād vahnirapyatrāsīdityevaṃ paramparayāgnijanyadhūmādagnijñānamutpadyata eva |

[288,2]

"nāpī"tyādinā pūrvoktamatraiva yojayati | "sāmānyākārāvabhāsi" cānumā"najñānaṃ" |
na "sannihitaviṣa"yatā | vinaṣṭepi hi viṣaye anutpanne ca sambhavāt | yadāpi sannihito viṣayastadāpi "na viṣayabalenotpattiriti niveditaṃ" prāk "na hi vikalpā" ityādinā | "bhāvābhāvānavidhānācca sāmarthyanna prati"dityādinā tṛtīye paricchede "pratipādayiṣyate ca | sākṣādupayogena"
svarūpānukāri"vijñānajananasāmarthyena | tatre"ti svaviṣayajñānajanane | paramiti pradīpādikaṃ | "tata" ityapekṣyāt pradīpādeḥ |

[289,1]

etaduktambhavati | na sarvo vyañjako janaka ityucyate | kintu svākārajñānajanakasya parasya sāhāyyaṃ yaḥ pratipadyate sa eva | tato nāsti vyabhicāra iti |
sāmānyamapi svākārajñānajananāśraya"mapekṣata iti vyaṅgya"miṣṭantatastenāśrayādupalambhayogya "ātmā labdhavyaḥ | na cāyamātmapratilambhaḥ sāmānyasya kutaścit sambhavati" | nityatvenābhyupagatatvāt | "tadi"ti sāmānyaṃ |

[289,2]

"naive"tyādi paraḥ | svāśrayasamavāyavyaktiṃ brūma iti sambandhaḥ | svāśrayasamavāyaḥ kathaṃ vyaktiriti cedāha | "svāśraye"tyādi | "tadi"ti sāmānyaṃ | "anyatreti" svāśraye |

[289,3]

"ukta"mityā cā ryaḥ | "tadevedamanupakārakasyāśrayatvaṃ na sambhāvayāma" ityādinoktatvāt | svāśrayasamavetaṃ hi "tadātmanyanyatra vā vijñānaheturiti" bruvāṇena "svāśrayasāvāyāpekṣaḥ" sāmānyapadārthaḥ "vijñānahetu"riṣṭaḥ | tataśca "tena" svāśrayasamavāyena sāmānyātmā "janyasya syā"t | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "taddheto"rjñānahetoḥ svabhāvasya svāśrayasamavāyāt "prāgbhāvā"t | svāśrayasamavāye sati "paścācca tataḥ" svāśrayasamavāyād vijñānahetoḥ svabhāvasya "bhāvā"t | nityaṃ sāmānyasya vijñānajananasvabhāvatvādasiddhametaditi cedāha | "nittya"mityādi | "tatsvabhāvasadbhāva" iti vijñānajananasvabhāve"prāgapi" svāśraya"samavāyād" vyaktiśūnyepi deśe kevalāt sāmānyādityarthaḥ | sāmānyākāra"vijñānodayaprasaṅgā"t || (148–49) ||

[289,4]

"ne"tyādiparaḥ | "vyakti"rāśrayaḥ "sāmānyasya saṃskā"ro yogyatādhānanta"smāddhe"torna"vyañjikā" sāmānyasya | yena tayā janyaṃ syāt sāmānyaṃ | "kintarhi tadgrāhiṇa" iti sāmānyagrāhiṇaḥ "saṃskārā"d vyañjaketi prakṛtaṃ |

[290,1]

"yopī"tyādyā cā ryaḥ | "añjanāde"riveti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ | "añjanādeḥ" sakāśād yathendriya"saṃskāro" yukto "naivaṃ vyakteḥ" sakāśāt | kasmāt "pratipatte"rjñānasya vyañjakatvenābhimatāyā vyakte"rbhāvābhāvakālayoḥ" saptamīdvivacanametat |

[290,2]

"saṃskṛtami"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "añjanādibhiḥ saṃskṛtamindriyaṃ kaṃcidatiśaya"mātmabhūta"māsādaya"ti | "pratipattau" pratipattinimittaṃ | viśiṣṭajñānotpādanāyeti yāvat | nimittāt karmmasaṃyoga ityanenātra saptamī | kuta etaditi cedāha | "spaṣṭe"tyādi | "pratipatte"riti vibhaktivipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | tathā hi timirādyupa hatamindriyamaspaṣṭaṃ vijñānañjanayati | tadevāñjanādisaṃskṛtaṃ spaṣṭato'vasīyate |
saṃskṛtamindriyaṃ pratipattyarthamatiśayamāsādayatīti |

[290,3]

athāñjanādeḥ sakāśānna pratipattibhedastadā | "tadakāriṇa"śca pratipattibhedākāriṇaścāñjanā"deratatsaṃskāra"ndriyāsaṃskārakatvāt | yathāñjanādeḥ sakāśā"dindriyasya saṃskāro naivaṃ vyakteḥ" sakāśāt | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tadbhāvābhāvakāla"yorityādi | tathā hi vyañjikāyā govyakterabhāvakāle yādṛśaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ vṛkṣādāvutpannantasyā govyakteḥ abhāvepi vṛkṣādau tādṛśameva | yadi tadabhāvakāle pūrvamaspaṣṭaṃ vijñānaṃ vṛkṣādiṣūtpannaṃ paścād govyaktikṛta indriyasaṃskāro gamyeta |

[290,4]

viṣayasaṃskārepi sati viṣayāntare naiva pratipattibhedo'styataḥ sopi na yukta iti cedāha | "viṣaye"tyādi | viṣayasya gandhāderyaḥ kenacit saṃskārassa "indriyāviśeṣepi" | yadi nāmānyatra viṣayāntare indriyasya pratipattiṃ prati viśeṣo nāsti | "tathāpi tadviveṣādhā"nantasya saṃskṛtaviṣayagrāhakasya jñānasya "viśeṣādhānādupakārī syāt" | nendriyasaṃskāra upakārī syāditi sambandhaḥ |

[291,1]

etaduktambhavati | viṣayā hi viniyatāste svākārasyaiva vijñānasya sādhanaṃ nākārāntarayuktasya | tato viṣayasaṃskāraḥ pratiniyatatvāt svaviṣayāmeva viśiṣṭāṃ pratipattiñjanayanna virudhyate | indriyaṃ tu svagrāhye viṣayabhede tulyaṃ sādhanamatastatsaṃskāraḥ sarvasmiṃstadgrāhye pratipatterbhedakaḥ prāpnotīti | nendriyasya vyaktibhedastadindriyagrāhye sarvasmin dṛśye viṣaye spaṣṭākārajñānajananāya saṃskāramādhatte |
kintarhi vyaktyutpatteḥ "prāgadṛśye" sāmānye indriyasya "darśanaśaktyādhānā"t kāraṇād vyaktibheda "upakārakaṃ iti cet | atīndriyadarśanāde"va ca spaṣṭamindriyasya saṃskāro gamyate | vyaktisannidhānāt pūrvamasamarthampaścāttatsannidhāne samarthamiti sa vyaktibhedotīndriyaṃ sāmānyākhyamarthandarśayan "kathaṃ pratipatteḥ" sarvatra "na bhedako" bhedaka evetyarthaḥ |

[291,2]

etaduktambhavati | dṛśyepi tāvadaspaṣṭe spaṣṭākāradarśanaśaktyādhānād añjanādikṛtaḥ indriyasaṃskāraḥ sarvatra tadindriyagrāhye viṣaye pratipatterbhedako dṛṣṭaḥ |
kiṃ punaryotīndriyasyārthasya darśakastathā cānyasyāpyatīndriyasya paramāṇvāderdarśakaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ | sāmānyasyaiva darśanāyendriyasya saṃskāramādhatte vyaktibhedaḥ tato nāstyatiprasaṅga iti cedāha | "eke"tyādi | ekasmin sāmānye draṣṭavye indriyasaṃskārasya "pratini"yamasta"sminna"bhyupagamyamāne tasminneva vyaktibhede śāvaleyādikesamavetaṃ ya"tsāmānyāntaraṃ" sattādravyatvādi | "tasya darśaka" indriyasaṃskāro na syāt | iṣyate ca | ātmasamavetānāmeva sarvasāmānyānāndarśanāyendriyasaṃskāro naikasyaiveti cedāha | "vyaktyā ce"tyādi | "taddarśana" iti teṣāṃ vyaktisamavetānāṃ sāmānyānāndarśane | "tadvyaṅgyeṣu" tayā vyaktyā vyaṅgyeṣu | dṛṣṭaśca dūrād dravyamātradarśane dravyatvamarthatvayorniścayepi sati gotvādāvaniścayaḥ | yasminnaniścayastasya darśanāya nāhitaḥ saṃskārabheda iti cedāha | eka"niścayo veti na syādi"ti sambandhaḥ | ekaśabdonyārtho'niścitādanyasyāpi niścitābhimatasya dravyatvāderniścayo na syāt | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tasyā" vyaktera"vibhāgamayāsteṣu" svātmasama"veteṣu"
sāmānyeṣu "viśeṣābhāvāt" | na hi sā vyaktiḥ kvacit pratyāsannā kvacinna | tataḥ sarvasya vā niścayaḥ sāmānyasya na vā kasyacida"pītye"vantāvad "vyakterindriyasaṃskāro na ghaṭata ityākhyā"tam |

[292,1]

adhunābhyupagamyāpyucyate | "vyakte"rityādi | "vyakte"ssakāśāt pakṣadvayepi sāmānyasya "vijñānajananasvabhāva iti" kṛtvā | tasmād vijñānajananāt "svabhāvāt pracyuteḥ" kāraṇānna hi samarthasya sahakāryapekṣā yuktā | "saṃskṛtamindriyaṃ saha"kāri yasya sāmānyasya tattathoktantadbhā"vastasmāt" | nityatvāda"nādheyātiśayasya"
sāmānyasya "koyaṃ sahakārārthaḥ" | naiva kaścit |

[292,2]

"anittyā hī"tyādinā vyatirekamāha | "sahakāriṇaḥ" sakāśādviśi"ṣṭasyātmano lābhāt | tami"ti sahakāriṇaṃ | kasmād | "yo hyeṣāṃ" kṣaṇikānāṃ "janaka ātmā" sahakārisannidheḥ prāṅnāsīt | "tadaiva" sahakārisannidhikāle | tataḥ sahakāriṇaḥ sakāśād "bhavatīti" kṛtvā | "eṣā"miti kṣaṇikānāṃ |

[292,3]

nanu kṣaṇikānāmapi kathaṃ sahakāriṇo viśiṣṭātmalābhāpekṣā | sahabhāvināmparasparamanupakāryopakārakatvāt | yaśca kṣaṇo jāyate na tasya sadasattvakālayossahakāryapekṣeti |

[292,4]

ayuktamuktamupakārī hyapekṣata iti naiṣa doṣaḥ | sattāpekṣayaitaducyate | ata evāha | janyataivaiṣāṃ parasparatopekṣeti | anāsādya "parami"ti sahakāriṇaṃ | "tatsvabhāvaṃ"
samarthasvabhāvaṃ | na hi tasya sāmānyasya kevalasya sahakārivikalasya prāg yo na vijñānajananasvabhāvaḥ sa punaḥ kathaṃcid bhāvī | "na hīti" sambandhaḥ | nityatvāditi bhāvaḥ |

[293,1]

kiñca | "vyakteḥ sāmānyasaṃskāre sati tajjanyaṃ sāmānyaṃ syādi"ti pareṇendriyasaṃskāroṅgīkṛtaḥ vyakteḥ sakāśāt | tathāpi vyaktijanyatvaṃ prasajyata ityāha | "vyakti"rityādi | "tatsahakāri" | vyaktisaṃskṛtendriyasahakāri sāmānyamvijñānaheturityabhyupagamyamāne | "vyaktikāryasyendri"yasya kāryatvāt "sāmānyaṃ vyakteḥ pāramparyeṇa kāryamuktaṃ syāt" || (149–50) ||

[293,2]

bhavatu nāma sāmānyasya vyañjikā vyaktiḥ tāvadasyā jātimattvaṃ na yuktamatiprasaṅgādityāha | "api ce"tyādi | "jātīnāṃ" sāmānyānāṃ "vyañjakasya" vyaktibhedasya "jātimattā yadīṣya"te | tadā gotvādeḥ prakāśakaḥ "pradīpā"diḥ vyañjakatvāttena gotvādinā tadvān gotvādimān "prāptaḥ" | śāvaleyādivat |
gotvādhāraḥ prāpta ityarthaḥ |

[293,3]

"yo hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "gotvādiṣu" vyaṅgyeṣu "vijñānahetutvaṃ pradīpāderapya"sti |
kathamiti cedāha | "teja" ityādi | tasmādastyā"lokasya vijñānamprati hetutvaṃ |
tata" iti jñānahetutvāt | "pradīpādaya" iti | ādiśabdādindriyasaṃskārādiparigrahaḥ | teṣāmapi jñānahetutvāt | vyakteḥ sakāśād viśiṣṭasyaivābhivyaktiḥ sāmānyasya bhavati na tathā pradīpāderiti cedāha | na hītyādi | "vyakterapi" sakāśāt "sāmānyasyābhivyaktirjñānahetutāṃ muktvā na hyanyā kācit" | yadi hi sāmānyasyātiśayādhānaṃ vyaktyā kriyate na pradīpādinā | tadā bhavedviśeṣastacca nāsti | "svabhāvātiśayasyādhātumaśakyatvāt" | nityatvāt sāmānyasyeti bhāvaḥ | "samavāya"
ityādi | vyaktau ca samavetaṃ gotvaṃ na pradīpādau | tasyeti sāmānyasya | ajanyajanakayoḥ koyaṃ samavāya "ityuktatvāt" |

[294,1]

bhavatu nāma samavāyastathāpyasya sāmānyasya "samavāyamātraṃ vyaktyā saha jātaṃ nānyaḥ kaścidviśeṣo" vijñānajananalakṣaṇaḥ | "pūrvava"diti vyaktisamavāyāt prāgvat"paścādapi" vyaktisamavāyepi yadyapi sāmānyasya "na kaścid viśeṣa"stathāpi samavāyabalādeva svaviṣayajñānajananamiti cedāha | "samavāyādeve"tyādi | "jñānahetutvena"
sāmānyasyābhyupagamyamāne | "svāśrayo" yo yatra samavetastatsamavāyinaṃ | sāmānyasyābhyupagamyamāne | "svāśra"yo yo yatra samavetastatsamavāyinaṃ | sāmānyā"danyeṣā"mapi paramāṇu"samavetānāṃ" rūpādīnā"mapi dṛśyatā"pattiḥ"syāt" | samavāyasyaikatvena sarvatrāviśeṣāt | yathā hi sāmānyamatīndriyamapi kevalassamavāyo darśayatyevaṃ paramāṇugatānapi rūpādīn kinna darśayet | yataśca samavāyapakṣe'yandoṣa"stasmāt jñānahetutaiva" sāmānye vyakte"rvyañjakatvaṃ" | taccetthaṃ bhūtaṃ vyañjakatvantulya"mpradīpāṃdāva"pīti "sa eva prasaṅaḥ" prāpto gotvādinā tadvānityādikaḥ || (150–51) ||

[294,2]

"tadi"ti tasmā"nnādhe"yatā "sāmānya"sya svāśraye vṛttirnāpi svā"śrayeṇa vyakti" rabhivyaktiḥ svāśraye sāmānyasya vṛttiḥ | ataścāvṛtteḥ kāraṇāt sāmānya"nnāne"katra vyaktibhede ekākāra"jñānahetuḥ" | na hi yo yatra na varttate sa tatrātmavṛttidvāreṇa jñānaheturyuktaḥ |

[294,3]

"ata evāne"katra ekasya sāmānyasyāvṛtteḥ kāraṇāt | "vyakteḥ" sakāśādanyā yadi "jātirathavāna"nyā | "yeṣāṃ" vādināṃ | "vyaktiṣvapūrvāsu" saṃpratyutpannāsu paścādvā dṛśyamānāsu | "tu" śabdo vidyate śabdātpareṇa draṣṭavyova"dhāraṇārthaḥ" | ata evāha | "vidyata"
evetyādi | "vastusato" yeṣāṃ jātiriti yāvat | "svasāma"rthye sati svapratipattidvāreṇa | "anyatre"ti vyaktibhede buddhiñjanayan | kiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ "svarūpānukāriṇī"mekarūpānugatāṃyatra buddhiñjanayati tena sambandhamapekṣate | sambandhamantareṇa svākārabuddhijanane'ti"prasaṅgāt" || (151–52) ||

[295,1]

"sa ce"ti sambandho vyaktyantareṇa "sāmānya"sya "sato" vidyamānasya | "tattva"pakṣe'nyattva"pakṣe" ca na "sambha"vati | kasmād | "ekatra" vyaktibhedasyārthāntarabhūtasyānarthāntarasya "cānya"tra vyaktyantare "darśanāsambhavāt | sā hī"tyādinaitadeva sādhayati | "sā hi buddhirbhūtagrāhiṇī" vastubhūtasāmānyagrāhi"ṇyekabhāvinī" | ekatra vyaktibhede utpannā "vyaktyantarameva" sā "skandet" gacched | vyaktyantaramapi sāmānyākāreṇa gṛhṇīyāditi yāvat | yadi "tatrai"kasmin vyaktibhede "dṛṣṭaṃ kiñcid" vastubhūtaṃ sāmānya"manya"treti yatra vyaktibhede tayā skanditavyaṃ | "taccāṃ"nyatra darśanaṃ | "sata" iti vastubhūtasya sāmānyasya na sambhavatīti sambandhaḥ | kiṅkāraṇam | āśrayāda"nanyatve"bhyupagamyamāne"nvayābhāvā"t | na hyekasmādavyatiriktastadātmabhūtonyadanveti | āśrayā"danyattve"pi sāmanyasya vyaktāva"napāśrayā"t | anantaroktenādhārādheyādibhāvaniṣedhenāśrayabhāvasya niṣiddhatvāt | yadi vyatiriktasya sāmānyasyāsambandhānna vyaktyantare svākārajñānajananam | evantarhyādyāyāmapi vyaktau tattulyamiti kimucyate vyaktiṣvapūrvāsviti vyaktiṣvityeva vaktavyaṃ |
tathaikatra dṛṣṭasyānyatra darśanāsambhavādityapi vaktavyaṃ | ekatrāpi vyaktibhede sambandhamantareṇa darśanāsambhavāt |

[295,2]

satyametat | abhyupagamyaitaduktamityadoṣaḥ |

[296,2]

nanu deśakālasvabhāvābhedepi sāmānyaviśeṣayoranugatavyāvṛttirūpābhyāṃ bhedopīṣyata ityata āha | "rūpasyānugatasya" svabhāvasyā"tadbhūtasya" vyāvṛttarūpasvabhāvasyā"nyattvāvyatikramāt" | vyāvṛttebhyo viśeṣarūpebhyo bhinnasyānugatarūpasya sāmānyasyānyattvameva syādityarthaḥ | astyatadrūpatvamanyattvameva | kathamityata āha | "idameve"tyādi | "yanna ta"dityatadrūpamityarthaḥ | etāvadevānyattvalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ | "ākārāntaravat" | ṣaṣṭhyarthe vatiḥ | tathā hi sukhād duḥkhasyāpyanyattvamasukha rūpaṃ duḥkhamiti kṛtvā | iyatā cātadrūpasyānyattvalakṣaṇena vyāptiruktā | asya cānyattvalakṣaṇasyā"viśeṣāda"bhimatepi sāmānye |

[296,3]

etena pakṣadharma uktaḥ | prayogastu | yadvastutve satyatadrūpantasya tatonyattvameva tadyathā sukhād duḥkhasya | vastutve satyavyaktirūpaṃ ceṣyate sāmānyamityatadrūpatvenānyattve vyavahārasya sādhyatvāt svabhāvahetuḥ | evantāvadatadrūpatve sāmānyasyānyattvamevāpāditam | athānyattvaṃ neṣyate tadā tattvaṃ prāpnotītyāha | "tacce"tyādi | vyaktera"nanyattadā tadeva" vyaktirūpameva "tat" sāmānyambhavati | "atattve" ityavyaktirūpatve"vastvantaravadanyattvaprasaṅgāt" | etaccānantaramevoktaṃ |

[296,4]

astvananyattvaṃ sāmānyasya tathāpi vyaktyantaramanuyāsyatītyata āha | "na caike"tyādi | "ekavyaktisvabhāvasya vyaktyantarānvāveśo"nugamo vyaktyantarasvabhātvamiti yāvat | kasmāt tasyāvagamyamānasyā"vyaktyantaratvaprasaṅgāt" | yadi śābaleyātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ bāhuleyasyātmabhūtaṃ bhavettadā bāhuleyaḥ śābaleya eva jātaḥ śābaleyātmakāt sāmānyādavyaktirekācchābaleyavaditi kutosya vyaktyantaratvaṃ | "tata"
iti tasmād "vyakteravyatirekiṇaḥ" sāmānyātsakāśād "anvayinī"tyanugāminī | "nāpi vyatireki"ṇaḥ sāmānyād anvayinī buddhiriti prakṛtaṃ | kasmāt | "tasya"
vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya "kvaci"d bhede"'nāśrayā"dapravṛtteḥ | sambandhamantareṇa pravṛttyayogāt | "vṛttirādheyatā vyaktiriti tasminna yujyata" ityādinā ca vyaṅgyavyañjakasyādhārādheyabhāvasya ca sambandhasya niṣiddhatvāt | anyastarhi sāmānyatadvatoḥ sambandho bhaviṣyatīti cedāha | "anyasyāpī"tyādi | "vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvā"deriti pañcamī | ādiśabdādādhārādheyabhāvaparigrahaḥ | etasmāt pūrvaniṣiddhāt sambandhadvayāda"nyasyāpi" yasya kasyacit "sambandhasya" vyaktiṃ prati sāmānyasyā"bhāvāt" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | nityatvāt kenacid vyaktibhedenānupakāryasya sāmānyasyā"pratibandhena" | na hyapratibandhasya kaścit sambandhostītyuktaṃ |

[297,1]

etena "cānyattve'pāśrayā"diti ślokabhāgo vyākhyātaḥ || (152–53) ||

[297,2]

asatsambandhamapi sāmānyaṃ vyaktiṣu svarūpānukāriṇīṃ pratītiṃ janayatīti cedāha | "asambandhā"dityādi | nāsya sambandhostīti vigrahaḥ | sarvasmāt sarvatra pratītiḥ syādityarthaḥ | "tadi"ti tasmā"dayami"ti sā mā nya vā dī | "ekasya" sāmānyasya "darśanena"
hetunā | "eka"smin śābaleye vyaktibhede "vṛtti"ryasya tasyānyatra vyaktyantare "vṛttimanvicchin" vastutve"neṣṭasya" sāmānyasya vyakteḥ sakāśād ye "tattvānyattve" | te "nākramati"
vastuno gatyantarābhāvāt | cokto doṣa it"yayuk"tametadvastubhūtāt sāmānyādanuyāyijñānamiti |

svabhāvaścā"syā āśraya iti nirṇītametat" prāka tatra bhāvabhedaḥ pāramparyeṇa kāraṇaṃvāsanā prakṛtiḥ sākṣāditi dvayamupanyastaṃ | yadyanyāpoha eva śabdavācyaḥ kathantarhīdānīmityādi | "pradhāneśvarādikāryaśabdā" iti pra dhā na kārya mī śva ra kāryañjagaditi | ādiśabdāccha bda bra hmapariṇāma ityādiśabdānāṃ parigrahaḥ |

[298,1]

"bhāve"ṣvādhyātmikabāhyeṣu | "atadbhūto"'pradhānādikāryātmako bhedo yeṣānte tathoktāḥ | yadyapyapradhānakāryātteṣāṃ bhedaḥ syāt tadā bhavet pradhānādikāryātmako bhedaḥ | sa eva ca sarveṣāmabhedaḥ | tenā"bhedenā"nimittena sarvatra "varttante" | sa ca nāsti bhāvānāmanyāpohavādino matenāpradhānādikāryātmakatvāt | tataśca kathamevaṃbhūteṣvabhedena varttante | naivetyabhiprāyaḥ | tataścāvyāpinyapohavyavastheti bhāvaḥ |

[298,2]

"tepī"tyādinā pariharati | tepi pradhānādikāryaśabdā vikalpavijñānapratibhāsinyarthe pravarttante iti sambandhaḥ | kathamityāha | "saṃkete"tyādi | vastunya"tathābhūte" | icchāvaśād yaḥ saṃketaḥ pradhānakārya "jagaditi" | tenāhitā yā vāsanāśakti stayottarottarakṣaṇavipariṇāme"nopaskṛtatvā"d vijñānasantateḥ sarveṣāṃ bāhyādhyatmikānāma"rthānāṃ darśane"ṣvanubhaveṣu satsvapya"napekṣya tadbheda"mapradhānakāryād bhedamvastugataṃ |
yadi nāmārthānāmapradhānakāryāṇāmeva darśanamvastudharmeṇa tathāpi vastusvabhāvamanapekṣyetyarthaḥ | "tathādhyavasāyād yathāsaṃketa"mapradhānakāryānapi bhāvān pradhānakāryatvenādhyavasānāt | atathābhūtakalpitapradhānakāryatvena "kalpitaṃ" caitanyaṃ sāṃ khye na tasya "vyavacchedena" pradhānakāryābhāvā iti yad "vikalpavijñānantatpratibhāsinyarthe" |
sa eva vijātīyavyavacchedenānyāpoha iti bhāvaḥ | kiṃ bhūtāste śabdā ityāha | "upādāne"tyādi | "vikalpa"hetorvāsanāyā dārḍhyamu"pādānabala"ntasmāt "prabhava" utpādo yasya vikalpasya tasmāt "samutthitāḥ"

[298,3]

etaduktambhavati | yadi nāma vastuni tathābhūtabhedābhāvastathāpi vikalpāropita evānyāpohaḥ śabdānāṃ pravṛtteraṅgantato nāsyāvyāpitādoṣa iti | pradhānādikāryaśabdānāmabhedena pravṛttau teṣu bhāveṣu sāmānyameva vastubhūtaṃ kinneṣyata iti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | "teṣu" pradhānakāryatvenādhyāropiteṣu | "atathābhuteṣu pradhānakāryeṣu"

[299,1]

u dyo ta ka ro pyāha | "kena sarvagatatvaṃ jāterabhyupagamyate yena mṛtpiṇḍe mṛdgavake gotvaṃ syādapi tu svaviṣaye sarvatra vṛttirvarttata iti sarvagatetyucyate | kaḥ punargotvasya svo viṣayaḥ | yatra gotvambhavati | kva punargotvamvarttate | yatra gotvanimittonuvṛttipratyayayo bhavati | kva punaranuvṛttipratyayaṃ gotvaṃ karoti | yattasya sādhanaṃ | kaḥ punarnitye gotve gossādhanārthaḥ | yattena vyajyate | na hi kakudādimadarthavyatirekeṇa gotvasya vyaktiriti | na piṇḍebhyorthāntaraṃ gotvampiṇḍāntarāleṣvagrahaṇāditi bau ddho bruvāṇaḥ piṇḍāntarālamparyanuyojyaḥ | kimidampiṇḍāntarālaṃ |
kimākāśamāhosvidabhāva uta dravyāntaramiti | yadyākāśaṃ na tatra gotvaṃ na hyākāśaṃ gauriti pratīyate | etenābhāvo dravyāntaraṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ | viśeṣapratyayānāmākasmikatvācca | ayaṃ piṇḍapratyayavyatirekabhāk pratyaya upajāyamāno nimittāntarād bhavati | dṛṣṭā khalu piṇḍavyatirekabhājāṃ pratyayānāṃ nimittāntarādutpattiryathā carmavastrakambaleṣu nīlapratyayastacca nimittāntaraṃ sāmānyamiti | tasmād vyaktisarvagataṃ sāmānyaṃ | vyaktiśūnyepi deśe vidyamānatvāt | na ca tatra sāmānyasya pratītirvyañjikāyā vyakterabhāvāt | yatraiva ca vyaktau sāmānyaṃ pratīyate saiva sāmānyābhivyaktau samarthā sāmānyapratipattyanyathānupattyā gamyate nānyeti | "
