[301,4]

"yadvā sarvagatatvepi vyaktiḥ śaktyanurodhataḥ | śaktiḥ kāryānumeyādivyaktirdarśanahetukā | tena yatraiva dṛśyeta vyaktiḥ śaktantadeva tu | tenaiva ca na sarvāsu vyaktiṣvetat pratīyate | bhinnatvepi hi kāsāṃcicchaktiḥ kāścidaśaktikāḥ | na ca paryanuyogosti vastuśakteḥ kadācana | vahnirdahati nākāśaṃ kotra paryanuyujyatāmiti | "

[302,1]

"tatra" tayoḥ "pakṣayo"rmadhye "yadi svāśrayamātra"gataṃ apūrvaghaṭādyutpattau ghaṭatvādiśūnye pradeśe paścādutpannād ghaṭāde"rbhinnadeśaṃ" yad dravyantadvarttinaḥ "sāmānyasya | kathanteṣu"
paścādutpanneṣu ghaṭādiṣu "sambhavo" naivetyabhiprāyaḥ | bhavet sambhavo yadi tasmāt "pūrvadravyā"t tatsāmānyampaścā"dutpadyamānandravyaṃ yāti" | tacca nāstītyāha | "yasmādi"tyādi | "tadi"ti sāmānyaṃ "pūrvadravyā"diti yatra tatpūrvaṃ samavetaṃ tasmā"dutpitsu" dravya mutpattumicchu pūrvaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ na "yāti" | amūrttatvena "niṣkriyatvā"t sāmānyasya |
pūrvadravyādacalatopi bhinnadeśena yogo bhaviṣyati vimbasyādarśa iveti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | "anyadravyavṛtte"rityutpitsudravyād bhinnadeśadravyavṛtterbhāvasya sāmānyākhyasya tataḥ pūrvakādāśrayā"dacalatastadubhayāntarālāvyāpinaḥ" pūrvapaścādutpannadvayāntarālāvyāpinaḥ svāśrayād "bhinnadeśena" dravyeṇa yogo "na hi yukta" iti "sambandhaḥ" | bimbasya tu bhinnadeśe nādarśena yogostīti bruvāṇaḥ kathannonmataḥ syāt | sāmagrībalād bhrāntaṃ jñānaṃ pratibimbānugatādarśapratibhāsi tatra jāyate | yathoktaṃ |

[302,2]

"viruddhapariṇāmeṣu vajrādarśatalādiṣu | parvatādisvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānāṃ nāsti sambhava iti | "

[302,3]

yepi tatra bhāvāntarotpattimicchanti | teṣāmapi na bimbena yogostīti yatkiñcidetat | utpitsudravyāt "prāk" sāmānyātmā "na ca tatro"tpitsudeśe"āsīt" | vyaktiśūnye deśe tasya sthānānabhyupagamāt | asti paścāt tatsāmānyaṃvyaktāvutpannāyāṃ | sāmānyaśūnyāyā vyakteranabhyupagamāt | na ca tatra deśe vyaktyā sahotpannaṃ nityatvāt | na ca vyaktyutpāda eva sāmānyasyotpādo bhinnatvāt |
abhinnatve vā tato na sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ syāt | "na ca kutaścit" pūrvakād vyaktiviśeṣād"āgataṃ" | etanna "yātī"ti yaduktantasyaivopasaṃhāradvāreṇopanyāsaḥ |

[303,1]

yāvadbhiḥ prakāraiḥ sāmānyasya vyaktyantare sambhavaste prakārā neṣyante tatra ca sāmānyamiṣyata iti vyāghātaḥ | sa ca prājñānānduḥsahatvād bhāraḥ | ata evāha | "ka imami"tyādi | prājño hi kathamayuktaṃ sahate | jaḍastvajñānād yuktāyuktavicāraṇākṣamaḥ sahetāpi | yadāhānyatra "jāḍyā"diti |

[303,2]

nanu cotpitsudravye sāmānyasyotpattāvapi samavetatvaṃ pratibhāsādevāvagantavyaṃ |
sa ca vyaktisamavetatvapratibhāsonutpādepi sāmānyasya vidyata eveti kimutpādena vyaktisamavetañca sāmānyasya rūpamiṣyate | tena tatpūrvadravyasamavetamapi tato'vicaladutpitsudravyasamavetaṃ ca pratibhāsata iti katha"nna yātī"tyādi dūṣaṇāyocyatebhīṣṭatvāt |

[303,3]

sattyaṃ | yo hi sāmānyasya pratibhāsaṃ necchati tasyedaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāt "pratibhāsata"
iti | yastu sāmānyapratibhāsolīka iti manyate tasya kathaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ | alīkatvaṃ cotpitsu dravyaṃ na yāti na ca tatrāsīnna cotpannamityādinā granthena sāmānyābhāvepi sāmānyāvabhāsino jñānasyotpatteḥ pratipāditamā cā rye ṇa | na ca pratibhāsanādeva satyatvaṃ | dvicandrāderapi satyatvaprasaṅgāt |

[303,4]

nāpi pratyakṣabādhaikā bādhā | anumānabādhāyā api bādhātvāt | yadi tadaṃśavat syāttadaikenāṃśena pūrvambhinnādhāre sthitamaṃśāntareṇotpitsu dravyaṃ vyāpnuyāt |
anaṃśamvā pūrvamādhāraṃ hitvā | dvayamapyetannāstītyāha | "na ce"tyādi | "pūrvamādhāra"miti sū tra bhāgaṃ | "utpitsudeśād bhinnadeśami"ti miśrakeṇa spaṣṭayati | "tayośce"ti pūrvapaścādutpannayordravyayoḥ |

[303,5]

"bhinne"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "dvidhā bhave"diti | nānāvayavātmatayā | pūrvādhāratyāgena vā | prathamantāvat pakṣamāha | "nāne"tyādi | etacca paraprasiddhyocyate |
na tvekamanekāvayavātmakamiṣyata ityuktaṃ | "anyānyobhyā"mavayavābhyāmparasparabhinnābhyāmaṃśākhyā"ntatsambandhā"t | tābhyāmbhinnadeśābhyāṃ sambandhāt | "āloko" hi sāvayavatvādanyenāvayavena ghaṭena sambadhyate | anyena ghaṭādibhiḥ | evaṃ "rajjuvaṃśa"daṇḍādāvapi svasambandhibhiḥ |

[304,1]

"na hī"tyādyasyaiva samarthanaṃ | atha sāvayavatvena sāmānyamanekavṛttīṣyeta | tathāpi kathamekamanekatra vartteta | yasmādekadeśāḥ sāmānyasya varttanta iti | ye ca tadaikadeśāḥ sāmānyasya pratyekampiṇḍeṣu varttante | te kiṃ sāmānyātmakā uta neti |
yadi sāmānyātmakā ekamekatra varttata iti prāptaṃ | na caikamekatra varttamānaṃ sāmānyamiti yuktamvaktuṃ | atha na sāmānyātmakāste | kathaṃ sāmānyamanekatra varttata ityucyate | ekadeśeṣu ca sāmānyasya yadyekadeśāntareṇa vṛttistadānavasthā syāt | "na ca sāvayavatvamantareṇaika"syānekatra "vṛttiryuktā" | athānavayavaṃ pratipiṇḍaṃ parisamāptyā piṇḍavadasādhāraṇatvānna sāmānyambhavitumarhati | kiṃ kāraṇa"ntasyā"navayavasya sāmānyasyaikena dravyeṇa sambandho ya ātmā | tadvyatirekeṇa "ditīyātmābhāvāt | ekātmanaśca"
tasya sāmānyasya "tatpradeśavarttisambandharūpatvāt" | utpitsughaṭadeśāt | pūrvadeśavartti yad ghaṭadravyantatsambandhirūpatvāt | nāsti bhinnadeśena yugapadyogaḥ | "anyathe"tyutpitsudeśadravyasambandharūpatve "tatsambadhāyogāt" | tena pūrvadravyeṇa sambandhāyogāt | tasmādekavyaktiniyatātmanaḥ sāmānyasya nāsti "tasminneva kāle" bhinnadeśena dravyeṇa sambandhaḥ |
sambandhe vā pūrvavyaktiniyataikātmakatvena sāmānyasya pūrvavyaktau sthitistasminneva kāle bhinnadeśavyaktisambandhenāsthitiretaccaviruddhamityāha | "ekasyādheya"syetyādi | "tatra sthānami"ti pūrvavyaktau | "tadaiva" tasminneva kāle vyaktyantare tvayābhyapagamāt |
pūrvavyaktityāgamantareṇaikasya cānyatrānvayāyogāt | tatra pūrvasyāṃ vyaktau | "tenaiva"
pūrvavyaktiniyatenātmanā | tasya sāmānyasyāsthānamitya"yuktame"tat | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tatsthite"tyādi | tasyāmeva vyaktau "sthitāsthitātma"noḥ svabhāvayo"rekasya" sāmānyasya"yugapad virodhā"t |

[305,1]

nanu yathaikatyāgenāparatra vṛttirevamaparāparāvayavairbahuṣu ca vṛttirdṛṣṭatvāditi dvividhābhyupagamyate | tathā sāmānyaṃ yadā yenaiva rūpeṇaikatra vṛttantadaiva tenaiva rūpeṇānyatra varttate dṛṣṭatvāditi sāpi tṛtīyā vṛttiḥ kinnābhyupagamyate | taduktambha ṭṭena ||

[305,2]

"na hi dvaividhyameveti vṛtterasti niyāmakaṃ | trividhāpi hi dṛṣṭatvāt sambhaved dvividhā yatheti | "

[305,3]

u dyo ta ka ro pyāha | "na gotvamavayavī na ca samudāyastasmānna tatra kṛtsnaikadeśaśabdau staḥ | na cet tatraitau śabdau staḥ tasmād gotvaṃ kiṃ kṛtsnamvarttate utaikadeśeneti na yuktaḥ praśnaḥ | kathantarhi gotvaṃ goṣu varttate | āśrayāśrayibhāvena | kaḥ punarāśrayāśrayibhāvaḥ | samavāyaḥ | tatra vṛttimad gotvaṃ | vattiḥ samavāya iha pratyayahetutvāttena sarvatra pūrvadravya utpitsudravye ca samavāya eva vṛttirataḥ kathamucyate |
sthitāsthitātmanorekatra virodhādayuktametadi" ti |

[305,4]

etadevāha | sarvatretyādi | "sarvatra" pūrvavyaktāvutpitsudravye ca | "sarvade"votyatsudravyotpādepi yadā varttate tadāpi dravyanna "jahāti" | tena sthitāsthitātmanornaikatra virodho sthitātmano'bhāvāditi | tadayuktaṃ | na hyekasamavetatvamevānyavyaktisamavetatvamanyasyāstatra pratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt | tasmādekasamavetatvānyasamavetatvayoḥ parasparaṃ bheda eva | taccābhinnaṃ sāmānyādekasamavetatvādananugamavadanyatra sāmānyasyāpyananugamaprasaṅgaḥ | yadvaikavyaktikālādisambandhena jñānajananaśaktiryāsāmanyasya | na sā'nyavyaktyādisambandhatvena | tenaikasyāṃ vyaktau sāmānyasya jñānajananaśaktiranyasyāṃ jñānajananaśaktivirodhinī | śaktiśca śaktimato'bhinnā | śaktilakṣaṇatvācca vastunaḥ | tena yadvastvekantadekavṛttyeveti vyāptisiddhiḥ | vastu caikaṃ sāmānyaṃ yadi kathamanyatrāpi vartteta | tathābhūtasya pratibhāsāditi cet | na | pratibhāso hyapratibhāsasya bādhako nāvastunastasyāpi pratibhāsanāt | asya tu vastupratibhāso bādhako na cānugataṃ vastvastītyuktaṃ | ata eva na pratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣabādhā | sāmānyajñānasya pratyakṣatvābhāsācca |

[305,5]

nanu yāvadasyāprāmāṇyaṃ na tāvadanumānasya prabṛttiryāvacca nānumānasya pravṛttistāvannāsya pratyakṣābhāsatetyanyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāditi cet | na | yatonumānaṃ pratibhāsamānasya vastutvasandehamātreṇaiva pravarttate | nāpyasyāprāmāṇyanimittamanumānampravarttatepi tu svasādhyapratibaddhaliṅganimittam | ataḥ sāmānyajñānasya bādhakantasmānnāsti paramārthata ekamvastvekadā'nekavṛttiḥ | vṛttau tu tatsthitāsthitātmanorvirodha eva | ā cā rya stvabhyupagamyāpi doṣamāha | "tatsvabhāvet"yādi | sāmānyasvabhāvasya "darśanamāśrayo" yasya pratyayasya sa "sarvatra" bhinnajātīyepi dravye "sarvākārasyāt | tathā ca sati gāmapyaśva" ityādi | kiṅkāraṇam | ityāha | "aśve" ātmā yasya dravyatvasyeti vigrahaḥ | gamakatvād vyadhikaraṇasyāpi bahubrīhiḥ |
aśve sthita iti vā "sādhanaṃ kṛte"ti samāsaḥ | paścādātmaśabdena dvipado bahubrīhiḥ | "tatsvabhāvapratipattyā" cāśvasthitasvabhāvadravyatvapratipattyā ca "tathā niścayād"
gaurdravyamiti niścayāt |

[306,1]

syādetat | nāśvasamavetadravyatvapratipattyā dravyamiti pratītiḥ | kintarhi | dravyatvamātrapratipattyetyata āha | "tasya ce"tyādi | "tasya" cāśve dravyatva"syaikasyādṛ"ṣṭasyāpratipannasyāśvasamavetatvavyatireke"ṇākārāntara"syāśvāsaḥ sa mavetatvalakṣaṇasyā"bhāvāt" | tasmādaśvasamavetenaiva dravyatvena viśiṣṭāṃ gāṃ dravyamiti pratipadyamānośva iti pratīyāt | yasya tvaśvavyatiriktameva dravyatvasāmānyantena ca viśiṣṭamasau gāṃ pratipadyamāno niyamenāśva iti pratīyāt |

[306,2]

"tasmādi"tyupasaṃhāraḥ | anavayavaṃ sāmānya"manekadeśe"'neko deśo'syeti tasmin ghaṭādau "yugapannādhīyate" | nādheyatāṃ pratipadyate | iyatā ca na "cāṃśavadi"tyetad vyākhyātaṃ |

[306,3]

"jahāti pūrvannādhāra"mityetat pūrvetyādinā vyācaṣṭe | sa ceti pūrvādhāratyāgaḥ sāmānyasya "nābhimataḥ" | (154–55)

[306,4]

"anyatreti" pūrvavyaktau "varttamānasya" sāmānyasya "svasmāt" pūrvādhāradeśād "acala"tastataḥ pūrvādhāradeśādanyatra sthāne janma yasya dravyasya tasmin vṛttirityatiyuktimadityupahasati 156

[307,1]

pūrvavyaktideśādavicaladapi sāmānyantatonyadeśandravyaṃ vyāpnotīti cedāha |
yatretyādi | yatra deśe'sau paścātkālabhāvī bhāvo varttate | tena deśena sāmānyaṃ na sambadhyate svavyaktisarvagatatvābhyupagamāt | yatra deśe sāmānyaṃ na varttate taddeśinaṃ ca paścāt kālabhāvinambhāvaṃ vyāpnotīti nyāyātikrāntatvāt kimapyetanmahādbhutamiti prakārāntareṇopahasati | na hi yo yatra deśe na varttate sa taddeśaṃ vyāpnotīti nyāyānusāriṇā śakyamavasātuṃ 157

[307,2]

sarvagatatvakalpanāmapi nirācikīrṣannāha | "yasye"tyādi | tasyāpi sarvagatasāmānyavādinaḥ sarvatragā yadi jātistadaikatra śāvaleyādau yā tasyāvyaktirabhivyaktistayā karaṇabhūtayā | sā jātissarvatra vyaktiśūnyepi deśe | vijātīyavyaktibhede ca "vyaktaiva" prakāśitai"vābhedādeka"tvāt sarvatra vyaktiśūnyepi deśe dṛśyeta |

[307,3]

etaduktambhavati | yadyapi vyaktiśūnye pradeśe vijātīyavyaktau ca svavyaktervyañjikāyā abhāvastathāpi svavyaktyabhivyaktenaiva rūpeṇa tatrāvasthānājjāterupalambhaḥ syānno cet svabhāvanānātvaṃ prāpnotītyekarūpā ceṣyata iti bhāvaḥ | "na jā"ternityāyā anādheyātiśayatvena "kadācidabhivyaktiriti niṣiddhametat" | " vṛttirādheyatā vyaktiriti tasminna yujyata"1 | 146 ityatrāntare | yata eva"ntasmāt" sā jāti"rnityamanapekṣitaparopaskārā"nādheyātiśayā | evambhūtā yadi svabhāvena svavijñānajananayogyā | tadā nitya"ndṛśyeta" vyakteḥ prāk paścācca | atha na yogyā tadā kadācid daśyeta | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasmin" vijñānajananayogya"svabhāve" tadviparīte "cāvasthānāt" |
sarvakālamekarūpatvādityarthaḥ | asamarthā vyaktyasannidhāne tatsannidhāne tu samarthā bhavati | tato na nityandarśanamadarśanamvā jāterityata āha | "svabhāve" tyādi | nityatvenānādheyātiśayatvāditi bhāvaḥ || (157–58)

[308,1]

yadi jāternāsti vyaktistatkiṃ vyaktyaivaikatra sā vyaktetyādyucyata ityata āha | "abhyupagamyā"pītyādi | "vyāpi"nyapi jātiḥ | "ekatrā"śraye vyaktā "bhedābhāvāde"katvājjāte"rvyaktaiva" prakāśitaiva "sarvatra vyaktiśūnye de"śe | vijātīye ca vyaktibhede | "vyaktiśūnyeṣvapītyapi" śabdād vijātīyepi vyaktibhede | api ca "na ca sā" jāti"rvyaktyapekṣiṇī" | vyañjikā vyaktirnnāpekṣyeta | vyakterjātivyañjakatvābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ | yadi hi vyañjikāṃ vyaktimapekṣeta | tadā "vyañjakāpratipattau na vyaṅgyasya pratī"tiḥ syānna hi pradīpādyapratītau ghaṭādeḥ pratītirbhavati | tathehāpi vyaktyapratītau na jātipratītiḥ syāt | "sāmānyatadvato"stu vyaṅgyavyañjakayo"rviparyayaḥ punaḥ kasmādiṣṭaḥ" | tathā hi nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇāviśeṣye buddhirvarttata iti niyamāt | prāgeva sāmānyagrahaṇamiṣṭantaddvāreṇa tu vyakteḥ | tato vyañjikāyā vyaktergrahaṇamantareṇāpi vyaṅgyābhimatasya sāmānyasya pratipattiriṣṭeti viparyayaḥ |

[308,2]

"yo hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "svāśra"yo yatra samavetaṃ sāmānyaṃ | sāmānyagrāhaka"mindriyaṃ" ca tayos"saṃyoga"stada"pekṣā" pratītiryasya "sāmānyasya" tattathoktaṃ | "āśrayaśūnyāḥ"
pradeśā vijātīyavyaktyadhyāsitā vyaktiśūnyāśca | teṣu "na dṛśyate" | yathoktasaṃyogābhāvāt | tasyāpyevaṃ vādinaḥ | kvacid vyaktirdarśane satyastyev"āśrayendriyasaṃyogo" jāteḥ sarvatra sthitāyā u"pakāra"ka iti | tata āśrayendriyasaṃyogāddheto"staddarśī"
kvacid vyaktibhede jātidarśī "yathāsthitāṃ" sarvadeśavyāpinīñjāti"mpaśyet" |
yatraiva vyañjikā vyaktistatraiva jāteḥ svarūpaṃ dṛśyaṃ nānyatreti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | "tasyāmiti" jātau | kvacid vyaktau "dṛśyamānāyā"ntadīyāmiti sāmānyasambandhi |
ekasya dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhāt | evantāvad vyaktervyañjikātvamabhyupagamya ca śabdopāttortho vyākhyātaḥ |

[309,1]

adhunā na sā vyaktyapekṣiṇītyādi vyākhyātumāha | "vyaktivyaṅgya"tvādityādi |
tasya ca mithyātvamanantaroktenaiva pratipāditaṃ | na hyekasya dṛṣṭādṛṣṭamastyato'pūrvapakṣa evāyaṃ kevalandoṣāntarābhidhānārthaṃ gajanimīlanaṃ kṛtvopanyastaṃ | tathābhūtasyeti nyāyyasya | "tatreti" jātitadvati | nyāyyasya "vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasyābhāvāt" |
kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "svetyā"di | hi yasmāt | "svarūpaśūnye" deśe pradīpādirahite deśe |
svavyaṅgyaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ | "naivaṃ" yatho"kte"na nyāyena "vyakti"rvyañjikā "sāmānyasya" |
kiṅkāraṇam | viparyayāt | yasmādagṛhītvāpi vyaktiṃ sāmānyamādau gṛhyata itīṣyate pareṇa | sāmānyagrahaṇadvāreṇaiva vyaktergrahaṇābhyupagamādataśca vyañjakāpratipattyāpi vyaṅgyasya grahaṇāt | vyañjakadharmātikramo vyakteḥ |

[309,2]

etadevāha | "kathaṃ" hītyādi | seti vyaktiḥ sāmānyasya vyañjikā ca syāditi "sambandhaḥ | tatpratipattidvāreṇeti" sāmānyapratipattidvāreṇa | sā vyaktirdṛśyā syāditi viruddhametat | "eva"miti sāmānyadarśanabalena | vyakterdarśanebhyupagamyamāne | "vyaṅgyā" sā vyaktiḥ "prasajya"te sāmānyañcetyadhyāhāraḥ | "pradīpena ghaṭavadi"ti |
tṛtīyeti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ | supsupeti vā samāsaḥ | yathā pradīpena ghaṭo vyaṅgyastadvatsāmānyena vyaktirvyaṅgyā prāpterthaḥ | tat"pratipattimantare"ṇa sāmānyapratipattimvinā vyakte"radṛśyarūpatvāt | anye tvāhuḥ" | vyaṅgyā ca saivaṃ prasajyata ityatra caśabdena sāmānyavyañjakamityetadupāttaṃ | tataḥ pradīpaghaṭābhyāṃ tulyamiti dvandvādeva vatirdraṣṭavyaḥ | pūrvanipātalakṣaṇasya vyabhicāritvād ghaṭaśabdasyāpūrvanipātaḥ |
pradīpavat sāmānyaṃ vyañjakaṃ | ghaṭavacca vyaktirvyaṅgyā | "prasajyata" iti vākyārtha iti | aneneti "sāmānyavādi"nā | sāmānyamvinā "ki"masambhavatkāryama"bhisamīkṣya" |
evamityuktavidhinā | "bahvāyāsaḥ" | aśakyasādhanatayā bahuduḥkhahetuḥ | (158–59)

[309,3]

"paraspare"tyādi paraḥ | "bhedā"dvilakṣaṇatvāddhetorvyatirekiṇīṣvananvayinīṣu | "anvayina" ekākārasya "pratyaya"sya pratyayagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamevaṃ śabdasya | sāmānyamantareṇā"yogā"t | sāmānyavāda āśrita iti sambandhaḥ |

[309,4]

"katha"mityācā ryaḥ | ye "pācakā"diśabdā na kriyānimittānicchanti tān pratyetaduktaṃ | abhinnena sāmānyākhye"nārthena vinā pācakādiṣu" kathamekaḥ śabdo "vācakaḥ" |
vācakagrahaṇena pratyayo"nvayī" gṛhīta eva tena vinā śabdasyāpravṛtteḥ | ata eva vṛ ttau "śabdapratyayānuvṛttirastī"tyāha |

[310,1]

u dyo ta ka re ṇāpi gavādiṣvanuvṛttipratyayaḥ piṇḍādivyatiriktanimittād bhavati viśeṣapratyayānāmanākasmikatvānnīlādipratyayavat | yattannimittantatsāmānyamiti sāmānyasiddhau pramāṇe kṛte svayamevāśaṃkitam |

[310,2]

atha manyase yathā pācakādiśabdā anuvṛttāśca bhavanti na ca pācakatvannāma sāmānyamasti | yadi syāt | bhāvotpattikāla evābhivyaktaṃ syāt tathā gavādiṣvanuvṛttipratyayā iti | na | hetvarthāparijñānāt | viśeṣapratyayānāmanākasmikatvādityasya hetoḥ piṇḍapratyayavyatiriktasya pratyayasya nimittāntarādutpāda ityayamarthaḥ | na punaḥ sarvānuvṛttipratyayaḥ sāmānyādeva bhavatīti | evañca sati pacanakriyāyā yatpradhānaṃ sādhanantatpācakaśabdenocyate | tacca prādhānyaṃ pācakāntareṣvapyastīti na doṣa iti vadatā pācakatvādisāmānyamvinā pācakādiśabdānāṃ vṛttiriṣṭaivo dyo ta ka re ṇetyanenābhiprāyeṇā cā rye ṇāpyuktaṃ kathamityādi |

[310,3]

na ca pacanakriyāyāṃ prādhānyanimittāyāṃ pācakādiśabdapravṛttiryuktā | ta nnimittatve hi pradhānaṃ pradhānamityanugāmī śabdaḥ syānna pācaka iti | ata evāha | "na hī"tyādi | "teṣvi"ti pācakādiṣu | "anyaditi" dravyād vyatiriktaṃ |
evaṃ sarvaśaktiṣva"bhinnaṃ yenai"kena te pācakādayo bhinnāssantopi "tathe"tyabhedena "pratīyeran"
jñānena | upalakṣaṇametat tathābhidhīyeran | pācakeṣvadhiśrayaṇādilakṣaṇaṃ | pāṭhakeṣvadhyayanātmakamevamanyeṣvapi yathāyogyaṃ | karmaikapratyayādinimittamastīti "cet |
sa" ityanvayī | pratyayagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamevaṃ śabdopi | anyena veti "karmaṇo" hetunā prayatnādinā | "bhinna"mityādinaitadeva samarthayate | "tadi"ti bāhyopanyāse | tatkarmetivā sambandhanīyaṃ | pratipācakaṃ karmaṇo bhedāt | yenāparādhena "tā" vyaktaya"stathe"tyabhinnapratyaya hetutvena |

[311,1]

sattyaṃ | na kaścidaparādhaḥ kintu tāsāṃ vyaktīnā"mekarūpatvā"t | tathā hi dravyamekarūpamanaṃśatvāt | etadeva ceda"bhinnapratya"yanibandhanaṃ na tu tato vyatiriktaṃ dharmāntarantadā pācakasya pācakatvamiti "vyatirekapratītirna syāt" | na hi tasyaiva tato vyatireko yuktaḥ | tasyāvyakterākārasta"dākā"rastasmādanyo'bhedākārastasya"viśeṣaḥ" sosti yasyāṃ "sā atadākāraviśeṣavatī" | dravyākārādanyākāretyarthaḥ |

[311,2]

etaduktambhavati | dravyebhya eva pratyayo dravyamityevamākāraḥ | tatonyenaivākāreṇa pācakapratyayaḥ pratiṣedhapratyayas sa yadi dravyanimittameva syāt tadā dravyamātrapratyayāviśiṣṭaḥ syāt | atha kimarthamatadākāraviśeṣavatītyubhayamuktamatadākāretyeva vaktavyaṃ | viśeṣavatītyeva vā | ucyate'bhedākāretyukte dravyasyābhāva iti pratiṣedhapratyayopyatadākāra iti śakyeta vyapadeṣṭuṃ na cāsau vastvantaranibaṃndhanaḥ pareṇeṣṭaḥ |
viśeṣapratyayānāmeva dharmāntaranibandhanatvāt | viśeṣagrahaṇe ca kevale kriyamāṇe |
caitrapratyayo maitrāpekṣayā bhavati viśeṣavān | na tvatadākāraḥ | caitrādyabhidhānena dravyasyaiva pratipādanāt | ubhayopādānāttvayamartho bhavatyadravyākāraścāsau pratyayo vastusparśād viśeṣavāṃśceti | tasmāt tatra dravyavyatirikte na nimittāntareṇa bhāvyamiti |

[311,3]

"uktami"tyā cā ryaḥ | yathā vyatireko gorgotvaṃ pācakasya pācakatvamityādiko yathā ca viśeṣapratyayā anantaroktāstathoktamiti sambandhaḥ | kathamuktamityāha | "yathāsvami"tyādi | "arthāntaraviveko"rthāntaravyavacchedaḥ | "yathāsvamiti" yasya śabdasya"yathāsaṃketaṃ" yo vyavacchedastasmādityarthaḥ | tathā hi pācakaśabdo'pācakavyavacchinnamapratikṣiptabhedāntaraṃ pratipādayan dharmivacanaḥ | pācakatvaśabdastu tameva vyavacchinnaṃ pratikṣiptabhedāntaramāheti dharmavacanaḥ | tato dharmadharmibhedakalpanayā pācakasya pācakatvamiti vyatirekavibhaktiḥ prayujyate | evaṃ dravyaśabdasyāpyadravyavyavacchinne svabhāve saṃketitatvāt tadanusāreṇādravyāvyavacchedānusāreṇādravyavyavacchedānukāriṇī buddhirutpadyate | pācakaśabdāt tvapācakavyavacchinnānukāriṇyeva buddhirato yathāvyavacchedaṃ saṃketānusāreṇa viśeṣavatī buddhirekatrāpyaviruddhā | etacca bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepetyādiṣu pratipāditaṃ |

[312,1]

"tasmā"dityādinopasaṃhāraḥ | yathā "vyaktī"nāṃ bhedastadvat karmaṇopi bhedāddhetorasya "pācakādyabhedapratyayasya" na hetuḥ karmeti sambandhaḥ | "teṣāṃ" pācakānāṃ yāni"karmā"ṇi pākākhyāni teṣu karmasu yā pācakatva"jātiḥ" samavetā saivābhedāddhetuḥ pācakābhedapratyayasya | "netyā"dinā pratiṣedhati | na jātirheturiti prakṛtaṃ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "karmasaṃśra"yāt | karmaṇi samavetatvāt | dravyā"darthāntaraṃ" karma tatsambandhinī | arthāntara iti dravye | "gotvamiveti" nidarśanaṃ | na hi gotvaṃ śābaleyādisambandhi | karkkādiṣvaśvabhedeṣu gopratyayahetuḥ | "pācakakarmasu" pākākhyeṣu karmajātissamavetā | na ca tāni karmāṇīti pākākhyāni | śabdagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ | tathā pācakapratyayena pari cchidyante | tasya pākākhyasya karmaṇa āśrayo dravyaṃ pācakaśabdenocyate | na ca tatra dravye "karmajātissa"mavetā |

[312,2]

evantāvada"rthāntarasamba"ndhitvaṃ karmajāterāśritya dravyaviṣayaṃ pācakābhidhānapratyayaṃ pratyayanimittatvamuktam | (159–60)

[312,3]

adhunā prakārāntareṇāha | "tasye"tyādi | "pācakaśra"teranyā śrutiḥ "śrutyantaraṃ" | śrutigrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamevaṃ jñānāntaranimittatvāt | śrutyantaramevāha | "pāka" ityādi | tata iti karmajāteḥ karmaviṣayasyābhidhānasya pratyayasya ca hetutvāt karmajāterityabhiprāyaḥ |

[312,4]

syānmataṃ | na karmajātiḥ pācakapratyayaṃ janayati kintu karmajātisamāśrayāt karmaivetyata āha | "tasye"tyādi | tasyeti pācakādyabhedapratyayasya | "karmanimittaṃ yasyeti"
vigrahaḥ | proktaṃ vyaktivad bhedānna "hetuḥ karmāsye"tyādi |

[312,5]

nanūktaṃ jātisamāśrayād bhinnamapi karmābhinnapratyayaheturiti |

[313,1]

uktamidamayuktantūktaṃ | jātisambandhepi karmaṇastathaiva bhinnatvāt | "kiñce"tyādinopacayahetumāha | "tasya" pācakādyabhedapratyayasya karmanimittatve'bhyupagamyamāne | "niruddhe karmaṇi" puruṣaḥ "pācaka iti nocyeta" | ucyate ca yogyatāmātreṇa | tato na vastubhūtakriyānimittoyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ | atītasyāpi karmaṇostitvādadoṣa iti cedāha"pacata" evetyādi | yadyatītasya sattvaṃ syād varttamānavadupalabhyetopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ ca karmeṣyate |

[313,2]

syānmataṃ | karmajātiḥ karmaṇi samavetā karmāpi dravye samavetantataḥ sambaddhasambandhāt karmajātirdravyaviṣayasya pācakapratyayasya heturiti cedāha | "tata eve"tyādi | "tata eve"ti karmaṇo vinaṣṭatvādeva na sāmānyasya karmaṇā sambandhaḥ sākṣāt | nāpi karmadvāreṇa pāramparyeṇa dravyasambandhosyā"sambandhāt" kāraṇā"nna sāmānyaṃ" pācakādyabhidhānapratyayasya hetuḥ | asambaddhamapi heturiti cedāha | "ne"tyādi | ayuktamityasambaddhaṃ | śabdagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamasambaddhaṃ sāmānyaṃ na jñānaśabdakāraṇamityarthaḥ |
kutaḥ | "atiprasaṅgāt" | gotvamapyaśvajñānasya hetuḥ syāt | (160–61)

[313,3]

vinaṣṭe hītyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "tat sāmānyami"ti karmasāmānyanna karmaṇi samavetantasyāsattvāt | karmābhāvādeva karttari pācake pāramparyeṇāpi samavetam |
ataḥ sambaddhasambandhopyasya sāmānyasya dravyeṇa saha nāsti | "anyathe"tyasambaddhasyāpi jñānādihetutve | sthityabhāvācca karmaṇa ityādi yaduktaṃ | tadatītetyādinā pakṣāntaramāśaṃkate | "atītaṃ" yadvinaṣṭaṃ | "anāgataṃ" yad bhaviṣyati karma | "tayoriti" śabdajñānayoḥ | karmāpyatītānāgatamasat | "jñānābhidhānayorni"mittamitisambandhaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tayorityādi | tayorjñānābhidhānayoḥ |

[314,1]

"asatī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | upākhyāyate prakāśyate vastvanayetyupākhyārthakriyāśaktiḥ | sā nirgatā yasmādasatastattathoktaṃ | "asad" yasmādarthakriyā"śaktivikalaṃ" |
tadevaṃbhūtaṃ kathaṃ śabdajñānayornimittaṃ syādityarthaḥ |

[314,2]

athāsatopi hetutvamiṣyate tadā tasya vastutvameva syānnāsattvaṃ | kiṅkāraṇamityāha | kāryetyādi | lakṣaṇaśabdaḥ svabhāvavacanaḥ | taditi tasmāt | atītaṃ pracyutarūpaṃ | anāgatamasaṃprāptarūpaṃ | karmaṇaḥ sakāśādanyacca vyaktyādikaṃ jñānābhidhānayornimittatvena "neṣṭaṃ" sāmānyavādinā |

[314,3]

"vyaktiḥ karmāśrayo dravyaṃ | "

[314,4]

ādiśabdāt saṃketavāsanā tatparipākayorgrahaṇaṃ | te iti śabdajñāne | tathā"cetya"nvayinoḥ pācakādiśabdajñānayoranimittatve sati na jātisiddhiḥ | caśabdāt nityaṃ sattvamasattvamvā śabdajñānayoḥ syāt | kasmānna jātisiddhirityāha | tasyā ityādi | "tasyā jāte"rabhinnasya "jñānasyābhidhānasya ca nimittatveneṣṭatvāt | yathā"
ca pācakādiviṣaye | te animitte pravarttete tathā gavādāvapīti kena nibandhanena jātiḥ kalpyeta |

[314,5]

"śakti"rityādinā pakṣāntaramāśaṃkate | karmāśrayasya dravyasya śaktiḥ | śabdagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ | pācakādi jñānasyāpi śaktirnimittaṃ | netyādinā pratiṣedhati | na pācakādiśaktiḥ pācakādiśabdanimittaṃ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | śakterdravyāvyatirekeṇa dravyavadevānanvayādananvayinaścārthasyānvayijñānābhidhānaṃ prati nimittatvānabhyupagamāt | abhyupagame vā jātikalpanāyā nirnibandhanatvaprasaṅgāt | bhinnaiva śaktiriti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | na hi dravyādanyaiva śaktiryadi syāttadā "tasyā" ekaśakteḥ "pākādyarthakriyāsūpayogena" kāraṇena "dravyasya" śaktyādhāra"syānupayogitvaprasaṅgāt" | tasyāṃ pākādinirvarttikāyāṃ śaktau tasya dravyasyopayogaḥ | evamapi pāramparyeṇa pākādau dravyamupayuktaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ |

[315,1]

"kimi"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | arthāntarabhūtayā "śaktyā" na kiñcit prayojanaṃ |
tathā hi pākādinirvarttikāyāṃ prathamāyāṃ "śaktau" dravyaṃ yayā śaktyopayujyeta | sāpi śaktiryadi vyatiriktā'bhyupagamyeta tadā pākādinirvarttikāyāṃ "śaktau" dravyasyo"payogāya śaktyantarasya" dravyād "vyatirekiṇo'bhyupagame'tiprasaṅgāt" | tasyāmapi śaktāvupayogāyāparā vyatiriktā śaktiḥ kalpanīyā tatrāpyaparetyanavasthā syādityarthaḥ |
tasmādantareṇa vyatiriktaṃ śaktiṃ "dravyameva" prathamāyāṃ pākādinirvirttikāyāṃ śaktā"vupayujyata iti vācyaṃ" | evaṃ ca dravyasyopayoge "śaktā"viṣyamāṇe | taddravyama"rthakriyāyāṃ"
pākādilakṣaṇāyā"mevopayujyata iti kinneṣyate" | dravyasyārthakriyāyāścāntarāle "kimanarthikayā śaktyā" kalpitayā |

[315,2]

yata evanta"smāt" pākādyarthakriyāśaktirityanena dravyamevocyate | kimbhūtantatkāryaṃ tatpākādi kāryaṃ yasya | tacca dravyaṃ vyaktyantaraṃ nānvetīti kṛtvā | tato dravyāt pācakaḥ pācaka itya"nvayī śabdo na syā"jjñānañca | śabdagrahaṇaṃ tūpalakṣaṇaṃ | (161–62) ||

[315,3]

pācakādiṣu dravyeṣu pācakatvādisāmānyamasti tadanvayi śabdajñānanibandhanamiti cedāha | "sāmānyami"tyādi | "sāmānyaṃ pācakatvādi" yadīṣyate | tadā pākādinirvarttanaśaktyavasthāyāḥ "prāgeva" dravyasyotpattisamakāla eva dravyasamaveta"ntad bhavedi"tyarthaḥ |
tathā ca tadaharjātopi bālaḥ pācakādijñānābhidhānaviṣayaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ | "no cet"
prāgeva bhavet tadā "paścāda"pi na bhavet | tasya dravyasyāviśeṣāt | astyeva sarvakālaṃdravye pācakatvādi | kintu prāganabhivyaktamato na śabdajñānayornimittamityata āha | "vyaktami"ti | prāgevābhivyaktambhavedityarthaḥ | "sattādivat" | yathā sattādravyatvādi |
yāvaddravyabhāvi | arthakriyāyāśca prāgeva yogyadeśāvasthitaṃ dravyaṃ |

[316,1]

"athāpī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "satyarthe" jātyāśraye "tatsamavāyasya" sāmānyasamavāyasyā"kādācitkatvāt" sarvakālabhāvitvāt | etadeva draḍhayannāha | "yāvanti" hītyādi | "arthe" jātyāśraye | "samavāyadharmāṇi" sambandhayogyāni "tāni" sāmānyāni | "asyā"rthasya ya utpādaḥ | "tena saha samavayanti" | asmin sāmānyāśraya iti vibhaktivipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | utpādasamakālameva dravyeṇa saha sambadhyata iti yāvat | "iti samayaḥ" | sā mā nya vā di naḥ siddhāntaḥ | yadāho dyo ta ka raḥ | "prāggotvānnāsau gaurnāpyagauriti | kiṅkāraṇam | abhāve tau viśeṣaṇapratyayau na ca viśeṣaṇapratyayau viśeṣyasambandhamantareṇa bhavato na ca prāg gotvayogād vastu vidyate | na cāvidyamānaṃ gauriti vā'gauriti vā śakyate vyapadeṣṭuṃ | yadaiva vastūtpadyate tadaiva gotvenābhisambadhyata iti | tathā na satassattāsambandho nāsataḥ | yadaiva ca vastu tadaiva sattayā sambadhyata" iti |

[316,2]

atha siddhāntamatikramya paścād bhāvitvaṃ sāmānyasya kalpyate | "tadā tadvyatikrame"
siddhāntavyatikrame | tasya sāmānyasyāśrayasya dravyasya "paścāda"pyaviśeṣā"nna tatsamavāyaḥ syāt" | tena sāmānyena samavāyo na syāt |

[316,3]

yathā phalaikasvabhāvasyāpi raktatā prāṅ na bhavati | paścācca bhavati |
tadvatpuruṣasya pācakatvādisāmānyamityata āha | "tatsambandhī"tyādi | "tatsambandhisvabhāvavaiguṇyāt" | pācakatvādisāmānyasambandhisvabhāvavaiguṇyāt | sa iti sāmānyasamavāyaḥ | "tasyeti" puṃsaḥ | na hyaviguṇe svabhāve sthitasya tatsambandho na bhavet | "tatraiva" ca sāmānyasamavāyaviguṇe "svabhāve sthitasya" dravyasya paścāt sāmānyasamavāyo bhaviṣyatīti "duranva"yandurbodha"metat" | phalasyāpyāmrādeḥ pūrvaṃ paścācca yadyekasvabhāvatā | tatrāpi tulyaṃ codyaṃ | sāmānyasambaddhameva tadā dravyaṃ kriyopakārāpekṣantu sāmānyaṃ vyanakti | (162–63)

[317,1]

sā ca prāṅnāstīti na prāk sāmānyābhivyaktirityata āha | "kriyopakāre"tyādi | pākādilakṣaṇā kriyā | tatkṛto ya upakārasta"dapekṣasya" sāmānyaṃ prati"vyañjakatve"'bhyupagamyamāne | tasya dravyasyākṣaṇikatvāda"vikāriṇonapekṣā" sahakāriṇaṃ prati |

[317,2]

atha vikriyeta tadāpya"tiśayesya" dravyasya kṣaṇikatvamāpadyate | "kṣaṇikatvā"ccotpādānantaraṃ dhvaṃsinaḥ "kutaḥ kriyā" | yena tadupakārāpekṣaṃ jātervyañjakaṃ syāt |

[317,3]

"karmopakāre"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | adhiśrayaṇādilakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ karma | tatkṛta upakārotiśayastama"pekṣya" sthirasvabhāvasya pūrvasvabhāvādacalatonatiśayāt svabhāvāntarānupādānāt | "aviśeṣādhāyini" karmaṇi | "kāpekṣā" | naiva | "atiśaye vā"
dravyasya kriyākṛtebhyupagamyamāne'tiśayādhāyakasya karmaṇaḥ "kṣaṇikatvāt" tasyāpyupakāryasya dravyasya svabhāvabhūtenānyenātiśayenotpattavyaṃ |

[317,4]

yadi kriyākṛto'tiśayo na svabhāvabhūto "dravyasya" tadarthāntarasya karaṇād dravyaṃ naivopakṛtaṃ syāt | tasmād yathākriyākṣaṇaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ "svabhāvabhūtasyānyānyasyātiśayotpattestadapi" dravyaṃ devadattādi "kṣaṇikaṃ syāt | tata" iti kṣaṇikatvāt | "svotpattisthānavināśinaḥ" svasminnevotpattideśe vināśinaḥ puṃsaḥ "kṛtaḥ" pākalakṣaṇā"kriyā" | yadapekṣantat kriyāsāpekṣaṃ pācakādidravyasāmānyasya "vyañjakaṃ syāta" |

[317,5]

nanu ca prathamādikriyākṣaṇadvāreṇa dravyasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ kriyā'bhāve ca kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti cet | na | yataḥ kriyāsambandhotpannānāṃ kṣaṇānāmanyasyāḥ kriyāyāssāmānyābhivyañjikāyā abhāvādityarthaḥ |

[317,6]

tasmāt sthitametad yathā vastubhūtā jātirnāstīti | (163–64)

[317,7]

"kathantarhī"tyādi paraḥ |

[317,8]

yathetyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | "yathā — pācakādiṣu" pācakatvādisāmānyannāsti tathā prasādhitamatha ca tatra pravarttete "anvayinau jñānaśabdau" | tathānyatrāpyantareṇa sāmānyantau bhivaṣyataḥ |

[318,1]

"tadva"dityādi paraḥ | teṣviti pācakādiṣu sāmānyamvinā kathamanvayinorjñānaśabdayorvṛttiriti | tatonvayajñānaśabdavṛtteḥ pācakādiṣvapi pācakatvādisāmānyamastīti cintitametadanantaraṃ | tathā teṣu pācakatvādi sāmānyaṃ sa na sambhavatīti |

[318,2]

yadyanvayi rūpannāsti tatkimidānī"manimitte" te śabdajñāne "syātāṃ | netyādi"
si ddhā nta vā dī | astyeva tayornimittaṃ yat pareṇeṣyate tasya pratikṣepaḥ | tadevāha | "kintarhī"tyādi | vastubhūtaṃ sāmānya"mbāhyatatvaṃ nimitte" te na bhavataḥ | kintarhi tayornimittamityata āha | "yathā"svamityādi | yo ya ātmīyo "vāsanāprabodhasta"smādanvayino vikalpasyotpattiḥ | "tato vikalpotpatteḥ" sakāśād yathāvikalpaṃ"śabdā bhavanti | na punarvikalpābhidhānayorvastusattā" | anvayipadārtha"sattāsamāśraya ityuktaprāyametata" | avaśyaṃ caitadeṣṭavyaṃ | tathā hi yathāsvaṃ samavāya"vāsanāvaśāt"
siddhāntāśrayeṇa jñānavāsanānurodhād "virodhirūpasamāveśena" parasparaviruddharūpādhyāropeṇa pra dhā na kāryamī śva ra kāryamahetukaṃ samvṛttimātraṃ jagadityevaṃ sarvabhedeṣvanvayino"stayo"riti jñānābhidhānayoḥ | "aparāparadarśane"pīti parasparabhinnānāmarthānāndarśanepi | "na ca tatreti" pradhānādikāryatvena parasparaviruddhena rūpeṇa kalpiteṣvartheṣu | "tannibandha"naḥ śabdajñānayornibandhanaḥ | kasmānnāstītyāha | "parasparavirodhi"norityādi |

[318,3]

"aniyamene"tyādi paraḥ | sarvaṃ sarvatrānvayi jñānamabhidhānaṃ ca syāt |

[318,4]

etadeva sādhayannāha | na hyanimittamityādi |

[318,5]

nanu yathāsvaṃ vāsanāprabodhād vikalpotpatterityādinā tayoranimittatvaṃ pratiṣiddhamityanavakāśameva codyaṃ | evammanyate | āntarameva nimittantayoriṣyate tasya ca nimittasya kenacidāsattiviprakarṣābhāvāt | sarvatra sarvavikalpahetutvaṃ syāditi | na hyanimitte bhavadityatra bāhyanimittābhāvādanimittamiti draṣṭavyaṃ |

[319,1]

"nānimitte" iti si ddhā nta vā dī | aviśiṣṭanimitte | na bhavata ityarthaḥ |
ata evāha | "vāsanāviśeṣanimittatvāditi" | yathābhūtadarśanadvārāyātā vāsanā sā tatraivādhyavasitatadbhāvamvikalpaṃ janayati | na sarvatreti samudāyārthaḥ | tathābhūtamityanvayi rūpaṃ | "na cāsati tasminna"nvayini bāhye nimitte vikalpena na bhavitavyambhavitavyameva |

[319,2]

tadeva "supte"tyādinā sādhayati | suptaśca "taimirika"śca tābhyāmupa"labdhe"ṣvartheṣu gavādiṣu keśamakṣikādiṣu ca yathākramaṃ | "abhāve"ṣu śaśaviṣāṇādiṣu | samavā"yavāsa"nā |
yathā svaṃ siddhāntaṃ saṃketavāsanā tadbale"nāropitarūpaviśeṣe" pradhānakāryādiṣu | "tathā" vikalpotpatteranvayino "vikalpasyotpatteḥ" | na hyeteṣu yathokteṣu bāhyamanvayi rūpamasti | svapnatimiropalabdhānāmevāsattvāt | teṣāṃ cāsattvaṃ tṛtīye paricchede3 | 85 pratipādayiṣyate | siddhāntasamāropitasya tu parasparavirodhinoryugapadekatretyādinā pratipāditamevāsattvaṃ | "na ca te" vikalpāḥ svapnādyupalabdhe"ṣvasatsu"
vastubhūtānvayirūpamantareṇāpyutpadyaṃta iti "sarvatrā"rthāḥ "sarvākārā" bhavantyapi tu pratiniyatā eva | niyamahetuṃ cāha | "vibhāgenaivet"yādi | "tathaivopalabdhānā"miti vibhāgenopalabdhānāṃ | vibhāgenaiva "vikalpanāt" | suptatimirāvasthāyāntāvad bhrāntajñānārūḍhānāmarthānāṃ vibhāgenopalambhaḥ | siddhāntāropitānāmapi yathāsvaṃ siddhāntaśravaṇakāle | "śaśaviṣāṇami"tyādiṣvapi | śaśaviṣāṇaṃ bandhyāsuta iti vyavahāravyutpattikāle'nāditvād vyavahāravāsanāyāḥ | uktaṃ cātretyādi | "ekapratyamarśārthajñānādyekārthasādhana"1 | 75 ityatra |

[319,3]

api ca yathā dhavakhadirādayaḥ parasparabhinnāstathā gavādayaḥ | tatra "tulye bhede"kasmād vṛkṣatvaṃ dhavādiṣveva varttate na gavādiṣviti pṛṣṭena pareṇaitadeva vaktavyaṃ bhāvaśaktireva sā dhavādīnāṃ yena ta eva vṛkṣatvaṃ prati pratyāsannā na gavādaya iti |
tadā tulye bhedye "yayā pratyāsattyā" bhāvaśaktilakṣaṇayā "jātiḥ kvacit"
svāśrayābhimate'rtharāśau | "prasa"rppati | vyāpya varttate | saiva bhāvaśaktiranvayi"śabdajñānanibandhanamastu" | kiṃ sāmānyena kalpitena |

[320,1]

tena yaducyate |

[320,2]

"viṣayeṇa hi buddhīnāṃ vinā notpattiriṣyate | viśeṣādanyadicchanti sāmānyantena tad dhruvaṃ | tā hi tena vinotpannā mithyā syurviṣayādṛte | na tvanyena vinā vṛttissāmānyasyeha duṣyatīti | "

[320,3]

tadapāstaṃ | na hi yathā sāmānyamantareṇa keṣucit sāmānyavṛttiriṣyate |
tathā sāmānyamvinā sāmānyabuddhiriṣyatāmiti parobhyupagamaṃ kāryate | yena tā hi tena vinotpannā mithyā syuriti parasyottaraṃ syāt | kevalaṃ yathā parasya sāmānyamantareṇa keṣucit padārthaṣu yayā pratyāsattyā sāmānyavṛttiḥ saiva bhrāntānvayijñānaśabdanimittamastu kiṃ sāmānyenetyayamarthotra vivakṣita iti na kaściddoṣaḥ |

[320,4]

[320,5]

atra sāṃ khyaḥ prāha | "na nivṛtti"mityādi | "bhāvānvayo" bhāvānāmekarūpatvaṃ | "apara" iti vastubhūtaḥ | tade"kasya" bījasya yat"kāryantadanyasya" pṛthivyāde"rna syāt" |
kasmāt | tayorbījapṛthivyora"tyantabhedataḥ" || (165–66)

[320,6]

"yadyeta" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "eṣā"miti bhāvānāṃ yathā bījādekādīnāmekamaṃkurākhyaṃ kāryaṃ | "yo hī"tyādinā tadeva sādhayati | "yo hi tasya" bījasyāṃkurajanana"svabhāvo na hi sonyasya" pṛthivyāderasti | "yosti" buddhyāropito vyāvṛttilakṣaṇo "na " | kasmād | "vyatireka"syānyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇasya "niḥsvabhāvatvāt" | tasmād bījasvalakṣaṇameva "janakaṃ yacca" janakarūpa"ntadeva vastu | tajjanakaṃ ce"tyaṅkurajanakaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ | "aparave"ti pṛthivyādau | aparaṃ pṛthivyādikamaṃkuraṃ janayet | "sa hī"tyādi |
hi śabda evakārārthaḥ | "tasyeti" bījasya | "anya"sya pṛthivyādeḥ | sa pṛthivyādistenāṃkurajananena bīja"svabhāvena tato" bījāda"bhinnaḥ syāt | ityastisvabhāvānvayaḥ" |
tena kecit svabhāvabhedepi prakṛtyaikakāryakāriṇa indriyādivadityayuktamuktamiti |

[321,1]

"yadī"tyādinā si ddhā nta vā dī | "ātmaikatrā"pīti | kāraṇakalāpasya yenābhinnenātmanā janakatvamiṣyate | "sa" ātmā teṣāṃ kāraṇānāmmadhye ekatrāpi kāraṇe"stīti" | tenaikena kāryaṃ kṛtamiti kṛtvā "vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ" |

[321,2]

nanu vyāvṛttivādinopyantyāvasthāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ janakatvāt kāraṇāntaravaiyarthyaṃ |

[321,3]

naitadasti | samuditānāmeva teṣāntādṛśaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ | hetupratyayāyattasannidhitvāt | parasya tu nityavādinaḥ sadā tad rūpamastīti bhavetkāraṇāntarāṇāmānarthakyaṃ | ata evokta"mekatrāpi sostī"ti kāraṇāntaravikalāvasthāyāmapītyarthaḥ |

[321,4]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "anekaḥ" padārtho "yadyekasvabhāvatvādekasya" kāryasya "kārakaḥ"
janakaḥ sa "teṣāṃ" kāraṇābhimatānāma"bhinno" janakaḥ "svabhāva eka"kāraṇa"sannidhānepyastiṃ | tata"śca sarvasyāmavasthāyā"rmavaikalyāt" kāraṇasya yatra tatrāvasthiti"rekopi janakaḥ syāt" || (166–67)

[321,5]

etadeva draḍhayannāha | "yasmā"dityādi | ekasminnapi bījādau sannihite "nāpaityabhinnaṃ tat"kāryajananaṃ sāmānya"rūpaṃ | viśeṣā" vyaktibhedā "apāyinaḥ | na hi tasyā" kāryajanana"svabhāvasya" bījāda"rthāntarepi" pṛthivyādau "viśeṣosti" | kiṅkāraṇam | "viśeṣe satyabhedahāneḥ | sa hya"bhinno janakābhimataḥ svabhāvasta"trāpi" bījepi kevale"stīti | naikasya sthitāvapi tasye"tyabhinnasya rūpasya janakābhimatasyā"pāyo"
vināśosti | traiguṇyasya sarvātmanā sarvatra sarvadā sattvāt | "ye viśeṣā avasthābhedāsteṣāṃ sahasthitiniyamābhāvāt syādapāyaḥ" |

[322,1]

etaccābhyupagamyoktaṃ | anyathā nityādavasthāntaravyatiriktānāṃ viśeṣāṇāmapi kathamapāyaḥ | "na ca te janakā" iti viśeṣāḥ kasmā"nneṣṭā" ityāha | "sahakāriṇā"mityādi | "tasmādeka"sminnapi bījādau sthite "janakasyā"tmanaḥ "sthānāt |
asthāyina" iti viśeṣasya | "ekasthitāva"pīti bījāderanyatamasya sthitāvapi "kāryotpattiḥ syāt | na ca bhavati" kāryotpattiḥ | tataḥ sāmānyasthitepi sahakāriṇāmma dhye | "eka"sya viśeṣasyā"pāye | phalābhāvād viśeṣebhyastadudbhavaḥ" kāryodbhavaḥ |
na sāmānyāt | tatkāryamaṅkurādikaṃ | kiṃ bhūtaṃ | "aneka"mityādi | anekasya sahakāriṇaḥ "sādhāraṇaṃ" | anekasahakārijanyamityarthaḥ | "ekaviśeṣāpāyepī"ti sahakāriṇāmanyatamabhedāpāyepi | anena vyatirekamāha |

[322,2]

"punarityā"dinānvayaṃ | tasmād viśeṣeṣvevānvayavyatirekau kāryasya na tu sāmānye | tadāha | nanvavikala iti | ekaviśeṣasthitāva"vikalepyabhinne rūpe" tatkārya"nna bhavati | kāryaṃ" hītyādinaitadeva vibhajate | "kutaścid" bhāva utpādaḥ sa eva dharmaḥ | sa yasyāsti tat tadbhāvadharmi | kadācit yatra "bhavati tattasya" janakasya vaikalyānna "cābhinnasya" rūpasya janakābhimatasya sahakāriṇāṃ madhye | "ekasya sthitāvapi vaikalyamasti | avikale tasmin" sāmānyarūpe kārya"mabhavat tasya" sāmānyasyā"janakātmatāṃ sacayati" || (167–68) ||

[323,1]

nanu na sāmānyameva janakamiṣyate yenāyandoṣaḥ syādapi tu anekātmatayā janaka ityuktamityatrāha | "yatsākalye"tyādi | yeṣāṃ ca viśeṣāṇāṃ "sākalyavaikalyābhyāṃ" kāryambhāvābhāvavat | "tata eva" viśeṣebhyaḥ "kāryasyotpattiḥ | tasmin satīti"
hetubhāvayogye viśeṣe sati bhavataḥ kāryasya | "tadanyasmā"diti | viśeṣādanyasmāt sāmānyā"datiprasaṃgāt" sarvaḥ sarvasya kāraṇaṃ syāt | yata evaṃ "tasmād viśeṣā eva janakāḥ | na sāmānyaṃ" janakaṃ | "tato"'janakatvāt "ta eva" viśeṣā "vastu" | paramārthasanta ityarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | yasmāt pāramārthiko bhāvaḥ paramārthasannityarthaḥ | "sa evārthakriyākṣamaḥ" |

[323,2]

idameva "hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "arthakriyāyogyatā vastuno lakṣaṇaṃ | ayogyatā"

"jvarādiśamane kaścit saha pratyekameva vā 1 | 76"

[324,1]

ityādinā prāgapyetat parihṛtantathāpyadhikavidhānārthaḥ punarupanyāsaḥ | "ekasya" vījāderya"jjanakaṃ rūpantadanyasya" pṛthivyādernāstīti kṛtvā'nyaḥ sahakārī"ajanakaḥ syāt" | janakasvabhāvād bhinnasvabhāvasya "janakatve" cābhyupagamyamāne"bhedāviśeṣāt sarvo" yavabījādirapi śālyaṅkurasya "janakaḥ syāt" |

[324,2]

"naitadi"tyādinā pariharati | śālibījasyaikasya janakasya ya ātmā "tenātmanā" pṛthivyādeḥ yavabījādeścātyanta"bhedepi hetuḥ kaścit" pṛthivyādiḥ śālyaṃkurasya"nāparo" yavabījādiḥ | "ca"śabdaḥ ślokapūraṇārthaḥ | evakārārtho vā | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "svabhāvoyaṃ" bhāvānāṃ ekasya yo janaka ātmā tasmādātmanaḥ svabhāvād bhidyamānāḥ sarve "samantulyaṃ janakāḥ" prāpnuvanti | bhedāviśeṣānna vā kaścijjanaka iti |

[324,3]

syādetaccodyaṃ | yadyeṣāmekasmājjanakādātmano bhinnānāntadatatkāryajananaṃ prati niyamalakṣaṇo viśeṣo na sambhavet | kintu sambhavedeva | "tata" iti viśeṣasambhavāta | "bhedāviśeṣe"pi "kutaścidātmātiśayā"dviśiṣṭakāryapratiniyatalakṣaṇāt"kaścijjanakaḥ" pṛthivyādiḥ śālyaṃkurasya "nāparo" yavabījādiḥ | kasmācchālyaṅkurajananāviśeṣa"stasya" pṛthivyādeḥ sahakāriṇaḥ "svabhāvo nāparasya" yavabījādeḥ |
ayameva vibhāgaḥ kiṃkṛta iti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | "kimagnirdahatyuṣṇo vā nodaka"ndahatyuṣṇaṃ "ceti na paryanuyogamarhati" pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhatvāt | etāvattu praṣṭuṃ yuktaṃ syāt | kuto hetorayaṃ yathoktasvabhāva iti | avaśyaṃ hi svabhāvabhedasya hetunā bhāvyaṃ | yato"nirhetukatve'napekṣiṇo" deśādi"niyamenātiprasaṃgāt" | sarvatra sarvadā sarvātmanā bhāvaprasaṃgāt | "tasmāt svabhāvosya" kāraṇābhimatasya "svahetoḥ"
sakāśād bhavatī"tyucyate | tasyāpi" svahetosta"jjananātmatā" tathābhūtakāraṇasvabhāvajananātmatā "tadanyasmāt" svahetori"tyanādirhetuparamparā" |

[325,1]

"na hi bhinnānā"mbhāvānāṃ hetupravibhāge bādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti | tadevāha | "bhinne"tyādi | "svabhāvā"diti vastusthiteḥ | ekatve tu bā"dhakama"stītyāha | "abhede" tvityādi |
parasparamabhedādekasya nāśe sarvasya "yugapannāśaḥ" utpāde sarvasyotpādaḥ syādityarthaḥ |

[325,2]

"abhedādi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "viśvasya" sarvasya padārtharāśeḥ svabhāvenābhedāt | "vibhāgotpattī"tyādi | ekasyotpattiranyasyā"nutpatti"rekasya "sthiti"ranyasya "nirodha"
ityevamvibhāgenotpattyādayo "na" syuḥ | "svātmavaditi" | yathaikasyāvasthāviśeṣasya vibhāgena notpattyādayastadvadityarthaḥ | ādiśabdādekasya grahaṇamanyasyāgrahaṇamityādi |
sūtre tu nāśotpādagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇārthaṃ | "tathā" tenaiva vibhāgotpattyādinā "upalakṣaṇā"nniścayādabhedasya | anyathā bhedābhedau kena lakṣyete | "ekākārasyāpī"ti tulyākārasyāpi "vyatireko" vibhāgaḥ pṛthagutpattyādimattvaṃ | tad bhedasya lakṣaṇaṃ | "avyatireko"'vibhāgaḥ pṛthagutpattyādimattvābhāvaḥ | tadabhedasya lakṣaṇaṃ | satyapi vibhāgotpattyādimattve kasmād bheda ityāha | "virodhino"rityādi | virodhinorutpādānutpādaprabhṛtikayoryugapadekātmani virodhāt | nābheda evārthānāṃ kintu bhedopyasti | taduktaṃ |

[325,3]

sarvaṃ hi vasturūpeṇa bhidyate na parasparaṃ | svarūpāpekṣayā caiṣāṃ parasparavibhinnateti |

[325,4]

tena kāraṇena | naivaṃ | na sakṛdutpādādiprasaṃga iti cedāha | "netyā"dyasyaiva vyākhyānaṃ | "na vai sarveṇākāre"ṇāvyatireka"mabhedaṃ brūmaḥ | yenaivaṃ syāt" | sakṛnnāśotpādādi syāt | kintvasya bāhyādhyātmikasya bhedasya "kaścidātmā" ghaṭādyavasthāviśeṣalakṣaṇo bhinno nānyastraiguṇyātmakaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmatāyā vastu rūpatāyā dravyarūpatāyā sattārūpatāyāśca sarvatrānugamāt | tenāyamarthovasthātadvatoḥparasparamabhedopyavasthānāntu parasparambheda eva | iti yathoktādavasthādilakṣaṇād"bhedāt" | (169–70)

[326,1]

evaṃ tarhi sāmānyasya nityatvāt sarvatra sthānaṃ | viśeṣāṇāntu vināśa ityetadaṅgīkṛtaṃ | tataścaikasmin viśeṣe vinaśyati sati yastiṣṭhati sāmānyātmā na sa tasya viśeṣasya sambhavaḥ | viruddhadharmādhyāsāt sāmānyaviśeṣayorbheda eva syāt |
anyathā "sthānāsthānayorekātmāśrayatve"bhyupagamyamāne viruddhāvapi dharmāvekātmanyaṅgīkṛtau bhavataśca | "konyo dharmo bhedako" naiva kaścit | naiva viruddhau dharmāvekatrāṅgīkriyete tayorlakṣaṇabhedād bhinnatvāt | tathā hi viśeṣāḥ pṛthagutpādādinā sarvākāravivekinaḥ sāmānyantu pṛthagutpattyādyabhāvāt sarvatrāvivekītyata āha | "sarvākāre"tyādi | "sarvākāravivekāvivekino"ryathākramambhedasāmānyayo"rarthayorabhyupagamāt | nāma kevala"miti bhedasāmānye bhinne ityetadabhidhānamātraṃ "neṣṭaṃ syā"nna tu vastu | "vastu tu" bhedasāmānyātmakamparasparambhinnameveṣṭaṃ | eta"ccoktaṃ prāk" | nāmāntaraṃ vārthabhedamabhyupagamya tathābhidhānādityādinā |

[326,2]

sāmānyasyābhāvāt | sāmānyād viśeṣāṇāmavyaktirekādaikyamityantābhedo viśeṣāṇāmabhāvāt | ekambhedasāmānyātmakaṃ nāstīti yāvat |

[333,3]

atha sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ kathaṃcid bheda iṣyate | atrāpyāha | "anyonya"mityādi | "sadṛśāsadṛśātmano"ssāmānyaviśeṣayoryadi kathaṃcidanyonyamparasparambhedastadaikāntena tayorbheda eva syāt | ghaṭapaṭavat | na cārthāntaraṃ sāmānyaṃ pratīyate | tasmānnaikaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣātmakaṃ vastu vidyate | di ga mba ra syāpi tadvati vastunyabhyupagamyamāne'tyantabhedābhedau syātāṃ | yadā ghaṭādyavasthābhedebhyaḥ suvarṇṇatvasāmānyasyābhedastadātyantamekāntena bhedaḥ syād ghaṭamaulyādeḥ | suvarṇṇatvasāmāmānyasyābhāvāt | atha suvarṇṇatvasāmānyād ghaṭamaulyādyavasthā bhedānāmabhedastadātyantamabheda ekāntenaikatvaṃ suvarṇṇarūpataiva syādityarthaḥ | athāvasthātadvatoḥ svabhāvābhede satyapi lakṣaṇabhedād bheda iṣyate | tathā hi suvarṇṇatva sāmānyasya svarūpaṃ sarvāvasthānuyāyi pratīyate | ghaṭādyavasthānāṃ svarūpaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ pratīyate | tenāvasthātadvatorlakṣaṇabhedād bhedostyevetyatrāha | "anyonya"mityādi | "sadṛśāsadṛśātmano"rityavasthātadvatoryadi bhedastadā tayoranyonyambhedaḥ parasparamekāntena bhedaḥ syāt | anugatavyāvṛttirūpayoḥ parasparāsaṃśleṣāt | na cāparaḥ svabhāvosvi yena tayorabhedaḥ syādanantadharmātmakasya dharmiṇo'pratīte ḥ | "bhāvāśced bhedina" iti sambandhaḥ | "abhinnenātmanā" pradhānākhyenānyena vā | vastutvādinā suvarṇṇatvena vā teṣāmeva ghaṭādīnāmbhedānāṃ "svātmabhūtenā"vyatiriktena tadvantaḥ syu"rabhinnasvabhāvavantaḥ" syuḥ | teṣāṃ pradhānādīnāmabhinnaḥ svabhāvastadabhinnasvabhāvaḥ ātmā rūpaṃ yasya bhedasya ghaṭādilakṣaṇasya sa "tadabhinnasvabhāvātmā" | tadbhāvastasmād | bhedasyāpi kuto bhedaḥ parasparaṃ | naiva | anenātyantābhedo vyākhyātaḥ |

[334,1]

atha tasya bhedasya ghaṭādilakṣaṇasya samāna eka ātmā na bhavati | bhedasya ghaṭādirūpeṇānekātmakatvāt | tathā sati "tadātmanā" bhedasvabhāvena "tenāpi" sāmānyapadārthena traiguṇyādinā "tatheti" sāmānyātmanā "bhavitunna yuktaṃ" | bhedādavyatiriktatvāt sāmānyasya samānatā na prāpnotītyarthaḥ | etenātyantabhedo vyākhyātaḥ |

[334,2]

"tathābhāve" hīti sāmānyātmakatve pradhānāderiṣyamāṇe pradhānādyātmā"'taddharmā"
bhedadharmā "na syāt" | avyatirekiṇāvasthākhyena dharmeṇa tadvānna syādityarthaḥ | avasthātadvatoḥ parasparato bhedaḥ syāditi yāvat | tameva sādhayannāha | "na hyaya"mityādi | "ayamekaḥ" svabhāvaḥ "pravṛttinivṛttimānna yukta" iti sambandhaḥ | "sthānaṃ" pravṛttiḥ | "vigamo" nivṛttiḥ | tathā hi pradhānaśaktau sthitāyāṃ suvarṇṇadravyatvādau ca sthite'vasthānānnivṛttiriṣyate | "etenānyonyamvā tayorbheda" ityādi vyākhyātaṃ |

[334,3]

"ne"tyādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | "na sarvātmanā" sāmānyaviśeṣayo"rabheda eva" kintu "tayorapi" bhedasāmānyayo"rbhedo bhavedyadi | na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | kvacid dravye sāmānyaviśeṣasya parasparam"bhedo'bhedo vaikāntiko" na hīti sambandhaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "vivekine"tyādi | "sāmānyaṃ" śaktiḥ suvarṇṇatvandravyatvañcāviśeṣo ghaṭādaya ityevaṃbhedena "vyavasthāpanāt" |

[335,1]

"yene"tyā cā ryaḥ | "tayorbheda"sāmānyayorayaṃ "bheda" idaṃ "sāmānyamityetadye"nātmanā vyāvṛttenānugatena ca svabhāvena bhedo vyavasthāpyate | "yadi tenātmanā" sāmānyaviśeṣayorbhedastadā "bheda" evātyantaṃ | 179

[335,2]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yamātmāna"mityanugataṃ vyāvṛttañca | "tenātmanā sāmānyaviśeṣayorya"di bheda iti sambandhaḥ | etadeva sphuṭayannāha | "yasmā"dityādi |
tau bhedavyavasthāpakāvātmānau "tayo"riti sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ | "svātma" svabhāvabhūtau | "tau ce"danugatavyāvṛttāvātmānau "vyatirekiṇau" parasparavyāvṛttau "tadā vyatireka eva" bheda eva | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "svabhāvabhedāt" | (179–80)

[335,3]

syānmatam | avasthā'vasthātrorbhedavyavasthāpako hi svabhāva eva bhidyate na bhāva ityāha | "svabhāvo hī"tyādi | svabhāva eva bhāva ityarthaḥ | tathā ceti | "bhedasāmānyayora"tyantabhede sati | bhedasya "nissāmā"nyatā | sāmānyasya ca nirviśeṣatā syāditi sambandhaḥ | sāmānyasya bhedavattvaṃ bhedānāṃ ca sāmānyavattvaṃ na syāt sambandhābhāvāditi yāvat | yadvad "ghaṭādīnāṃ" bhedānāṃ sambandhābhāvāt "paraspara"ntadvattā nāsti | 181

[335,4]

"vyatireke ce"tyādinārthamāha | bhedasāmānyayorajanyajanakatvena "sambandhābhāvāt" |
bhavati ca tayossambandhitayā pratītistasmād bhrāntatvamuktamiti "na syāt sāmānyabhedadhīrityatrāntare"1 | 171 | (180–81)

[336,1]

evamūrdhvasāmānyavādaṃ di ga mva rā dyabhimataṃ | tiryaksāmānyavādañca sāṃ khyā dyabhimataṃ sādhāraṇadūṣaṇena nirākṛtya punastiryaksāmānyavādameva dūṣayitumāha | "api" cetyādi |

[336,2]

etaduktambhavati | arthakriyārthinaḥ sāmānyaviṣayabhedābhedacintayā na kiñcit prayojanamarthakriyārahitatvāt | kintu | "yamātmāna"marthakriyāyogyaṃ "puraskṛtyā"lambanīkṛtya | "tatsādhyaphalavāñchāvān" | tenātmanā yatsādhyamphalantadabhilāṣāvān | "ayaṃ puruṣaḥ pravarttate | tadāśrayā"varthakriyāsamarthādhiṣṭhānau "bhedābhedau" ciṃtyete | tasya cārthakriyāyogyasya "svātmanā" svena rūpeṇa "bheda" ātyantikostyeva | "vyāvṛttyā" ca vijātīyavyāvṛttena rūpeṇa "samānatā"styevādhyavasitaikatvarūpayā | iyataivārthakriyārthino bhedābhedacintā samāptā | tatonarthakriyākāriṇaḥ sāmānyasya kiṃ svalakṣaṇe bhedābhedacintayeti | (181–82)

[336,3]

nanu cārthakriyārthinaḥ puruṣasya vyāvṛttyāpi samānatāyāḥ kimprayojanamarthakriyārahitatvāt |

[336,4]

sattyaṃ | svalakṣaṇānyeva vyāvṛttyā sāmānyamucyate śabdāttatraikatvādhyavasāyena pravṛttiryathāsyādityadoṣaḥ |

[336,5]

atha syāt svalakṣaṇameva svalakṣaṇāntarānuyāyīti kiṃ parikalpitayā vyāvṛ ttyetyāha | svalakṣaṇānāmparasparambhedāt | yadi ghaṭarūpampaṭe syādudakāharaṇārthī paṭepi pravartteta | tadāha | "pravṛttyā"dītyādi | "ādi"śabdāt tulyotpattinirodhādiprasaṅgaḥ |

[336,6]

"sarva eve"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | viśeṣamevārthakriyāyogyaṃ svabhāvākhyamātmabhūtamityarthaḥ | kasya bhāvasya vastuno"dhikṛtya pravarttate" | sa "eva hī"tyarthakriyākārī viśeṣaḥ | "tatheti" | gaurityādiśabdaiḥ | arthakriyārthī hi svalakṣaṇapratipādanābhiprāya eva śabdaṃ prayuṅkte dṛśyavikalpyayorekīkṛtya | pratipattāpi tathaiva pratipadyate | tato vyavaharttṛṇāmadhyavasāyavaśācchabdavyāpārāpekṣayaitaduktaṃ | śabde tu jñāna"svalakṣaṇapratibhāso" nāstīti svalakṣaṇamavācyamuktamityadoṣaḥ |

[337,1]

dravyādayastu na tatreti | gaurityādiśabdairgaṃvādicodanāyāṃ | kasmāt yathāsvaṃ dravyatvādiśabdaisteṣāṅgavādeḥ "pṛthagabhidhānāt" godravyamityādinā | kathantarhi gaurityādipadaprayoge sattādravyatvādayaḥ pratīyanta ityāha | "arthasye"tyādi | arthasya gavādeḥ | "tena" sattvadravyatvādinā'"vyabhicārāt" | tatorthād gatiḥ sāmānyānāṃ syāt | na tu viśeṣaśabdaḥ sāmānye vyāpriyate | "nirloṭhitaṃ caitadācārya" di ṅ nā ge na sā mā nya pa rī kṣā dau yathā na viśeṣaśabdānāṃ sāmānye vṛttiriti |

[337,2]

atra codyate | kasya punaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣeṇāvyabhicāraḥ | yattāvat paraparikalpitannāstyeva | yaccānyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ prasajya mātrantadapi nāstyeva |
nāpi vikalpabuddhipratibhāsino bāhyenāvyabhicārosti tasya svatantratvāt |

[337,3]

ucyate | svalakṣaṇameva sajātīyavyāvṛttamviśeṣaḥ | tadeva vijātīyavyāvṛttimapekṣyābhedenopāttaṃ sāmānyamityucyate | tataḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayorvastuta ekatvāt |
kṛtakatvānityatvayorivāvyabhicāraḥ | śabdavyāpārabhedāttu kevalaṃ kvacicchābdī pratipattiḥ kvacidārthītyucyate | "taditi" tasmādeyaṃ puruṣaḥ | "gavādiśabdapratyupasthāpitaṅ" gavādiśabdasannidhāpitamarthamarthakriyāśrayaṃ | "arthāntarasya" sāmānyasyo"panyāsena"
bhedasāmānyākāratayā dvimukhā buddhiryasya sa tathoktaḥ | "yosya" gavā"derātmā"
svabhāvaḥ | "ananya"bhāva"sādhāra"ṇasya eva svabhāvaḥ śabdacodita iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ | yamarthaṃ sāsnādimanttaṃ "puraskṛtyā"lambanīkṛtya viśiṣṭārthakriyārthī | tamevāha | "yathe"tyādi | yathā gorvāhadohādāvarthī gāmadhikṛtya pravarttate | "anyasambhavina" iti goranyasminnaśve sambhavinorthasyārthī gāṃ puraskṛtya na pravarttata iti vākyārthaḥ samarthanīyaḥ | korthonyasambhavītyāha | "yathā yuddhapraveśa" iti | yathāsvamiti yasya yaḥ śabdo vācakaḥ | "na davyatvādi sāmānyaṃ | codita"miti liṅgavipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | taccodanayā gavādīnāṃ gavādiśabdaiścodanayā | "tade"tyarthakriyārthinaḥ pravṛttikāle | "prāptumanabhipretatvād" dravyatvādisāmānyasyeti | vibhaktivipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | kasmāt punargavādiśabdena dravyatvādisāmānyaṃ codayituṃ nābhipretamityāha | "gavādisamāveśād" gavādiśabdasya gavādau loke saṃketitatvāt |
gavādisvabhāvatvād dravyatvādisāmānyasya gavādicodanayā'bhidhānamiti cedāha | "tadātmabhūtānāṃ" ceti | gavādisvabhāvānāṃ dravyatvādisāmānyānāṃ gavādivadevānanvayena hetunā"tatre"ti tasya gavādibhedasya | "anubhayarūpatvā"dasāmānyaviśeṣarūpatvādeveti yāvat | tataśca viśeṣa eva codyate |

[338,1]

tadevāha | "tameve"tyādi | tameva cānanyasādhāraṇa"mbhāva"marthakriyārthī puruṣo bhedābheda"prakāraiḥ paryanuyuṅkte" | a nyā po ha vā di nopi vyāvṛttilakṣaṇo dravyatvādyabhedaḥ svalakṣaṇānāmiṣṭastato'tyantabhedo viśeṣāṇāṃ viruddha ityata āha | "tasye"tyādi | tasyārthakriyākāriṇorthasya "bhede" prakṛtyā sthite sati vyāvṛttilakṣaṇo"dravyatvādyabhe"dosya viśeṣasyā"bādhaka eva" | tasya kalpitatvāt | tasmāt pāramārthiko bhedaḥ | svalakṣaṇānāmupakalpitamekatvamanena ca prakāreṇa bhedābhedāviśiṣṭāvasmākaṃ | tadeva darśayannāha | "sarvatre"tyādi | "svabhāvena bhedaḥ" svajātīyavijātīyāt | "sāmānyasya ca vyāvṛttilakṣaṇasyābhyupagamāditi" sambandhaḥ |

[338,2]

na vyāvṛttirūpeṇa sāmānyenābhedaḥ kintu vastubhūtenaiveti cedāha | "svabhāva"bhūtasyetyādi | vastubhūtasya "sāmānyasyābheda iti" vyaktibhyonarthāntaratve | "ukta"miti sāmānyādavyatirekād bhedānāmaikyaṃ | bhedavadeva vā sāmānyasyāpyanekatvamityuktaṃ prāk | na sāmānyadvāreṇa bhedānāmaikyamityucyate | kintu yosau viśeṣastenaivābheda ityāha | "svātmanai"vetyādi | svenaiva viśeṣarūpeṇa gavāśvādīnāmabhede"tad" godravyaṃ "nibandhanaṃ" yasyā artha"kriyāyā" vāhadohādilakṣaṇāyāsta"yārthī" puruṣaḥ | "samami"tyubhayatrāpyavasitagavādibhāvaḥ | "dvayorapī"ti gavi cāśve caiva | yasmā"dekopi" hi kāraṇatvenābhimato gopadārthastāmarthakriyāmvāhadohādisvabhāvāṃ | "tatsvabhāvatvātta"darthakriyākaraṇasvabhāvatvādeva karoti | "tadanyasyāpi" tasmād godravyādanyasyāpyaśvasya "tadvā"hadohādikaraṇasvabhāvatva"ntulyamiti so"pyaśvaḥ gosādhyāmarthakriyāṃ "kinna karoti" || 0 || (182–83)

[339,1]

"etenai"veti sarvasyārthasya bhedasādhanena | "ahrīkā" nagnatayā nirlajjāḥ kṣa pa ṇa kāḥ |
ayuktābhidhānasya kutsitatvāt kimapītyāha | "aślīlaṅ"grāmyaṃ | sarvaḥ sarvasvabhāvo na ca sarvaḥ sarvasvabhāva iti yat "pralapanti pratikṣiptantada"pi tasmā"dekāntasambhavāt" |
ekasyaivāntasyātyantabhedaprakārasya sambhavāt | (183–84)

[339,2]

nanu di ga mva rā ṇāṃ sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ na sarvaṃ sarvātmakamiti naitaddarśanantatkimarthamidamā cā rye ṇo cyate |

[339,3]

sattyaṃ | yathā darśanantvaṃ "tyantabhedābhedau ca syātāmi"1 | 178tyādinā pūrvameva dūṣitaṃ |

yatpuranaretaduktaṃ | tadyathā kaṭakeyūrādiṣu suvarṇṇapratyayasyānuyāyinassadbhāvāssuvarṇṇatvasāmānyaṃ kalpyate | tathā ghaṭapaṭādiṣu dravyatvādipratyayasyānvayinaḥ sadbhāvād dravyatvasāmānyamekaṃ kinneṣyate | na ceṣyate'bhinnapratyayasadbhāvepi tathā kaṭakakeyūrādiṣu sāmānyakalpanā mābhūdityevamparametat |

[339,5]

syā"duṣṭro dadhi" | dravyādirūpatayaikatvāt | syānna dadhi uṣṭrāvasthāto dadhyavasthāyā bhinnatvāt | aślīlamityasya vyākhyāna"mayukta"miti | tasyāyuktatvāt |
vidvajjanāyogyatayā grāmyamiti bhāvaḥ | aślīlamityasya grāmyaparyāyatvāt | "aheyopādeya"miti | atyājyamagrāhyañca | kasmāda"pariniṣṭhānāt" | yadi hi kiṃcitsukhasādhanatvena niścitamanyacca duḥkhasādhanatvena tadā yathākramaṃ heyamupādeyaṃ vā syāt |
tacca nāsti yataḥ sarvasya sarvasvabhāvatvaṃ | na ca sarvasya sarvasvabhāvatvaṃ | ata evākulamekasyāpi svabhāvabhedasya gṛhītumaśakyatvāt |

[340,1]

etaduktambhavati | yadāvasthātadvatossarvātmanā'bhedovasthānāttu parasparambhedastadāyandoṣastadāha | "tadanvaye" veti | tasya svabhāvabhedasya parasparānvaye vā | dadhyādisvabhāvasya dravyasyoṣṭrādiṣu tādātmyenānugamāditi yāvat |

[340,2]

"sarvasyobhayarūpatvaṃ" | ubhayagrahaṇamanekatvopalakṣaṇārthantasmin sati tadviśaṣasya uṣṭra uṣṭra eva na dadhi | dadhi dadhyeva noṣṭra ityevaṃ lakṣaṇasya nirākṛteḥ | "dadhi khāde"tyevaṃ coditaḥ puruṣaḥ "kimuṣṭraṃ" khādituṃ "nābhidhāvati | uṣṭropi" dadhyabhinnād dravyatvād avyatirekāt "syād dadhi | nāpi sa eve"ti | "uṣṭra" evoṣṭra ityekāntavādaḥ | "yenānyopi" dadhyādikaḥ "syāduṣṭraḥ tathā dadhyapi syāduṣṭraḥ" | uṣṭrābhinnena dravyatvena dadhnastādātmyenābhisambandhāt | "nāpi tadeve"ti dadhyeva "dadhi | yenānyadapyu"ṣṭrādikaṃ "syād dadhi" | etena sarvasyobhayarūpatvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ |

[340,3]

"tadviśeṣanirākṛte"rityeta"danayori"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | ubhayathāpi dadhyuṣṭraviśeṣaḥ syāt | dadhirūpābhāvo voṣṭre syāt | uṣṭrarūpaṃ vā dadhyasambhavi yadyuṣṭrasvarūpa eva niyatambhavet | evaṃ dadhnopi vācyaṃ |

ādyasya tāvadasambhava"stadi"tyādinā kathyate | tadevamanekayordadhyuṣṭrayorna kaścid viśeṣa iti sambandhaḥ | "ekasyāpī"ti dadhna uṣṭrasya vā "kasyacit tadrupābhāvas"yeti |
