"athāsti" dadhyuṣṭrayo"ratiśayaḥ kaścid yenā"tiśayena "dadhi khādeti" coditaḥ puruṣo"bhedena varttate" | uṣṭraparihāreṇa dadhnyeva pravartatte |

[340,7]

etaduktambhavati | yathā dadhyuṣṭrayoḥ parasparaṃ svarupambhinnantathā dravyaparyāyayorlakṣaṇabhedād bhedo yadīṣyate tadā "sa eva" svarūpātiśayo dadhi | sa cānyatroṣṭre nāsti | nāpi dravyatvaṃ dadhyādivyatirikta pratibhāsate | ityanena dvāreṇānubhayaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣarahitaṃ sarvamvastu | paraṃ kevalaṃ | ekatvantu kalpita | anayoriti dadhyuṣṭrayoḥ | "tathā codita" iti dadhi khādeti coditaḥ | "kṣīravikāro dadhi |
nānyatre"tyuṣṭre | sa evātiśayo dadhi | kimbhūtaḥ | "arthakiyārvipravṛttiviyayaḥ" |
dadhisādhyārthakriyā tayā yorthī puruṣastasya pravṛttivipayaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | tatphaletyādi | dadhisādhyaṃ phalaṃ tadeva viśivyatenyasmāditi viśeṣaḥ | tasyopādānabhāvo hetubhāvastena lakṣitaḥ svabhāvo yasya vastuna | tadeva dadhīti kṛtvā | sa ca tādṛśa ityanantarokto dadhisvabhāvaḥ | anyatretyuṣṭre | kasmād | dadhyarthinastatroṣṭre "pravṛttyabhāvāt" | (185–86)

[341,1]

"sarvātmatva ityekarūpatve satītyarthaḥ | bhinno" niyatārthaṃ | dhīṣvanī | jñānaṃ śabdaśca | tadabhāvād bhinnavuddhiśabdābhāvāt | bhedānāṃ sahāravādasya | ekīkaraṇavādasyāsambhavaḥ | bhedena gṛhītayoḥ śrutayorvā | ekatvenopasaṃhāro nirdeśaḥ |
syāduṣṭro dadhītyādi |

[341,2]

soyamityādinā vyācaṣṭe | kvacidapi dadhnyuṣṭre vā pratiniyatamekamākāramapṛśyan kathaṃ buddhyādhimucyetārthāniti samvandhaḥ | kimviśiṣṭayā buddhayetyāha |
asaṃsṛṣṭetyādi | asaṃsṛṣṭonyākāro yasminnarthe sa tathoktaḥ | sa yasyā buddherasti sā saṃsṛṣṭānyākāravatī | vibhaktārthagrāhiṇyeveti yāvat | abhilapedvā katha |
pratyartha pratiniyatasaṃketena dhvaninetyākūtaṃ | kasmānnādhimucyetetyāha | "vibhāgābhāvād bhāvānā"miti | "tatsaṃhāravāda" iti bhedasaṃhāravādo na syāt |
syāduṣṭraḥ syād dadhītyādikaḥ |

[342,1]

atha punarasaṃsṛṣṭau dadhyuṣṭrau pratipadya saṃharet | syāduṣṭraḥ syād dadhīti | "tadāpyekarūpasaṃsargiṇyā" | uṣṭrarūpeṇaiva dadhirūpeṇaiva vā saṃsargiṇyā buddherasaṃsṛṣṭākāragrāhiṇyā kvaciduṣṭre dadhani ca | pratiniyamāt tatpratibhāsabhedakṛta eva tayordadhyuṣṭrayoḥ svabhāvabhedopi | "ekāneketyā"di | pratibhāsabhedasyānekavyavasthitirviṣayaḥ |
ekavyavasthitiḥ pratibhāsabhedasyeti yojyaṃ | bhinnapratibhāsaviṣayau ca dadhyuṣṭrau tathā ca sati naika uṣṭro dadhi vā tadubhayarūpaḥ tadubhayandadhyuṣṭrātmakaṃ rūpaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ |
mithyāvāda eva syā dvā daḥ || 0 || (186–87)

[342,2]

bhedalakṣaṇamiti vyāvṛttilakṣaṇamvijātīyavyāvṛttānyeva svalakṣaṇāni sāmānyamityucyante | "prakṛtyā" svabhāvena | ādiśabdādudakādyāharaṇādyekaphalāḥ ||

[342,3]

"bhavatu nāme"tyādinā cā cā ryaḥ parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | bhāvānāmvastūnāṃ svabhāvabhedaḥ svabhāve naivānyasmād vyāvṛttiḥ | tatreti nirupākhyeṣu | kathaṃ svabhāvabhedaviṣayā vyāvṛttiviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ |

[342,4]

nanu nirupākhyeṣu śabdānāṃ pravṛttireva nāsti tatkimarthamidamāśaṃkitamiti kadācit paro brūte | tannirākaraṇārthamācāryaḥ prāha | "teṣvava"śyaṃ "śabdapravṛ"tyā bhāvyaṃ |
ye tu na cānyāpohavādinā śakyamvaktunnaiva nirupākhyeṣu śabdānāṃ pravṛttiriti |
yatasteṣvavaśyaṃ śabdapravṛttyā bhāvyamiti codako brūta iti vyācakṣate | teṣāmanena krameṇa deśakālaniṣedha eva sarvabhāveṣu kriyate | "tathā sambandhasya svarūpaṇānabhidhānamuktaṃ" | evaṃ yatpunaretat tadarthaniṣedhe'narthakaśabdāprayogāt | nirviṣayasya naño'prayoga ityatrottaramvakṣyata ityādi grantho vakṣyamāṇaścodakābhiprāyeṇāvācakaḥ syāt |

[343,1]

tasmādā cā rya eva nirupākhyeṣu śabdapravṛttiṃ samarthayate "teṣvavaśyaṃ śabdapravṛttyā bhāvyamityā" dinā granthena | kasmāt | kathaṃcijjñānaśabdaviṣayatvenāvyavasthāpiteṣu nirupākhyeṣu sarvatrārthe vidhipratiṣedhe vā yogāt | yadi kvacidasata ākārasya niṣedhe jñānābhidhāne syātāṃ | tadā niṣiddhākāraparihṛterthe vidhiḥ syāt | "tathā ce"ti vidhipratiṣedhābhāve | anvayavyatirekau vidhipratiṣedhau āśrayo yasya vyavahārasya sa tathoktaḥ | tameva vyavahārabhāvamuṣṇetyādinā'ha | uṣṇasvabhāvognirityanvayāśrayo vyavahāraḥ | nānuṣṇa iti vyatirekāśrayaḥ | ayamapyatiprasiddho lokavyavahāro na syādityapiśabdenāha | uṣṇavyavasthā hyanuṣṇavyavacchedena |

[343,2]

tasya cānuṣṇasyoṣṇābhāvalakṣaṇasya kathañcid vyavasthānāt kathantadvyavacchedenoṣṇaṃ vyavasthāpyeta | tadāha | "svabhāvāntaretyā"di | uṣṇābhāva evoṣṇasvabhāvādantaramvilakṣaṇantadviraharūpeṇeti svabhāvāntaramuktaṃ | ata evāsata ityetad ghaṭate |

[343,3]

nanu svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ svabhāvāntarantasya kathaṃcidapi vikalpabuddheḥ śabdasya ca viṣayatvenāvyavasthāpanāt | sarvathānuṣṇasyāpratipatteraniścayāt tadvyavacchedalakṣaṇasyāgnisvabhāvasyāpratipattiraniścayaḥ | yathāgnisvabhāvasyaivaṃ sarvasya padārthasya |
tato vyāmūḍhamaniścitarūpaṃ jagat syāt ||

[343,4]

syādetat | na tatra vahnyādau kasyacidasato niṣedho yenābhāvepyavaśyaṃ pravṛttyā bhāvyamiti codyate | kintvanuṣṇaṃ sparśākhyaṃ "sadeva" vastveva | agneścārthāntaraṃ niṣidhyata iti |

[343,5]

"katha"mityādyā cā ryaḥ | "sadeve"ti vacanāt sattvamiṣṭaṃ | niṣidhyata iti vacanādasattvamekaṃ ca kathaṃ sadasannāma || netyādinā paraḥ pariharati | tatrāgnāvanuṣṇaṃ nāstītyanena sarvatrānuṣṇamasaditi brūmaḥ | evaṃ hyucyamāne sattvaṃ pratijñāya punaḥ sarvatra sattvaniṣedhesadasattvamekatra pratijñātambhavet | kevalantatra tvagnāvanuṣṇannāstīti brūmaḥ |
tataścānyatra satonyatrāsattvamaviruddhaṃ | ayameva ca deśa haityāha | iha nāstīti deśasya niṣedhaḥ | idānīnnāstīti kālasya | anena prakāreṇa nāstīti dharmasya |
dharmiṇo niṣedhaḥ | kasmāt | "tanniṣedhe" dharmiṇo niṣedhe | "tadviṣayasya" dharmiviṣayasya śabdasya nirviṣayatayā pravṛttyabhāvāt | tataśca dharmiśabdāpravṛtteranirdiṣṭo viṣayo yasya nañastasyāprayogāt | idamiha nāstītyavaśyamidamādipadairviṣayaḥ pratiṣedhasyopasthāpyonyathā kimviṣayoyaṃ pratiṣedha ityevaṃ sa na jñāyate | etacca sarva mu dyo ta ka rādīnāmmatamupanyastaṃ |

[344,1]

sopītyā cā ryaḥ | tatrā"tatrāpī"tyādideśakāladharmaniṣedhena deśādīnāṃ niṣedhaḥ sattvāt | "ādi"śabdāt kālasya parigrahaḥ | vyaktibhedād bahuvacanaṃ | nārthasyeti dharmasya | kvacit sattvādeva | na tvarthaśabdena dharmiṇo nirdeśaḥ |
pareṇāpi dharminiṣedhasyāniṣṭatvāt ||

[344,2]

syādetanna deśādiniṣedhaḥ kriyate nāpyuṣṇasya niṣedhaḥ | kintvanuṣṇena sahāgneryaḥ sambandhassa niṣidhyate |

[344,3]

"natvi"tyādyā cā ryaḥ | "tanniṣedhepī"ti sambandhaniṣedhepi tulyo doṣaḥ | dharmmivat sambandhasyāpyaniṣedhāt | tadevāsa satītyādinā sādhayati | asati sambandhe śabdāpravṛttiḥ | ādiśabdādanirdiṣṭaviṣayasya naño'prayogāt | athavā tulyo doṣaḥ |
kathaṃ | niṣedhādasati yo niṣedhastasya tvayaiva niṣedhāditi vyākhyeyaṃ | kathaṃ niṣedha ityāha || "asatī"tyādi | asato vāsyeti sambandhasya niṣedhe | "tadvat sambandhavat" |
dharmiṇopi niṣedhaḥ ||

[344,4]

netyādi paraḥ | sambandho nāstītyeva svaśabdena na vai sambandhasya niṣedhaḥ |

[344,5]

etaduktambhavati | yathā sambandhasya svaśabdena svarūpeṇābhidhānannāsti tathā niṣedhepi | tadevāha | kintarhi neha pradeśe ghaṭo | nedānīṃ kāla ityevaṃ pratiṣedhoktau satyāṃ | nānena deśena kālena vāsya ghaṭasya sambandhostīti pratītiḥ | tathā naivannā'nena prakāreṇa ghaṭostītyuktau naitaddharmā ghaṭa iti pratītiḥ | "tathe"tyevaṃ pratītau satyāṃ |

[344,6]

"tathā"pītyā cāryaḥ | nedānīmityādināpi kathaṃ sambandho niṣiddho yāvadasya puṃsaḥ sambandho dharmo vā nāstīti matirbhavati | neha nedānīmiti pratiṣedhe sambandho nāstīti matiḥ | naivamiti pratiṣedhe dharmo nāstīti matiḥ ||

[344,7]

nanu dharmaniṣedho'pi sambandhaniṣedha eva | dharmadharmiṇoḥ sambandhaniṣedhāt |
sattyaṃ | saṃyogasamavāyalakṣaṇasambandhabhedāttu sambandho dharmo veti bhedenoktaṃ |
na cāsyāssambandho nāstīti mateḥ kathaṃcid bhāve sambandhādisattāyāṃ sambhavaḥ |
kasmāda"bhāveṣvi"tyādi | tathāśabdo yathāśabdārthamākṣipati | yattadornityābhisambandhāt | satsu deśādiṣu yathā nāstīti buddherabhāvaḥ | satsvabhāvabuddhervirodhāt |
tadvadabhāveṣu | asati buddhipravṛtteranabhyupagamāt | tasmāt sambandhābhāvapratīteḥ sakāśānnāyamihetyādyā pratītiḥ | sā tadabhāve sambandhābhāvapratītyabhāve na syātyadvā "se"ti sambandhābhāvapratītiḥ | "tadabhāva" iti sambandhābhāve | pratītau vā"tadabhāvasya" sambandhābhāvasya | tādṛśī sambandhābhāvapratītissā vidyate yasya puṃsaḥ | tasya yathāpratītimataḥ | tatprabhavāssambandhābhāvapratītijanmānassambandhābhāvaviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ kena vāryante | vikalpānāmviṣayaḥ sambandhābhāvo na śabdānāmiti cedāha | "sa eva hī"tyādi | yo na vitarkāṇāmviṣayaḥ sa eva na śabdānāmviṣayaḥ | vikalpaviṣayastvavaśyaṃ śabdaviṣaya ityarthaḥ | "te cet pravṛttā" iti vitarkāḥ ||

[345,1]

nanu purovasthite nīlādau nīlamityādivikalpaḥ | svalakṣaṇaviṣayo na ca svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdavācyamityāha | na hītyādi | avācyamarthamiti svalakṣaṇaṃ | vikalpādhikārād vikalpabuddhayo gṛhyante | samīhanta ityālambante | sāmānyākāraiva sadā vikalpabuddhiryāpi sannihite svalakṣaṇe | savikalpanirvikalpayostu yaugapadyādabhimāna eṣa mandamatīnāṃ vikalpaḥ svalakṣaṇākāra iti | vicāritaṃ caitat"pramāṇaviniścaye" śāstrakāreṇeti neha pratanyate |

[345,2]

nanu yadi vikalpabuddhyā viṣayīkṛtatvāt sambandhābhāvo vācyaḥ | evantarhi sambandhopi vācyaḥ syād vikalpabuddhyā viṣayīkṛtatvād | atheṣyata eva | kathantarhyācārya di ṅ nā ge na tasyāvācyatvamuktamityāha | "sambandha"syetyādi | "svena rūpe"ṇeti sambandharūpeṇa | sambandhinaṃ sambandha iti parasparāpekṣālakṣaṇambhāvamātramadravyabhūtaḥ sambandhasya svabhāvaḥ | tena ca rūpeṇa tasyābhidhāyakaḥ śabdo nāsti | sambandhaśabdo hi tasyābhidhāyaka eṣṭavyaḥ sa ca prayuktaḥ kayorityākṣipati | tatra rājapuruṣayoḥ sambandha ityucyamāne rājapuruṣayorityasya vyatirekasya hetuḥ sambandhastadā sa sambandhaḥ sambandhirūpeṇa pratīyate | tadāha | "abhidhānena sambandhitvene"tyādi |
rājapuruṣayoḥ sambandha ityabhidhāne rājapuruṣābhyāṃ parasparasāpekṣābhyāṃ niṣkṛṣṭarūpasyaiva sambandhasya sambandhitvena "buddhāvupasthānāt | yathābhiprāyamapratītaḥ" |
rājñaḥ puruṣa iti parasparāpekṣālakṣaṇassambandho yathā jñātumiṣṭastena rūpeṇāpratītiḥ | "tadi"ti tasmādayaṃ sambandhaḥ "pratīyamānopi" sambandhaśabdāt | yathoktavidhinā "sambandhirūpa eve"ti na sambandhe"nābhidhīyate | tasmānnābhāvavat sambandhepi prasaṃga iti" sambandhābhāvo yathā buddhyā viṣayīkriyata iti "vācyaḥ" prasakto naivaṃ sambandhepi vācyatvamityarthaḥ | sambandhābhāvo hi "svena rūpeṇa" buddhyā viṣayīkriyate | śabdenāpi tathaivābhidhīyate | sambandhastu svarūpeṇa gṛhyate | nāpyabhidhīyate | sambandhirūpāpannasyaiva viṣayīkaraṇādabhidhānācca | tathā cāha |

[345,3]

asattvabhūtassambandho rūpantasya na gṛhyate |

[346,1]

nābhidhānaṃ svarūpeṇa sambandhasya kathañcaneti |

[346,2]

tasmāt sthitametad vikalpaviṣayovaśyamvācya iti | tataśca yadi nāsti sambandha iti matistadā tatprabhavopi śabdaḥ pravarttata eva | tathācābhāvaviṣayaḥ śabda āpatita eva |

[346,3]

atha mābhūdayandoṣa iti sambandhasya nāstīti buddhyā viṣayīkaraṇaṃ neṣyate |
neha ghaṭa ityatra kasya niṣedho | na tāvad deśādestasya sattvāt | na sambandhasya tadbhāvasyāgrahaṇāditi yatkiñcidetat ||

[346,4]

"api cābhāvamabhidheyaṃ yo brūte taṃ" bruvāṇaṃ "prati" ayamabhāvā"nabhidhānavādī" abhāvo na vācya iti "pratividadhan" pratikṣi"pannabruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ pratividadhyāt" | na hyabhāvaśabdamuccārayatā abhāvasya vācyatvaṃ śakyaṃ pratipādayituṃ | athecchatyabhāvasya vacanantadā vacane vāsyābhāvasyābhyupagamyamāne "kathamabhāvonuktaḥ" | ukta eva |
abhāvo na vācya ityanenaivābhāvaśabdena tasyokteḥ || atha pareṇābhāvasya vācyatvaṃ yaducyate tadanuvādena niṣedhaḥ kriyate —

[346,5]

nābhāvo vācyastenādoṣa iti cet |

[346,6]

nanvanuvādepi kimabhāvasya vācyatā na bhavati yenaivamucyate | tasmādiṣṭasyaivābhāvasya vācyatā | svabhāvo naivāsti "tenā"sattvāda"vacana"mabhāvasyeti cedāha | "athābhāvameve"tyādi | "tene"tyabhāvasyā"sattvena" | idānīmityabhāvasyāsattve "tadevābhāvo nāstīti vacanaṃ kathaṃ" | abhāvo nāstītyasyaivābhāvaśabdasya prayogo na syāt |
kathañca na syādabhāvasyaivānabhyupagamāt | abhāvo hyasya vācyaḥ sa ca nābhyupagamyate | paraparikalpitasyābhāvasya pratiṣedha iti cediṣṭastāvadabhāvaviṣayaḥ śabdaḥ | tasmāt kathaṃcidabhāvavyavahāraṃ pravarttayatā'vaśyamabhāvaviṣayā jñānaśabdā eṣṭavyāḥ |

[346,7]

"yatpuna"retaduktam | "arthaniṣedhe" satyanartha"kaśabdāprayogāt" kāraṇā"nnirviṣayasya nañoprayoga ityatrottaramvakṣyateṃ" |

[346,8]

"anādivāsanodbhūtavikalpapariniṣṭhata"1 | 207 ityādinā |

[346,9]

"tasmā"dityupasaṃhāraḥ | iyatā ca granthena yaduktanteṣvavaśyaṃ śabdapravṛttyā bhāvyamiti tadevācā rye ṇa samarthitaṃ |

[346,10]

atra paraḥ prāha | yadya"bhāveṣvapi śabdāssanti te"ṣvabhāveṣu "kathaṃ svabhāvabhedaḥ"
śabdapravattiheturyenāpohaviṣayatvamabhāvapratipādakānāṃ syāt | atrottaramāhā cā ryaḥ | "tatrāpī"tyādi | "rūpābhāvā"diti svarūpābhāvādabhāvasya | "rūpābhidhāyinaḥ" svabhāvagrāhakāḥ "śabdā nāśaṃkyā eva" | yataste śabdā abhāvaviṣayā"vyavacchedasyā"nyāpohasya "vācakāḥ siddhā" eva |

[347,1]

etaduktambhavati | abhāvaviṣayāṇāṃ "śabdānāṃ" bhāvasvarūpāgrāhakatvādapohaviṣayatvantathā bhāvaviṣayāṇāmapi śabdānāmbhāvasvarūpāgrāhakatvādapohaviṣayatvameva | kevalaṃ kecicchabdā bhāvādhyavasāyād bhāvaviṣayāḥ kecidabhāvādhyavasāyādabhāvaviṣayā ucyante | "vastuni vṛtti"rvyāpāro yeṣāṃ śabdānānteṣāṃ "kiṃ rūpamabhidheyaṃ" vidhirūpeṇa vastugrāhya"māhosvid bhedo"'nyavyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvodhyavasīyata "iti śaṅkā syāt | abhāvastu vivekalakṣaṇa" iti svabhāvavirahalakṣaṇaḥ kasmā"nnimittīkarttavyasya rūpasya" vastusvabhāvasya | "tadbhāve" tasya rūpasya sattayā hya"bhāvāyogāt" | tasya rūpasya bhāvastadbhāvaḥ sa eva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya bhāvasya sa tathoktaḥ | ayameva sa mukhyo vivekonyāpohaḥ | anyastu gavādiśabdaviṣayopohanimittatvādapoha ityupacaritaḥ sarvabhāvavirahalakṣaṇaḥ | tasya vivekasya "tathābhāvakhyāpina" iti vivekarūpābhidhāyinaḥ || "vivekaviṣayā itya"nyāpohaviṣayā | vikalpāśca "vivekaviṣayā" iti sambandhaḥ | te śabdā vikalpāśca | ekaṃ vyāvṛttisamāśrayabhūtamvastu | "pratiśaraṇama"dhiṣṭhānaṃ yeṣāṃ śabdānāṃ vikalpānāñca | te tathoktāḥ | tathā hyakṛtakavyavacchedena yadeva vastu kṛtakaśabdasya vikalpasya vādhiṣṭhānantadevānityānātmādiśabdānāmvikalpānāṃ ca | te tathābhūtā api bhinnaviṣayā eveti sambandhaḥ |
kasmād "yathāsvami"tyādi | yā vyāvṛttiryato vyavasthāpyate sā tasyā avadhiḥ |
yathā kṛtakākhyasya vyavacchedasyākṛtakaḥ | evamanityatvalakṣaṇasya vyavacchedasya nitya ityādi | teṣāṃ"yathāsvamava"dhīnāṃ bhedāstai"rbhedairupakalpitā" racitā anityatvādīnāṃ vivekināṃ bhedāḥ parasparaṃ viśeṣāḥ | "tairbhedairbhinneṣviva" vikalpa"buddhau pratibhātsu" pratibhāsamāneṣu dharmiṣu | teṣāṃ śabdānā"mvivekeṣu" bhedeṣu vikalpānāṃ "copasthāpanāt" | yathākramaṃ vācakatvena grāhakatvena copaśleṣāt |

[348,1]

nanu ca kṛtakānityatvayornaivāvadhibhedostyakṛtakasyeva nityarūpatvāt |
tataśca pratijñārthaikadeśa eva hetuḥ |

[348,2]

naiṣa doṣo yasmādakṛtakasyāpi prāgbhāvasyānityatvāt | kṛtakasyāpi pradhvaṃsābhāvasya nityatvādastyevāvadhibhedaḥ | yadvā kāraṇena kṛtaḥ śabdo na bhavatītyasya samāropasya vyavacchedena kṛtako dvitīyādikṣaṇe sthāyitvasamāropavyavacchedenānitya ityucyata ityastyevāvadhibhedaḥ | "te"neti yathoktena vyāvṛttibhedena svabhāvahetau"svabhāvasyaiva sādhyasādhanabhāvepi na sādhyāsādhanayoḥ saṃsarga" ekatvaṃ | "tataśca" yaduktaṃ svabhāve sādhye "pratijñārthaikadeśo hetuḥ syāditi" sa doṣo nāstītyāha —

[348,3]

"tanne"ti | "tadi"ti tasmāt || "sa cāyaṃ svabhāva" iti sambandhaḥ | svabhāva ityavyatirikto dharmaḥ | sa kadācit sattvamanyo vā | yadyapi kṛtake sattvamasti satsu ca kṛtakatvantathāpi hetukṛtoyaṃ svabhāva ityetāvanmātravivākṣāyāṃ kṛtako heturucyate | na tu sāmarthyavivakṣāyāṃ | prameyatvādivat | sāmarthyamastyetāvanmātravivakṣāyāñca sattvaṃ heturucyate tena tu hetukṛtatvavivakṣāyāṃ | (187–88)

[348,4]

tena yaducyate | "kṛtake sattvaṃ vidyate na ca tasyānityatve vyabhicārosti | tatkimityupādhibhedena viśeṣyata" iti tadapāstaṃ | kṛtakatvādau sāmarthyasyāvivakṣitatvāditi | hetutvenāpadiśyamāna ucyamānaḥ | "upādhibhedāpekṣo" viśeṣaṇabhedāpekṣaḥ | "kevalo" vetyupādhyanapekṣaḥ | "sādhyasiddhyarthamucyate" | anityatve sādhye kṛtakatvamupādhibhedāpekṣantadanapekṣantu sattvaṃ || apekṣitetyādinopādhibhedāpekṣatvaṃ kṛta katvasyāha | parasyāhetvabhimatasya jananaśaktireva vyāpāraḥ | anvayavyatirekānuvidhānameva cāpekṣā | "svabhāvaniṣpattau" svabhāvaniṣpattinimitta"mapekṣitaḥ paravyāpāro"
yena "bhāvena" sa kṛtakaḥ | saṃjñāyāṃ kano vidhānāt saṃjñāśabdoyaṃ "kṛtaka" iti | yataevanteneyaṃ kṛtakaśrutiḥ svabhāvābhidhāyinyapi satī "paropādhima"tyantaviśeṣaṇamenaṃ svabhāvamā"kṣipati | eteneti" kṛtakatvasyopādhibhedāpekṣatvapratipādanena | "pratyayānāṃ"
kāraṇanāmbhedastena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathoktastadbhāvastattvaṃ | sthānakaraṇādibhedād bhidyate śabdaḥ | ādiśabdāt prayatnānantarīyaka"tvādayo vyākhyātāḥ" |

[349,1]

"eva"mityādinopasaṃhāraḥ | "kvacit prayoge upādhibhedaṃpratyanapekṣaḥ" | ataevāha | sāmānyena "anitya eva" sādhye "yathā sattvaṃ | svabhāvabhūtaś"cāsau "dharma"śca tasya "parigraheṇa" | kvacitsvabhāvo heturucyate iti prakṛtaṃ | "yathā tatraive"tyanityatve sādhya "utpattiḥ" | na cotpattirutpattimatonyābhāvasyājanyatvenotpattyabhāvaprasaṅgāt |
kevalamarthāntarabhūtevakalpitāviśeṣaṇatvena tenotpatterityutpattimatvādityarthaḥ | ayamupādhyapekṣa eva svabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ | kṛtakatvādau parabhūta upādhirahitatvātmabhūta eva dharmaviśeṣa ityetāvān viśeṣaḥ |

[349,2]

"anayā di"śeti | upādhyapekṣānapekṣahetupravibhāgadiśā || 189

[349,3]

yadi "sattākhyaḥ svabhāvo hetuḥ" sattvamiti yāvat | pradhānādi"sattā kathaṃ na sādhyate" | atha sattāsāmānye sādhye siddhasādhyatā syādataḥ sattāviśeṣassādhyastasmiṃśca sādhye viśeṣasyānanvayāt sādhyaśūnyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syādato na sattā "sādhyate" |
tadā hetāvapi sattve viśeṣasyānanvayāt sādhanaśūnyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt | tadāha | "ananvayo hī"tyādi | "bhedānā"mviśeṣāṇāṃ "vyāhato" duṣṭo "hetusādhyayoḥ" | hetau sādhye cetyarthaḥ || anyatra "ce"tyanātmādau | "tadi"ti sattvaṃ | "kila"śabdonabhimatārthe eva | prasādhyamānamiti | (189–90)

[349,4]

asti "pradhānami"tyādinā "pradhāna"lakṣaṇayogena "viśeṣībhavati na ca viśeṣaḥ"tyācārya di gnā gaḥ | "asti pradhānamityanena pradhānasvalakṣaṇameva sādhyata" iti yatsāṃ khye noktaṃ ta"tpramāṇa"syānumānasya"viṣayājñānāt" | sāmānyaviṣayaṃ hyanumānaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ | "vyāhanyate" duṣyati | "kintarhi | hetāvapi tulyadoṣatvāt" | tadevāha | "na hi heturi"tyādi | na vidyate 'nvayosyetyananvayaḥ "siddheḥ" sādhyasādhanasya "nāṅgaṃ" | kuta ityasādhāraṇāddhetoḥ | "bhāvaḥ" sattā sā"upādāna"mviśeṣaṇaṃ yasya dharmiṇasta"nmātre" | tanmātratvādeva "sāmānyarūpe dharmiṇi" sādhye | sāṃ khya sya "na kaścidarthaḥ siddhaḥ syāt" | traiguṇyādilakṣaṇasyāsiddheḥ | "aniṣiddhañca tādṛśaṃ" | tādṛśamiti sāmānyamātraṃ | anena siddhasā dhyatāmāha || (190–91)

[350,1]

"na sarvathe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "sattāsādhana" iti sattāsiddhau | "bhāvamātraviśeṣaṇa" iti sattāmātraviśeṣaṇaḥ | "anirdiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo" yasyeti vigrahaḥ | "neheti"
vastumātrasādhane | "sattāsādhanapratiṣedhaḥ | kintu" sa vādī "tathā" sāmānye nāsti kaściditi kañcanā"sya" dharmiṇo "bhedaṃ" viśeṣaṃ nityatvādikama"parāmṛśanna"saṃspṛśan | "anene"ti vādinā || "upāttabheda" ityupāttaviśeṣaḥ | triguṇātmako nitya ityādi nopāttabhede "sādhye"smin pradhānādike dharmiṇi | "bhaveddheturananvayaḥ" | nāsya sādhyadharmaviśeṣaṇadṛṣṭāntenvayostītyananvayaḥ | yata evaṃ |

[350,2]

"sattāyāntena sādhyāyāmviśeṣaḥ sādhito bhavet" |

[350,3]

anye tu "sattāyā"mityādi paścād dharmādau vyākhyāya | pūrvārddhamu"pāttabhedami"tyādi paścād vyācakṣate |

[351,1]

sa hītyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "eko" mūlaprakṛterbhedābhāvāt | "nityo" niranvayavināśābhāvāt | triguṇatvātmakatvāt sukhaduḥkhamohā"tmakaḥ | anyo" veti karttṛtvādiyuktaḥ | "yathākathaṃcidapī"ti | yathoktairddharmaiḥ samastairvyastairvā viśeṣitaḥ | "tatsvabhāva" iti yathoktaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasvabhāvaḥ | "sa ca" dharmī "tatheti" viśiṣṭena svabhāvena nānveti sapakṣe | tathā bhūtasya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇosiddheḥ | "na tena siddhene"ti sattāmātreṇa | sattāmātre vivādābhāvāt | (191–92)

[351,2]

"nanvi"tyādi paraḥ | "evaṃ prasaṅga" iti yaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sattāyāmuktaḥ | taduktaṃ |

[351,3]

"viśeṣānugamābhāvaḥ sāmānye siddhasādhyateti | "

[351,4]

yasmātta"trāpya"gnyādiṣu sādhyeṣu nā"gnisāttāyāṃ kaścidvivā"dostyagnimātrasya siddhatvāt | na ca tena siddhena kiñcit tasyāpravṛttyaṅgatvāt | deśādiviśiṣṭo hyagniḥ pravṛttyaṅgaṃ nāgnimātraṃ | sa eva tarhi sādhya ityāha | viśiṣṭa ādhāro yatrāgnyādikaṃ sādhyate sa viśeṣaṇaṃ yasyāgnyādikasya sa "viśiṣṭādhāraviśeṣaṇaṃ" |
tasya | sādhyatvenā"bhimatasya" | sapakṣe'nanvayādasiddhiḥ |

[351,5]

"ne"tyā cā ryaḥ | "na vai sa ādhāro" viśeṣaṇabhāvena gṛhītopi tama"gnimviśeṣīkaroti" | yenānvayaḥ syāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tadayoga" ityādi | tasya dharmasya tasmin dharmiṇyayogo ya āśaṃkitastasya "vyavacchadena" viśeṣaṇāt | etacca "pakṣadharma"1 | 3 itya"troktaṃ | vakṣyate ca" caturthe paricchede 4 | 149 ||

[351,6]

nanu ca vyāptigrahaṇakāle pradeśāyogavyavacchinno vahnirasiddhaḥ | tatsiddhau vā kimarthonvayānugamaḥ | katham | asiddho yasmāt | yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniriti vyāptiṃ pratiyatā sāmānyenābhimatadeśāyogavyavacchinnopi bahnirākṣipta eva |
kevalamidānīmasmindeśe vahnirityevaṃ viśeṣapratītyarthamanvayānugamanamiṣyate |

[352,1]

"tasmā"dityupasaṃhāraḥ | "tatre"ti pradeśādau | tadayogavyavacchedeneti tasmin pradeśādau dharmiṇi sādhyadharmasyā"yogavyavacchedena" sāmānyasyāgnimātrasya sādhanāt nāstyanvayadoṣaḥ | nāpi siddhasādhyatā pradeśāyogavyavacchedasyāsiddhatvāt || pradhānādike dharmiṇyayogavyavacchedena sattāmātraṃ sādhyamiti cedāha | na "tathe"tyādi | kvaciditi pradhānādike dharmiṇi | kasmāt | "pradhānādiśabdavācyasyaivārthasya" traiguṇyādilakṣaṇasyaivā"bhāvāt | nirviśeṣeṇaiva sā" sattā | viśeṣaṇabhūtasyādhārasyā"bhāvāt" |

[352,2]

"kathamityā"di paraḥ | sopi dharmī "kathaṃ | vijñātavyaḥ" | jñātvā ca śabde"nābhi"dhātavyaḥ | abhihitaḥ pramāṇena "niścetavyaḥ" | tasmājjñeyatvādibhiḥ sopi siddha"eva" | tasmin sattā sāmānyaṃ sādhyate | "tatki"midānīṃ "jñeya"nnirviśeṣaṇama"stītye"tāvatā pra dhā na sya "siddhirastu" | jñeyādyartho hi pradhānārthaḥ śabdārtharūpaḥ syānna nityādiguṇopetaḥ || pradhānantāvatsiddhambhavatyanye ca dharmā anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ setsyaṃte iti cedāha | "tathāpi" jñeyatvādinā "kiṃ siddhaṃ syāt" | naivābhimatasya pradhānasya svalakṣaṇasya siddhiḥ syāt | asya śabdārtharūpatvāt | agnyanumānepi tarhyagnimātraṃ siddhamityasādhyaṃ syādityāha | "anyatra" tu "tadevāgnisāmānya"niyatādhāramasiddha"ntatra" deśe na "siddhamiti sādhyate" ||

[352,3]

nanu "tatrāpi tadayogavirahiṇeti" tena pradeśenāyogastadayogastena virahaḥ pradeśena yoga ityarthaḥ | sosti yasya sāmānyasya tattathoktaṃ | tenā"nvayo na siddhaḥ" |

[352,4]

"netyā"dinā pariharati | "na vai kaści"nnyāyajñaḥ "tathābhūtena" pradeśasambandhinā'gnisāmānyena vyāptiṃ "karoti | tasmāt paraṃ" prativādinaṃ "pratipādayatā dhūmognināntarīyakognyavinābhāvī darśanīyaḥ | yatra dhūmastatrāgni"rityevaṃ | "sa" dhūma"stathe"ti sarvopasaṃhāravyāptipradarśanenā"gnimātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatraiva" pradeśedharmiṇi "svayaṃ" svena "rūpeṇa dṛśyate tatraivāgnibuddhiñjanayati | tatrai"tasyāṃ sāmarthyādanumeyapratītau "sādhyanirdeśena na kiñcit prayojanantena" vināpi sādhyasiddheḥ etadevāha | "tatre"tyādi | "tatra" sādhyadharmiṇi liṅgasya "darśanāt sambandhākhyānamātrācceṣṭasya" sādhyasya "siddheḥ" | yataśca na sādhyasya dharmadharmisamudāyasya nirdeśastadā"tadanirdeśe ca kathantadviśiṣṭe" sādhyadharmeṇā"nvayaḥ" | naiva | yatonanvayadoṣaḥ syāt | taditi "tasmādayandhūmognyavinābhāvitayā siddhaḥ sāmarthyādeva tena pradeśenāyogamvyavacchinatti" | tasmāt samudāyaḥ sādhya ucyate |

[353,1]

yadi hi tatra nāgniḥ syānnaiva dhūmo bhavediti sāmarthyaṃ | anvayastu kevalenaiva sādhyadharmeṇa darśanīyo na sādhyadharmadharmisamudāyena | tasya dṛṣṭānte'siddhatvāt | samudāyena ca vyāptipradarśane prayojanābhāvāt | ata evāha | "na punara"syāstatheti pradeśaviśiṣṭa"syopanyāsapūrvakonvayaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sādhyokte rihānva"yapradarśanakāle'"naṅgatvāt" | sādhyanirdeśapūrvakāle vānvayasyeṣyamāṇe naiva sādhanavākyāt "kaścit" pratijñāvākya"mapanayet" |

[353,2]

tasmāt sthitametat | pakṣamanupradarśyaiva sādhyadharmeṇa liṅgasya vyāptiḥ kathanīyeti | tathā cāha ācārya di gnā gaḥ | "liṃgasya dhūmādeḥ sādhyenāvyabhicāronyatra sāmānye na dharmimātre darśayitavyaḥ | niścitāvyabhicāraṃ ca liṅgantatre"ti sādhyadharmiṇi "prasiddhaṃ sat | tena vyāpakadha"rmeṇa yuktaṃ sādhya"dharmiṇaṃ" gamayiṣyati |

[353,3]

"tasmā"dityādinopasaṃhāraḥ | "yathāgnisādhana"mviśeṣaparigrahādanavadyaṃ "naiva sattāsādhanama"navadyaṃ viśeṣāsiddhaiḥ | tadevaṃ siddhasādhyatāprasaṃgādananvayācca na pra dhā nā deḥ sattā sādhyā ||

[354,1]

sādhanaṃ punaḥ sarvamatramanuddiṣṭamiti pratipādayitumāha | "aparā"mṛṣṭetyādi |
aparāmṛṣṭonupāttas"tadbhedaḥ" | yasmin "vastumātre" sattāmātre | tasmin "sādhane"
kriyamāṇenvayo na vihanyate | kasya | "tanmātravyāpinaḥ" sattāmātravyāpinas"sādhyasya" | tadeva vivṛṇvannāha | "vastumātravyāpini sādhyadharme | svabhāvaviśeṣāparigraheṇa" punassattve kriyamāṇe "nānvayavyāghātaḥ" | na sādhyaśūnyo dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ |

[354,2]

"na hi tatre"ti | sattve "sādhane" | kasmāt | "sanmātrāśrayepi" sattvamātrasya hetutvenāśrayaṇepītyarthaḥ | na punaḥ sādhyatve sattāyā viśeṣānāśrayaḥ | kasmād | "vaiphalyāt" | (192–93)

[354,3]

sattāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ punardoṣāntarandātumāha | "api ceti | asiddhe" pradhānādau dharmiṇi "na bhāvadharmostī"tyasiddho hetuḥ | yastu bhāvābhāvo"bhayāśrayo" dharmaḥ sa sattve sādhye "vyabhicārya"naikāntiko yop"yabhāva"sya "dharmaḥ" sa sattve sādhye "viruddho" sattvasyaiva sādhanāt | yasyāṃ pradhānādisattāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ heturyaḥ kaścidupādīyate sa sarvo doṣatrayaṃ nātivarttate | "sā sattā sādhyate kathaṃ" | iha ca hetoḥ siddhatvamabhyupagamya viruddhānaikāntikāntikatve ukte hetvasiddhāvanayorasambhavāt | (192–93)

[354,4]

nanu sarvajñādisattāyāmapi sādhyāyāṃ hetorasiddhatādidoṣasya tulyatvāt kathantatsattāsiddhiḥ |

[354,5]

naiṣa doṣaḥ | yadyadupadiśyate tajjñānapūrvakameva yathā'nyat kiñcit | upadiśyate ca caturāryasatyaṃ | tasmāttadapi jñānapūrvakameva yasya tajjñānaṃ sosmābhiḥ sarvajñobhyupagamyata iti | na kācit kṣatiḥ | "taddhetu"riti sattāhetuḥ | "trayī"miti tryavayavāndoṣajātindoṣaprakārā"nnābhivarttate" | tāmāha | "asiddha"mityādi | "virodha"miti viruddhatāṃ | "tatra bhāvadharmo heturasiddhasattāke kathaṃ sidhyet" |

[355,1]

syādetad | bhāvadharmaḥ pra dhā nā dessiddho na tu bhāva ityāha | "yo hī"tyādi | "yo hi" pradhānādi"bhāvadharmma"hetu"ntatra" pradhānādā"vicchati sa kathaṃ" vādī pradhānādikam"bhāvaṃ" siddhaṃ "necchet" | tasmād bhāva eva dharmaḥ | kathantarhi bhāvasyāyaṃ dharma iti kathyata iti cedāha | "kadācida"pekṣayeti bhedāntarapratikṣepalakṣaṇayā "vyatirekīva" bhinnarūpa iva "dharmiṇaḥ" sakāśād "dharmo nirdiśyate | yathā" kṛtakatvamasyetyakṛtakavyāvṛtta eva bhāva ucyate | natvanya eva dharmo dharmaśabdenocyate'nyaśca dharmī dharmiśabdenetyāha | "na hī"tyādi | yasmādanyavyāvṛttinirapekṣaḥ pumān yadā śabdasyākṛtakādevaikasmād vyāvṛttiṃ jijñāsate | tadā kṛtakatvamasyetyucyate |
yadānyavyāvṛttisākāṃkṣo'kṛtakatvādevaikasmād vyāvṛttiṃ jijñāsate tadā kṛtakaḥ śabda ityucyata iti | etacca prāgevoktam | bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepetyādinā |

[355,2]

atha punarubhayorbhāvābhāvayorddharmaṃ hetumbūyāt | kathaṃ punareko dharmo bhāvābhāvayorbhavati | dharmo hi svabhāvo yaśca bhāvasya svabhāvaḥ kathamabhāvasya syādityāha |
anāśritetyādi | "anāśri"tamvastu yasmin vyatirekamātre | tasya vyatirekamātrasya "pratiṣedhamātrasya" dharmatvena kalpitasyā"bhāvepyavirodhāt" | vyatirekamātrameva kathambhavatītyāha | aparyudāsena prasajyapratiṣedhena | prasajyopasarjano vidhiḥ "paryudāsaḥ"
sa ceha nāśritaḥ | "yathā na bhavati mūrtta ityamūrttatvaṃ" mūrttatvanivṛttimātraṃ bhāvepi vijñāne "nirūpākhye"pyabhāve"pi syāt" ||

[355,3]

paraḥ pratibaddhumāha | "nirupākhyābhāvānna pratiṣedhaviṣayatvaṃ" | yadadhikaraṇādiśaktiyuktantatkasyacidviṣayaḥ syāt | nirupākhyaṃ ca sarvaśaktirahitantatkathamviṣayaḥ syāt | "saṃprati" pratiṣedhaviṣayatve pratiṣiddhe "kimvidhiviṣayosti" nirupākhyaṃ | "tadapi"vidhiviṣayatvannirupākhyasya "neti cet | kathami"dānīmabhāvo "na pratiṣedhaviṣayaḥ" | vidhiviṣayatvaniṣedhādeva hi pratiṣedhaviṣayatvaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "vidhinivṛttirūpatvāt pratiṣedhasya | tadi"ti tasmādetadanantaroktama"vyavacchedamātraṃ dvayorapi" bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambhavat sattve sādhye gamakatvaṃ kathamātmasāt kuryāt | kimbiśiṣṭaṃ gamakatvaṃ | "vipakṣe"tyādi | "vipakṣe" prayoge "vṛtti"rhetostasya "śaṅkā" tasyā api "vyavacchedena na labhyanna"
cobhayadharmasya vyavacchedamātrasya vipakṣād vyāvṛttirastīti "katha"ntad gamakatvamā"tmasāt kuryāt | sa ca" vādī "svavācā"nyavacanena | sattāsādhanasya heto"rubhayadharmatāṃ bruvāṇassataḥ" sādhyā"danyatrāpya"sati asyobhayadharmasya heto"rvṛttim"bhāṣate | sa eva ca "sattāyāṃ" sādhyāyāma"vyabhicāranibandhanatvād" gamakatvasyetyavyabhicārambhāeta iti hetoḥ "kathaṃ no"nmattaḥ ||

[356,1]

"abhāvadharmantu" hetuṃ "sattāyā"mvadatosya vādino viruddhaḥ syāt | sattvaviparītasyāsattvasya sādhanāt | kaḥ punarasyaiva abhāvasyaiva dharma ityāha | vyavacchedaṃ kīdṛśam"bhāvamātravyāpī sāmarthya"lakṣaṇastasya "vyavacchedo" niyamenābhāvasyaiva bhavati | na tu mūrttatvādervyavacchedastasyaivobhayadharmatvāt | kasmādviruddha ityāha | "tasya" bhāvamātravyāpyarthavyavacchedasya "bhāve kvacidabhāvādabhāve" ca sarvatra bhāvād viruddhatvaṃ || "tasmādayaṃ triprakāropi" bhāvābhāvobhayasambandhī dharmaḥ "sattāyāssādhranena hetulakṣaṇamuktaḥ" | na ca triprakārādadharmā"danyā gati"ranyaḥ prakārosti yata"stasmānna sattā sādhyate" | sādhanatve liṅgatve'syāssattāyāḥ "sāmānye"nānupāttaviśeṣaṇatvena | "siddhasattāke dharmiṇi nāsiddhiḥ" | anityatvādike "vastudharme"sādhye | kimviśiṣṭe"tanmātravyāpini | tena ca sādhyadharmeṇa" liṃgasya "vyāptiḥ | kathaṃcidi"tyanvayamukhenavyatirekamukhena"vā yadi niścīyate" | na virodhavyabhicārau | na viruddhatvama"naikāntikatvamvā" | iti heto"rnāyaṃ prasaṃgo"siddhaviruddhānaikāntikalakṣaṇaḥ |
aniścitāyāntu sādhyadharmeṇa liṅgasyā"vyāptau | dharmisamāśraye vā" pakṣadharmatve"vā'niścite sati tatsvabhāvatayā" niścitatrairūpyasvabhāvatayā yo "gamako"'bhimato"heturna sa kaścid gamakaḥ || ata eva" kāraṇāt "svadharmeṇa" svena sādhyarūpeṇa "vyāptaḥ"
sādhyadharmiṇi "siddho" niścito hetu"svabhāvo vācyaḥ" |

[357,1]

etadeva draḍhayannāha | "na hī"tyādi | "prakāśatayā" prabhāsvaratayā ghaṭādīnprakāśayan yadā kadācid ghaṭādyudarāntarvarttī bhavati tadā "tadrūpāpratipattau" prabhāsvaratā'pratipattau satyāṃ "svāmarthakriyāṃ" ghaṭādiprakāśanalakṣaṇāṃ "na hi karoti" ||

[357,2]

gamakasvarūpamabhidhāyādhunā gamyasvarūpamāha | "vyāpakastasye"ti | yosau gamako vyāpyaḥ svabhāvastasya "vyāpakaḥ" svabhāvaḥ niścito gamyaḥ |

[357,3]

"taddharme"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | dharmiṇo "dharmo" gamyaḥ | kīdṛśastasya gamakatvenābhimatasya "vyāpakatvena niścitaḥ" | kathaṃ punarvyāpakatvena niścita ityāha | "taddharmaniścayādeva" vyāpyadharmaniścayādeva |

[357,4]

iyatā gamyagamakayoḥ svarūpandarśitaṃ ||

[357,5]

nivarttyanivarttakayorapi svarūpamāha | "tasye"tyādi | ayamiti vyāpako dharmaḥ svayaṃ "nivṛttau" satyāṃ "tasya" vyāpyasya "nivarttakaḥ" |

[357,6]

"tasye"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "ayaṃ vyāpako dharmaḥ svayannivarttamāna"stasya "vyāpyasya nivarttaka" iti sambandhaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | yasmā"devaṃ hya"syā"yaṃ" sādhyo "dharmo vyāpakaḥ siddho bhavati | yadyasya" vyāpakasyābhāve vyāpyo "na bhavet" || taditi vākyopanyāse |

[358,1]

anenānantaroktenānuvarttyānuvarttakabhāvasya nivarttyanivarttakabhāvasya ca pradarśanena"dvividhasyāpi" sādharmyavato vaidharmyavataśca "sādhanaprayogasya gamakalakṣaṇaṃ" sādhyasādhakatvalakṣaṇamuktamveditavyaṃ |

[358,2]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "dvividho" hītyādi | "yathāhureke" iti nai yā yi kāḥ | "sādharmyavāneva"
hi prayogonvayī | "vaidharmyavāneva" ca vyatirekī |

[358,3]

nanu sādharmyaprayoge pakṣadharmatvamanvayaśceti | tathā vaidharmyaprayogepi pakṣadharmatvaṃ vyatirekaśceti dvirūpantarhi liṅgamprāptamityāha | "nānayo"rityādi | anayorityanvayavyatirekiṇorhetvorvastutaḥ "paramārthato na kaścid bhedaḥ" | dvayorapya"nvayavyatirekavattvāt" | anyatra saṃyogabhedāt | tasmāttāvevānvayavyatirekau kadācitsādharmyaprayogeṇa pratipādyete kadācid vaidharmyaprayogeṇeti prayogamātrambhidyate na tvarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ |
yasmāt "sādharmyeṇāpi hi prayoge'rthāt" sāmarthyāt | sādhyavipakṣāddhetorvyāvṛttirvaidharmyantasya gatiḥ |

[358,4]

tadeva sāmarthyamāha | "asatī"tyādi | "tasminniti" vaidharmye | evaṃ hi sādhyenānvito "hetuḥ" syād yadi "sādhyābhāve na bhavet" | tathā vaidharmya iti vaidharmyaprayoge |
tasminnityanvaye yadi hi sādhyena hetoranvayaḥ syāt tadāyaṃ sādhyanivṛttau nivartteta | "etacca" vya ti re ka ci ntā "yāmvakṣyāmaḥ" || (194–95)

[358,5]

"anityatve yathā kāryaṃ | anitya eva kṛtakatvaṃ" | etaccānvayina udāharaṇaṃ |
akāryamvā | avināśinīti vyatirekiṇa udāharaṇaṃ | tenāyamartho bhavati | "avināśini" vināśābhāve sati | akāryaṃ kṛtakatvanna bhavati | tadevāha | "anene"tyādi | "anayori"tyanvayavyatirekiṇoḥ | yatkiñciditi sarvopasaṃhāreṇavyāptikathanenārthānnityād vyāvṛttiḥ kṛtakatvasyo"kteti" vyatirekamatiḥ | "śabdaśca kṛtaka" iti pakṣadharmakathanaṃ | pakṣaḥ kasmānnocyata ityāha | "kṛtaka"syetyādi | "anityatvena vyāptaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ" yadā śabdena "kathi"tantadā niyamena svaṃ vyāpakaṃ sannidhāpayatīti "sāmarthyādevānityaḥ śabda" iti bhavati | "tasmānnāvaśyami"tyādi | iheti sādharmyaprayoge |

[359,1]

vaidharmyavantaṃ prayogamāha | "vyatireke"pītyādi | etaccākāryamvā 'vināśītyetasya vivaraṇaṃ | ihāpi na pratijñāvacanaṃ | yasmāt siddhasvabhāvatayā niścitayā nityasvabhāvatayā hetubhūtayā | "tadabhāva" ityanityatvābhāve sati "na bhavataḥ kṛtakatvasya śabde ca bhāvakhyātau" sadbhāvakathane kṛte sati "tadātmanaḥ" sata ityanityasvabhāvasya sataḥ kṛtakatvasya śabde "bhāva" iti | "sāmarthyāda"nityaḥ śabda iti siddheḥ | "pūrvavadi"ti sādharmyaprayogavat |

[359,2]

nanvatra vaidharmyaprayoge'nvayo nokta ityāha | anvayastvityādi | "anvaya"mantareṇa vaidharmyasyānupapattira"rthāpattiḥ" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | na hītyādi | yasmā"datadātmaniyatasyā"nityasvabhāve'pratibaddhasya | "tannivṛttā"vanityatvanivṛttau "nivṛtti"ryuktā | yata evantasmāt svayantādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ hetoḥ sādhye "niyamaṃ" pramāṇena"prasādhya" sādhyanivṛttyā mūḍhaṃ prati heto"rnivṛttirvaktavyā" |

[359,3]

tena yaducyate | "pramāṇena cenniyamaḥ prasādhitaḥ kinniṣphalena nivṛttivacanena | kathaṃ vā niyamaṃ na pratipadyate | na tu tannivṛttau nivṛttimi"ti tadapāstaṃ ||

[359,4]

anye tvanyathā vyācakṣate | prasādhya śabdārthādākṣepavacanastenāyamartho niyamaṃ prasādhya niyamamarthādākṣipya nivṛttirvaktavyeti | tathābhūtena vacanena nivṛttirvaktavyā |
nivṛttyuktiḥ sāmarthyānniyamamākṣipatīti | ata evāha | "sā ce"tyādi | "se"ti niyamasyākṣepikā nivṛttiḥ sidhyati paramprati | yadi tathā bhūtena vacanena prakāśate | "tadā" sādhyātmaniyama"marthā"duktisāmarthyā"dākṣipati | iti" hetoḥ "siddhonvayaḥ" ||

[360,1]

"kathami"tyādi paraḥ | "idānī"miti niścite vyāpyavyāpakabhāve gamako heturityabhyupagame satītyarthaḥ | kathaṃ kena pramāṇena "kṛtakovaśyamanitya iti" pratyetavyo niścetavyo "yena" tvayaivamucyate | kṛtakaḥ śabdo'nityaḥ | yatkṛtakantadanityamityevaṃ pṛṣṭo vyāptiviṣayaṃ bādhakaṃ pramāṇandarśayitumāha | "yasmādi"tyādi | yasmād vināśasya nivṛttidharmakatvalakṣaṇasya svabhāvāt svarūpamātrādanubandhitā | yadvā bhavatyasmāditi bhāvaḥ | svo bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ svaheturityarthaḥ | tasmādevānubandhitā vināśasya vastuni sadbhāvastasmāt kṛtako'nityaḥ | kuta eva tada"hetutvād"
yato na janakāddhetoranyo "vināśasya" hetuḥ | tasmāt "svabhāvādanabandhaḥ" |

[360,2]

tadayamatra samudāyārthaḥ | mudgaravyāpārānantaraṃ dvayaṃ pratīyate ghaṭanivṛttiḥ |
kapālaṃ ca | tathaite vināśarūpatayā pratīyete | tatra ghaṭanivṛtternīrūpatvenākāryatvāditi vakṣyati | tatkāryatvena tu pratītibhrāntireva | kāryatve vāsyā na ghaṭanivṛttirūpatvaṃ syāt | ghaṭasambandhitvena kṛtakatvāt | vināśarūpatayā ca na pratītiḥ syāt ghaṭasya sattvāt | kapālasyāpi mudgarakāryatve satyapi vināśarūpatā | ghaṭasyānivṛttatvāditi ca vakṣyati | tataśca kathamasya vināśarūpatayā pratītiḥ | nirhetuke tu vināśe svarasato nivarttamāna eva ghaṭo mudgarādisahakārī kapālajanakatvena sadṛśakṣaṇānārambhakatvāt mudgaravyāpārānantaraṃ ghaṭanivṛtteḥ kapālasya ca sadbhāvāttayorvināśarūpatayā vināśasya ca sahetukatvena mandamatīnāmavasāyo yujyata eva |

[360,3]

mudgaravyāpārānantaraṃ santānavicchedāt | tatkathaṃ "nirhetuka"vināśābhyupagamavādināṃ pratītibādhā codyata iti | etamevārthamāha | "na hī"tyādi | naśyanta iti yeṣāntāvat kṛtakānāṃ nāśo dṛśyate te vinaśyantaḥ | "tadbhāve vinaśvarasvabhāve"
svarūpajanakādanyatra "hetumapekṣate" | kutaḥ | "svahetoreva vinaśvarāṇāṃ" nivṛttidharmāṇāṃ"bhāvāt" | yataśca naśvarasvabhāvaṃ pratyanapekṣatā bhāvānā"ntasmād yaḥ kaścid kṛtakaḥ sa svabhāvenaiva naśvaraḥ" | (195–96)

[361,1]

yadi sahetuko vināśastadāvaśyaṃbhāvī na syādityāha | sāpekṣāṇāmityādi |
hīti yasmāt | sāpekṣāṇāmbhāvānāṃ nāvaśyambhāvitā | tasmāt "nirapekṣo"bhāvo vināśe vinaśvare svabhāvo hetusāpekṣatve hi ghaṭādīnāmmadhye "keṣāñcinnityatāpi syāt" | yeṣāṃ nāśakāraṇamasannihitaṃ | vāhulyāt vināśakāraṇānāṃ na kvacidasannidhānamiti cedāha | "yene"tyādi | "taddhetoriti vināśahetosteṣāmapi" vināśakāraṇānāṃ "nāvaśyaṃ sannidhāna"miti sambandhaḥ | kasmāt | "svapratya"yādhīnasannidhitvāt svakāraṇāyatasannidhitvāt | na ca vināśakāraṇāntaṃ kāraṇāni sarvatra sannihitāni | tataśca vināśahetoramannidhānāt "kaścinna naśyedapi" | satyapi vināśahetusannidhānaṃ na niyato vināśaḥ | yato na "hyavaśyaṃ hetavaḥ phalavantaḥ" vināśākhyakāryavantaḥ | kasmāt | sahakāryasannidhānaṃ "vaikalyaṃ" |
viruddhopanipātaḥ "pratibandhaḥ" | etena sāpekṣasya nāvaśyambhāvitvena vyabhicāritvamuktaṃ | (195–96)

[361,2]

sarveṣāṃ nāśahetūnāṃ nāśasya liṅgatvena ye hetava upādīyante teṣāṃ | kasmāt | "kāryāvyavasthiteḥ" | nāśalakṣaṇakāryotpattiniyamābhāvāt | "hetumannāśavādināṃ"
hetumantannāśaṃ ye vadanti teṣāṃ | yataścāhetuko vināśaḥ | "tattasmādayambhāvaḥ""kṛtakonapekṣastadbhāvamprati" vinaśvarasvabhāvamprati | "tadbhāvaniyato" nivṛttidharmakatāyāṃ niyataḥ | dṛṣṭāntamāha | "asambhave"tyādi | na sambhavati pratibaddho yasyāṃ sā kāraṇasāmagrī | "sakaleti" sahakāripratyayena santānapariṇāmena ca paripūrṇṇetyarthaḥ | prayogastu | ye yadbhāvaṃ pratyanapekṣāste tadabhāvaniyatāḥ | "tadyathā" | anyānapekṣaśca kṛtako bhāvo vināśa iti svabhāvahetuḥ | (196–97)

[362,1]

"nanvi"tyādinā naikāntikatvamāśaṃkate | "kvacit" kārye'"napekṣāṇāmapi keṣāṃcit" kāraṇānāṃ "nāvaśyantadbhāva" ityāha | "bhūmī"tyādi | sā hi kāryajanane'pekṣā sāmagrī | tasyāmasatyāmapi "kadācit" pratibandhakāle'"ṅkurānutpatteḥ" | etacca santānasyaikatvamadhyavasāyoktaṃ |

[362,2]

"ne"tyādinā pariharati | "tatra" yathoktāyāṃ sāmagryāṃ santānasya pariṇāmaḥ svabhāvāntarotpattilakṣaṇastatra "sāpekṣatvāt" | tato'napekṣatvādityasya hetostatrāvṛttiḥ |
kṛtakasyāpyasti vināśaṃ prati kālāntarāpekṣā tato heturasiddha ityāha | "naiva"mityādi | kṛtakasya "bhāvasya" nāśe "kācit" kālānta"rāpekṣeti" vakṣyati |

[362,3]

syādetad | ekasvabhāvā eva bhūmibījādayaḥ kutasteṣāṃ santānapariṇāmāpekṣatvaṃ | ato vyabhicāra eva hetorityāha | "tatrāpī"tyādi |

[362,4]

etaduktambhavati | na bhūmibījādaya ekasvabhāvāḥ paścādiva prāgapi kāryotpādanaprasaṅgāt | kintūttarottarapariṇāmena bhinnāḥ | tatreti tasyāṃ santānapariṇāmena bhinnāyāṃ "sāmagryāmantyā yā" sāmagrī | kāryotpādane lakṣaṇāntareṇā"vyavahitā" sā"phalavatyeveti" kuto hetoranaikāntikatvaṃ |

[362,5]

syādetat | pūrvā sāmagrī janikāpi satī na niyatetyāha | "saive"tyantyā sāmagrī tatra "tāsu madhye'ṅkurahetu"rnānyā kācit | kimarthantarhyaṅkurārthibhiḥ pūrvā sāmagryupādīyata ityāha | "anyāstvi"tyādi | pūrvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ pūrvovasthāviśeṣa"stadarthaevā"ṅkurajananasamarthāntyasāmagryartha eva | tenārthibhirupādīyate sāmagrī rūpatayā cādhyavasīyate |

[362,6]

syādetad | antyāyā api sāmagryāḥ pratibandhaḥ sambhavati | tena kāryotpādaniyamābhāvāt sādhyaśūnyo dṛṣṭānta ityāha "na ce"tyādi | "tāma"ntyāṃsāmagrī"ntatra" kārye janye | "ekatra bhāva" ityantye kṣaṇe | vikārasyo"tpattau vā" tasyāntyasya kṣaṇasyai"katvahāneḥ" pūrvasya pracyutervikārākhyasya ca dvitīyasyotpatteḥ | tataśca nāsāvantyaḥ syāt |

[363,1]

atha na tasyāntyasya janakasvabhāvāt pracyutiriṣyate | tadā tadātmano janakātmanaḥ | svabhāvāda"pracyutasya tadutpādanaṃ" kāryotpādanaṃ "prati vaiguṇyamakurvāṇasya pratibandhahetora"pratibandhakatvād vighātakaraṇāt |

[363,2]

punarapi vyabhicāramāśaṃkate | "yavabījādayo na sāpekṣāḥ" | "kasmin" | "śālyaṅkure" kārye janye | kasmāt | "tadutpattipratyayānāṃ kadācit tatrāpi"
yavabījādau "sannidhānāt" | te "nirapekṣā" api na śālyakuraṃ janayantītyanaikāntika eveti |

[363,3]

"kathamiti" si ddhā nta vā dī | sāpekṣā evetyarthaḥ | "eṣā"miti yavabījādīnāṃ"śālibījasya" yasta"dutpādanaḥ" śālyaṅkurotpādanaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa evaiṣāṃ nāstītisambandhaḥ | "tatsvabhāvāpekṣā" iti śālyaṃkurotpādanasvabhāvāpekṣāḥ |

[363,4]

kadā ca kathaṃ nirapekṣatvaṃ syā"devantarhīti" paraḥ | "kṛtakānāṃ ca keṣāṃcit satāmvā"
keṣāṃcit | "sa eva" svabhāvo "nāsti yo naśvaraḥ | tasmāt tatsvabhāvāpekṣatvād"
vinaśvarasvabhāvāpekṣatvānna "vinaśvarā" ityasiddhatvaṃ hetoriti |

[363,5]

etannirākarttumprakramate | "śālibīje"tyādi | ādiśabdād yavabījādīnāṃ | sa"svabhāva" ityabhimatetarakārya jananājananasvabhāvaḥ "svaheto"riti kṛtvā | yo yavabījādirna "taddhetuḥ | sa" śālibījaheturyasya hetu"rnabhavatī"tyarthaḥ | so'tatsvabhāva ityaśālyaṃkurajananasvabhāvaḥ |

[363,6]

nanvataddhetuśca syāt tatsvabhāvaścetyāha | "niyataśakti"ścetyādi | niyatā pratiniyatā śaktiryasya sa tathā | "sa heturiti" śāliyavabījajananasvabhāvaḥ | "svarūpeṇa" vibhaktenaiva svabhāvena "pratītaḥ" pratyakṣataḥ |

[364,1]

syādetat | na hetukṛtaḥ svabhāvabhedo bhāvānāṃ kintu svabhāva eva kasyacit | tādṛśasvabhāvonyasya cānyādṛśa ityāha | "na ce"tyādi | "ākasmika"
iti nirhetukaḥ | "anapekṣasyā"hetoḥ kvaci"ddeśe" | kvacit"kāle" | kvacicca śālibījādau "dravye" śālyaṃkurotpādanasya svabhāvasya "niyamo" na syāt | kintu sarvvasya sarvadā sarvatra bhavedapekṣābhāvāt | tasmād deśādikamapekṣya bhavanniyamo hetumāniti gamyate | yathā śālibījādīnāṃ svabhāvaniyamas"tathātrāpi" kṛtakeṣu, satsu vā"niyamaheturvaktavyo yato" niyāmakāddhetoḥ kṛtakāssanto vā "kecinnaśvarātmāno jātā" nānye |

[364,2]

syādetad | yadi nāma niyāmako heturna śakyate darśayituntathāpi sambhāvyata ityāha | "na cātra" loke naśvarasya svabhāvasya "niyāmako heturasti" | na sambhāvyata eveti yāvat | sarveṣāṃ janmavatāṃ nāśasya siddherdṛṣṭatvāt | aniyatahetuko vināśa iti yāvat |

[364,3]

yadi "sarvajanmināṃ vināśasiddhire"vantarhi sattvāditi heturanaikāntikaḥ syāttadāha | "janmī"tyādi | janmavatā"meva svabhāvo nāśī" nājanmavatāṃ | nākāśādīnāṃ satāmapīti paro manyate | ā cā rya āha | "na vai janme"ti | na hi janmavaśād bhāvasya svabhāva utpadyate | tasmānna janma "nāśasya hetuḥ" | nāpyākāśādau sattvamastītyāha | "na ce"tyādi | "aheto"rākāśādeḥ "svabhāvaniyamaḥ" svarūpaniyamo'hetordeśakālaprakṛtiniyamāyogāt | yataśca sarvajanmināṃ vināśasiddhirākāśādīnāṃ cāsattvaṃ | "tasmānnātra" kṛtakeṣu satsu vā "heto"rnaśvarānaśvarajanakatvena "svabhāvapravibhāgaḥ |
tadbhāvāddhe"tupravibhāgābhāvāt "phalasya" kṛtakasya "sato vā" naśvarānaśvarapravibhāgo"nāstītyasamānaṃ" yavabījādinā | "seyamvināśasya nirapekṣatā kvacid" vastuni | "kadācit" kāle vināśasya yo "bhāva"stena "virodhinī" karoti "tadabhāvaṃ | tasya kvacita" vināśasyābhāvaṃ "svabhāvena" sattayā "sādhayati" | sarvatra sarvakālambhāvaṃ sādhayatīti yāvat | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yo hī"tyādi | "tatkāladravyāpekṣa" iti yasmin kāle bhavati yatra vā dravye | taṃ kālaṃ dravyañcāpekṣata iti "nirapekṣa eva na syādityuktaṃ"
prāk |

[365,1]

nanu vināśakahetvanapekṣatvena vināśasyānapekṣatvaṃ, na tu kālādyanapekṣatvena | tatkathamucyate tatkāladravyāpekṣa iti nirapekṣa eva vināśo na syāditi | yadi ca kālānapekṣo vināśaḥ dvitīyepi kṣaṇe vināśo na syāt tatkālāpekṣatvāt |
dravyānapekṣatve ca kasya tarhi vināśaḥ syāt |

[365,2]

evammanyate | jātasya tadbhāve'nyonapekṣaṇāditiṃ vacanāt | dvitīya eva kṣaṇe vināśo bhavati nānyasmin kṣaṇe | tathā sarvasya jātasya bhavati na dravyaviśeṣasya | tena dravyā'napekṣatve kasya tarhi vināśo bhavatu |

[365,3]

iti nirastaṃ | kālāntare dravyaviśeṣe ca nāśasya bhāve kālāntarasya dravyaviśeṣasya ca vināśakatvameva syāt | "vināśasya tadbhāva" eva bhāvāt | "tasmāt" tatkāladravyāpekṣatve "nirapekṣa" eva na syādityucyate |

[365,4]

"tarhī"ti paraḥ | netyā cā ryaḥ | "sattāyā" yo he"turbhāva"stasmā"deva tathotpatte"rnaśvarasvabhāvasyotpatteḥ | etadeva spaṣṭayati | "sato hi bhavata" iti sattāṃ pratipadyamānasya "tādṛśasyaiva" naśvarasvabhāvasyaivā"bhāvāt | nāvaśyaṃ sataḥ" padārthasya"kutaścit" kāraṇād "bhāva" utpādana "iti cet" | keciddhi santopi notpattimanto yathākāśādaya iti paro manyate | "ākasmikī"tyahetukā | "neyaṃ" sattā "kasya"cidarthasya"kadācit" kāle kvacid dravye"virameta" |

[365,5]

nanu ca ghaṭādīnāṃ svahetutaḥ sattāniyame kathamākāśādisattāprasaṅgaḥ |

[365,6]

sattyaṃ | kintu na kasyacid virametetyasyāyamarthaḥ | na sa kaścid bhāvo yatsvabhāvosāvākāśādirna syāt sarvātmakaḥ prasajyata ityeke | tadayuktaṃ |
yadi hi ghaṭādirūpamākāśe syādahetukaṃ syāt tasya mṛtpiṇḍādikamantareṇa bhāvāt | "tasmānneyamā"kāśādessattā | "kasyaci"dātmādeḥ "kadācit" kāle "kvacid" deśe virameta | deśakāladravyaniyatā na bhavedityarthaḥ |

[366,1]

etadeva draḍhayannāha | taddhītyādi | taddhi vastu | kiṃcidupalīyetāśrayet | "yasya yatra kiṃcidu"tpādādikaṃ pratibaddhamāyattaṃ | na copalīyeta yasya yatrāpratibaddhaṃ | "seyaṃ sattā kvacidapratibandhinī cet" | dravyakālāpekṣayā "na niyamavatī syāt" | tathā cākāśasyeyaṃ sattā nātmanaḥ | ātmanassattā na kālasyetyādi na syāt | "yataścaivantasmānneyaṃ sattākasmikī kvaci"nnityābhimateṣvapi |

[366,2]

"yadi" sattāhetoreva vinaśvarasyotpādaḥ "katha"midānī"mahetuko vināśa ukta" iti vyāghātamāha |

[366,3]

"jātasye"tyādinā pariharati | "jātasya" niṣpannasya "tadbhāve" vinaśvaratābhāve janakāddheto"ranyasyānapekṣaṇāt" |

[366,4]

ahetuko vināśa uktaḥ | uktaṃ "cātra" prāk yathā"na vināśo nāmānya eva kaścid" bhāvāt kintu "bhāva eva hi nāśaḥ" |

[366,5]

nanu ca pradhvaṃsābhāvo nāśaḥ sa kathambhāvasvabhāvo bhavatītyāha |

[366,6]

"sa eva hī"tyādi | yasmāt svahetoreva "kṣaṇasthāyī jātastasmād" bhāva eva nāśa uktaḥ | ya eva sattākālo bhāvasya tamevaikaṃ kṣaṇaṃ sthātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathā | na punarutpadya kṣaṇamapi tiṣṭhati | yadi tiṣṭhenna kadācinna nivartteteti vakṣyāmaḥ |
yadyekakṣaṇasthāyī bhāvo vināśaḥ kasmāt pravāhavicchedāt prāgapi tathā na niścīyate'niścayāccākṣaṇikaḥ sa ityāha | "tamasye"tyādi | "taṃ" nāśasvabhāvamasya ghaṭāderāsaṃsāramavidyānubandhāt "mandā urdhvaṃ" pravāhavicchedakāle "vyavasyanti na prāk"
sattākāle | "darśanepīti" naśvarasvabhāvasya satyapi "darśane" | na darśanakāle'dhyavasāyosti | avidyāsāma"rthyā"tsadṛśāparotpattyā ca darśanapāṭavasyābhāvāt |
yataśca santānavicchedakāle nāśasvabhāvasya niścaya"stasmāt tadvaśena" niścayavaśena | "paścā"diti yasmiṃn kāle nāśasvabhāvasya niścayastatkālopādhireva sa bhāvasya vināśasvabhāvo vyavasthāpyate | dṛṣṭāntamāha | "vikāre"tyādi |
yathā viṣadravyaṃ gṛhītamapi bhrāntisadbhāvāt prāganavadhāritamajñaiḥ puruṣaiḥ paścād viṣakṛtasya vikārasya lālāsrutyāderdarśanena viṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadvat | etāvanmātreṇāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto na tu māraṇaśaktirgṛhītā paścādavadhāryata iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
taditi tasmād "ayamvināśa" iti sambandhaḥ | vastuno yā sattā tadvyatirekeṇa na kicid vināśakāraṇa"mapekṣata iti tadvyāpī" sattāvyāpī |

[367,1]

"kathamityā"di paraḥ | "asāmarthyācce"ti prativacanaṃ | taddhetoriti nāśahetoḥ |
cakārādakārakatvācca | etadeva vivṛṇvannāha | abhāvakāriṇa ityabhāvakāritayābhimatasya kriyāyāḥ kārakatvasya "pratiṣedhācceti" | avastukārī yobhimataḥ sokāraka eva bhavati | asāmarthyandarśayitumāha | siddhe hītyādi | nāśaheturbhāvādabhinnamvā vināśaṃ kuryāttatonyamvā | na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhe hi "bhāve" kārako nāśahetustambhāvaṃ "na karoti" siddhatvādeva | nāpi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ | yato "nāpyanya" bhāvasya "na kiñcit" | tadavasthatvāt | tadatadrūpetyādi | bhāvarūpasya tatonyasya ca vināśasya "kāraṇāccākiñci"tkaro vināśaheturato nāpekṣyata iti siddhamasāmarthya |

[367,2]

"kriyāpratiṣedhastu katha"mityāha | "vināśa iti hi bhāvasyābhāvante" hetumannāśavādino "manyante" | asmābhirbhāvasvabhāva eva vināśa ityuktaṃ | taditi tasmādayaṃ vināśaheturvināśaṃ karotyabhāvaṃ karotīti prāptaṃ | tatraitasmin prāpte sati yadyabhāvo nāma kaścit svabhāvaḥ kāryaḥ syāt | tadā kāryatvādaṃkurādivat sa eva bhāva iti nābhāvaḥ syāt | atha yathā ghaṭo ghaṭarūpeṇa kāryaḥ paṭaśca paṭarūpeṇa kāryo na tu kāryatvād ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavati | tathā bhāvo bhāvarūpeṇa kāryo'bhāvopyabhāvarūpeṇa kāryaḥ syāt | na tu bhāva eva bhavatīti | tadayuktambhavatīti hi bhāvo na bhavatīticābhāvastenābhāvo bhāvavirodhī | na cābhāvarūpatayā tasya pratibhāsanādabhāvarūpatā | bhavanadharmatvenābhāvarūpatayā pratibhāsa eva na syāditīdameva codyate |
na ca parasparaviviktarūpatayā'bhāvānāṃ pratibhāsaḥ | yataścābhāvasya nīrūpatvādakāryatva"ntasmādabhāvaṃ karotīti bhāvaṃ na karotīti" vākyārthaḥ syāt | tena "kriyāpratiṣedhosya" nāśahetoḥ "kṛtaḥ syāt | tathāpi" kriyāpratiṣedhepyayaṃ vināśahetu"rakiñcitkaraḥ | kimiti" nāśe'pekṣyate bhāveneti "siddhā vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣā bhāvasya" |

[368,1]

nanu nirhetukepi vināśe kathamvināśaṃ pratyanapekṣā bhāvasya | svabhāvo hi sa tasyetthaṃ yenāpekṣya nivarttate virodhinaṃ | yathā'nyeṣāṃ pravāho mudgarādikaṃ | tena pūrvamvirodhino'bhāve nānivṛtteḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti |

[368,2]

tadayuktaṃ | yato virodhyapekṣasvabhāvatvaṃ yadi vastuno na pūrvamapi tadāsya pūrvottararūpayorbhedād nityatvameva | atha pūrvamapi sa svabhāvosti tadā pūrvamapyasya nivṛttiḥ syāt | atha tadā virodhyabhāvānna nivarttate | kathantarhi virodhyapekṣasvabhāvatvaṃ | satyeva virodhini | virodhyapekṣasvabhāvatvasya bhāvānnānyadā | yadi virodhī vastuno nopakārakaḥ kathantantadapekṣate | upakāre vā virodhisannidhānepyaparasya bhāvasyotpattiriti pūrvako bhāvastadavastho dṛśyeta | virodhe sannidhānābhāvenānivṛtteḥ | atha nivarttate | na tarhi virodhyapekṣayā bhāvasya nivṛttiḥ | yadi ca na bhāvamvināśayati kathamvirodhī | na ca kṣaṇikavādināṃ virodhisannidhāne sattā no nivarttate | kintarhi notpadyate | tathā hi nirodhamupagacchanneva ghaṭo mudgarādisahakāryapekṣaḥ kapālajanakatvena sadṛśakṣaṇānārambhako bhavatīti santānānutpattirna tu virodhinamapekṣya pravāho nivarttate | yataśca pūrvaṃsantānenotpitsorbhāvasya virodhisannidhāne santānānutpattirata eva mandamatīnāṃ sahetukanāśādhyavasāyo mudgarādau ca virodhitvāvasāya iti sarvaṃ susthaṃ || tasmānnirapekṣatvādeva yatra nāma kvacid bhavaddṛṣṭo vināśastatraiṣa svabhāvata eva bhavati |

[368,3]

nanvahetukepi nāśe yadaiva ghaṭādernāśaḥ pratīyate tadaivāhetukaḥ syānna pūrvamapratīterarthaikakṣaṇasthāyitvena ghaṭāderutpatteḥ pūrvamapi nāśaḥ | nanu yathaikakṣaṇasthāyitve notpattiḥ svahetubhyastathā 'nekakṣaṇasthāyitvenāpyutpattiḥ syāt | vicitraśaktayo hi sāmagryo dṛśyante | tatra kācit syādapi yā'naśvarātmānaṃ janayedityāha |

[369,1]

"asmādi"tyādi | asmācca svabhāvamātrabhāvāda"nyatrāpi" deśādivyavadhānenā"dṛṣṭe" | tathā dṛṣṭe | virodhi sannidhānāt pūrvamapi "svabhāvata" eva vināśo bhavati |

[369,2]

evammanyate | yeṣāntāvadvināśo dṛśyate teṣāṃ yadi na pratikṣaṇaṃ vināśaḥ syāt tadā vināśapratītireva na syāt | tathā hi yadi dvitīye kṣaṇe bhāvasya sthitistadāsau sarvadaiva tiṣṭhet | dvitīyepi kṣaṇe kṣaṇadvayasthāyī svabhāvatvāt | tadā ca tenāparakṣaṇadvayaṃ sthātavyaṃ | aparasminnapi kṣaṇe kṣaṇadvayasthāyisvabhāvatvādaparasmin kṣaṇe'vasthānaṃ syādevamuttarottare kṣaṇe draṣṭavyamityāsaṃsārambhāvasya sthitiḥ syāt |

[369,3]

atha prathame kṣaṇe bhāvasya kṣaṇadvayasthāyī svabhāvo dvitīye kṣaṇa ekakṣaṇasthāyī |
tathāpi tayoḥ svabhāvayorbhedāt kṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt | na tvevamapi prathame kṣaṇe bhāvasyānekakṣaṇāvasthāyisvabhāvādakṣaṇikatvaṃ syānnāsaṃsāraṃ sthitiprasaṅgādityuktatvāt |

[369,4]

nanu dvitīyepi kṣaṇe bhāvasyottarakṣaṇānavasthānepi pūrvakṣaṇasthāyī rūpābhedena pūrvamapi sthānāt kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvamastyeveti cet |

[369,5]

na | pūrvambhāvasya hyeṣa svabhāvo yadekasmin kṣaṇe tiṣṭhatyanyasmin kṣaṇe sthāsyati | sa eva cetsvabhāvo dvitīye kṣaṇe tadāpyekasmin kṣaṇe tiṣṭhatyanyasmin kṣaṇe dvayaṃ sthāsyatītyevamuttarottarakṣaṇepi draṣṭavyamiti na vināśo bhāvasya syāt |
dṛśyate ca | tasmād vināśapratītyanyathānupapattyā pratikṣaṇavināśānumānaṃ |

[369,6]

adṛṣṭeṣu tarhi kṛtakeṣu kathaṃ pratikṣaṇavināśitvānumānaṃ vināśasyaivādarśanāt |

[369,7]

naiṣa doṣo yasmāt teṣāmapi prathame kṣaṇe ya eva svabhāvaḥ sa eva cet dvitīyādikṣaṇe tadā'bhūtvā bhavanameva prathamakṣaṇavat | atha prathame kṣaṇe tasya janmaiva na sthitirdvitīye ca kṣaṇe sthitireva na janma | evamapi kṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt | janmajanminoḥ sthitisthitimatoścābhedāt | na ca dvitīye kṣaṇe janma vinā sthitiryuktā | janma cenna tadāsthitistasyā dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvitvāt | dvitīyādau kṣaṇepyevamiti sarvatrotpattireva na sthitiriti kṣaṇikatvaṃ | kiṃ ca parasparabhinnasyāparāparakālasambandhitvasya kṛtakād bhāvādabhinnatvāt kṣaṇikatvameva |

[369,8]

"soyami"tyādinā kā ri kā rthamāha | "ayami"ti vināśaḥ | "kvacid" ghaṭādau mudgarādisannidhāne"tathānyatrā"pīti mudgarasannidhānāt pūrvamapi | evandeśādivyavadhānepi | (198–99)

[370,1]

yatpūrvamupanyastantatra dvau vastusādhanāviti tadupasaṃharannāha | "tata" iti tasmād"yā kācid bhāvaviṣayā" kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ liṅgābhyāṃ "dvidhaivānumitiḥ" | kasmāttayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayoreva "svasādhye sambandhaniyamāt | kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ" yasyā anumiteḥ | evaṃ"svabhāvo liṅgaṃ" yasyā iti vigrahaḥ | "yathāsvaṃ vyāpini sādhya" iti kāryasya kāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ sādhyaṃ | svabhāvasyāpi svabhāvo vyāpakaḥ sādhyastasmin sādhye "liṅgini tayoreva" kāryasvabhāvayorliṅgayoḥ "pratibandhāt" || (198–99)

[370,2]

anupalabdhimadhikṛtyāha | "pravṛtte"rityādi | pravṛtteḥ | sanniścayaśabdavyavahāralakṣaṇayoḥ "buddhipūrvatvāt" pramāṇapūrvatvāt | "tadbhāvānupalambhane" tasya pravṛttiviṣayasya bhāvasya pratyakṣānumānābhyāmanupalambhane prekṣāvatā "pravarttitavyaṃ netīyatā" leśenādṛśyaviṣayāyā apya"nupalabdheruktā pramāṇatā || tṛtīyastu hetura"nupala"bdhirgamaka ityucyata"
iti sambandhaḥ | "aviśeṣe"ṇeti dṛśyaviṣayetyamumviśeṣantyaktvā sāmānyena "kvacidarthe"
sādhye | "sanniścaye"tyādinā tamevārthandarśayati | pramāṇapṛṣṭhabhāvī saditi vikalpaḥ sanniścayaḥ | tatpṛṣṭhabhāvyeva saditi "dhvaniḥ" sacchabdaḥ | tathaiva sadityanuṣṭhānaṃ"sadvyavahāraḥ" | teṣāṃ "pratiṣedhe hi sarvaiva" dṛśyaviṣayā'dṛśyaviṣayā ca |

[370,3]

nanu kā ri kā yāṃ pravṛttirityuktantatkathaṃ vṛttau "sanniścaye"tyādi vyākhyāyata ityāha | "sanniścayā"ddhītyādi | yasmāt satāṃ vidyamānānāṃ niścayā"cchabdavyavahārāḥ" sanniścayaśabdavyavahārāstrayopi pravṛttyaṅgatvāt puruṣapravṛtternimittatvāt "pravṛttirityuktaḥ" | tasmānna sū tra vṛ ttyorvyāghāta iti |

[371,1]

kimpunaḥ kāraṇamupalambhanivṛttau sadvyavahāro nivarttate | "tathā hyanupalabdhireva" dviprakārāpyaviśeṣeṇā"sattvamityuktaṃ" prāk | "taccā"sattvamviprakṛṣṭāyāmanupalabdhau"pratipattṛvaśādu"ktaṃ | pratipattā hyanupalabhyamānannāstītyadhyavasyati | "na vastuvaśāt" | tathā hi viprakṛṣṭerthe sattvamasattvañca san"digdhaṃ" | tasmāt "tāvaddhi" sa viprakṛṣṭo "bhāvosya" pratipattu"rnāsti yāvadatrāpratipattiḥ" | kasmāt | "satāpi tena" viprakṛṣṭenārthenānupalabdhena "tadarthākaraṇāt" | tasya puṃsorthākaraṇāt | sannapyasatkalpaḥ | "vastutastvanupalabhyamāno na sannāsan" | kasmāt | "satāmapi" kadācit"svabhāvādiviprakarṣādanupalambhānnā"sattāniścayaḥ | "kvāpi" sattāniścayastasyāsyānupalambhasyā"satsvapi tulyatvāt | tadi"ti tasmāt | "etat sattva"miti sambandhaḥ |
kimbhūtamanu"palabdhilakṣaṇan"deśādiviprakṛṣṭaṃ "pratipattuḥ pramāṇābhāvāt" | pratyakṣānumānābhāvā"nnivṛttanna" vastuvaśāt | kiṃ karoti | "svanimittān śabdavyavahā" |

[371,2]

"upalabdhilakṣaṇa"mityanye paṭhanti | upalabdhireva sattvamupacārāt tathābhūtaṃ sattvaṃ nivṛttamityarthaḥ |

[371,3]

yenaiva"ntena" kāraṇena "yāpīyamanupalabdhiḥ" | keṣām | "anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ" | yā "vastutopyasattvarūpā" | apiśabdāt pratipattṛvaśādapi | kiṃ kāraṇam | "apravṛttiyogyatvāda"sadvyavahārayogyatvāt | tasyā apyanupalabdheretatsadvyavahārapratiṣedhakatvena "tulyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ | atra viṣaye" sadvyavahārapratiṣedhe |

[371,4]

yeyamanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānupalabdhi"rasanniścayaphalāpi sā" | asanniścayaḥphalaṃ yasyā iti vigrahaḥ | (200–201)

[372,1]

"asattāyā"mityādinā vyācaṣṭe | asattāyāmapyaniścayepi | yasmānna hyasti sambhavo "yadupalabdhiyogyo" bhāvaḥ "sakaleṣvanyeṣūpa"lambha"kāraṇeṣu san" vidyamāno "nopalabhyeta | na punaḥ pūrvā" viprakṛṣṭaviṣayānupalabdhira"sattāsādhanī" | tathā hi |
pratyakṣānumānāgamanivṛttilakṣaṇaivānupalabdhiḥ | tatra "śāstrasyādhikā"rosmin prakaraṇe tatrā"sambaddhā" anāntarīyakā "bahavorthāḥ" svabhāvādiviprakarṣiṇaḥ śāstre nādhikriyanta iti yāvat | pratyakṣasyāpi na te viṣayā ityāhā"tīndriyāḥ" | nāpyanumānasya yasmādaliṅgāḥ | naiṣāṃ liṅgamastīt"yaliṅgāḥ" | teṣāmatīndriyāṇāmarthānāṃ pramāṇatrayānivṛttilakṣaṇāyā "anupalabdhitaḥ" kathamabhāvaḥ | naiva | (200–1)

[372,2]

"soya"miti vādī | "sarvārthānā"miti deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣiṇāṃ "pramāṇatrayanivṛttyeti" pratyakṣānumānāgamanivṛttyā | "tasyeti śāstrasya kvacit" puruṣārthānupayoginyarthe'"nadhikāre" viniyogābhāve "pravṛtteḥ | yasmācchāstraṃ hī"tyādi | "anyathe"ti"puruṣārthānupayoginamarthamāśritya śāstrapravṛttau | abaddhapralāpasyā"sambaddhābhidhāyinaḥ śāstrasyā"prāmāṇyāt" |

[372,3]

syādetat | sarva evārthāḥ puruṣārthopayogina ityatrāha | "tatre"tyādi | "tatra prakaraṇa" iti puruṣārthacintāprastāve | "pratyātmaniyatā" iti pratipuruṣaniyatāḥ |
etena puruṣāṇāmānantyādānantyaṃ cetovṛttīnāmāha | "aniyatā"nnimittād bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yāsāmiti vigrahaḥ | anenaikasminnapi puṃsi nimittabhedād bahutvaṃ | evaṃbhūtāścetovṛttayo "nāvaśyaṃ" sākalyena pratipadaṃ "nirdeśyā" aśakyatvāt | kāladeśavyavahitā vā puruṣārthānupayogino "dravyaviśeṣā nāvaśyaṃ nirdeśyā"stato "na tacchā" | tāśca cetovṛttayaste ca viśeṣāstāniti puliṃgenoktāḥ | "pumān striye" ti puṃsaḥ śeṣaṃ kṛtvā ||

[373,1]

nāpi pratyakṣasya viṣayā ityāha | "na ce"tyādi | "tathā viprakṛṣṭeṣvi"ti deśādiviprakṛṣṭeṣu "svasāmarthyopadhānāt" | svarūpasannidhānāt | "jñānotpādanaśaktirnāsti" |
etenā"tīndriyā" ityetad vyākhyātaṃ ||

[373,2]

anumānasyāpi na te viṣayā ityāha | "sa cāvaśya"mityādi | "eṣā"miti deśādivyavahitānāṃ | "yeneti" kāryopalambhena | "na ca ta" iti viprakarṣiṇaḥ | "sarve"tyadṛśyānupalabdhirapi | "nivṛttini"ścayasyābhāvaniścayasya | yata eva"ntaditi"
tasmāt | "iya"mityadṛśyānupalabdhissadasanniścayaphalā neti | "sanniścayaphalā na"
bhavati sadvyavahāranimittā | na cāpyasanniścayaphalā sandehāt | "iti" hetoḥ"syādvā"nupalabdhe"rapramāṇatā | vyavasāyaphalatvādi"ti niścayaphalatvāt "pramāṇānāṃ" |
pratyakṣamapi hi pramāṇaṃ sarvākāragrahepi yeṣvākāreṣu niścayamāvahati teṣveva |

[373,3]

nanu pravṛttiniṣedhapramāṇaṃ syādityāha | "na hī"tyādi | "iya"mityanupalabdhiḥ | "niḥśaṃkapariccheda"miti niḥśaṃkaḥ paricchedo yasya cetasa iti vigrahaḥ | saṃśaye sati na pravarttitavyama vaśyamityevaṃ niścitaṃ ceto na karotityarthaḥ | "saṃśayādapi kvacit"
kṛṣīvalāderlokasya "pravṛtteḥ" || kathantarhyapravṛttiphalatvenāsyāḥ prāmāṇyamuktamityata āha | "tathātvetadi"tyādi | tathā tena rūpeṇai"tadapra"vṛttikāraṇamanupalambhākhyaṃ "niravadyaṃ"
nirdoṣaṃ yadi "niścayapūrvaṃ vyavaharet" kaścit | pramāṇapūrvaṃ sadvyavahārādi pravartayet |
i"tya"nena dvāreṇa seyamadṛśyānupalabdhira"pravṛttiphalā proktā" niścitasadvyavahārādipratiṣedhaphalā proktā | sandigdhastu sadvyavahārādirna niṣidhyata iti puruṣasya pravṛttirbhavatyapi |

[373,4]

"liṅgātiśayabhāvinī"ti liṅgamanupalabdhistasyā atiśayo viśeṣa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvantasya bhāvassadbhāvassa yasyāmasti sā tathoktā | "liṅgaviśeṣa"tyarthaḥ | upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānupalabdhiriti yāvat |

[374,1]

[374,2]

[374,4]

"svabhāvajñāpakājjñānasyāyaṃ nyāya udāhṛtaḥ | 1 | 203"(#pava.3.200ba)

[374,5]

asattve sādhye nāsti prāmāṇyamiti | svabhāvājñānaṃ pratyakṣanivṛttiḥ | jñāpakājñānamanumānanivṛttiḥ | adṛśyaviṣayāyāḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛtterayaṃ nyāya udāhṛta iti samudāyārthaḥ |

[374,6]

"yasye"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yasya kasyacit" piśācādeḥ | sa iti svabhāvaḥ | "tadanupalambhamātre"ṇeti tena tadviṣayānupalambhamātreṇa pratyakṣanivṛttirūpe"ṇāsannāma | yathoktaṃ prāgiti" | "satāmapi kadācidanupalambhādi" tyādinā | svabhāvrājñānamanena vyākhyātaṃ |

[374,7]

jñāpakājñānamvyākhyātumāha | "yopī"tyādi | "jñāpaka"syetyasya vivaraṇaṃ liṅgasyeti | "atīndriyaḥ pratikṣipyate'rthaḥ | yathā nāsti viraktaṃ ceta" ityādi | tathā jñāpakasya liṅgasyābhāvāt svabhāvaviśeṣo vā pratikṣipyate | atra viśeṣaḥ pratikṣipyate na dhārmimātraṃ | yathā "nāsti dāne"tyādi | dānaṃ ca hiṃsāviratiśceti dvandvaḥ | tadviṣayāścetanāḥ | "dāna"cetanānāṃ "hiṃsāviraticetanānāṃ" cetyarthaḥ | "abhyudayahetutā" svargādiphalahetunā | atra cetanānāṃ na svarūpaṃ pratikṣipyate tāsāṃ pratyakṣatvāt | kintvabhyudayahetutvaṃ svabhāvo viśeṣo nāstītyucyate |

[375,1]

nanu cetanānāṃ pratyakṣatvādabhyudayahetutāpi tadātmabhūtatvāt | pratyakṣasyaiveti kuto bhrāntirityādi |

[375,2]

pratyakṣepyarthe "viparyasto'pavadetāpīti" sambandhaḥ | kathamviparyasta ityāha | "atatphale"tyādi | atatphalā anabhyudayaphalā ye dṛṣṭāścetanā viśeṣā avyākṛtāḥ |
taissā"dharmyāt" | sādharmyameva kathamityāha | "phalasyānantaryābhāvā"diti | yā anyā atatphalāścetanāḥ | yāśca tatphalā | ubhayatra tatphalasyānantaryanna dṛśyate | "na tāvateti" phalasyānantaryādarśanamātreṇa | "tadabhāvaḥ" phalābhāvaḥ | kasmād | "vyavahitānā"mityādi | "hetoḥ" sakāśāt kālāntareṇottarottarāvasthāpariṇāmalakṣaṇena"vyavahitānāṃ phalānāndarśanāt | mūṣikasyā"larkkasya "conmattakukkurasya viṣavikāra iva" sa hi na viṣasaṃcārakāla eva bhavati kintu sahakāriṇaḥ kālaviśeṣasya sannidhauniṣpadyate | na tu hetvantarameva tadvat ||

[375,3]

syādetat | mūṣikādiviṣavikārasya kālāntare dṛṣṭatvāt sadbhāvo yukta eva | dānādiphalantu na kadācanāpi dṛṣṭamiti kathantasya sadbhāva ityāha |
tadityādi | "tadbhāva" iti | tayordānādiphalātīndriyavastunorbhāve "virodhābhā"vāt | "atra" dānādiphale'tīndriyabhāve "vānupalabdhimātramapramāṇaṃ" |

[375,4]

"yadi" bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāstītyapratikṣepo || "bhāve"'stitve kiṃ "pramāṇannaivāsti pramāṇa"mataḥ sattāniścayo na yukta iti paraḥ |

[375,5]

"ata eve"tyā cā ryaḥ | atyantamatīndriyasyārthasya sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvataḥ "saṃśayo" yuktaḥ | yadi vā yad vastu nirākarttunna śakyate na ca tasya sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratibhāti | tasyaivaṃ sambhāvanā yuktā bhavedasya kadācit sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃkasyacit pratibhāvataḥ | tasmādarthasaṃśayāt pramāṇasaṃśayādvā'pratikṣepaḥ |

[376,1]

anye tu viraktacitte'bhyudayahetutve cāta eveti sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvāt saṃśayostviti vyākhyāya | viraktaṃ cittaṃ sarvajñatve bhavedvā pramāṇamityapratikṣepaḥ |
tacca pramāṇaṃ dvitīye paricchede'bhidhāsyata iti vyācakṣate |

[376,2]

yata eva vyavahitasyāpi kāryotpattiḥ | "tattasmādatra" evātīndriyeṣu madhye "keṣāṃcidarthānāṃ svabhāvānāṃ ceti" yadyapi pāṭhakramaḥ | tathāpi yathāyogaṃ sambandhaḥ |

[376,3]

keṣāṃcit svabhāvanāmabhyudayahetvādīnāṃ bhavejjñāpakāsiddhiḥ | kathaṃ | "darśanapāṭavābhāvāt" | tadviṣayasyānubhavasya yathāgṛhītasvarūpaniścayotpādane sāmarthyābhāvāt | keṣāṃcidarthānāṃ viraktacittatvādīnāṃ | pratyakṣānumānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ jñāpakantasyābhāvāt |

[376,4]

tathābhūtasya kāryasya kasmādabhāva ityāha | "kāraṇānā"mityādi | na hi kāraṇairavaśyamātmajñāpakaṅkāryaṃ sarvapuruṣagrāhyamārabdhavyamiti niyamaḥ |

[376,5]

anye tvanyathā vyācakṣate | keṣāṃ cit svabhāvānāmabhyudayahetuvādināṃ | "arthānāṃ ca" viraktacittādīnāmbhave"jjñāpakasya" niścāyakasya pramāṇasyā"siddhiḥ" | kutaḥ |
darśanapāṭavābhāvāt |

[376,6]

etaduktambhavati | darśanameva jñāpakaṃ kasyacidarthasya taccāpaṭutvāt sarvākāraniścayannotpādayati | kāraṇānāṃ ca kāryotpādananiyamābhāvastenānantarakāryādarśanāt | kāryadvāreṇāpyabhyudayahetutvanna śakyaṃ niṣeddhuṃ | tathātīndriyāṇāmarthānāṃ darśanasya manovijñānalakṣaṇasyāpāṭavāt pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇaṃ | na hi kāryadvāreṇaiṣāṃ niścayaḥ kāraṇānāṃ ca kāryotpādananiyamābhāvāt | na hi kāraṇairavaśyamātmajñāpakaṃ kāryaṃ santānāntare janayitavyamiti niyamaḥ | tasmānna pratyakṣaṃ nānumānaṃ teṣāmasti |

[376,7]

"neyateti" yathoktajñāpakābhāvamātreṇa "tadabhāvo"tīndriyāṇāmabhāvaḥ | yasmāt pratyakṣānumānābhyāmanupalabdhānāmapi "keṣāṃci"darthānāṃ "punarapi paryāyeṇa" krameṇa kuḍyavivarāvasthitānāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣeṇānumānenā"bhivyakteḥ" pratīteḥ | tadevaṃ viprakṛṣṭe svabhāvānupalambho nāsattāsādhanaṃ | nāpi kāryānupalambhaḥ |

[377,1]

kāraṇānupalambhastu tatrāpyabhāvasādhanamityāha | kārye tvityādi | kārye tu svabhāvādiviprakarṣiṇyapi kārakājñānaṃ kāraṇānupalabdhirabhāvasya sādhanameva |

[377,2]

"svabhāve"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | viprakṛṣṭaviṣayasya "svabhāvasyābhāve sādhye"
svabhāvā"nupalambha evāpramāṇamucyate | kāraṇānupalambhastu pramāṇameva" |

[377,3]

nanu viprakṛṣṭaviṣaye kāraṇānupalambha eva niścetumaśakyastatkathaṃ kāryābhāvaṃ sādhayet | sattyam | etāvad vaktuṃ śakyate | kāraṇamantareṇānuddiṣṭaviṣaye kāryamavaśyaṃ na bhavatītīyatā leśenāsyopanyāsaḥ | ata eva sāmānyenāha | "na hyastī"tyādi ||

[377,4]

"nanvi"tyādi paraḥ | "agnervināśepi" vāsagrṛhādau dhūmasya darśanāt | tathā cāsatyapi kāraṇe kāryaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vyabhicāraḥ || asati kāraṇe kāryanna syādityanena vākyena "kāraṇasthitikālabhāvi kāryaṃ" | yāvat kāraṇasattā tāvat kāryasattetye"vanna brūmo" yena kāraṇanāśepītyādikaḥ prasaṃgaḥ syāt | kintarhyanena vākyenocyata ityāha | "heturahite"tyādi |

[377,5]

evantāvat sthiratāmabhyupagamyoktaṃ | kṣaṇikatve tu kāraṇe vinaṣṭe kāryaṃsthānameva nāstīti kuto vyabhicārāśaṃkā | tathā hi yognijanyo dhūmakṣaṇastasyāgnivināśe nāstyevāvasthānaṃ | kṣaṇikatvena vināśāt | yaśca paścāt sthāyī dhūmaḥ sa dhūmahetuka eva nāgnihetukaḥ | tadeva darśayannāha | "na ca tathe"tyādi | "tathā sthāyī"ti naṣṭepyādye kāraṇe kālāntarasthāyī | "tadupādānaḥ" pūrvaniruddhahetūpādānaḥ |

[377,6]

kathantarhi pāścātyopi dhūmognihetuka ityucyata ityāha | "pāramparye"tyādi |

[378,2]

[378,3]

"svabhāvābhāve"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "kaścidi"ti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ | yadyanupalabhyamāno vyāpakaḥ svabhāvosya vyāpyasya siddhaḥ syāt tadā bhavet pramāṇaṃ || kāraṇavyāpakānupalambhaśca bhavet pramāṇaṃ yadi tadabhāvastayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakayorabhāvaḥ pratīyeta hetunā kenacit | svabhāvānupalambhākhyena |

[378,4]

[379,1]
