[379,2]

uttaramāha | "dṛśyasye"tyādi | viprakṛṣṭe viṣaye svabhāvānupalambhe pramāṇamuktaṃ |
na tu dṛśyaviṣaya ityarthaḥ | "dṛśya"syeti svabhāvādyaviprakṛṣṭasya "bhāvasyānupalabdhasya"
sataḥ | "bhāvasya" sattāyā "abhāvaḥ pratīyate" | kadā "darśanābhāvakāraṇāsambhave sati" |
darśanābhāvasya kāraṇaṃ | kāraṇāntarāṇāṃ vaikalyantasyāsambhave sati | upalambhapratyayāntarasākalye satītyarthaḥ |

[379,3]

"bhāvo hī"tyādi viraṇaṃ | svabhāvādyaviprakṛṣṭo bhāvo "yadi bhavet | yathāsva grāhakeṇa karaṇene"ti yasya yad grāhakamindriyante"nopalabhya" eva bhavet | sa iti yathokto bhāvaḥ | "darśanaprapibandhiṣu vyavadhānādiṣu" | ādiśabdād vaikalyapratibandhādiṣva"satsu" | upalambhapratyayeṣu satsviti yāvat | (205–6)

[379,4]

tathā bhūtonupa"labdhastvasanniti niścīyate" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tādṛśaḥ sata" upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sataḥ | "upalambhāvyabhicārāt" | ya evāyaṃ svabhāvasyābhāvaniścaye dṛśyasya darśanetyādinokto'"yameva heturveditavyaḥ" | kasmin sādhye | "hetuvyāpakayorabhāvepi" sādhye ||

[379,5]

"viruddhasya cetyādi" | yasyābhāvassādhyastena yo "viruddhastasyopalabdhau ca"
syā"dasattāyāḥ" pratiṣedhyābhāvasya "niścayaḥ" | kiṅkāraṇam | "viruddhasya bhāvasya bhāve" sattāyā"ntadbhāvabādhanāt" | tasya niṣedhyābhimatasya sattābādhanāt |

[379,6]

"yo hī"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | kasmānnāvatiṣṭhata ityāha | "tadi"tyādi | tayorviruddhayorye "upādāne" tayoranyonyaṃ "parasparaṃ" yad "vaiguṇyantasyāśrayatvena" | yathā śītopādānamuṣṇopādānavaiguṇyasyāśraya itaraścetarasyetyarthaḥ | tena kāraṇena viruddhayorekatra yugapadā"rambhavirodhāt | tayorviruddhayorekasya bhāvepyanyābhāvagatirbhavati | yathoktaṃ prāga"nupalabdhiprabhede | "na śītasparśotrāgneri"tyādi |
yadyapyatrānupalabdhiriti na śrūyate tathāpīdaṃ svabhāvaviruddhākhyaṃ liṅgamanupalabdhessakāśānna pṛthagucyate | kiṃṅkāraṇaṃ | "tata evā"nupalambhād "virodhagateḥ |
virodhāccābhāvasādhanādi"tyuktaṃ ||

[380,1]

"bhavatu nāmaivamvidhāyā" dṛśyā"nupalabdheḥ" sakāśād "bhāvagatiḥ" | sā punaḥ kathamanumānaṃ | naivānumānaṃ kintu pramāṇāntarameveti bhāvaḥ |

[380,2]

"kathanna syā"dityā cā ryaḥ |

[380,3]

"dṛṣṭānte"tyādi paraḥ | "dṛṣṭāntāpekṣaṃ" hyanumānamanvayavyatirekavattvāt | dṛṣṭāntāpekṣaṇamevāha | "na hīti | asyā"mityanupalabdhau |

[380,4]

"kinne"tyācā ryaḥ |

[380,5]

"tadi"tyādi paraḥ | tad "vyomakusumādi" | asa"diti kathaṃ" kena pramāṇenā"vagantavyaṃ yenaivaṃ syād"dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt | "anapalabdhereva" liṅgād vyomakusumādyasadavagantavyamiti "cet | tatre"ti vyomakusumādau | "kathamadṛṣṭāntikā" dṛṣṭāntarahitā'"sattāsiddhiḥ | sadṛṣṭāntatve vānavasthāprasaṃga" iti tatrāpyaparopīti kṛtvā | "tathā ce"tyanavasthāyāṃ satyāṃ sādhyasyā"pratipattiḥ" | yataśca dṛṣṭāntatvenavasthādoṣaḥ | "tasmānnirupākhyābhāvasiddhira"dṛṣṭāntikā karttavyā | "tadvadanyatrāpi" | neha ghaṭonupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdherityādāvapi prayoge "dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṇādananumānama"nupalabdhiḥ |

[380,6]

"śrṛṇvanna"pītyā cā ryaḥ | asakṛduktametat | yathā svabhāvānupalabdhau nābhāvaḥ sādhyate kintvabhāvavyavahāra iti śrṛṇvannapi "devānāṃ" mūrkhāṇāṃ "priyo nāvadhāraṇa" satyapi dṛṣṭānte tadasiddhiścodyate | dṛṣṭāntameva darśayitumupakramate | "nimittaṃ" hītyādi | upalabhyānupalabdhirdṛśyānupalabdhiryā "nimittaṃ" kāraṇama"sadvayavahārāṇāṃ | se"tyanupalabdhiḥ "svasannidhānā"dātmasannidhānāt | "svanimittān"
svamanupalabdhirūpaṃ nimittaṃ yeṣāntānetāna"sadvyavahārān" sādhayatīti kṛtvā "sarvotra dṛṣṭāntaḥ" | kiṃbhūtaḥ | "svanimittasāmagrīyogyasannidhānaḥ" | svakāraṇānāṃ sāmagrī tasyāṃ yogyaṃ sannidhānaṃ yasyāṅkurādessa tathoktaḥ | prayogaḥ punaḥ | yasya yatra nimittaṃ sakalamapratibadvamasti tatra tena bhavitavyantadyathāṅkurādi | asti copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhāvasadvyavahārāṇāṃ nimittatvamiti svabhāvahetuḥ |
kasmād | atrābhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate na punarabhāva evetyāha | "asatte"tyādi | "atra" dṛśyānupalabdhāva"nupalabdhirevā"sattā | yathoktaṃ prāk | "tasmāda"bhāvo "na" sādhyate | yata evātrābhāvavyavahāraḥ sādhyate'"ta eveyamanu"palabdhiḥ svabhāvahetāvantarbhavatīti sambandhaḥ | "kāraṇād" dṛśyānupalambhāt "kāryasyā"sadvyavahārasyānu"mānaṃ" tadeva "lakṣaṇaṃ" yasyeti sāmānyenānyapadārthamupadarśya paścād bhāvapratyayaḥ |
samagrāt "kāraṇāt kāryānumāne" ca yogyatānumānamiti svabhāvahetāvantarbhāvaḥ |
vakṣyāmaścaturthe paricchede |

[381,1]

dṛśyānupalabdhau bhavatu dṛṣṭānto'dṛśyānupalabdhau tuṃ kathamityāha | "sacchabde"tyādi deśādiviprakṛṣṭeṣu"pramāṇanivṛttyā sadvyavahāraniṣedhe" sādhye kāraṇābhāvāt kāryasyābhāvaḥ sādhyastenātra na kevalannirupākhyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ kintu "nimitta"sya kāraṇasya"vaikalye"nābhāvino"ṅkurādayopi dṛṣṭāntaḥ" | prayogastu | yadvikalakāraṇantanna bhavati yathā bījarahitoṅkuraḥ | vikalakāraṇaścādṛśyānupalabdhau sadvyavahāra iti kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ |

[381,2]

yatpunaruktaṃ | tadasannirupākhyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti tatrāpi "nirupākhye"
dṛṣṭānte | "iyameva"majñānavyavahāralakṣaṇā "pravṛttirniṣidhyate" | anupalabdhito na tvabhāvaḥ sādhyate | kiṅkāraṇam | "anupalabdhī"tyādi | viṣāṇādiviviktaśaśamastakādyupalabdhirevānupalabdhiḥ paryudāsavṛttyā | saiva lakṣaṇaṃ yasyāḥ śaśaviṣāṇāsattāyāḥ sā "siddhaiva" |

[382,1]

syādetad | adṛśyānupalabdhāvasattve viṣayabhūte siddhe | tannimittopyasadvyavahāraḥ siddha eveti kintenāsadvyavahāreṇa | adṛśyānupalabdhāvapi sadvyavahāranimittasyābhāvād vyavahārāpravṛttiḥ siddhaiveti sadvyavahāraniṣedhenāpi sādhitena kiṃ |

[382,2]

tathā pūrvaprasiddhaviṣayopadarśanalakṣaṇena dṛṣṭāntenāpyanupalabdhau na kiṃcit prayojanamityata āha | "soya"mityādi | mūḍhaṃ pratyetat sādhyata iti yāvat |

[382,3]

kvacidapyasadvyavahāra"nimittaṃ" dṛśyā"nupalambhamabhyupagamyā"sadvyavahāra"pravṛttimvilomaya"nnakurvan | adṛśyānupalabdhau tadabhāvaṃ ca sadvyavahāranimittasya pramāṇasyābhāvaṃ cābhyupagamya sadvyavahāra"nivṛttiṃ ca vilomayanna"kurvan | "yathābhyupagamaṃ pratipādyata iti" dṛśyānupalambhena nimittena tvayā'sadvyavahāronyatra kṛtastadihāpyasti | tasmādasadvyavahāraṅ kurviti pratipādyate | tathā pramāṇena nimittena tvayā kvacit sadvyavahāraḥ kṛtastadihāpyanirupākhye nāsti | tasmād sadvyavāhārammā kurviti pratipādyate | kimiva "nirupākhyavat" | yathā śaśaviṣāṇādāvasadvyavahāranimittasya dṛśyānupalambhasya bhāvādasadvyavahārastathehāpīti |

[382,4]

"anyadveti" | yathā sannihitanimittasyā'ṅkurādeḥ pratipattireva sadvyavahārasyāpīti | yathā ca nirupākhye pramāṇābhāvāt sadvyavahārasya nivṛttiḥ | "anya"smin vā kāraṇavikale kārye nivṛtti"stadvad" viprakṛṣṭeṣu sadvyavahārasya nivṛttiriti "pratipādyate" ||

[382,5]

"sa eva tāvadupalabdhyabhāvo"nupalabdhyākhyaḥ "kathaṃ" kena pramāṇena "siddhaḥ" | na pratyakṣeṇābhāvaviṣayatvavirodhāt | nāpyanumānena pratyakṣapūrvakatvādasya | nāpi pradeśasambandhyanupalambho'bhāvasya nīrūpatvena sambandhitvāyogāt | pradeśasyānupalambhe ca dharmmasiddherāśrayāsiddho heturityanupalabdherna pakṣadharmatvamityudyo ta ka ra prabhṛtayaḥ |

[382,6]

atrāha | "etaduttaratra vakṣyāma"stadviśiṣṭopalambho'tastasyāpyanupalambhanantasmādanupalambhoyaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva siṃdhyatīti || yatpunaruktamanupalabdhau kindṛṣṭāntopadarśanenetyāha | "anyatrāpī"tyādi | vidhisādhanepyanumāne "sādhyadharmeṇa vyāpakena"
vyāpyadharmaṃ kṛtakatvādikaṃ sādhana"micchan" pratipādyaḥ "kimiti" dṛṣṭāntena "pratyāyyaḥ" |
kiṅkāraṇaṃ | yathāsvaṃ sādhyena "vyāpya"sya heto"rnirdeśādeva vyāpnuvataḥ" sādhyadharmasya"siddheḥ | niścitārthassambandha"lakṣaṇo yena "tasya" vyāmūḍhamprati "smṛtyarthaḥ" | tadetad"dṛṣṭāntena mūḍhaṃ prati smṛtijananamatrā"nupalabdhau | etadevāha | "soya"mityādi | "anyatrāpī"ti śaśaviṣāṇādau | (205–6)

[383,1]

atha yadidamācārya di gnā ga prabhṛtibhiruktaṃ | "na santi pradhānādayonupalabdhe"
riti tatra prayoge | ā cā rya āha | "kathaṃ ca na syādi"ti |

[383,2]

codakaḥ svābhiprāyeṇāha | "tadarthe"tyādi | tadarthasya pradhānārthasya "niṣedhe" sati pradhānādidha"rmivācinobhidhānasyāprayogāt" | na hi vācyamantareṇa vācakasya prayogosti | yadā ca pradhānādiśabdānāmaprayogastadā na santīti pratiṣedhavācyeva śabdovaśiṣyate | tasya ca pratiṣedhyāsaṃkīrttane "nirviṣayasya pratiṣe"dhasyeti pratiṣedhavācinaḥ śabdasyā"prayogāt" | tathā ca na santi pradhānādaya iti dvayorapi pratijñāpadayoraprayogāt | kutra kiṃ sādhyata iti vyarthānupalabdheḥ sādhanayogaḥ |
pradhānādīnāṃ ca pakṣabhūtānāmabhāvād pakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt | pratijñāpadayorvā parasparaṃ virodhastathā hi pradhānādaya iti prayogāt tadarthasannidhānaṃ | punarna santīti vacanāt teṣāmasannidhānaṃ | ete ca sannidhānāsannidhāne yugapadekatra virudhyete | (206–7)

[384,1]

"naiṣa doṣa" iti parihāraḥ | yasmā"danādervāsanā"yāssa"mudbhūte vikalpe pariniṣṭhita"ssamāruḍhaḥ "śabdārthaḥ" sa ca "bhāvābhāvobhayāśrita"tvāt "trividho" dharmmaḥ | "tasmin"
śabderthe bāhyapradhānādiko bhāvonupādānamasyeti tasmin "bhāvānupādāne sādhye |
asye"ti buddhiparivarttinaḥ pradhānādidharmiṇaḥ | "tathe"ti bāhyapradhānādyupādānatve"nānupalambhanaṃ hetuḥ" | vāsanopādānatvenopalambhanamevātrānupalambhanaṃ | "na tasyaiva"
vikalpapratiniṣṭhitasya dharmiṇo'"bhāva"ssādhyate | kasmāt | pradhānādiśabdānāṃ"prayogataḥ" | tanniṣedhe hi nirviṣayatvācchabdaprayoga eva na syāt |

[384,2]

"nivedita"mityādinā vyācaṣṭe | yadi hi svalakṣaṇamabhidheyaṃ syāt tadā svalakṣaṇapratiṣedhe śabdārthasya pratiṣedhāt tadvācinaḥ śabdasyāprayogaḥ syāt | yāvatā niveditametad "yathaite śabdā na svalakṣaṇaviṣayā" iti | kintva"nādivāsanāyāḥ prabhava"
utpādo yasya "vikalpasya" tasmin "pratibhāsī" yortha"stamviṣayatvenātmasātkurvanti" |

[384,3]

kuta etad vikalpaviṣayamevārthamviṣayīkurvantītyāha | "vaktustadvikalpabhāja"
iti bhāvābhāvobhayāśrayasāmānyākāravikalpabhājaḥ | kāraṇamāha | "yathe"tyādi | "yathāpratibhāsi vastu" | pratibhāsivastvanatikrameṇa yā "pratipādanasamīhā" tayā śabda"prayogāt" | tasmād vikalpapratibhāsina evārthān śabdā viṣayīkurvanti |

[384,4]

tathā śrotuśca tadvikalpabhāja iti sambandhaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tadākāravikalpajananāt" | bhāvābhāvobhayāśrayasāmānyākāravikalpajananācca vikalpapratibhāsina evārthān śabdā viṣayīkurvanti |

[384,5]

syādetad | yadi nāmaivantathāpi kathanna svalakṣaṇaviṣayā śabdāḥ svalakṣaṇapratīterityāha | "na ce"tyādi | "upādānaṃ" ca "kāryaṃ" ca te eva "pratyayo" jñānantatrā"pratibhāsi yadrūpantadviṣayatvena tanna" śakya"nniścetuṃ" | tatropādānapratyayo vaktuḥ pratipādanasamīhārūpo vikalpaḥ śabdasya kāraṇatvāt | kāryapratyayaḥ śabdotthaḥ śroturvikalpaḥ | na hi sa śabdārtho yaḥ śabde pratyaye na pratibhāsate | na ca tatra svalakṣaṇaṃ pratibhāsate | spaṣṭākāravivekāt |

[385,1]

nanu kathaṃ vikalpābhāvāśrayo'rthajanyatvenāvikalpakatvaprasaṃgāt | kathañcābhāvāśrayo'bhāvasyākāraṇatvāt | kathañcaika ubhayāśrayo'hetukatvaprasaṅgādityata āha | "sa tvi"tyādi | sadasadubhayākāro "vikalpaḥ sadasadubhayapratyayastenāhitā vāsanā tataḥ prabhava" utpādo yasya sa tathoktaḥ | "iti" hetorbhāvābhāvobhayadharma ityucyate |

[385,2]

dvitīyaṃ kāraṇamāha | "tadi"tyādi | "ta"sminneva vikalpe "pratibhāsī" ya "ākāra"stasya sadasadubhayarūpatayā"dhyavasā"yasta"dvaśena ca | bhāvābhāvobhayadharma ityucyate" | 209

[385,3]

etaduktambhavati | satpratyayāhitavāsanāprabhavassadākārādhyavasāyīva bhāvadharma ityucyate | evamabhāvobhayadharmayorapi draṣṭavyaṃ pūrvapūrvasadādipratyayāhitavāsanāprabhavatvādeva sadādivikalpānāmanāditvam | ato na bhāvādijanyatvaṃ |
yataśca śabdārthastrividhaḥ | "tatta"smā"datra" śabdārthe "dharmiṇi" vyavasthitā vivā"dāśrayatvena" sthitāḥ puruṣā"ssadasattvaṃ" pradhānāde"ścintayanti | kathaṃ" cintayantītyāha | "kimayaṃ pradhānaśabdādu"ccaritād vikalpa"pratibhāsamānortho" bāhyapradhānanibandhano bhavati na veti | "tasya" pradhānādivikalpapratibhāsasya "bhāvānupādānatve" dharme "sādhye " vikalpapratibhāso buddhisvabhāvatayā "pratyātmavedyatvāt" svasamvedanapratyakṣasiddhatvāda"pratikṣepārhortho dharmī" |

[385,4]

nanu ca sa eva vikalpagrāhyārthaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇarūpatayādhyavasāyāt |
tataśca pratyakṣasiddha eva pradhānādiḥ śabdaśca svalakṣaṇaviṣaya ityāha | "na ca sa eve"tyādi | sa eva vikalpapratibhāsyartho bāhyaṃ "svalakṣaṇamiti śakyamvaktuṃ" | kiṃkāraṇam | "asaṃprāpte"'nutpanne svalakṣaṇe "niruddhe" ca "tasya" vikalpapratibhāsasyāna"pāyā"t | kiṃ ca "vastuni" ghaṭādau "viparītākāraḥ" parasparavirodhino nityānityādayaḥ | tāna"bhinive"ṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāntī"rthāntarīyapratyayānānteṣa" bhāvācchavdārthapratibhāsasya | na ca sa evārthaḥ svalakṣaṇamiti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ || (209–10)

[386,1]

amumevārthaṃ saṃgrahītumāha | "paramārthaḥ svalakṣaṇa"ntasminnekasthānaḥ pravṛttiryeṣāntadbhāvastattvantasminsati "śabdānāmanibandhanā" paramārthanibandhanarahitā pravṛ"ttirna syāt | darśanāntarabhi"nneṣvarthe"ṣu" | siddhāntabhedabhinneṣu | "atītājātayorvāpī"ti atītānagate "cā"rthe śabdānāmpravṛtti"rna syāt" | tathā "kasyāścid vāco" mṛṣārthatā na syāt | "iti" yathoktāddhetoreṣā vāk | "bauddhārthaviṣayā" |
vikalpapratibhāsyarthaviṣayā matā | (210–11)

[386,2]

"tasya" ceti pradhānādivikalpapratibhāsasya | "yathāsamīhitaṃ rūpaṃ" yathāparikalpitambāhyapradhānādirūpantada"nupādānatve sādhye | tathānupalambha" iti yathā samīhitarūpopādānatvenānupalambhostīti kṛtvā na sādhana"dharmā"siddhirnāpakṣadharmo heturityarthaḥ |

[386,3]

"na punaratra" prayoge'yameva "śabde"tyādi | "śabdā"dutpadyate yo vikalpastatprati"bhāsyarthopahanūyate" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" vikalpapratibhāsyarthasya śrotṛ"buddhā"vupasthāpanāya "śabdaprayogāt | tadabhāve" vikalpapratibhāsyarthābhāve | "tadayogā"cchabdaprayogāyogāt |

[387,1]

"api ca" yadi "śabtārthasya vāpahnavaḥ sādhyate" | tadā śabdārthāpahnave sādhye tasya sādhya"dharma"sya nāstitvasya ya "ādhāro" dharmī śabdārthalakṣaṇastasya "nirākṛterna sādhyaḥ" dharmidharmātmakaḥ "samudāyaḥ syāt | kevalaśca" sādhya"dharmassiddha" eva | nāstitvamātrasya kvacit siddhatvāt |

[387,2]

"yadī"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | "tadi"ti tasmā"dayaṃ" sādhyadharmaḥ "ādhā"reṇa yo "vyavacchedo"
viśeṣaṇamasyedaṃ nāstitvanta"danapekṣaḥ | iti" heto"rnopanyasanīya eva" vivādakāle | (211–12)

[387,3]

"sadasatpakṣabhede"neti sadasatpratijñābhedena "vastveva cintyate | śabdārthānapavādibhi"rathaṃkriyārthibhiḥ prekṣāvadbhiḥ | yasmādatra vastuni "pratibaddhaḥ phalodayaḥ" | (212–13)

[387,4]

yadi nāmaivantathāpi kinna śabdārtho vicāraṇīya ityāha | arthetyādi | "arthakriyāṃ" pratya"samarthasya" śabdārthasya "vicāraiḥ" sadasattvavicāraiḥ "kintadadarthi"nāmarthakriyārthināṃ | nidarśanamāha "ṣaṇḍhasye"tyādi | puṃstvarahitasya yad "rūpavairūpyanta"smin viṣaye "kāminyā" maithunābhilāṣiṇyāḥ "kimparīkṣayā" | (213–14)

[387,5]

"na hī"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | na hi "śabdārtho'san kaṃcit puruṣārthamuparuṇaddhi" nivarttayati | "san vā samādadhāti" karotīti yathāyogaṃ sambandhanīyaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yathābhiniveśaṃ" puruṣastaṃ śabdārthambāhyatayā'bhiniviśate'dhyavasyati tathā "tasyā"vidyamānatvāt | "yathātattvaṃ" vā samīhitatvāt |

[388,1]

yathārthasvalakṣaṇaṃ jñānasvalakṣaṇamvā sthitantathā śabdenāviṣayīkṛtatvāt |
yata eva"ntasmādayaṃ" puruṣassadasaccintāyāṃ "pravarttamānaḥ sarvadā'vadhīritavikalpapratibhāso"'napekṣitavikalpapratibhāso "vastvevādhiṣṭhānīkaroti" viṣayīkaroti "yatra"
vastu"nyayaṃ puruṣārthaḥ pratibaddhaḥ | agnāvi"tyagnisvalakṣaṇe | ādigrahaṇād dāhapākādi |

[388,2]

syādetad | īdṛśorthaḥ śabdārthenāpi sādhyata ityāha | "na hī"tyādi | "atre"ti śītapratighātādau | kasmāt "tadanubhavāptāvapi" | tasya śabdārthasyānubhavāptāvapi | "tadabhāvāt" tasya śītapratīkārāderabhāvāt | "tat" tasmā"dayamarthakriyārthī" puruṣaḥ | "tadasamartha"ntasyāmarthakriyāyāmasamarthaṃ śabdārthaṃ "prati dattānuyogo" dattāvadhāno bhavi"tunna yuktaḥ | na hi vṛṣasyantī" maithunamicchantī "ṣaṇḍhasya" paricaritumaśaktasya "rūpavairūpyaparīkṣāyāmavadhatte"'vadhānavatī bhavati |

u dyo ta ka rā dyuktadūṣaṇanirāsārthaṃ pṛcchati | "yatpunaretadukta"mācārya di gnā gena | "kalpitasye"tyādi | tasya korthaḥ |

[388,4]

uttaramāha | "śabdārtha" ityādi | "kalpanājñānaviṣayatvācchabdārthaḥ" pradhānādiśabdārthaḥ | "kalpito | vastuno" bāhyasya pradhānalakṣaṇasyā"śraya"ṇantenā"siddhi"ranupalabdhirasya pradhānādiśabdārthasya dharma "ukto" liṅgabhūto bhāvānupādānatve sādhye | "nyāyavādinā"cārya di gnā ge na |

[389,1]

tena yaducyate u dyo ta ka rā dibhiḥ | yadi pramāṇena pradhānaṃ sattvena kalpitaṃ kathamasyānupalabdhirddharmaḥ pratīyate | athāsattvena kalpitaṃ pradhānantathāpi kathamasyānupalabdhirdharmo'sattvāditi |

[389,2]

tadapāstaṃ | yasmāt "kalpa"nājñāna"viṣayatvācchabdārtha eva kalpitaḥ" | na tu pramāṇena bāhyaṃ pradhānaṃ sattvena kalpitaṃ | "tasye"ti pradhānaśabdārthasya bāhyapradhāna"vastvāśrayaṇānulambha" ityayamabhiprāya ācārya di gnā ga sya || (214–15)

[389,3]

"yadukta"mityādi paraḥ | pramāṇatrayaṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamalakṣaṇaṃ | "anyapramāṇanivṛttāviti" pratyakṣānumānanivṛttau nivṛttirdeśādiviprakṛṣṭānāṃ | "tayo"riti pratyakṣānumānayoḥ | "na kiñcada vyāpnoti" sarvameva viṣayīkaroti | tanninivṛttirāgamanivṛttiḥ |

adhunā naiva bāhyerthasya prāmāṇyamityāha | "api ce"tyādi | "vastubhi"ssvalakṣa"ṇaissaha" | śabdā"nāntarīyakatāyā" avinābhāvasyābhāvāt tebhyaḥ śabdebhyo "nārthasiddhirna bā"hyavastuniścayaḥ | yasmā"tte hi vaktrabhiprāyasūcakāḥ" |

[389,7]

yadyapi ghaṭavivakṣātaḥ paṭaśabdasyotpattistathāpi sthānakaraṇābhighātādereva sākṣāt karaṇāt tadutpattervyabhicārābhāvānnāhetukatvaṃ | yaśca ghaṭavivakṣājanyaṃ ghaṭaśabdamavadhārayati | tasya paṭaśabdāt paṭavivakṣānumānantadavadhāraṇaṃ ca prakaraṇādinā lokasya vidyata eveti vivakṣānumāne'vyabhicāra eva |

[390,1]

"yathābhāvaṃ" yathāsvalakṣaṇaṃ | "yata" iti yathābhāvaṃ pravṛtteḥ śabdebhyo"rthaprakṛti"rarthasvabhāvo "niścīyeta | te hī"ti śabdāḥ | vivakṣayā vṛttiryeṣānte tathoktāḥ | "tatrāntarīyakā" vivakṣānāntarīyakāḥ | "tāmeva" vivakṣāṃ | saiva vivakṣā svalakṣaṇamantareṇa na bhavati | atostyeva śabdānāmarthāvyabhicāra ityāha | "na ce"tyādi | "yathārthaṃ" yathāvastu bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yāsāntāstathoktāḥ | kṣīṇadoṣasya kṛpāloryathārthabhāvinī sarvā ityāha | arthe'pratibaddhopi śabdārthaṃ gamayiṣyatīti cedāha | "na ce"tyādi | tasmin vastunyapratibaddhaḥ svabhāvo yasya śabdalakṣaṇasya | anyaṃ yatrāsau na pratibaddhaḥ ||

[390,2]

yadi bāhye vastuni śabdasya nāsti prāmāṇyaṃ yattarhīda"māptavādāvisamvādasāmānyāt" | yo ya āptavādaḥ so'"visamvādī" | yathā "kṣaṇikāḥ sarve saṃskārā" ityādikaḥ | āptavādaścāyamatyantaparokṣepyarthe tasmādayamapyavisamvādītyevamāptavādasyāvisamvādasāmānyādavisamvāditvādanumānatetyāgamasya bāhyerthenumānatvamuktamācārya di gnā ge na |

[390,3]

"tatkatha"mityanenābhyupetabādhāmāha | "nāya"mityādinā pariharati | etat kathayati | nācāryeṇa bhāvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ kathayatā anumānatvamāgamasyoktamapi tu puruṣapravṛttimapekṣya | yasmā"nnāyampuruṣaḥ" pravṛttikāmaḥ"āgamaprāmāṇyamanāśrityāsituṃ samarthaḥ" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "pratyakṣaṃ" parokṣaṃ phalaṃ yeṣānteṣāṃ keṣāṃcit "pravṛttinivṛttyoriti" yathāyogaṃ sambandhaḥ | hiṃsādicetanāviṣayāṇāṃ nivṛtteḥ svargādiphalatvena"mahānuśaṃsāśravaṇāt" | hiṃsācetanāviśeṣāṇāṃ pravṛtternarakādiphalatvena mahā"pāpaśravaṇatvāt" | na cātra vastubalapravṛttamanyatpramāṇaṃ sādhakamasti yenāgamamanapekṣyānyataḥ pramāṇampravartteta |

[390,4]

nāpi bādhakamasti yato nivartteta | bādhakābhāvamevāha | "tadbhāva" iti yathoktābhyāṃ pravṛttinivṛttibhyāmiṣṭāniṣṭasya phalasya bhāve "virodhādarśanācca" | icchati cāyamāgamavaśena pravarttituṃ tat "sati pravarttitavye" | (215–16) ?

[391,1]

vara"mevamā"gamamparīkṣya "pravṛtta ityā"gamasya "parīkṣayā prāmāṇyamā"hā cā ryaḥ |
na ca sarvaṃ śāstraṃ parīkṣayādhikṛtaṃ | kintu "tacce"tyādi śāstraṃ | padārthānāmparaspara"sambandhāt" sambaddhaṃ | "anuguṇaḥ" sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ phalasādhano"pāyo" yasmiṃstadanuguṇopāyaṃ sambaddhaṃ ca tadanuguṇopāyaṃ ceti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | evaṃ bhūtamapi yadi puru"ṣārthābhidhāyaka"ntadā "parīkṣādhikṛtaṃ vākyaṃ | ato" yathoktasvabhāvādaparamanyadvākya"manadhikṛtam"parīkṣāyāṃ |

[391,2]

"sambandha" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "vākyānā"maṅgāṅgibhāve"naikasminnarthe" vidheyapratiṣedhyalakṣaṇe "upasaṃhāro" mīlanante"nopakāraḥ" parasparaṃ vākyānāṃ sambandhaḥ | anupakārakaḥ punaḥ keṣāmityāha | "daśa dāḍi"metyādi daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpāḥ kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalamityevamādīni vākyāni | na hyeṣāmekārthopasaṃhārosti parasparamasambandhāt | "anayathe"tyasambaddhatve "vaktuḥ" śāstrakārasya "vaiguṇya"masambaddhābhidhāyitva"mudbhāvayet" | aśakyopāyo yeṣāṃ phalānantānyaśakyopāyāni | evaṃ bhūtāni phalāni yeṣāṃ śāstrāṇāntāni | "phalārthī" pumānnādriyeta "vicārayituṃ" | etaccānuguṇopāyamityetasya vaidharmyeṇa vivaraṇaṃ |

[391,3]

puruṣārthaḥ phalaṃ yeṣāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ tāni tathoktāni | tatonyā"nyapuruṣārthaphalāni" | tāni "ca" nādriyeta vicārayituṃ |

aśakyopāyaphalasyodāharaṇaṃ | "viṣe"tyādi | evaṃ hyasya viṣaṃ śāmyati yadi"takṣaka"nāgarājasya karṇāvasthitena ratnenālaṅkāraḥ kriyata iti | etaccāśakyasādhanaṃ |

[392,1]

"kaḥ punarasya" śāstrasyā"visamvāda" ityāha | "pratyakṣe"ṇetyādi prathamorthaḥ śabdo vastuvacanaḥ | dvitīyo viṣayavacanaḥ | tenāyamarthaḥ | dṛṣṭādṛṣṭayorvastunostadarthayoḥ pratyakṣānumānaviṣayayoryathākramaṃ pratyakṣeṇānumānena ca dvividhena vastubalapravṛttenāgamāśritena cābādhanamasya śāstrasyāvisamvādaḥ | (216–17) |

[392,2]

"pratyakṣe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | śāstre "pratyakṣābhimatānā"mpratyakṣatvenopagatānā"marthānāntathābhāvaḥ" pratyakṣabhāvaḥ "pratyakṣeṇābādhanaṃ" |

[392,3]

"yathe"tyādinā svasiddhānte pratyakṣābhimatamarthaṃ pañca"skandha"saṃgṛhītandarśayati | "nīlādī"tyanena rūpādīn pañca viṣayānāha | anena ca rūpaskandha uktaḥ | sukha"duḥkhe" iti ve da nā skandhaḥ | "nimitta"sya strīpuruṣādicihnasyo"palakṣaṇaṃ" nimittopalakṣaṇaṃ | anena saṃ jñā skandhaḥ | "rāgādi"grahaṇena saṃ skā ra skandhaḥ | ādiśabdād dveṣamohādiparigrahaḥ | "buddhi"grahaṇena vi jñā na skandhaḥ | nīlādi ca sukhaduḥkhe ca nimittopalakṣaṇaṃ ca rāgādi ca buddhiśceti dvandvaḥ | evaṃ śāstre pratyakṣābhimatānāṃ pratyakṣatvameva | nīlādīnāṃ cakṣurvijñānādipratyakṣatvāt | sukhādīnāṃ svasamvedanapratyakṣatvāt | "atathābhimatānāṃ" cāpratyakṣābhimatānāṃ cārthānā"mapratyakṣatā" |
pratyakṣeṇāvadhānamiti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ | "yathe"ti viṣayopadarśanaṃ | śabdādirūpeṇa sanniveṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ sukhādīnānteṣāmapratyakṣatā | śabdādisvabhāvānāṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ pratyakṣeṇāpratīteḥ

[393,1]

na hi nīlādiviṣayaṃ paṃca vyatirekeṇānyasya pratyakṣatāsti | tadvyatirekeṇānupalabdheḥ | "vastubalapravṛttamanumānamanāgamāpekṣānumānaṃ" | tasya "viṣaya"tvenā"bhimatānāntathā"bhāvonumānaviṣayabhāvonumānenābādhakaṃ | "catvāri cā rya satyāni" | uttaratra pratipādayiṣyate | "ananumeyānāntathābhāvo"'nanumeyatvamanumānenābādhanaṃ | "yathātmādīnām" | ādiśabdāt pradhāneśvarādiparigrahaḥ | na hyeṣāṃ kiñcilliṅgamasti yenānumeyāḥ syuḥ | etadapi pratipādayiṣyati | viśuddhe viṣayadvaye 'tyantaparokṣe cāgamaviṣaye paurvāparyavirodhena yasmin cintāṃ pravarttayati tasmi"nnāgamāpekṣamanumānamapi" | abādhanamiti prakṛtaṃ |

[393,2]

kīdṛśantadabādhanamityāha | "rāgādi"rūpaṃ rāgadveṣamohasvabhāva"madharmamabhyupagamya tatprabhavaṃ" rāgādisamutthāpitaṃ kāyavākkarma cādharmamabhyupagapya | "tatprahāṇāya" tasyādharmasyāpagamāya "snānāgnihotrādeḥ" | tīrthasnānena pāpakṣayo bhavati | yamuddiśyāgnau ghṛtādikaṃ hūyate tasya pāpakṣayo bhavatītyevamāde"ranupadeśaḥ" | ādiśabdādupavāsādiparigrahaḥ | tathā hi na snānādi pāpamapanayati | pāpanidānena rāgādinā virodhābhāvāt |

"seyama"nantaroktāpratyakṣeṇānumānena dvividhena "śakyaparicchedasya" śakyaniścayasyā"śeṣasya viṣayasya" bādhālakṣaṇā || tasyāstāvadasyā visamvādād "sāmānyāt" | yathā śakyaparicchederthe "āptavādasyāvisamvāda"stathātyantaparokṣepi āptavādatvādeva |

[394,1]

"tasye"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | tasyāgamasyācārya di gnā ge na nirdiṣṭānumānabhāvasya | "asye"tyasmābhi"ssambandhādanuguṇopāya"mityādinā vicāritasya | ata evāha | "evaṃbhūtasyeti" sambandhādiguṇayuktasyetyarthaḥ | pratyakṣānumānagamye tasmin vastu"nyavisamvādasāmānyāda"visamvādatvāt kāraṇād "dṛṣṭavyabhicārasyā"pavādasya"pratyakṣānumānāgamyerthe" viṣaye | āptavādādanutpannāyāḥ "pratipatte"rbuddheravisamvādonumīyate | kasmāt | "tadāśrayatvā"dāptavādāśrayatvaṃ cācāryapāramparyopadeśāt siddhaṃ | "tadanyapratipattivat" | atyantaparokṣādanyasmin viṣaye pratyakṣānumānaviṣaye pratipattivat | "tato" yathoktādāptavādādatyantaparokṣerthe yathoktāgamāśritā buddhiḥ"śabdaprabhavāpi" satī śabdādutpannāpi | "śābdavadi"ti yathānyaḥ śābdaḥ pratyayobhiprāyamātraṃ nivedayati | "tathā ne"yaṃ buddhi"rabhiprāyameva nivedayati" | evakārasya bhinnakramatvāt |

[394,3]

asyaivārthasya khyāpanārtho'piśabdaḥ prakārāntareṇāptavādāvisamvādaṃ darśayannāha | "athave"tyādi | heyaṃ sarvanduḥkhaṃ | upādeyaṃ sarvaṃ"kleśaprahāṇa"nnirvāṇaṃ | tayostattvamaviparītaṃ rūpanduḥkhasatyasya nirodhasatyasya ca | saha upāyena yad varttate heyopādeyatattvantasyopāyaṃ | "heya"syopāyaḥ sa mu da ya sattyaṃ | upādeyasyopādeyo mārgasatyaṃ | asya "heyopādeyatattvasya sopāyasya" bha ga va ddarśitasya vastubalāyātena pramāṇena "prasiddhito" niścayataḥ kāraṇāt | bhagavadvacane sattyacatuṣṭayalakṣaṇasya pradhānasyārthasyāvisamvādaḥ | sattyacatuṣṭayalakṣaṇorthaḥ pradhānantadadhigamena nirvāṇaprāpteḥ | tasmāt "pradhānārthāvisamvādāt" | bhagavadvacanādutpannaṃ jñānaṃ "paratrā"pyatyantaparokṣepyarthe"numānamvā" śabdaḥ pūrvaprakārāpekṣa yā vikalpārthaḥ |

[395,1]

"tayorheyopādeyayorupāyau tadupāyau" | heyaṃ copādeyaṃ ca tadupāyau ceti dvandvaḥ | "teṣāntadupadiṣṭānā"ntenāptenopadiṣṭānā"mavaiparītya"manumānena nirūpyamāṇānāmavitathatvama"viṃsamvādaḥ | yathā caturṇṇā"nduḥkhādīnā"māryasatyānāṃ" dvitīye paricchede | "vakṣyamāṇayā nītyā" vicāreṇa | "tasyā"syeti bhagavatā pūrvanirddiṣṭasyādhunā vibhakta tvādasya sa ttya ca tu ṣṭayalakṣaṇasya | kiṃbhūtasya "puruṣārthopayoginaḥ" | puruṣārtho nirvāṇaṃ tatropayogaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ sa yasyāsti tathā | ata evā"bhiyo"gārhasyābhyāsārhasyā"visamvādād viṣayāntarepi" pratyakṣānumānāgamye | "tathātvopagama" ityavisamvādopagamo na vipralambhāya | na visamvādāya bhavati | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anuparodhāt" | pramāṇenābādhanāt | pradhāne ca sattyacatuṣṭayalakṣaṇerthe puruṣamavisamvādya punastṛtīye sthāne "vakturniṣprayojanaṃ" yadvitathā"bhidhāna"ntasya "vaiphalyāt" |

[395,2]

"iṣṭa" ityādi "si ddhā nta vā dī | yoya"manantaroktorthaḥ sa iṣṭosmākaṃ | kintu"śakyeta jñātuṃ" puruṣanaiyamyena "yotiśayo" yathā darśanādilakṣaṇasya tu śakyaḥ |

[396,2]

"sarva evetyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "sarva eva prekṣāpūrvakārī | āgamamanāgamamvānveṣate"
nirūpayati | anāgamantyaktvāgamadvāreṇa "pravṛttikāmaḥ | na vyasanenā"saktimātreṇa |
pravṛttikāmatā"mapi ne"tyādināha | "apinā"meti kathannāma | "ata" ityāgamā"danuṣṭheyaṃ" sākṣāt karttavyamarthaṃ "jñātvā pravṛtta sannarthavā"n phalavān "syā"mbhaveya"miti" |
sonveṣamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ "śakyaṃ darśanaṃ" niścayo yasminnarthe pratyakṣānumānagamye tasyā"visamvādaḥ" pratyakṣānumānābhyāmavadhānaṃ | sa eva pratyayovalambanantenā"nyatrāpi"
pratyakṣānumānāgamyepyarthe "pravartteta" | kiṃ kāraṇam | evaṃ"prāyatvāllokavyavahārasya" | evamityekadeśāvisamvādadarśanenānyatra pravarttanaṃ | "prāyo" bāhulyena yasmin lokavyavahāre sa tathoktaḥ |

puruṣaparīkṣayā punaḥ pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ "pravṛttireva na syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tasya puṃsa"stathābhūtasya" yathārthadarśanā diguṇayuktasya | "nāniṣṭe"rapravṛttireva syāditi sambadhyate | tenāyamartho na punaryathārthadarśanādiguṇayuktānāṃ puṃsāmavitathābhidhāyitvenāniṣṭerapravṛttireva syāt | kiṃ kāraṇam | "tādṛśāṃ" yathārthadarśanādiguṇayuktānāma"vitathābhidhānāt" | yathāvasthitavastuprakāśakavāt |

[396,4]

kiṃ puna kāraṇantathābhūtaḥ pumān jñātumaśakya ityāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | "ayaṃ"
pumāne"vando"ṣavān | "na vā" | evandoṣavān | kintu nirdoṣa "ityevamanyadoṣānirdoṣatāpi" | nirdoṣatetyetadapekṣayā durbodhetyekavacanena strīliṃgena ca nirdeśaḥ | anyadoṣā ityetadapekṣayā tu durbodhā iti pulliṅgabahuvacanābhyāṃ vipariṇāmaḥ karttavyaḥ | kasmād | durbodhatvād duḥprāpyatvādanyaguṇadoṣaniścāyakānāṃ"pramāṇānāṃ" |

[397,1]

"caitasebhya" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "samyag mithyā" ca pravṛttiḥ kāyavākkarmalakṣaṇā yeṣāṃ puṃsānte tathā | cetasi bhavāḥ caitasā guṇadoṣāḥ | caitasebhyo guṇebhyaḥ kṛpāvairāgyabodhādibhyo hetubhyaḥ "samyakpravṛttayaḥ" yathārthapravṛttayaḥ | caitasebhyo doṣebhyo rāgādibhyo mithyāpravṛttayo viparītapravṛtta yo bhavanti | "te ce"ti pareṣāṃ caitasā guṇadoṣāścetodharmatvenā"tīndriyāḥ" | tato na pratyakṣagamyāḥ | nāpyanumānagamyā atīndriyatvādeva svabhāvaliṅgasyāsiddheḥ | kintu "sva"smād guṇadoṣarūpāt "prabhava"
utpādo yasya "kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ" | tena kāryaliṅgenā"numeyāḥ" | tacca nāsti |
yasmād "vyavahārāśca" kāyavākkarmalakṣaṇāḥ "prāyaśo" vā bahulyena | "buddhipūrva"miti kṛtvā pratisaṃkhyānenā"nyathāpi karttuṃ śakyante" | tathā hi sarāgā api vītarāgavad ātmānandarśayanti | vītarāgāśca sarāgavat | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "puruṣecchāvṛttitvād"
vyavahārāṇāṃ puruṣecchayā "vṛttiḥ" pravṛttiryeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ |

[397,2]

yadi nāma puruṣecchāvṛttayo vyavahārāstathāpi kimityanyathā kriyanta ityāha | "teṣāṃ ce"ti puṃsāṃ "citrābhisandhitvā"ccitrābhiprāyatvāt | tato yatheṣṭaṃ vyavahārāḥ pravarttanta iti nāsti guṇadoṣaprabhavāṇāṃ vyavahārāṇāmvivekaniścayaḥ | taditi tasmādayamanumātā pumān "liṅgasaṃkarā"lliṅgavyabhicārā"daniścinvan" kṣīṇadoṣaḥ"katha"māgamasya karttāraṃ "pratipadyeta" naiveti nigamanīyaṃ |

[397,3]

"atha kimi"tyādi | "yo nirdoṣo" rāgādidoṣarahitastā"dṛśaḥ puru"ṣaḥ "kinnaivāsti" |
astīti pratipādayannāha | "sarveṣāmi"tyādi | pratipakṣasammukhībhāve nirhrāsamapacayaṃpratipakṣāsammukhībhāve cātiśayamupacayaṃ śrayante ye rāgādayaste "nirhrāsātiśayāśritāḥ" |
teṣāṃ "sarveṣāṃ vipakṣatvā"t | yasya ca sammukhībhāvāsammukhībhāvābhyāṃ nirhrāsātiśayambhajante | sa eva teṣāṃ vipakṣo bādhakastena saha varttata iti savipakṣaḥ |
tadbhāvastattvantasmāt | sa bādhakatvāditi yāvat | yena ca bādhakena doṣāṇāṃ savipakṣatvantasya "bādhakasyābhyāsāt" punaḥ punarnairantaryeṇotpādanād ya "sātmībhāva"stadaurjjityantanmayatā | ta"smād" bādhakasātmībhāvā"ddhīyeran" | kṣīyaren | "āsravā" rāgāgadayaḥ "kvacit" santāne sātmībhūtadoṣapratipakṣe doṣāṇāṃ ca bādhakaṃ nairātmyajñānamiti pratipādayiṣyati | tasmānna tathābhūtaḥ puruṣo neṣyate etāvattu brūmaḥ "sa tu kṣīṇāsravo durjñāna" iti |

[398,1]

"doṣo hī"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | "doṣā hi" rāgādayaḥ | kiṃbhūtā | "nirhrāsātiśayadharmāṇaḥ" | apakarṣotkarṣasvabhāvāḥ santo "vipakṣābhibhavotkarṣa" vipakṣakṛto yobhibhavastiraskārastasyotkarṣāpakarṣaṃ "sādhayanti" gamayanti | tenāyamarthaḥ |
nirhrāsadharmāṇaḥ vipakṣābhibhavotkarṣaṃ sādhayanti "bādhakābhibhavo"tkarṣeṇa doṣāṇāṃ nirhrāsāt atiśayadharmāṇo bādhakābhibhavāpakarṣaṃ sādhayanti | bādhakābhibhavamāndyena teṣāmatiśayadharmatvāt | "jvālādivat" | ādiśabdācchītoṣṇasparśādiparigrahaḥ |
yathā jvālādayo bādhakasyodakāderutkarṣāpakarṣe sati nirhrāsātiśayadharmāṇo yathākramamudakādyabhibhavotkarṣaṃ sādhayanti tadvat |

[398,2]

nanu ca bāhyārthapratibaddhā rāgādayaḥ bāhyaṃ ca vastu nityaṃ sannihitameva |
tatkathaṃ rāgādīnāmuccheda ityata āha | te hītyādi | hiśabdo yasmādarthaḥ | te rāgādayo "vikalpaprabhavāḥ" | vikalpādayoniśomanaskāralakṣaṇāt prabhava utpāda eṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | tathā hyayoniśomanaskāramantareṇa "satyapi" bāhyerthe notpadyante rāgādayaḥ tatsammukhībhāve ca vināpyarthenotpadyanta iti vikalpaprabhavā rāgādayaḥ | tataḥ satya"pyupādāne" yathoktalakṣaṇe | anādaravivakṣāyāṃ ceyaṃ saptamī | "kasyacit manoguṇasya"
nairātmyadarśanalakṣaṇasyā"bhyāsāt | apakarṣiṇaḥ" apacayavanto bhavantītyarthaḥ |

[398,3]

etaduktambhavati | yadyapi tāvad doṣanidānasya sarvadā nocchedaḥ pratipakṣasyātyantapāṭavābhāvāt | tathāpi pratipakṣābhyāsāt mandīkṛtasāmarthyādupādānād apakarṣiṇaḥ kṣāmakṣāmatarā doṣā bhavantītyanena ca heturuktaḥ | yadā tu yathoktasyamanoguṇasya bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantavarttitayā pāṭavaṃ jātantadā "tatpāṭave" | tasya manoguṇasya pāṭave sati | anvayaḥ kleśabījamanvetyutpadyate'smāddoṣa iti kṛtvā |
nirgatonvayo yasmin vināśe sa niranvayavināśaḥ | sa dharmo yeṣāndoṣāṇānte"niranvayavināśadharmāṇaḥ" | vāsanayā saha vināśadharmāṇa ityarthaḥ | "jvālādivat" | yathā jvālādayaḥ pratipakṣasyodakāderutkarṣe satyatyantavināśadharmāṇastadvat | prayogaḥ punaḥ |
ye yadupadhānādapakarṣiṇaste tadatyantavṛddhau tadabhibhavānniranvayavināśadharmāṇaḥ |
tadyathā jvālādayaḥ salilābhibhavavṛddhau | nairātmyadarśanopadhānāccāpakarṣadharmāṇo doṣā iti svabhāvahetuḥ |

[399,1]

yata eva"ntena" kāraṇena "syādapi" kaści"nnirdoṣaḥ | kathamityā"di paraḥ | "yāva"tetyayannipāto yadetyasminnarthe varttate | "doṣasātma"no "vipakṣotpattiva"diti cānādikālābhyāsāt | doṣasātmanaḥ puṃsaḥ vipakṣotpattirnairātmyadarśanotpatiḥ |
eva"ndoṣavipakṣa"sya nairātmyadarśanasya "sātmatvepi yathāpratyayaṃ | yathā"kāraṇasannidhāna"ndoṣotpattirapi" syāt |

[399,2]

"nāyami"tyā cā ryaḥ | sarvasāṃsārikopadravarahitatvānnirupadravaḥ | bhūtaviparītamanityādisvalakṣaṇamartho viṣayosyeti bhūtārthaḥ | bhūtārthagrahaṇādeva ca mārgaścittasvabhāvaḥ | nirupadravaścāsau bhūtārthaśceti "nirupadra"va"bhūtā"rthastabhūtaścāsau"svabhā"vaśceti karmadhārayagarbha eva karmadhārayasamāsaḥ nirupadravasya bhūtārthasya bhūtārthatvenābhyāsāt sātmībhāvagate | anena ca citta"svabhāvasya" doṣapratipakṣasya"viparyayai"ryathoktāt trayād vilakṣaṇaiḥ sopadravairabhūtārthairasvabhāvaiśca doṣai"rna bādhanaṃ" |
sātmībhūtaṃ mārgamabhibhūya na doṣāṇāmutpattirityarthaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "yatnavattve pītyādi" | etadāha | sātmībhūtasya mārgasya doṣotpādanāya yatna eva na sambhavati |

[399,3]

tathāpyabhyupagamyocyate | doṣotpādane yatnavattve "buddhestatpakṣapātataḥ" |
tasmin doṣapratipakṣabhūte guṇavati nairātmyamārge | pakṣapātena bahumānataḥ | doṣotpādane yatnannivarttya | guṇapakṣapātena doṣapratipakṣa eva yatnādhānāditi yāvat |

[400,1]

svabhāvapadameva tāvadādau vyācaṣṭe | "na hi svabhāvo" nairāpmyadarśanalakṣaṇaḥ pratipakṣasātmani vyavasthitena puruṣeṇa | "ayantena" prayatnena "vinā nivarttayituṃ śakyaḥ śrotriyakāpālikaghṛṇāvadi"ti | yaḥ śrotriyaḥ san kāpāliko bhavati tasya śrotriyāvasthāyāṃ yā ghṛṇā sā yathā yatnamantareṇa na śakyate nivarttayituntadvat |
mārgasvabhāvanivarttanāya "yatnaśca" kriyamāṇaḥ | "prā"pyasya rāgādisvabhāvasya "guṇa"darśanena"nivarttya"sya vipaśyanāsvabhāvasya "doṣadarśanena kriyeta | tacca" doṣadarśanaṃ "vipakṣasātmanaḥ"
doṣapratipakṣasātmanaḥ "puṃso" doṣapratipakṣe"na sambhava"ti | tathā tacca guṇadarśanamvipakṣasātmano "doṣeṣu" na sambhavati |

[400,2]

kasmāt punaḥ pratipakṣe doṣadarśananna sambhavatītyāha | tasyetyādi | "tasya"
pratipakṣasya "nirupadravatvāt" | trividho hyupadravo yasyābhāvānnirupradravo mārgaḥ |
tathā hi cittamvibaddhuṃ heturdoṣopadravo yaiścittamvivaddhambhūtārthadarśane na pravarttate |
kāyacittavyathāheturduḥkhadaurmanasyopadravaḥ | sāsravasukhasyāpraśāntatayā tadupabhoge vairasyodvegaśca |

[400,3]

tatra prathamasyopadravasyābhāvamāha | "sarvadoṣahāne"riti | sarvasya rāgādidoṣasya hānervigamāt |

[400,4]

"paryavasthā"netyādinā dvitīyasyābhāvamāha | rāgādisammukhībhāvaḥ paryavasthānaṃ ca janma ca "paryavasthānajanma"nī | tayoryat"prativaddhanduḥkha"ntasya "vivekāt" | rāgādyutpattikāle yad duḥkhaṃ kāyacittaparidāhalakṣaṇantatparyavasthānapratibaddhajātijarāvyādhyādiduḥkhantu janmapratibaddhaṃ |

[400,5]

tatīyasyopadravasyābhāvamāha | praśametyādi "praśamo" rāgādivirahalakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ |
tasmin ya"tsukha"manāsravantasya "rasa" asvādasta"syānudvejanāt" | avaimukhyakaraṇāt | "abhūtārtha"mabhataviṣayaṃ "khalvapi" rāgādi | na syāditi sambandhaḥ |

[400,6]

yadyabhūtārthaṃ kathantarhi tasyotpattirityāha | "upādānabalabhāvī"ti vitathavikalpavāsanābalabhāvi | tadevaṃbhūtarāgādibījāśrayasya vijñāna"santānasya viparyayopādānāt" rāgādiviparyayalakṣaṇasya pratipakṣasya parigrahānna syānnotpadyeta | na tu"bhūtārthama"viparītaviṣayaṃ "na" bhavet | kintu bhavedeva | kiṃ kāraṇam | "vastubalapravṛtteḥ" | yathāvasthitavastusāmarthyenotpatteḥ | doṣasātmyepi tāvat sthitasya | pramāṇānyanityādibhatākāragrāhīṇi | pratipakṣamārgamāvahanti | (222–23)

[401,1]

kiṃ punarvipaśyanā sātmani sthitasya | "abhūtārthaśca" doṣā rāgādayaḥ | ātmātmīyādhyāropiterthe pravṛtteḥ | te "pratipakṣa"sya bhūtārthasya yat "sātm"yaṃ svabhāvatvantasya"vāci"no na bhavanti | yata eva"ntasmānna punaḥ" prahīṇadoṣāṇāṃ "doṣotpattiḥ" | doṣotpādana"yatnepi buddherguṇapakṣapātena" kāraṇena rāgādi"pratipakṣa eva yatnādhānāt" prayatnasya karaṇāt | kasya "parīkṣāvato" yuktyā vicārakasya doṣasātmyepi tāvat sthitasya | "viśeṣeṇā"tiśayena guṇeṣveva yatnādhāna"maduṣṭātmanaḥ" pratipakṣasātmani sthitasya |

[401,2]

"kaḥ punareṣāndoṣāṇāṃ prabhava" utpattikāraṇaṃ | prabhavatyutpadyatesmāditi kṛtvā |
yasya doṣahetoḥ "pratipakṣābhyāsena prahīyaṃte" |

[401,3]

uttaramāha | "sarvāsāmi"tyādi | "doṣajātīnā"ndoṣaprakārāṇāṃ "jāti"rutpattiḥ"satkāyadarśanāt" | ātmātmīyābhiniveśāt |

[401,4]

nanu cāvidyāhetukāḥ kleśā āgame uktāstatkathaṃ na vyāghāta ityāha | "sā'vidye"ti saiva"satkāyadṛṣṭi"ravidyā | tato nāsti virodhaḥ | kena punaḥ krameṇa doṣāṇāṃ satkāyadarśanādutpattirityāha | "ta"tretyādi | "tatrā"tmātmīyatvenābhiniviṣṭe viṣaye | "tatsnehaḥ" | ātmātmīyasnehaḥ | "tasmādā"tmātmīyasnehāt "dveṣādisambhava"
iti kramaḥ |

[401,5]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "nāha"mityātmākārapratiṣedhaḥ | "na mame"tyātmīyākārasya | anātmākāreṇa nātmīyākāreṇa ca "paśyataḥ" puruṣasya | "parigrahamantareṇe"ti | ātmātmīyatvena tadanugrāhakatvena parikalpya grahaḥ tena vinā "na kvacit" viṣaye"snehaḥ | na cānanurāgiṇaḥ" ātmātmīyādisneharahitasya "kvacid dveṣaḥ" | anunaya mantareṇa tasyābhāvāt | kiṅkāraṇam | "ātmātmīye"tyādi | "ātmātmīyayoranuparodhinya"pratikūlavarttini | udāsīnapakṣe | "tadabhāvāt" tasya dveṣasyābhāvāt |
uparodha"pratighātini" ceti | ātmātmīyatvena gṛhītasya ya uparodhaḥ pīḍā |
tat"pratighātini" tatpratiṣedhaṃ kurvati | mitrapakṣe "tadabhāvāt" | dveṣābhāvāt | kiṃtvātmātmīyasnehaviṣayabhūtavirodhena | yaḥ sthitaḥ pratikūlavarttī | tatraiva dveṣaḥ | tasmānnātmātmīyasnehamantareṇa dveṣa iti | "tasmā"dityādinā nigamanaṃ | yata evanta"smāttau ce"ti | "ātmada"rśa"nā"tmīyagrahau | "sne"haṃ "prasuvāte" iti vacanavipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | "sa" ca sneho "dveṣādīn prasūte" janayati |

[402,1]

tayostarhyātmadarśanātmīyagrahayoḥ ko heturityāha | "samāne"tyādi | "samā"na"jātī"yantadevātmadarśanantasyā"bhyā"saḥ paunaḥpunyenādikālamutpattiḥ | tadvāsanā ca |
tasmājjā"tamātmadarśana"mātmīyagrahaṃ prasūte | tasmāt "satkāyadarśanajāḥ sarve kleśāḥ" | (223–24)

[402,2]

"tadeva" ca satkāyadarśanama"jñāna"mavidyetyucyate siddhānte |

[402,3]

yenaiva satkāyadarśanamevā'vidyā'"ta eva" kāraṇāt "mohonidānaṃ" pradhānakāraṇa"ndoṣāṇāṃ" rāgādīnā"mabhidhīyate" sū trā nta re — "avidyāhetukāḥ sarvakleśā"
iti "satkāyadṛṣṭi"rdoṣāṇāṃ nidānama"nyatra" sūtrāntarebhi dhīyate | kasmāt | "tatprahāṇe"
satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇe doṣāṇāṃ "prahāṇataḥ | mohandoṣanidānaṃ" doṣa kāraṇamāhurbuddhā bhagavantaḥ | kasmād | "amūḍhasyā"jñānarahitatya "doṣānutpatteḥ punaranyatra" pradeśe"satkāyadṛṣṭi"ndoṣanidānamāhuḥ | "taccaitatkā"raṇatvaṃ mohasya satkāyadṛṣṭeśca "pradhāna"hetu"nirdeśe sati syā"nnahetumātranirdeśe | kiṃ kāraṇam | "aneka"smādindriyaviṣayo'yoniśomanaskārakalāpājjanma yeṣāndoṣāṇānteṣā"meka"smāt mohāt satkāyadṛṣṭeśco"tpativirodhāt" | tasmādanyakāraṇasambhavepi prādhānyaṃ gṛhītvā mohasatkāyadṛṣṭyoḥ kāraṇatvamuktamiti gamyate |

[403,1]

yadi cānyo mohonyā ca satkāyadṛṣṭistayośca prādhānyantadā "na ca dvayo"rmohasatkāyadṛṣṭyoḥ "prādhānye" satye"kaikanirdeśaḥ" | kvacit mohasyaiva nirdeśaḥ kvacit satkāyadṛṣṭerevetyarthaḥ | na "parabhāgabhāk" śobhābhāk vakturakauśalamevāvahatīti yāvat | yadā punaranayorna svabhāvabhedaḥ | tadā mohaśabdena satkāyadṛṣṭiśabdena"cobhayathāpyekasyā"rthasya paryāyeṇa "nirdeśena na virodhaḥ" prādhānyasya | "prādhānyaṃ puna"ssatkāryadarśanasya "tadupādānatvena" doṣāṇāmupādānatvena | taccānantarameva pratipāditaṃ | pratipādayiṣyate ca dvitīye paricchede |

[403,2]

tasya ca satkāyadarśanasya "prahāṇe" sati "doṣāṇāṃ prahāṇataḥ" prādhānyaṃ | yata eva"ntasmāt sambhava"ti "satkāyadarśanājjanma" ye"ṣāndoṣāṇā"ntteṣāṃ tasya satkāyadarśanasya "pratipakṣo nairātmyadarśa"nantasyā"bhyāsāt prahāṇaṃ" |

[403,3]

"sa ca kṣīṇadoṣaḥ" pumānauddeśiko "duranvayo" durbodho "yadupadeśād" yasya kṣīṇadoṣasyopadeśā"dayaṃ" pravṛttikāmaḥ "pratipadyeta" | tenopadiṣṭamarthamanutiṣṭhet || 0 || 25

[403,4]

"mā bhūt puruṣāśrayaṃ" puruṣahetukam"vacanamāgamaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇama | anantaroktena nyāyenāgama"praṇeturduranvayatvāt" | durbodhatvāt |

[403,5]

"girā"mvacasāṃ "mithyātvasya" mṛṣārthatvasya ye "heta"vo "doṣā" rāgādaya"steṣāṃ" |
karttari ceyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī | āśrayaṇamāśrayaḥ | "puruṣa"syā"śraya" iti samāsaḥ | puruṣaśabdācca karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī | na cobhayaprāptau karmaṇīti niyamaḥ | śeṣa vibhāṣeti vikalpanāt | tenāyamartho | mithyāhetubhirdoṣaiḥ puruṣaparigṛhītatvāditi |

[404,1]

athavā doṣāṇāmiti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī doṣāṇāṃ puruṣeṇāśrayāt parigrahāt |

[404,2]

"apauruṣeya"mvacas"satyārtha"mmithyātvahetordoṣasyābhāvā"diti kecit" mī māṃ sa kā"ācakṣate" |

[404,3]

etaduktambhavati | trividhamapyaprāmāṇyammithyātvājñānasaṅśayalakṣaṇe vāde nāstyeva | yataḥ śabdānāṃ dvividhaḥ svabhāvo nisargasiddha aupādhikaśca tatra nisargasiddho yo yathārthapratipādakatvam | ayathārthapratipādakatvaṃ punaraupādhikaḥ |
svabhāvaḥ puruṣādhīnatvāt | tadāha |

[404,4]

"śabdadoṣodbhavastāvad vaktryadhīna iti sthitaṃ | tadabhāvaḥ kvacit tāvad guṇavadvaktrṛkatvataḥ | 62tadguṇairapakṛṣṭānāṃ śabde saṃkrāntyasambhavāt | yadvā vakturabhāvena na syurdoṣā nirāśrayā iti63"

[404,5]

tena ve de puruṣanivṛttau mithyātvanivṛttiḥ | nāpyanutpatilakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyamvedādarthāvagateḥ | nāpi saṃśayalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ vedādarthagatau saṃśayasyāpratibhāsanāt | tadāha |

[404,6]

"evaṃbhūtasya vedasya jñānotpattiṃ ca kurvataḥ | svarūpaviparītatvasaṃśayau bhāṣyavāritāviti || "

[404,7]

yataścāprāmāṇyaṃ trayannivṛttaṃ | nisargasiddhaśca yayārthapratipādanalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvo vedasyāsti tasmāt svata evāsya prāmāṇyamarthapratipādakatvāta |
yataśca śabde vaktṛdoṣeṇa bādhaduṣṭakāraṇatvalakṣaṇasya doṣasya sambhavastena vede puruṣanivṛttau doṣanivṛtteḥ svataḥ | prāmāṇyāpavādakayorbādhakāraṇaduṣṭatvajñānayornivṛtternāprāmāṇyāśaṅkā | tadāha |

[404,8]

"tatrāpavādanirmuktirvaktryabhāvāllaghīyasī | vede tenāpramāṇatvaṃ nāśaṅkāmapi gacchati | 68prāmāṇyaṃ pauruṣeye tu pramāṇāntarabhāvataḥ | tadabhāve tu tadduṣyed vaidikaṃ na kadācana | tenetarapramāṇairyā codanānāmasaṃgatiḥ | tayaiva syāt pramāṇatvamanuvādatvamanyathā | codanārthānyathābhāvaṃ kurvataścānumānataḥ | tajjñānenaiva yo bādhaḥ sa kathaṃ vinivāryate | 89tanmithyātvādabādhaścet prāptamanyonyasaṃśrayaṃ | nānumānādatonyaddhi bādhakaṃ kiṃcadasti te | 90"

[405,1]

na cānyāpramāṇairvedārthasyāgrahe'bhāvo rasādivat | atha rasāderaparayā rasabuddhayā grahāt pūrvikāyā rasabuddheḥ prāmāṇyamvedārthepyevambhaviṣyati | tadāha ||

[405,2]

"na cānyairagraherthasya syādabhāvo rasādivat | taddhiyaivārthabodhaścettādṛgdharme bhaviṣyati | mamāsiddhamitīdaṃ ced vedājjāte'vabodhane | vaktunna dveṣamātreṇa yujyate satyavādineti | 91, 92"

[405,3]

"na khalvi"tyādinā kārikārthamācaṣṭe | "sarva eve"ti pauruṣeyo' pauruṣeyaśca | "sambhāvyavipralambhaḥ" sambhāvya aśaṃkanīyo vipralambho visamvādosyeti | kintu pauruṣeya eva sambhāvyavipralambhaḥ | "vipralambhahetū"nāṃ visamvādahetūnā"ndoṣāṇāṃ puruṣāśrayāt" | 227

[405,4]

yatpuna"rapauruṣeyantatsatyārthamityeke" | yasmād vedeṣu mithyātva"kāraṇā"nāṃ puruṣāṇāma"bhāvaḥ kārya"sya mithyātvasyā"bhāvaṃ" sādhayatītyapauruṣeyaṃ satyārthamiti |

[405,5]

ya "evamvādi"nastāneva mī māṃ sa kā n pra"tyanye pracakṣate" | paramukhena śāstrakāra evāha | "girāṃ sattyatva"sya ye "hetavo guṇā"ste"ṣāṃ" pu"ruṣāśrayā"dapauruṣeyeṣu vākyeṣu puruṣanivṛttyā sattyatvakāraṇasya guṇasya nivṛtteḥ kāryasyāpi sattyatvasya nivṛttiri"tyapauruṣeya"mvākyaṃ "mithyātvaṃ kinna" bhavati |

[405,6]

<1>etaduktambhavati | śabde satyattvamithyātvayoḥ puruṣāyattatvād yadipuruṣanivṛttau sattyārthatvamiṣyate mithyārthatvaṃ kinneṣyata ityucyate | paramārthatastu puruṣanivṛttyā sattyārthatvamithyārthayornivṛtterānarthakyādanutpattilakṣaṇamevāprāmāṇyaṃ |
tena |

[406,1]

"mamāsiddhamitīdaṃ ced vedājjātevabodhane | vaktunna dveṣamātreṇa yujyate sattyavādineti | 92, 93"

[406,2]

nirastaṃ | vedāt svabhāvatorthāvabodhasyānutpatteḥ |

[406,3]

<2>kiñca | varṇṇānāmavācakarūpatvaṃ pratyeka samastānāṃ cāvācakatvād varṇṇarūpaśca veda iti kathamatorthajñānaṃ |

[406,4]

nanvagṛhītasamayasyāpi vākyāduccāritāt kopyarthonenokta iti sandeho dṛśyate |

[406,5]

sa caivaṃ syāda yadyarthapratipādane śabdasya svabhāvena śaktiḥ syāt | evantarhi sandehalakṣaṇamasyāprāmāṇyaṃ syāt | iṣṭeniṣṭecārthe prakāśanaśaktisambhavāt | yadi cāsya svabhāva ta eva sā śaktiḥ kiṃ saṃketena | yathā dīpasyārthaprakāśane śaktasyendriyāpekṣā tathā śabdasyāpi saṃketāpekṣeti cet | na | pradīpendriyayoḥ pratyekamabhāvepyarthaprakāśakatvābhāvāt | tatrānyonyāpekṣatvaṃ yuktaṃ | naivaṃ śabdaśaktisaṃketayoḥ | saṃketamātreṇaivārthapratīterutpatteḥ | tasmānna svabhāvataḥ śabdorthapratipādanasamartha ityutpattilakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyam |

[406,6]

<3>nanvagnihotrañjuhuyāt svargakāma ityādi vākyeṣvagnihotrādeḥ svargādisādhanopāyatvaṃ pratīyata eveti kathamanutpattilakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ |

[406,7]

sattyametat | kevalaṃ pratītirhyapratīterbādhikā | na tu mithyātvasya |
tasyāpi pratīteḥ | tena kimebhirvākyairagnihotrādiḥ svargasādhanānupāya evopāyatayā pradarśyate'thopāya eveti mithyātvāśaṃkā na nivarttata eva | bādhakapramāṇābhāvādapauruṣeyatvasya mithyārthatvena saha virodhābhāvacca | dṛṣṭaścāpauruṣeyāṇāmvitathajñānahetutvaṃ | tadyathā jyotsnādīnāṃ śuklavastrādau pītajñānahetutvaṃ | tena codanārthānyathābhāvonumānataḥ kriyata iti kathantajjñānena bādhā | rasādijñānānāntu tṛptyādikāryāvisamvādādeva prathamaṃ prāmāṇyaniścayādanyadā tvabhyāsādinā svata eva prāmāṇyaniścayo yukta iti na mithyātvāśaṅkā | vede tu naiva kadācidapyavisamvādaḥ pratipanna iti kathamanyadāpi svataḥ prāmāṇyaniścayaḥ | tena satyapi vijñāne pratibhāderyathaiva hi svātantryānna pramāṇatvaṃ tathā vedepi dṛśyatāṃ |

[406,8]

<4>kiṃca | codanārthajñānasyāvidyamānopalambhanarūpatvāt mithyātvaṃ | tathāhi kāryerthe vedasya prāmāṇyamiṣyate | kāryaścārthānuṣṭheya eva, sa ca bhāvitvenāvidyamānatvānna codanājñānakālabhāvīti | tatkathamavidyamānaviṣayatvāccodanājñānasya na mithyātvaṃ | sarvavikalpānāṃ ca pūrvamavastuviṣayatvasya pratipāditatvāt tenāpi codanājñānasya mithyātvameva | kiṃ ca | lokavedayorvarṇṇāḥ padāni cābhinnānyeva vākyabhedastu kevalamiṣyate | loke ca padānāmarthaḥ saṃketavaśāt | laukikapadārthaśca vaidikānāṃ padānāntena pauruṣeya evārthasambandhaḥ | laukikapadārthadvāreṇa ca vaidikavākyārthāvagamo bhavatīti pauruṣeya evāsau laukikavākya iva | loke ca padānyanekārthānīti vaidikavākyasyāpyanekārthatāsambhavād viparītārthā śaṃkā na nivarttata iti saṃśayalakṣaṇamapramāṇyaṃ vedasyeti |

[407,1]

"yathe"tyādinā kārikārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe | "rāgādiparīto" rāgādiyuktaḥ | "daye"ti karuṇā | saiva sātmībhūtā "dharmatā | ādi"śabdāt prajñāśraddhādi | tai"ryuktaḥ | ta"ttasmād"yathā vacanasya puruṣāśrayāt mithyārthatā | tathā sattyārthatāpi | sa" iti puruṣaḥ | "tāmapi"
sattyārthatā"nnivarttayati" | na kevalaṃ mithyārthatāṃ | iti puruṣanivṛttau taddharmayoḥ sattyārthatvamithyārthatvayornivṛttā"vānarthakyaṃ" vede "syāt" |

[407,2]

atha puruṣanivṛttāvapi sattyārthateṣyate | tadā sattyārthatā"viparyayo" mithyārthatā"vā" syāt |

[407,3]

<5>syānmataṃ | na puruṣāpekṣayā śabdānāmarthavattā kintu svabhāvata evetyāha | "na hī"tyādi | "prakṛtyā" svabhāve"nārthavantaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "samayāt"
saṃ ketāt | "tataḥ" śabdebhyo"rthakhyāte"rarthapratīteḥ | "kāyasaṃjñādivat" | hastavikārākṣinikocādayaḥ kāyasaṃjñā | yathā tatra samayāt kvacidarthapratipattistadvat | yadi punaḥ svabhāvata eva śavdā arthaprakāśakāḥ syustadā na saṃketamapekṣeran | tasmānna svatorthaprakāśanayogyatā śavdānāṃ | kinta"rhyaprātikūlyantu" yathāsaṃketaṃ pravṛttireva śabdānāṃ "yogyatā" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "samaye" saṃketakāle "ta"sya saṃketakartturyatra niyoktu"micchā" tayā yatheṣṭaṃ śavdānāṃ "praṇayanāt" pravṛtteḥ | yadi punarnisargasiddhāḥ svabhāvasiddhāḥ kvacidarthe śabdāḥ syustadā "nisargasiddheṣu" puruṣe"cchāvaśād" yatheṣṭaṃsaṃketenārtha"pratipādanāyogāt" |

[408,1]

tasmāda"narthakāḥ" svataḥ śabdāstenarthakāssantaḥ "puruṣasaṃskārāt" puruṣasaṃketā"darthavantaḥ" | atha mābhūdanarthakatvamiti puruṣasaṃskārāpekṣayārthavattvanteṣāmiṣyate |
tadā pauruṣeyatayaiva syāt | yasmāt "tatsaṃskāryataiva" puruṣasaṃskāryataiva "caiṣāṃ"
śabdānāṃ "pauruṣeyatā yuktā | na" puruṣā"dutpattiḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tata eva"
puruṣasamayāde"vārthavipralambhād" visamvādāt | na puruṣādutpattervipralambhaḥ | yasmā"dutpannopi" puruṣācchabdo"nyathā samita" iti mithyārthatāvirodhena yathābhāvaṃ "samitaḥ"
saṃketitaḥ | "noparodhī" na vipralambhakaḥ | "tadanya" iti śabdādanyaḥ "puruṣadharma" unmeṣanimeṣādiḥ svatonarthakopi yathābhāvaṃ puruṣeṇa samito na vipralambhakastadvat |

[408,2]

upasaṃharannāha | "tadi"ti | tasmā"dayaṃ" puruṣo "nivarttamānaḥ svakṛtasamayāt sambhava" utpādo yasyā "arthapratibhā"yāḥ arthabuddhes"tāmapi nivarttayati | tadi"ti tasmāt | "kutastannivṛttyā" tasya puruṣasya nivṛttyā "sattyārthatā" kintvānarthakyameva syāt |

[408,3]

etena yaducyate | yatpūrvāparayoḥ koṭyoḥ paraiḥ sādhanamucyate | tannirākaraṇaṃ kṛtvā kṛtārthā vedavādinaḥ || pūrvā vedasya yā koṭiḥ pauruṣeyatvalakṣaṇā | parā vināśarūpā ca tadabhāvo hi nityateti |

[408,4]

tadapāstaṃ satyapauruṣeyatve nityatve ca vedasyānarthakyenākṛtārthatvāt | <6>"atha punarutpattireva pauruṣeyatā na samayākhyānanna" saṃketakaraṇaṃ pauruṣeyatā tenāpauruṣeyatvādeva yathārtho veda iti bhāvaḥ |

[408,5]

evamapya"rthajñāpanahetu"rarthābhivyaktihetuḥ "saṃketaḥ puruṣāśraya" puruṣecchānurodhīna yathārthamavaśyamvarttata iti "girāmapauruṣeyat"vebhyupagamyamāne | "ataḥ" puruṣecchānurodhinaḥ saṃketāt "mithyātvasambhavaḥ" |

[409,1]

<7>"ki"mityādi vivaraṇaṃ | "asye"ti vedasya ya"to hi samayāt" saṃketādartha"pratītira"rthaprakāśanaṃ "sa" samayaḥ "pauruṣeya"stato "vitathopya"līkopi "syāt" | svātantryāt |
tataśca "śīlaṃ sādhanaṃ" heturyasya "svarga"sya | tathābhūtaścāsau svargaśca sumerupṛṣṭhalakṣaṇastasya yadvede va"cana"ntada"nyathā samaye na viparyāsayet" | niratiśayā prītiḥ svarga itye vamviparītārthaṃ kuryādagnihotrādisādhanena ca viparītārthaṃ kuryā"ttena" kāraṇe"nāyathārthama"pi "prakāśanasambhavāt" |

[409,2]

"sa eva doṣo" yaḥ pauruṣeyeṣūktaḥ | puruṣadoṣāt sambhāvyavipralambhaḥ pauruṣeya iti | 228

[409,3]

<8>nanvapauruṣeya eva śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ | tathā hi yathedānīntanā vṛddhāḥ pūrvaprasiddhameva śabdārthasambandhamupadiśanti | tathā pūrvapūrvavṛddhā apītyanāditvādapauruṣeya eva sambandhaḥ | taduktaṃ |

[409,4]

"śabdārthānāditāṃ muktvā sambandhānādikāraṇaṃ | asti nānyadato vede sambandhādirna vidyata iti"

[409,5]

sa ca sambandhastripramāṇakaḥ | tathā hi | śroturarthapratipattaye kenacid vṛddhena śabde prayukte'nyaḥ pārśvasthaḥ pratipattā prayoktāramvācyaṃ vācakaṃ pratyakṣe ṇa pratipadyate | śrotuśca pratipannatvaṃ pravṛttidvāreṇāvagacchati | arthapratipattyanyathānupapattyā ca śavdārthāśritā vācyavācakaśaktiṃ cāvagacchatīti tripramāṇaka eva sambandhaḥ | taduktaṃ ||

[409,6]

"śabdān vṛddhāmidheyāṃśca pratyakṣeṇātra paśyati | śrotuśca pratipannatvamanumānena ceṣṭayā || anyathānupapattyā ca buddhyecchaktiṃ dvayāśritāṃarthāpattyā ca budhyante sambandhantri pramāṇakamiti | "

[410,1]

tatrāha | sa"mbandhāpauruṣeyat"va ityādi | śabdārthayossa"mbandhāpauruṣayatvebh"yupagamyamāne "syāt pratīti"rarthapratipattira"samvidaḥ" | saṃketajñānaṃ samvit | sā na vidyate yasya tasya | "akāryaḥ" puruṣairajanyaḥ "samba"ndho yeṣānte tathā | "te śabdā artheṣu"
vācyeṣu "puruṣai"ryathārthaprakāśakatvāt | svabhāvā"danyathā viparyasyante" vitathajñānahetavo na kriyante | "tenā"viparyāsenā"doṣo" visamvādalakṣaṇo doṣo nāsti | "idānīmiti"
sambandhāpauruṣeyatve "kiṃ saṃketena" prayojanaṃ | "yasmāt sa hi" śabdārthayo"ssambandhaḥ" sa ceda"rthapratīti"hetuḥ sambandhopauruṣeyastadā "nāyaṃ" puruṣo nisargasiddhasambandhatvācchabdādarthaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ "samayamapekṣeta" | pradīpādivat | apekṣate ca saṃketantasmānna śabdānāmarthena sahāpauruṣeyaḥ sambandho rājacihnādivat |

[410,2]

<9>syānmatam | apauruṣeya eva sambandhaḥ sa tu saṃketanirapekṣo pratītyāśraya ityāha | "apratītyāśrayortha"pratīterevāśrayo vā "kathaṃ sambandhaḥ" | naiva |
pratītyanyathānupapattyā sambandhakalpanāt | pratītyabhāve kathaṃ sambandhaḥ | atha |

[410,3]

"jñāpakatvāddhi sambandhaḥ svātmajñānamapekṣate | tenāsau vidyamānopi nāgṛhītaḥ prakāśakaḥ | sarveṣāmanabhivyaktānāṃ pūrvapūrvaprayoktrṛtaḥ | siddhaḥ sambandha ityevaṃ sambandhādirna vidyata iti | "

[410,4]

tatrāha | "saṃkete"tyādi | "saṃkete"na "ta"sya sambandhasyā"bhivyaktau | asamarthā" niṣphalā saṃketā"danya"sya sambandhasya "kalpanā" |

etaduktambhavati | saṃkete satyarthapratīterutpattirasati cānutpattirityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ saṃketa evārthapratīteḥ kāraṇamiti kiṃ sambandhenānyena |

[410,6]

"ne"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "anabhivyakto" prakāśitortha"pratītihetuḥ | enamiti" sambandhaṃ"sa tarhī"ti sambandhaḥ | saṃketādevārthapratipādane "siddhe" sati "upasthātuṃ śīlaṃ" yasya sasambandhaḥ "kimakāra"ṇaṃ kasmānniṣphalaṃ poṣyate |

[411,1]

<10>naiṣphalyamevāha | "nanvi"tyādi | "iyāne"tāvanmātra eva | "yadarthe" vācye "pratīte"rjñānasya "jananaṃ | ta"tpratītijananaṃ "samayena kṛtamiti" niṣphalassambandhaḥ | "nāyogye samayassamarthaḥ" | kintarhi ya evārthapratipatyanyathānupapatyā pratipādakena samarthaḥ pratipannaḥ śabdastatraiva saṃketaḥ samartha iti "yogyatā samba"ndhaścet | taduktaṃ |

[411,2]

"śaktireva hi sambandho bhedaścāsyā na dṛśyate | sā hi kāryānumeyatvāt tadbhedamanuvarttate iti || saṃbaṃ0 28"

[411,3]

atrāha | "tatkimi"tyādi |

[411,4]

evammanyate | naikā śaktiḥ śabdārthayoḥ sthitā kintu śabdasthā hi vācakaśaktiranyārthe sthātuṃ vācyaśaktiranyaiva | yadā tu śabdaśaktiḥ sambandhastadā ya eva sambandhassa eva sambandhī prāpta iti pṛcchati | "tatkimvai śabdaḥ sambandhostu" |

[411,5]

nanvanyā hi yogyatā'nyaśca śabdastatkathaṃ śabdassambandha ityata āha |

[411,6]

yasmāt "samarthaṃ hi rūpaṃ śabda"syārthapratipādanaṃ prati "yogyatā | kāryakāraṇayogyatāvat" | kāryakaraṇāya yogyatā kāryakaraṇayogyatā | yathā kāraṇasyātmabhatā |
tadvat | "sā ce"diti yogyatā tataḥ śabdāda"rthāntaraṃ" tadā "kiṃ śabdasya" bhavatīti śabdayogyatayo"ssambandho vācyaḥ" | anyathā śabdasyeyaṃ yogyateti na sidhyet | yārthāntarabhūtā"yogyatā" tasyāṃ śabdasyo"pakāra iti cet" | śabdena yogyatāyā upakāraḥ kriyata iti yāvat | tena śabdajanyatvācchabdasya yogyatetyucyata iti bhāvaḥ | "na" śabdenopakāro yogyatāyāḥ | kutaḥ | "nityāyā" yogyatāyā "niratiśayatvāt" | atha yogyatāyā api śabdena vyatirikta evopakāraḥ kriyate | tadā tasya śabdakṛtasyopakārasya yogyatayā kaḥ sambandha iti vācyaṃ | athaṃ tatrāpyupakāre yogyatayānya upakāraḥ kriyate tadā "tatrāpyu"pakāre yathoktavidhinā'parāparasyopakārasya kalpanāyā"matiprasaṅgāt" |
tatonavasthāyā"mupakārāsiddheḥ" saiva yogyatayā saha śabdasya sambandhāsiddhiḥ | kiñca vyatiriktāṃ yogyatāmupakurvāṇaḥ śabdaḥ svarūpeṇaivopakaroti na pararūpeṇa | śabdasyānupakārakatvaprasaṃgāt | tadā "yogyatāyāṃ ca svataḥ" svarūpeṇa śabdasya "yogyatve'rtha eva"
śabdasvabhāvaḥ pratītijananayogyaḥ "kinneṣyate" | kiṃ pāramparyeṇeti yāvat | tasmānna yogyatā sambandho na ca sārthapratītihetuḥ | samavāyādevārthapratīteḥ |

[412,1]

bauddhasyāpi "tarhi samayaḥ kathaṃ śabdārthayossambandhaḥ" | kathaṃ ca na syāt"puruṣeṣu vṛtteḥ" | asyārthasyāyaṃ vācaka ityarthakathanaṃ sa ma yaḥ | sa ca puruṣeṣu varttate na śabdārthayoḥ | na cānyadharmonyasya dharmo'śvadharma iva goḥ |

<1>ā cā rya stu na kevalaṃ samayo na sambandhonyopi bhāvikaḥ sambandho nāstītyāha | "netyā"di | tathā hi bhāvānāṃ rūpaśleṣo vā sambandhaḥ syāt |
pāratantryaṃ vā parasparāpekṣaṇaṃ vā | ta"trāmiśrāṇā"mparasparabhinnānāṃ na kaścid rūpaśleṣalakṣaṇassambandhaḥ | teṣāmabhedaprasaṅgāt | ekatvāpatteḥ | tathā "siddhānāṃ"

"ne"tyādinā prativacanaṃ | "tadvacane" jātivacane "prayojanābhāvāditi nirloṭhitametada"nyāpo ha ci ntā yām 3 | 55

api pravarttata pumān vijñāyārthakriyākṣamān | ityatrāntare | "sarvatra cā"bhidhāne "jāterasambhavāt" kāraṇāt | jāticodanāyā "ayogaḥ" | yathā "yādṛcchikeṣu vyaktivāciṣu" bāhyaṃ nimittamantareṇa śabdaprayogecchā yadṛcchā | tasyāṃ bhavā yādṛcchikāḥ | teṣu devadattādiśabdeṣu vyaktivāciṣu | 234

[419,4]

5. catuṣṭayī śabdānāṃ pravṛttiriti keṣāṃciddarśanaṃ | jātiśabdā guṇaśabdāḥ kriyāśabdā yadṛcchāśabdā iti | teṣāṃ matenaitaduktaṃ | atha devadattādiśabdopyavasthābhedena jātivācaka iṣyate | tadā "sarvadā jātico"danebhyupagamyamāne "viśeṣāntaravyudāsena" vyaktyantaraparityāgena kvacidabhimate vyaktyantaraṃ "pravṛtyayogācca"
na jātyabhidhānaṃ | dṛṣṭā ca gosvāminā gāmānayetyukte'nyasvāmikagovyudāsena viniyatā eva gorānayanārthampravṛttiḥ sā caivaṃ syāt | yadi prakaraṇādinā gośabdo viśeṣavṛttiḥ syāt | na ca gorthasyānayanamastīti vākyārthapratītirapi na syāt |
tasmānna sarvatra jātiścodyate | yata evaṃ vāstavaḥ sambandho na saṃgacchate prakṛtibhinnānāṃ | "tasmādanvayavyatirekiṇa" iti bhāvābhāvavato bhāvasya kāryobhimatasya |
kāraṇābhimatabhāvābhāvadvāreṇa yau "bhāvābhāvau" sa eva "sambandhaḥ" janyajanakabhāvaevā bhinnānāṃ sambandha iti yāvat |

[420,1]

yata eva"mataḥ" kāraṇā"darthaiḥ" kāraṇabhūtaissaha kāryātmanāṃ "śabdānāṃ" sambandhaḥ "puruṣaiḥ"
kartṛbhi"rddhiyā" buddhyā "saṃskāryo" vyavasthāpyaḥ | arthe sati śabdasya prayogādasati cāprayogāt | atha "bhāvābhāvadvāreṇa" śabdasya yau "bhāvābhāvau" tāvā"śritya" buddhyā śabdārthayoḥ sambandho vyavasthāpyate iti vākyārthaḥ |

[420,2]

6. etadeva vyācaṣṭe | "tāveve"tyādi | arthadvāreṇa śabdasya yau "bhāvābhāvau"
tāvā"śritya" svabhāvenā"saṃsṛṣṭāvapi" śabdārthāvasambandhinau "saṃsṛṣṭau" sambaddhau "puruṣasya pratibhātaḥ" | vikalpabuddhau pratibhāsete | kutaḥ | "vyavahārabhāvanātaḥ" | anādikālīnavyavahārābhyāsataḥ | "iti" hetoḥ "pauruṣeyo bhāvānāṃ" śabdārthānāṃ saṃśleṣaḥ sambandhaḥ | vyavahāravāsanābalenāvasthāpyamānatvāta |

[420,3]

7. vastubhūtasambandhābhyupagame'yamaparo doṣa ityāha | "kiṃce"tyādi | vācyatvenābhimatasyā"śrayasya vināśāda"vinaṣṭe sambandhe | sa tasya vācakatvenābhimataḥ śābdo sambandhaḥ | nāsya sambandhostīti kṛtvā tadabhāvastasmādasambandhāt punara"pūrveṇa" vācyena "na yojyeta" | tataśco"tpannotpannāśca bhāvā avācyāḥ" syurasa"mbandhino yataḥ" | asambandhina eva kutaḥ | "sthitasambandhābhāvāt" | ye ya utpadyante teṣu teṣu na tāvadutpādāt pūrvaṃ sambandhaḥ sthito dviṣṭhasya tasya sambandhinamantareṇa sthānāyogāt | "tatrā"pītyādi | tatrāpyutpannotpanneṣvartheṣu "tairevārthaissaha" sambandhasyo"tpāde" | yosau paścādarthena sambandha utpadyate | tatsambandhisvabhāvatā pūrvannāsti sambandhābhāvāt paścāttu bhavatīti svabhāvaviparyayaḥ śabdānāṃ syāt | sa ca nityatvānna yujyate |

[421,1]

"athe"tyādi vyākhyānaṃ | pūrva"sambandhivināśe" vinaṣṭaḥ sambandho yasya śabdasya tasyā"rthāntare" paścādutpanne vaiguṇyaṃ sambandhavaikalyaṃ tasmāccā"rthānā"mpaścādutpannānāma"vācyatā mā bhūditi kṛtvotpannotpannorthaḥ sambandhavān" agṛhītasambandha eva "yadyutpadyeta" | tathāpi "sambandha utpannopi na śabde syāt" | śabdastena sambandhena tadvānna syāt | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | tasya śabdasya "tena" paścādutpannena "sambandhenāsambandhisvabhāvasya tadbhāvāyogāt" | tena sambandhena sambandhisvabhāvāyogāt |
kadā | "svabhāvaviparyayamantareṇa" | pūrvāsambandhisvabhāvatyāgamantareṇa doṣāntaramapyāha | arthena "sahotpannasya" ca sambandhasya śabdā"danyataḥ siddhasyānupakāriṇi śabde" tasyā"samāśrayatvācca" | tadbhāvāyoga eva | 234

[421,2]

atha "tasyāpi" śabdasya "tadutpattisahakāritve" sambandhotpattiṃ prati sahakāritve kalpyamāne | "samarthasya" śabdasya "nityotpādanaprasaṃgaḥ" | sarvakālaṃ sambandhajananaprasaṃgaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sahakāryanapekṣatvāt" | anapekṣatvaṃ puna"rnityasya" śabdasya sahakāribhi"ranupakārāt" | athāsamarthaḥ sahakāryapekṣayā janayet | tadā prāksambandhajananaṃ pratya"sāmarthyepi paścāda"pyarthe sannidhikālepya"śaktiḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ |
pūrvāsamartha"svabhāvātyāgāt" | vastubhūte "sambandhe" yo "doṣoyamvikalpite" buddhisandarśite sambandhe "nā"sti |

[421,3]

"na hī"tyādi vyākhyānaṃ | tada"pekṣā" teṣāmbhāvānāṃ parasparāpekṣā kutaścinnimittād buddhiparikalpitāt | "tallakṣaṇassambandhaḥ puruṣabhāvanāpratibhāsī" |
puruṣasya bhāvanābhyāsavatī vikalpabuddhistatra pratibhāsituṃ śīlamasyeti kṛtvā | sa caivaṃ pauruṣeyassambandho na bhāvaśleṣāpekṣī | bhāvaśleṣo miśratā tadapekṣī na bhavatisarveṣāmbhāvānāṃ prakṛtibhedena svasvarūpāvasthānāt | kevalaṃ "soyaṃ" puruṣo "nityānāmapi svabhāvamā"tmīya"maparāvartta"yanna sambandhisvabhāvaṃ sthiramapanīyānyaṃ sambandhisvabhāvamanādadhat | "kuta"ści"diti" tadbhāve kasyacid bhāvadarśanāt | antastathābhūtavyavahāravāsanāparipākādvā | "svayamutprekṣye"damiha sambandhamiti "ghaṭayediti" | puruṣavyavahārābhyāsāttepi nityābhimatāstathā syuḥ | puruṣopakalpitasambandhavantaḥ syuḥ | "na ca tāvatā te" pūrvavyavasthitādasambandhisvabhāvāc"cyavanadharmāṇaḥ" |

[422,1]

etaduktambhavati | buddhiparikalpitaḥ sambandhastvatparikalpitaḥ sambandhastvatparikalpiteṣvapi nityeṣu na virudhyate | tasmāt sa evāśrayituṃ yukto na vāstava iti | "yaduktaṃ prāgāśrayasyāpāyena" kāraṇenā"śritasya sambandhasya vināśādanityaḥ" sambandha"iti | tatrai"tasmin dūṣaṇe "nityatvāt" sambandhasyā"śrayāpāyepyanāśo yadi" jātivadityucyate | yathā jāte"rnityatvādāśrayanā"śepyanāśastadvat sambandhasyeti | 235

[422,2]

atrāpyāha | "nitye"ṣvāśrayābhimateṣu jātyādiṣvapi kāyaṣu kimā"śra"yasya"sāmarthya"nnaiva | "yeneṣṭaḥ so"kiñcitkara "āśrayaḥ | śrūyata" ityādi vivaraṇaṃ | śrūyata ityanena prasiddhimātrametannirvastukamityetadāha | vyaktyāśritā | kevala"nnityeṣu"
jātyādiṣvā"śrayasāmarthyamā"śrayakṛtamupakāranna "paśyāmo yenā"sāvāśrayābhimata "āśrayaḥ syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "kṛtasya" siddhasvabhāvasya "kāraṇābhāvāt | akārakasya cā"śraya"syānapekṣatvāt" | 236

[422,3]

āśrayāt sakāśā"jjāteḥ sambandhasya ca vyakti"rabhivyaktirūpasya tu yogyatā bhavati | saiva cāśrayakṛta "upakāra"stena kāraṇena padārtha "āśraya" iti cet |

[422,4]

uttaramāha | "jñāne"tyādi | "sahakāriṇāṃ jñānotpādanahetūnāṃ" pradīpādīnāṃ"sambandhād" yogyadeśāvasthānāt sakāśāt "tadutpādanayogyatvena" svānurūpajñānotpādanasāmarthyena "ghaṭādiṣvapi" vyaṃgyeṣu "yotpattiḥ" saiva "yuktijñai"rnyāyavidbhi"rvyaktiriṣyate" | jātyādīnāntu vyaṅgyānānnityatvā"davikāriṇāṃ" vyañjakātsakāśā"daviśeṣe" |
jñānotpādanayogyatānutpattau | "svairvyañja"kaisteṣāṃ jātyādīnāṃ "korthaḥ ka" upakāraḥ kṛtaḥ | naiva kaścit | yataste jātyādayastairvyañjakai"rvyaktā matāḥ" | 237

[423,1]

"sahakāriṇa" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | sahakāriṇaḥ pradīpādeḥ "sakāśāt" kimbhūtā"dupādānāpekṣāt" pūrvakojñānajananāsamarthoghaṭādilakṣaṇa upādānakāraṇaṃ samarthasya ghaṭādilakṣaṇasya ghaṭāpekṣatvāt | svaviṣaya"jñānajananaṃ" prati yogyasya "kṣaṇāntarasyotpattireva ghaṭādīnāmabhivyaktiḥ | anyathā" yadi pradīpādessakāśāt jñānotpādanayogyatāṃ na labhante ghaṭādayastadā"napekṣya tadupakāraṃ" pradīpopakāraṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ "jñānajananaprasaṅgāt" |

[423,2]

atha pradīpādiḥ prāgasamarthasya vyaṃgyasya sāmarthyaṃ karotītīṣyate | tadā "sāmarthyakāriṇaśca" pradīpāderghaṭādīnprati "janakatvāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" sāmarthyasya"tadātmakatvāda"vyaṃgyātmakatvāt | tasya janane ghaṭādireva janitaḥ syāt |

[423,3]

atha mābhūdeṣa doṣa iti pradīpādikṛtasya sāmarthyasya vyaṃgyādarthāntaratvamiṣyate | tadā"rthāntaratve ca" sāmarthyasyābhyupagamyamāne | bhāvasya ghaṭādeḥ pradīpādibhi"ranupakāraprasaṅgāt" | na hyanyasmin kṛtenya upakṛto bhavatyatiprasaṃgāt |
yacca pradīpādikṛtaṃ "sāmarthya"marthāntarantasmā"cca" ghaṭādi"jñānotpatte"ssāmarthyameva sarvakālaṃ gṛhyeteti svaviṣayajñānājananānāṃ "ghaṭādīnāṃ nityamagrahaṇa"prasaṅgāt | iṣyate ca ghaṭādīnāṃ grahaṇāt | tadāpyanālokāpekṣagrahaṇaprasaṃgāt | "ālokamanapekṣya"
ghaṭādīnāṅ"grahaṇamprasajyete"tyarthaḥ | ālokānapekṣaiva kathamiti cedāha | "anape"kṣetyādi | yeyaṃ ghaṭādīnāmālokānapekṣā prasaktā sā ā"tmānupakārāt" pradīpādibhirghaṭādyātmanonupakārād vyatiriktasya hi sāmarthyasya karaṇena ghaṭādīnāṃ kaścidupakāraḥ | "taditi" tasmād "ime" vyaṃgyāḥ "svaviṣayajñānajanane | para"mpradīpādi"kamapekṣamāṇāḥ | tata" iti parasmāt "svabhāvātiśayaṃ" jñānajananayogyaṃ svarūpaṃ "svīkurvanti | tena" kāraṇenāsya pradīpādeste vyaṃgyābhimatā "janyā eva" | yadi janyāḥ kasmād vyaṅgyā ityevamvyapadiśyanta ityāha | "jñeyarūpe"tyādi | vyañjakāt pradīpādessakāśājjñeyarūpasya grāhyarūpasyā"sādanā"llābhāttu kāraṇādavaśyaṃ tadviṣayaṃ jñānambhavati | ato "jñānavaśena | kāryātiśayavācinā" | agṛhītajñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāryātiśayastadvācinā vyaṃgyādi"śabdena" | anāgṛhītajñānebhyaḥ kāryemyo "viśeṣakhyātyartha" |
yadāvaśyakenopāttajñānantadeva janyamapi sad "vyaṅgyamityucyate" | yattu naivaṃbhūtantatkāryamevetyucyata ityevaṃ prasiddhyarthaṃ vyaṅgyāḥ khyāpyanta ityarthaḥ | "naivaṃ jātisambandhādaya" iti | jātiśca sambandhaśca tāvādī yeṣāṃ | ādiśabdādanyasyāpi nityābhimatasyāśritasya parigrahaḥ | "kathaṃcidā"śrayābhimatenā"nupakāryatvāt | tenānu" iti sambandhaḥ |

[424,1]

na ca sambandhastripramāṇaka iti darśayitumāha | "sambandhasya ca vastutve" sambandhibhyāṃ sambandhasya "bhedāt" tṛtīyaḥ sambandhākhyo bhāṃvo jātaḥ | sa ca yadyupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptastadā padārthatrayālambanatvena "syād buddhicitratā | sa cāyaṃ" śabdārthayo"ssambandho vastu bhavanniyamena śabdārthābhyāṃ bhedābhedau nātivarttate" krāmati | bhedābhedavyatiriktaḥ prakāro bhaviṣyatīti cedāha | "rūpaṃ hī"ti yato rūpaṃ svabhāvo vastu "tasya svabhāvasyātattvame"vātadbhāva "evānyattvamityuktaṃ" prāk | "rūpasyātadbhūtasyānyattvāvyatikramādi" tyatrāntare |

[425,1]

"sa cāyaṃ" sambandha aindriyaḥ san "svabuddhau" sambandhālambanāyāṃ buddhau | "tadanyaviveke"neti | tasmātsambandhā"danyassambandhī" tato "viveke"nārthāntareṇa "rūpeṇāpratibhāsamānaḥ kathantathā syāt" tadanyaviveki rūpaṃ kathaṃ syāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | dṛśyasya pratyakṣādarthādaviveko'pṛthagbhāvaḥ | yaccādarśanantayordṛśyā"vivekādarśanayo"ryathākramaṃ "vivekasattā viparyayāśrayatvāt" | vivekaviparyayo vivekābhāvastasya dṛśyāviveka āśrayaḥ |
sattāviparyayosattvantasya dṛśyādarśanamāśrayaḥ | tenāyamarthaḥ | yadyato bhedena nopalabhyate tattato nānyat | yadyat dṛśyaṃ sannopalabhyate tannāstīti yāvat |

[425,2]

"anyatheti" | yadyatorthāntaramabhyupagataṃ dṛśyaṃ ca tasya tasmādaviveke satyadarśane ca yadi vivekaḥ sattā ca kalpyate | tadā "tatsthite"ravivekābhāvayorvyavasthite"rabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ" | tathā hi dṛśyāvivekādarśane asyā vyavasthāyā nimitte | "te ceti" vivekābhāvayorna sādhanamiṣṭe tadā tadvyavasthocchidyate | "atīndriyatvāt" sambandhasya vivekena buddhāva"vapratibhāsanepi na" yathokta"doṣa indriyādivaditi cet" | yathendriyañcakṣurādi rūpādibhyo vivekena buddhau na pratibhāsate'tha ca vyatiriktamasti |
tadvat sambandho bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ

[425,3]

"ne"tyā cā ryaḥ | nātīndriyassambandhaḥ | "tato"tīndriyāt sambandhādarthasyā"pratipattiprasaṅgāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "aprasiddhasya" svena rūpeṇāniścitasyā"jñāpakatvāt" |
na hi yena saha yasya sambandho na gṛhyate taddvāreṇa tasya pratītiryuktā |

[425,4]

athājñāta eva sambandhorthaṃ jñāpayatīndriyavadityāha | sannidhimātreṇetyādi |
sambandhasya "sannidhimātreṇa" sattāmātreṇārtha"jñāpane"bhyupagamyamāne śabdārthasambandhampratya"vyutpannānāma"pyasyārthasyāyamvācaka iti pratipattiḥ "syāt" |

[425,5]

syānmatam | astyeva sambandhasya vivekenopalabdhiḥ | sā tu na pratyakṣātkintarhyanumānādityata āha | "nānumānāt pratipatti"ssambandhasya | kuto liṅgā"bhāvāt" | na hi sambandhasādhanaṃ kiñcilliṅgamasti | arthapratītirapi na liṅgaṃ"dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ" | na hi kvacid dṛṣṭānte sambandhakāryā'rthapratītiḥ pratipannā | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tatrāpi" dṛṣṭāntatvenopanīte sambandhasyā"tīndriyatvena" kāraṇena "sādhanāpekṣaṇāt" | na cāsti sādhanaṃ | tatrāpi dṛṣṭāntāsiddheḥ |

[426,1]

tadetad dṛṣṭāntarahitatva"mindriyādi"ṣvatīndriyeṣu sattāsādhakenumāne kriyamāṇe"tulyamiti cet | na" tulyaṃ | kutaḥ | "teṣā"mindriyādīnā"manyathānumānāt" | napratyakṣāṇāmindriyādīnāmidantayā kiṃcid rūpaṃ prasādhyate | yena tulyo doṣaḥ syāt |
kintu "jñānaṃ" kāryabhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ "keṣucidā"lokādiṣu "satsu" vyatirekā"nvayavat" | nimīlitalocanādyavasthāsu "vyaṃtirekavat" | unmīlitalocanādyavasthāsamanvayavat |
tadevaṃbhūtaṃ jñānaṃ kāryantanmātrāsambhavaṃ | yeṣu satsvapyabhavad dṛṣṭa"ntanmātrādasambhava"manutpattimātmanaḥ sādhayati | "tadvyatiriktāpekṣāṃ ca" | yathā sannihitakāraṇād vyatiriktakāraṇāpekṣāñca "sādhayati" |

[426,2]

asti kimapi kāraṇāntaramiti | "tato" yathoktānvayāt"kāryadvāreṇendriyasiddhiḥ" | kāraṇāntaravaikalyāsambhavinaścāṃkurādayotra dṛṣṭāntaḥ | "naivaṃ sambandhasya"
cakṣurādivatkāryavyatirekeṇānumānaṃ | viśeṣānumānāt | tathā hi sambandhostīti yadanumānantadviśeṣasyaivānumānaṃ |

[426,3]

taccāyuktaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyaiva" sambandhasyā"siddhau" satyā"ntatkāryasyaiva"
sambandhakāryasyaiva "jñānasyābhāvāt" | śabdārtho liṅgamiti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi |
na hi "tatra" sambandhaviśeṣe "śabdarūṃpamartho vā liṅgaṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tayoḥ" śabdārthayo"ssarvatra yogyatvāt" | sarvasya śabdasya sarvasminnarthe vācakatveṃna yogyatvāt sarvasya cārthasya sarvasmin śabde vācyatvena yogyatvāt | arthaviśeṣapratīteśca kāraṇaṃ sambandhaviśeṣastasya cā"rthaviśeṣapratītisamāśrayasya" sambandhasyāniyatābhyāṃ śabdārthābhyāma"pratyāyanāt" | pratyāyane vā viśeṣābhāve na sarvasambandhapratītaḥ sarvārthagatiḥ syāt | na caivam | tasmādaniyatābhyāṃ śabdārthābhyāmapratītirasya sambandhasya |

[427,1]

yadi ca śabdārthānāṃ sambandhena saha sambandhaviśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ syāt kvacittadā sambandhaviśeṣapratītiḥ syāt | "na hyasatyāṃ sambandhaviśeṣeṇa" śabdānāṃ sambandhasiddhau sā sambandhaviśeṣapratīti"ryuktā" |

[427,2]

atha punassambandhamantareṇa śabdāt sambandhaviśeṣapratītiriṣyate "tasyāmvā"
sambandhapratītā"vanimittāyā"miṣyamāṇāyā"ntadviśeṣaḥ pratītiniyamavat" sambandhaviśeṣapratītipratiniyamavad artha"pratipādanamapyanimittaṃ śabdānāṃ kinneṣyate" |
tacchabdārthasvabhāvaṃ "liṅgaṃ sadṛśantulyaṃ sarvasambandhe | tataścāviśeṣeṇa" śabdaḥ"sarvaṃ sambandhaṅgamayet tadā'viśeṣeṇaiva sarvasyārthasya pratītiḥ syāt" | sarvasya puruṣasya gṛhītasamayasyāgṛhītasamayasya sarvārthapratītiḥ syāt | "tasmād" yathoktena nyāyena "sambandhasiddhyā'rthapratīteḥ" kāraṇānna "kaścit" puruṣorthapratītau "saṃpradāyaṃ"
paropadeśa"mapekṣeta" |

[427,3]

na kevalasya śabdasya sambandhasiddhau liṅgatvaṃ kintu "saṃpradāyasahitasya liṅgatvamiti cet | tatki"midānī"manayā paramparayā" | sampradāyastataḥ śabdasya liṅgatvantasmāt sambandhapratītistatorthasya pratyāyanamiti kimanayā paramparayā | "sa eva"
śabdaḥ kevalo vastubhūtasambandharahitassa"mpradāyāpekṣorthajñāpanaṃ kinna karoti" yena sambandhoparaḥ kalpyate |

[427,4]

ata evārthapratītyanyathānupapattyāpi śaktisambandhakalpanā nirastā | śaktimantareṇa saṃketabalādevārthapratītisambhavāt | tena "sambandhastripramāṇaka" iti yaducyate tadapāstaṃ |

[428,1]

"sa ca śabdo yadabhiprāyai"ryadarthapratipādanābhiprāyaiḥ puruṣaiḥ "prayujyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ"
samayakāle'"nyathā na dṛṣṭa iti" vivakṣitārthaviparyayeṇa prayujyamāno na dṛṣṭaḥ | etenānvayavyatirekāvuktau | 238

[428,2]

iti yathoktābhyā"ndarśanādarśanābhyā"ntasyārthasya "pratītiñjanayati dhūmādivat" |
sa eva darśanādarśanaśabdābhyāṃ sūcitaḥ śabdārthayora"vinābhāvākhyaḥ sambandhaḥ | na cātrā"pratītijanane yathoktamavinābhāvaṃ muktvā"nyasya" vastubhūtasya sambandhasya "sāmarthyampaśyāmaḥ" | nāpi tasya sambandhasya siddhyupāyaṃ siddhinimittaṃ kiṃcit paśyāmaḥ |

[428,3]

evantāvat sambandhibhyāṃ sambandhabhedābhyupagame doṣamuktvā'bhedābhyupagamepi doṣamāha | "athe"tyādi | "tābhyā"miti sambandhibhyāṃ sambandhasyā"bhede" sati | "tāveva"
sambandhināveva śabdārthau kevalamiti na sambandho nāma kaścit | tattvānyattvarahitastarhi sambandho bhaviṣyatīti cedāha | "nā"ta ityādi | atastettvānyatvavikalpā"danyā" nāsti "vastuno gatiḥ" |

[428,4]

"rūpe"tyādi viraṇaṃ | "rūpabhedaḥ" svabhāvabhedaḥ | ta"nnibandhanatvād" vyavasthāntarasyeti svabhāvāntaravyavasthānasya | yattu na bhinnarūpaṃ kintu tadrūpaṃ sambandhirūpameveṣṭaṃ sambandhākhyamvastu | tattadeva syāt | sambandhisvabhāvameva syānnānyat |
kathantarhyanayoḥ sambandha iti pratītirityāha | "dharmabhedastu" parikalpitaḥ "syāt |
pūrvoktena krameṇā"nyāpohavihitena vyāvṛttibhedasamāśrayeṇa | "sa ca" vyāvṛttibhedaḥ |
kalpanākṛta ekasminnapya"viruddhaḥ | na tu vastubheda" ekatrāviruddhaḥ kintu viruddha "eva" |
ekasya paramārthena nānātvāyogāt "na bhedābhedau muktvā vastunonyā gatiḥ" |

[429,1]

kutasta"sya vastuno" rūpala"kṣaṇatvāt" svabhāvalakṣaṇatvāt | "rūpasya caitad vikalpānativṛtteḥ" | bhedābhedavikalpānativṛtteḥ | "bhinnatvād vasturūpasya" śabdārthasvarūpasya | na rūpaśleṣalakṣaṇassa"mbandho" bhāvikaḥ kintu "kalpanākṛta evetyuktaṃ prāk" | "puruṣasya vyavahārābhyāsādasaṃsṛṣṭāvapi saṃsṛṣṭau tau bhāsete tadvaśātsambandhavyavasthetyā" dinā | "na hi śleṣalakṣaṇassambandhinoḥ" parasparammiśratālakṣaṇaḥ sambandho'"śliṣṭeṣva"saṃsṛṣṭeṣu "padārtheṣu sambhavati" | śabdārthānāṃ rūpaśleṣādarthāntarameva tṛtīyamvastu sambandha ityāha | "na ce"tyādi | 239

[429,2]

yasmānniṣpannaṃ sat tadarthāntaram"parādhīnaṃ" kathaṃ | sambandhādhīnaṃ kathambhavet |
sambandhādhīnaśca sambandha iṣyate dviṣṭhatvāt | nāpi tadarthāntaramparaśleṣarūpatvātsambandho yujyata ityāha | "dravya"mpadārthāntarañca"kathamanyasya" sambandhinaḥ "sambandhaḥ " |

[429,3]

etenārthāntaratve sambandhasya sambandhyāśritatvamparaśleṣarūpatvañca yatpareṇeṣṭantadubhayaṃ nirastaṃ |

[429,4]

yadi nāmārthāntaraṃ kasmāt parādhīnaṃ na bhavatītyāha | "na hī"tyādi | yasmānna hi siddhaṃ "sat paramapekṣate" | niṣpannasya sarvanirāśaṃsatvāt | "anapekṣatvena svatantraścā"nyasya "na sambandhaḥ" | na cārthāntaraṃ sambandho yujyate | yasmād "dravyamiti svabhāva ucyate" padārthāntaramevocyate | "sa kathaṃ parabhāvasya" sambandhinoḥ "śleṣaḥ syāt" | naiva syāt | nāpi śleṣaheturbhavati | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | yasmā"nna svabhāvāntarasya" tṛtīyasya "sattayānyaḥ" sambandhinoḥ svabhāvaḥ "śliṣṭo nāmābhūdaśliṣṭe"nāsambaddhena sambandhākhyena śliṣṭo bhāvaḥ | "śliṣṭena tu" śliṣṭaḥ "syāditi cet" |

[429,5]

"nai"tadevaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyaiva" sambandhākhyasya "tābhyāṃ" sambandhibhyāṃ "śleṣā"mbandhaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ san tau sambandhinau "śleṣayet | tadaya"mityādi | "yadyarthāntareṇa" tṛtīyena sambandhinau "śliṣyatastadātiprasaṃgaḥ" | sarvo yena kenacit tṛtīyena śliṣṭaḥ syāt | "viśeṣābhāvāt" | na hi sambandhābhimatasyānyasya ca padārthāntareṇa sambaddhatve kaścid viśeṣosti | 240

[430,1]

"kiñca | varṇṇā" ye "santo" vastusantaste tāva"nnirarthakā"stato na te vācakāstena na tatra vācyavācakasambandhasya vṛttiḥ | padādestarhi sārthakatvāt tatra sambandhavṛttirbhaviṣyatītyāha | "padādiparikalpita"mādiśabdād vākyamvācakambhavet | tasmiṃśca parikalpite pade vākye vā'vastunyavastusvabhāve | kathaṃ "sambandhasya" vācyavācakatvalakṣaṇasya "vastuno" vastusvabhāvasya "kathampravṛtti"rnaiva |

[430,2]

"vācako hī"tyādi vivaraṇaṃ | vācako hi "vacanāṃgeno"ktinimittena sambandhākhyena "tadvān" sambandhavān "syāt | santopi" vidyamānā api "varṇṇāḥ" pratyekamarthāpratipādakatvāt | sāhityābhāvāt | nānāprayoktṛprayuktebhyaścārthapratipattyadarśanā"davācakāḥ" |

[430,3]

"tadi"ti tasmā"nna teṣu" varṇṇeṣu "vācyavācakabhāvasambandho varttate | tadvṛttau" teṣu vācakeṣu varṇṇeṣu sambandhasya vṛttau satyāṃ sambandhasya yaṃdvācakatvāṅgatvantasya hāniprasaṅgāt |

[430,4]

"kramaviśeṣeṇā"nupūrvī viśeṣeṇaikaprayoktṛprayuktā "varṇṇā eva vāca"kāstato na yathoktadoṣa "iti cet" | taduktaṃ | "yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca yadarthapratipādane | varṇṇāḥ prajñātasāmarthyāste tathaivāvabodhakāḥ || sphoṭa0 69"
etadeva spaṣṭayati |

[430,5]

[431,1]

kiñcārthapratyāyanaṃ prati |

[431,2]

"avaśyambhāvinī nityaṃ pratyāsattiśca kasyacit | na tāvatā vyapetatvāditareṣāmanaṅgatā || sphoṭa0 83yathā visarjanīyasya vyavadhāne na śaktatā | tathaiva śaktiranyeṣāmānantarye na vidyate || sphoṭa0 85na ca yatraikaśo'śaktistatra sarveṣāma śaktatā | rathāṅgāni hi dṛśyante śaktāni vahanādiṣviti || sphoṭa0 86"

[431,3]

netyādinā parihāramāha | naitadevaṃ | yasmād varṇṇebhyaḥ kramasyānarthāntaratvaṃ syādarthāntaratvamvā | tatra prathame pakṣe "kramasyānarthāntaratvena" kāraṇe"nābhedakatvāda"viśeṣakatvāt | na hi yadyatonarthāntarantattatsvabhāvasya bhedakambhavati | tataśca"tadrūpasya" varṇṇātmakasya kramasya | rasa ityatra yadrūpantataḥ "kramāntare" sā ityetasmi"nnapi"
varṇṇava"daviśeṣāt tulyā" syādartha"pratipatiḥ" |

[431,4]

vyatiriktastarhi varṇṇebhyaḥ krama ityata āha "arthāntaratvama"pīti | varṇṇebhyorthāntaratvamapi "kramasya paścāt niṣetsyamānatvāt" | yato na yugapadutpannānāmvarṇṇānāṃ kramaḥ sambhavatyapratīteḥ | ayugapadutpannānāmapi nārthāntarabhūtaḥ kramo'yugapadutpādasyaiva kramarūpatvāt | tathā hi laukikāḥ kramaṃ kathayanto'yugapadutpādameva kathayanti | "tasmā"dayugapadutpāda eva kramaḥ | nāpi kramo'yugapadutpannayorekasya dharma ekapratītau kramasyāpratīteḥ | nāpyubhayadharmaḥ | ekakālamubhayasyāsattvādasataśca kathaṃ dharmaḥ |
tasmāt pūrvāparayorbhāvayoḥ svarūpameva krama ucyate iti vakṣyati | pūrvāpararūpe ca krame tathāpi na varṇṇāḥ krameṇārthādhigamanimittambhavaṃti | pratyekamarthāpratipādakatvāt | sāhityābhāvāt | niyatakramavarttināmayaugapadyena sambhūya kāritvānupapatteśca | syādetad | yathā kevalasya bījasyāṃkuraṃ pratyakārakatvepi sahakārisannidhāne viśiṣṭatvāt kārakatvaṃ | tathā varṇṇāḥ pratyekamasamarthā apyānupūrvīviśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭā arthapratītihetava iti |

[432,1]

tadayuktaṃ | antyasya hi varṇṇasya varṇṇāntarasahitasya kevalasya coccāraṇe ko viśeṣo yatkṛtāvarthapratītibhāvābhāvau syātāṃ |

[432,2]

nanvayameva viśeṣo ye sahitāsahita te |

[432,3]

sattyaṃ | kāryakaraṇe hi khalu teṣāṃ sāhityaṃ | na ca te yadā santastadā vyāpriyanterthapratītau | pratyekamasamarthatvāt | nāpyanyavarṇṇakāle'sattvāt |

[432,4]

eṣa tarhi viśeṣo yeyaṃ kvacit pravṛttā pūrvavarṇṇopalabdhiḥ kvacinneti |

[432,5]

naitadapi sāraṃ | na hi pravṛttāpūrvavarṇṇopalabdhirantyamvarṇṇambhettumarhatyasattvāt |
aviśeṣe ca yatra kārye varṇṇānāṃ pratyekamaśaktistatra sahitānāmapyaviśeṣāt |
andhānāmivādityadarśane |

[432,6]

tena na ca yatraikaśo śaktirityādi nirastaṃ | rathāṅgānāṃ hi viśeṣotpattau satyāṃ sāhityāvasthāyāmvahanādau sāmarthyamanyathā pratyekavat sāhityepi sāmarthyanna syāt |
na ca parasparamvarṇṇānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yena pūrve varṇṇāḥ pāramparyeṇārthapratītau śaktāḥ syuḥ | nāpi pūrvavarṇṇajanitasaṃskārasahitasyāntyasya varṇṇasyārthapratītihetutvāt pūrvavarṇṇānāṃ pāramparyeṇa sāmarthyaṃ | varṇṇānubhavāhitasaṃskārasya varṇṇeṣveva smṛtihetutvānnārthe | na hi gavānubhavāhitasaṃskāro'śve smaraṇamupakalpayati |
na ca pūrvavarṇṇāhitasaṃskārasahitāntyavarṇṇadarśane satyarthapratīterdṛṣṭavāt taddhetutvaṃ |
saṃketābhāverthapratīterabhāvāt | saṃketaśca sāmānyaviṣayo na varṇṇasvalakṣaṇaviṣaya iti kathamvarṇṇāḥ kramaviśeṣeṇa vācakāḥ |

[432,7]

kiñca | kevalasya varṇṇasyārthāpratipādakatve saṃskārasahitasyāpi na tat syāt | viśeṣānutpatteḥ | tatkathaṃ kaścidvarṇṇaḥ sākṣādarthapratipādane samarthaḥ kaścit pāramparyeṇetyucyate | yadapyucyate |

[432,8]

"itthaṃ kramagṛhītānāṃ yugapad yāthavā sthitiḥ | tataḥ sā kāraṇaṃ naḥ syānnityamarthadhiyamprati || "

[432,9]

evaṃ kramapratipannānāmvarṇṇānāṃ nityatvād vyāpitvāccākāśadeśe yā yugapat sthitiravasthānantadeva nimittamarthapratītiṃ pratīti |

[432,10]

tadayuktaṃ | pratīyamāno hi śabdārthaṃ pratipādayati na sannidhānamātreṇa | sarvapadārthapratipādanaprasaṅgāt | na caikakarttṛkāṇāṃ yaugapadyaṃ pratibhāsate | nāpi nityatvaṃ vyāpitvaṃ ca yujyata iti vakṣyatītyasārametat |

[433,1]

yaccāpyucyate | "yadvā pratyakṣataḥ pūrvaṃ kramajñāteṣu yatparaṃ | samastavarṇṇavijñānantadarthajñānakāraṇaṃ || tatra jñāne ca varṇṇānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ pratīyate | nāvaśyaṃ yaugapadyena pratyakṣasthena tad bhavet || "
yatparamityuttaraṃ pūrvāparaparāmarśe"ṇa" samastavarṇṇaviṣayaṃ vijñānantadarthapratītinimittaṃ | tadbhavedityarthapratipādanambhavedanyenāpi yaugapadyajñānenārthapratipādanambhavedityartha iti |

[433,2]

etadapyayuktaṃ | kramo hi prayoktṛprayukto na yaugapadyaṃ | prayoktṛprayuktāvasthebhyaśca varṇṇebhyorthapratītiriti na yaugapadyādarthapratītiḥ syāt | sakramāṇāñca varṇṇānāṃ yaugapadyena grahaṇe bhrāntatvaprasaṃgāt | na ca teṣāṃ yaugapadyamasti nityatvāyogāditi |

[433,3]

"citrarūpāṃ ca tāṃ buddhiṃ sadasadvarṇṇagocarāṃ | kecidāhuryayā varṇṇo gṛhyate'ntyaḥ pade pade || sphoṭa0 11"

[433,4]

pratipadamantyo varṇṇo yayā buddhyā gṛhyate sā sannihitāsannihitavarṇṇaviṣayatvena smaraṇapratyakṣarūpābhyāmubhayarūpeti kecidāhuḥ |

[433,5]

tadapyayuktam | ekasya jñānasya pratyakṣāpratyakṣarūpavirodhāt | na ca pratyakṣamevaikaṃ sadasadvarṇaviṣayaṃ | abhāvaviṣayatvavirodhāt | nāpi smṛtirūpaṃ sannihitaviṣayatvenāniṣṭatvāt | ata eva ca padādigrāhakajñānaṃ kalpitaviṣayaṃ syāditi |

[433,6]

anye tvantyavarṇṇaparijñāne sati pūrvavarṇṇānubhavāhitasaṃskāraprabodhakāritaṃ smaraṇaṃ sarvavarṇeṣvarthapratyāyakamācakṣate | tadāha |

[433,7]
