[433,8]

"sarveṣu caivamartheṣu mānasaṃ sarvavādināṃ | iṣṭaṃ samuccayajñānaṃ kramajñānaṣu satsvapi || spho0 113tena śrotramanobhyāṃ ca kramād varṇṇeṣu yadyapi | pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ parastāttu yugapat smaraṇambhavet || tadāruḍhāstato varṇṇā na dūrerthāvabodhanāt | śabdādarthamatistena laukikairabhidhīyata iti || "

[434,1]

etadapyayuktaṃ | ekakarttṛprayuktānāmevārthapratipādakatvenāyugapadvarttināmevārthapratipādakatvāt | na ca smaraṇaviṣayāṇāṃ varṇṇānāṃ yaugapadyamadhyavasīyate | niyatakramāṇāmeva smaryamāṇatvāt | nāpi smṛtyā varṇṇasvalakṣaṇagrahaṇampratyakṣavat spaṣṭapratibhāsābhāvāt | ekasya ca spaṣṭāspaṣṭānekākārāyogācca | kevalaṃ smaraṇenāspaṣṭasvabhāvānāmvarṇṇānāṃ svākārarūpāṇāṃ bāhyavarṇṇābhedenādhyavasāyāt bāhyavarṇṇānāmeva vācakatvamucyate | avāhyeṣu ca varṇṇeṣu bāhyavarṇṇādhyavasāyena padādiparikalpitamasmābhiriṣyate |

[434,2]

evaṃ mī māṃ sa ka pakṣe varṇṇānāṃ vācakatve niraste padādyapi nirastameva |
varṇṇādivyatirekeṇa padāderabhāvāt | taduktaṃ |

[434,3]

na varṇṇavyatirekeṇa padamanyaddhi vidyate | vākyamvarṇṇapadābhyāṃ ca vyatiriktanna kiñcaneti ||

[434,4]

saṃprati vaiyākaraṇānāṃ varṇṇādivyatiriktampadādi nirākarttumāha | "tadasatīti" | tadityupanyāse | tasmādarthe vā | "asati varṇṇānāmvācakatve padādi vācakaṃ syāttacca" padādi "na kiñcit" | kiṃ kāraṇam | varṇṇebhyastasya padāde"rvyatirekāvyatirekayorvirodhāt" | vyatireke bhedenopalambhaḥ syād dṛśyasya |

[434,5]

yata eva"ntasmāt | indriyavijñānaviśeṣaḥ" kramavarṇṇagrāhipaṭīyaḥ śrotravijñānantadanu"bandhī" tadanubhavadvārāyātaḥ | sabhāgavāsanā sajātīyavikalpaśaktirupādānaṃ yasya vikalpasya sa tathoktaḥ | "sabhāgavāsanopādāna"ścāsau "vikalpaśca tasya" pratibhāsavibhramaḥ | pratibhāsa"bhrāntireva padaṃ" vākyaṃ "caikāvabhāsi mithyaiva" |

[435,1]

etaduktambhavati | kramavarṇṇānubhavapṛṣṭhabhāvi manovijñānantān varṇṇān padādirūpatayaikasvabhāvānadhyavasyatīti padādiparikalpitaṃ mithyaiva |

utpadyate ca | tasmād varṇṇeṣvekapadādyanubhavena bhāvyamiti |

[435,3]

naiṣa doṣaḥ | pratipādako hi saṃketakāle varṇṇakramamekapadādirūpatayā pratipannameva paraṃ pratyekamidaṃ padādīti saṃketayati | tadā ca parasyāpi tatra varṇṇakrame ekapaṃdādhyāropikā buddhirutpadyate | tasya caikapadādyadhyāropitaikākārānubhavāhitasaṃskārasya puṃso vyavahārakālepi varṇṇakramaśravaṇādekamidaṃ padamvākyamvetyekākārasya vikalpasyotpattirbhavati | evaṃ pūrvapūrvaśrotṝṇāṃ pūrvapūrvavaktṛbhyo varṇṇakrameṣvekatvāropeṇa pratītirbhavatītyanāditvaṃ padādivyavahārasya |

[435,4]

ata evocyate | anādisabhāgavāsano vikalpapratibhāsavibhramaḥ padaṃ vākyaṃ caikāvabhāsi mithyaiveti | mithyātvaṃ ca bhinnānāmvarṇṇānāmekapadādirūpatayā smaraṇajñāne pratibhāsanāt | tāvataś"caikānekatvayo"rvirodhe"nāyogāt" |

[435,5]

atha syādekameva padādi pratyakṣagrāhyantatkathaṃ mithyeti |

[435,6]

tadayuktaṃ | yasmānna hyekaṃ padādi | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "anekayā" varṇṇakramagrāhiṇyā"buddhyā" krameṇa "grahaṇāyogāt" | ekatve hye"kayaiva" buddhyā sakṛd "gṛhyeta" | na tvekayaiva buddhyā padādergrahaṇamiti cedāha | "na tadekaye"tyādi | "tat" padādi | "naikayā" buddhyā"grāhyaṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "varṇṇānukrameṇa" varṇṇaparipāṭyā padavākyayo"rgrahaṇāt" |

[435,7]

ekavarṇṇarūpantarhi padamekabuddhigrāhyambhaviṣyatītyata āha | "ekavarṇṇe"tyādi |
ekavarṇaniṣpattikāle"pyanekabuddhivyatikramā"nnaikavarṇṇaḥ | tathā hi bhāgityukte'rddhamātrākālo niracko gakāraḥ pratīyate | sāckastu mātrākālaḥ pratīyata iti kathamekavarṇṇarūpaṃ padamvidyate yadekabuddhigrāhyaṃ syāt | tena yaducyate | sakalameva "gṛhṇā"ti |

[435,8]

"alpīyasāpi yatnena śabdamuccaritammatiḥ | yadi vā naiva gṛhṇāti varṇṇamvā sakalaṃ sphuṭaṃ | pṛthak ca nopalabhyante varṇṇasyāvayavāḥ kvaciditi | "

[435,9]

tadapāstaṃ | yathoktena nyāyena sāvayavatvād varṇṇasya | na caikayā buddhyā kramavatāṃ varṇṇabhāgānāṃ grahaṇaṃ "kṣaṇikatvād buddhīnāṃ" |

[436,1]

syādetad | yāvatā kālena varṇṇaniṣpattistāvatkāla ekaḥ kṣaṇastata ekayā buddhyā padasya grahaṇambhaviṣyatītyata āha | "kṣaṇasye"tyādi | yāvatā kālenaikaḥ paramāṇuḥ paramāṇvantaramatikrāmati tāvatkālatvāt kṣaṇasya | vibhāgarahitaḥ kālaḥ sa "caikaparamāṇvatikramakāla" eva yujyate | yathoktātkālādā"dhikye" kṣaṇasyābhyupagamyamāne | "vibhāgavataḥ" śakyavibhāgasya kṣaṇasya kālapa"ryavasānāyogāt" |
tenaikasyāpyatiniṣkṛṣṭasya varṇṇasyānekakṣaṇena "niṣpattiḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "aneke"tyādi | "anekasyā"ṇorvyatyayo vyatikramo yasminnimeṣe so"nekāṇuvyatyayo nimeṣaḥ" |
tena tulya"kālatvāda"ntyasya "niṣkṛṣṭasyā"pyākārāde"rvarṇṇasya" parisamāpteḥ | tasmānnaikavarṇṇarūpaṃ padamekabuddhigrāhyaṃ | nāpyanekātmakamekapadaṃ smṛtigrāhyaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yathānubhavaṃ smaraṇāt" | yathānubhavo varṇṇānāmanukrameṇa tathā smṛtirapi tatra kramabhāvinyeveti "smṛtirapi tatkālaiva" | sa evānubhavakramakālosyā iti kṛtvā |
etaccānyāṃ pravṛttimadhikṛtyoktamabhyāsavatyāntu pravṛttau krameṇānubhūtānāmapi varṇṇānāṃ yadyapi yugapatsmaraṇambhavati tathāpyanu"bhavasmaraṇānukramayorviśeṣānupalakṣaṇācca naikampadādi" | tenāyamarthaḥ | anubhave yoyamvarṇṇānāmanukramaḥ pratibhāsate smaraṇe ca yo varṇṇānukramaḥ pratibhāsate tayorviśeṣo bhedo nopalakṣyate'taḥ kathamekaṃ padādyekabuddhigrāhyamucyate |

[436,2]

nāpyanekameva padādi | kiṃ kāraṇam | "abhedapratibhāsatvāt buddheḥ" | abhedenaikatvena pratibhāsanād buddheḥ padavākyākārāyāḥ tathā hi pade vākye coccārite ekamidaṃ padaṃ vākyaṃ ceti lokasya matirbhavati |

nānekameva padādi | "tadi"ti tasmād | ekānekatvena pratibhāsanādekānekayorvirodhenāyogāt padādi "na vastu" | yadvā tatpadādi na vastu | ekānekatvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tasya vastunaḥ "etadvikalpānatikramāt" | yasmād vastvekarūpaṃ vā syādanekarūpaṃ vā kadācit syānna tūbhayarūpaṃ virodhāt | "vastu ca" śabdārtha"sambandhaḥ"
pareṇeṣṭaḥ "sa kathantadāśrayaḥ syāt" | avastubhūtapadavākyāśrayaḥ syāt | tatpadavākyamāśrayosyeti vigrahaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | asattvena padāde"rāśrayaṇīyasyāyogāt" | evamityāśrayaṇīyā"bhāve'nāśritaḥ" sambandhaḥ "syāt | tathā cā"nāśritatvā"dasambandhaḥ" sambandhaḥ"syāt" | sambandhipāratantryābhāvāt |

yata eva"ntasmānna svābhāviko"pauruṣeyaḥ "śabdārthayossambandhaḥ" | kintu pauruṣeya eva sambandhaḥ | yasmāt | "tadabhiprāyasyā"rthapratipādanābhiprāyasya yaḥ "prayogāntaḥ"
parispandādiḥ | tasmā"dutpannaḥ" śabda etat svadarśanenoktaṃ | "abhivyakto vā śabda"

[437,3]

"apauruṣeyatāpi" vedavākyānāṃ mī māṃ sa kai "riṣṭā | karttṛṇāṃ" vedasya praṇetṝṇā"masmṛte"rliṅgāt | "kila" śabdaścāyuktatākhyāpanāya |

[437,4]

"yāpī"tyādi vyākhyānaṃ | bahūnāmarthānāṃ karttā na smaryate | na ca te tāvatā'kṛtakāḥ | tadyathā jīrṇṇakūpādayaḥ | evaṃ hetorvyabhicārādayuktarūpā"pīyamapauruṣeyatā |
vedavākyānāṃ kartturasmaraṇād varṇyate" jai mi ni nā | asyaivamvidhasya vastunaḥ "santya"dyatvepya"nuvaktāra" iti | kimatra vaktavyaṃ kevalaṃ "dhigvyāpakantamaḥ" | tathā hi |
yaḥ kartturasmaraṇādapauruṣeyatāmāha jai mi niḥ | "tasyaiva tāvadī"dṛśamatisthalaṃ "prajñā" jāta"miti" kṛtvā saha vismayenānukampayā varttata iti "savismayānukampaṃ nosmākaṃ cetaḥ" | śrutavatopyevamavidyāvilasitamiti savismayaṃ | gāḍhenāvidyābandhena sattvāḥ pīḍyanta iti kṛtvā sānukampaṃ | tadatrā"parepī"dānīntanmatānusāriṇaḥ ku mā ri la prabhṛtayaḥ parīkṣakaṃmanyā evametada"nuvadantīti nirdayaṃ niṣkṛpamākrāntaṃ bhuvanaṃ" jagad yena "tamasā" tattathoktaṃ dhigvyāpakantamaḥ | ajñānasyaivātra dhigvādo yukto na prāṇinaḥ | yasmāt "kaḥ prāṇina" evaṃ vādinopi "hitepsāvipralabdhasya" hitaprāptīcchayā vipralabdhasya visamvāditasyā"parādhaḥ" | kintvajñānasyaivāyandoṣaḥ | kiṃ punastasyaivamvadataḥ prajñāskhalitaṃ |

[438,1]

yasmādidaṃ sādhanamasiddhamanaikāntikañca | 242

tatrāsiddhamadhikṛtyāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | smaranti sau ga tā vedasya "karttṛna ṣṭa kā dīn" | ādiśabdād vā ma ka vā ma de va vi śvā mi tra prabhṛtīn | "hiraṇyagarbha" bra hmā ṇaṃ vedasya karttāraṃ "smaranti kā ṇā dā vaiśeṣikāḥ" | tataścāsiddhaṃ kartturasmaraṇaṃ | "teṣāṃ" saugatānāñca sa vedasya karttṛsmaraṇavādo "mithyāvā"dastataḥ |
siddhiheto"riti cet | ka idānī"mvedādanyopi "pauruṣeyaḥ" śabdaḥ | na kaścit pauruṣeya ityarthaḥ | "eva"miti karttuḥ smaraṇavādasya mithyātve | etadeva spaṣṭayannāha |
ku mā ra sa mbha ve tyā diṣvityādi | "kumārasambhavādiṣu" grantheṣu kā li "dā sā daya ātmānamanyamvā praṇetāraṃ" karttāraṃ "vyapadiśanto yadevamprativyūhyeran | pratikṣi"pyeran | mithyāvādo yuṣmākaṃ na yūyaṃ praṇetāra iti | "tatra" kumārasambhavādau karttuḥ "prativahanebhyupetabādhā" | kumārasambhavādīnāṃ pauruṣeyatvenābhyupagatatvāditicet | "nanvidameva" kartturasmaraṇamaporuṣeyā"bhyupagameṅgaṃ" sādhanaṃ | tacca kumārasambhavādāvastīti yathoktena nyāyeneti kathamanena pauruṣeyaḥ kumārasambhavādiriṣṭa iti kasya "kena bādhā" | atha tulyepi nyāye kumārasambhavādau karttuḥ prativahanebhyupetabādhanamiṣyate | "ta"detadabhyupetabādhanamparasyāpi vedavādinopi vedavākyeṣu praṇetṛprativahane "tulyameva | tasya" vedavādino vedāpauruṣeyatvamiṣṭamato pauruṣeyatvasye"ṣṭatvāt" karttuḥ prativahanepya"doṣaḥ" | abhyupetavādhādoṣo nāstīti "cet kutosya"
vedavādinaḥ āgamopādānanimittatāyāḥ parīkṣāyāḥ prāgiyamapauruṣeyo veda ityeva"miṣṭi"rabhyupagatiḥ | "apramāṇikā" pramāṇarahitā āsīt | tathā hi vedasyāpauruṣeyatvābhyupagame kartturasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇamuktaṃ | tatra cānantaramukto doṣa itya"pramāṇikeyamiṣṭiḥ" |

[439,1]

atha pramāṇamantareṇa vedasyāpauruṣeyatvamaṅgīkṛtavān vedavādī | tadā'"kasmād grāhī" yuktyā vinā grāhakaś"cāyaṃ" mī māṃ sa kaḥ "kimpunaḥ kvacit" pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyatvādau "sādhanaṃ" pramāṇa"mapekṣate | yaditi pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyacintaye"ti pauruṣeyāpauruṣayatvasādhanopanyāsenā"tmānamā"sādayati | yo hyayuktigrāhī sa sarvatra tathaiva pravarttatāṃ | kimiti kvacit pramāṇāvatāraṇenātmānaṃ "duḥkhayatīti" samudāyārthaḥ |

[439,2]

"tata evā"pramaṇikāyā vedasyāpauruṣeya"tveṣṭe"rhetorvedavādino vedasya karttuḥ prativahanepya"nabhyupetabādhāyāmiṣyamāṇāyāntadanyasyāpi" tasmāt mī māṃ sa kādanyasyāpi puṃsaḥ ku mā ra sa mbha vādimapauruṣeyamicchatastatpraṇetṛprativahanepyanabhyupetabādhanaṃ"tulyamityanupālambhaḥ" | tatra prativahanebhyupetabādhetyayamupālambho nāstītyarthaḥ |

"kiṃ cānatiśayadarśī"tyādi | "evaṃprakārāṇāṃ kartturasmaraṇādityevamādīnāmapauruṣayatvasādhanānāṃ" vākyeṣu pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyatvābhimateṣvanatiśayadarśīti sambandhaḥ |
tathā hi yathā pauruṣeyāṇāmanekeṣāṃ cirakālātītakarttṛkāṇāṃ karturasmaraṇamasti | tathā vedavākyeṣvevaṃ kartturasmaraṇādisādhanasyānatiśayadarśī viśeṣadarśī san mī māṃ sa kaḥ | puruṣakāryāṇāṃ vā śabdānāṃ dharmāḥ kāryadharmāḥ puruṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvādayasteṣāṃ "kāryadharmāṇāmvākyeṣu" laukikavaidikeṣvanatiśayadarśī san "kvacid"
vaidike śabde"tiśayaṃ" viśeṣamapauruṣeyatvalakṣaṇa"mabhyupeti" nānyatreti na kiñcidabhyupagame sādhanamastī"tyapratyayevā"yukte"vāsya" vedavādino "vṛttiḥ" |

[440,1]

tadevaṃ yathoktavidhinā kartturasmaraṇādityasiddho hetuḥ | anaikāntikatvamapyāha | "dṛśyante ce"tyādi | upadeśapāramparyaṃ sa mpra dā yaḥ | vicchinnaḥ kriyāsaṃpradāyaḥ puruṣakṛtatvasaṃpradāyo yeṣāṃ vaṭe vaṭe vai śra va ṇādi śabdānānte tathā | anenāsmaryamāṇakarttṛtvamāha | kṛtakāśca pauruṣeyāśca | tataḥ pauruṣeyepi vākye kartturasmaraṇamvarttata ityanaikāntikoyaṃ hetuḥ | "tāni"ti "vicchinnakriyāsampradāyān | kṛtakān" śabdān | "yatnavantaḥ" pumāṃsa"mupalabhante"'nena kṛtā "iti" | naitadevaṃ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | yatnavatopi karttuḥ smaraṇe "niyamābhāvāt" | nāvaśyaṃ karttāramupalabhate yatnavānapīti sandeha eva |

kiñca | "anyatrā"pauruṣeyābhima"tepi" śabdesya karttā nopalabhyata ityanupalambhasya | upalabhyate vāsyāpauruṣeyasya karttetyupalambhasya na pramāṇāt kutaścinniścayaḥ | kintu "paropadeśāt" kiṃbhūtāda"pratyayāda"pramāṇakāt | evaṃbhūtāccopadeśāt karttu"rupalambhānupalambhasyāniścayārhatvāt" | mayā vedavākyāni kṛtānītyevaṃvādinonupalambhād vedavākyeṣu kartturabhāvo niścīyata ityetadapi nāsti | "svayaṃkṛtānāmapi"

atiprasaṃgameva darśayannāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | "anyo vā" puruṣa"racitaḥ" kumārasambhavādiko "granthaḥ | saṃpradāyādṛte" | paropadeśamantareṇa "paraiḥ kobhihito dṛṣṭo"

"na khalvi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na khalu kiñcidapauruṣeyatvāśrayo" pauruṣeyatvasya siddhinimitta"manyatredānīntanānāmanupadeśena" yaḥ pāṭhasta"trāśakteḥ" | na hi paropadeśamantareṇa vedaṃ paṭhituṃ śakta ityapauruṣeyatvamvedavākyānāmiṣṭaṃ | "sā cā"nupadeśapāṭhāśakti"ranyatrā"pi pauruṣeyābhimate | "ekena" kenacit puruṣeṇa "racitenyasyā"dhyetustu"lyā | tadanusāri"ṇeti | anupadeśapāṭhāśaktimapauruṣeyatvasādhakatvena yonusarati tena"sarvo" laukikavaidikaḥ śabda"stathā" pauruṣeyatve"nānumeyaḥ | na vā kaścid" vaidiko viśeṣābhāvāt | "tasya" laukikasya vākyasya "tathe"tyapauruṣeyatvenā"naṣṭatvā"dityādau |

ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ | laukikena śabdena samānadharmo vaidikopi śabdo laukikavat puruṣahetukaḥ syānnā vā kaścidapīti |

[442,3]

"atha heturūpasya" hetusvabhāvasya "nivṛttāvapi tadrūpaṃ" puruṣahetuśabdasamānaṃ rūpaṃ na "nivṛttaṃ" vaidikasya śabdasyeṣyate | tadā "kāryadharmavyatikramaḥ" | ayaṃ hi kāryasya dharmo yatkāraṇanivṛttau nivṛttiḥ | yadā tu nivṛttepi puruṣe vaidikeṣu śabdeṣu pauruṣeyaṃ rūpaṃ syāt tadā tena kāryadharmo vyativṛttaḥ syāt | "tataḥ" kāryadharmavyatikramāttataḥ puruṣānna kiñcidvākyaṃ "syāditi na kaści"cchabdo laukikastatheti pauruṣeyatvena"vacanīyaḥ syāt | rūpaviśeṣo vā" pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vaidikād bhinno "darśanīyo yo" rūpaviśeṣa enaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ"hetumanuvidadhyāt | yena" viśeṣeṇeṣṭasyāpauruṣeyatvena vedasya aniṣṭasya ca laukikasya | "iṣṭaviparyayo na syāt" | yathākramaṃ pauruṣayatvamapauruṣeyatvamvā syāt | na ca laukikavaidikānāṃ kaścit svabhāvabhedostītyuktaṃ |

[443,1]

kiṃ ca puruṣākhyasya "hetoryaḥ" svabhāvastasya nivṛternivṛttāvapi paṣṭhīsaptamyorabhedāt | yathā vṛkṣe śākhā vṛkṣasyaśākheti | vaidikānāṃ vākyānāṃ pauruṣeyairvākyai"rabhedena" tulyarūpatvebhyupagamyamāne | "sa" teṣāṃ laukikānāmvākyānāmbhevaḥ puruṣakṛto viśeṣa "ākasmikaḥ syādahetukaḥ" syāt | puruṣamantareṇāpi vaidikeṣu vākyeṣu tasya viśeṣasya bhāvāt | "tathā ca na kvacinnivarttetākāśādau | na caivantasmād yaḥ svabhāvo" yajjanmā | yasmājjanma yasyeti vigrahaḥ | "sonyatrāpyadṛṣṭahetāvapyavibhajyamānaḥ" | dṛṣṭahetunā kāryeṇāpṛthakkriyamāṇastatkāryatāṃ "yāto bhavan dṛṣṭastaskāryatāṃ svātmanā" svena rūpeṇa "nātivarttate | kimiva | agnīndhanavat" | agniścendhanaṃ cetyagnīndhanantena tulyantadvat | dṛṣṭenendhanakāraṇenāgninā bhedamanubhavannadṛṣṭakāraṇopyagniryathendhanakāryatāṃ nātivarttate tadvat | (244–245)

[443,2]

tatraitasmin nyāye sthite | laukikavaidikayorvākyayorbhedamapradarśya aporuṣeyatvasādhanāya "ye hetavaḥ pravitanyante" | vistareṇābhidhīyante | tadyathā "kartturasmaraṇāt | "

[443,3]

"vedasyādhyayanaṃ sarvaṅ gurvadhyayanapūrvakam | vedādhyayanavācyatvāt adhunādhyayanaṃ yathā | vākya0 366atītānāgatau kālau vedakāraviyogino | kālatvāt tadyathā kālo varttamānassamīkṣyate || brahmādayo na vedānāṃ karttāra iti gamyatāṃ | puruṣatvādihetubhyastadyathā prākṛtā narā iti | "

[444,1]

"sarve te" hetavo "vyabhicāriṇo"'nekāntikā eva | "kāryasāmānyadarśanāt" |
puruṣakāryaiḥ śabdaiḥ sāmānyasya tulya sya vaidikeṣu śabdeṣu darśanāt |

[444,2]

kimvadanaikāntikā ityāha | "yathe"tyādi |

[444,3]

yadvā "tatre"ti | yadvedādhyayanantadvedādhyayanapūrvakamityatra prayoge | apradarśya bhedamiti vedakriyāpratibhārahitāt puruṣād viśeṣamapradarśya | idānīṃ vedādhyayanaṃ vedādhyayanapūrvakantathānyadāpītyevaṃ vedādhyayanatvalakṣaṇasya kāryasāmānyasya darśānādevaṃprakārā hetavaḥ pravitanyate sarve te vyabhicāriṇaḥ | "yathā'nyopi pathikakṛtāgni"radṛṣṭahetutvāt | "jvālāntarapūrvako na kāṣṭhanirmathanapūrvakaḥ" | kutaḥ | pathikāgnivat | kimiva | "anantarāgnivadi"ti jvālāntarasaṃbhatadṛśyamānāgnivat |

[444,4]

"katha"mityādi | yasmā"jjvālodbhavasāmarthyaṃ hyāśri"tyeti jvālāyāḥ sakāśādudbhavasāmarthyamāśritya "pathikakṛtadahanasya hetvantaramara"ṇinirmathanaṃ "pratikṣipyate" |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yadi hyayamagnirvinā" jvālayā "syāda"trāpīti jvālāpūrvakapathikāgnisthānepi jvālāmantareṇaiva "syādi"ti | "tatrai"tasmin sādhane'naikāntikatvamucyate | kathaṃ "jvāletarajanmanorjvālāyā yotpattiḥ" | itarasmādaraṇinirmathanād yotpattistayorutpatyoragnisāmānye parasparamabādhya"bādhakatvāt" | ko hyatravirodhogniśca syānna ca jvālāntarapūrvaka iti | evaṃ sati "jvālāprabhavatva"mvahne rūpa"manyathāpi syāda"raṇi nirmathanādapi syāt | iti"evaṃdharmayo"rjvāletarasambhavinordvayo"rekatrārthe" vahnisāmānye "sambhavāt" kāraṇāt sa "pathikāgniranyo" vā cedadhyayanādiḥ | "ekapratiniyata" iti jvālāpūrvaka eva | vedādhyayanaṃ |
vā vedādhyayanapūrvakamevetyeta"nna syādityāśaṃkyate vyabhicāraḥ" | vedādhyayanaṃ ca syāt |
na ca vedādhyayanapūrvakaṃ | tathā pathikāgniśca syānna na ca jvālāpūrvaka iti |
virodhābhāvāt |

[445,1]

nanu yajjvālāprabhavamvahnerna tadaraṇinirmathanaprabhavamiti kathaṃ na virodha ityāha | "sopī"tyādi | "sopyanyonyavyatirekī" parasparaviruddho "dharma"dvayasya jvālāprabhavatvāraṇinirmathanaprabhavatvalakṣaṇasyā"vatāro"vakāśo "vastusāmānye'viruddha ityucyate | nāvasthābhedini" vahni"viśeṣe" jvālājanmanyaraṇinirmathanajanmani "vā"'viruddha ucyate | kintu viruddha eva | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "niṣkalasyātmano" nirvibhāgasya svabhāvasya "tadatattvavirodhāt" | jvālājanmano hi jvālāpūrvakatvamatatpūrvakatvaṃ ca virudhyate |
araṇijanmanaścāraṇipū rvakatvamatatpūrvakatvaṃ ca virudhyate pathikāgnisāmānyepi dvayamvirudhyata ityāha | "na ce"tyādi | "jvāletarajanmanoḥ" jvālotpādasyāraṇinirmathanotpādasya ca "pathikāgnau" pathikāgnisāmānye "bādhyabādhakatā" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" pathikāgnisāmānyasya "jvālāprabhavavyatirekeṇa" jvālotpattivyatirekeṇa yo'sambhavastasyābhāvāt | jvālotpattivyatirekeṇāraṇinirmathanādapi bhāvādityarthaḥ | yādṛśastu "jvālāprabhava iti syānna sarvo" vahniraviśeṣeṇa | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tatra" hetubhedabhinne vahnau "viśeṣapratikṣepasyā"raṇinirmathanakṛtaviśeṣā pahnavasya "karttumaśakyatvāt | sambha"vatyaraṇikṛto viśeṣo yasya vahnestasya ca "tādavasthyāniyamāt" | jvālāprabhavatvalakṣaṇāyāmavasthāyānniyamābhāvāt |

[446,1]

yadapyuktam | ādyaḥ pathikāgnirvinā jvālayā yadi "syādanyatrā"pi jvālārahitepi pradeśe "syāditi" |

[446,2]

atrocyate | bhavatyeva | "yayā"raṇinirmathanalakṣaṇayā "sāmagryā sa" pathikāgniḥ "sambhavati sā" sāmagrī "yadi syāt" | yadi puna"rasyāḥ" sāmagryāḥ "sambhavaṃ pradarśya tadabhāva"mvahnyabhāvaṃ "kathayet | tatra vā" yathoktasāmagrīsambhavini deśe"jvālāndarśayet | tadā syādeva" jvālāpūrvakatvameva vahnerna caivaṃ | tasmānna sarvaḥ pathikāgnirjvālāpūrvaka iti vyabhicāraḥ |

[446,3]

yata eva"ntasmānnaikasya" vedakriyāśaktirahitasya "parapūrvakamu"padeṣṭṛpūrvaka"madhyayana"ndṛṣṭaṃ "sarvasya" hi ra ṇya garbhāderapyadhyayanasya "tathābhāvaṃ" parapūrvakatvaṃ "sādhayati" |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyā"dhyayanasyā"nyathā" parapūrvakatvamantareṇa yo "sambhava"stasyā"bhāvāt" |
svayamuparacayyādhyayanaṃ na sambhavedityarthaḥ | hiraṇyagarbhādīnāmvedaracanāyāṃ śaktisambhavāt | yastu śaktivikala idānīntanastasya tathāvidhasya svayaṃ kṛtvā vedamadhyetumasamarthasya | "tatkriyā" vedakriyā tasyāṃ yā "pratibhā" tayā "rahi"tasya vedakaraṇasamarthayā buddhyā rahitasyetyarthaḥ | "evaṃbhūtasya" puruṣasya yadadhyayananta"ttathā" syādadhyayanāntarapūrvakaṃ syā"diti" kṛtvā | "tathābhūtamiti" vedakriyāśaktirahitasya yadadhyaya"nanantadeva" | evaṃ vākyaṃ syādadhyayanāntarapūrvakaṃ "vācyaṃ syānnāviśeṣeṇa" | yatpunaradhyayanaṃpuruṣātiśayasambhavena svayaṃ kṛtvādhyayanāt "sambhavadviśeṣaṃ" | aviśeṣeṇa sarvamadhyayanamadhyayanāntarapūrvakamit"yucyamānaṃ" vyāptyasiddhyā vyabhicāritvānna "chāyāṃ puṣṇāti" | vivakṣitasādhyāsādhanāt |

[447,1]

"kathami"tyādi paraḥ | "viśeṣasya" svayaṃ kṛtvā vedabāhyānāmadhyayanasya "sambhavaḥ"
kathaṃ | "yāvate"ti yadetyarthaḥ | "teṣāmapi puruṣāṇāṃ" vedasya karttṛtvenābhimatānāmvedaracanāyā"maśaktiḥ" puruṣatvā"didānīntanapuruṣavat" |

[447,2]

"atrā"pītyā cā ryaḥ | atrāpi prayoge | na "śakti"puruṣayoriti | vedakaraṇasya śakteḥ puruṣasya ca parasparaṃ | "na kiñcid virodhadarśanamasti | tataśca"
bra hmā diṣu puruṣatvaṃ hetutvenokta"maviruddhatvānna" vedakaraṇaśaktimapanayati | "tasmānnāviruddhavidhiḥ" | aviruddhasya vidhiryasminnanupalabdhiprayoge sa evaṃbhūto"nupalabdhiprayogo na gamakaḥ" | virodhābhāva eva kathamityāha | "na hī"tyādi | "atīndriye"ṣvatyantaparokṣeṣu brahmādiṣu vedakaraṇaśaktyā saha | sahānavasthānalakṣaṇasya "virodhasya pratītiḥ" | atīndriyatvādeva | nāpi parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇasya virodhasya pratītiḥ | śaktyaśaktyoḥ puruṣāpuruṣatvayośca parasparamvirodhāt | na śaktipuruṣayoryaḥ puruṣaḥ sa vedakaraṇaṃ pratyaśakto yathedānīntanaḥ puruṣa iti | "na cāyaṃ prayogaḥ"
pūrvaprayogāditi | yadvedādhyayanantadvedādhyayanapūrvakamidānīntanavedādhyayanavadityetasmāt"parvaprayogād bhidyate" | tasmādubhayorupādānaṃ vyarthamevetyabhiprāyaḥ |

[447,3]

yatpunarucyate | "yadi puruṣāḥ" prāktanā vedaṃ kṛtvā svayamadhyetuṃ "śaktāḥ syustadedānīntanā api syuriti" |

[447,4]

atrocyate | puruṣāṇā"mviśeṣāsambhave satyetada"nantaroktaṃ "syāt | sa ca"
puruṣāṇāṃ viśeṣāsambhavād "dussādhya"śakyasādhanaḥ | bādhakābhāvāt | tasmād"yatraikasya" puruṣasyāśa"ktistatra sarvapuruṣāṇāmaśaktiḥ" | puruṣatvā"ditya"sminnapi sādhane"pūrvavada"dhyanatvādivat puruṣatvaṃ liṅgaṃ "vyabhicāri" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "bhā ra tā diṣvapi"
pauruṣeyābhimateṣ"vidānīntanānāṃ" puruṣāṇā"maśaktāvapi kasyacid" vyā sā deḥ puruṣātiśayasya "śaktisiddheḥ" |

[448,1]

yata eva"ntasmāt kāraṇāni vivecayatā" vaidikānāṃ vākyānāṃ tālvādivyāpāraṃ kāraṇamapanayatā | "artheṣu" laukikavaidikeṣu śabdeṣu | kimbhūteṣu | "tadatatpratibhaveṣu"
tālvādikāraṇeṣvatatkāraṇeṣu "svabhāvabhedo darśanīyaḥ" | tālvādikāraṇānāmī dṛśaḥ svabhāvo tatkāraṇānāmanyādṛśaḥ svabhāva ityevaṃ svabhāvanānātvaṃ darśanīyaṃ |
yena tadatatprabhavatvamvibhāgena jāyate | "tadabhāve" svabhāvabhedābhāve "sarvastadātmā bhavet" | sarvaḥ śabdaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ syā"nna vā kaści"llaukikopi |

[448,2]

atha syād | astyeva tayoḥ svabhāvabheda ityāha | "na cātre"tyādi | atra jagati "laukikavaidikayorvākyayoḥ svabhāvanānātvaṃ paśyāmaḥ | asati tasmin"
svarūpabhede "tayo"rlaukikavaidikavākyayo"ssāmānyasyaiva" tulyarūpasyaiva varṇṇānukramalakṣaṇasya "darśanādekasya" laukikavaidikasya vākyasya "kaṃcid dharmmaṃ vivecayan"
pauruṣeyatvamapauruṣeyatvamvā vibhāgena vyavasthāpayan puruṣa "āśaṃkya vyābhicāravādaḥ kriyate | āśaṃkya" vyabhicāro vādo yasya puruṣasya sa tathocyate | kena kriyate | "tatsvabhāvasambhavinā" tena | laukikavaidikavākyasambhavinā tena varṇṇapadaracanālakṣaṇena sāmānyena | pauruṣeyatulyadharmakasya vedasyāpauruṣeyatvamvadan vyabhicāryate iti yāvat |

[448,3]

nanu "vedāvedayosta"ttvānyattva"lakṣaṇo" vedāvedalakṣaṇo "viśeṣo"styeva | tato viśeṣāllaukikavaidikayoryathākramaṃ pauruṣeyatvamapauruṣeyatvambhaviṣyatīti paro manyate |

[448,4]

"sattya"mityā cā ryaḥ | nanvīdṛśo viśeṣa"stayoḥ" pauruṣeyatvāpauruṣeyatvasādhako yasmā"nna kevalamanayoreva" laukikavaidikayorviśeṣaḥ | kintarhi | "ḍi ṇḍi ka purāṇetarayorapi" | ḍi ṇḍi kai rnagnācāryaiḥ kṛtasya purāṇasyetarasya ca purāṇasya | īdṛśoviśeṣosti | "na ca tāvatā" svayaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ "svaprakriyābhedadīpanaḥ" samayaparikalpito "nāmabhedaḥ" saṃjñābhedaḥ puruṣakṛti"mbādhate" vedasya | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anyatrāpi"
purāṇe'pauruṣeyatva"prasaṃgāt" | ḍiṇḍiketarapurāṇānāṃ nāmabhedasya vidyamānatvāt |

[449,1]

"yadi" tu yā vedavākye varṇṇapadaracanā dṛśyate "tādṛśīṃ racanāṃ puruṣāḥ karttu na śaknuyuḥ | kṛtāmvā" niṣpāditāmvā varṇṇapadaracanā"makṛtasaṃketaḥ" śravaṇamātrād"vivecayedi"yaṃ puruṣapūrviketi | "tadā vyaktamapauruṣeyo vedaḥ syāt" | na vivecayati tāṃ racanāntatkathamapauruṣeyo vedaḥ syāt |

[449,2]

"nanvi"tyādi paraḥ | ma ntrā api puruṣakṛtā "evetyetaduttaratra vicārayiṣyāmaḥ |
api ca na mantro nāmānyadeva kiñcit" | kintarhi | "sattye"tyādi | yathābhūtākhyānaṃ sattyaṃ | indriyamanasordamanantapaḥ | tayoḥ prabhāvo viṣastambhanādisāmarthyaṃ sa vidyate yeṣāṃ puṃsānte tathā | teṣāṃ "sattyatapaḥprabhāvavatāṃ" puṃsāṃ "samīhitārthasya sādhana"ntadeva mantraḥ | tadvacanaṃ mantralakṣaṇama"dyatvepi puruṣeṣu dṛśyata eva" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yathāsvaṃ sattyādhiṣṭhānabalād viṣadahanādeḥ stambhanasya" sāmarthyopaghātasya darśanāt | tathā śa ba rā ṇāṃ ca "keṣāṃcit" svaniyamasthānāmadyāpi viṣādyapanayanaśaktiyuktasya kāraṇācchaknuvantyeva puruṣā mantrān karttuṃ | "avaidikānāñca"
vedādanyeṣāṃ bau ddhā dī nāmiti | ādiśabdād ā rha ta gā ru ḍa mā heśva rā dīnāṃ "mantrakalpānāṃ" | mantrāṇāṃ mantrakalpānā"ñca darśanāt" | vidyākṣarāṇi mantrāḥ | tatsādhanavidhānopadeśā mantrakalpāḥ | "teṣāṃ ca" bauddhādīnā mmantrakalpānāṃ"puruṣakṛteḥ" puruṣaiḥ karaṇāt |

[449,3]

tasmānna laukibhyo vaidikānāṃ svabhāvabhedaḥ |

[449,4]

"tatre"tyādi paraḥ | tatrāpi bauddhādimantrakalpep"yapauruṣeyatve" kalpyamāne | "katha"midānī"mapauruṣeyaṃ" vākyaṃ sarva"mavitathaṃ" | kintu mithyārthamapi syāt | "tathā hī"tyādinaitadeva bodhayati | "bauddhamantrakalpe hiṃsā maithunātmadarśanāda"yaḥ ādiśabdādanṛtavacanādaya "anabhyudayahetavo" duḥkhahetavo "varṇyante" | itarasmiṃstvabauddhamantrakalpe ta eva hiṃsādayonyathā cābhyudayahetavo varṇyayante | yadi ca sarve mantrakalpā apauruṣeyāḥ syustadā caitad "viruddhābhidhā"yi vākya"dvayamekatrā"pauruṣeye "kathaṃ sattyaṃ syāt" |

[450,1]

syādetad | bauddhamantrakalpeṃ hiṃsādiśabdānāmanya evāprasiddhortho yo vaidikena mantrakalpenāviruddha iti | ata āha | "tatre"tyādi | tatra bauddhe mantrakalpe prasiddhādarthādanya"syārthāntarasya kalpane" kriyamāṇe | "tada"rthāntarakalpana"manyatrā"bauddhe vaidike mantrakalpe "tulyami"ti kṛtvā sarvatra mantrakalpeṣvarthāntarakalpanāsambhavenārthānirṇṇayāt | tatpratipāditerthe kvacit pratipattiranuṣṭhānaṃ na syāt | "tathā cetyarthāniśca"yenānuṣṭhānābhāve sadapya"pauruṣeya"mvākyaṃ puruṣārthaṃ pratya"nupayogaṃ" |

[450,2]

"bauddhādīnāṃ mantratvameva nāstīti cedāha | bauddhādīnāmamantratva" iti | "tadanyatrāpi" tasmād bauddhādimantrādanyatrāpi vaidike mantre mantratvapratipādanāya"kośapānaṃ karaṇīyaṃ" | na hi kācid vyaktirastītyabhiprāyaḥ | dṛṣṭaviruddhaṃ caitad bauddhādayo na mantrā iti | tathā hi "viṣādikarmakṛto" viṣakarmādīn kurvanto "bauddhā api" mantrā "dṛśyante" | tena "tatra" bauddhādiṣu mantrakalpeṣva"mantratvamapi" vipratiṣiddhaṃ |
viṣakarmādikaraṇadvāreṇa vaidikānāmapi mantratvavyavasthāpanāt | na ca viṣastambhanādisāmarthyayogāt vedavākyaṃ laukivākyādatiśayavadityevāpauruṣeyaṃ yuktaṃ |

[450,3]

tathā hi pāṇyaṅgulasanniveśo "mu drā | ma ṇḍa laṃ" devatādiracanāviśeṣaḥ | "dhyāna"ndevatādirūpacintanaṃ | "tairanakṣarai"raśabdasvabhāvaiḥ sva"karmāṇi" viṣādyapanayanādilakṣaṇāni kriyante | na ca tāni mudrāmaṇḍaladhyānā"nyapauruṣeyāṇi" yujyante |

[450,4]

syādetat | mudrādiṣveva puṃsāṃ karaṇasāmarthyanna varṇṇakrameṣu mantreṣviti |

[451,1]

tanna | yasmāt "teṣāṃ" mudrādīnāṃ "kriyāsambhaṃve satyakṣararacanāyāṃ" sattyādimatāṃ puṃsāṃ "kaḥ pratighāto" viśeṣābhāvāt | "tasmānna kiñcidaśakyakriyameṣāṃ" puṃsāṃ |
yena puruṣeṇākṛtamatiśayamupalabhya laukikebhyo vaidikānāṃ svabhāvabhedaḥ kalpyeta |

[451,2]

yadi bauddhetarau mantrakalpau dvāvapi pauruṣeyo "tau ca sattyaprabhavau" | avitathābhidhāyipuruṣādutpannau | "tatkatha"midānīntāveva sattyaprabhavau "mantrakalpau" bauddhetarau"parasparaviruddhau" yujyete | ekatra hiṃsādīnāmanabhyudayahetutvena darśanādanyatrābhyudayahetutvena |

[451,3]

"ne"tyādinā pariharati | "na vai sarvatra tau" mantrakalpau "sattyaprabhavau" yenāyaṃ virodhaḥ |
kintu "prabhāvayuktapuruṣapratijñālakṣaṇāvapi" tau mantrakalpau staḥ | prabhāvavatā puruṣeṇa"ya imāṃ varṇṇapadaracanāmabhyasyati tadvidhiṃ cānutiṣṭhati tasyāhaṃ yathāpratijñātamarthaṃ sampādayiṣyāmī"ti yā pratijñā tallakṣaṇāvapi mantrakalpau bhavataḥ | tatonyathāvādyapi prabhāvayuktau mantrakalpau kuryādevetyavirodhaḥ | sa eva sattyābhāvāt prabhāvaḥ kuta iti cedāha | "sa prabhāvo gatisiddhiviśeṣābhyāmapi syāt" | puṇyena gativiśeṣa eva sa tādṛśo labdho devatādisaṅgṛhīto mantrasiddhiviśeṣo yena sa tādṛśaḥ prabhāvo bhavatīti |

[451,4]

"yadi pauruṣeyā mantrāstadā" puruṣatvāt "sarve puruṣāḥ kinna mantrakāriṇaḥ" |
na ca kurvanti | tasmādabhimatā api puruṣā na mantrānakārṣurityabhiprāyaḥ |

[451,5]

"tadi"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | teṣāmmantrāṇāṃ yat "kriyāsādhanaṃ" sattyatapaḥprabhāvādi tena "vaikalyā"nna sarve puruṣā mantrakāriṇaḥ |

[451,6]

"yadi punastādṛśaiḥ sattyatapaḥprabhṛtibhirma"ntrahetubhiḥ puruṣā "yuktāḥ" syustadā te mantrān kurvantyeva |

[452,1]

"api ca kāvyāni" tatkriyāpratibhāyuktaḥ "puruṣaḥ karotī"ti kṛtvā tatkriyā pratibhārahitopi "sarvaḥ puruṣaḥ" puruṣatvasāmyāt "kāvyakṛt syāt | akaraṇe vā kasyacida"nyopi naiva kuryāt | tadvat | kāvyakaraṇāsamarthapuruṣavat | "ityapūrveṣā vā co yuktiḥ" | vyabhicāriṇītyarthaḥ |

[452,2]

"sattya"mityādi paraḥ | "mantrakriyāsādhanena vikalāḥ" puruṣā "mantrānna kurvate" |
kevala"ntadevā"tra mantrakriyāsādhanasya sattyādeḥ "sākalyaṃ kasyacit" puruṣasya "na paśyāmaḥ |
sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ samānadharmatvāt" |

[452,3]

"uktami"ti si ddhā nta vā dī | "atra" codya uktamuttaraṃ | kimuktaṃ | "na mantro nāme"tyādi | vacanaṃ ca samayaśceti dvandvaḥ | "sattyādimatāṃ" puruṣāṇāṃ samīhitārthasādhanā"dvacanāt" | tathā sattyādiyuktapuruṣapratijñālakṣaṇācca samayānna mantronāmā"nyadeva kiṃcit | tāni ca" sattyatapogatisiddhiviśeṣalakṣaṇāni mantrakriyāsādhanāni"kvacideva puruṣeṣu dṛśyante" |

[452,4]

syādetad | yo yaḥ puruṣasya mantrakriyāsādhanarahitastadyathā rathyāpuruṣaḥ |
puruṣaścāyaṃ mantrakarttṛtvenābhimataḥ puruṣa iti | tatrāpi "sarvapuruṣāstadrahitāstena" mantrakriyāsādhanena rahitā "ityapi tatsambhavasya" mantrakriyāsādhanasambhavasya puruṣatvena saha "virodhābhāvāt | anirṇṇa"yo'niścayaḥ | mantrakriyāsādhanasya svabhāvānupalambhādeva puruṣe svabhāvaniścaya iti cedāha | "na ce"tyādi | "atyakṣasvabhāveṣu" akṣātikrāntaḥ svabhāvo yeṣānteṣvatyantaparokṣeṣvityarthaḥ | "anupalabdhirnābhāvaniścayasya hetuḥ" | ātmani mantrakriyāsādhanānāṃ smṛtyādīnāmanupalambhena paratrāpyabhāvo niścīyata iti cedāha | "na ce"tyādi | atikrāntajanmādismaraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ | paracittāvabodho ma tiḥ | adṛṣṭeṣu padārthatattvadarśanaṃ "prativedhaḥ | sattya"mananyathāvāditvaṃ | "śaktiḥ" prabhāvaḥ | tā mantrahetavaḥ sarvabhāvinyaḥ | "sarvapuruṣa"santāna"bhāvinyo bhavanti" | yena tā ātmani na dṛṣṭā ityanyatrāpi pratikṣipyeran |

[453,1]

idānīṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ kvacideva puruṣe sambhavamāha | "tatsādhana"mityādi | teṣāṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ yathoktānāṃ yatsādhanamutpattikāraṇantasya "saṃpradāya upadeśa"stasya bhedo viśeṣaḥ kvacidevāgame sambhavo na sarvatra | tadvad "guṇāntarasādhanānyapi syuḥ" |
kvacideva puruṣe bhaveyuḥ | siddhiḥ sādhanaṃ | smṛtyādikāraṇānāṃ kāryabhūtāni yāni guṇāntarāṇi smṛtyādirūpāṇi | teṣāṃ sādhanāni niṣpattayopi kvacideva puruṣe syuḥ smṛtyādikāraṇānuṣṭhānāt | yadi smṛtyādi sādhanaṃ syāt kinna dṛśyata iti cedāha | "nāpī"tyādi | "sannapi" vidyamānopi santānāntarastho manoguṇo draṣṭuṃ puruṣamātreṇa "na śakyaḥ | ata eva" kāraṇā"dadṛṣṭa"sya santānāntarasya manoguṇasyāna"pahnavo"pratikṣepaḥ | "nāpi puruṣeṣu" mano"guṇasyotpitsorutpattimicchoḥ pratiroddhā" bādhakosti yena tadanyaguṇātiśāyī manoguṇaḥ "kasyacidapi" nāstīti syāt | puruṣatvādika eva dharmo bādhaka iti cet | na | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tasyānyasantānabhāvino bādhyasya guṇasya puruṣamātreṇā"dṛṣṭeḥ" | puruṣatvādinā dharmeṇa "bādhyabādhakabhāvā"siddheḥ | abādhakāccāpratikṣepaḥ |

[453,2]

"etenā"ntaroktena "sarva"syārthasya yajjñānantasya "pratiṣedhaḥ" | ādiśabdād vītarāgādi"pratiṣedhādayo nirvarṇṇitottarāḥ" |

[453,3]

yathā na vaktṛtvādiliṃgena sarvajñatvādīnāṃ pratikṣepa iti | "tatrā"pi bītarāgaṃtvādipratikṣepa "evaṃbhūtaḥ" puruṣo vītarāgatvādiguṇayukto neti nyāyo yuktaḥ |
kiṃbhūtaḥ | yādṛśoyamasambhavantatsādhanasaṃpradāyaḥ | "asambhavantatsādhanasaṃpradāyo" vītarāgatvādisādhanasaṃpradāyo yasyeti vigrahaḥ | vītarāgatvādisādhanenopāyena vikalassa vītarāgādi"rna bhavatyevaṃ nyāya iti" yāvat | "na dṛṣṭajñāpako"tatsvabhāva "ityapi" | adṛṣṭaṃ jñāpakaṃ vītarāgatvādi liṅgaṃ yasya | sa jñāpako darśanamātreṇātatsvabhāvo vītarāgatvādiguṇaviyuktasvabhāvo bhavatītyapi na yuktamvaktuṃ | na hi jñāpakānupalambhamātreṇa jñāpyasyābhāvo nyāyyaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "satāmapi" keṣāṃcidarthānāṃ liṃgabhūtasya"kāryasyānārambhasambhavāt" | ārabdhannāma tairatīndriyaiḥ kāryantathāpi "svabhāvavipra"mīṣāmidaṃ kāryamiti "draṣṭumaśakyatvācca" | tasmānmantrakriyāsādhanavaikalyaṃ yathaikasya tathā sarvasyetyetadaśakyaniścayamiti sthitaṃ |

[454,1]

yata evanta"smādadhyayanama"dhyayanāntaravad a"dhyayanāntarapūrvakami"ti sādhye "adhyayanā"diti liṅgaṃ "vyabhicāri | bhā ra tā dyadhyayane" pauruṣeyādhyayanatvasya "bhāvāt" |

[454,2]

"vedena viśeṣaṇādadoṣaḥ" | adhyayanamātrasya hi vyabhicāro na vedena viśiṣṭasyādhyayananasyetyabhiprāyaḥ | "kaḥ punari"tyādi siddhāntavādī | "kotiśayo vedādhyayanasya ye"na tadvedā"dhyayanamanyathe"ti svayaṃ kṛtvādhyetuṃ "na śakyate" | naiva kaścidatiśayaḥ | tato vedādhyayanaṃ ca syānna cādhyayanapūrvakamiti virodhābhāvāt sa eva vyabhicāraḥ | yasmā"nna hi viśeṣaṇaṃ" vedatva"maviruddhaṃ vipakṣeṇā"nadhyayanāntarapūrvakatvena "saha | asmād" vipakṣā"ddhetunnivarttayati" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "aviruddhayo"rvedatvānadhyayanāntarapūrvakatvayo"rekatra" vedavākye "sambhavāt" | ko hyatra virodho yad vedādhyayanaṃ ca syānna cādhyayanāntarapūrvakamiti | "idānīntanānāṃ" puruṣāṇāma"nadhyayanāt" | adhyayanāntarapūrvakatvenaivādhyayanāt | "uktottarametat" | bhā ra tā dhyayanepi prasaṅgāt | tadapi hīdānīntanāḥ paropadeśenaivādhīyata iti | tasyāpyādyābhimatamadhyayanamadhyayanāntarapūrvakatvena vedavadapauruṣeyaṃ syāt | vedādhyayanapūrvakameva vedādhyayanaṃ karttura"darśanāditi cet | idamapi prāk pratyūḍhaṃ" pratikṣiptaṃ | dṛśyante hi vicchinnakriyāsaṃpradāyāḥ | "kṛtakāśce"tyādinā | "nāpyadarśanamātramabhāvaṃ gamayatīti"
kṛtvā "vyabhicāra eva" vedādhyayanatvādityasya hetoḥ | "tasmāt" vedatvaṃ "viśeṣaṇa" madhyayanasya hetora"tiśayabhāg na bhavati" viśeṣādhāyakanna bhavati | vipakṣavirodhābhāvena vipakṣādavyāvarttanāt | upāttamapi viśeṣaṇa"manupāttasamaṃ" |

[454,3]

kiñca | "yatkiñcida vedādhyayanaṃ sarvantadadhyayanāntaraparvakamiti" vedenaviśeṣitepi hetau "vyāptirna sidhyati" | viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvena sarvasya vedādhyayanasya tathābhāvasiddheradhyayanāntarapūrvakatvāsiddheḥ | "yādṛśaṃ" tvadhyayanaṃ svayaṃ karttumaśaktasya tannimittamadhyayanāntaranimittaṃ "dṛṣṭaṃ tattathetya"dhyayanāntarapūrvakame"veti syāt" | svayaṃ kṛtvādhyetumaśaktasya yadadhyayanantasya dṛṣṭe viśeṣajāḍyādilakṣaṇaṃ tannimittatayā parapūrvādhyayananimittatayā | tattyāgena tasya jāḍyādinimittasyādhyayanasya yathā paridṛṣṭe viśeṣasya tyāgena | yadvā "tannimittatayā" śaktinimitatayā | dṛṣṭe'vagate viśeṣesvayaṃ kṛtvādhyayanalakṣaṇe"tattyāgena" tasya viśeṣasya tyāgena vedādhyayanatvasāmā"nyasya grahaṇaṃ" śaktasyāśaktasya vā sarvaṃ vedādhyayanamadhyayanāntarapūrvakamvedādhyayanatvasāmānyāditi kriyamāṇaṃ "vyabhicāryeva" | kimiva | hutāśanasiddhau | agnisiddhau "pāṇḍudravyatvavat" | agnisādhye dhūme yaḥ pāṇḍuviśeṣo dṛṣṭastattyāgena pāṇḍudravyasāmānyamupādīyamānamagnisiddhau yathā vyabhicāri tadvadityarthaḥ |

[455,1]

etenānantaroktena vyabhicāritvapratipādanena vacanādayaḥ | ādiśabdāt puruṣatvādayaḥ "pratyuktāḥ" | yathā tepi vyabhicāriṇa iti |

[455,2]

kasmin sādhye | rāgādisādhane | rāgādisiddhau | yādṛśo rāgādiprabhavo vacanaviśeṣo dṛṣṭastattyāgena vaktṛtvasāmānyasya vyabhicārāt |

[455,3]

astu "ve"tyabhyupagamyāpyāha | sarvathāpyevaṃkṛtvā vedasyā"nāditā sidhye"dādirahitatvamātraṃ sidhyet | "nāpuruṣāśrayaḥ" | apauruṣeyatvantu na sidhyet |

[455,4]

atha tasmādapauruṣeyamātrādevāpauruṣeyatvamiṣyate | tadā "syādanyopi" lokavyavahāronādipravṛttatvādanarāśrayopauruṣeyaḥ | "puruṣa eva hi svayamabhyuhyo"pakalpyādhīyate |
parato vā śrutvādhīyate teṣāṃ puṃsā"mavyāpatakaraṇānā"mavyāpṛtatālvādīnāṃ "svayaṃ" | svarūpaṃ prakāśayanti | "yena" svayaṃ dhvananenā"pauruṣeyāḥ syuḥ" | kintu puruṣavyāpāreṇaiṣāṃ vaidikānāṃ śabdānāṃ dhvananāllaukikavākyavat pauruṣeyatvameva |

[456,1]

"api syurapauruṣeyā"ssambhāvyata eṣāmapauruṣeyatvaṃ "yadi puruṣāṇāmādiḥ syāt" |
adhyayanaṃ cānādi"stadāpyā"dyasya puruṣasyādhyayana"manyapūrvaka"madhyayanāntarapūrvakaṃ "na sidhyati" | kiṅkāraṇam | "adhyāpayitura"nyasya puruṣasyā"bhāvāt | tatprathamodhyetā" tasya vedasya prathamodhyetā svayamabhyuhya vedamadhīta iti "kartaiva syād"
vedasya | "tadi"ti tasmā"dayaṃ" vedādhyayanalakṣaṇo vyavahāra ekasmādadhītyāparamadhyāpayati | sopyanyamiti pūrvapūrvadarśanapravṛtto"nādiḥ" puruṣavyavahāra iti puruṣairevāyaṃ racito vyavahāra iti syānnāpauruṣeya eva | kimiva | "ḍimbhakapāṃsukrīḍāvat" | ḍimbhakā bālāsteṣāṃ pāṃsukrīḍā yathā "pūrvavatdarśanapravṛ"ttatvādanādiḥ "puruṣavyavahāra"stadvat | ādiśabdād bhojanādivyavahāraḥ |

[456,2]

"anāditvādi"tyādi | "anāditvād" vedasyā"pauruṣeyatve"bhyupagamyamāne "mle cchā divyavahārāṇā"miti svakulakramāgatānāṃ mātṛvivāhādilakṣaṇānāmanāditvāt tathābhāvo vedavadapauruṣeyatvaṃ syāt | ādiśabdādāryavyavahārasyānādeḥ parigrahaḥ |
tathā "nāstikyavacasāmapi" dharmādharmaparalokāpavādapravṛttānā"manāditvāttathābhāvaḥ" |
apauruṣeyatvaṃ syāt | anāditvameva teṣāṃ kathamiti cedāha | "pūrvasaṃskārasantateḥ"
pūrvasaṃskāravaśāt santānena pravṛtterityarthaḥ | "mlecchavyavahā"rā anādayaḥ | "ke"
punasta ityāha | mṛte pitari putreṇa "mātṛvivāhaḥ" kārya iti | mlecchānāṃ keṣāṃcid vyavahāraḥ | ādiśabdād vṛddhānāmmāraṇaṃ saṃsāramocanārthamityādivyavahāraparigrahaḥ | ādiśabdopāttamāha | "madane"tyādi | ma da na tra yo daśyāmparvaṇi "madanotsavaḥ" | atrāpyādiśabdāt putrajanmotsavādayopyanādayaḥ | "nāsti"kānāṃ lau kā yati kā nā"mvacāṃsi" ca | kiṃbhūtānya"pūrvaparalokādyapavādīni" | apūrvasya dharmādharmasya paralokasya cāpavādīni pratikṣepakāṇi | tānyapyanādīnīti | liṃgavipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | 248

[457,1]

kathaṃ punarmlecchādivyavahārādīnāmanāditvamityāha | "na hī"tyādi | te ca vyavahārā"stāni" ca nāstikyavacāṃsīti "napuṃsakamanapuṃsakenaikavaccānyatarasyāmi"ti napuṃsakasyaikaśeṣaḥ | tenāyamarthaḥ | tān vyavahārāṃstāni ca nāstikyavacāṃsi "parai"ranyaiḥ puruṣaira"nāhitasaṃskārā" avyutpannabuddhaya idānīntanā "na pravarttayanti" |
kintu vyutpāditabuddhaya eva | tepyaparaistepyaparairiti siddhamanāditvaṃ |

[457,2]

yepyapūrvaṃ kāvyādikaṃ kurvanti | teṣāmapyanyakṛtenaiva saṃskāreṇa pravṛttestatkṛtopi vyavahāronādiriti kathayannāha | "svapratibhe"tyādi | "svapratibha"yā svabuddhyā"raci"ta"ssamayaḥ" kāvyādilakṣaṇo yaiste"ṣāmapi" tāvat puruṣāṇāṃ "yathāśrutaḥ" parasmāt samasto vyasto vā "yorthaḥ" | tatra ye "vikalpā"steṣāṃ "saṃhāra" ekatropādānamvargīkaraṇamiti yāvat | te"naiva" prakāreṇa "pravṛtte"rgranthādīnāṃ karaṇāt | svapratibhāracitopi grantho vastutaḥ parapūrvaka eva | kathantarhi svakṛta ityucyate ityāha | "tat"kāvyādika"maparapūrvakamityucyata" iti sambandhaḥ | kenacit svayaṃ kṛtamityucyate | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "kutaścidu"padeṣṭuḥ kiñcidarthajātamā"gatamiti" kṛtvā | "ekasyopadeṣṭuḥ prabandhenābhāvāt" | tadevaṃ svapratibhāracitopi tāvad granthaḥ paramārthataḥ parapūrvaka eva | "prāgeva"
kimpuna"ryathādarśanapravṛttayaḥ" | parebhyo yathādarśanameva pravṛttirnivṛttiryeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ | "samyagmithyāpravṛttayaḥ" | samyag mithyā ca pravṛttirācaraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ "lokavyavahā"rāṇānte tathoktāḥ | tatra samyakpravṛttayaḥ pūjyapūjādayaḥ | mithyāpravṛttayaḥ kāmopasaṃhitādayaḥ | ete ca sphuṭameva parapūrvakāḥ |

[457,3]

atra vyabhicāramāśaṃkate | "nanvi"tyādi | prathamakalpe bhavā "ādikalpikāḥ" | teṣ"vadṛṣṭā vyavahārāḥ iṣyante" | na hi taiḥ pūrvebhyo vyavahārā upalabdhāsteṣāmeva prathamatvāt |

[458,1]

"teṣāmapī"tyādinā pariharati | "teṣāma"pyādikalpikānāmpuṃsā"manyasaṃskārāhitānāṃ pū"rvajanmaprasareṣu pūrvadṛṣṭavyavahāreṇāhitasaṃskārāṇāṃ paścād "yathāpratyayayaṃ" |
yathā sahakārisannidhānaṃ "prabodhāt" pravṛtteḥ | tepi nāparapūrvakāḥ | 248

[458,2]

"bhavatva"nāditvāt "sarveṣāṃ" mlecchādivyavahārāṇāma"pauruṣeyatvamiti cet |
tādṛśe"nāditvamātreṇa sarvavyavahārāṇā"mapauruṣeyatve siddhepi ko guṇo bhavet" |
naiva kaścit | tathā hi "kāmaṃ bhavedavisamvādakamityapauruṣeyatvamiṣṭaṃ | taccā"pauruṣeyatvaṃ "visamvādakānāmapi keṣāṃci"llokavyavahāraṇā"mastī"ti nāpauruṣeyatvamavitathatvasya sādhakaṃ vyabhicārāditi "ki"ntenā"pauruṣeyatvena" kalpitena |

[458,3]

"atha" vedavākyānāmevāpauruṣeyatvamiṣyate | tadā "vedavākyānāmevāpauruṣe"yatve "satya"pi tadvācyeṣvartheṣu "saṃśaya" eva "puna"riti bhūyaḥ | apauruṣeyatvamapi kalpayitvā bhūyaḥ saṃśaya eva prāpta ityarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | artha"bhedā"nāṃ vedārthavyākhyānavikalpānāmācāryabhedena "darśanāt" |

[458,4]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe |

[458,5]

"apauruṣeyatvepi yadi" vedavākyaṃ yathāsvaṃ "pratiniyatāmeva | tadarthapratibhāṃ" |
vedavācyārthālambanāmbuddhipravṛttikāmasya yadi "janaye"ttadā viparītārthasamāropābhāvādā"śvāsanaṃ syā"llabdhāśvāsaḥ puruṣo bhavet | tattu nāsti | yasmād | "yatheṣṭantu samāropāpavādābhyā"madhikaśabdaprakṣepeṇa śabdāntarāpahnavena vetyarthaḥ | viruddhaśāstravyavahāriṇo "nai ru ktāḥ | ādi"śabdād vai yā ka ra ṇā diparigrahaḥ | "vedavākyāni viśasanto" nānārthān kurvanto "dṛśyante | na ca te" parasparavirodhino vyākhyābhedopanītā "arthāsteṣā"mvedavākyānā"nna saṃghaṭanta" eva sambhavantyevetyarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "arthaniveśa"syārthavācakatvena pravarttanasya "samayaprādhānyāt" |
saṃketapratibaddhatvāt | "ekasyā"pi "vākya"sya yathāsamaya"manekārthavikalpasambhavāt"
saṃśaya eva | prakṛtipratyayānusāreṇa ca vedavākyānāṃ vyākhyānāt | teṣāṃ ca niyatārthatvānna vedavākyeṣvanekārthavikalpasambhava ityapi mithyā | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "prakṛtipratyayānāmanekārthapā"ṭhasambhavāt | ekāpi hi prakṛtiranekeṣvartheṣu paṭhyate |
tathā pratyayopīti | tadavastha eva yathābhiprāyamarthasaṃskārabhedāt saṃśayaḥ |

[459,1]

syādetad | ruḍhimāśritya vedārthavyākhyānāt prakṛtipratyayānāmanekārthapāṭhepi na saṃśaya ityapyasat | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "ruḍherapyekāntena" svayamevā"nanumate"ranaṅgīkaraṇāt | etadeva kutaḥ | "arūḍhaśabdabāhulyāt" | arūḍhā eva ye loke śabdāste vede bāhulyena dṛśyante | tadyathā jarbhurāṇaprabhṛtayaḥ | tato na tatra rūḍhiśabdānnirṇṇayaḥ | tatra "tadarthasyā"rūḍhaśabdārthasya nirṇṇaye vyākhyātṛ"puruṣopadeśāpekṣaṇāt | tadupadeśasya" ca puruṣopadeśasya ca | "tadicchānuvṛtteḥ" puruṣecchānavṛtte"ranirṇaya eva" veda"vākyārtheṣu" | 249

[459,2]

"api cāyaṃ" ve da vā dya"pauruṣetvaṃ sādhayan varṇṇānāmvā sādhayed vākyasya vā" |
vākyavikalpenaiva padasyāpyabhidhānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |

[459,3]

<1>varṇṇavikalpamadhikṛtyāha | "tatre"tyādi | "anyāviśe"ṣāditi | laukikebhyo varṇṇebhyo vaidikānāmaviśeṣāt | "varṇṇānā"mapauruṣeyatva"sādhane kimphalambhe"t | naiva kiñcit |

[459,4]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | yasmānna "hi laukikavaidikavākyayornānā varṇṇāḥ" | kintarhi | yathā vaidikā akārādayo'bhinnāstathā laukikā api | ekatvena pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt | satyapi pratyabhijñāne yadi laukikebhyo vaidikānāṃ varṇṇāṃnāṃ bheda iṣyate | tadā "bhedepi | tataḥ" pratyabhijñānād vaidikānāmakārādīnāṃ pratyuccāraṇaṃ yade"katva"ntasyā"siddhiprasaṃgā"t | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "pratyabhijñāviśeṣā"t |
laukikavaidikavarṇṇabhede dṛṣṭasya pratyabhijñānasya vaidikeṣu varṇṇeṣvaviśeṣāt | ekatvavyabhicāriṇaḥ pratyabhijñānāt kathamvaidikānāmekatvaṃ sidhyatītyarthaḥ | "bhedānupalakṣaṇācca vaidikavarṇṇāsiddhiḥ" | laukikavaidikayorbhedānupalakṣaṇāt |

[460,1]

atha syād vaidikeṣu varṇṇeṣvekatvanimittatvāt pratyabhijñānaṃ pramāṇamevānyatra tu sādṛśyena bhrāntatvādapramāṇamityata āha | "pratyabhijñānādapratītiprasaṅgādi"ti |
yadyanyatrāpramāṇaṃ ghaṭādāvapi tarhi pratyabhijñānād kṣaṇikatvāpratipattiprasaṅgāt |
anyattvādeva | bhavadbhi rmī māṃ sa kairllaukikavaidikavarṇṇabhedā"nabhyupagamācca |
teṣāñca" varṇṇānāma"pauruṣeyatvasādhane"bhyupagamyamāne "te" varṇṇāḥ "sarva"tra loke vede ca"tulyā iti kimanena" mī māṃ sa ke naivamapauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhayatā "pariśeṣitaṃ" parityaktamvarṇṇajātaṃ yat pauruṣeyaṃ syāt | "tathā vai" laukikavaidikavarṇṇānāmapauruṣeyatve sati "sarvaḥ" śābdo "vyavahāro" laukiko vaidikaś"cāpauruṣeyo na ca sarvo'vita"tho na ca sarvaḥ sattyārthaḥ | apauruṣeyatvepi vitathārthasya sambhavāt | "iti" heto"rvyarthaḥ pariśramo"'pauruṣeyatvakalpanāyāḥ

[460,2]

<2>"athe"tyādinā dvitīyapakṣopanyāsaḥ | "atha vākya"ma"pauruṣeyamiṣṭaṃ" |
tadasat | tathā hi "vākyanna bhinnamvarṇṇebhyo vidyate" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | dṛśya"syānupalambhanāt" |

[460,3]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na hi vayandevadattādipadavākyeṣu" | devadattādipadeṣu vākyeṣu ca "dakārādī"nāṃ varṇṇānāṃ yaḥ "pratibhāsastaṃ" muktvā'nyavarṇṇātmakaṃ padavākyapratibhāsaṃ "buddheḥ paśyāmaḥ | dvitīyavarṇṇapratibhāsavat" | yathā dakāre pratibhāsamāne tatsamānakālameva dvitīyo varṇṇo na pratibhāsate | tadvanna padavākyaṃ pratibhāsate | "na cāpratibhāsamānaṃ" grahaṇe buddhau "grāhyatayeṣṭa"mupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sa"dastī"ti śakyamavasātuṃ | tathā varṇṇebhyo"nyad veti śakyamavasātuṃ" | na ceti sambandhaḥ | astitve niṣiddhenyattvamapi niṣiddhameva | tathāpi dvayorupādānamatyantasattvapratipādanārthaṃ | "ākārāntavat" | yathaikasminnākāre bhāsamāne tatrāpratibhāsamānaṃ dṛśyamākārāntaramanyannāsti tadvat |

[461,1]

"anyāsambhavītyā"di | anyeṣu varṇṇeṣvasambhavi | arthapratyāyana"kāryaṃ"lakṣaṇaṃ"kārya"vyatiriktasya padavākyasya "gamakamiti cet" | tathā hyapratipattirdevadattādipadavākyeṣu dṛṣṭā | na ceyamvarṇṇebhyasteṣāṃ pratyekamanarthakatvāt | ekavarṇṇakāle'paravarṇṇābhāvena sāmastyābhāvāccātovagamyate'sti tatpadavākyaṃ yata iyamarthapratītirbhavatīti |

[461,2]

"syādi"tyādinā pratividhatte | "syād" varṇebhyorthāntaraṃ padādi | "yadi" teṣu"varṇṇeṣu satsvapi tadartha"pratītilakṣaṇaṃ "kāryanna syāt" | yāvān varṇṇasamudāyorthapratipādanāya saṃketitastāvato yadyarthapratītirna syāt syādetat | yāvatā bhavatyeva |
taduktaṃ |

[461,3]

nānyathānupapattistu bhavatyarthamatiṃ prati | tadevāsyānimittaṃ syājjāyate yadanantaramiti | sphoṭa0 95

[461,4]

"na bhavatī"tyādi paraḥ | "na bhavati" varṇṇebhyorthapratītiḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "teṣā"mvarṇṇānā"maviśeṣepi padavākyāntare"rthapratītera"sambhavāt" | yadi hi varṇṇebhyorthapratītiḥ syāt tadā sara ityasmin pade yādṛśyarthapratītistādṛśyeva rasa ityatrāpi syād ubhayatra varṇṇānāntulyatvāt | evaṃ vākyepi sadṛśavarṇṇe boddhavyaṃ | na ca bhavati | tasmānna varṇṇebhyorthapratītilakṣaṇaṃ kāryamiti |

[461,5]

"ne"tyādinā pariharati | "teṣā"mvarṇṇānāṃ vākyāntareṣ"vaviśeṣāsiddheḥ" | tathā hi ya ekatra vākye varṇṇā na ta eva vākyāntareṣu puruṣaprayatnabhedena varṇṇānāṃ prativākyambhinnānāmevotpatteḥ |

[462,1]

sa evāyamvarṇṇa iti "pratyabhijñānāt" prativākyaṃ varṇṇānā"maviśaṣo'"bhedaḥ "siddha iti cet" |

[462,2]

"naita"devaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" pratyabhijñānasya "vyabhicāritvāt" | dṛśyate hi lūnapunarjāteṣu keśeṣu bhinneṣvapi sādṛśyagrahaṇād vipralabdhasya pratyabhijñānaṃ |
sādṛśyagrahaṇaṃ ca sadṛśasya svarūpagrahaṇaṃ na tvanyasadṛśa iti grahaṇaṃ | "anidarśanatvā"ccādṛṣṭāntatvācca pratyabhijñānasyāliṃgasya | na hyekaḥ pratyabhijñāyamāno vādiprativādisiddho dṛṣṭāntosti | nāpi pratipadaṃ varṇṇaikatvagrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ sambhavati | pūrvakālasambandhitvasyedānīmasannihitatvenāgrahaṇāt | grahaṇe vā śrotrajñānavat spaṣṭapratibhāsaḥ syāt | na ca bhavati | tasmānna pūrvakālavarṇṇagrāhakaṃ | dṛśyamānasya cedānīntanakālatvād yaścedānīntanakālasambandhī svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ pūrvakālasambandhī | pūrvāparakālayoḥ parasparavirodhāt kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tattvagrahaṇa ucyate | sannihitaviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣamiṣyate | na ca varṇṇasya sannidhānaṃ sambhavati sāṃśatvāt | antyavarṇṇabhāgakāle ca pūrvvavarṇṇabhāgānāmasattvāt | tena na varṇṇeṣu pratipadamekatvagrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ sambhavati |

[462,3]

tasmāt sthitametat prativākyaṃ bhinnā eva varṇṇāsteṣāmeva bhedārthapratīterbheda iti |

[462,4]

nanu varṇṇā nirarthakā ityuktantatkathanteṣāmeva bhedādarthapratīterbheda ityucyate |

[462,5]

sattyaṃ | santo varṇṇā nirarthakā vikalpaviṣayāstu sāmānyarūpā eva prativākyaṃ bhinnā varṇṇā varṇṇasvalakṣaṇā bhedenādhyastā vācakā iṣyante | tena varṇṇānāmeva bhedādarthapratīterbheda ityucyate | yadi tu varṇṇabhedādayamarthapratītibhedo neṣyate kintu "varṇṇāviśeṣepi" | tato vyatiriktasya "vākya"sya "bhedāda"rtha"pratipattibhe"daḥ | sa eva "kāryabhedaḥ syāt" | sā cārthapratīti"rvākyād" bhavet | "tacca" vākyama"tīndriya"mvarṇṇavyatirekeṇendriyabuddhāvapratibhāsanāt | "iti" evaṃ "kutaḥ syā"t | vākyāt sa pratītirna syāt | sambandhasyāgṛhītatvāt |

[462,6]

syādetad | adṛśyamapi tadvākyamindriyavat sannidhimātreṇa pratītiṃ janayati | pratītyanyathānupapatyā ca vākyakalpanetyata āha |

[462,7]

"sannidhimātre"ṇa vākyasya pratīti"janane"'bhyupagamyamāne | indriyādiva"davyutpa"kṛtasaṃketasyāpi puṃsorthapratītirvākyāt "syāt" | na ca bhavati | tasmād varṇṇebhyaḥ saṃketabalādevārthaṃpratīterbhāvāt kathamanyathānupapattyā vākyakalpanā | "tasmānna vākyannāma kiñcidarthāntaramvarṇṇebhyo yasyā"nyasyā"pauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhyeta |
tadabhāvād" vākyābhāvād va"rṇṇā" eva kevalamavaśiṣyante | te cāviśiṣṭāḥ sarvatra teṣā"mapauruṣeyatva"sādhane |

[463,1]

"vedanāviśiṣṭa"rūpāṇāṃ laukikānāmapi va"rṇṇā"nāma"pauruṣeyatvaṃ" sādhayitavyam | atra ca "prathamapakṣe" varṇṇāpauruṣeyatvasādhanapakṣe "pratyuktaṃ" | vyarthaḥ pariśrama iti | (249–250)

[463,2]

"api ce"tyādi | "anekāvayavātmatve" vākyasya kalpyamāne "teṣā"mavayavānāṃ"pṛthak" pratyekaṃ "nirarthakā" yadi |

[463,3]

"tepī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "tasya" vākyasya ba"havovayavāḥ pṛthak prakṛtyā" svabhāvena yadyanarthakāstadā vākyamapyanekāvayavasamudāyātmakaṃ tadvadevānarthakaṃ | tataścā"tadrūpa" ityanarthakatvenāvācakarūpe'vayavasaṅghāte "tādrūpyaṃ" vācakavākyarūpamarthavattvamiti yāvat | "kalpitaṃ" samāropitambhavet | "siṃhatādivat" | yathā siṃho māṇavaka ityādiṣapacāreṣu | māṇavakādiṣvatadrūpeṣu siṃhādikamāropitantadvat |

[463,4]

"arthavāni"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "arthavānevātmā" | vācaka eva svabhāvo "vākyaṃ |
te cāvayavā" vākyasya "svayamanarthakāḥ | teṣu ca" svayamanarthakeṣvavayaveṣu sorthavān vākyā"tmā kalpanāsamāropitaḥ syā"t | "siṃhatādivat māṇavakādiṣu | iti" hetossa vācaka ātmā kalpanāracitatvāt "pauruṣeya eva" | 251

[463,5]

"atha mābhūdeṣa do"ṣa "iti pratyekaṃ" vākyasyā"vayavāḥ" vākyārthena "sārthakā iṣyante" | tadā "pratyeka"mavayavānāṃ "sārthakatve mithyānekatvakalpanā" ekasyāpyavayavasya parisamāptārthatvādavayavāntarāpekṣā vākyasya na yujyata ityarthaḥ | yadā "caikāvayavagatyā ca" |
ekasyāpi vākyāvayavasya grahaṇe "vākyārthapratipa"tpratītirbhavet |

[464,1]

atha syād | ekāvayavagatyāpi sāmānyena vākyārthapratītirbhavatyeva |
yadāha | bha rttṛ ha riḥ | "sarveṣāmpṛthagarthavattā sarveṣu pratiśabdaṃ kṛtsnārthaparisamāpteḥ |
tathā yadeva prathamaṃ padamupādīyate tasmin sarvarūpārthopagrāhiṇi niyamānuvādanibandhanāni padāntarāṇi vijñāyanta" iti | tatkathamucyate "vṛthānekatvakalpa"neti |

[464,2]

naiṣa doṣo yasmāt | vivakṣitārthaviśeṣāpekṣayaitaducyate | pratyekaṃ sārthakatvepi mithyānekatvakalpanā | ekāvayavagatyā ca vākyārthapratipad bhavediti |

[464,3]

nāpi kaścidavayavaḥ kārakaviśeṣasyābhidhāyakonyaśca kriyāviśeṣasyābhidhāyaka iti vākyāvayavānāṃ pratyekaṃ sārthakatvāt sāphalyaṃ yuktaṃ | kriyāviśeṣānanvitasya kārakaviśeṣasyābhidhātumaśakyatvāt | tadanvitasya tvabhidhāne mithyānekatvakalpanetyādidoṣastadavastha eveti |

[464,4]

"parisamāptārthetyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | pa"risamāpte"rtho yasya "śabdarū"pasya tattathā | "te cāvayavā" vākyagatāsta"thāvidhā" iti parisamāptārtharūpāḥ "pṛthak pratyekaṃ" | iti hetoḥ pratyekante'vayavā "vākyaṃ" prasaktāḥ | "tathā" ca nā"nekāvayavaṃ vākyaṃ" | anekenāvayavena yuktamekamvākyaṃ na syādityarthaḥ | pratyekaṃ cāvayavānāṃ sārthakatve "ekāvayavapratipattyā" samastavākyārthapratipattyā samasta"vākyārthapratipatteravayavāttaraṃ prati apekṣā" śroturna syāt | "kālakṣepaśca na syāt" | kālaharaṇena vākyārthapratītirna syādityarthaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tasya" vākyārthasya "niṣkalātmano" nirvibhāgasya"kṣaṇenaikena pratipatteḥ" | etadeva kuta | "ekajñānotpattau" tasya vākyārthasya "niḥśeṣāgamāt" |

[465,1]

anye tvanyathā vyācakṣate | ekāvayavapratipattyā ca vākyārthapratipattau tasyāvayavasya kālakṣepaśca na syāt | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | tasyāvayavasya niḥkalātmanaḥ kṣaṇenaikena pratipatteḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | ekajñānotpattau tasya nirbhāgasyāvayavasya niḥśeṣāvagamāt |

[465,2]

"anyatheti" yadyekajñānakṣaṇena sarvasya grahaṇaṃ na syāt tadā gṛhītāgṛhītasvabhāvayore"katvavirodhāt" | viruddhayorekatvāyogāt | 252

[465,3]

atha mā bhūdayandoṣa iti "sakṛcchraruti"riṣyate | tadā "sakṛcchrutau ca sarveṣā"mavayavānāṃ kalpyamānāyāṃ "kālakṣepo na yujyate" | 252

[465,4]

"mā bhūdi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "avayavāntarā"ṇāma"pratīkṣaṇenaikasmādevāvayavād vākyārthasiddhe"rvākyārthaniścayāt kāraṇād a"nekāvayavatvahānirvākyasyeti" kṛtvā"sarve"ṣāmvākyā"vayavānāṃ sakṛcchravaṇamiṣya"te | "tadāpi kālakṣepo na yukta eva" |
kiṃ kāraṇam | "ekāvayavapratipattikāla eva sarveṣāma"vayavānāṃ "śravaṇāt" | krameṇa ca śravaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ | "kramaśravaṇe cā"vayavānāṃ pṛthak "pṛthagarthavatāṃ" satā"mekasmāde"vāvayavā"ttadarthasiddhe"rvākyārthasiddhe"ranyas"yāvayavasya "vaiyarthyāt" | etaccānantaramevoktaṃ |

[465,5]

sakṛtsarvāvayavaśravaṇe parandoṣandarśayannāha | "sakṛcchrutau" sarvāvayavānāṃ yugapadgrahaṇebhyupagamyamāne "pṛthak" pratye"kamartheṣu" vācyeṣva"dṛṣṭasāmarthyā"nāmavayavānāṃ sahitānāmap"yarthavattā ca na sidhyati" |

[465,6]

syādetat | "sahite"ṣvavayaveṣva"rthadarśanāda"rthapratīteḥ pṛthagapyavayavānāmarthapratītijananasāmarthyamastyatoya"madoṣa" iti |

[465,7]

tanna | kiṃ kāraṇam | "pṛthak" pratyekaṃ teṣvavayaveṣ"vasato rūpasyā"rthapratipādanasvabhāvasya "saṃhateṣvasambhavā"t |

[465,8]

kevalānāmavayavānāṃ yadrūpantatonyadeva samuditānāmarthapratipādanasamarthaṃ rūpamupapadyata ityata āha | "arthāntarānutpatteśca" | pūrvakādasamartharūpādarthāntarasya samarthasya rūpasyānutpatteśca | nityatvādvarṇṇānāmiti bhāvaḥ |

[466,1]

anityavādinopyayandoṣaḥ kinnetyāha | "śabdotpa"ttītyādi | "śabdotpattivādinastāvadaya"manantarokto "na doṣa e"va | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | tasya vādinaḥ "pṛthagasamarthānāmapya"samarthānāṃ punaḥ puruṣaprayatnakṛtā"dupakāraviśeṣā"t sahitāvasthāyāmarthapratipādanasāmarthyalakṣaṇenātiśayenā"tiśayava"tāmarthapratītilakṣaṇe "kāryaviśeṣa upayogāt" |
nityavādinastu "pratyekamavayaveṣu samartheṣ"vekasmādapyavayavādarthapratīte"vyarthā syādanya"syāvayavasya "kalpanā" |

[466,2]

evantāvatsāvayavavākyapakṣe doṣa uktaḥ |

[466,3]

"atha punarekamevānavayavamvākyaṃ syāt | tatraikatvepi hi" vākyasyābhyupagamyamāne | tasyā"bhinnasya" nirbhāgasya "kramaśaḥ" krameṇa "gatyasambhavāt" | grahaṇāsambhavāt"kālabheda eva na yujyate" | yato "na hyekasya krameṇa pratipattiryuktā" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "gṛhītāgṛhītayorabhedāt" | na hi tasya gṛhītāt svabhāvādagṛhītonyaḥ svabhāvosti yasya krameṇa grahaṇaṃ syāt | bhavatvakrameṇa vākyasya grahaṇamiti cedāha | "krameṇa ce"tyādi | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sarva"sya "vākya"sya yo vyavahārakālo vaktuḥ śrotuśca "śravaṇa"kālaḥ "smaraṇakāla"śca | tasyā"nekakṣaṇanimeṣānukramasamāpteḥ" | anekaḥ kṣaṇo yasminnakṣinimeṣe sonekakṣaṇanimeṣaḥ tasyānukramaḥ paripāṭistenānukramaṇotpatteḥ kāraṇāt |

[466,4]

varṇṇānāmidaṃ krameṇa grahaṇaṃ vākyasya tvakrameṇaiveti cedāha | "varṇṇe"tyādi | "varṇṇarūpāsaṃsparśino" varṇṇarūpavyatiriktas"yaikabu"ddhikṣaṇapra"tibhāsinaḥ śabdātmanopratibhāsanāt" | etadeva kutaḥ | varṇṇānukramapratīteḥ "varṇṇānukrame"ṇaiva vākyasya "pratī" | na hi kramapratibhāsaṃ varṇṇakṛtaṃ muktvā'paro krama pratibhāsassampadyate śrotrajñāne | itaśca nākramasya vākyasya pratibhāsaḥ | yata"stadaviśeṣepi" tvanmate na teṣāṃ varṇṇānāmaviśeṣepi varṇṇā"nukramakṛtatvād vākya"bheda"syānukramavatī vākyapratītirna"
yugapadbhāvinī | "varṇṇānukramopakārānapekṣaṇe" | varṇṇānukramakṛtamupakāraṃ vākyaṃ yadi nāpekṣeta | tadā "tai"rvarṇṇai"ryathākathaṃcit" tatkramairanyakramai"rapi prayuktairyatkiñcid vākyaṃ pratīyeta" | sarostīti prayukte rasostīti pratīyeta | varṇṇopakārānapekṣatvād vināpi vā varṇṇairvākyaṃ pratīyeta | na ca varṇṇopakārāpekṣayā vākyapratītiḥ |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tai"rvarṇṇairanukramavadbhirasya" vākyasyopakārā"yogāt" | kramavadbhiḥ kramavānevopakāraḥ karttavyastathā copakāryasya kramavattvaṃ syāt | na caivamiṣyate |

[467,1]

akramā eva varṇṇā vākyasyopakārakā bhaviṣyantīti cedāha | "akrameṇa ce"tyādi | "akrameṇa" varṇṇānāṃ"vyāharttumu"ccārayitu"maśakyatvāt" | na ca kramākramopakāravyatirekeṇānyaḥ prakārostīti ga"tyantarābhāvānno"pakārakā varṇṇā vākyasyeti sthitaṃ | "naiva vākye varṇṇāḥ santi" | naiva varṇṇātmakaṃ vākyaṃ | kintarhi varṇṇebhyorthānta"rameka"meva "śabdarūpaṃ" vākyaṃ | "vyañja"kā dhvanayo"nukrama"vanto viśiṣṭenānukrameṇa vyañjayanti na vyutkrameṇa | taduktaṃ |

[467,2]

"yathānupūrvīniyamo vikāre kṣīrabījayoḥ | tathaiva pratipattṝṇānniyato buddhiṣu kramaḥ | "

[467,3]

tena yathākathañcit prayuktairityādiradoṣa iti |

[467,4]

"vyañjakānukramavaśāt" tadekamapi vākyaṃ vyaktyanukramāda"nukramavat" | sphoṭarūpāvibhāgena varṇṇānāṃ nādarūpāṇāṃ grahaṇād "varṇṇavibhāgavacca" puruṣasya pra"tibhāti" | paramārthatonukramavarṇṇavibhāgābhyāṃ rahitamapi | taduktaṃ |

[467,5]

"nādasya kramajanyatvānna pūrvo nāparaśca saḥ | akramaḥ kramarūpeṇa bhedavāniva jāyate || tasmādabhinnakāleṣu varṇṇavākyapadādiṣu | śabdakālasvabhāvaśca nādabhedād vibhidyata iti || "

[468,1]

atrottaramāha | anu"kramavate"tyādi | evammanyate | avadhāraṇarūpā vābhi"vyakti"ranavadhāraṇarūpā vā | tadāvadhāraṇarūpābhivyakti"rakramasya" vākyasyānukramavatā "vyañjakena pratyuktā" pratikṣiptā | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "vyaktāvyakta"rūpayoravadhṛtānavadhṛtarūpayorekatra "virodhāt" | na hyavadhṛtarūpādanyadanavadhṛtaṃ rūpāntaramekasyāsti yena tatpaścād vyajyeta | tena yaducyate | "prathamena varṇṇenābhivyaktasyānavadhāraṇādavadhāraṇārthamanyeṣāmvarṇṇānāṃ vyāpāra" iti tadapāstaṃ | pratha menaiva varṇṇenāvadhāraṇarūpayā vyakterniṣpāditatvāt | anavadhāraṇarūpāyāṃ vyaktau samastavarṇṇetyādinottaramvakṣyati |

[468,2]

atha syād | varṇṇebhyo bhinnameva vākyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu dhvanisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ |
taduktaṃ |

[468,3]

kaiścid dhvanirasamvedyaḥ svatantronyaiḥ prakalpita iti |

[468,4]

atrāpyāha | "avarṇṇe"tyādi | "a"vidyamānā "varṇṇa"rūpā "bhāgā" yasmin "vākye"
tasminnabhyupagamyamāne puruṣasyā"sakalaśrāviṇo" samastavarṇṇānukramaśrāviṇaḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ śroturityarthaḥ | kadācidapyasakalasya "vākya"sya "gatiḥ" śru"tirna syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | varṇṇavyatirikta"syaikasya" vākyasya "śakalābhāvād" bhāgābhāvāt | bhavati ca loke katipayavarṇṇaśravaṇe pūrvavākyabhāgaśravaṇapratītiḥ | atha varṇṇairbhāgavato vākyasyābhyupagamāt | katipayavarṇṇaśravaṇe pūrvavākyabhāgaśravaṇamiṣyate |

[468,5]

tadayuktam | ekatvād vākyasya yadi pūrvabhāgaśravaṇantadā "sakalaśrutiḥ"
sarvātmanā vākyasya śravaṇaṃ syāt | pūrvabhāgāvyatirekāt | atha na sakalaśrutistadā "na vā kasya"cichrutiḥ syāt | pūrvasyāpi bhāgasya śrutirna syād vākyavyatiriktatvāditi |

[468,6]

tena yaducyate ma ṇḍa ne na | "vyañjakasādṛśyācca vākye tadātmagrahaṇābhimānastena nāśravaṇaṃ sakalaśravaṇaṃ veti" |

[468,7]

tadapāstaṃ | sakalāsakalavarṇṇabhāgapratipattikāle niṣkalasya vākyasyāśravaṇāt | na hi vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ sādṛśyamvarṇṇāvarṇṇātmakatvena visadṛśatvāt tatkathaṃ vākye varṇṇātmagrahaṇābhimāna iti yatkiñcidetat |

[469,1]

anye tvanyathā vyācakṣate | athopakāryopakārābhāvenāyuktamapi kramavad vyañjakānuvidhānamakramasya vākyasyābhyupagamyate | tataścāsakalaśrutirityata āha |
sakaletyādi | khaṇḍaśaḥ śroturapi "sakala"sya niṣkalasya vākyasya "śrutiḥ" syāt |
atha neṣyate tadā "na vā kasyacit" puṃsaḥ syāt | sakalavarṇṇāśrāviṇopi na vā niṣkalasya vākyasya śrutiḥ syāt | antyāvasthāyāmapi yugapad varṇṇānāmaśravaṇena bhāgasyaiva śravaṇāt |

[469,2]

atha syād | yathā śloka ekadā prakāśito nāvadhāritonyadā prakāśane tvavadhāraṇasaho bhavati | punaḥ punaḥ prakāśane tvavadhāryate | tathā vākyaṃ pūrvadhvanibhāvānabhivyaktamapi nāvadhāritaṃ | tena pūrvapūrvavākyābhivyaktyāhitaistu saṃskārairvākyāvadhāraṇaṃprati pratyayabhūtairantyavarṇṇaśravaṇakāle tadavadhāryate | tasmād varṇṇenānukramavatā'kramasya vākyasya vyaktiryujyata eva | taduktaṃ |

[469,3]

"yathānuvākaḥ śloko vā soḍhatvamupagacchati | āvṛttyā na tu sa granthapratyāvṛttirnirucyate || pratyayairanupākhyeyairgrahaṇānuguṇaistathā | dhvaniḥ prakāśite śabde svarūpamavadhāryate || nādairāhitabījāyāmantyena dhvaninā saha | āvṛttaparipākāyāmvuddhau śabdovadhāryata iti || "

[469,4]

etadevāha | "samaste"tyādi | samastairvarṇṇaiḥ pratyekaṃ vākyābhivyaktipūrvakā ye kṛtāḥ saṃskārā vidyante yasyā buddhessā tathā | tayā "samastavarṇṇasaṃskāravatyāntyayā"
'ntyavarṇṇaviṣayayā "buddhyā" niṣkalasya "vākya"syā"vadhāraṇamityapi" kalpanā "mithyā" |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" vākyasyā"varṇṇarūpasaṃsparśinaḥ" | varṇṇarūpasaṃsparśarahitasya śrotrajñāne "kasyacit" puruṣasya "kadācida"pya"pratipatteḥ" prativarṇṇoccāraṇaṃ pratibhāsābhāva ityarthaḥ ślokasya tūccāraṇaṃ pratibhāsosti |

[469,5]

atha syād | varṇṇātmakameva vākyantenendriyajñānaviṣayamevetyata āha | "varṇṇānāṃ cākrameṇāpratipatteḥ" krameṇaiva pratipatteḥ kāraṇāt "kutokramamekabuddhigrāhya"mvākya"nnāma" |

[470,1]

atha syād | "antyavarṇṇapratipatterurdhva" mānasena jñānena niravayavasya vākyasyāvadhāraṇamastyeveti cedāha | "na ce"tyādi | antyavarṇṇapratipatterūrdhva"manya"mvarṇṇavyatirikta"maśakala"makhaṇḍaṃ nirvibhāgamityarthaḥ | "śabdātmānaṃ na copalakṣayāmaḥ" |

[470,2]

"nāpi svayamayamvaktā" yathoktaṃ śabdātmāna"mvibhāvayati" | tathā hi tadāpi vākyamavadhārayan varṇṇānukramameva bāhyarūpatayāvadhārayati | na tu varṇṇavyatiriktannirvibhāgamvākyamavadhārayati | kevalamayaṃ vaktā yathā mayoktaṃ "samāptakalaḥ śabdontyāyāmbuddhau bhātītyevaṃ yadi syāt | sādhu" me syāditi yā "kalyāṇakāma"tābhipretārthāśaṃsā | "tayā mūḍhamatiḥ svapnāyate" | asvapannapi svapne vyavasthitamivātmānamācarati | adhikaraṇācceti vaktavyamiti saptamyantādapi |
kyaj | kyaj vidhānepyetadvaktavyaṃ smaryata ityeke | anye tvāhuḥ | svapnavānevābhedopacarāt | athavā matvarthīyasyārśa ādidarśanena vidhānāt | svapnaśabdenoktaḥ | tena kartturevopamānāt kyaj pratyayaḥ | supta ivācarati svapnāyata iti yāvat | anenopahasati |

[470,3]

smaraṇajñānena tarhi padavākyamakramaṃ gṛhyata iti cedāha | "na hī"tyādi | "na hi smaryamāṇayorapi padavākyayoḥ" sambandhino "varṇṇāḥ" padavākyayorbhedavyavasthāpakāḥ"kramaviśeṣa"mantareṇākramāyāmekasyāṃ buddhau na hi "vibhāvyante" kintvanubhavakramavat smaraṇamapi krameṇaiveti yāvat | yadi tvakramāyāmantyāyāṃ buddhau padavākyayorvarṇṇāḥ kramaviśeṣamantareṇavibhāvyante | tadā tasyā"makramāyāṃ buddhau paurvāparyābhāvād" varṇṇā yugapadeva vibhāvyanta iti kṛtvā teṣāṃ "padavākyabhedānāṃ" padabhedānāṃ vākyabhedānāṃ"ca tatkṛto" varṇṇapaurvāparyapratibhāsakṛto "bhedo" viśeṣo "na syāt" | varṇṇānāṃ kramaviśeṣapratibhāsādeva padavākyānāmparasparambhedastadabhāve sa na syāditi yāvat |

[471,1]

"nāpyakrama"mityādi | na vidyate varṇṇakramo yasmin śabdarūpe tadakramaṃ "śabdarūpamvarṇṇe"bhyonya"nna paśyāma ityuktaṃ" | tasyāvarṇṇarūpasaṃsparśinaḥ kasyacidapyapratipatterityuktatvāt |

[471,2]

jātisphoṭastu jātyabhāvādeva nirastaḥ | "sati vā" tasminnavarṇṇakrame śabdarūpe | "tac"chabdarūpama"nityamvā syāt nityamvā" | vastuno gatyantarābhāvāt |
yadya"nityantadā" puruṣapra"yatnasambhūtaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na ta"dvākyaṃ | pauruṣeyameva syāt | "avaśyaṃ hyanityamutpattima"diti "kutaścit" svaheto"rbhavati" | tathā "hyākasmikatve"
heturahitatve "śabda"syābhyupagamyamāne "deśādiniyamaḥ" | ādiśabdāt kālavastuniyamī na "syādityuktaṃ" |

[471,3]

"tacca" vākyaṃ puruṣa"prayatnena preritānyaviguṇāni karaṇāni yeṣāṃ" puṃsānteṣāmbhavad "dṛṣṭaṃ" puna"ranyathā" vaktukāmatābhāve karaṇavaiguṇye vā neti | "na dṛṣṭa"miti puruṣavyāpārānvayavyatirekalakṣaṇasya "kāraṇadharmasya" vākyaṃ prati "darśanāta puruṣavyāpāra eva" vākyasya "kāraṇamataḥ" kāraṇāt "pauruṣeya"mapi vākyaṃ | 253

[471,4]

atha nityantad vākyaṃ tadāsya "nityatve"bhyupagamyamāne "nityopalabdhi"rvākyasya"syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tasya nityasya sato "nāvaraṇasambhavāt" | āvaraṇābhāvāt |

[471,5]

"athe"tyādi vyākhyānaṃ | atha "tacchabdarūpamvākyātmakannityaṃ syādupalabhyasvabhāvaṃ ca" | upalabhyaḥ svabhāvosyeti vigrahaḥ || "sa" upalabhyaḥ "svabhāvastasya" vākyasya "kadācinnāpaiti" na hīyata "iti" kṛtvā "nityamupalabhyeta" | yasmā"devaṃ" jñānajananalakṣaṇādapi "sāmarthyāt pracyavet" |
kiṃ kāraṇam | "tasya jñānajananasāmarthya"sya tadā"tmakatvā"nnityaśabdasvabhāvāt |
nāpi śabdājjñānajananasāmarthyamarthāntaraṃ yasmāda"rthāntaratvasya prāgeva niṣiddhatvāt" | "bhāvānupakārakatvaprasaṅgā" dityatrāntare |

[472,1]

stimitena vāyunāvaraṇānnityaṃ nopalabhyanta iti cedāha | "nāpī"tyādi | "tasya" bāhyasyo"palabhyātmano" dṛśyasya "kiñcidupalambhāvaraṇaṃ sambhavati" | tatsiddhau pramāṇābhāvāt | "satopi vā" vidyamānasyāpi cāvaraṇasya "tadātmānamakhaṇḍatayo"
nityaśabdātmānamapracyāvayataḥ | "sāmarthyatiraskārāyogāt" | jñānajananaśaktyabhibhavāyogāt | yasmā"nna hi tatra" śabdātmanya"tiśayama"nutpādayannāvaraṇābhimataḥ"kiñcitkaro" nāma | "akiṃcitkaraścā"rthaḥ kaḥ kasyā"varaṇaṃ" jñānavibandhaka"manyadveti"
prakārāntareṇopaghātakaṃ naiveti yāvat | nirloṭhitaprāyametat | "vicāritaprāyametat"
prāk | akiñcitkarasyāvaraṇatvandṛṣṭamiti kathayannāha paraḥ | "kuḍyādaya" ityādi | "kuḍyādayo ghaṭādīnāṃ kamatiśayamutpādayanti | kamvā" sāmarthyātiśayaṃ "khaṇḍayanti yenāvaraṇamiṣyante" | tasmād yathā te'tiśayamanutpādayanto ghaṭādīnāmāvaraṇamiṣyante | tathā nityasyāpi śabdasya kiṃcidāvaraṇambhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ |

[472,2]

"na brūma" ityādinā pariharati | "te" kuḍyādayaḥ "kañcid" ghaṭādikamatiśāyayanti viśiṣṭaṃ svabhāvaṃ kurvantīti na brūmaḥ | kathantarhyāvaraṇamucyanta ityāha | "api tu na sarva" ityādi | na sarvaghaṭakṣaṇās"sarvasya" puruṣasye"ndriyajñānahetavaḥ" |
kintarhi | "parasparasahitāstu viṣayendriyālokāḥ" | parasparato "viśiṣṭakṣaṇāntarotpādāt" kāraṇād "vijñānahetavaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anupakāryasya" parairanādheyātiśayasya parampratya"napekṣāyogāt" | paraiścānādheyātiśayaḥ śaktasvabhāvovā syādaśaktasvabhāvo vā | tatra "śaktasvabhāvasya nityaṃ" kārya"jananaṃ" syā"dajananamanyasye"tyaśaktasvabhāvasya "syādityuktaṃ prāk | te ca" viṣayendriyādayaḥ | tena"pratighātinā" kuḍyādinā'"vyavahitā" yadā bhavanti tadā"nyonyasyopakāriṇaḥ" |
kiṃ kāraṇam | "avyavadhāne"tyādi | na vidyate vyavadhānaṃ yasya deśasya so"vyavadhānadeśa"stasya "yogyatā" sāmarthyanta"tsahakāritvāt teṣāṃ" viṣayādīnāma"nyonyātiśayotpatteḥ" | teṣāṃ punarālokādīnāṃ kuḍyādikṛte "vyavadhāne sati" | avyavadhānadeśayogyatālakṣaṇasya "hetorabhāvāt samarthakṣaṇāntarānutpatteḥ" kāraṇād ghaṭādi"jñānānutpattiḥ" | yata evaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu na sarvakālamekasvarūpānuvṛtti"stasmāt parvotpannasya samarthasye"ndriyādikṣaṇasya svarasata eva "nirodhāt | sati" ca vyavadhāyake "kuḍyenyasyotpitsoḥ" samarthasya kṣaṇasya yathokta"kāraṇābhāvenānutpatte"rjñānakāraṇavaikalyamataḥ kāraṇavaikalyāt | ghaṭādiṣu kuḍyādivyavahiteṣu "jñānānutpattiriti" kṛtvā "kuḍyādaya āvaraṇa"mucyate | "na punaḥ prāg" vijñānajananayogyasya ghaṭādeḥ"pratibandhāt" | kiṅkāraṇam | tasya ghaṭāderyogyasvabhāve sthitasya kuḍyādisannidhānepi svabhāvādapracyuteḥ | yassamarthaḥ sa samartha eva | na tasyānyathātvaṃ karttuṃ śakyate |
tadevaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu padārtheṣu yathoktavidhinātiśayamakurvadapyāvaraṇamucyate |

[473,1]

adhunātiśayakaraṇenaivāvaraṇamityāha | "athave"tyādi | sambhavatyapi "bhāvānāṃ" ghaṭādīnāṃ "kṣaṇikānāmanyonyopakāraḥ" kuḍyādikṛtopyukāraḥ sahakārikṛte upakāre vivādābhāvāt | na tvāvaraṇamindriyaviṣayābhyāṃ dūravarti | tat kathamindriyaviṣayāvupakarotītyāha | "acintyatvā"dityādi | naivaṃ cintayituṃ śakyaṃ dūradeśavartyāvaraṇaṃ kathaṃ viṣayasyopakārakaṃ | dūravarttināpyayaskāntenāyasaḥ samākarṣaṇāt | "hetu"rupādānakāraṇaṃ | "pratyayaḥ" sahakārikāraṇantayoḥ "sāmarthyasyācintyatvādasarvavidā"'sarvajñena |

[474,1]

yatra evantena kāraṇena "yadindriyaviṣayayormadhye sthitamāvaraṇaṃ" | tattāvindriyaviṣayāvatiśāyayedapi | kena prakāreṇa | vijñānotpattivaiguṇyatāratamyena | apiśabdaḥ sambhāvanāyāṃ sambhāvyateyamartho na hyatra kiñcid bādhakamastīti |

[474,2]

nanu sannihitenāvaraṇena dvitīyādikṣaṇe tad dravyaṃ jñānajananāsamarthañjanyate | na tu samparkkakṣaṇa evānupakārāt | tataśca prathame kṣaṇe tad dravyamāvaraṇasannidhānepi dṛśyaṃ syāt | jñānajananasāmarthyasyāpratibandhāt |

[474,3]

naiṣa doṣaḥ | yo hyāvaraṇakṣaṇasya janako dṛṣṭaḥ sa āvriyamāṇasyāpi kṣaṇa syāsamarthasyaiva janako dṛṣṭo yathā dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu | tenādāvapyāvaraṇakṣaṇajanaka āvriyamāṇakṣaṇamasamartha janayed | ata evocyate | acintyatvāddhetupratyayasāmarthyasyeti | tena kutaḥ prathamakṣaṇe dravyasyāvaraṇasannidhāne darśanaṃ syāt |
tāratamyagrahaṇe cāyamartha upadarśitaḥ | vaiguṇyamādāvarthasyāvaraṇakāraṇetrāpi kṛtaṃ |
dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣu tadāvaraṇamatiśayamādhatta iti |

[474,4]

syādetad | āvaraṇasya vaiguṇyādhāne sāmarthyamanvayavyatirekābhyāmanu gantavyaṃ | na cānvayavyatireko vidyete ityāha | "āvaraṇa"bhedenetyādi | karppaṭapaṭakuḍyādi vyavadhānabhedena śabdādau śabdagandhasparśeṣu | śrutigrahaṇamupalakṣaṇārtha |
tena śravaṇadarśanādīnāṃ "māndya"tatpā"ṭavayordarśanā"dāvāvaraṇasāmarthyamanugamyate | anyathā yadyāvaraṇena viśeṣo nādhīyate | tadā tasyāvaraṇasyā"kiṃcitkarasya yatsannidhānantasya sannidhānasyāpyasannidhānatulyatvāt | tasya śabdasyedamāvaraṇamityupasaṃhāraḥ sambandho vikalpanirmita eva syānna vastvāśrayaḥ" |

[474,5]

atha syāt | tadā dhvanirapi pratīyata ityata āha | "na dhvanirato" vācakādbhinno rūpantena vācakena saha pṛthag vā śrūyate | dhvanibhyaḥ śrūyata eveti cedāha | "na hi pratyakṣerthe paropadeśo garīyān" | yena svayamvivekenāśrṛṇvannapi tvadvacanamātrād dhvaneḥ śravaṇaṃ vyatiriktasya pratipadyate | taditi tasmā"dayaṃ" śrotā "sthiteṣvanyeṣu vyavaharttṛṣve"kasyaiva vyāharataḥ | "kevalame"vārthāntaradhvaniviviktameva "śabdaṃ śṛṇvaṃstadupalambhapratyayānāṃ" vyavaharttṛgatānāṃ karaṇasāṅgalyādīnāṃ śabdopalambhapratyayānāṃ "sāmarthyābhāvaṃ pratyeti" | kasmin karttavye | "tadanyaniṣpādane" śrayamāṇācchabdādanyasya dhvanerniṣpādane | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yadi" tadupalambhapratyayāstadanyaniṣpādane "samarthāḥ syustadā tat sādhitantaiḥ" śabdopalambhapratyayaiḥ sādhitaṃ dhvanirūpa"mupalabhyeta" | na copalabhyate |

[482,3]

atha syāt | kalakale te dhvanyārambhakā ityāha | "tatsvabhāvā" ityādi | dhvanirahitaśabdajananasvabhāvā eva punaḥ śabdopalambhapratyayā vyāharatsvapi "bahuṣu kalakale" svakāryaṃ śabdaṃ muktvā "kāryāntaraṃ" dhvaniṃ "kathamārabheran" | naivārabheran | yasmānna "hi kāraṇābhede kāryabhedo yuktaḥ" | tasminneva kāraṇe kāryabhedaḥ śabdadhvanilakṣaṇo na yuktaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | kāraṇabhedānapekṣiṇaḥ kārya"bhedasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgādityuktaṃ prāk" | tasmāt kalakale vācakā eva śrūyante na dhvanayaḥ |

[482,4]

nanu yadi kalakale vācakā eva santītyabhyupagamyate | kathantarhi dūravarttināṃ dhvanimātraśravaṇaṃ samīpavarttināṃ vācakānāṃ dhvanīnāṃ śravaṇamiti |

[483,1]

sattyaṃ | ya eva vācakāḥ prayatnaniṣpannāsta eva parasparasaṃharṣeṇa dhvanyārambhakāḥ | tena kalakale keṣāṃcid dhvanimātrasya pratītiranyeṣāmubhayapratītirityadoṣaḥ | 259

[483,2]

yadapyuktaṃ samīpavartināpi kalakale dhvanaya eva kevalaṃ śrūyante na vācakāḥ śabdā iti |

[483,3]

tadapyayuktaṃ | yasmānna "ca kalakale vācako na śrūyate" | kintu śrūyata eva |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "padavākyavicchedānāmupalakṣaṇāt" | api ca "kathaṃ" cendriyasyaikaśaktiprati"niyamād bhinnadhvanigatirbhave"t | bahūnāṃ dhvanīnāṃ grahaṇambhavet | naiva bhavet |

[483,4]

"tānī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "tāni pratiniyataśaktīnyapīndriyāṇi" yugapa"nnānārūpān" dhvanīn śrṛṇvanti | kīdṛśān | "pratiśabdaniyatān" | śabdaṃ śabdaṃ prati vyañjakatvena niyatān | "na tve"va śabdān yugapa"cchraṇvantīti" kaḥ "śabdeṣveṣā"mindriyāṇāṃ "nirvedo" vaimukhyaṃ yena tān na śrṛṇvanti | na ca bhāvaśaktirīdṛśīti śakyamvaktuṃ | "kadācid" bahūnāmapi "vācakānāṃ śravaṇāt"260

[483,5]

"yadukta"mityādi paraḥ | yaduktambau ddhe na "vācakebhyaḥ" varṇṇapadavākyebhyo "bhedena"
dhvanayo na siddhā iti | kathanna siddhāḥ | siddhā eva | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | vacanādarthapratīteḥ | śabdāduccaritādarthasya vācyasya gateḥ | "na ceyamarthagatirdhvanibhyaḥ sambhavati" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "na hi dhvanibhāgāda"lpīyaso varṇṇavyañjakādartha"pratītiḥ" |
varṇṇopyekastāvat prāyeṇānarthakaḥ | prāgeva vyañjakolpīyān dhvanibhāgaḥ |
sahitā pratipādakā iti cedāha | "na ca sonyaṃ sameti" | solpīyān dhvanibhāgaḥ kṣaṇikatvādanyamuttarakālabhāvinaṃ dhvanibhāgaṃ sameti saṃśliṣyati | "tadi"ti tasmādiyamarthapratītiḥ samastāni paripūrṇṇāni padavākyarūpāṇi yasmin vācake tattathā | "tena sādhyā" dhvaniṣu na sambhavati | kīdṛśeṣu | "asamastā" asaṃśliṣṭā bhāgā utpannotpannadhvanibhāgasya kṣaṇikatvena dvitīya"dhvanibhāgānavasthānād" yeṣānteṣu | iti evamartha"pratipattya"nyathānupapattyā siddhama"kramasattvaṃ" | akramaṃ sattvaṃ yasya "śabdarūpasya"
tattathā | nirvibhāgamiti yāvat | "kramavad" vibhāgaśca vācakavyatirikto dhvaniḥ | kramavanto bhāgā yasyeti vigrahaḥ |

[484,1]

"tanne"tyādinā pratiṣedhati | tadetadanantaroktaṃ na sambhavati | kasmāt | "krama" vanto ye varṇṇāstadv"yatirekiṇā kramasya" śabdasya | "na hi vayandevadattādi padavākyeṣu dakārādipratibhāsaṃ muktvā paraṃ pratibhāsamupalakṣayāma" ityādinā "prāgeva niṣiddhatvāt" |

[484,2]

yadi cāsamastabhāgeṣu dhvaniṣvarthapratīterasambhavādakramasattvaṃ śabdarūpaṃ kalpyate |
tadātiprasaṅgaścaivaṃ kalpyamāne | "tathā" hi hastādīnāṃ yathā saṃketagamanāgamanādisūcakāni yāni karmāṇi teṣāṃ ye bhāgāsteṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt "pūrveṇa karmabhāgenāparasyo"ttarasya karmabhāgasyāpratisandhānādaghaṭanāt | "ekāṃśāccāpratīteḥ" | ekasmāccālpīyasaḥ karmabhāgād yathā saṃketasya gamanāgamanādilakṣaṇasyārthasyāpratipatteḥ | "tadvyatirekī" | karmabhāgebhyonyaḥ | yathāsaṃketaṃ "hastasaṃjñādayaḥ" | ādiśabdādarthapratītau śiraḥkampādayo gṛhyante | teṣvarthapratītihetuḥ "samastarūpakarmātmābhyupagantavyaḥ syāt |
śabdavadeva" | dhvanivyatiriktaśabdakalpanāvat |

[484,3]

yatpunaruktamma ṇḍa ne na | "yadā traividyavṛddhā hastasaṃjñādiviṣayānutkṣepaṇatvādiśabdanirdeśyān sāmānyaviśeṣānabhyupagacchanti tadā koyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ | ekaḥ karmātmābhyupagantavya" iti |

[484,4]

tadayuktaṃ | yato yadyekamutkṣepaṇarūpaṅkarma siddhambhavet | tathā parāparamapiyadi siddhaṃ syāt tadā teṣu bahuṣūtkṣepaṇeṣu pratyekamutkṣepaṇatvasāmānyamvartteta |
tadeva tu na siddhaṃ pūrvāparakarmabhāgānāmananvayāt | na ca viśeṣābhāve sāmānyasadbhāvaḥ | nāpi karmabhāgeṣu pratyekamutkṣepaṇādirūpatayā pratītiḥ | kintarhi |
tadbhāgarūpatayā | tatkathanteṣu bhāgeṣūtkṣepaṇatvasāmānyamabhyupagamyeta |
abhyupagame vā ekasmādapi karmabhāgād gamanādilakṣaṇasyārthasya pratipattiḥ syādarthābhidhāyakasya sāmānyasya bhāvāditiṃ yatkiñcidetat | yathā ca na karmabhāgeṣu vyatiriktaṃ karmātmā tathā dhvanibhāgeṣvapi na vyatiriktaḥ śabdātmā | kathantarhyarthapratītirityāha | "kramabhāvina eve"tyādi | "yathāsvaṃ" yasya yatkaraṇantālvādi |
tasya "prayo"go vyāpārastasmād "bhinnā varṇṇabhāgāḥ | karmabhāgā vā yathāsvaṃ karaṇaprayogāt" | karmahetoḥ prayogāt "kramabhāvino" bhinnā ityatrāpi sambandhanīyaṃ | te yathoktā varṇṇabhāgāḥ karmabhāgā vā "krameṇa vikalpaviṣayāda"tyanubhavajñānānukramānusāriṇāṃ vikalpānāṃ krameṇa viṣayamupagatā "yathāsaṃketamevārthapratītiṃ janayantīti nyāyyaṃ" | yuktyapetatvāt |

[485,1]

"kiṃ ce"ti doṣāntaramapyāha | yaiḥ kairapi doṣaiḥ pūrvapūrvasya dhvanibhāgasyottarottareṇa dhvanibhāgenāpratisandhānādityādikaiḥ karaṇabhūtaiste "dhvanayo" vai yā ka ra ṇā dīnāmavācakās"sammatāḥ" | dṛṣṭāḥ | taiḥ kramabhāvibhi"rdhvanibhirvyajyamānesmin"dhvanivyatiriktepi "vācake kathanna te" | dhvanibhāvino doṣā na santi bhavantyeva |

[485,2]

nanu dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ samuditā vā pūrvoktena nyāyena nārthasya pratipādakāḥ |
vācakasya tu te pratyekamabhivyañjakā iṣyante | ekena dhvaninābhivyaktasya vāṃcakasyānavadhṛtatvādanyānyairabhivyaktasya saṃskārādhānatāratamyaprabodhenāvadhāraṇamiti dhvanibhirvyajyamāne vācakepi kutaste doṣā iti | taduktamma ṇḍa ne na |

[485,3]

"nānekāvayavaṃ vākyaṃ padaṃ vā sphoṭavādināṃ | ekatvepi hyabhinnasya kramaśo darśitā gatiriti | "

[485,4]

tadayuktam | abhivyaktirhi jñānaṃ | na ca śabdānugamena vinā jñānamiṣyate bhavadbhiḥ | tenābhivyaktiriti niścaya evocyate | na ca prathamadhvanyanantaramvācakaniścayaḥ | pratibhāsata iti | tatkathamasyābhivyaktiḥ |

[485,5]

tasmāt sthitametad yathā dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ samastā vārthapratipādane'śaktāstathā vācakābhivyaktāviti |

[485,6]

krametyādi vivaraṇaṃ | "kramotpādibhirdhvanibhāgairvyaktaḥ prakāśitaḥ kilā"kramaḥ śabdātmā "vācako rthamvakti" | na sannidhānamātreṇa 261

[485,7]

"tamapi" dhvanivyatiriktaṃ śabdātmānaṃ "te" dhvanayo "na sakṛt prakāśayanti" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | teṣāṃ dhvanibhāgānāṃ "kramabhāvāt" | nā"pyeka eva" dhvanibhāgaḥ śabdaṃ "vya" | niścāyayati | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tadanyasya" vyañjakatvenābhimatasya dhvanibhāgasya "vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt" | itaścaiko dhvanibhāgo na samastasya śabdasya vyañjako yasmā"dekavarṇṇabhāgakāle ca samastasya" vācakarūpasyā"nupalakṣaṇāt" |

[486,1]

"tadi"ti tasmādayaṃ śabdātmā | dhvanibhāgaiḥ kramabhāvibhiḥ krameṇa vyajyamānatvāt | "apratisaṃhito" na saṃghaṭita"ssakalopalambho" yasya śabdātmanaḥ sa evambhūtaḥ śabdātmā | "upalambhasākalyasādhyamartha" svābhidheyaṃ prakāśanalakṣaṇaṃ "kathaṃ sādhayet" | naiva sādhayet | kimiva | "dhvanivat" | yathā dhvanibhāgāstvanmatena pūrvvāpareṇāpratisandhānādarthanna prakāśayeyustadvat |

[486,2]

"ko hī"tyādinaitadeva samarthayate | "upalambhasādhyeṣvartheṣu ko hi saṃdasatoratyantānupalambhe" sati "viśeṣo" naiva kaścit | yathā hi kṣaṇikā dhvanibhāgā uttarottarabhāgāvasthāyāmasattvādasamastopalambhanānna samarthāstathaivākramopi śabdātmā sannapyasvīkṛtasamastopalambhano na samartha eveti | "na cā"yaṃ śabdātmā | upalambhanirapekṣaḥ"sannidhimātreṇā"rthapratīti"sādhanaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇa | tasyā "vyapekṣaṇāt" | sā ceyaṃ vyaktiḥ kramabhāvinī sadasatoḥ | "sataḥ" śabdātmanaḥ | "asata"śca dhvanibhāgasya "krameṇa bhavantī tulyopayogā" | tulyaphaleti kṛtvā "dhvanibhiraśakyasādhanaṃ" sādhayitumaśakyaṃ yat kāryamarthapratītilakṣaṇaṃ | ta"trāpi tathā" | dhvanibhirvyajyamānepi śabdātmani tathā | aśakyasādhanameve"tyalamanyena" śabdena dhvanivyatiriktena kalpitena |

[486,3]

"tasmānna varṇṇeṣvapauruṣeyatā" | nāpi vākya ityupasaṃhāraḥ |

[486,4]

na varṇṇavyatiriktamvākyaṃ kintu "varṇṇānupūrvī vākyaṃ" | taccāpauruṣeyamiti "cet" |

[487,1]

"tanna" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "varṇṇānāmā"nupūrvyāḥ sakāśā"dabhedataḥ" |

[487,2]

"na" varṇṇebhyo"rthāntarameva śabdarūpamvākyamapauruṣeyaṃ" | kintarhi | "varṇṇānukramalakṣaṇaṃ hi no"smākaṃ mī māṃ sa kā nām"vākyaṃ | tadapauruṣeyaṃ sādhyamiti cet" |

[487,3]

"na | varṇṇānāmānupūrvyāḥ" sakāśā"dabhedāt | neyamā"nupūrvī "arthāntaramvarṇṇebhyaḥ" |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "dṛśyā"yāmanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāyāntasyāmānupūrvyāmaṅgīkriyamāṇāyāṃ varṇṇebhyo vibhāgena "bhedo nopalambhaprasaṅgāt" | na copalaṃbhyata ityabhāvasiddhau svabhāvānupalabdhirvācyā | "athādṛśyā"nupūrvī | tadāpyadṛśyāyāmānupūrvyāṃ | "tata" anupūrvyā arthā"pratipattiprasaṅgāt" | na ca dṛśyāyā ānupūrvyā grāhakaṃ pratyakṣamadṛśyatvādeva | nāpyanumānaṃ liṅgābhāvāt | varṇṇebhyo "bhedavatyāścānupūrvyā abhāve varṇṇamātramaviśiṣṭaṃ" sarvatra laukikavaidikavākye"ṣviti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ" yaḥ kimanena pariśoṣitaṃ syādityādinoktaḥ |

[487,4]

atha syād | kramo varṇṇānāṃ dharmamātranna vastvantaraṃ tenādoṣaḥ | taduktaṃ |

[487,5]

"dharmamātramasau teṣānna vastvantaramiṣyate | krameṇa jñāyamānāḥ syurvarṇṇāstenāvabodhakāḥ | na ca kramasya kāryatvaṃ pūrvasiddhaparigrahāt | vaktā na hi kramaṃ kaścit svātantryeṇa prapadyate | yathaivāsya parairuktastathaivainaṃ vivakṣati | paropyevaṃ sataścāsya sambandhavadanāditā | "

[487,6]

tena pūrvapūrvavṛddhadarśanāyātonādivarṇṇakramo pauruṣeya evetyatrāha |

[487,7]

"teṣāṃ ca na vyavasthānaṃ" | teṣāṃ varṇṇānāṃ na vyavasthitakramatvaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | vyavasthitādekasmāt "kramāntarasya virodhataḥ" |

[488,1]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "varṇṇānāmānupūrvī" yadi "kṛtakā te" ca varṇṇā na bahavassamānajātīyā yena kenacid varṇṇā "vyavasthitakramāḥ" syurvaidikāḥ | anye punarllaukikā "yatheṣṭaparāvṛttayaḥ" | yatheṣṭaṃ parāvṛttiḥ kramāntareṇa prayogo yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | "kintarhi trailokya eka evākārastathā gakāraḥ" | taduktaṃ |

[488,2]

"deśakālaprayoktṝṇāmbhedepi ca na bhedavān | gādivarṇṇo yatastatra pratyabhijñā parisphuṭeti | "

[488,3]

yadā caivantadā vyavasthitakramatve varṇṇānāma"gnirityeva syānna gaganamiti" |
kiṃkāraṇam | "akāragakārayoḥ pūrvāparabhāvasya vyavasthitatvāt" | akāro gakārāt pūrvamevākārācca gakāraḥ pareṇaiva vyavasthita ityarthaḥ | gaganamityatra gakārātpareṇākāraḥ syāditi kramāntaranna syāt |

[488,4]

etadeva draḍhayannāha | "kṛtakānāma"pītyādi | āstāntāvadakṛtakānāmiyañcintā | yeṣāmanyathābhāvaḥ kathañcidapi karttuṃ na śakyate | kṛtakānāmapi tāvad bhāvānāṃ kīdṛśaṃ "hetupariṇāmaniyamavatāṃ" hetoḥ pariṇāmaḥ | uttarottarāvasthāpratilambhaḥ | tasmānniyamaḥ kāryasya hetvanantaraṃ sattā | sa yeṣāṃ vidyate |
te tathocyante | teṣāmapyaśa"kyaḥ kramaviparyayaḥ karttuṃ | yathā bījāṅku"rādīnāṃ | bī jāt paścādaṅkuroṅkurāt "kāṇḍaṃ" yatra puṣpādīni na viparyayaḥ | tathā "ṛtusamvassarādīnāṃ" vyavasthitakramatvaṃ | ṛtūnāṃ hemantādilakṣaṇānāṃ | samvatsarāṇāñca śau kra bā rha spatyādīnāṃ | ādiśabdād grahanakṣatraprabhṛtīnāṃ | "kiṃ punaracalitāvasthāsvabhāvānāmakṛtakānā"mvarṇṇānāṃ | acalitākramādyavasthā svabhāvaśca yeṣāmakṛtakānāmiti vigrahaḥ | "kathaṃdid vyavasthitānāṃ" | viniyatena krameṇa | "pūrvāvasthāyāstyāgamantareṇānyathābhāvāyogāt" kramāntareṇāvasthānasyāyogāt | "pūrvāvasthātyāge vā" varṇṇānāmabhyupagamyamāne teṣā"mvināśaprasaṅgāt" | varṇṇānāmapi tāvanna pūrvāvasthātyāgamantareṇa kramaviparyayo "viśeṣeṇa nityāyāmānupūrvyā" | tadetat kramānyarttvaṃ "pratipadamvarṇṇānyatve" syānnityā api varṇṇāḥ pratipadambhinnā iti kṛtvā | "apūrveṣā"mvarṇṇānāmpratipadamu"tpādād varṇṇabāhulyaṃ" | tasmādvā kramānyattvaṃ syāt | "taccai"tadubhayamapi "nābhimataṃ" mī māṃ sa kā nā mekatvānnityatvācca varṇṇānāṃ | 262.

[489,1]

"api ce"tyādinā dūṣaṇāntaramāha | "deśakā"lābhyāṃ yaḥ kṛtaḥ "krama"stasya varṇṇeṣva"bhāvaḥ" kathaṃ | "vyāptinityatvavarṇṇanāt" | taduktaṃ |

[489,2]

"kiñca śabdasya nityatvaṃ śrotrajapratyabhijñayā | vibhutvaṃ ca sthitaṃ tasya ko vyavasyedviparyayamiti | "

[489,3]
