varṇṇānāmākāśavad vyāptivarṇṇanānna deśakṛtaḥ kramaḥ | nityavarṇṇanānna kālakṛtaḥ | "sā ceya"mityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "sā ceyamvarṇṇānāmānu"pūrvī | "deśakṛtā vā" syāt | "yathā"nyonyadeśaparihāreṇa sthitānāṃ "pipīlikā"dīnāmpaṅktau | "kālakṛtā vā"
syādānupūrvī | "yathā bījāṅkurādīnāṃ" | yadā bījaṃ na tadāṃkuro yadāṃkuro na tadā patrādaya iti "seyamā"nupūrvī "dvidhā" | deśakālakṛtā "varṇṇeṣu na sambhavati" |
kutaḥ | vyāpternnityatvācca | tatra "na" tāvaddeśakṛtānupūrvī "varṇṇānāṃ sambhavati |
yasmādanyonyadeśaparihāreṇa" bhāvānāṃ "vṛttirhi deśapaurvāparyaṃ | tadi"tthambhūtaṃ paurvāparyamva"rṇṇaṣu na sambhavati" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | vyāpitvena "sarvasya" varṇasya "saṃrveṇa" varṇṇena"tulyadeśatvāt | vātātapavat" | laukiko dṛṣṭāntaḥ | śāstrīyamāha | "ātmādivacce"ti | ādiśabdādākāśādiparigrahaḥ | "tathā" kālakṛtānupūrvī varṇṇānānnasambhavati | yasmāda"nyonyaṃ kālaparihāreṇa vṛttiḥ kālapaurvāparyaṃ" | etadeva kutaḥ | "yade"tyādi | yasmin kāle "eko nāsti tadānyasya bhāvāt" kāraṇāt | "tadapi" kālapaurvāparya"nnityeṣu" varṇṇeṣu na "sambhavati | sarvadā sarvasya" varṇṇasya "bhāvāt | na ca"
deśakālakṛtāt kramā"danyā" varṇṇānupūrvī "gatiḥ" prakārosti | "tatkathamvarṇṇapaurvāparyaṃ vākyaṃ" yadbhavadbhi"rapauruṣeyaṃ sādhye"teti |

[490,1]

na ca dhvanikṛto yugapadbhāvināmvarṇṇānāṃ kramo yukto'nityatvaprasaṃgāt |
taduktam |

[490,2]

"anityadhvanikāryatvāt kramasyāto vināśitā | puruṣādhīnatā cāsya tadvivakṣāvaśād bhavediti | "

[490,3]

tenāyamartho bhavati | vyāpitvād varṇṇānāṃ yaugapadyamato vyāpitvavirodhī kramaḥ | kramavirodhi ca vyāpitvaṃ | kramaśced varṇṇānāmiṣyate vyāpitvagrāhi pratyabhijñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt | tathā ca deśakālaprayoktṛbhedena varṇṇānāmbhinnatvāt kāryatvamiti kathamanāditvaṃ kramasya |

[490,4]

tena yaducyate |

[490,5]

"na ca kramasya kāryatvaṃ pūrvasiddhaparigrahāt | vaktā na hi kramaṃ kaścitsvātantryeṇa prapadyate | yathaivāsya parairuktastathaivainamvivakṣati | paropyevamataścāsya sambandhavadanāditeti | "

[490,6]

tadapāstaṃ | krame sati varṇṇaikatvapratyabhijñānasyāprāmāṇyena pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇṇānāṃ kāryatvāt kramasya ca tebhyonarthāntaratvāt | na ca kramaḥ kramiṇāndharmaḥ |
dharmasyāpi dharmiṇassakāśād bhedāt bhedena śrotrajñāne'vabhāsaḥ syāt | na ca bhavati |
tasmādayugapadutpannā eva bhāvāḥ kramaḥ tena pratyuccāraṇamvarṇṇānāmutpattibhedāt kramabhedepi | pūrvadṛṣṭa evāyaṃ krama iti pratyabhijñānaṃ sādṛśyanibandhanaṃ | na pratyabhijñānaṃ sādṛśyanibandhanaṃ | na pratyabhijñānaṃ pramāṇamiti pratipādayiṣyate ca |
tatkathaṃ kramasyānāditvādapauruṣeyatvamiti | 263

[491,1]

atha mābhūdeṣa doṣa ityanityān vyāpinaśca varṇṇānicchet ve da vā dī |
tadā'"nityāvyāpitāyāndoṣaḥ prāgeva kīrtitaḥ" |

[491,2]

athetyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "mābhūdeṣa" varṇṇānupūrvyabhāva"doṣa ityanityānavyāpinaśca varṇṇānicched" ve da vā dī | anityatvāt kālakṛtapaurvāparyamavyāpitvād deśakṛtamidamiti manyamānaḥ | "tāvapya"nityāvyāpi"pakṣau prāgeva" | "anityaṃ yatnasambhūtampauruṣeyaṃ kathaṃ na tad | "... ityādinā | "sarvatrānupalambhaḥ syā"dityādinā ca yathākrama"nnirākṛtāvityaparihāraḥ" | 264

[491,3]

varṇṇānāṃ vyaktira"bhivyakti"stasyāḥ "kramopi vākyanna" bhavati | yadā karmasthā kriyābhivyaktistadā varṇṇānāṃ vyaktiviṣayatvakramo vākyamityapi na bhavatītyarthaḥ |
kasmāt | "nityavyaktinirākṛteḥ" |

[491,4]

"ne"tyādinā vyāca"ṣṭe | na varṇṇānāṃ rūpānupūrvī" svarūpānupūrvī "vākyaṃ" yenāyandoṣaḥ | "kintarhi | tadvyakteḥ" | varṇṇarūpavyaktervyaktatvalakṣaṇāyā yānupūrvī tad vākyaṃ | tāmeva darśayannāha | "ne"tyādi | "sā" vyakti"ryathā svavarṇṇābhivyaktipratyayānāṃ" | yena yasya varṇṇābhivyaktipratyayāstālvādivyāpārāsteṣāṃ "kramād bhavantī kramayoginīti" kṛtvā "tadānupūrvī" teṣāṃ vyaktānāṃ varṇṇānāmānupūrvī "vākyam |
ityapi mithyā" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyā" vyakte"rnityeṣu prāgeva" sā mā nya vya kti ci ntāsthāne "niṣiddhatvāt" | tadeva smārayannāha | "kāryatet"yādi | vyañjakakṛtena"sākṣā"jjanana"śaktyupadhānena | jñānajananā"samarthānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ "kāryaviśeṣa eva vyaktirityākhyātametat" | kiñca "karaṇānā"ntālvādīnāṃ "vyāpārādeva tasmāddheto"steṣāmvarṇṇānāmupalabdhesteṣāmvarṇṇānāṃ "kāryatā" prāptā | yasmāt |

[492,1]

"yat khalu rūpaṃ yata evopalabhyate tasya" rūpasya "lokaḥ kāryatāṃ prajñāpayatī"ti samba ndhaḥ | yata evopalabhyata iti yacchabdena yo nirdiṣṭastasyopalabdhi"stadupalabdhi"stannā"ntarīyikā"mevo"palabdhimāśritye"ti bhinnakrama evakāraḥ | "sā" yathoktopalabdhi"rvarṇṇeṣvapyasti" | prayatnavyāpāropalabdhināntarīyakatvādeva varṇṇopalabdheḥ | "sā co"palabdhi"ranyatrāpi" kāryatvena prasiddhe vastuni | "tadāśrayaḥ" kāryatāprajñapterāśrayaḥ | "nāto"dhiko "viśeṣaḥ | tatkathantulye" kārya"tābhyupagamanibandhane na varṇṇāḥ kāryāḥ" |

[492,2]

"ne"tyādi paraḥ | "na caitadupalabdhyāśrayā" | ekopalabdhināntarīyikā yā'parasyopalabdhistadāśrayā "kāryatāsthitiḥ | kintarhi | yatsatyeva bhavati" | yasmin satyeva yad bhavati | "iti" evaṃ "sattāśrayā" kāryatāsthitiḥ | na ca varṇṇānāṃ karaṇebhyaḥ sattā bhavati kintūpalabdhireveti manyate |

[492,3]

"sā satte"tyā"cā ryaḥ" | sattāśrayasyaiva kāryatā prajñaptirityasattyametat | kevalaṃ"sā sattā kutaḥ" pramāṇāt "siddhā yene"yaṃ "kāryatāṃ sādhayet | na hyasiddhāyāmasyāṃ"
sattāyā"mevambhavati" | satyevāsminnidaṃ bhavatītyevambhavati | "tasmāt sattāsiddhistatsādhanī" | tasyāḥ kāryatāyāḥ sādhanī | "sā" siddhi"rupalabdhireva" siddherjñānasvabhāvatvāt | tataśca yannāntarīyikaiva yatsattopalabdhistattasya kāryamityetāvat sthitaṃ | tacca varṇṇeṣvapi tulyamiti kathaṃ na varṇṇāḥ kāryāḥ |

[492,4]

"sattya"mityādi paraḥ | "sattyamevaṃ" karaṇavyāpārādeva śabdopalabdhau tatkāryatā syāt | "yadi tasya" śabdasya tālvādivyāpārāt "sattā na siddhā syāt" | kintu siddhaiva pramāṇena | tathā hi pūrvaṃ gośabdaṃ śrutavataḥ puṃsonyadā gośabdaśravaṇe sa evāyaṃ gośabda iti tattvagrāhiṇī pratyabhijñotpadyate | tattvagrahaṇamevānyathā na syāt | yadi pūrvottaraśravaṇakālayorantarāle śabdo na syādityarthāpattyā prākchabdasya sattā siddhaiva | na ca siddhipūrvikā siddhiḥ kāryatāsādhanī | kintu "sā hi sattāsiddhiḥ"
kāryatvaprajñapternimittaṃ yā "siddhipūrvikā" | yathā ghaṭasya prāgasataḥ kulālādivyāpārādeva paścāt siddhiḥ |

[492,5]

"nanvi"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | etat kathayati | na tāvat pratyabhi"jñā"
pramāṇamiti prātipādayiṣyate tatkathaṃ sattā siddhā | bhavatu nāma prākchabdasya sattā siddhā | tathāpi śabdasya "tadrūpamasiddhaṃ" | katarat tad rūpamityāha | "yat tathā"tyādi | "tathāvidhasya" śabdasvalakṣaṇapratibhāsi"jñāna"sya "vyavadhāne"nopayuktaṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ | yadi hi tathābhūtaṃ rūpaṃ prāk siddhaṃ syāt tadā nityaṃ śabdopalambhaḥ syāt |

[493,1]

"siddhameva taccha"bdasya yathoktaṃ rūpaṃ kevala"manyas"ya sahakāriṇo "vaikalyā"cchrotravijñāne kāraṇatvena "nopayuktamiti cet" |

[493,2]

yadyevaṃ sahakārisannidhāne yā paścāt svajñāne upayuktā | yā prayatnāt prāganupayuktāvasthā | te parasparaviruddhe | "kathamidānīmupayuktānupayuktayo"ravasthayorviruddhayo"rabhedaḥ" | api tu bheda eva tataśca nānātvāt sa tādṛśaḥ śabdasya svabhāvaḥ kṛta iti kārya eva śabdaḥ syāt |

[493,3]

athāpi syād | yosāvatiśayo bhavati na sa śabdasyātmabhūtopi tvarthāntaramiti pūrvakasvabhāvādapracyuta evāsāvityāha |

[493,4]

"nāpi bhedo"'kārakāvasthātaḥ kārakāvasthālakṣaṇotiśayaḥ śabda"svabhāvāsaṃsparśī" śabdasvabhāvānna vyatirikta iti yāvat | vyatireke hi "tasyaivātiśayasya"
śabdajñāne "upayogasiddheḥ" kāraṇatvasidve"stasya" śabdas"yākāraṇatvaprasaṃgāt" | tathā hi"yasyaiva bhāve sādhyasiddhistadeva tatra" sādhya "upayogi yukta"nnāparaṃ | atiśayo jñāna upayujyate | sākṣādatiśaye tu śabda upayujyata iti pāramparyeṇa śabdopi jñāne upayukta evetyata āha |

[493,5]

"tadatiśaye"tyādi | "tasminnatiśayasya" śabdasyo"payogepi" kalpyamāne | "tadvatprasaṅgaḥ" | jñānavatprasaṅgaḥ | yathā vijñāne karttavyerthāntarabhūte nātiśayena śabda upayujyate | tadvadatiśayepi karttavyerthāntarabhūtotiśayaḥ kalpanīyaḥ | tathā cānavasthā syādatotiśayaḥ śabdādabhinnaḥ | yataścābhinnaḥ | "tasmāt" tadanyaṃ svaviṣayajñānajananaṃ śabdasvabhāvama"tiśeta eva" | svarūpabhedena | ko'"vyavahitasāmarthyo" |

[494,1]

atha syāt | naiva vijñānajanikāvasthotpadyate nityatvāt | kintu tālvādikamapekṣyāsau jñānaṃ janayatīti |

[494,2]

ata āha | atiśayasyetyādi | nāsya sahakārikṛtotiśayostītyanatiśayasya sahakāriṇaṃ pratyapekṣā prāgeva nirastā | "sa ca" janakaḥ śabdasvabhāvaḥ "karaṇavyāpārādeva siddha iti kṛtvā sarvakāryatulyadharmā" | sarve kārye tulyadharmā yasyeti vigrahaḥ |
tasya tādṛśasya kāryatulyadharmaṇaḥ śabdasya vyaktāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ sarvamaṅkurādyapi vyaṅgyaṃ syāt | na vā kiṃcid vyaṅgyaṃ | śabdopi kāryaḥ syād viśeṣābhāvāt |

[494,3]

tathā hi | svajñānena karaṇenānyadhīheturartho vyañjako mataḥ | kadā |
siddherthe | yadyaso vyaṅgyaḥ kāraṇāllabdhasattāko bhavati | yathā dīpaḥ kulālādisiddhe ghaṭe tajjñānaheturvyañjakaḥ | anyathā vāpi yadi vyaṅgyaḥ prāgasiddhaḥ syāt |
tadā ko viśeṣosya vyañjakasya kārakāddhetoḥ |

[494,4]

svapratipattītyādinā vyācaṣṭe | svapratipattireva dvāramupāyastena karaṇenānyasya ghaṭādeḥ pratipattiheturloke vyañjakaḥ siddhaḥ | dīpādivat | sa ced vyaṅgyaḥ vyañjakavyāpārāt prāk siddhaḥ syāt |

[494,5]

nanu ca pradīpādirapyupalabdhiyogyaṃ ghaṭakṣaṇaṃ prāgasiddhameva janayati | tatkimucyate sa cet prāk siddha iti |

[494,6]

ata āha | samānajātīyetyādi | anupalambhayogyaḥ pūrvako ghaṭādikṣaṇaḥ samānajātīya upādānakṣaṇastasya vyañjakavyāpārāt prāk siddheḥ kāraṇāt sa cet prāk siddhaḥ syādityucyate | na tasyaiva vyañjakāllabhyasya jñānahetoratiśayasya prāk siddheḥ siddha ucyate | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tasya yathoktasyātiśayasya | tatsāmagrīpratyayatvāt | sā vyañjakasāmagrī pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ | ye punaḥ svavyāpārāt prāg asiddhasyopalambhakāḥ kārakā eva te | kimiva | kulālādivad ghaṭādau śabdasyāpyupalambhahetavaḥ kulālāditulyā iti | śabdopi ghaṭādivat kārya evaṃ |

[494,7]

nanvekadā śrutasya śabdasyānyadā śravaṇe ca sa evāyamiti tattvaṃ pratyakṣapratyabhijñayā pratīyate | tattvapratipattyanyathānupapattyā ca tālvādivyāpārāt prāk sattvaṃ śabdasyāpi niścitamiti kathantālvādayo siddhopalambhanāḥ | tena vyañjakā eva yuktāḥ |

[495,1]

evammanyate | prathame kṣaṇe śabdagrahaṇaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe pūrvagṛhītaśabdāhitasaṃskāraprabodhastatonyasmin kṣaṇe śabdasmaraṇaṃ | tatataścaturthe kṣaṇe tirohite tasmin sa evāyaṃ ghaṭaśabda iti pratyabhijñānaṃ kathaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādasannihitaviṣayatvāt |

[495,2]

nāpi prākprabuddhasaṃskārasya puṃso varṇṇagrāhakaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ sambhavati | varṇṇasya sāṃśatvādityuktaṃ | antyavarṇṇabhāgakāle ca pūrvavarṇṇabhāgānāmasattvenāntyasyāpi varṇṇasyāsannihitatvāt | ata eva padavākyayorapi grāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ na sambhavati varṇṇasamudāyatvāt padāderantyavarṇṇakāle ca pūrvapūrvavarṇṇānāmasattvāt sannihitaviṣayañca pratyakṣamiṣyate | tasmānna pratyakṣaṃ pratyabhijñānamvarṇṇapadavākyeṣu tattvagrāhakaṃ sambhavati | ata eva cā cā rye ṇa nopanyastaṃ |

[495,3]

bhavatu vā teṣu pratyabhijñānaṃ pratyakṣantathāpi tattvagrahaṇānyathānupapattyā na tālvādivyāpārāt prākchabdasya sattvakalpanā yuktā | sadṛśāparagrahaṇenāpi tattvagrahaṇasya sambhavāt sadṛśāparagrahaṇamevāvyāpyasiddhamiti cet |

[495,4]

nanvekatvamapi naiva siddhaṃ | tattvagrahaṇāt siddhamiti cenna | bhinneṣvapi lūnapunarjāteṣu keśeṣu tattvagrahaṇasya darśanāt saṃśaya evātaḥ | kathamarthāpattyā prāk sattvakalpanā |

[495,5]

atha pratyabhijñāyamānatvācchabdasya nityatvam | anityatve hyanekatvāt pratyabhijñānameva na syāt | tathā | yaḥ parārthamprayujyate sa prayogāt prāg vidyamāno yathā vāsyādicchidāyāṃ | prayujyate ca śabdaḥ parapratyāyanāya | tasmāt sopi prāg vidyata eva ceti |

[495,6]

ata āha | "pratyabhijñāne"tyādi | śabdasya sadā sattāsiddhihetavaḥ | "tepi na hetulakṣaṇaṃ puṣṇanti" | tathā hyanityepi pradīpādau pratyabhijñānandṛṣṭaṃ | tasmādanaikāntikametat | tathā kṣaṇikepi karmaṇi prayoge dṛśyate | tena prayujyamānatvādityapi heturanaikāntika eva |

[495,7]

"yadapi kiñci"lliṅgaṃ śabdasyaikatvasādhanāyopādīyate | "uttarā" paścādbhāvinya"kārapratīti"ryā sā pūrvābhinnaviṣayā | pūrvayā akārapratītyā ekaviṣayā |

[495,8]

etena śabdānāmekatvasādhanānnityatvaṃsādhitamiti manyate | akāra"pratītiri"tihetuḥ | "tadvadi"ti pūrvākārapratītivadi"tyādi" | ādiśabdād drutamadhyavilambitāvasthāyāmeka eva gakārādivarṇṇassa evāyaṃ gakārādivarṇṇo drutādibhedabhinna iti pratīteḥ | prayogastu yā yā akārapratītiḥ sā pūrvākārapratītyabhinnaviṣayā | tadyathā pūrva akārapratītiḥ | akārapratītiścottarāpyakārapratītiriti svabhāvahetupratirūpakaḥ | "tadapi" sādhanaṃ pūrvāparayorakāra"svalakṣaṇayorabhedasādhane" na "samartha" | tathā hyakārapratīterityayaṃ heturviśeṣeṇa vā syāt pūrvākārapratītirūpatvāditi | sāmānyena vā syādakārapratītimātratvāditi | ādye pakṣe heturasiddhaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tatsvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ" pūrvākārapratītitvāsiddheḥ | yadvā viśeṣeṇa vā heturuttarākārapratītirūpatvāditi |

[496,1]

tadapi na sādhanaṃ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | tatsvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ sādhyasvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ | anaikāntikatvaṃ vyāpterasiddhatvādityarthaḥ |

[496,2]

atha "sāmānyena" liṅgasya "vacane bhinnaviṣayatvasyāpyavirodhaḥ" | akārapratītiśca syāt pūrvākārapratītiviṣayād bhinnaviṣayā ceti ko virodhaḥ |

[496,3]

anye tvakārapratītitvaṃ sāmānyaṃ yathā tayoḥ pratītyorevamakāraviṣayatvamaviruddhamiti vyācakṣate |

[496,4]

kiñca | "ekaviṣayayośca pratītyoḥ" pūrvavyavasthitaikākāraviṣayayoḥ pūrvottarakālabhāvinyoḥ pratītyoḥ "pūrvāparabhāvaḥ" prāk paścādbhāve "virudhya"te | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sannihitāsannihitakāraṇatvena" yathākramaṃ kāryasyo"tpādānutpādāt" | sannihitakāraṇatve ca tayoryugapad bhāvaḥ syāt | atha sannihitepi kāraṇe pūrvaivākārapratītirutpadyate nottarā | tadā paścādapi sā na syāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | pūrvāparapratītikāraṇa"sannidhānepyanutpannasyo"ttarākārapratītiviśeṣasyā"tatkāraṇatvāt" | pūrvākārapratītikāraṇaṃ nāsya kāraṇamityarthaḥ | tasmāt "tayoḥ" pūrvāparabhāvinyoḥ pratītyo"rbhinnākhilakāraṇatvaṃ" | bhinnamakhilaṃ kāraṇantayoriti vigrahaḥ |

[496,5]

syānmataṃ | tayorakārapratītyoḥ śabda evaikaḥ kāraṇaṃ kevalaṃ sahakārisannidhānakramādutpattikrama iti |

[496,6]

ata āha | tatretyādi | "tatra" tasmin pūrvottarākārapratītyutpattikāle | ekasya kāraṇasya svarūpeṇā"bhedepi" pratītyoryugapad bhāva eva syāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tasyaikasya "śaktasya" kāraṇasya sahakārya"pratīkṣaṇāt" | tataśca "yuktiviruddhaṃ pūrvāparayoḥ pratītyorekaviṣayatvaṃ" |

[497,1]

etena ca sarveṇottarākārapratīte pūrvākārapratītyabhinnaviṣayatve sādhyenumānabādhitatvaṃ pratijñāyā uktaṃ | anumānantvīdṛśaṃ | yat kramabhāvi tannaikaviṣayaṃ |
yathā krameṇa bhavaccakṣuḥśrotravijñānaṃ | kramabhāvinyau ca pūrvottare akārapratītī |
ekaviṣayatvamakramabhāvitvena vyāptantadviruddhaṃ ca kramabhāvitvamiti vyāpakaviruddhameva |

[497,2]

nanvatra pratyakṣapratyabhijñābādhitatvāt pratijñāyā anumānasyotthānameva nāstīti cet |

[497,3]

na | sa evāyamiti jñānasya pūrvāparakālasambandhiviṣayatvena bhedaviṣayatvāt | anyadeva hi pūrvakālasambandhitvamanyadeva cāparakālasambandhitvaṃ | anyathā pūrvakālasambandhitvādvā'parakālasambandhitvasyābhededhunā bhāvād bhāvasya pratibhāso na syāt | sa eveti ca jñānasyotpattiḥ syāt | na sa evāyamiti | aparakālasambandhitvādvā pūrvakālasambandhitvasyābhede pūrvamasya pratibhāso na syād |
ayameveti ca jñānasyotpattiḥ syāt | na sa evāyamiti |

[497,4]

tasmād yatpūrvakālasambandhitvantadaparakālasambandhitvanna bhavati | yaccāparakālasambandhitvantatpūrvakālasambandhitvaṃ na bhavatīti pūrvāparakālasambandhiviṣayatvena bhedaviṣayatvāt kathampratyabhijñātaḥ pratijñābādhā |

[497,5]

u mbe ka stvāha | "yadi sa evāyamityekānubhavastathāpyayamatītajñānakarmatā'parokṣate ekādhikaraṇe gṛhṇan samvedyate | athāpi pratyayadvayamidaṃ grahaṇasmaraṇarūpaṃ | tathāpi ghaṭasmaraṇapaṭagrahaṇayornirantarotpannayorvilakṣaṇamidamparasparaviṣayatvena pratibhāsanāt | aparokṣa eva hyarthotītajñānaviśiṣṭatayā smṛtau pratibhāsate | atītajñānaviṣayaścāparokṣatayā pratyakṣe | tadahaṃ smarāmyetaditi pratibhāsanāt | tasmādanimiṣitadṛṣṭeḥ puruṣasya yadutpattivināśarahitānuvṛttāvasāyaḥ sa eva bādhakaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhakasyānumānasye"ti |

[497,6]

tadayuktam | uttarottarapratyakṣāṇāṃ yathākramamuttarottaravastvavasthābhedaviṣayatvena sa evāyamiti tattvāropasya bhrāntatvāt | tathā hi prathamadarśinaḥ pratyakṣe yathā'parokṣāvrasthā pratibhāsate nātītajñānaviṣayāvasthā | tathā bhūyo darśinopi |
idānīntanena ca rūpeṇa vastvavasthitanna prāktanena | avasthite ca rūpe prāktanarūpasyānavasthānameva vināśaḥ | yathā vṛddhāvasthāyāmbālarūpasya prāktanañca rūpamatītajñānakarma | idānīntanaṃ ca rūpamaparokṣamatha ca bālādyavasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥpuruṣo vṛddhādyavasthāyāṃ pratyabhijñāyata iti kathamatītajñānakarmatā'parokṣate ekādhikaraṇe pratibhāsete | kathaṃ vā'parokṣa evārthotītajñānaviśiṣṭatayā smṛtau pratibhāsata ityādyucyate |

[498,1]

yatrāpyanimiṣadṛṣṭeściratarakālaṃ paśyatonuvṛttāvasāyastatrāpīdānīntanapratyakṣajñānasambandhenārthasyāparokṣatotpadyate | atītajñānābhāvenātītajñānakarmmatāyāścedānīmabhāva eva vināśa iti kathamucyate | utpattivināśarahitānuvṛttāvasāya eva bādhakaḥ kṣaṇikatvānumānasyeti |

[498,2]

yadapyucyate | yaḥ pratikṣaṇamanyatvamvadati tasya cāyambādhaḥ pratyabhijñānamātreṇānanyattve tu vinaṣṭasyāpi tattvāvagamāt | mṛtapratyabhijñāyāmiveti |

[498,3]

tadapi nirastaṃ | ananyatvasyaivābhāvāt | nāpi vinaṣṭāvinaṣṭayorananyatvaṃ virodhāt | na ca tattvāvagamānyathānupapatyānanyatvaṃ sādṛśyenāpi tattvāvagamasya sambhavāt | sa ityaṅśaśca na pratyakṣo'sannihitaviṣayatvāt | smaraṇarūpatve cāsya na pūrvadṛṣṭārthagrāhitvaṃ spaṣṭapratibhāsābhāvāt | dṛṣṭārthādhyavasāyakatvena tu smṛtirūpatve bhrāntatvaṃ | svākārābhedena dṛṣṭārthādhyavasāyāt | ayamiti cāṃśaḥ pratyakṣa iṣyate | smaraṇapratyakṣayoścaikatvamvirudhyate | tasmāt pūrvavijñānaviṣayatvarahite purovasthiterthe sādṛśyena pūrvajñānaviṣayatvamāropya sa evāyamiti mānasaṃ jñānaṃ gṛhṇāti | āropabalena cātītajñānakarmatā'parokṣate ekādhikaraṇe pratibhāsete | marīcikāyāṃ jalapratyabhijñāna iva | āropābhāve tvete bhinnādhikaraṇe eva pratibhāsete | jalasmaraṇamarīcikāgrahaṇayoriva |

[498,4]

tasmāt sthitametad | bhrāntatvādapratyakṣatvācca na pratyabhijñātaḥ kṣaṇikatvānumānabādheti | tena pūrvottare akārapratītī bhinnaviṣaye eva | tathā drutamadhyabilambitānāṅgakārādipratipattīnāṃ bhinnaviṣayatvaṃ | drutādibhedabhinnagakārālambanatvāt | gakāra eva druto gakāra eva vilamvitaṃ iti gakāraikatvapratītistu sādṛśyanimittaiva |

[498,5]

tena yaducyate |

[498,6]

"na hi drutādibhedepi niṣpannā saṃpratīyate | gavyaktyantaravicchinnā gavyaktiraparā sphuṭā | tenaikatvena varṇṇasya buddhirekopajāyate | viśeṣabuddhisadbhāvo bhaved vyañjakabhedata iti | "

[499,1]

tadapāstaṃ | yato dhvaniviśeṣa eva varṇṇa ucyate | tena drutoccāritā dhvaniviśeṣā drutā gavyaktirucyate | madhyoccāritā madhyagavyaktiḥ | vilambitoccāritā dhvaniviśeṣā vilamvitā gavyaktiḥ | na tu vyañjekebhyo dhvanibhyonyo gakāraḥ pratibhāsate | gakāro gakāra iti teṣu nāmasāmyameva kevalaṃ pratīyate | tathā hrasvadīrghaplutādiṣu naikākāraḥ | yato dhvaniviśeṣā eva mātrākālaṃ prayujyamānā hrasvokāro bhavati | tathāpare dhvaniviśeṣā dvimātrākālaṃ prayujyamānā dīrgha ākāro bhavati | trimātrākālaṃ prayujyamānā dhvaniviśeṣāḥ pluto bhavati | tena hrasvadīghraplutānāṃ svabhāvabheda eva pratibhāsate | na tvakāro'bhinnasteṣu pratibhāsate | akāra eva tu mātrādikālamuccāryamāṇo yathākramaṃ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ pratīyanta iti śabdamātrameva kevalaṃ | tena yaducyate |

[499,2]

"svato hrasvādibhedastu nityavāde virudhyate | sarvadā yasya sadbhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ mātrikaḥ svayaṃ | tasmāduccāraṇantasya mātrākālaṃ pratīyatāṃ | dvimātramvā trimātramvā na śabdo mātrikaḥ svayamiti | "

[499,3]

tadapi nirastaṃ | hrasvadīrghapluteṣvakārokāra ityanuyāyinorjñānābhidhānayorapravṛtteḥ | athāpi syāt | pūrvottarakālabhāvinyoḥ pratītyornāmasāmyādekaviṣayatvamiti |

[499,4]

ata āha | "pratītyā"di | pūrvottarayorakārapratītyoḥ pratibhāsabhedaḥ pūrvottararūpatayā | svabhāvabhedo drutamadhyavilamvitādibhedena | tasmin "pratītipratibhāsasvabhāvabhedepi" | akārapratītirakārapratītirityevaṃ "nāmasāmyādekaviṣayatvamayuktaṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "ghaṭādiṣvapi prasaṅgāt" | yā pūrvā ghaṭapratītiryā ca paścād anyaghaṭapratītistayorapi ghaṭapratītirghaṭapratītiriti nāmasāmyādekaviṣayatvaṃ syāt | tathā caiko ghaṭaḥ sarvatra prāpnoti | tatra ghaṭādāvekatvasādhane dṛṣṭavirodho ghaṭādīnāmanekatvasya dṛṣṭatvāt | tasmāt tatrā"sādhanamekatvas"yeti "cet | ihāpi" varṇṇeṣvapyekatvasādhane dṛṣṭa"virodhābhāvaḥ kena" pramāṇena "siddhaḥ" | atrāpi karaṇānāṃ pratipuruṣaṃ bhedena bhedaḥ siddha eva | lūnapunarjāteṣu keśeṣviva sādṛśyādekatvādhyavasāya iti yāvat |

[500,1]

nāmasāmyādityayaṃ heturanaikāntika ityāha | "yāvadi"tyādi | "tathābhidhe"yateti akārapratīti rakārapratītirityevaṃ nāmasāmyenābhidheyatā | arthābhedena viṣayaikatvena "vyāptyā na sādhyate tāvat sandigdho vyatirekaḥ" | nāmasāmyaṃ ca syād bhedaśceti | kiñca | "pratikaraṇabhedaṃ" puruṣabhedena karaṇabhedaṃ prati "bhinnasvabhāvaḥ śabdaḥ śrutau" śrotravijñāne "niviśamānaḥ" samārohan "yadaikaḥ sādhyate kinna" ghaṭādayopyekarūpāssādhyante | tepi sādhyantāṃ | viśeṣopi vā vācyaḥ |

[500,2]

ekatvepi śabdasya vyañjakabhedāt pratibhāsabheda iti cedāha | "tatrāpī"tyādi | "tatrāpi" bhinne ghaṭādau "śakyamevaṃ vyañjakabhedāt pratibhāsabheda iti pratyavasthātuṃ" | 266

[500,3]

kiñca | "kāraṇānāṃ samagrāṇāṃ vyāpārāt" parispandādilakṣaṇā"nniyamena"
śabdasyaiva upa"labdhitaḥ" kāraṇāt "kāryatva"mprāptaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "vyañjake" hetau"tadasambhavāt" | niyamena vyaṅgyasyopalambhāsambhavāt |

[500,4]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "vyāpṛteṣu karaṇeṣu" na hi "kadācicchabdānupalabdhiḥ"
kintūpalabdhireva | "na cāvaśyaṃ vyañjakavyāpārorthamupalambhayati" grāhayati | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "kvacid" ghaṭādiśūnye deśe "prakāśe" pradīpādilakṣaṇe sat"yapi ghaṭādyanupalabdheḥ" |
tasmādavikalavijñānotpādasahakārikāraṇasya puṃsaḥ | "seyaṃ" śabdasya tadvyāpārāt kāraṇavyāpārā"nniyamenopalabdhistadudbhave" | karaṇavyāpārā"cchabda"syotpattau satyāṃ"syāt" | tataśca janya eva śabdo na vyaṅgyaḥ |

[500,5]

nanu pūrvaṃ jananamātreṇa kārakaṃ jñānajananayogyatvenotpādakantu vyañjakamevetyuktaṃ | tena tālvādīnāṃ vyañjakatvameva yuktaṃ |

[500,6]

naiṣa doṣo yataḥ | kāryamātramabhipretya jananamātreṇa kārakaṃ | jñānajananayogyatvena tu vyañjaka ityuktaṃ | na tu dṛśyakāryāpekṣayā | tathā hyavikalasahakārikāraṇasya puṃsaḥ pradīpādijanako niyamena pradīpāderupalambhakaḥ kārako na vyañjaka ityadoṣaḥ |

[501,1]

atha punaḥ karaṇaṃśabdasyākarttṛ | tasyā"kartuḥ" karaṇasya "vyāpāreṇa tatsiddhyayogāt" |
śabdasya siddhyayogāt | vyāpinaḥ śabdā nityāśca | tato "vyāpinityatvā"cchabdānāṃ |
vyañjakasya karaṇasya vyāpārāt sarvatropalabdhiḥ | ghaṭādayastu na vyāpino nāpi nityāḥ | tena te vyañjakavyāpāreṇa nāvaśyamupalabhyanta iti |

[501,2]

yadyevaṃ "ka idānīṃ ghaṭādiṣu samāśvāsaḥ" | niścayaḥ | yathā te na nityā nāpi vyāpina iti | yāvatā tepi nityā vyāpinaśca bhavantu | kathaṃ sarvadā nopalabhyanta iti cet | etacchabdeṣvapi tulyaṃ | yattatra pratividhānaṃ tad ghaṭādiṣvapi bhaviṣyati | "teṣāṃ" ghaṭādīnā"ntathā" vyāpinityatvenā"niṣṭeriti cet | śabdo" vyāpinityatvena"kimiṣṭaḥ" | kasmādiṣṭa"statsamānadharmā" | ghaṭādisamānadharmā | "pratiṣiddhe ca vyāpinityatve" prāgiti yatkiñcidetat |

[501,3]

"ghaṭādīnā"mityādi paraḥ | kārakavyatirekeṇa "vyañjakāntarasadbhāvādadoṣaḥ" |
śabdena tulyatvaprasaṅgadoṣo nāsti | vyañjakāntarameva darśayannāha | "prakāśo hī"tyādi | "prakāśo hyeṣāṃ" ghaṭādīnāṃ "vyañjako" loke "siddho" na kulālādayaḥ | "kulālādīnāṃ vyañjakatve" | te kulālādaya"stādṛśā eva" syuḥ | yathā pradīpādayo na niyamena ghaṭamupalambhayanti | kvacit prakāśepi ghaṭasyābhāvāt | tathā kulālādayopi bhaveyuḥ | na caivam | a"tiśerate ca" kulālādayaḥ | kulālādivyāpāre sarvadā ghaṭāderbhāvāt | "tato vyañjakātiśayāt" | vyañjakād bhedena vṛtteḥ | "kārakā eva" kulālādayaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "upakārakasya gatyantarābhāvāt" | kārakavyañjakatvavyatirekeṇa prakārāntarābhāvāt | tatra vyañjakatve niṣiddhe pāriśeṣyāt kārakatvaṃ kulālādīnāṃ | naivaṃ śabdasya karaṇamuktvānyad vyañjakāntaraṃ siddhaṃ yena karaṇameva śabdasya kārakaṃ kalpyeta | tasmād ghaṭādivailakṣaṇyācchabdo vyaṅgya eva |

[501,4]

"tadi"tyādi siddhāntavādī | "tadetad" vyañjakāntarasambhavanaṃ "śabdepi tulyaṃ" | yasmāt "tatrāpi" śabde "indriyayogyadeśatādibhyaḥ" śrotrendriyācchrotrayogyadeśāvasthānāt | ādiśabdāt manaskārācca | "karaṇānāmatiśayāt" | atiśaya eva kathamiti cedāha | "ghaṭādī"tyādi | hyarthe caśabdaḥ | "ghaṭāde"rye "kārakāḥ" kulālādayaḥ samagrāsteṣāṃ yo "dharmo" niyamena svakāryārambhakatva"ntasya karaṇeṣu dṛṣṭeḥ" | tānyapi hi vyāpṛtāni śabdaṃ niyamena janayanti | tasmāt tānyapi kulālādivat kārakāṇyeva |

[502,1]

yadi ca śabdasya vyañjakāntarābhāvāt karaṇāni vyañjakānīṣyante | tadā"tasyaiva" vyañjakasya "pradīpāderviṣayāntarasya ca kasyacidi"ti rasādervyañjakāntara"mpradī"pādirnāsti | tato "vyañjakāntārābhāvāt | tatkāraṇāni" pradīpādikāraṇāni"caiṣāṃ" pradīpādīnāṃ "vyañjakāni syuḥ" |

[502,2]

yata eva"ntasmānna vyaktiḥ śabdasya" karaṇebhyaḥ kintūtpattireva | "bhavantī vā karaṇebhyaḥ" sakāśād vyaktistridhā bhavet | <1> pūrvāvasthātyāge"nātiśayavattā vā śabdasya vyakti"rbhavet | <2> upalambhā"varaṇavigamo vā" | <3> śabdālambanaṃ"vi"vā vyaktiḥ | prakāratrayavyatirekeṇa "gatyantarābhāvāt" |

[502,3]

<1>"tatra nātiśayotpattiḥ" śabdasya vyaktira"nityatāprasaṅgāt" | bhavatvati śayotpattiranityatvantu kathamiti cedāha | "tasyā" atiśayotpatteḥ "pūrva"rūpasya yā"hānirapara"sya pāścātyasya rūpasya yad"upajananaṃ" talla"kṣaṇatvāt" |

[502,4]

<2>dvitīyapakṣamāha | "athe"tyādi | "ta"sya śabdasya yajjanakaṃ "rūpa"ntasyopalambhapratighātīni stimitavāyavīyāvayavasaṃyogarūpāṇyā"varaṇā"ni | te"ṣāṃ vigamaḥ"
prayatnapreritena vāyunā viyogaḥ | sa "yadi" śabdasya "vyaktiste" tava mī māṃ sa ka sya matā | taduktaṃ |

[502,5]

"prayatnābhihato vāyuḥ koṣṭhyo yātītyasaṃśayaṃ | sa saṃyogavibhāgau ca tālvāderanuvarttate || vegavatvācca sovaśyaṃ yāvadvegaṃ pratiṣṭhate | tasyātmāvayavānāñca stimitena ca vāyunā | saṃyogāśca viyogāśca jāyante gamanād dhruvamiti ||" (ślo0 śabda 122–24)

[503,1]

sā vyaktiḥ kathaṃ kriyate | yasmādāvaraṇavigamo'bhāvastasminna"bhāve" kathaṃcidapyakārye "karaṇagrāma"sya karaṇasaṅghātasya "sāmarthya kinna tad bhavet" | naiveti yāvat |

[503,2]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | etadāha | "āvaraṇa"svarūpe niṣpanne"'kiṃcitkarā"ṇyeva"karaṇāni" na hi "samarthāni" bhavanti | āvaraṇavigamepi na teṣāṃ sāmarthyaṃ | yasmād"vigamaścābhāvo na cābhāvaḥ kārya iti niveditametat sāmarthyacintāyāṃ" |

[503,3]

abhyupagamya caitaduktaṃ | tadeva nāstītyāha | "nāpī"tyādi | "na śabdasya nityas"yānādheyātiśayatvāt "kiñcidāvaraṇa"masti yenāvaraṇavigamo vyaktiḥ syāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tasyāvaraṇasya nityavastunya"sāmarthyādityapyuktaṃ" |

[503,4]

yata eva"ntasmānnāvaraṇe karaṇā"nāmu"pakṣepaḥ" | karaṇānyāvaraṇavigamaṃ śabdasya kurvantītyetannopanyasanīyamityarthaḥ |

[503,5]

"nāpyevaṃ" kāraṇānāṃ śabdaṃprat"yasāmarthyame"va | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tadvyāpārābhāve"
karaṇānāṃ vyāpārābhāve "śabdānupalabdheḥ | ato yuktamete" karaṇavyāpārā"yacchabdān kuryuḥ" |

[503,6]

"anyathā" yadi karaṇāni na kārakāṇi kintu vyañjakānyeva | tadā "śabdāviśeṣādanyeṣāmapi" ghaṭādīnāṃ "vyaktiḥ" kulālādibhyaḥ "prasajyate" |

[503,7]

atha punastepi ghaṭādayo vyajyanta eva kulālādibhiritīṣyate | tadā "tathābhyupagame sarvakāraṇānānnirarthatā" |

[503,8]

tathā hi | vyaṅgye vastunyatiśayasya kārako vā'varaṇābhāvasya kārako vā jñānasya vā kārako vyañjakaḥ syāt | atiśayādervyaktisvarūpasya cākāryatvāt | sarveṣāṃ vyaktikārakāṇāṃ svarūpakārakāṇāṃ ca nirarthatā |

[503,9]

"yadī"tyādinā vyākhyānaṃ | "yadi" śabdasya "karaṇāni vyañjakāni" kīdṛśāni | "sarvakāraṇasamānadharmāṇya"pi sarve kāraṇānāṃ samānā dharmā yeṣāṃ karaṇānāmiti vigrahaḥ | tadā "na kiñcid" ghaṭādikamapī"dānīṃ" kasyacit kulālādeḥ "kāryaṃ syā"cchabdenāviśeṣāt | sarvasya vyaṅgyatvamiṣṭamiti cet | "na cetad" yuktaṃ |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | sarvakārakāṇāṃ vyañjakatvenābhimatānāmānarthakyaprasaṅgāt | tathāhi vyañjakānāṃ trayo vikalpāḥ | vyaṅgye vastunyatiśayasya vā'varaṇābhāvasya vā jñānasya vā karaṇād vyañjakaḥ syāditi |

[504,1]

na tāvad vyaṅgyasyātiśayakaraṇād vyañjakaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | vastunovasthitarūpasyā"nādheyātiśayatvāt" | nāpyāvaraṇavigamakaraṇāt | "āvaraṇābhāvasyākāryatvāt" | nāpi jñānakaraṇād vyañjakaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "vastuvadeva"
tadviṣayasyāpi "jñānasya" satkāryavādidarśane "siddhatvāt" | athāsadeva jñānaṃ kriyate |
tadā "jñānaṃprati kārakatve kasyacidi"ṣyamāṇe | "tathābhūtānāṃ" jñānasya kārakaistulyadharmāṇā"manyeṣāmapi" kulālādīnā"ntathābhāvaprasaṃgena" | ghaṭādīn prati kārakatvaprasaṃgena "sarvasya" vastunaḥ "kāryatāprasaṃgāt" | viśeṣo vā vācyo yena jñānaṃ prati kārakatvaṃ na ghaṭādīn prati | na cānyo vyakteḥ prakāraḥ sambhavati |

[504,2]

"tasmādayaṃ kārakābhimatorthakalāpo" ghaṭādeḥ kasyacidapi na "vyaktā"vupayujyate |
vastuno nādheyaviśeṣatvādinā vyakterniṣiddhatvāt | "nāpi kriyāyāmu"payujyate |
kāryakatvānabhyupagamā"diti vyartha eva syāt" |

[504,3]

"tathā" ceti kārakāṇāṃ vaikalye sati | "idaṃ jagannirīhaṃ" nirvyāpāraṃ "syāt" | kiṃ bhūtam | "anupakāryopakārakaṃ" | na vidyate upakāryamupakārakaṃ ca yasminniti vigrahaḥ |

[504,4]

kiñca | "śabdanityatve" sādhye | "sādhanaṃ pratyabhijñāna"maprayogādi "yanmata"miṣṭaṃ |
yathā nityaḥ śabda ekatvena pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt | taduktaṃ | saṃkhyābhāvāt |
aṣṭakṛtvo gośabda uccarita iti hi vadanti | nāṣṭau gośabdā ityanenāvagamyatepratyabhijānantīti | sataḥ prayogāt | yat prayujyate tat prāk sat | yathā vāsyādi cchidāyāṃ | prayujyate ca śabdorthapratipādane tasmātsopi prayogāt prāk sanniti |
ādiśabdāt parārthamuccāryamāṇatvādityādiparigrahaḥ | taduktaṃ | "nityastu syāddarśanasya parārthatvāt" | darśanamuccāraṇaṃ | tatparārthamarthaṃ pratyāyayituṃ |
uccāritamātra eva vinaṣṭe śabde | na tatorthampratyāyayituṃ śaknuyādato na parārthamuccāryeteti | "anudāharaṇa"mityadṛṣṭāntaṃ | na hi nityaṃ kiṃcidasti yatraitatsādhanamvartteta | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sarvabhāvānāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgataḥ" |

[505,1]

etadeva tāvat padaṃ vivṛṇvannāha | "kṣaṇabhaṅgino hī"tyādi | "vināśasyākaraṇādityuktaṃ prāk | vakṣyate ca" paścāt | vināśadvāreṇānityatāṃ pradarśya "utpa"ttidvāreṇāpi darśayannāha | utpattītyādi | "parataḥ" kāraṇā"dutpattimantaśca" bhāvāstatopi na nityaḥ | parata utpadyanta iti kuta etat | "sattāyā ākasmikatvāyogāt" |
ākasmikatve deśādiniyamo na syāditi prāgevoktaṃ | "tadi"ti tasmāt "pratyabhijñānaṃ satprayogādikaṃ" liṅgaṃ | "sthiraikarūpe" vastuni sapakṣabhūte | "na kvacidanveti |
aparāpareṇā"nyenānyena "svabhāve"na "parāvṛtti"rutpattiryathā "pradīpādī"nānte"ṣveva" pratyabhijñānādiliṅgambhedena vyāpta"ndṛṣṭamiti viruddhameva" | na cātra dīpatvādisāmānyanimittaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ sāmānyasya pūrvameva niṣiddhatvāt |

[505,2]

"ne"tyādi paraḥ | "na" viruddhaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | abhinnāt sthiraikarūpājjanma yasya tasyā"bhinnajanmanaḥ" pratyabhijñānasya "dīpādiṣu bhrāntyā bhāvāt" |
bhrāntiḥ kathamiti cet | "sādharmyavipralambhāt" pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayoryatsādṛśyantena vipralambhād vañcitatvāt | etatkathayati | abhrāntaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ liṃgatvenopāttantacca naiva pradīpādiṣu varttate |

[505,3]

"abhinnajanme"tyā cā ryaḥ | "kenāvaṣṭambhena" kena pramāṇenā"bhinnajanma"pratyabhijñāna"mityucyate" | nityasya sāmarthyābhāvāt | etacca pratyakṣasyāpi pratyabhijñānasya dūṣaṇandraṣṭavyaṃ | pratyabhijñāyamānasyābhedena pratibhāsanāditi cet |
na | "tasyaivābhedasya sarvatra vajropalādi"ṣvapi "paurvāparyeṇa cintyatvāt" | yathāpūrvambajrādiṣu svarūpaṃ kiṃ paścādapi tadevāhosvidanyadeva kevalaṃ sādaśyādekatvavibhramaḥ pradīpādiṣviveti cintyametat | yathā vajrādiṣvabhedasya cintyatva"ntathā bhedasyāpi" cintyatvā"diti cet" | kimbhedaḥ paurvāparyeṇa pratibhāsata ityetadapi nirūpaṇīyameva |

[506,1]

"tenai"vetyācāryaḥ | yataśca naikāntena bhedo'bhedo vāvadhārayituṃ śakyastenaivānavadhāraṇena "saṃśayostu" | pratyabhijñāyamāneṣvartheṣu bhedābhedasaṃśayo bhavatu | saṃśayādeva pratyabhijñāyamānatvād bhedaniścaya iti cedāha | "na ca" saṃ"śayitāt" saṃśayaviṣayāt pratyabhijñānaliṅgācchabdasyaikatvasiddhiḥ |

[506,2]

pūrvakṣaṇāduttarasya kṣaṇasya "vivekādarśanād" vivekāpratibhāsanāt pūrvottarakāleṣu bhāvasyai"katvaṃ" siddha"miti cet" |

[506,3]

"ne"tyādi prativacanaṃ | tenāyamartho bhāvasyedānīmpratibhāsa eva kṣaṇapratibhāsaḥ | pūrvāparakālasambandhitvenāpratibhāsanāt | kṣaṇasya ca svarūpeṇa pratibhāsa eva pūrvādikṣaṇād vivekena pratibhāsassu me ru bhinnapratibhāsavānna tvavinābhāvena pūrvādikṣaṇāt pratibhāsamānāt | kevalaṃ sa viveko nāvadhāryata iti |
tadarthamanumānaṃ pravarttate | tadāha na vajrādiṣvavivekasyādarśanamasti | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "paurvāparyeṇa" vajrādi"jñānā"nāṃ pūrvāparabhāvena vajrādeḥ "sadasattvasiddheḥ" | tathā hi | vajrādyālambanamuttaraṃ jñānaṃ prāgabhavat svakāraṇaviśeṣasya prāgasattvaṃ sādhayati |
paścād bhavacca sattvamityevaṃ jñānapaurvāparyeṇa vajrādiṣu sadasattvasiddheḥ | "vivekasadbhāvād" bhedasadbhāvāt |

[506,4]

etadeva sphuṭayannāha | "yadī"tyādi | "aparāṇyu"ttarakālabhāvīni "jñānāni prāk" pūrvajñānakāle "sannihitakāraṇāni" syuḥ "pūrvajñānavajjātānyeva syuḥ" | na caivaṃ | tasmāda"jātāni tu" tāni jñānāni prāk | sva"kāraṇa"sya "vaikalyaṃ sūcayanti" |
anyathā yadi teṣāṃ kāraṇaṃ prāgapi syāt | tatsamarthamvā bhavedasamarthamvā | yadisamarthaṃ prāgapi janayet | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "samarthasya jananāt" | athāsamartham |
paścādapi na janayet | kasmād | "asamarthasyāpya"nādheyātiśayatvena "punaḥ" kutaścit "sāmarthya" | atha kutaścit sāmarthyaṃ pratilabheta | tadā sāmarthyasya "pratilambhe vā sthairyāyogāt" | pūrvāsamarthasvabhāvahāneranyasya ca samarthasyotpādāt |

[507,1]

tasmāt kramabhāvīni vijñānāni svaviṣayasyāpi kramaṃ sādhayantīti sarvapadārthānāmbhedasiddheranityatvaṃ | sa evāyamiti jñānaṃ tu sadṛśadarśananimittaṃ |

[507,2]

yata evan"tasmādayaṃ satprayoga ityapi" yoyaṃ dvitīyo heturucyate | tenāpi śabdasya"jananame"vocyate | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "prayoktuḥ" sakāśācchabdasya "sāmarthyāt" | abhimatakāryakaraṇe śabdasya sāmarthyapratilambhādityarthaḥ | anyayā yadi prayokturvyāpārāt prāgeva vāsyādikaṃ śabdo vā svakārye samarthaṃ syāttadā "svayaṃ sāmarthye tasya"
prayoktura"nupayogā"t puruṣānapekṣāṇāṃ svayameva vāsyādīnāṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt | na ca bhavati | tasmāt pra"yoga ityapi | iṣṭa"syābhimatasyārthasya cchidādeḥ "sādhanaṃ"
siddhistatra "samartha"svabhāvasyotpā"danameva" vāsyādeḥ "kathyate" | kimbhūtamutpādanaṃ |
samānajātīyaṃ sadṛśamupādānaṃ pūrvaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ kṣaṇamapekṣata iti "samānajātīyopādānāpekṣaṃ" vā"syādiprayogavat" | chidādiṣu prayujyamānānāṃ vāsyādīnāṃ samānajātīyapūrvakṣaṇāpekṣaṇāt | "upādānānapekṣaṃ vā | karmādiprayogavacca" | ādiśabdād vīṇādiśabdaparigrahaḥ | na hi karmādiṣu prathamaṃ prayujyamāneṣu pūrvasadṛśakṣaṇāpekṣāsti |

[507,3]

"yopi manyate" | mā bhūt pratyabhijñānamanumānaṃ vyabhicārāt yat purovasthite vastuni "samakṣe pratyabhijñāna"nta"tpratyakṣaṃ" pramāṇaṃ | "tataḥ pratyakṣādeva" pramāṇād bhāvānāṃ "sthairyasiddhiriti | tadapyuttaratra niṣetsyāmaḥ" |

[507,4]

anayā diśā sthairyasādhanāyopanītaḥ "kuhetu"rdraṣṭavyaḥ | yasmā"nnaivaṃ kaścid" sā"dhanadharmosta" sthairyasādhano "yaḥ samānajātīyaṃ" sthiraikasvabhāmvastvanveti | kasmāt | "sarvadharmāṇāmetadavasthānāt" | aparāparasvabhāvahānyutpādasvabhāvatvāt | "sarva"syāḥ "sthairyapratyabhijñā"yāśca "yuktivirodhā"danumānavirodhāt | kathaṃ | "yathābhidhānaṃ" | yatheha śāstre kṣaṇikatvasādhanamabhihitamabhidhāsyate ca | tathā yuktivirodhāt kāraṇā"danyepi" paraparikalpitāḥ sthairyasādhana"hetavo vācyadoṣāḥ" |

[508,1]

evantāvad vyaktikramo vākyaṃ neti prakramya vyaktistrividhā kalpitā |
śabdasyātiśayotpādanaṃ | tadāvaraṇavigamo | jñānaṃ ceti | tatra nityatvācchabdasya nātiśayotpādanaṃ | āvaraṇābhāvasya cākāryatvānnāpyāvaraṇavigamo vyaktiriti vikalpadvaye pratikṣipte | jñānaṃ vyaktirityavaśiṣyate |

[508,2]

<3>tadā ca vyaktikramo vākyaṃ | buddhīnāmānupūrvī vākyamāpadyate |

[508,3]

na caitad yuktam | abuddhisvabhāvatvād vākyasya | tathāpyabhyupagamyocyate | vyaktikramasya ca vākyasyāpauruṣeyatve sādhye buddherevāpauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhyaṃ syāt | tatra "buddherapuruṣāśraye" puruṣānāśrayaṇe sādhye pratijñāyā bādhā | kaiḥ | "abhyupetapratyakṣapratītānumitaiḥ samame"kakālaṃ abhyupetenābhyupagatena | pratyakṣapratītenānumitena ca | "tadānupūrvī" buddhyanupūrvī "vākyaṃ" | sā ca nārthāntaraṃ buddhibhya iti"tasyā" ānupūrvyā "apauruṣeyasvaprasādhane" | buddherevāpauruṣeyatvaṃ sādhitaṃ syāt | tatra"ca samayaḥ" siddhāntosya mī māṃ sa ka sya "bādhyate" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "buddhīnāṃ" sva"siddhānte puruṣaguṇatvenābhyupagamāt" |

[508,4]

pratyakṣabādhāndarśayannāha | "pratyakṣaṃ khalvapyetad yadi tā buddhayo manaskārādibhyo bhavantīti" | ādigrahaṇādindriyaparigrahaḥ | kīdṛśebhyo manaskārādibhyaḥpuruṣa iti vyavahāralāghavārthaṃ kṛtasaṃketebhyaḥ | etatsvamatenoktaṃ | "puruṣaguṇebhyo"
veti vyatikramya puruṣasya guṇebhyaḥ | etattu paramatenoktaṃ | tasmāt manaskārādibhya utpadyamānāyā buddheḥ kāryatvaṃ pratyakṣasiddhamiti tasyā apauruṣeyatve sādhye pratyakṣabādhā |

[509,1]

syānmataṃ | kāryatāyā apratyakṣatvānna pratyakṣabādheti cedāha | nanvityādi |
kāraṇābhimatasya bhāva eva bhāvaḥ tadabhāve cābhāva ityetau "bhāvābhāvaviśeṣau |
tābhyāṃ nānyā kāryatā bhāvasya | sa" yathokto "bhāvaḥ pratyakṣa"siddhaḥ | tadabhāve tvabhāvaḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣasiddha iti cedāha | "abhāvopi | anupalabdhi"reva lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvo yasyābhāvasyeti vigrahaḥ sopi "pratyakṣasāmarthyasiddhaṃ i"tyuttaratra "vakṣyāmaḥ" |
tadanyaviviktarūpambhāvameva pratipādayat pratyakṣaṃ sāmarthyādabhāvaṃ gamayatīti sāmarthyagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ | yataśca manaskārādibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ buddhibhāvābhāvau | "tata" eva tadbhāvabhāvitvāt "puruṣakāryatā buddhīnāmanumeyā" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anvayavyatirekaliṃgatvādasyāḥ" kāryatāyāḥ | tadanenānumānabādhoktā |

[509,2]

atha syānna vyaktikramo vākyaṃ | kintu varṇṇānupūrvī vākyamityata āha | "kiṃ ce"tyādi | "varṇṇebhyaḥ" sakāśā"dānupūrvyā bhedaḥ spho ṭe ne" ti pūrvoktena sphoṭavicāreṇa | abhinnāpi prāgeva niṣiddhā | bhedābhedaṃ ca muktvā vastuno nānyā gatirasti | tadā ca vyāpināmvarṇṇānāmānupūrvī "kalpanāropitā syā"t | "kathaṃ vā tadānīmapuruṣāśrayā" | puruṣāśrayaiva syāt |

[509,3]

varṇṇetyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "varṇṇe"bhyaḥ sakāśād "vyatirekiṇī" bhinnasvabhāvā"nupūrvī" | pūrvoktena "sphoṭavicārānukrameṇaiva prativihitā" |

[509,4]

vākyanna bhinnamvarṇebhyo vidyatenupalambhanād | ityādinā dūṣaṇenānupūrvyapi pratikṣiptā |

[509,5]

"nāpi sā varṇasvabhāvā" | saro rasa iti pratipattibhedabhāvaprasaṅgāt | na cāpi sā tattvānyattvābhyāmavācyā | "vastusvabhāvasyaitadvikalpānatikramāt" | tattvānyattvavikalpānatikramāt | tasmā"datadrūpeṣu" vastubhūtabhinnānupūrvīrahiteṣu varṇṇeṣu "tadūpasamāropapratibhāsinyā" ānupūrvīsamāropapratibhāsinyā "buddherayamvibhramaḥ syādānupūrvīti | sā cā"nupūrvī "kathamapauruṣeyī" pauruṣeyyeva | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | buddherviṭhaṃpanena vyāpāreṇa "pratyupasthāpanāt" | sandarśitatvāt |

[510,1]

"api cātyantikasya" nityasya "kasyacitsvabhāvasyābhāvāt | bhavatā" vidyamānena"dhvaninā" śabdenāvaśyama"nātyantikenā"sthireṇa "bhavitavyaṃ | sa ca" dhvani"rahetukaḥ" syāt |
puruṣavyatirekeṇānyo heturasyetya"nyahetuko vā" | tatrāhetukatve "nityambhavet" | anyānapekṣaṇāt | anyahetukatve tu "na ca puruṣavyāpārād" bhavet | bhavati ca puruṣavyāpārāt | "tasmāt pauruṣeya" iti gamyate |

[510,2]

"kathami"tyādi paraḥ | "anātyantiko dhvaniranyo vā" pṛthivyādikā"bhāva iti kathamidaṃ" gamyate |

[510,3]

"satte"tyā cā ryaḥ | "nāśasya sattāmātrānubandhitvāt" | kāraṇā"danityatā dhvaneḥ" |
sannityeva kṛtvā nāśo bhavati na kāraṇāntaramapekṣate | saṃśca śabdaḥ | tasmānna nitya iti samudāyārthaḥ |

[510,4]

kasmāt sattāmātrānubandhī vināśa ityāha | "na hī"tyādi | yasmānna"bhāvānāṃ nāśo" nāma dharmāntaraṃ "kutaści"nnāśakāraṇād "bhavati" |

[510,5]

yata evaṃ | "tadi"ti tasmād "bhāvasvabhāva" eva nāśo "bhavet" | kuta etad | "bhāvasyaiva svahetubhyaḥ" sakāśāt "taddharmaṇo" vināśadharmaṇo "bhāvā"dutpatteḥ | ekakṣaṇasthitidharmakatvameva vināśaḥ | tacca hetubhya evotpadyata iti yāvat |

[511,1]

kṛtakānāmeva satāṃ vināśo nānyeṣāṃ satāṃ | taduktaṃ | "sadakāraṇa vannityami" ti |

[511,2]

"na cetyā"di | "na ca bhāvaviśeṣa"sya kasyacit"svabhāvo" vināśaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyo"ttaratra "niṣetsyamānatvāt | tasmād bhāvamātrasvabhāvaḥ syād" vināśaḥ |
sattāmātrasvabhāvaḥ syāt | "tena" kāraṇena "śabdonyo vā sarva eva bhāvaḥ sattābhājanaḥ"
sattādhāraḥ sanniti yāvat | "anātyantika iti siddhaṃ" |

[511,3]

"na siddha"miti paraḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyaiva vināśasyāparajanmāsiddheḥ" |
parasmājjanma parajanma | na parajanmāparajanma | tasyāsiddheḥ | vināśasyāhetukatvāsiddheriti yāvat |

[511,4]

"tathā hyagninā kāṣṭhaṃ" dagdhaṃ | "daṇḍena ghaṭo" bhagna "iti vināśahetavo"'gnyādayaḥ kāṣṭhādīnā"mbhāvānāndṛśyante" | tathā hyagnyādibhāve kāṣṭhādīnāṃ nāśastadabhāve cānāśa itya"nvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ" nāśasyāsti | etacca "hetutadvato"rhetumato"rlakṣaṇamāhuḥ" | taduktaṃ |

[511,5]

"abhighātāgnisaṃyoganāśapratyayasannidhiṃ | vinā, saṃsargitāṃ yāti vināśo na ghaṭādibhiriti | "

[511,6]

"ne"tyādinā pratipedhati | nāgnyādayaḥ kāṣṭhādervinā karaṇālloke vināśahetavaḥ pratīyante | kintu pūrva"pūrvasya" kāṣṭhādikṣaṇasya "svarasanirodhe" svayameva nirodhe sati | "anyasyo"ttarasya kṣaṇasya "nikṛta"sya bhasmādi"rūpasyotpatte"ragnyādayaḥ kāṣṭhādīnāṃ vināśahetavaḥ prajñāyante na tu vināśasya karaṇāt | kutaḥ punastasya vikṛtasyotpattirityāha | "viśiṣṭe"tyādi | "viśiṣṭaḥ pratya"yo'gnyādiḥ sahakārī"tadāśrayeṇa" |

[511,7]

abhyupagamyāpi "brūmaḥ | astu vāgniḥ kāṣṭhavināśahetuḥ | sa nāśogni" | agnerjanma yasyeti vigrahaḥ | "kiṃ kāṣṭhamevāhosvi"tkāṣṭhā"darthānta"rantatrā"gne"rvināśakam |

[512,1]

hetossakāśānnāśasyā"rthāntarasyotpattau bhavet kāṣṭhasya darśanaṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "avināśāt" | kāṣṭhasya "kimityarthāntarāt" kāṣṭhā"darthāntarasya" nāśasyotpattau"janmani" sati "kāṣṭhamabhūtaṃ" vinaṣṭaṃ "nāma" | naivābhūtamiti yāvat |

[512,2]

yadi nāmāvinaṣṭantathāpyarthāntarotpatyā tasya darśanamiti cedāha | "na dṛśyate veti" | kimiti "na dṛśyate" | dṛśyata eva | yadi tvarthāntarotpatyārthāntaraṃ vinaṣṭaṃ"na dṛśyate vā" | ta"dātiprasaṅgo hyevaṃ syāt" | arthāntarasya yasya kasyaciduttpatyā sarvamabhūtaṃ syāt | na vā dṛśyeta | "sa eva" padārthognijanmā | na sarvaḥ | "asya"
kāṣṭhasya "vināśo" loke vināśarūpatayā pratīte"riti" yāvat |

[512,3]

etadeva grahaṇakavākyaṃ "yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yadi sa evāgnijanmā" kāṣṭhasyā"bhāvo" vināśaḥ | taditi tasmā"didaṃ" kāṣṭhama"bhūtatvād" vinaṣṭatvā"nna dṛśyata"
iti |

[512,4]

"bhava"tvityādinā pratiṣadhati | "bhavatu tasyā"gnijanmanorthas"yedannāma" saṃjñā yadida"mabhāva iti | tathāpi" nāmamātreṇa "kathamanyonyasya" vināśaḥ | "na" hi "kasyacidartha"syāgnijanmano vināśa iti "nāmakaraṇamātreṇa kāṣṭhaṃ na dṛśyata iti yuktaṃ" |

[512,5]

nanu lokapratītatvādvināśa evāsau na tasya vināśa iti nāmakaraṇamātramityata āha |

[512,6]

"na cānyaḥ" padārtho"'nyasya vināśo'tiprasaṃgāt" | sarve padārthāḥ kāṣṭhasya vināśaḥ syād | etaccānantaroktameva smarayati |

[513,1]

evammanyate | yathā sarvapadārthānāmarthāntaratvāt na kāṣṭhavināśarūpatayā pratītistathā'gnikṛtasyāpyarthāntaratvānna kāṣṭhavināśarūpatayā pratītiḥ syāt |

[513,2]

syādetad | yadyarthāntaratvādagnikṛtasyārthasya na vināśarūpatā | dhūmasyāpi tarhyagnikāryatā na syādarthāntaratvād ghaṭavat | bhavati ca tadarthāntaratvāviśeṣepyagnikṛtasya kāṣṭhavināśarūpatā bhaviṣyatīti |

[513,3]

ata āha | "aviśeṣāt | tasyā"gnikṛtasya vastubhūtasya kāṣṭhāda"rthāntaratvena tadanyebhyo" ghaṭādibhyo "viśeṣābhāvāt" | kathamvināśarūpatā nivṛttirūpatvād vināśasyeti bhāvaḥ | dhūmasya tvarthāntaratvepyagnikāryatvaṃ yuktameva | arthāntarasyāgnikāryatvena saha virodhābhāvāditi yatkiñcidetat |

[513,4]

"kāṣṭhegnikṛtaḥ svabhāvo nāśo na" sarvaḥ ghaṭādistato nātiprasaṃga "iti cet" |

[513,5]

"kāṣṭhe"'yamagnikṛto vināśa "iti" kāṣṭhavināśayoḥ "kassambandhaḥ" | parasparamanupakāryopakāratvāt | naiva sambandhosti |

[513,6]

kāṣṭhamāśraya āśrayosyāstītyāśrayī vināśaḥ | tata "āśrayāśrayisambandhostīti cet" |

[513,7]

"nai"tadevaṃ | tasyāśrayāśrayisambandhasya "niṣetsyamānatvāt" |

[513,8]

vināśo janyaḥ | tasya kāṣṭhaṃ janakaṃ | tato nāśakāṣṭhayo"rjanyajanakabhāva"sambandha"ścet" |

[513,9]

ta"dāgneriti kiṃ" | agneḥ sakāśānnāśo bhavatīti kimucyate | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "kāṣṭhādeva" tasya nāśasya "bhāvā"dutpatteḥ |

[513,10]

"tadapekṣā"dagnyapekṣāt kāṣṭhānnāśasyo"tpatteradoṣaḥ" | agnikṛto nāśo na syāditi yo doṣa uktaḥ sa nāstī"ti cet" |

[513,11]

vahneḥ sakāśāda"na" kāṣṭhasya vahnimprati "kāpekṣā" | naiva kācit | vahneḥ sakāśāt kāṣṭhasyātiśaya"lābhe vā'para"sya dvitīyasya "kāṣṭha"syātiśayasaṃjñakasya "janma syāt" | tathā ca "pūrva"kāṣṭha"mapracyutikāra"ṇaṃ | nāsya pracyutikāraṇamastīti vigrahaḥ | "tathaiva" prāgvad "dṛśyate" |

[513,12]

syādetad | yata evāgneratiśayavato dvitīyasya kāṣṭhasya janma | "tata evāgneḥ" kāṣṭhasya vināśa iti cet |

[514,1]

"kaḥ pūrveṇa" kāṣṭhenāsya vahnikṛtasya vināśasya "sambandha iti sa eva prasaṃgaḥ" |
kāṣṭha iti kaḥ sambandha ityanantaramevoktaḥ |

[514,2]

athāpyāśrayāśrayibhāvādikamāśrīyate | tadā tasya niṣetsyamānatvādityādi sarvaṃ punarāvarttate ityaparyavasānaśca prasaṅgaḥ syāt |

[514,3]

taditi tasmā"davaśyaṃ vināśasambandha"sya "yogyaṅ kāṣṭhasyottaramatiśayaṃ pratyupakurvāṇognirapūrvameva" kāṣṭha"ñjanayatīti pūrvaṃ" kāṣṭhantadavasthandṛśyetetyupasaṃhāraḥ |

[514,4]

kiñca | "kāṣṭhavināśa iti kāṣṭhābhāva ucyate | na cābhāvaḥ kāryaḥ" | vidhinā kāryatvopagame tasya bhāvatvaprasaṅgāt | tasmādabhāvaṃ karoti bhāvanna karotīti |
kriyāpratiṣedhamātraṃ | tathā ca "tatkārī" cābhāvakārī vākāra eva kriyāpratiṣedhamātratvā"diti" kṛtvā kāṣṭhavināśena vahnyādi"ranapekṣaṇīya ityuktaṃ sāmānyatadvatorādhārādheyacintā"sthāne |

[514,5]

kiñca | "svabhāvābhāvasya" kāṣṭhādisvabhāvasya yo'bhāvo nāśastasya tataḥ kāṣṭhādisvabhāvād "bhede"bhyupagamyamāne | tatorthāntarādabhāvāt kāṣṭhādirbhāvo nivarttate | tatastasmādabhāva"nnivarttamānasya" kāṣṭhādeḥ "svabhāva eva samarthitaḥ syāt" | asato nivarttamānasya sattvameva samarthitaṃ syāditi kṛtvā kathamagnyādikṛtena vināśena kāṣṭhādi"rabhūto nāma" |

[514,6]

yata eva"ntasmānna anyonyasya vināśaḥ" | arthāntaramarthāntarasya na vināśa ityarthaḥ |

[514,7]

abhyupagamyāpi brūmaḥ | astvanyo vināśastasminnarthāntare vahnikṛte kāṣṭhantadavasthameveti "kasmānna dṛśyate" | etadeva sādhayannāha | "koyamvirodhaḥ | "sya yo "bhāvaḥ" | yacca "kāṣṭha"sya "darśana"nta"yoḥ |
tathā ca kāṣṭhantadavasthaṃ" dṛśyeta |

[515,1]

nanu"yosāvarthāntaraṃ bhāvo vahnikṛtaḥ sa kāṣṭhavināśaḥ | vināśarūpatayā pratīteḥ | vināśaścābhāvo yaśca kāṣṭhābhāvaḥ | sa kāṣṭhavirodhirūpa eva kriyate | na cāyamarthāntaratvād ghaṭavad virodhirūpatayā karttumaśakyaḥ | na hi ghaṭavadarthāntaratvād dhūmognikāryo na bhavati | tasmād yathārthāntarabhūtopi dhūmogninā kriyate, tathā virodhirūpo vināśaḥ kriyate | yayośca parasparaparihāreṇa virodhastayorekabhāva evāparasyādarśanamiti kathamagnikṛtasyārthāntarasya vināśasaṃjñitasya virodhino bhāve kāṣṭhasya darśanaṃ syādityucyata" iti śa ṅka raḥ |

[515,2]

tadayuktaṃ | yatorthāntarasyāgnikāryatvena saha virodhābhāvād | dhūmamyārthāntaratvepyagnikāryatvamaviruddhameva | vahnikṛtasya tvarthāntarasya bhavanadharmatayā bhāvarūpatā | yaśca bhāvaḥ sa kathamabhāvo vaḥ | virodhād vināśaścābhāva iṣyate | tatorthāntarabhāvena viruddho vināśaḥ | na cārthāntarasyāpi vināśarūpatayā pratibhāsanāt | kāṣṭhādivināśarūpatā | svarasanirodho hi nimittamvināśapratibhāse |

[515,3]

svarasanirodhānabhyupagame tu kathamarthāntarasyāpi vināśarūpatayā pratibhāso bhāvarūpatvādityādāvevoktaṃ | tatkathamucyate | vināśākhyasyārthāntarasya virodhinaḥ kṛtakatvāt kāṣṭhasyādarśanamiti | nīrūpatve tu vināśasya syād bhāvena sahāyaṃ virodhaḥ | kintu tadāpyarthāntaratvaṃ hetujanyatvaṃ cāsya na syānnīrūpatvādeva | tasmādagninārthāntarasya karaṇe kāṣṭhantadavasthaṃ dṛśyeta |

[515,4]

tenāgnikṛtenārthāntareṇa "parigrahataḥ" svīkārāt kāṣṭhaṃ na dṛśyata iti "cet" |

[515,5]

eva sati tadarthāntaraṃ kāṣṭhasyāvaraṇamiti prāptaṃ | tacca na yuktaṃ | "yato na tenā"rthāntareṇa kāṣṭhasyā"varaṇaṃ" sambhavati |

[515,6]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "tenārthāntareṇā"gninā kṛtena | "tadi"tyagnikṛtamarthāntaraṃ | na "caitadāva"raṇakalpitaṃ "yuktaṃ" | yasmādā"varaṇaṃ hi" | āvriyamāṇe"rthadarśanamvibadhnīyāt | nābhighātāvīni dravyasāmarthyāni" vibadhnīyāt | andhakārāvṛtānāṃ ghaṭādīnāmabhidhātādidarśanāt | tatra svadeśe parasyotpattivibandhobhighātaḥ | ādiśabdād gandharasādiparigrahaḥ | athāvaraṇaṃ sarvasāmarthyaṃ kāṣṭhasya nibadhnīyāt | tadā "sarvapratibandhe cā"bhyupagamyamāne | "na tvanenai"vāvaraṇena kāṣṭha"nnāśitaṃ syā"nna vahninā | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | tenaivāsya kāṣṭhasya "sarvaśaktipracyāvanāt" | tathā ca sati "punastatrāpyagnikṛ"terthāntare nāśahetā"vagnāviva prasaṃgāt" |
kāṣṭhavināśaṃ prati yognau doṣo vistareṇoktaḥ sorthāntareṇāpyagnikṛtena kāṣṭhanāśe kriyamāṇe syāt | tathā "cānavasthā" | tenāpyarthāntareṇāgnikṛtena nāśenāparamarthāntarannāśākhyaṃ karttavyantenāpyaparamityanavasthā syād |

[516,1]

atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityapracyutā eva kāṣṭhasyābhidhātādisāmarthyādayaḥ |

[516,2]

tadā"pyapracyuteṣu vāsya" kāṣṭhasyā"bhighātasāmarthyādiṣu | satā vā" tenānyenāgni janitena kāṣṭhasya "kiṃ vināśitaṃ" yena tadāvaraṇantathā ca kāṣṭhaṃ dṛśyeta || "yadi ce"tyādi || "agneḥ samudbha"vo yasyeti vigrahaḥ | agnisamudbhūtena "vināśākhye"nā"rthena parigrahā"dityarthaḥ | tadā "vināśasya vināśitvaṃ syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "utpatteḥ" | utpattimatvād vināśopi kāṣṭhavad vināśī syāditi yāvat | "tato" vināśavināśāt "punaḥ kāṣṭhasya darśanaṃ" syāt |

[516,3]

"avaśya"mityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "utpattimatā" satā kāṣṭha"vināśenāvaśyaṃ vinaṣṭavyaṃ | tasmin" kāṣṭhanāśe "vinaṣṭe" sati "punaḥ kāṣṭhādīnāmunmajjanaṃ syāt" |
prādurbhāvo bhavet |

[516,4]

"hantughāte"tyādinā paramāśaṃkate | caitrasya yo hantā tasya "hanturghāte" sati "yathā" |
hatasya "caitra"syā"punarbhāvaḥ" punaranutpattiḥ | "atrā"pi kāṣṭhanāśe vinaṣṭe"pyevaṃ" kāṣṭhasyāpunarbhāva "iti cet" |

[517,1]

"hanturi"tyādinā pratividhatte | nedaṃ samādhānaṃ yuktaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "hanturamaraṇatvataḥ" | na hi hantā caitrasya maraṇasvabhāvaḥ | kintarhi | mārayitā | tato yuktaṃ yat tannāśe caitrasyāpunarbhavanaṃ | maraṇe tvanivṛtte'vaśyaṃ punarbhavanaṃ syāt |

[517,2]

"vināśe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "vināśa"sya "vināśepi na vastunaḥ pratyāpa"ttirna pūrvarūpagamanaṃ | yasmā"nna hi hantari hate"pi "tadvata"stena hantrā puruṣeṇa hataḥ "pratyujjīvati | nā"yamparihāro yuktaḥ | kasmād | "hantuḥ" puruṣasya "tadghātahetutvāt" |
tasya caitrasya yanmaraṇantaddhetutvāt | na tvasau hantā maraṇasvabhāvaḥ |

[517,3]

etadeva spaṣṭayannāha | "ne"tyādi | "nāśahetoragnidaṇḍādernivṛttau" satyāmvinaṣṭena "bhāvena" puna"rbhavativyamiti na brūmaḥ" | evamabhidhāne bhavedeṣa parihāraḥ | "kintarhi" | vah nyādinā kāṣṭhāde"rbhāva"syā"bhāvo" yaḥ kriyate "tasya" | kimbhūtasya | "atyantānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya" | karmmasthā ca kriyātropalabdhiḥ | tatpratiṣedhenātyantānupalabdhiḥ sarvasāmarthyaviraha ucyate | "tasyai"vaṃbhūtasyābhāvasya "nivṛttau"
satyāṃ | svabhāvāvasthiteḥ sakāśād bhāvasya "kānyā gatiḥ | svabhāvasthitire"va gatiriti yāvat |

[517,4]

hantari tu vinaṣṭe nayuktaṃ punarbhavanaṃ | yasmā"ddhantā hi caitrasya na nāśakalpaḥ |
kintarhi | daṇḍādikalpaḥ" daṇḍāditulyaḥ nāśahetutvāt | "nāśakalpaṃ hyasya" caitrasya "maraṇaṃ | tannivṛttau" tasya nāśakalpasya maraṇasya nivṛttau "syādevāsya" caitrasya"punarbhāvaḥ" |

[517,5]

evantāvat nāśasyārthāntaratve doṣa uktaḥ |

[517,6]

anarthāntaratvamadhikṛtyāha | "ananyatvepī"tyādi | vastuno "nāśasyānanyatvepi syānnāśaḥ kāṣṭhameva tu | tasya" ca kāṣṭhasya svahetorutpannasya "satvāt" | navahnyādibhiḥ kiñcit karttavyamiti tatsvabhāvasya nāśasyā"hetutvaṃ | nāta"stattvānyatvavikalpānnāśasya vastudharmasya "vidyatenyā gatiḥ" |

[518,1]

"anarthāntara" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "kāṣṭhādanarthāntarabhūto" yadā "vināśa"stadā"tadeva" kāṣṭhameva "ta"dvināśākhyamvastu"bhavati | tacca" kāṣṭhādi | vahnyādisannidhānāt "prāgevāstīti | kima"tra kāṣṭhādau vināśye "sāmarthyamvahnyādīnā"miti draṣṭavyaṃ | kvacid daṇḍādīnāmiti pāṭhaḥ sa tu ghaṭādīn purodhāya vyākhyeyaḥ | "tasmāt tadanukārāt" | tatra kāṣṭhādau vināśahetūnāmanupakārāt "tena" kāṣṭhādinā vināśahetavo "nāpekṣyante kathaṃcit" kenāpi rūpeṇa | "nāpyasya" kāṣṭāde"rida"mvahnyādikaṃ vināśahetu"riti sambandhamarhati" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyopakāranibandhanatvāt |
anyatho"pakāramantareṇa sambandhakalpanāyāma"tiprasaṃgāt" | sarvaḥ sarvasya sambandhī syāt |

[518,2]

syādetat | na sākṣād vanhyādiḥ kāṣṭhāderupakārakaḥ kintu tatsambandhibhūtopakārakaraṇāditi |

[518,3]

ata āha | "pāramparyeṇe"tyādi | vahnyādinā kāṣṭhādeḥ sambandhibhūta upakāraḥ kriyate na sākṣāditi | evaṃ "pāramparyeṇopakārepi" kalpyamāne"'vaśyamayamvikalponvetya"nugacchati | sa kimpāramparyeṇā"pyupakārorthāntaramāhosvit tadeva" kāṣṭhādikami"ti" | tatra "ta"smāt kāṣṭhādera"rthāntaratvepyu"pakārasya | "tasya" kāṣṭhāderayamupakāra"iti" kassambandha iti | tatra kāṣṭhādau tasyāgnikṛtas"yopakāra"syopakārakatvaṃ"paryanuyojyaṃ" | tadantareṇa sambandhābhāvāt | ādiśabdāt tatrāpyaparopakārakalpanetyanavasthādoṣādiparigrahaḥ | "tathānanyatvepyu"pakārasya "tadavasthaḥ paryanuyogaḥ" syānnāśaḥ kāṣṭhamevetyādinā ya uktaḥ "tasmāt sato" vidyamānasya "rūpasya tattvānyattvāvyatikramāt" kāraṇāt |

[518,4]

syādetat | sato rūpasya tattvānyattvāvyatikramād vināśahetukṛtaṃ tūpakārotpādanamasadeveti |

[519,1]

ata āha | "upakāre"tyādi | "rūpaniṣpādanalakṣaṇa"tvāt | sadrūpaniṣpādanalakṣaṇatvāt | tataśca tadvā vastu tena vināśakena karttavyamanyadvā | ubhayathā cokto doṣa iti | "tadatatkriyāvikalo" nāśahetu"rna kartaivaiti na kasyaciddhetuḥ | ahetuśca"
daṇḍādi "nāpekṣyate" vinaśvareṇa ghaṭādinā | "tasmāt svayaṃ" sattāmātre"ṇāyambhāvastattatsvabhāvo" vinaśvarasvabhāva "iti" ||

[519,2]

pradhvaṃsābhāvannāśaṃ gṛhītvā parasya codyamāśaṃkate | "ahetutvepī"tyādi aheturhi bhavannityambhavet | "nityatvā"cca bhāvakālepi nāśo bhavedityevam"bhāvanāśayoḥ sahabhāvaprasaṅgaścet" |

[519,3]

nāyandoṣaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "asataḥ" pradhvaṃsalakṣaṇasya nāśasya "nityatā kutaḥ" |

[519,4]

"syādeta"dityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yadyapi nāśaḥ" kṣaṇikavādino'"hetukaḥ sovaśyaṃ nitya iti" kṛtvā "bhāvastadabhāvalakṣaṇo" vināśanivṛttirūpaḥ | "vināśaśca" tadabhāvalakṣaṇo bhāvanivṛttirūpaḥ | ekasya "saha syātāmiti" |

[519,5]

"naita"devaṃ | kasmāt | "tasyā"bhāvasyāvastutvena "nityādidharmāyogāt | na hyasatyaya"nnityānitya"vikalpassambhavati | tayo"rnityayo"rvastudharmatvāt | vināśasya ca" bhāvanivṛttilakṣaṇasyā"kiñcittvāt" |

[519,6]

kiṃ ca | "bhavato" hyutpadyamānasya nityaṃ sattvāt "kenacit sahabhāvaḥ syāt |
na ca vināśo bhavati" | kevalamekakṣaṇasthitidharmā bhāvaḥ svayameva na bhavatīti kriyāpratiṣedhamātrametat | "tasmādadoṣo"nantaroktaḥ |

[519,7]

punarapi parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | yadi vināśo sanniṣyate tadā vināśasyā"sattve" satya"bhāvanāśitvaprasaṃgaḥ" | bhāvasya nāśitvaṃ na syādityayamapi prasaṅgo "na yujyate | yasmād bhāvasya nāśenā"rthāntareṇa "nā"smābhi"rvināśanamiṣyate" |

[520,1]

"kathami"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "kathamasan vināśo bhāvaṃ nāśaye"dasato vyāpārāyogāt | "ataḥ" kāraṇāda"vināśī bhāvaḥ syādityaprasaṃga eva" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "vināśā"darthāntarabhūtād "bhāva"sya "nāśānabhyupagamāt" |

[520,2]

"yo hī"tyādinaitadeva samarthayate | "yo hi" vādī "vināśa iti kiṃcinnetyāha |
sa kathantato" niḥsvabhāvānnāśād "bhāva"sya "nāśamicchet" | necchet |

[520,3]

"katha"mityādi paraḥ | "asat"yavidyamāne "vināśe kathambhāvo naṣṭo nāma" | naiva vinaṣṭaḥ syāt | tathā hi "pratyutpannāvasthāyāma"sadvināśāḥ | "asadvinā"śo yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | te na hi naṣṭā gaṇyante | yadā ca bhāvasya nāśo nāsti tadā kathantena sa vyapadiśyate nāśavāniti | "na hi yo yena" svabhāvenā"tadvān" asambandhavān | "sa" padārtha"stenā"sambandhinā "tathā vyapadiśyate" | tadvāniti vyapadiśyate śabdena | "pratīyate vā" jñānena |

[520,4]

netyādinā pariharati | "na vai" bhāvasya "nāśo nāstye"vāpi tvastyeva nāśaḥ |
kathantarhi nāstītyucyate | "sa tu nāsti" nāśo "yo bhāvasya bhavati" |
yadi vināśo na bhavati kathantarhi vināśostītyucyata iti |

[520,5]

āha | "bhāva eva tu kṣaṇasthitidharmā" | ekakṣaṇasthāyī "nāśaḥ" |

[520,6]

yadi bhāva eva nāśaḥ kathantarhi bhāvasya nāśo bhūta iti loko vyapadiśatīti |

[520,7]

ata āha | "tama"syetyādi | "asya" bhāvasya "tame"kakṣaṇasthāyi"svabhā"vaṃ sadṛśāparotpattivipralambhādupalakṣitaṃ | "uttarakālaṃ" santānocchittāvanupalambhenāsthitipratipattyā | "vibhāvayanto" niścinvantaḥ | "vināśosya" bhāvasya "bhūta iti yathā pratīti vyapadiśanti" vyavahāriṇaḥ puruṣā "ityuktaṃ" prāk |

[521,1]

yasmā"nna hi bhāvasya" niṣpannasya "kiñci"drūpāntaramvināśākhyamanyadvā "kadācid bhavati | sa eva" bhāvaḥ "kevalaṃ svahetubhyastathābhūta" ekakṣaṇasthāyī "bhavati | tadi"ti tasmā"nna kenaci"dvināśākhyena "bhavatā | sa" bhāvo "naṣṭo" nāma | "kintarhi | svabhāva evāsya" bhāvasya sa ekakṣaṇāvasthānaśīlaḥ | "yena sa" bhāvo "naṣṭo nāma" | anyathā svayamatatsvabhāvatvenyasannidhānepyanāśāt |

[521,2]

yadi nāśo nāma na kiñcit | "kathantarhīdānīmahetuko nāśo bhavatītyucyate"
bhavadbhiḥ | yasya hi svabhāva eva nāsti tasya kima"hetukaḥ" sahetuko veti cintayā |
bhāvasya nāśa iti vyatireko vā kathaṃ |

[521,3]

"naśyanni"tyādinā pariharati | "bhāvo naśyanna"parāpekṣaḥ | paraṃ vināśahetuṃ nāpekṣata "iti" kṛtvā | "na jñāpanāye"tyaparāpekṣatvajñāpanāya | "sā" nāś"āvasthā"smābhira"heturuktā" | tasyā nāśāvasthāyāś"cetasā" vikalpabuddhyā bhāvād "bhedaṃ" vyatireka"māropya" |

[521,4]

etaduktambhavati | ahetuko bhāvasya vināśo bhavatīti sahetukosya vināśo na bhavatītyarthaḥ |

[521,5]

"ne"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na bhāvo jātaḥ" sanna"parasmād" vināśaheto"rnāśaṃ pratilabhate" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tathābhūtasyaiva" naśvarasvabhāvasyaiva "svayaṃ" sattāhetoreva"jāteru"tpatteḥ | "iti" hetoraparamanyamvināśahetutvena kalpitamapekṣata ityaparāpekṣaḥ |
tathābhūtaścāsau dharmaśca vināśākhyaḥ | "aparāpekṣadha"rmastasya "pratiṣedhārthaṃ" |
sahetukavināśapratiṣedhārthamiti yāvat | "tatsvabhāvajñāpanene"ti bhāvasya vinaśvarasvabhāvajñāpanena | "svabhāva eva" tathocyata ityanena sambandhaḥ | "tathocyata" ityahetukosya vināśo bhavatītyucyate | kadācittanmātrajijñāsāyāṃ | bhāvasyānyasmāt kimvināśo bhavati na cetye"tāvanmātrajijñāsāyāṃ" | kena prakāreṇocyate | "dharmi"ṇaḥ sakāśād "arthāntaramiva" vināśākhyaṃ "dharmaṃ ceta"sā buddhyā "vibhajyā"sya bhāvasya vināśa iti vibhāgaṃ kṛtvā | "tadetad" yathoktena prakāreṇābhāvādavyatiriktannāśitvantatvato vyavasthāpitamapi "mandamatayo" nāśaṃ guṇaṃ dharmaṃ samāropyātmānamākulayantītyanena sambandhaḥ |

[522,1]

kasmāt punasta evamākulayantītityāha | "kvaci"dityādi | rājñaḥ puruṣa ityādau vyatirekavibhaktiprayoge "tathādarśanāt" | sambandhinorvibhāgadarśanāt | ihāpi bhāvasya nāśo bhavatītyanena "ghoṣaṇāmātreṇa vipralabdhāḥ" | bhāvasya vyatiriktaṃ"nāśaṃ guṇaṃ" dharmaṃ "samāropya | tasya ca" yathā kalpitasya guṇasya "bhāvaṃ" sattāṃ "samāropya" | taṃ nāśākhyaṃ guṇaṃ "sahetukamahetukamvā" darśanabhedena samāropya "bhāvacintayā"
vastucintayā | kiṃbhūtayā | "apratiṣṭhitatattvayā" | apratiṣṭhitantattvaṃ yasyāṃ cintāyāṃ | tayāt"mānamākulayanti" |

[522,2]

"svatopī"tyādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | yasyāpi svayamevāhetuko nāśo bhavati | tasyāpi "svatopyabhāvasya" vināśasya "bhāve"ṅgīkriyamāṇe | ayantattvānyattvalakṣaṇo "vikalpaśce"tasaḥ |

[522,3]

"nanvi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | na parabhāvitva"maparabhāvitva"mahetukatvepītyarthaḥ | "bhāvasya" vastuno yo "nāśa"sta"sya svata eva bhavataḥ | ayantattvānyattvavikalpastulyaḥ" |

[522,4]

kimarthāntarannāśo bhāvāduta bhāva eveti | tatra yadyarthāntara"ntadā kimarthāntara"sya nāśasya "bhāve" sattāyām"bhāvo na dṛśyate" | athānarthāntaraṃ vināśasta"dānarthāntaratvepi tadeva" ghaṭādikameva "tannā"śakhyam"bhavati | tatta"smā"nna kiñcidasya"
padārthasya "jātamiti kathaṃ vinaṣṭo nāma" |

[522,5]

"nanvi"tyādinā pariharati | "atra" prastāve | uktaṃ | kimuktaṃ | "na tasya" bhāvasya "kiṃcid" vyatiriktamvā nāśākhyaṃ dharmarūpam"bhavati" | kathantarhi vināśī bhāva ityāha | "na bhavatyeva kevalami"tyuktaṃ prāk |

[523,1]

etadeva sphuṭayannāha | "na hī"tyādi | "na hyayama"hetukavināśavādī bhāvasya svahetorniṣpannasya kaścid bhāvarūpo'bhāvarūpo vā "vināśonyo" vā sthityanyathātvādiko dharmo "bhavatītyāha | kintarhi sa eva bhāvo na bhavatīti" bhāvanivṛttimātramāha | tenāyamarthaḥ | prathame kṣaṇe bhāvo'bhūto bhavati | dvitīye kṣaṇe tasya na bhāvo bhavati nābhāvo vā | nāpi svarasahānirvā bhavati | kevalaṃ svayameva nivarttate |

[523,2]

"yadi" punarnāśābhidhānena "kasya"ciddharmasya "bhāva"mutpādaṃ "brūyā"nna "bhāvonena" vādinā"nivartitaḥ syāt" | bhāvanivṛttirna kathiteti yāvat | "tathā ca bhāvanivṛttau prastutāyā"marthāntarasyānyasya vidhānā"daprastutamevoktaṃ syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "na hi kasyacid" vināśākhyasyābhāvasya bhāvanivṛttirūpasya vā "bhāve"notpādena "bhāvaḥ"
padārtho "na bhūto nāma" | yena tadvidhānena bhāvasya svanivṛttiḥ syāt |

[523,3]

etaduktambhavati | yathā bhāvasya vijñānabhāve bhāvo na nivarttate kevalantadvijñānantatsambaṃndhi syāt | tathā bhāvasya nivṛttirbhavatītyabhyupagame sa eva nivṛttyākhyo dharmastatsambandhī syānna tu bhāvo nivartteteti kathamasya nivṛttiḥ syāt |
tasmāttadā sa bhāvo "na bhūto nivṛtto yadi svayaṃ na bhavet" |

[523,4]

tena yaducyate | nanvabhavanamapi yadi bhāvasya na bhavati | tadā'vināśitvaṃ |
atha bhavati | tadbhinnamvā syādabhinnamvā'nayośca pakṣayorbhāvasya sarvadā darśanaṃ syādavināśāt | tasmānnābhāvasya vināśaḥ | kathantarhi bhāvaḥ sarvadā na pratīyate pramāṇābhāvāditi |

[523,5]

tadapāstaṃ | dṛśyasya hi sattāyāḥ pramāṇaviṣayatvena vyāptatvāt | tadabhāvādabhāvaḥ | bhāve vāvaśyaṃ pramāṇaviṣayatvamiti kathamapratipattiḥ | athādṛśyarūpatayāsya bhāvastadā tarhi dṛśyarūpatāyā nivṛttiḥ | sā ca bhāvādbhinnā'bhinnā vā |
anayośca pakṣayorbhāvasya darśanaṃ syāditi doṣastadavastha eva | tasmād bhāvasyābhavanamapi na bhavati | nāpyavināśitvadoṣaḥ | svarūpeṇa nivṛtteḥ |

[523,6]

nanu bhāvanivṛtternīrūpatvena rūpiṇo bhāvādanyattvamiti cet |

[523,7]

nanu yasya rūpameva na vidyate tasya kathamanyattvaṃ | tatkimekatvamastu | tadapi nāstyarūpatvāt | tasmād bhāvena sahāsyāstattvānyattvaniṣedhamātraṃ kriyate | śaśaviṣāṇavat |

[524,1]

natvevamapi kathaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe bhāvo na bhavatītīṣyate | yato yadi dvitīyakṣaṇe bhāvastadā kathantatra nāstītīṣyate virodhāt | atha nāsti tadā kathaṃ bhāvo nāstītyucyate'sattvāditi |

[524,2]

tadayuktaṃ | yataḥ prathamepi kṣaṇe bhāvo bhavatīti lokebhidhīyate | tatra ca yadi bhāvaḥ kathambhavatītyucyate | tasmāt sarvatra buddhisthameva bhāvaṃ kṛtvā vidhipratiṣedhavyavahāra iti yatkiñcidetat |

[524,3]

tasmāt sthitametat | tadā sa bhāvo na bhūto yadi svayaṃ na bhavediti |

[524,4]

nanu svayambhāvo na bhavatītyanenāpi vākyena svayamevābhāvo bhāvasya bhavatītyucyate | tadā ca sa eva doṣa ityata āha | "na bhavatīti ce"tyādi | caśabdo yasmā darthe | yasmād bhāvo na bhavatīti ca "prasajyapratiṣedha eṣaḥ | na paryudāsaḥ" | yatraprasaktasya nivṛttimātrameva kriyate na vastvaṃśasya saṃsparśaḥ sa prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ |
yatra tvekaniṣedhenānyavidhānaṃ sa paryudāsaḥ | anyathe"hāpi" prasajyapratiṣedhepi "kasyacidva"stuno "bhāve" | vidhāne sati | na "pratiṣedhaparyudāsayo rūpabhedaḥ" svabhāvabhedaḥ "syāt" |
prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhaśabdenoktaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "ubhayatrāpi" prasajye paryudāse"ca | vidheḥ prādhānyāt" |

[524,5]

yadi ca prasajyapratiṣedhepi vidhistadā pratiṣedha eva nāsti | "evaṃ cāpratiṣedhāt kasyacit paryudāsopi na syāt kvacit" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "yadi hi kiṃcidvas"tu kutaści"nnivartteta | tadā tadvyatireki" | nivarttamānād vastuno vyatireki"saṃspṛśyeta | tatparyudāsena" nivarttyamānaparyudāsena | yathā'brāhmaṇamānayeti brāhmaṇaparyudāsena kṣatriyādeḥ saṃsparśāt | "tacca" kasyacinnivarttanameva "nāsti" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sarvatra" kasyaci"nnivṛttirbhavatītyuktepi" na bhāvavyavacchedaḥ "kasyacit" pratīyate'pi tu nivṛttiśabdenāpi kasyacid "bhāvasyaiva pratīteḥ" | na cānena vādinā bhāvasya nivṛttiṃ bruvāṇenāpi nivṛttirnaivoktā kintva"rthāntarabhāva evoktaḥ syāt" | tathā ca yasya paryudāsena yadviviktamucyate "na tayoḥ parasparavivekaḥ" siddhaḥ | asati ca"viveke na paryudāsaḥ" | tadanyavivekenānyopādanalakṣaṇatvāt paryudāsasya | "tadevaṃ"yathoktena prakāreṇa "vyatirekābhāvādanvayopi na syāt" | anvayaḥ kasyacidarthasyānugamo vidhānantanna syādityarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyā"nvayasyai"kasvabhāvasthitilakṣaṇatvāt | tatsthitiścaika"svabhāvasthitiśca tasmā"danyasya vyatireke" parihāre "sati syāt | sa ca" tadanyavyatireko"nāsti" tvanmatena | iti evaṃ śabdāda"pravṛttinivṛttikaṃ jagat syāt" | śābdasya vidhipratiṣedhavyavahārasyābhāvaḥ syāt | na caivamityavaśyaṃ kasyacid vyavacchedamātraṃ śabdavācyamabhyupagantavyaṃ |

[525,1]

yataścaiva"ntasmād yasya" bhāvasya "nāśo bhavatītyucyate sa svayameva na bhavatītyuktaṃ syāt" | na punarasya dharmāntaraṃ kiñcinnāśo nāma vidhīyate | caitrasya putra ityatra yathā vāstavo bhedastathā bhāvasya nāśa ityatrāpi vyatirekavibhaktestulyatvādityata āha | "netyā"di | "na vai ghoṣa"mātreṇa caitrasya putra ityanena śabdena"sāmyād viṣayāntaradṛṣṭo vidhiḥ" | caitrasya putra ityatra dṛṣṭovidhirvāstavo yaḥ sa"sarvatra" bhāvasya nāśa ityatrāpi "yojanāmarhati" | śabdapravṛttimātreṇa vastuyojanāyā ayogāt |

[525,2]

etadeva "na hī"tyādinā prāha | kasyacit puruṣasya "gardabha iti nāmakaraṇāt " gardabhasya dharmā "manuṣyepi na hi yojyāḥ | tathā na caitrasya putro bhavatītyatra" vākye "dṛṣṭo vidhi"rarthāntarasya putrasya vidhānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti "nāśepi" yojyaḥ |
bhāvasya nāśo bhavatītyatrāpi bhāvād vyatireko nāśo vidheyaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "virodhāt" | nāśasyābhāvarūpatvādabhāvasya bhavanavirodhādityuktaṃ |

[525,3]

yadi nāśo nārthāntaraṃ kasmād bhāvasya nāśo bhavatītyevamabhidhīyata iti |

[525,4]

ata āha | "evaṃ ce"tyādi | bhāvasya nāśa itya"bhidhānepi prayojanamāveditameva" | "arthāntaramiva dharmiṇo dharmaṃ cetasāvibhajya tanmātrajijñāsāyāṃ svabhāva eva tathocyata" ityādinā niveditatvāt ||

[525,5]

tasmādabhāvasyākiṃcittvāt tattvānyattvavikalpo na tulyaḥ | ato "bhāve"vastuno bhavane "eṣa" tattvānyattva"vikalpaḥ syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇam | bhavanasya "vidhervastvanurodhataḥ" |

[526,1]

"nanvatiśayotpattāvapi sa eva tasyātiśaya utpanna iti kathaṃ" naṣṭo nāma | "tena nāyaṃ tadavastho naṣṭo nāma | yena svayaṃ na bhavati | tena naṣṭo nārthāntarotpādādityuktaṃ | na hyatiśayotpattyā svayaṃ na bhūto nāma | abhāvasya sarvātiśayopākhyā nivṛttyā sarvabhāvadharmavivekalakṣaṇatvāt | bhāvasya cotpattisamāveśalakṣaṇatvāt" |

[526,2]

"bhāva" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "bhāvo" bhavanamutpāda iti yāvat | "sovaśyambhavantamapekṣate" | bhavitāramapekṣate | bhavitāramantareṇa bhavanasyābhāvāt | "sa ca" bhāvaḥ"vyāpāre svabhāva eva" vastveva | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "niḥsvabhāvasya kvacid" bhavatītyādike "samāveśābhāvāt" | sambandhābhāvāt | na ca vyāpāro nāmārthāntaraṃ |
kintu "vyāpāra iti" hi "yathābhūtasvabhāvotpatti"rviśiṣṭasvabhāvotpattiḥ | "sā"
cotpatti"rniḥsvabhāvasya" nāśasya "kathaṃ syāt" |

[526,3]

yadi niḥsvabhāvasya nāsti vyāpārasamāveśaḥ "kathamidānīmbhavatyabhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇamityādivyavahāraḥ" śaśaviṣāṇamabhāvo bhavatīti bhavanalakṣaṇena vyāpāreṇa vyavahāra ityarthaḥ | ādiśabdād vandhyāsuto'bhāvo bhavatīti parigrahaḥ |

[526,4]

"net"yādinā pariharati | "na vai śaśaviṣāṇaṃ kiṃci"dabhāvonyadvā "bhavatīti" vidhi"nocyate | api tveva"miti śaśaviṣāṇamabhāvo bhavatītyanena vākyenā"sye"ti śaśaviṣāṇasyābhāvo bhavati | bhāvo "na bhavatīti bhāvapratiṣedha eva kriya"te | "api ca vyavaharttāraḥ" puruṣāḥ | "eta"cchaśaviṣāṇādika"meva"mabhāvo bhavatīti "vyāpāravadiva samāropyādarśayanti | kenacit prakaraṇena" | kiṃ śaśaviṣāṇādikamabhāvo bhavati na bhavatīti prastāvasamāśrayeṇa | "na tu tac"chaśaviṣāṇādikaṃ vyavahāramātreṇa "tathā"
vyāpārayuktambhavati | yasmāt "sarvārthavivecanaṃ" sarvārthasvabhāvaviraha"statra" śaśaviṣāṇādau "tattvaṃ | na" tvasataḥ "kasyacid" bhavanādeḥ "samāveśaḥ" |

[527,1]

sahetukopi vināśa evambhaviṣyatīti cedāha | "ne"tyādi | "evaṃ" śaśaviṣāṇavat sarvārthavirahalakṣaṇo "vināśaḥ" pareṣṭaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "vastuni ta"sya vināśasya "bhāvā"dutpatteḥ | yaśca bhavati sa kathamabhāvo virodhāt |

[527,2]

"yadi" puna"rasāvapi" vināśo niḥsvabhāva eva kevalaṃ"vaktṛbhirevam"bhavatīti vyāpāravāniva "khyāpyate | na tu svayantathā"bhavanadharmā nīrūpatvādasya | "tadai"vamiṣyamāṇe'bhāvo bhavatītyapi bruvāṇena | "na kiñcid bhavatītīṣṭameva" | kriyāpratiṣedhamātratvādasya vākyasya | "tasmāt svaya"manadhyāropitenākāreṇa kvacid vastuni"bhavan svabhāvo vikalpadvayaṃ nātivarttete tattvamanyattvaṃ ceti" prakārāntarābhāvāt 0 || 280

[527,3]

rūpādiskandhasvabhāvaḥ pudgalo na bhavatyatha ca rūpādibhyo nānyaḥ | tasma tattvānyattvamativarttata eva svabhāva iti cet |

[527,4]

tanna | yasmā"datattvamevā"tatsvabhāvatvameva "svabhāvasyānyattvamiti" |

[527,5]

yadi pudgalopi na skandhasvabhāvastadā skandhebhyonya eva | yato "na hi" prasiddhānyattvayo "rūparasayorapyanyadeva parasparamanyattvaṃ" | kintvatatsvabhāvatvamevānyattvantacca pudgalepyastīti sopi skandhebhyonya eveṣṭavyaḥ ||

[527,6]

nanvatatsvabhāvatvepi parasparaṃ "svabhāvāpratibandhonyattvamiti cet" | sa capratibandhaḥ pudgalasya skandheṣvasti tato tatsvabhāvatvepi nānyattvaṃ skandhebhyaḥ pudgalasyeti |

[527,7]

"koyami"tyādinā pratiṣedhati | "koyaṃ pratibandho nāma" pudgalasya skandheṣu "yena"
pratibandhena | "sa ca na syādi"ti skandhasvabhāśca pudgalo na syāt | "nānya"svabhāvaś"ca"
skandhebhyaḥ | anyaḥ svabhāvosyeti vigrahaḥ |

[527,8]

skandhebhyaḥ pudgalasya janma tadeva "janma" pratibandha "iti cet" |

[528,1]

evaṃ sati kāryatvāt skandhebhyaḥ pudgalasya tattvānyattvenāvācyatvamiṣṭaṃ | tathā ca sati "sarvakāraṇānāmparasparamavācyatā syāt | tathā ce"ti kāryatvādavācyatve | "sarvaḥ sarvasya kathaṃci"diti sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa "copayogīti" sarvatra kāryakāraṇabhāvā"nna" ca "kaścit" kutaści"danyaḥ syāt | evaṃ cā"nantaroktenāvācyatālakṣaṇenā"vācyatetyapi" bruvatā "kāryakāraṇabhāva eva śabdāntareṇoktaḥ syānnārthabhedaḥ" kaścit |
anyattvantu na niṣiddhameva | yasmāt "svabhāva"yoḥ parasparama"nanugama"namamiśrībhavana"manyattvambrūmaḥ" | sa ca svabhāvānanugamaḥ "svabhāvavatāṃ" sarvapadārthānā"mastyeve"ti "parasparamanyattvameva" | na cānyaḥ pratibandhaḥ pudgalasya skandheṣu | yasmā"nna" hi "janmalakṣaṇā"jjanmasvabhāvāt "svabhāvapratibandhādanyaḥ pratibandho nāma" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anāyattasya" tadutpattyā tatrāpratibaddhasya | tena saha yo "vyabhicāra"stasy"āvirodhāt |
tato"pratibandhāt pudgalasya skandhebhyonyattvaṃ | "dharmabhedāccā"nyattvaṃ | tathā hyavācyatvaṃ pudgalasya dharmaḥ skandhānāntu parasparamvācyatvamiti dharmabhedaḥ ||

[528,2]

yadyapi na janmakṛtaḥ pratibandhastathāpi pudgalasya skandheṣu jñā"nakṛtaḥ pratibandha iti cet" |

[528,3]

"syādityā"dinaitadeva vyācaṣṭe | yasya rūpādeḥ pratipatti"ryatpratipatti"stayā"nāntarīyaka"mavinābhāvi "yajjñānaṃ" yasya pudgalasya jñānaṃ | "tadgatā"viti rūpādigatau"niyamena" tasya pudgalasya "pratibhāsanāt" | jñānakṛtaḥ pratibandhastathā hi rūpaśabdādigrahaṇenaiva pudlagrahaṇamiṣyate | cakṣurādivijñānavijñeyatvāt pudgalasyeti | tena jñānakṛtāt pratibandhāt | tatpudgalākhyamvastu skandhebhyonyattvenā"vācyamatadrūpamap"yaskandhasvabhāvamapi |

[528,4]

"ne"tyādinā pratiṣedhati | "na" pudgalasya rūpādipratipattināntarīyakaṃ jñānaṃ | kiṃkāraṇaṃ | "tasya" pudgalasya rūpādisvabhāvamapahāya "niḥsvabhāvatvāt svayaṃ" | yasmāt"sa eva hi tasya svabhāvo yo" rūpādirūpaḥ "pratibhāti" |

[529,1]

athārūpādisvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ | tadā'rūpādi"svabhāvatve'sya" pudgalasyā"tadvad"rūpādivat pṛthak"pratibhāvaprasaṅgāt" | na ca pratibhāsate tato nāstyeva pudgalaḥ |
yato "dṛśyasyāpratibhāsamānasya cābhāvāt" | athādṛśyaḥ pudgala iṣyate | tadā"adṛśyatvepi" pudgalasyeṣyamāṇe "na tadrūpaṃ" jñānanna pudgalākāraṃ "jñānamiti kasya kimāyattā pratītiḥ" | na rūpādijñānanāntarīyakaṃ pudgalajñānamityarthaḥ | tathā ca na jñānakṛtaḥ pratibandha iti bhāvaḥ |

[529,2]

rūpādyāyattapratītitvādeva pṛthak pudgalo na pratibhāsata iti ced |

[529,3]

āha | "na ce"tyādi | "yad" vastu "yadāyattapratītikaṃ" yatpratibaddhopalambhana"ntasya svabhāvapratibhāsa eva" na ca "naśyatīti" sambandhaḥ | "kimive"tyāha | "prakāśe"tyādi |
yathā "nīlādīnāmā"lokapratibaddhajñānānāmāloke pratibhāsamānepi svapratibhāso na naśyati | ālokavyatirekeṇa teṣāṃ pratibhāsanāt | tadvat pudgalasyāpi syāt ||

[529,4]

api ca "kā vā tasya" pudgalasya "pratyāsa"ttiḥ sambandha"statra" skandhe | "ya"diti yena pratyāsattikāraṇena "tasmiṃ"skandhe'"nātmarūpe"'pudgalasvabhāve pratibhāsamāne "sva"ya"mpratyupatiṣṭhate" | ātmānaṃ grāhayatīti yāvat |

[529,5]

"atiprasaṃgo hyevaṃ syāt" | apratibaddhe pratibhāsamāne yadi niyamena pudgalaḥ pratibhāseta | tadā yasya kasyacitpratibhāsanenyopyatyantāsambandhaḥ pratīyata ityarthaḥ | "pratīyamānasya" pudgalasya "tadupādānatā"rūpādyupādānatāpratyāsatti"riti"
cet | "koyamupādānārthaḥ | na" tāvat pudgalasya rūpādīnāñca yathākramaṅ"kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ" | tasyānabhyupagamāt | kāryakāraṇabhāvā"bhyupagame vā na" rūpādidarśane niyamena pudgalasya darśanaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | yato"na kāryakāraṇe | anyonyapratītipratyupasthāpane" | yathā kāryāt kāraṇapratītistathā na kāraṇāt kāryapratītirbhavatītyarthaḥ || na pudgalasya rūpādināntarīyakatā kintu pudgalasya yā pratītistasyāḥ | "tannāntarīyakatā" rūpādināntarīyakatā |

[530,1]

saiva "pratyāsattiriti cet" |

[530,2]

"nanu saiva" pratītestannāntarīyakatā | rūpādiṣu pudgalasy"āsati pratibandhe na yuktetyucyate" |

[530,3]

akāryakāraṇayorapi pudgalarūpādyoḥ pratibandho bhaviṣyatīti |

[530,4]

ata āha | "akāryakāraṇayorna kaścid" vāstavaḥ "pratibandha it"yasakṛ"duktaṃ yatpratipattināntarīyakaṃ yajjñānamityapi" yaducyate | "tajjñāne" rūpādiviveke | pudgalajñāne"sati syāt" | tacca nāsti | yato "yaḥ" pudgale "vijñāne" svarūpeṇa na prati"bhāsate"nyāsaṃsargeṇetyarthaḥ | "tasya kiñcijjñānaṃ na hī"ti sambandhaḥ | "tadabhāvād" yathoktajñānābhāvā"dartharūpasya" pudgalākhyasyā"vācyatālakṣaṇaṃ na sidhyati" |

[530,5]

"tadi"ti tasmād "vastutaḥ" paramārthataḥ kvacid "bhavatā" kenacidarthena tatra "tattvānyatvabhājā bhavitavyaṃ" | vastuno gatyantarābhāvāt | "yasya tu" kṣaṇikavādino "vinaśyato bhāvasya na kiñcid bhavati" kevalaṃ sa bhāvaḥ svayameva na bhavatīti mataṃ | "tenābhāvo bhavatītyapi" bruvatā "na bhāvo bhavatī"ti pratiṣedhamātrame"voktaṃ" na kasyacid vidhānaṃ |
tato nābhāvaṃprati kṣaṇikavādinastattvānyatvavikalpasyāvatārostīti manyate |

[530,6]

"yadapī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yadapyayaṃ" kṣaṇikavādī "bhāvasyābhāvo bhavatīti"
vidhisaṃsparśineva śabde"nāha | tadapi bhāvo na bhavatītyevoktaṃ bhavati | evaṃ hi sa"
bhāvo "nivartito bhavati" yadi kiñcinna vidhīyate | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "pratiṣedhe"
bhāvamātravyavacchede "vidherasambhavāt" |

[530,7]

yataśca vinaśyato bhāvasya na kaścid vastudharmo bhavati | "tata evāsya" bhāvasya"vināśe na kaściddhetuḥ | tathā hi" vinaśyatā bhāvenā"pekṣeta paro" vināśahetuḥ | "yadi"tena bhāvasya "kāryaṃ" karttavya"mvidyeta kiñcana" | na tu kiñcit kāryamasti |
tasmāda"kiñcitkara"mvināśakāraṇaṃ | "yaccākiñcitkaramvastu | tatkiṃ kenacidapekṣyate" | naivāpekṣyate |

[531,1]

"satī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "sati hi" karttavye "kārakambha"vati | "na ca naśyato bhāvasya kiṃcit kāryamityuktaṃ | tasmād yo nāma" kaści"nnāśahetuḥ sa bhāve na kiñcit karotītyakiñcitkaro nāpekṣaṇīyo" vināśahetuḥ ||

[531,2]

"tatkatha"mityādi paraḥ | yadi vinaśyato nātiśayaḥ kaścidutpadyate | "katha"midānīmanutpannātiśayaḥ | "anutpannotiśayos"yeti vigrahaḥ | "tadavastha eva" pūrvarūpāvastha eva "bhāvo" vi"naṣṭo nāma" |

[531,3]

"nanvi"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | vināśahetoḥ sakāśād bhāvasyā"tiśayotpattāvapya"ṅgīkriyamāṇāyāṃ "sa eva tasyātiśayo" nāśākhyaḥ | "utpanna iti" sa bhāvaḥ"kathaṃ naṣṭo nāma" | na hyanyabhāvenyasya nāśaḥ | yata eva"ntena" kāraṇe"nāya"mbhāvas"tadavastho na naṣṭo nāma" | kintu "yena" yasmāt "svayaṃ na bhavati tena naṣṭo nārthānta"rasya nāśākhyasyo"tpādāditya"nantarame"voktaṃ" | yato "na hi" nāśākhyasyā"tiśa"yasyo"tpattyā"
bhāvaḥ "svayaṃ na bhūto nāma" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "abhāvasya sarve yetiśayāḥ" |
sāmarthyalakṣaṇāḥ | yāś"copākhyāḥ" vyapadeśāsteṣāṃ "nivṛttyā" | sarvasāmarthyavyapadeśanivṛttyetyarthaḥ | "sarva"sya "bhāvadharma"sya bhavanarūpasya dharmasya yo "viveko" virahasta"llakṣaṇatvāt | bhāva"sya "cotpattisamāveśalakṣaṇatvāt" | yasmād bhavatīti bhāva ucyate |
tenotpattiyogī bhāvaḥ | yataścaiva"ntasmānnābhāve" bhāvasya vināśe "kasyacidanyasya bhāvo" bhavanantasyo"pakṣepaḥ" | na kasyacid bhavanamityarthaḥ |

[532,1]

"etene"ti svabhāvapratipādanena | ahetu"katvepi" nāśasyāṅgīkriyamāṇe sa nāśaḥ prathamama"bhūtvā" bhavatītyevamabhūtvā "nā"śasya "bhāvataḥ" kāraṇāt tasya nāśasyāṃkurādivat sattā syāt | nāśitvaṃ ceti | "sattānāśitvadoṣasya" yat "prasañja"nantat"pratyākhyātamete"naiva |

[532,2]

"yopī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "ahetukepi nāśe"'sya nāśa"syābhūtvā bhāvāt sattā'nityatvaṃ ca durnivāraṃ | abhūtvā bhavannahetuko bhavatītyapi viruddhaṃ" kādācitkasyāhetutvavirodhāt | "sopi" doṣopanyāso"'nenaiva" vināśasya nīrūpatvapratipādanena"pratyākhyātaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | vināśakāle "kasyacid" dharmasya "bhāvānabhyupagamāt" ||

[532,3]

"yathā" tulye vastutve "keṣāṃcideva janminā"mutpattimatāṃ "pratigho" nāma svadeśe parasyotpattivivandhalakṣaṇa "iṣṭo" na sarveṣāṃ | "tathā bhāvānāmutpattimatā"meva "nāśasvabhāvo" bhavatu | na tvanutpattimatāmākāśādīnāṃ | tathā ca "yat sattatkṣaṇika"mityetad vyabhicārīti |

[532,4]

"athe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "bhavatu nāma | svabhāva eṣa bhāvā"nāṃ | kosau svabhāva ityāha | "ya ime kṣaṇasthitidharmāṇaḥ" | kṣaṇasthitirdharmo yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | "sa tu" kṣaṇasthitidharmasvabhāva "utpattimatāmeva" bhāvānām"bhaviṣyati" | na tvanutpattimatāmākāśādīnāṃ |

[532,5]

yasmānna "hi svabhāva it"yeva kṛtvā "sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvo bhavati | pratighātmatāvat" | yathā pratighātmatā vastusvabhāvatvepi na sarvasya bhavati tadvadityarthaḥ |

[532,6]

"sattya"mityā cā ryaḥ | sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvo na bhavatīti sattyametat | "tathāpyayaṃ"
sapratighasya janako'yaṃ neti "svabhāvaniyamāddhetoḥ svabhāvaniyamaḥ phale"'yaṃ pratigho'yaṃ neti | "nānitye" tu nānityatvaviṣaye kṛtakānāṃ "rūpabhedosti" yena kasyacinnaśvaraḥ svabhāvaḥ syānnānyasya | kiṃ kāraṇam | anityasvabhāvasya "bhedakānāṃ"
hetūnāma"bhāvataḥ" | sarveṣāmvinaśvarasvabhāvasya jananāditiyāvat |

[533,1]

nanu nāśasvabhāvo bhāvānānnānutpattimatāṃ yadīti codyaṃ prakṛtaṃ | na ca tatrānitye rūpabhedosti bhedakānāmabhāvata ityayamparihāro yuktaḥ | na hyākāśādīnāṃ svahetukṛto vinaśvarasvabhāvonutpattimattvāt | tatkathaṃ sattyamityādyuktamiti |

[533,2]

evammanyate | yathā sattvaṃ vyabhicāryuktantathā kṛtakopi kaścinnaśvaraḥ kaścinnetyāśaṃkate | tenādāveva kṛtakatvasya vyabhicārantāvat pariharttuṃ sattyamityādyuktamityadoṣaḥ |

[533,3]

"netyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "anya" iti sanidarśanādikaḥ | "akasmā"diti hetumantareṇa"niyamavān" | kvacit syāt kvacinneti | "yādṛśī tu" pratiniyataviṣayā |
pratighādidharmmajanakasya "hetoḥ śaktisthitiḥ" | śaktiniyamas"tādṛśaṃ" hetuśaktyanurūpaṃ "phalambhavatīti" kṛtvā "hetusvabhāvaniyamāt phalasvabhāvaniyama" iṣṭaḥ | "ākasmilatve" tu nirhetukat"vesya" phalasvabhāvaniyamasyokto "doṣaḥ" | deśakālaprakṛtinivamo na yujyata iti | tasmāt "pratighātātma"tāyā hetustasya "svabhāva"stasya "pratiniyamavat" | na "naśvarajananapratiniyatasvabhāvaṃ" hetubhūtambhāvasya "paśyāmaḥ" |
kaścideva naśnaraṃ janayenna sarvamityevaṃ naśvarajanane pratiniyataḥ svabhāvo yasya bhāvasyeti vigrahaḥ | "yena" hetupratiniyamena | "tajjanmā" vinaśvarajananāddhetorjanma yasya sa tathā syānnaśvaraḥ syā"nnānyo" yastadvilakṣaṇahetujanmeti | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sarvākārajanmanāṃ nāśadarśanāt" | sarvākārebhyo hetubhyo janma yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ ||

[533,4]

"nan"vityādi paraḥ | "sarvākārebhyo" hetubhyo "janma" yeṣāmbhāvānānte "naśyantītīdamapyaniśceyameva" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tāsāṃ" hetusāmagrīṇāmarvāgdarśanai"raniḥśeṣadarśanāt" sākalyenādarśanāt | kasyāścit sāmagryā naśvarajanikāyā darśanādadṛṣṭā api tajjātīyatayā tathābhūtā niścīyanta iti ced |

[534,1]

āha "vicitre"tyādi | "vicitrā śakti"ryāsāmiti vigrahaḥ | "sāmagryo dṛśyante |
tatra" vicitraśaktiṣu sāmagrīṣu madhye "kācit" sāmagrī "syādapi yā" bhāva"manaśvarātmānaṃ janayet" |

[534,2]

"ne"tyādinā pariharati | ayaṃ ca parihāro nāśasvabhāvo bhāvānāṃ nānutpattimatāṃ | yadītyatrāpi codye draṣṭavyaḥ sādhāraṇatvāt | nāyandoṣaḥ | kasmāt | "jñeyādhikārāt" |

[534,3]

etadeva spaṣṭayannāha | ye "kadācit" kāle "kvacid" deśe "kenacit" puruṣeṇārthā"jñātāḥ santaḥ" punarna "jñāyante teṣāṃ santānānubandhī nāśa iti brūmaḥ" | ye cājñātāḥ santo jñāyante jñātā vā punarna jñāyante | "ta eva kṛtakā anityāssādhyante" | anena ca kṛtakatvasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiḥ sattvādityanena niścīyata ityuktambhavati |

[534,4]

nanu ca yadyapi te jñātāssanto na jñāyante tathāpi kathanteṣāmanityatvamiti |

[534,5]

ata āha | yasmānna "hyasti sambhavo yat te jñānajananasvabhāvāḥ" pūrva"mpunaranaṣṭā"stasminneva svabhāve sthitā "na janayeyuḥ" |

[534,6]

sahakāryabhāvānna janayantīti ced |

[534,7]

āha | "apekṣerannāparaṃ" | na hyasya sambhavostīti sambandhaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tajjananasvabhāvasya niṣpanna"tvāt |

[534,8]

atha syāt | teṣvanapekṣeṣvapi kasyacit kadācijjñānambhaviṣyatīti |

[534,9]

ata āha | "na ca teṣu" naiva teṣu jñānajananasvabhāveṣu vyavasthiteṣu sahakāryanapekṣeṣu "kasyacit" puṃsaḥ | "kadācit" kāle kiṃcij"jñānaṃ nivartteta | sarvasya" sarvadā svaviṣayāṇi jñānāni janayeyuḥ | na caivaṃ | kadācit jñānadarśanāt | tataśca jñānamajanayanto janakasvabhāvāt pracyutā iti gamyate |

[534,10]

yattarhyajñeyaṃ kṛtakamakṛtakamvā tannaivambhaviṣyatīti |

[534,11]
