ata āha | "rne"tyādi | na caivaṃbhūtamajñeyaṃ kiṃcidasti | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sarvasyārthasya kenacitpu"ruṣeṇa "kadāciñjñānāt" | atha tajjñānamapi na janayet | tadā"jñānamātrārthakriyāyāmapyasāmarthye" tatsāmarthyarahitam"vastveva na syāt | tathā hi "marthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇam"vastviti vakṣyāmaḥ | tasya cārtha"kriyāsamarthasya vastunaḥ krameṇārthakriyāṃ kurvato "vināśāvyabhicārā"dahetutvācca vināśasya "sattānubandhī" vināśaḥ siddhaḥ || ata evānantaroktāt sarvabhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvasādhanācchabdārthayossambandhasyāpi niṃtyatā pratyākhyeyā | dūṣyā |

[535,1]

netyādinā vyācaṣṭe | ata eva yathoktād vināśasya vastumātrānu bandhāt | śabdavad | yathā śabdasya nityatā pratikṣiptā tadvat sambandhasyāpi nityatā pratyākhyeyā |

[535,2]

evantāvat sambandhaṃ vyatiriktamabhyupagamya doṣa ukto'dhunā'vyatirikta eva sambandho na yujyata iti |

[535,3]

āha | yā ca śabdaśaktiryogyatākhyā yogyatāsaṃjñitārthapratipattyāśrayo jai mi nī yai rva rṇṇyate | sā yogyatāśabdārthāntarameva na bhavati | tathā hi bhāvānāṃsvabhāvātiśaya eva vivakṣitārthakriyāsamartho yogyatetyāveditaṃ prāk | "samarthaṃ hi rūpaṃ śabdasya yogyate" tyādinā |

[535,4]

tena śabdasyānityatve yogyatāyā apyanityatvamavyatirekāditi bhāvaḥ |

[536,1]

"astu vā" śabdā"darthāntaraṃ" yogyatā | "tathāpi śabdaśaktiśca dūṣitā" veditavyā |
kaiḥ | "sambandhadoṣaiḥ prāguktaiḥ" |

[536,2]

"ukto hītyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "sambandhaḥ" sambandhibhyo"rthāntara"mityeva"mvāde'nekaprakāro doṣa uktaḥ" |

[536,3]

"sambandhināmanityatvānna sambandhesti nityatā" ityādinā | tenaiva prāguktena doṣeṇa śabdaśaktirapi sambandharūpeṇa kalpitā dūṣiteti kṛtvā "na punaḥ"
pṛtha"gucyate" doṣaḥ |

[536,4]

tadevaṃ nā"pauruṣeyo" vedaḥ |

[536,5]

bhavatu nāmāpauruṣeyastathāpi na tasya satyārthatā niścetuṃ śakyā | yasmā"dapauruṣeyamityeva" kṛtvā "na" vaidikamvacanaṃ "yathārthajñānasādhanaṃ" | aviparītārthajñānahetuḥ |
yasmāt "puruṣāgasā" puruṣadoṣeṇā"duṣṭo vahnyā"dinā | ādiśabdājjyotsnādiḥ | "anyathāpi dṛṣṭo" vitathajñānaheturdṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ |

[536,6]

"bhavatvi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "bhavantu nāmāpauruṣeyā vaidikāḥ śabdāstathāpi sambhāvyamevaiṣāṃ" vaidikānāṃ śabdānā"mayathārthajñānahetutvaṃ" | yato "na hi puruṣadoṣopadhānādeva" | puruṣadoṣe rāgādibhirupadhānāt | saṃskārādeva | "artheṣu" jñāpyeṣu jñāpakānāṃ śabdānāṃ "jñānavibhramo" jñānaviparyāsaḥ | prakṛtyāpi mithyājñānajananasya sambhāvyatvāt | yasmāt "tadrahitānāmapi" puruṣadoṣopadhānarahitānāmapi "pradīpādīnāmvitathārthajñānajannāt" | ādiśabdājjyotsnādīnāṃ | kutra | "nīlotpalādiṣu" | tathā hi rātrau pradīpo nīlotpale raktapratibhāsajñānahetuḥ | jyotsnā pīte vastre śuklajñānahetuḥ | "tadi"ti tasmā"dime" vaidikāḥ "śabdāḥ" puruṣa"saṃskāranirapekṣāḥ" syuriti sambandhaḥ "prakṛtyā" ca svabhāvena "cārtheṣu pratītihetavo" jñānahetavaḥ syuḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "svabhāvaviśeṣāt" svarūpaviśeṣāt | kimiva | "vahnyādivat | " syu"rniyame"na | vitathā vyaktayorthapratipattayo yebhyaḥ śabdebhya iti vigrahaḥ | vitathavyaktaya eva sadā vaidikāḥ śabdā ityasya niyamasya kāraṇaṃ nāsti | tato "niyamakāraṇābhāvād" vitathavyaktaya eva vaidikāḥ śabdā ityetat kalpana"mayuktamiti cet" | tavāpi mī māṃ sa ka syāvitathajñānahetavo vaidikāḥ śabdā ityasmi"nnavitathavyaktiniyame kiṃ kāraṇaṃ" | naiva kiñcit | "tasmāt" tvanmatena"yathārthavyaktiniyamatvāt prakṛtyā" svabhāvenā"yathārthavyaktiniyamaḥ kinna kalpyate" |

[537,1]

"athavā" yathā vahnyādayo ghaṭādiṣu nīlotpalādiṣu "cārtheṣu" yathāyogaṃ satyāsatyajñānahetavastathā vaidikānāṃ śabdānā"martheṣu" mithyetarajñānahetutveno"bhayajñānahetutvaṃ syāt" | yasmā"nna hyapauruṣeyā api vahnyādayo" vanadavacandrālokādirūpāḥ | "ekatra"
ghaṭādau divā "yathārthajñānahetavopi" santaḥ "sarvatra" nīlotpalādāvapi rātrau | "tathā bhavanti" yathārthajñānahetavo bhavanti | "tathā" vaidikānāṃ "śabdānāmapyapauruṣeyatvepyubhayaṃ syāt" | yathārthāyathārthajñānahetutvaṃ syāt |

[537,2]

"bhavatvi"tyādi paraḥ | "vahnyādīnāṃ kṛtakatvāt" kāraṇād "yathāpratyayaṃ" yasya yadbhrāntikāraṇaṃ | tadvaśā"danyatra" nīlotpalādau | "anyathātvaṃ" vitathajñānahetutvaṃ"na punarnityeṣu śabdeṣvetat" sahakāripratyayabalena mithyājñānahetutva"masti" | nityānāṃ sahakāribalenānyathā pravṛttyasambhavāt |

[537,3]

"nanvi"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | "evaṃvidha" iti sahakāribalenārtheṣyanyathā parivṛttilakṣaṇost"yeva dharmmaḥ" | "tatrāpīti" vaidikeṣvapi śabdeṣu | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "teṣāmapi" vaidikānāṃ "saṃketabalādanyathāvṛtteḥ" puruṣecchānuvidhāyisaṃketabalenānyathā pratītijananādityarthaḥ |

[537,4]

atha saṃketabalānna teṣāmartheṣu parāvṛttiriṣyate | kintu nityatvāt svabhāvata eva svaviṣayajñānajananasvabhāvā vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ | tadā "kārya"sya svaviṣayajñānasyayo "jananasvabhā"vastatra "sthitau caiṣāṃ" vaidikānāṃ śabdānāṃ "samayādeḥ" | ādiśabdādanyasyāpi karaṇavyāpārāderapekṣaṇīyasyā"bhāvāt" kāraṇāt | "tato" vaidikācchabdāt"pratīti"rjñāna"martheṣu sarvasya" puṃsaḥ "sarvadā syāt | na cāsti" sarvasya sarvadārthapratītiḥ | "tasmānna" vaidikāḥ "śabdā" arthapratītipratiṣṭhitas"vabhā"vāḥ kintu samayādikamapekṣyanta eveti | tepi mithyājñānasya hetava iti tadavastho doṣaḥ |

[538,1]

"api ca | tasmin" śabde"'kṛtake mate" iṣṭe sati "na jñānahetutaiva syāt" |
yasmānna hi "nityebhyo vastusāmarthyāt" svarūpopadhānasāmarthyena "janmāsti kasya"cit | jñānasyānyasya vā |

[538,2]

"yadyakṛtakaṃ" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yadyakṛtakaśśabdo" vaidikastato"rtheṣu pratītireva na syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "pratītītyā"di | itaradajanmājanma ca itaracceti vigrahaḥ | tayoḥ kālo "pratīterjanmetarakālayostulyarūpasya" nityatvādekarūpasya "pratī" | pratīterajanmakāle yattasya janakaṃ rūpantasminneva svabhāve sthitasya janakatvavirodhāt | kiṃ kāraṇam | "evama"nena rūpe"ṇāyaṃ" nityābhimato "janako naiva"manena rūpeṇājanaka "itye"vaṃ "vivecanīyasya" pṛthag vyavasthāpyasya "rūpabhedasya" svabhāvabhedasyā"bhāvāt" | nityasya sarvadaikarūpatvāt |

[538,3]

ekasvabhāvopi pūrvamajanakaḥ paścājjanako bhaviṣyatīti ced |

[538,4]

āha "ne"tyādi | "asya" nityasyā"jana"ko "yādṛśaḥ" svabhāvas"tādṛśa eva janakona yuktaḥ" | ekarūpatvāt | sahakāriṇamadhikaṃ prāpya paścājjanayatītyādi mithyā |
yato"nyāpekṣāpi" sahakāryapekṣāpi nityasya "niṣiddhaiva" prāk |

[538,5]

yata eva"ntasmānnityānāṃ" śabdānāṃ "kvaci"dartheṣu puruṣe "jñānajananasāmarthyaṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "kadāci"jjñānas"yājanane" sati paścādapi tatsvabhāvatvā"nnityamajananaprasaṅgāt" |

[538,6]

atha mābhūdeṣa doṣa iti nityaṃ svakāryaṃ kurvantyevetīṣyate |

[539,1]

tadapi nāsti | svaviṣayajñāna"kārya"sya "sātatyādarśanācca | na te" śabdāḥ kathaṃcit kenacit prakāreṇa "karttāra it"yetacco"ktaṃ prāk" |

[539,2]

syādetat | nityebhyopyākāśādibhyo buddhayo bhavantyeva kasyacit kadāciditi |

[539,3]

ata āha | "yā apyetā nityābhimateṣvākāśādiṣu pratipattayo" buddhayo bhaviṣyantītīṣyate | "tā apina tatsvabhāvabhāvinyo" nākāśādisvabhāvāyattajanmānaḥ |
nityānāṃ kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt |

[539,4]

kimpunarutpattau tāsāṃ nimittamiti |

[539,5]

āha | "na hī"tyādi | anādiḥ samānajātīyo yo "vikalpa"stenāhitā "yā vāsanā" śaktistata "udbhūtā" utpannā | yathāgamaṃ "samāropito" ya ākāśādyākārastad"goca"rāstatpratibhāsinya eva "kevalaṃ" gatāḥ | tatra bāhyatvena kalpiteṣvākāśādiṣu"jāyante | na" tu tā "buddhayorthagocarā" nākāśādisvalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ |

[539,6]

"svalakṣaṇe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "svalakṣaṇaviṣayā hi buddhirniyamena ta"sya svalakṣaṇasya "yogyatā" sāmarthyantasyo"pasthānaṃ" sannidhānanta"danuvidhāyinī" tadbhāva eva bhāvi"nīti" kṛtvā | "asyā" buddheryat kāraṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ yogyaṃ samarthan"tasmin kāraṇe" yogye "sati"
sā buddhirbha"vatye"va | "tade"vaṃ nyāye sthite "yadi nityānāṃ padārthānāṃ svalakṣaṇe kasyacit"
puṃso "jñānaṃ syāt" | tadā nityaṃ kāraṇasya saṃnnidhāt "sarvasya" puṃsaḥ "sarvadā syāt" |

[539,7]

nāpi sahakāryapekṣayā nityānāṃ kasyacit kadācijjñānajananantathā hi "kāryo"
janyaḥ sahakāribhi"rviśeṣo" yāsāṃ vyaktīnāntā "hi vyaktayaḥ kathaṃcidde"śakālāvasthāniyamena "kvacit" kārye "upayujyamānā" hetutvaṃ pratipadyamānāstasya kāryasyo"pajanane"gyo yotiśaya ātmabhūtastasya "pralambhe hetumvastuviśeṣaṃ" sahakāriṇamiti yāvat |

[540,1]

"tathe"tyanityatvavat | ni"tyo bhāvo kāryaviśeṣo"nādheyātiśayaḥ "kenacit" puṃsā"gṛhyamāṇastatkāraṇāpekṣaḥ" grahaṇasahakārikāraṇāpekṣo "yadi grahaṇamasya" puṃso "janayet" | "yuktaṃ yattenaiva" puṃsā "gṛhyeta" nānyena sahakāripratiniyamāt | "tacca" sahakāryapekṣayā jananaṃ nityasya "na sambha"vati | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sthitasvabhāvatvād" | nityasya sahakāriṇā nādheyātiśayatvāditi yāvat |

[540,2]

tataśca nityaṃ jananasvabhāve sthitatvāt "sarveṇa" puṃsā "samame"kakālaṃ "gṛhye"tātha sarveṇājanakatvānna gṛhyeta | tadā sa evāsya svabhāva iti "na vā kenacit" puruṣeṇa kadācid gṛhyeta | "iti" hetos"san" vidyamāno nityo bhāvo yadi "kenacit" yogināpi "dṛṣṭa"stadā "na kaścinnityo'tīndriyaḥ syā"tsarveṣāmavaśyaṃ kenacid darśanāt |
tathā cāsau nityaṃ sarvapuruṣāṇāmindriyagrāhya eva syāt sarvapuruṣamprati jñānajananasāmarthyāviśeṣāt | "na cedaṃ" sarvapuruṣagrāhyatvannityasyā"sti | tasmādarthasāmarthyānapekṣā" ākāśādisvalakṣaṇasāmarthyānapekṣakāḥ "samāropitagocarāḥ" | yathāgamamadhyāropitā'kāśādyākārapratibhāsinya ityarthaḥ | "āntaramevopādāna"kāraṇamā"śritya"
kīdṛśaṃ "vikalpavāsanāprabodhaṃ" | ākāśādivikalpanānāditā | yā āhitā vāsanā tasyāḥ prabodhaḥ kāryotpādanaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ | yata evārthasāmarthyānapekṣā ata eva"bāhyārthaśūnyā bhrāntaya evākāśādiṣu sarvasya" puṃso "bhavanti" |

[540,3]

sthitametat | nāsti nityebhyaḥ kāryotpāda iti | śabdāttu dṛśyate kadācijjñānakārya"ntasmānnāparāvṛttidharmāṇaḥ śabdāḥ" | ekarūpatāyāṃ aparāvṛttireva dharmo yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | kintu jñānaṃ jñānaṃ pratyarthā bhinnavṛttaya eva |

[540,4]

atha nityamekarūpā eva tadā "tattve vā" | eka rūpatve vā'bhyupagamyamāne'vitathārthapratītaya eva vaidikāḥ śabdā iti "kuta etat | avitathā arthapratī"tiryebhya"iti vigrahaḥ" |

[541,1]

syānmatam | "agnirhimasya bheṣaja"mityādivaidikavākyasyāvitathatvāt sarvasyāvitathatvamiti |

[541,2]

ata āha | "na hī"tyādi | "na hyagnirhimasya bheṣajaṃ" pratipakṣa "i"tyevamā"diṣu"
vedavākyeṣvagneḥ "śītapratighātasāmarthya"mvedavākyāt | prāgapi yathāsaṃketaṃ "lokaprasiddhaṃ khyāpyata iti" kṛtvā "sarva"madṛṣṭārthamapi vedavākya"ntathā bhavati" | avitathambhavati | lokaprasiddhe hyarthe lokasya saṃketānusāreṇa vyavahāro dṛṣṭaḥ | tato"lokasya svecchākṛto" yaḥ "saṃketa"ste"nānu" paścād vyavahārakāle "vyavahārāt" | sandeha eva ki"mayaṃ lokaḥ svasaṃketamanuvidadhat" | anusaran |

[541,3]

agnirhimasya bheṣajamityādivākyā"devampratye"tyagneḥ śītāpanodasāmarthyamiti niścinotyā"hosvicchabdasvabhāvasthiteḥ" śabdasya svabhāvena prakṛtyā sāmarthyaniyamādevaṃ pratyet"īti" | yadā ca dṛṣṭa evārthe vaidikasya śabdasya svatorthapratipādanaśaktissandigdhā tadātyantaparokṣepyarthe nitarāṃ sambhāvyata iti bhāvaḥ |

[541,4]

nanvanādilokaprasiddhyanuvidhānenaiva vaidikānāṃ śabdānāmarthavattā na ca tatra sandehaḥ pratibhāsata iti |

[541,5]

iti heto"rlokaprasiddhyānuvidhāne"pyaṅgīkriyamāṇe "sambhavatyevaiṣāṃ" vaidikānāṃ śabdānāma"nyathābhāvo" mithyātvaṃ | prasiddherevāniyatatvāt |

akṛtakatvādeva satyārthatvamiti ced |

[542,1]

āha | "akṛtakasvabhāvatvehyeṣāṃ" vaidikānāṃ śabdānāṃ "mithyārthaniyato"pi "kaściccha"bdaḥ syāt | itihetoḥ svabhāvaparijñānādayaṃ satyārthoyaṃ mithyārtha ityevaṃ vivekena śabda"svabhāvāniścayāt sarvatra" śabde "saṃśayaḥ syāt" | satyārthamvaidikamvākyamakṛtakatvāditi prayoge kriyamāṇenvayābhāvāt |

[542,2]

vyatirekiprayogamāha | "mithyātva"mityādinā | "mithyātvaṃ kṛtakeṣveva dṛṣṭamiti"
hetora"kṛtakamvacaḥ satyārthaṃ yadī"ti sambandhaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "vyatirekesya virodhivyāpanāt" | akṛtakasya hetoryo vyatirekaḥ kṛtakatvantena satyārthatvaṃ yatsādhyantasya virodhimithyātvantasya vyāpanāt | vyatirekasyeti karttari ṣaṣṭhī |
hetuvyatirekeṇa kṛtakatvena satyārthavirodhino mithyārthatvasya vyāptatvāt | vaidike śabde'kṛtakatvāt kṛtakatvanivṛttau mithyārthatvanivṛtteḥ satyārthatvaṃ sidhyatyeva |

[542,3]

"yathe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "ya"tkiñci"nmithyārthamvacaḥ tadakhilanniḥ"śeṣaṃ "kṛtakamiti" kṛtvā | "heto"rakṛtakatvasya "vyatirekeṇa" kṛtakatvena "sādhyavyatirekasya" |
sādhyaṃ satyārthatvaṃ tasya vyatireko mithyātvantasya "vyāpteranyatr"ākṛtake mithyārthatvasyā"sambhavāt" kāraṇā"dakṛtakaṃ satyārthamiti syād vināpyanvayena" | satyārthamvaidikamvaco kṛtakatvādityatra prayoge yadyapyanvayo nāsti | tathāpyanvayena vinā sidhyatyevetyarthaḥ | yasmād "yo hya"rtho mithyātvalakṣaṇo "yena" kṛtakatvenā"vyāptastatra"
mithyātve "tadvyatire"kastasyāvyāpakasya kṛtakatvasya vyatireko kṛtakatvalakṣaṇo dharma "āśaṃkye"tāyamapi mithyātve bhavediti | tacceha nāsti kṛtakatvena mithyārthatāyā vyāpteḥ | "na ca" viruddhena vyāpte viruddhasya sambhavo yato na ca "viruddhayoḥ" kṛtakatvākṛtakatvayo"rekatra" mithyātve "sambhavosti" | tenākṛtake satyārthatvaṃ "vijātīyasya" mithyārthatvasyā"sambhave" | satyārthamithyārthatvābhyāṃ nānyā gatirastīta "gatyantarābhāvāda"kṛtakatvena satyārtha eva bhavitavyamityakṛtakatvā"diṣṭā"sya satyārthatvalakṣaṇasya "siddheḥ" kimanvayena | "tatsādhanatvācca liṅgasya" iṣṭārthasādhanatvācca liṅgasya "vyarthamanvayadarśanaṃ" | kasmād | yathoktavidhinā "vyatirekamātreṇaiva" sādhya"siddheriti" |

[543,1]

"sattyameta"dityā cā ryaḥ | vipakṣāddhetorvyatireke siddhe sati sādhyaṃ sidhyediti"sa"ttyametat | "yadi" sattyārthatā'kṛtakatva"vipakṣayo"rmithyātvakṛtakatvayo"rvyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ sidhyet" | tadā kṛtakatvena vyāptānmithyārthatvādakṛtakannivarttate | "sa tu"
vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo vipakṣayorna "siddhaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yasmāt" mithyātve'kṛtakatvasyā"sambhave"'sambhavanimittaṃ bādhake "hetāvanukte" sati | "bhāva"ssattva"ntasyāpya"kṛtakatvasya mithyātve "śakyate" | akṛtakaṃ ca syānmithyārthaṃ ceti | 290

[543,2]

nanu ca mithyātve kṛtakatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ | yatra ca kṛtakatvantatra kathamakṛtakatvamiti |

[543,3]

ata āha | "viruddhānā"mityādi | "viruddhānāmapi padārthānā"mekav"yāpakadarśanāt" |

[543,4]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yadya"kṛtakatvākhyasya "hetossādhyavipakṣe" mithyārthatve"'bhāvaḥ sidhye"ttadā "sādhyasya" satyārthatvasya "vyati"rekaṃ mithyātvaṃ | "hetuvyatirekaḥ"

[543,5]

[543,6]

āha | "na ce"tyādi | mithyārthatven"āviruddha"syākṛtatvasya "vidhi"rmithyārthatā"pratiṣedha"sya "sādhano yuktaḥ" | kasmād | "atiprasaṅgāt" | evaṃ hi yasya kasyacid vidhānena yasya kasyacidabhāvaḥ pratīyeta |
