[543,8]

āha | "na caikatra" kṛtake "dṛṣṭasya" mithyātvasya punara"nya"trākṛtake'"sambhava" eva | kintu sambhava eva | kiṃ kāraṇam | "pṛthagviruddhasahabhāvinā"mpṛthagitivyaktibhedena viruddhasahabhāvināmviruddhairarthairekatra bhāvinā"mapi darśanāt | anityatvavat prayatnānantarīyaketarayori"taradaprayatnānantarīyakaṃ | anityatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvena saha dṛṣṭamaprayatnānarīyakatvena saha dṛśyate |

[544,1]

yadyevamakṛtake mithyātvasyādarśanādabhāvaḥ syāditi |

[544,2]

ata āha | "na ca tathāvidhas"yetyakṛtakasya sato mithyātvasyā"darśanādasatvameva" |

[544,3]

"yasmānna" vipakṣe heto"rasattāsiddhiḥ sarvatonupalambhanādityuktaṃ" prāk | tataścā"siddhāyāṃ" vipakṣāddhetora"sattāyāṃ sandigdha"vipakṣād "vyatirekitā" |

[544,4]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "ayampuruṣamātraka" ityarvāgdarśī "sarva"mvastu "draṣṭuṃ samartho yenāsya" puṃso "darśananivṛttyā na tathā syāt" | adṛṣṭo na syāt | yasmād | "yasya" hi puṃso "jñānaṃ jñeyasattāṃ na vyabhicarati" | sadityeva kṛtvā yasya sarvasmin "jñe"ye jñānaṃ pravarttate tasya jñānaṃ jñeyavyāpakaṃ nivarttamānaṃ jñeyamapi nivarttayati |
ato"sāvadarśanānnāstītyevaṃ vruvāṇaḥ śobheta" | na sarvam | "tadi"ti | tasmād | "ime" bhāvāḥ "santopyanupalakṣyāḥ" apohyāḥ syuḥ | kathaṃ | "svabhāvadeśakālaviprakarṣeṇa" | svabhāvaśca deśaśca kālaśca tairviprakarṣo vyavadhānamiti vigrahaḥ | "sannapi" kaściddeśakālābhyāṃ svabhāvena ca viprakṛṣṭaḥ piśācādivat | 291

[544,5]

nanu kālavyavahitānāmatītānāgatānāmanupalambhādasatvaṃ yuktamabhāvādeva | satyaṃ | kevalamatītānāgatānāmidānīmanupalambhepi kadācit sattvaṃ bhūtaṃ kadācid bhaviṣyatītyanupalambhābhāva iti |

[544,6]

"tathā hī"tyādinaitadeva bodhayati | "ko hyasarvadarśī | atyantaparokṣerthe vacanasyākṛtakasya samvādanaṃ | itarasya" kṛtakasya vacanasyātyantaparokṣerthe | "itaradvetya"samvādanaṃ"bhāvayituṃ" niścetuṃ "samarthaḥ" | naiva | pareṇa kṛtakasyāsamvādanamiṣṭamiti dvayamuktaṃ | syādetad | ekasya vedavākyasya samvādadarśanāt sarvatra vede samvādanamiti |

[545,1]

ata āha | "pratipāditaṃ caitaccheṣavadanumānacintāyāṃ" pūrvameva | kiṃ "prati"pāditamityāha | "kvaci"dityādi | "kvacid" deśakāle vā | "tathe"tyetena prakāreṇa"dṛṣṭānāmarthānāṃ punaranyathābhāvaḥ" | pūrvadṛṣṭākārād vaiparītyaṃ | etadevāha | "yathe"tyādi"saṃskāraviśeṣāt" kṣīramadhvādipariṣkārādilakṣaṇāt | "āmalakīphalāni ca kvaciddeśe madhurāṇī"ti sambandhaḥ | "na cedānīmataddarśinā" | madhuranimbaphalādyadarśinā | "tāni madhurāṇi nimbaphalāni pratikṣeptavyānye"va | tathā vedavākyānāmmithyātvaṃ yadi nāma dṛṣṭantathāpi na śakyampratikṣeptuṃ | "tasmādakṛtakaṃ ca syānmithyārthaṃ" cetyakṛtakamithyārthatvayorna "virodhampaśyāmaḥ" |

[545,2]

nanu mithyārthatāyāmakṛtakatvasyānupalambhādabhāva ityata āha | "na hīyamanupalabdhiradṛśyātma"svadṛśyasvabhāvertheṣvabhāvasya sādhiketyuktaṃ prāk | yataścākṛtakatvasya na mithyātve'bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ | "tena yatkiṃcinmithyātvantatsarvaṃ pauruṣeyaṃ |
iti" evammithyārthatvasya kṛtakatvenā"vyāptiḥ" | kiṅkāraṇama"niścayāt" | akṛtakatvasya mithyārthatve vyatirekāniścayādityarthaḥ | na cāniścitavyatirekāddhetossakāśāt sādhyasiddhiḥ |

[545,3]

"tathā hi" svasādhyena heto"ranvayo" vyāptiḥ | "vyatireko vā" vipakṣād vyāvṛttirvā | "satvaṃ vā" hetoḥ "sādhyadharmiṇi" | pakṣadharmmamityarthaḥ | etāni ca trīṇi rūpāṇi "jñānaiḥ" pramāṇai"ryadi sidhyanti" kīdṛśaista"nniścayaphalai"stasya rūpatrayasya niścayaḥ phalaṃ yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | tadā tāni trīṇi rūpāṇi vivakṣitasya sādhyasya "sādhana"mbhavanti | ya"thokta"mācārya di gnā ge na | "ya eva hyubhayaniścitavācī" | vādiprativādibhyāṃ niścitasya hetulakṣaṇayuktasyārthasya vācakaḥ "sa sādhanandūṣaṇamvā" | asiddhatvādilakṣaṇayuktasyārthasya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ prativādinā dūṣaṇābhiprāyeṇa prayuktaḥ | "nānyataraprasiddhaḥ sandigdhavādo" vādiprativādibhyāmanyataraprasiddhasya sandigdhasya cobhayoranyatarasya ca yo vācakaḥ śabdaḥ sa na sādhanaṃnāpi dūṣaṇaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "punaḥ sādhanāpekṣatvāt" | aniścitasya niścayārthaṃ punaḥ pramāṇāpekṣatvāt | na cākṛtakatvena saha mithyārthatvasya virodho niścito yenākṛtake mithyātvasya vyatirekaḥ siddhaḥ syāt |

[546,1]

atha syād | akṛtakatvādeva vede mithyātvaṃ na bhavatīti ced |

[546,2]

āha | "ko" hītyādi | yasmāt "ko hi" sacetā akṛtakatvena sahā"dṛṣṭavirodhasya"
mithyātvasya "sambhavam"vedavākyeṣu "pratyācakṣīta | tadi"ti tasmā"dayama"kṛtakatvasya hetoryathokto "vyatireko na sādhanaṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "saṃśayāt" | itaśca vyatirekī hetornāstīti darśayannāha |

[546,3]

"api ce"tyādi | "yatra" viṣaye "sādhyavipakṣasya" | sādhyaṃ satyārthatvantadvipakṣasya mithyātvasya "varṇṇayate vyatirekitā" | yatkṛtakaṃ na bhavati tanmithyārthanna bhavatīti |
ya eva mithyārthatvavyavacchedasya viṣayaḥ | "sa evāsya" kṛtakasya hetoḥ "sapakṣaḥ syād | ataḥ" kāraṇāt "sarvo heturanvayī" | anvayavyatirekī | vyatirekasya prakṛtatvāt | na vyatirekyevetyarthaḥ |

[546,4]

nanu sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānorthaḥ sapakṣaḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate | na cāyamihāsti | tatkathaṃ sa evāsya sapakṣaḥ syādityucyate |

[546,5]

satyaṃ | sapakṣasādhyatvenānvaya eva sapakṣa ucyate | ata evāha | "sarvo heturatonvayīti" |

[546,6]

"yadi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yatkiñcinmithyārthantatsarvampauruṣeyamiti" | evaṃ"heto"rakṛtakatvasya "vipakṣeṇa" kṛtakatvena "sādhyavipakṣasya" mithyātvasya yā "vyāptiḥ sā tadabhāve" kṛtakatvābhāve mithyātvasyā"bhāvasiddhau" satyāṃ "syāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ |
kṛtakatvābhāve "bhavato" mithyārthatvasya "tena" kṛtakatvena "vyāptyayogāt" | tasmād vyāptimicchatā | mithyārthatvasya kṛtakatvanivṛttyā nivṛttireṣṭavyā | "yaiva" ca sādhyasādhana"vijātīyayo"rmithyātvakṛtakatvayo"rvyāvṛttisiddhiḥ" | kṛtakatvanivṛtyāmithyārthatvannivarttata ityevaṃrūpā | "saivā"kṛtakasya hetoḥ satyārthatvenānvayasthitira"nvayavyavasthitiḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "vipakṣavyavacchedalakṣaṇatvāt sādhyasya" satyārthatvasya | vipakṣo mithyātvantasya kṛtakatvanivarttano kṛtake yo vyavacchedo vyāvṛttistallakṣaṇatvāt |

[547,1]

kiñca | satyārthatāpratiṣedho mithyārthatvaṃ | tasya ca mithyārthatvasyākṛtake yadā pratiṣedhaḥ kṛtastadā "pratiṣedhadvaya"ñjātaṃ | asmā"cca" satyārthatāvyavacchedarūpāt pratiṣedhadvayāt satyārthatā"vidhisiddhe"riti hetoḥ "kānanvayā"nvayarahitā |
sādhanavyatirekeṇa kṛtakatvena sādhya"vyatire"kasya mithyātvasya vyāptisiddhirnaivānanvayā "vyāptisiddhiḥ" |

[547,2]

"tadi"ti tasmā"nna kaściddheturananvayo nāma" | kintu sarvonvayavyatirekavāneva |
kiṃ kāraṇam | "ekavyavacchedasyā"kṛtake mithyārthatvavyavacchedasya | "vijātīyasiddhināntarīyakatvāt" | mithyārthatā vijātīyasya satyārthatvasya yā siddhistannāntarīyakatvāt |

[547,3]

yadyekavyavacchedastadvijātīyasiddhināntarīyakastadā"'nityanirātmādivyavacchedepi" anityatāyā nirātmatāyā ādiśabdād duḥkhatvādīnāñca | yadā kvacicchaśaviṣāṇādau vyavacchedaḥ kriyate tadāpi "tathā syāt" | mithyārthatāvyavacchedena satyārthasiddhivadanityatvādivijātīyānānnityasātmakasukhatvādīnāṃ siddhiḥ syāt | na caitadiṣṭaṃ | tathātrāpi mābhūditi paro manyate |

[547,4]

"ne"tyādinā pariharati | nāyandoṣaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "vyatirekavyavacchedasya bhāvarūpatvāt" | vyatireko'bhāvo | abhāvasya ca yo vyavacchedo nivṛttistasya bhāvarūpatvāt | abhāvanivṛttyā bhāvavyavastheti yāvat | tadanenabhāvalakṣaṇamuktaṃ |
asmādeva vacanādidamapyarthāduktambhavati | bhāvavyavacchedasyābhāvarūpatvāditi |
tadanena bhāvābhāvayostāvallakṣaṇamuktaṃ | tatra yasmin vyavacchidyamāne | na bhāvānuṣaṅgaḥ | yasmiṃśca vyavacchidyamāne bhāvānuṣaṅgastaddarśayannāha | "na bhā"vetyādi | "bhāva"svabhāvasya "vyavacchede" sati na "bhāvānuṣaṅgo" na bhāvasyākṣepaḥ | bhāvo na bhavatīti tatpratiṣedhasyaiva sambhavāt | "abhāva"vyavacchedasvabhāvasya virahamātrasya "tu"
yo "vyavacchedassa niyamena bhāva"syo"pasthāpano" bhāvasyākṣepakaḥ | kiṅkāraṇam | "bhāvābhāvayoranyonyaṃ" yo "viveko" virahastadrū"patvāt" | tatsvabhāvatvāt | bhāvavivekasyābhāvarūpatvādabhāvavivekasya ca bhāvarūpatvādityarthaḥ |

[548,1]

evantāvad bhāvābhāvavyavacchedayorbhāvānākṣepākṣepakatvamuktvā prakṛtaṃ yojayatya"bhāvarūpas"tvityādinā | satyārthatāyā"stu" yo "vyatireko" mithyārthatālakṣaṇaḥ | "sa" satyārthatā'bhāvarūpā sa "vyatiricyamānaḥ" kṛtakatvanivṛtyā nivarttamāno "bhāvaṃ"
satyārthatālakṣaṇa"mupasthāpayatya"kṛtake |

[548,2]

yadi tu satyārthatvaviparītarūpaṃ mithyārthatvampareṇābhyupagamyate | tadā vedavā kyeṣu kṛtakanivṛttau mithyātvameva na syānna tu satyārthatvantataścānarthakyaṃ syāditi vakṣyati | tasmādavaśyaṃ satyārthatā bhāva"rūpā" | mithyārthatālakṣaṇo dharma eṣṭavyaḥ | sa ca vyatiricyamānassatyārthatāyā bhāvamupasthāpayati | "naivaṃ nairātmyādayo"
viraharūpāḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "svabhāvaviśeṣāt" | svabhāvaviśeṣo hi nairātmyaṃ |
tamevāha | "kriyā" śubhāśubhakaraṇaṃ | "bhogaḥ" sukhaduḥkhānubhavastayo"radhiṣṭhānaṃ" svīkārastatrā"svatantraḥ" paravaśo "hyātmā" svabhāvo "nirātmā" | svabhāvaparyāyotrātmaśabdaḥ |
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam | evaṃbhūtaḥ svabhāvo nirātmā bhavatītyāha | "tatsvātantrye"tyādi | "tasmin" kriyābhogādhiṣṭhāne yat"svātantryaṃ" tal"lakṣa " | tatsva bhāvatvādevā"tmanaḥ" paraiḥ kalpitasya | atastadvaidharmyeṇāsvatantrasvabhāvo nirātmā bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ |

[548,3]

yata evanta"di"ti tasmād "rūpaṃ" svabhāvo "nairātmyaṃ nātmanivṛttimātraṃ | anyathā"
yadi nivṛttimātraṃ nairātmyaṃ syāttadā niḥsvabhāvatvānnirupākhyameva tad bhavet | "nirupākhye" ca "kṛtakatvādeḥ" | ādiśabdātprayatnānantarīyakatvādervastudharmasya hetora"yogāt | tataḥ" kṛtakatvāderhetossakāśānnairātmyaṃ gati"rnairātmyasiddhirna" | iṣyate ca | tasmānna bauddhasyātmavirahamātraṃ nairātmyaṃ | na vyavacchedamātraṃ vivakṣyate | kint"vātmavyavacchedena nirātmano bhāva"sya vastuno nirātmaśabdena"parāmarśāda"bhidhānāt kṛtakatvādessakāśānnairātmyagatirna prāpnotītyaya"madoṣa iti cet" | evamapyātma"paryudāsena vastusaṃsparśāt | tadevā"smaduktam"vasturūpa"mbhāvasvabhāva"nnairātmyamāyātaṃ" | na ca bhāvavyavacchede bhāvāntarānuṣaṅgaḥ | tasmād bauddhānāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādau nairātmyavyavacchedepi nātmano bhāvasiddhiḥ | tena yadukta "manityanirātmatāvyavacchedepi tathā syādi" ti tatparihṛtaṃ |

[549,1]

"yasyāpi" nai yā yi kā de "rnābhāvarūpa" ātmā"vyatirekaḥ" | kintarhi |
svabhāvābhāva eva "tasya" naiyāyikāde"rbhāvarūpa"sya nairātmyasya "vyavacchede nā"tmano"bhāvasiddhiḥ syāt | iti" hetoḥ śaśaviṣāṇādau nairātmyavyavacchedepyātmano "nānvayānuṣaṅgaḥ" | ātmanānvayonugamo na bhavatītyarthaḥ | yathā ca śaśaviṣāṇādau nairātmyavyavacchedepyātmano nānvayānugama"stathā" jīvaccharīre'"nairātmyepi" nairātmyābhāvepi"nā"tmano "bhāvasiddhiḥ syāt" |

[549,2]

athavānyathā vyākhyāyate | mī māṃ sa ko ktavyatirekinirākaraṇaprastāvena naiyāyikoktamapi vyatirekiṇaṃ nirākarttumāha | "yasyāpī"tyādi | yasyāpi naiyāyikāde"rnābhāvarūpa" ātmā "vyatirekaḥ" | kintarhi | nairātmyambhāvasvabhāva eva | "tasyai"vamvādino naiyāyikasya "bhāvarūpasya" nairātmyasya "vyavacchede nā"tmano "bhāvasiddhiḥ syāt" | bhāvavyavacchede bhāvāntarānuṣaṅgābhāvāt | "iti" hetoryatra prāṇādimatvantatrātmeti "nānvayānuṣaṅgaḥ" | yathā ca nānvayānuṣaṅga"stathā" sādhyadharmi"ṇyanairātmyepi" nairātmyanivṛttāvapi "nā"tmano "bhāvasiddhiḥ" syāt |

[549,3]

etadeva prayogapūrvakandarśayannāha | "yathe"tyādi | "idaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ na nirātmakaṃ prāṇādimatvāditi" | āśvāsaḥ prāṇaḥ | ādiśabdāt praśvāsādiparigrahaḥ |
atra prayoge jīvaccharīrasya sātmakatvaṃ sādhyanna cobhayasiddhaḥ | sa pakṣabhūta ātmāstīti nānvayaścintyate | kevalaṃ sādhyasyātmano hetośca prāṇādimattvasya yathākramaṃ yau "vipakṣau" nairātmyamaprāṇādimatvaṃ ca "tayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāvacintāyāṃ"
kriyamāṇāyāma"pramāṇādimatva eva nairātmyaṃ dṛṣṭantadabhāve" vyāpakasyāprāṇādimattvasyābhāve "ca" vyāpyaṃ nairātmyaṃ | prāṇādimati "nāstīti" nyāyāt | "svayaṃ na bhavadapi" nairātmyaṃ "prāṇādīnāṃ" hetutvenābhimatānām"ātmani" sapakṣabhūte "na siddhimupasthāpayati" | nairātmyasya bhāvarūpasya vyavacchedepyanātmalakṣaṇasya bhāvasyānākṣepāt | tataḥ satyapi vyatirekenvayānuṣaṅgābhāvād vyatirekyeva hetuḥ prāṇādiriti na yā yi ka syeṣṭasiddhireveyatā granthena darśitā |

[550,1]

etasminnabhyupagame doṣamāha | "tathe"tyādi | aprāṇādimatvanivṛttyā prāṇādibhyo nivarttyamānamapi nairātmyaṃ | yathā prāṇādīnāmātmani sapakṣabhūte na siddhimupasthāpayati | "tathā sādhyepi" jīvaccharīre "prāṇādi"hetubhirnnairātmyaṃ "vyudasyamānaṃ kevalaṃ syāt" | na tvātmana upasthāpakaṃ |

[550,2]

etadeva grahaṇakavākyaṃ spaṣṭayannāha | "nairātmye'bhāvā"dityādi | "nairātmye"
prāṇādīnā"mabhāvāt prāṇādayastannira"sanā nairātmyamātravyavacchedakā "nātmopasthāpakāḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tatra" sātmake prāṇāde"rbhāvāsiddheḥ | na ca" jīvaccharīre"nairātmya"syātmaviruddhasya "nivṛttyātmasiddhiḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "vipakṣā"nnairātmyāt prāṇāde"rvyatirekadarśanepi" kriyamāṇe sapakṣepyātmani prāṇādīnāṃ siddhi"prasaṅgāt" |

[550,3]

yata evaṃ | tasmā"nna viparyayavyāptiḥ" | sātmakatvaprāṇādimatvavipakṣayornairātmyāt prāṇādimattvayorna vyāptisiddhirityarthaḥ | kadā | nairātmyāt prāṇā"dervyatirekāsiddhau" | evaṃ hi hetuvipakṣeṇāprāṇādimattvena sādhyavipakṣasya nairātmyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ syāt yadi prāṇādibhyo nairātmyaṃ | nivartteta | sā ca nivṛttiranvaye sati syāt | tadāha | "tatsiddhireva ce"tyādi | tasya vyatirekasya "siddhirevānvaya siddhiḥ" | tannāntarīyakatvāttasya | vyatirekasiddhirevānvayasiddharuktā |

[550,4]

athānvayasiddhirneṣyate | tadā'"siddhau" cānvayasya | tadvyatirekavṛttisiddhāvapi | "ta"syātmano "vyatire"ko nairātmyantasya prāṇādeḥ sakāśā"nnivṛttisiddhāvapi |
tadasiddhi"stasyātmanassapakṣabhūtasyāsiddhi"riti" kṛtvā "sādhyepi" jīccharīre nairātmyanivṛttāvapyātmano'siddhi"prasaṃgaḥ" | taditi tasmā"danvayā"'nvayarahitā "na vyatirekavyāptiḥ" sādhyasādhanavipakṣayorna vyāptirityarthaḥ |

[551,1]

abhyupagamyāpīti tu brūmaḥ | bhavatu nāmānanvayā viparyayavyāptiḥ | jīvaccharīrācca nairātmyanivṛttau sātmakatvaṃ jīvaccharīrasya prakārāntarābhāvāt |
satyārthatāsādhane tvakṛtake hetāvayamprakāro na sambhavatītyāha | "mithyārthatāyā"
ityādi | "mithyārthatāyāstu" sādhyavipakṣabhūtāyāḥ "pauruṣeyatvena vyāptyā" hetubhūtayā śabdā"dapauruṣeyānnivṛttāvapi na satyārthatvama"kṛtakasya sidhyet | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ |
satyārthatvavyatirekeṇānarthakyasya "prakārānta"rasya "sambhavāt" | satyārthatvamithyārthatve "na dvairāśye" tu "śabdānāmetat" syāt | mithyārthatvanivṛttau satyārthatvaṃ syāt | kiṃ kāraṇam | "ekanivṛttau" mithyārthatānivṛttau satyārthatāvyatirekeṇa "gatyantarābhāvāt" | dvairāśyameva tu nāsti gatyantarasambhavād | ataste śabdā "anarthā api syuriti neṣṭasiddhirna" satyārthatāsiddhiḥ |

[551,2]

śabdebhyo"rthapratīteḥ" kāraṇānnā"narthakā iti cet" | "nā"yaṃ svābhāvikorthapratyayaḥ kint"ve"ṣa "puruṣavyāpāraḥ syāt" | saṃketaḥ puruṣavyāpārastatphalatvātpuruṣavyāpāra ityabhedenoktaḥ puruṣavyāpārāt syādityarthaḥ | kimvat | prasiddhādarthāda"rthāntaravikalpavat" |

[551,3]

etadeva vyācaṣṭe | "yathe"tyādi | jai mi nī yai riṣṭenārthena "bha ra to rva śyā dicaritādi"kasyā"tadarthatvepi" tadbharatacaritamurvaśīcaritaṃ | ādiśabdādanyasyāpi pu rū ra va ścaritādergrahaṇaṃ | dvitīyenādigrahaṇe na bharatādīnāṃ caritādanyadapyavasthāviśeṣādi"kamarthamanye" mī māṃ sa kā lokaprasiddhādarthāda"nyathā vyācakṣate" | bharato yūpaḥ | urvarśī pātrī | araṇirvetyādinā |

[551,4]

vyākhyātṛvikalpitād arthapratītirna bhavatyeveti ced |

[551,5]

āha | "tadanusāreṇe"tyādi | vyākhyātṛbhirvikalpitārthā"nusāreṇa | keṣāṃci"cchrotṝṇāṃ"pratīti"rbhavatyeva | "ta"theti bharatādiśabdavyākhyāvat | svabhāvāda"narthakeṣvapi" vedavākyeṣ"varthavikalpaḥ puruṣakṛtaḥ syānna śabdasvabhāvakṛtaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | vaidikebhyorthapratipattau "puruṣa"sya jai mi ni prabhṛte"rupadeśāpekṣaṇāt" | kimiva | "arthāntaravadeva" | bharatorvaśyādiśabdānāmarthāntaravikalpavadityarthaḥ | svabhāvatorthapratipādanepi puruṣopadeśamapekṣiṣyanta ityapi mithyā | yato "na hi prakṛtyā" svabhāvenārtha"prakāśanāstaṃ" puruṣopadeśa"mapekṣante vahnyādayaḥ | puruṣastu" svamātmīyaṃ "samayavyāpāra"saṃketasāmarthyenā"cakṣāṇaḥ" parasmai "upadiśati" | yathāyaṃ śabdosminnarthe mayā prayukta"iti" nyāyyaṃ | na tu prakṛtyārthaprakāśane puruṣopadeśo nyāyyaḥ |

[552,1]

atha puruṣasamitārthavannisargasiddhopi vedortheṣu puruṣopadeśamapekṣate | tadā yaśca "puruṣe"ṇa "samitaḥ" saṃketito yaśca "nisarge"ṇa svabhāvena "si"ddhorthaḥ | tayordvayorapi puruṣopadeśā"pekṣaṇaṃ" pratyaviśeṣāt | "anya"śca kaścidviśeṣo nāsti yenāyaṃ puruṣasamitoyaṃ nisargasiddha iti pratīyeta | "ataḥ" kāraṇā"deko" vaidikorthe "naisargi"kaḥ |
nisarge bhava ityādhyātmāditvāṭṭhak | "anyo" laukikaśabdorthe "pauruṣeya iti duravasānaṃ" | durbodhaṃ | vibhāgasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt |

[552,2]

"asti viśeṣo" nisargasiddhasya vaidikasya kopi pramāṇasamvādaḥ | pramāṇāntarānugamanaṃ | yastu naivaṃ sa pauruṣeya iti cet | "etaduttaratra niṣetsyā"mo yathā"nāstyantaparokṣerthe pramāṇāntaravṛttiri"tyādinā granthena | puruṣopadeśāpekṣaṇādinā ca "samānadharmaṇo"rlaukikavaidikayoḥ "pramāṇasamvādamātraviśeṣādekatra" vaidike"'pauruṣeyatve"na kalpyamāne | "bahutaramidānīṃ" laukikamekavākyaṃ pramāṇasamvā"dyapauruṣeyaṃ" kalpyaṃ syāt | yasmāt "santi puruṣakṛtānyapi vākyāni kānicid""anityā vata saṃskārā" ityevamādīni | "evamvidhānīti" pramāṇasamvādīnīti kṛtvā"teṣva"pauruṣeyatva"prasaṃgaḥ" |

[552,3]

atha pramāṇasamvādinopi laukikasya pauruṣeyatvantadā "tadvadeṣāmapi" vaidikānāṃśabdānāma"bhipretārthavattā pauruṣeyī ca syāt pramāṇānurodhinī ca" pramāṇāsamvādinī ceti na viśeṣaṃ paśyāmo vaidikānāṃ śabdānāṃ laukikebhyaḥ |

[553,1]

vaidikānāṃ śabdānāṃ mantratvādevāpauruṣeyatvamiti darśayannāha | "api ce"tyādi | "vyāhataṃ" parasparaviruddhaṃ | tathā hi | "mantrāṇāṃ kasyaci"tpuruṣasya "samayatve" pratijñāvyavasthāpitatve sati "kāryasādhanaṃ yukta"mabhimatakāryasiddhirmantraprayogād yukteti |

[553,2]

"yadyeta" ityādinā vyākhyānaṃ | "ete mantrā yadi kasyacit" prabhāvavataḥ karttuḥ"samayaḥ" syāditi vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ | samayavyavasthāpitatvātsamaya ityucyante |
kathaṃ punarasau samayaḥ kṛta ityāha | "parārthe"tyādi | "parārthapa"ratā parārthapradhānatā |
kṛpāluteti yāvat | "ta"syā "anurodhena | anyato vā kutaści"d yaśaḥprabhṛte"rhetoḥ"
kṛtaḥ "syāt" | kīdṛśosau samaya ityāha | "yathe"tyādi | "yathā matpraṇītameta"d "vākyaṃ" | kiṃ bhūtam | "abhimatārthopanibandhanaṃ" | mantrasya kartturabhimato yortho vidhiviśeṣaḥ | āvāhanavisarjanādilakṣaṇaḥ sa nibandhanaṃ pravṛttyaṅgaṃ yasmin vākye tattathoktaṃ | "eva"mityanenānukrameṇa "niyuṃjānaṃ" prayuṃjānaṃ puruṣama"nenārthena" puruṣābhimatena phalena "yojayāmīti" samayaḥ syāt | "tadā mantraprayogāt kadācit" vidhisamāptau |
abhimat"ārthaniṣpattiḥ" syāt | "kavisamayādiva" | yathā kenacit kāvyaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ samayaḥ kṛtaḥ | matpraṇītaṃ kāvyaṃ yaḥ paṭhati | tasmai mayedaṃ dātavyamityatastatkṛtakāvya"pāṭhakānāṃ" yathā pratijñātārthaniṣpattistadvat |

[553,3]

"atha bhāvaśaktiḥ" śabdasvabhāvasyaiva sā tādṛśī śaktiryenābhimatamphalambhavati |
na yathābhimatāt puruṣasamayāt | tadā syā"danyatrāpi" | yathā kathaṃcitprayuktānmantrādapi | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | varṇṇātmakasya mantrasyā"viśeṣataḥ" |

[553,4]

"ne"tyādi vyākhyānaṃ | "na vai puruṣasamayā"ddheto"rmantre"bhyortha "siddhiḥ"sya varṇṇarūpasya mantrasya "svabhāva eṣa | yadi na" mantrāḥ kasyacidvidhipūrva"nniyuktāḥ phaladāḥ" |

[554,1]

"tattarhī"tyādi | si ddhā nta vā dī | "tattarhi" mantrākhyānaṃ "varṇṇānāṃ rūpaṃ sarvatreti" vidhirahite kāle | viparītādiprayoge vā"'viśiṣṭamiti | yathākathaṃci"tpā ṭhānukramaṃ vidhiṃ collaṃghya "prayuktādapi" mantrādabhimataṃ "phalaṃ syāt" | yasmād "varṇṇā eva hi mantro nānyat kiñcid" varṇṇavyatiriktaṃ |

[554,2]

"tatkramo" varṇṇakramo na varṇṇā eve"ti cet" |

[554,3]

tadasat | yasmād varṇṇebhyaḥ "kramasyārthāntaratvaṃ ca" varṇṇānupūrvī vākyaṃ cedityatrāntare "pūrvameva nirākṛtaṃ" |

[554,4]

"ne"tyādi vyākhyānaṃ | "varṇṇe"bhyaḥ kramasyā"vyatireke ca varṇṇā eva mantrāste ca"
varṇṇā "aviśiṣṭāḥ sarvatra" pratilomapāṭhādāviti "sarvathā" yathākathañcit prayuktā"phaladāḥ syuḥ" | na ca phaladā bhavanti | na kevalaṃ vidhibhraṃśe na phaladāḥ pratyutānarthakāriṇa eva bhavantītyāha | "upaplava" ityādi | upadravaḥ | "upaplavaḥ" | tu śabdotiśaye | "alpīyasopi" vidhi"kramasya bhraṃśād dṛṣṭaḥ" | sa ca puruṣasamayatve mantrāṇāṃ yujyate | nāpauruṣeyatve |

[554,5]

kasyacit samayatvepi kathamupaplava iti cedāha | "kasyacidi"tyādi | mantrasya karttrā ye vidhayo nirdiṣṭāsteṣāṃ madhye "kasyaci"dvidhe"ranuṣṭhānā"d "devatā"yāḥ sannidhirbhavati | tata"ssanni"dheranyasya vidhiviśeṣa"syāsākalye"nāsampādanena | devatāyā"virādhanāt" khedanā"cco"paplavaḥ syāt | tatrāvītarāgā devatā | virāgitā svayamevānarthaṃ karoti | vītarāgāḥ tu na svayaṃ | tadabhiprasannāstvanye devatādayaḥ kurvantīti draṣṭavyaṃ |

[554,6]

yatra mantre na kaścidapi vidhiḥ kriyate tatra kathamiti |

[554,7]

āha | "sarve"tyādi | "sarva"vidhi"bhraṃśe tu kasyacide"va "samayasya" mantrapraṇetṛkṛtasyavidhera"nuṣṭhānād" devatāyā "asannidhernārthānarthau" |

[555,1]

"kiṃce"tyādinā doṣāntaramāha | nivāritaṃ "krama"syārthāntaratvaṃ | bhavatu vā varṇṇebhyaḥ kramasyārthāntaratvamanarthāntaratvamvā | tatrā"narthāntaratve" kramasya varṇṇātmā varṇṇasvabhāva eva mantraḥ | arthāntaratve tu tatkramātmā | varṇṇakramātmā | tasya"varṇātmanastatkramātmano vā mantrasya" kīdṛśasy"ārthahetoḥ" puruṣārthakāraṇasya hetubhi"rakṛtatvānnityasya nityaṃ sannidhānamiti" kṛtvā "nityantadarthasiddhiḥ syāt" | tebhyo mantrebhyaḥ puruṣārthasya niṣpattiḥ syāt | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "yato" yasyā "hi bhā"va"śakte"rmantraśakteḥ sakāśāt mantrasādhyasya "phala"syo"tpattiḥ sā" bhāvaśakti"ravikaleti na phalavaikalyaṃ syāt" | yasmā"nna hi kāraṇa"sya "sākalye" sati "kārya"sya "vaikalya"masattvaṃ"yuktaṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasyā"vikalasya kāraṇasya kāryamakurvato "kāraṇatvaprasaṅgāt" | nityatvepi mantrāṇāṃ "na kevalānmantraprayogā"diti mantrasambandhā"diṣṭasiddhiḥ" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "tasya" mantrasya "vidhānāpekṣatvāditi cet" | tadayuktaṃ yasmānmantrasya vidhānāpekṣatve'bhyupagamyamāne tasyā"pekṣa"ṇīyasya vidhānādermantraṃ"pratyasāmarthya"manādheyātiśayatvānmantrasya |

[555,2]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "yadi hī"tyādi | vidhānādibhirmantravidhistasmā"danyato ve"ti "kuta"ścitsahakāriṇaḥ sthānaviśeṣādessakāśāt kañcit "svabhāvātiśayamāsādaye"yurlabheran | tadā sahakārī "ta"trotpādye mantrasya svabhāvātiśaye "samarthopekṣyaḥ syā"t | "na ca nityeṣveta"datiśayotpādana"mastītyuktaṃ" prāk | "tatkima"yaṃ sahakāryatiśayotpādanaṃ pra"tyasama"rtho mantrai"rapekṣyata iti" kṛtv"ānapekṣā" mantrāḥ "sadā"
kāryaṃ "kuryuḥ" | yadi kārakasvabhāvā | no ce"nna vā kadācit" kāryaṃ kuryu"ranati" svabhāsya sarvadā tulyatvāt |

[556,1]

kiṃ ca | "sarvasya" puṃsaḥ pātakādiyuktasyāpi "sādhanaṃ" phalahetava"ste" na mantrāḥ"syuḥ" | samayanirapekṣā "yadīdṛśī" mantrāṇām"bhāvaśaktiḥ" | atha syād yajamānenaiva prayuktāḥ phaladā iti |

[556,2]

ata āha | "prayokturbhedo" viśeṣo yajamānatvanta"dapekṣā ca | nāsaṃskāryasya"
mantrasya "yujyate | yadi bhāvaśaktyaiva" samayānapekṣayā "mantrāḥ" phaladā "na te" mantrāḥ phaladānaṃ prati "kañcit" puruṣaṃ "parihareyuḥ | anyaṃ vā" śūdrādikaṃ | yasmā"nna hyanyama"yajamānaṃ "prati svabhāvo" mantrāṇāṃ kāryakaraṇasvabhāvo"'tadbhāvo bhava"tyajanakasvabhāvo bhavati | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" janakasvabhāvasya "tenā"brāhmaṇena cānapakarṣaṇāt | akhaṇḍanāt | "anyena" ca yajamānādinā"nutkarṣaṇā"t | ataśca kāraṇāt"kenadit" puruṣeṇa "saha" mantrāṇāṃ "kāryakāraṇabhāva"yogaḥ | ta"dayogācca" yathākramaṃ brāhmaṇenānyena ca mantrāṇāṃ "pratyāsattiviprakarṣābhāvāt" sarvasya sādhanaṃ syuriti | "ata eva" na nityatvādevā"sya" mantrasyā"saṃskāryatvāt prayoktā" | kārye niyoktā kaścid brāhmaṇonyo vā "nāsti yataḥ prayoktā" mantrasādhyaṃ "phalamaśnuvīta" labheta brāhmaṇa eva nānyaḥ | tathā hi yathā śūdrādirapāṭhako na kiṃcitkarotīti na prayoktā tathā brāhmaṇopi | tataḥ saṃskārāpratipatteriti |

[556,3]

kiñca "saṃskāryasyā"pyādheyātiśayasyāpi "bhāvasya vastubhedo" hi kāraṇabhedo"hi bhedako" na ca brāhmaṇaśūdrādīnāṃ svabhāvabhedaḥ paramārthatosti | kevalaṃ lokavyavahārakṛto vipraśūdrādibhedaḥ | tena lokavyavahārabhinnānāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ "prayoktaṇāmbhedānniyamo" mantra"śaktau na" sambhavati | yena brāhmaṇa eva phalamāsādayenna śūdraḥ |

[557,1]

kva tarhyayanniyamaḥ syāditi |

[557,2]

āha | "samaye bhavet" | yadā samayo mantrastadā samayasya karttā vastusvabhāvānapekṣaḥ samayaṃ karoti | yathāloke ye brāhmaṇāḥ prasiddhāstebhya eva prayoktṛbhyaḥ phalandāsyāmi nānyebhya iti syānniyamaḥ |

[557,3]

"ādheye"tyādinā vyākhyānaṃ | "ādheyo" janyo "viśe"ṣo yeṣānte bhāvāḥ | "taddheto"rviśeṣahetoḥ "svabhāvabhede" sati | "tato" viśeṣahetoḥ sakāśād"āsāditātiśayatvāde"katrānyathābhūtaḥ punara"nyatra" kāraṇāntare"'nyathā" syu"rna" tva"bhede" kāraṇasyānyathābhāvaḥ |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ "kāraṇāviśeṣe" sati "kāryasyāviśeṣāt" |

[557,4]

atha kāraṇāviśeṣe kāryasya viśeṣastadā viśeṣe kāryasyāpyabhyupagamyamāne | "tasya viśeṣasyāhetukatvaprasaṃgādi"tyuktaprāyaṃ |

[557,5]

"tadi"ti tasmā"dime maṃtrāḥ kāryā apya"nityā api | hetukṛtāt "svabhāvabhe"dāt "phaladāyino"'pi "na śūdrādiprayogepyanyathā syu"raphaladāḥ syuḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "śūdra" iti "vipra" iti brāhmaṇa itya"bhidhānaṃ" saṃjñā ya"yoḥ puruṣayo"stayorbuddhīndriyadeheṣu"svabhāvabhedābhāvāt" | prativyakti svalakṣaṇabhedostīti cet | na | tasya brāhmaṇeṣvapi prativyakti sambhavāt | jātikṛtastu bhedo nāstītyucyate |

[557,6]

nanvayaṃ brāhmaṇo'yaṃ śūdra iti loke nāmabhedosti | tathā sammānādivyavahārabhedaśca | tataḥ svabhāvabhedovasīyata iti | ced |

[557,7]

āha | "na hī"tyādi | "puruṣecchānurodhino" brāhmaṇādi"nā"mabhedāt satkārādi"vyavahārabhedā"cca "svabhāvabhedānubandhināṃ" yathā kāraṇamutpannena svabhāvabhedenānugatānā"marthānāmanyathātvaṃ" | na hi svabhāvabhedostīti sambandhaḥ |

[557,8]

"tayo"rbrāhmaṇaśadrayoḥ puruṣayo"rjātibhedostīti cet" |

[558,1]

tannaivaṃ | yasmāt "sa khalvi"tyādi | sāmānyaniṣedhānniṣiddhaiva jātiḥ |
kevalamabhyupagamyocyate | "sa khalu" bhavannapi jātibhedastridhā "iṣṭaḥ | ākṛtiguṇaśaktibhede" sati | "gavāśvavat" | gavāśvasyeva gavāśvavat | tatrākṛtibhedaḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ sa prativyakti bhedavatīṣvapi goṣvanugāmī vidyate | nāśvavyaktiṣu |
guṇabhedaḥ kṣīrādīnāṃ rasavīryavipākādibhedena sa ca samānajātīyāsu vyaktiṣvanugāmī dṛṣṭaḥ | na vijātīyāsu | śaktibhedānurūpakāryasāmarthyalakṣaṇaḥ |
yathā gavāndohādisāmarthyaṃ nāśvānāṃ | tadevaṃ samānajātīyavyaktyanugāmināmākṛtyādibhedānāmupalambhāt kāmaṃ gavāśvādiṣvastu jātibhedo naivaṃ brāhmaṇādiṣu pratiniyata ākṛtyādibhedosti | yena jātibhedaḥ kalpyeta | sakṛcca gavādiṣu vyutpanno deśakālādibhede"pyanupadeśa"mityupadeśamantareṇainaṃ jātibhedaṃ "lokaḥ pratipadyate" | ayaṅgaurayamaśva iti | naivaṃ brāhmaṇādibhedamanupadeśaṃ pratipadyate | "tadvadi"ti gavāśvavat | "anayo"rbrāhmaṇaśūdrayoḥ "kaṃcidapi" guṇaṃ viniyataṃ samānajātīyāsveva vyaktiṣu sthita"mpaśyāmaḥ" | guṇagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ | evamākṛtibhedaṃ śaktibhedaṃ ca viniyataṃ na paśyāmaḥ | "apaśyantaścā"kṛtyādi"bhedaṃ kathaṃ" śūdraviprayorjātibhedaṃ"pratipadyemahi" | naiveti yāvat | tathā hyadhyayanaśaucācārādiviśeṣaḥ sarvo vyabhicārī | yaśca gaurapiṅgalakeśatvādilakṣaṇa ākārabhedaḥ kalpyate sa brāhmaṇeṣvapi keṣucinnāsti | śūdreṣu ca vidyate keṣucit |

[558,2]

yadi na jātibhedaḥ vipraśūdrayoḥ kathantarhyayaṃ brāhmaṇādiśabdaśravaṇād bhinnā pratītirbhavatīti |

[558,3]

āha | "yopī"tyādi | "nāmabhedānvayo" brāhmaṇādisaṃjñāviśeṣahetuko "yopyayaṃ pratītibhedo"buddhibhedo ayaṃ brāhmaṇo'yaṃ śūdra iti pratītibhedo"satyapi jāti"jjapahomādikriyāviśeṣānuṣṭhānāt "syāt | anvayācce"ti | tathābhūtavyāpārānuṣṭhāyinaḥ kulādutpatteśca | "vaidyavaṇigvyapadeśādivat" | yathā tulyajātīyeṣu śudreṣu tasya tasya vyāpāraviśeṣasyānuṣṭhānādanvayācca vaidyādivyapadeśāḥ pravarttante | na tāvatā jātibhedaḥ | tadvat brāhmaṇādiṣvapi syāt |

[559,1]

"taditi" tasmā"dime" mantrā "aviśiṣṭena" brāhmaṇaśūdrādinā "prayujyamānāstato"
brāhmaṇāde"raviśiṣṭameva svabhāvamāsādayanti | tena" kāraṇe"nāviśeṣeṇaiva" śūdrādiṣu"phaladāḥ syu"rityupasaṃhāraḥ | tadevaṃ mantrāṇāmbhāvaśaktyā phalotpādanenāyaṃ doṣo"yadā tu" yathoktāt puruṣa"samayādebhyo" vaidikebhyonyebhyo vā mantrebhyaḥ "phala"miṣyate | "tadāya"maviśeṣeṇa phaladāḥ syuri"tyayamadoṣaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "samayakārasya" mantrapraṇetū "ruceḥ phalotpattiniyamāt" | samayakārasyaivamabhirucitaṃ ya īdṛśo brāhmaṇavyapadeśabhāgevamvidhaṃ niyamamanutiṣṭhati tasyaivāhaṃ phalayogena pratyupasthito nānyebhya ityevaṃ ruceḥ phalaniyāmakaḥ | paryanuyogaḥ | tathā hi | "svabhāvavṛttayo" bhāvāḥ puruṣavyāpārānapekṣā vastusthityaiva kāryakāriṇa ityarthaḥ | te "tanmukhena" svabhāvadvāreṇa"prasaṃgamarhanti" | yathā svabhāvaviśeṣādihāpyevaṃ kinna bhavatīti | "na puruṣecchā vṛttayo" bhāvāḥ prasaṃgamarhanti | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "teṣāṃ" puruṣāṇāṃ svecchānuvidhāyināṃ yathā"kathaṃcid vṛtteḥ" |

[559,2]

"yadapi" viśiṣṭaḥ "prayoktā" mantrapha"laśmanuta i"tyucyate | tatrāpi "prayoga"mevaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ "paśyāmaḥ" | yathā "samīhite" puruṣā"rthe yogyo" yo mantrasvabhāvasta"syotpādanaṃ" |
utpannasyāpyuttarottaraviśeṣotpādanena "santānapariṇāma"namanyathātvamvā "tadubhayamu"tpādanamvipariṇamanaṃ vā "viśeṣajanmani" viśeṣotpattau satyāṃ "syāt | anyathā"
viśeṣānutpattāva"nādheyātiśayānāṃ" mantrāṇāṃ | "kiṃ kurvāṇaḥ prayojakaḥ" | naiva |

[559,3]

"yene"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yena" kāraṇena "tato" mantraprayogāt kaścit prayoktā brāhmaṇaḥ "phalamaśnute'nyaḥ" śūdrādi"rnā"śnute | notpādanammantrāṇāṃ "prayogaḥ" kintva"bhivyaktiḥ" prayogo yadīṣyate | "sābhi"vyaktiḥ "prageva" sā mā nya ci ntā yāṃ"nirākṛtā" |

[560,1]

tadvyācaṣṭe | "na hi nityānā"mpadārthānāṃ "kācidabhivyaktirityuktaṃ | yataḥ"
kāraṇā"dābhivyañjakaḥ" śabdasya "prayoktā syāt" |

[560,2]

bhavatu vābhivyaktiḥ | sā ca tāvad yogyatotpattinityatvāt | kintu"vyaktiśca" śabdaviṣayā "buddhi sā yasmāt" puruṣāt prayoktuḥ "sa" puruṣo mantra"phalairyadi yujyate | syācchetu"rapi "phalasambandhaḥ" | yonyena paṭhyamānaṃ mantraṃ śrṛṇoti kevalaṃ |
tasyāpi mantraphalena yogaḥ syānna tu vaktureva | yasmāt "vaktā hi vyaktikāraṇaṃ"
jñānakāraṇamataśca phalena prayujyate | tacca mantraviṣayajñānakāraṇatvaṃ śroturapi tulyamiti sopi vaktaiveti kasmānna phalena yujyate |

[560,3]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na hi" nityasya "śabdasyānyataḥ" kāraṇāt "svarūpapariṇāmaḥ" svarūpānyathātvamvyaktiḥ | "nāpyāvaraṇavigamanaṃ vyaktiḥ" | nityasyāvaraṇānupapatteḥ | "kintu tadviṣayā" śabdaviṣayā "pratīti"rbuddhirabhivyaktiḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | "aśrūyamāṇe" śabde"'vyaktavyapadeśāt" | na hyanupalabhyamānaḥ śabdobhivyakta ityucyate | "tatraivaṃ" vyavasthite "yadi" śabdaviṣaya"buddhiheturvaktā syāt" | tadā tacchabdaviṣayabuddhihetusvabhāvavakttṛlakṣaṇaṃ "śrotaryapya"stīti "sopi" śrotā mantraprayogasambhavamabhimataṃ "phalamvaktṛvadaśnuvīta | na hi vaktuḥ kaścidanyastadbhāvo" vaktṛtvabhāvo"nyatra tadbuddhihetutvāt" | śabdabuddhihetutvāt | ato nāsti vaktṛśrotroḥ śabdajñānahetutve viśeṣa iti tulyaḥ phalasambandhaḥ syāt | paro vaktā | upādhirheturyasyā buddheḥ |
sā "paropādhibuddhiḥ śroturna vaktuḥ" paropādhirbuddhiḥ | "iti" hetorvaktṛśrotro"rviśeṣa iti cet | kaḥ punarupayogaḥ" sāmarthya"mvaktuḥ śrotari" buddhijananamprati | "yeno"payogeno"pādhiriṣyate" vaktā | "tato" vaktuḥ sakāśā"cchabdaśrutiḥ" śabdopalabdhiḥ śroturbhavatyatosau vaktā upādhiri"ti cet" |

[561,1]

"nanu tadevedaṃ paryanuyujyate kathantato" vaktuḥ sakāśācchabdaśrutiḥ śroturbhavati |
kathaṃ ca tato na bhavet | "sambandhābhāvāt" | upakāryopakārakabhāvābhāvāt | tadabhāvameva darśayannāha | "viṣayopanayād" viṣayasannidhāpanā"dayam"vakt"āsya" śrotuḥ "śrāvakaḥ syāt" | śrāvayitā bhavet | "tacca" pratyupasthāpanaṃ "na śakyantasya" śabdasya | nityasya"kathaṃcidapyapariṇāmāt" | anyathātvābhāvāt |

[561,2]

śroturindriyasaṃskāraṅkurvannāvaraṇavigamanaṃ vā śabdasya sampādayan brajedupayogamvakteti cet |

[561,3]

"tanna" | yasmā"dindriyasaṃskārādayopyuktāḥ" pratikṣiptāḥ | "indriyasya syātsaṃkāraḥ śṛṇuyānnikhilantadi"tyādinā | māmayamvaktā śrāvayatīti śrotuḥ pratyayo buddhi"rahamenaṃ" śrotāraṃ "śrāvayāmīti" vaktuḥ saṃpratyayo bhavati | ataḥ pratyayadvayād yathāyoga"mvaktṛśrotrorbheda iti cet" |

[561,4]

"anupakārye"tyādinā pratiṣedhati | māṃ śrāvayatyahaṃ śrāvayāmīti "bhrāntimātrametat" | kimbhūta"manupakāryopakārakaṃ" | upakāryaḥ śrotā | upakārako vaktā na bhavati yasmin bhrāntimātre tattathoktaṃ | nitye ca śabde buddhijanmani puṃsaḥ sarvathā vyāpārābhāvādanupakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ | "tasmā"devaṃbhūtād bhrāntimātrā"ttadbhāve" | vaktṛśrotṛbhedabhāve"'tiprasaṅgaḥ" | sarvasyāśrāvayituraśṛṇvataścaivaṃ "syāt" |
kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "a""nyatrā"pyunmattādau vinaiva śabda śravaṇena "bhrāntyā"'haṃ śṛṇomītyādi"pratyayadarśanāt" | tasmāt "sarvathopakārābhāve ca tathāpratyaya" ityahaṃ śrāvayāmītyādi pratyayo "na yuktaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sarveṣāṃ parasparama"nupakāryopakārakāṇā"mevama"hamataḥ śṛṇomītyādi "prasaṅgāt" | yathā tarhyunmatteṣu bhrāntyā pratyayotpattistathā nityeṣvapi bhavatviti cedāha | "bhrāntiri"tyādi | "bhrānti" rapi yā puruṣasyonmattasya bhavati sāpi svasthāvasthāyāṃ "kutaścit puruṣādupakāre sati" tathā pratyayotpattau tadāhitasaṃskāravaśena punarunmattāvasthāyā"manyatrāpya"vaktaryapi | "kayācit pratyāsattyā" kenacitsādṛśyena bhavati | "sāpi" bhrāntirnityeṣu mantreṣvatyantaṃ "pāramparyeṇā"pyanupakāre"na syāt" |

[562,1]

"tasmā"dityādinā prakṛtamupasaṃharati | yathoktavidhinā "vaktṛśrotrorvyaktihetutve" |
śabdajñānahetutve "viśeṣābhāvāttulyo" mantra"phalena sambandhaḥ syāt" | nityeṣu vyaktihetutvamapi naivāsti | kevalamabhyupagamyaivamucyate |

[562,2]

"api ce"tyādinā dūṣaṇāntaramāha | "anabhivyaktaḥ" na śrotraviṣayannītaḥ "śabdo yaiḥ" karaṇaistālvādibhistānyanabhivyaktaśabdāni | teṣāṃ "karaṇānāṃ prayojanaṃ" vyāpāraṇaṃ vyarthaṃ syāditi liṅgavipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ | yatrauṣṭhādipraspandamātreṇa upāṃśujapaḥ kriyate | sa "vyarthaḥ syāditi" vākyārthaḥ | yatrauṣṭhādipraspandopi nāsti kevalaṃ manasā mantracintanaṃ sa "manojapaḥ | vā" śabdaḥ samuccaye | manojapaśca vyarthaḥ syāt | yasmā"cchabdo hi śrotragocaraḥ" śrotragrāhya eva śabdaḥ | śabdasvabhāvaśca mantraḥ | upāṃśumānasayośca japayoḥ śrotragrahaṇābhāvādaśabdatvam | aśabdatvāccāmantratvaṃ ca japan kathaṃ phalavān syāt | gṛhyata iti grahaṇaṃ | "śrotragrāhya"
ityarthaḥ | tadeva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya śabdasya sa tathoktaḥ | tadati"krametiprasaṃgāt" |
śrotragrāhyaṃ śabdaṃ muktvā manojapāderjñānātmakasya śabdatva iṣyamāṇe rasādīnāmapi śabdatvaṃ syāt |

[562,3]

"nanvemapi" śrotragocarasya śabdasvabhāvatve śabdatva"sāmānye" śabdasvabhāvatā"prasaṅgaḥ" |

[562,4]

"ne"ti si ddhā nta vā dī | "na brūmaḥ" śrotragocaraḥ "śabda eveti | śabdastvavaśyantallakṣaṇaḥ" śrotragrahaṇalakṣaṇa iti brūmaḥ | kasmāt | "tasya" śabdasya śrotragrāhyatvammuktvā la"kṣaṇāntarābhāvāt | tatrai"tasmin śabdasvalakṣaṇe "yadi śabdātmanāṃ" śabdasvabhāvānā"mmantrāṇāmabhivyaktihetuḥ" śabdasvarūpagrāhijñānahetuḥ puruṣaḥ "prayokte"ṣyate yasya phalena sambandhaḥ | tadā"nabhivyaktaśrutiviṣayāṇāṃ" | śrutiviṣayaḥ śabdaḥ sonabhivyakto yaiḥ kāraṇairiti vigrahaḥ | teṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ "prayoktā" | oṣṭhādispandamātreṇa vyāpārayitā | "upāṃśujāpī na mantraphalena yujyate" nāpi manasā japan mantraphalena yujyeta | yasmānna "hi tadā" upāṃśumaunajapakāle "śrotreṇa kaṃcidarthaṃ"
śabdākhya"mvibhāvayāmo" gṛh ṇīmaḥ |

[563,1]

mānasopi japo mantra ityāha | "na ca" mānaso vikalpo"'śabdātmā mantraḥ" |
śabdasya śrotragrāhyatvāpauruṣayatvanityatvenābhyupagamāt | tadviparītatvācca vikalpasya |

[563,2]

"pāramparye"tyādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | yāpyupāṃśumanojāpakāle mantrābhāsā "mati"rbuddhi"ssāpi tadvyaktiḥ" | tasya śabdasya vyaktijñānaṃ | kasmāt |
pāramparyeṇa "tajjatvāt" | śabdajātatvāt | tathā hi tasya prāk śabdajñānamutpannantena jñānena cāhitasaṃskārasya krameṇa manojape śabdapratibhāsotpatteḥ |

[563,3]

"netyā"dinā vyācaṣṭe | "na hi manasā dhyāyatopi" japino yā "mantrābhāsā buddhiḥ"
sā "śravaṇādṛte" | śabdaśravaṇaṃ vinā | "tataḥ śabdaprabhavā"cchabdādutpatte"ssāpi" manojapakāle matiḥ "śabdavyaktireva" śabdajñānameva | tataśca mantrasvabhāvatvāt manojapādeḥ prayoktā phalavān syāditi bhāvaḥ | "evami"ti pāramparyeṇa mantratve'"navasthā syāt" |

[563,4]

tamevāha "śabde"tyādi | mantralakṣaṇācchabdādarthavikalpāḥ "śabdārthavikalpāḥ" |
tathā hi | "agnaye svāhā" | ityukte | agnirjvaladbhāsurādirūpa ityādivikalpāḥ kadācidutpadyante | "teṣāmapi parampara"yā śabdaprasūtirastīti "tepi" vikalpāsta"thā syu"rmantravyaktilakṣaṇāḥ prayogāḥ syuḥ | śabdaprabhavāpi satī yā "tadarthā" śabdaḥ arthaḥ viṣayo yasyā iti vigrahaḥ | saiva "cenma"tirmantravyaktirna cārthavikalpā ye śabdaviṣayāḥ | "asiddha"miti si ddhā nta vā dī | śabdavikalpasyāsiddhaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "kalpanānvayāt" | sajātīyavikalpahetukatvāt |
adhyāropitākāraviṣayā eva manovikalpāḥ |

[564,1]

"ne"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na brūmaḥ sarvā śabdaprabhavā buddhistadvyaktiḥ" śabdavyakti"riti" | kintu "yā tadviṣayā" śabdaviṣayā vikalpabuddhiḥ | "sā tasya" śabdasya"vyaktiriti" |

[564,2]

tadetadasat | yato "mano"vijñānasya tadviṣayatvaṃ "śabdaviṣayatvamasiddhaṃ" | yasmā"nna hi svalakṣaṇa"śabdānāṃ "vṛttiriti nivedayiṣyāmaḥ" yadi bāhyortho "vikalpānāṃ na" hetuḥ kathantarhyutpadyanta iti |

[564,3]

āha | "te hī"tyādi | "te hi" vikalpā "yathā svami"ti yasya yo vāsanāprabodho hetuḥ | vijñānapratiṣṭhitatvenāntarāt | "vikalpavāsanāprabodhād bhavati | anapekṣito bāhyārthopanidhiḥ" sannidhānaṃ yairiti vigrahaḥ | kasmāt | "bāhye"tyādi | "apāyo" nirodhaḥ | "anāgamo"nutpattiḥ | bāhyasya nirodhe'nutpattau ca vikalpānā"mbhāvāt" | yataścārthamantareṇa bhavanti tasmānnārthahetavaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "na hi yo yasya sattopadhānaṃ" sattāsannidhānaṃ "nāpekṣate so"napekṣyamāṇa"stasya" nirapekṣasya "heturahetuśca" vikalpānāṃ "katha"mviṣayo naiva | yata evaṃ na śabdaviṣayo vikalpas"tasmānna manovikalpo"manoja"pā" dilakṣaṇaḥ"śabdavyaktiryato" yena | "tadvān" |
manojapavān puruṣaḥ | mantrasya "prayoktā syāt" | naiva syāditi yāvat |

[564,4]

śabdābhivyaktimabhyupagamyāpi doṣamāha | śabda"prasūtā tadviṣayā ca buddhiḥ śabdavyaktistadāśraya"stasyā vyakterāśrayo yataḥ puruṣastasmāt "prayokte"tyatrāpi"pakṣe uktaṃ" | kimuktaṃ | śro traprayoktṛtvaprasaṅga iti śrotāpi hi śabdaprasūtāyāstadviṣayāyā buddheḥ svasantānabhāvinyā āśrayastathā ca tasyāpi mantraphalena yogaḥ syāditi |

[565,1]

kiṃ ca nityānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nātiśayotpādanaṃ prayogaḥ kintu tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ prayogaḥ | "tasminna jñāne ca prayoge"bhyupamyamāne "śabdaḥ puruṣe vyāpriyate" | kathaṃ | "tasya" puruṣasya "jñānajananāt | na puruṣaḥ śabde" vyāpriyate | kasmāt | "tadātmani" nitye śabdātmani kathaṃcidapi puruṣeṇā"nupakārāt" kāraṇāt | atha ca "puruṣaḥ śabdānāṃ prayoktetyalaukikoyaṃ vyavahāraḥ" | loke hi yo yatra vyāpriyate sa tasya prayoktetyucyate |

[565,2]

"sarvathe"tyādinopasaṃhāraḥ | yadi sākṣācchabdaprasūtā buddhiḥ śabdabuddhiḥ | atha pāramparyeṇa | "sarvathā śabdasvabhāvānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ prayogāt" tadviṣayajñānajananāt"phalāvāptā"viṣyamāṇāyāṃ "vyartho manojapaḥ" | kiṅkāraṇam | manojapalakṣaṇasya"vikalpasya śabdasvarūpāsaṃsparśāt" |

[565,3]

yasyāpi samayāt phalantasyāpi kathammanojapo na vyartha ityāha | "sva"svabhāvaḥ śabdasvalakṣaṇamvikalpapratibhāsyākāraḥ "sāmānyasvabhāvanteṣāṃ" svasāmānyasvabhāvānāmekabhāvavivakṣayā | dṛśyavikalpayorekīkṛtya "samayakāraṇāmukte"rmantrapraṇayanāt manojapo vyarthaḥ syādityayama"virodhaḥ" | samayakārasyābhiprāyasampādanena phalaniṣpatteḥ | "na" tu "vastunya"virodhaḥ kintu virodha eva | tathā hi | śabdasvalakṣaṇād vastunaḥ phalāvāptau manojapo vyarthastasyāvastusaṃsparśāt |

[565,4]

"samaye"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | śabda"svalakṣaṇaṃ" śrotre"ndriyaviṣayaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇañca vikalpapratibhāsaṃ yathāvyavahāraṃ" lokavyavahārānatikrameṇa "saṃvṛtyā saṃkalayyeti"vikalpabuddhyā dṛśyavikalpayoḥ śabdasvalakṣaṇasāmānyākārayorekīkṛtya "samayamārocayet" | yo vācā manasā cābhilapanammatpraṇītasya mantrasyānutiṣṭhati tasyāyammantro "yathāsamayamarthanniṣpādayediti" | tato ya enaṃ mantramvācā manasā cābhilapati tasya "yathā"samayaṃ cārthaṃ "niṣpādayediti na manojapādau doṣaḥ" | ādigrahaṇādupāṃśuprayogādiparigrahaḥ | "vastusvabhāvāttu" śabdasvabhāvāt mantrāt "phalotpattā"viṣyamāṇāyāma"tatsvabhāvasaṃsparśe" sati manojapādau na phalaṃ "syā"t |

[566,1]

"yaduktamit"yādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate | yaduktam | "varṇṇā eva hi mantra" ityatrāntare |

[566,2]

"na varṇṇebhyonyā" kācidā"nupūrvīti" tatrocyate | "ānupūrvyāmasatyāṃ sara iti" pratītibhedalakṣaṇaḥ syāditi cet | yasmā"nna hi saro rasa ityādi padeṣu kaścidvarṇṇabhedaḥ" | ya eva hi varṇṇāḥ sara ityatra pade | ta eva rasa ityatra pade |

[566,3]

"na ca vyatiriktamanyat" padamasti "yataḥ kāryabhedo" buddhibhedalakṣaṇaḥ "syāt" | asti ca kāryasya bhedaḥ | yato "bhinnāñca tayo"ssaro rasa iti padayoḥ "pratibhāṃ" buddhimpaśyāmaḥ | "ānupūrvīmeva cātulyāṃ" bhinnāntayoḥ paśyāmo varṇṇāḥ punasta eva | "na ca kāraṇasya"
varṇṇasyā"bhede kāryabhedo" buddhibhedalakṣaṇo "yuktaḥ | tasmād" varṇṇābhedepyasti "bhedavatī"
pratipadambhinnā | "se"tyānupūrvī | "yataḥ" pratipadambhedavatyā ānupūrvyā ayaṃ sara ityādipadeṣu "pratītibhedo" buddhibhedaḥ |

[566,4]

"satya"miti si ddhā nta vā dī | satyaṃ pratipadambhedavatyastyānupūrvī | kevalaṃsānupūrvī "puruṣāśrayā" pauruṣeyī | avyatiriktaiva varṇṇebhyaḥ | varṇṇāśca pratipadamanye cānye cotpadyante kāraṇabhedāt | kevalanteṣu sādṛśyādekatvādhyavasāyo mandamatīnāṃ |

[567,1]

etadeva darśayannāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ | vaktṛsthena pūrvapūrvavarṇṇasamutthāpakacittenottarottaravarṇṇasamutthāpakaṃ cittañjanyata iti samutthāpakacittakramāt | tatsamutthāpyānāmvarṇṇānāmutpattikramaḥ kramotpannaiśca varṇṇaiḥ svaviṣayāṇi kramabhāvīnyeva śrotravijñānāni sākṣājjanyante | kramabhāvinya eva varṇṇālambanāḥ smṛtayaśca pāramparyeṇa | tato varṇṇānāṃ samutthāpakajñānakramād yā krame kāryatā |
svaviṣayajñāneṣu ca yā krameṇa kāraṇatā saivānupūrvīti vyavasthāpyata iti |

[567,2]

sampratyavapadārtho vibhajyate | yo dhvanirjāyata iti sambandhaḥ | yathā sara ityatra pade sakārāt paro'kāraḥ | kuto jāyate | "yadvarṇṇasamutthānajñānajājjñānataḥ" | pūrvakālabhāvī varṇṇaḥ sakāraḥ | yaścāsau varṇṇaśceti yadvarṇṇaḥ |
yadvarṇṇasya samutthānaṃ kāraṇaṃ samuttiṣṭhateneneti kṛtvā | yadvarṇṇasamutthānaṃ | yadvarṇṇasamutthānañca tajjñānaṃ ceti karmadhārayaḥ | tasmājjātaṃ yajjñānaṃ | tad yadvarṇṇasamutthānajñānajaṃ jñānaṃ | tasmājjñānato "jāyate" | sakārasya samutthāpakaṃ yajjñānantasmādakārasamutthāpakaṃ jñānaṃ yadutpannantenākāro janyata ityarthaḥ | evamanyopi pūrvapūrvavarṇṇasamutthānajñānajāduttarotaro varṇṇo jāyata iti yojyaṃ | evantāvad vaktṛsantānasthasya samutthānajñānasya kramād varṇṇānāṃ krameṇotpatteḥ kāryatvamuktaṃ | te ca krameṇotpannāḥ śrotṛsantānasthānāṃ svaviṣayajñānānāṃ krameṇa hetavo bhavanto jñāyanta iti darśayannāha | "tadupādhiri"tyādi | pūrvo varṇṇa upādhiviśeṣaṇaṃ yasyottarasya varṇṇasya sa tathoktaḥ | sa ityuttaro varṇṇaḥ "śrutyā" śrotrajñānena "samavasīyate" gṛhyate |

[567,3]

nanu ca pūrvo varṇṇa uttaravarṇṇakāle naivāsti | tatkathantadupādhir pūrva uttaro varṇṇo gṛhyata iti |

[567,4]

āha | "tajjñānajanitajñāna" iti | tena pūrvavarṇṇāviṣayeṇa jñānena janitaṃ svaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ |

[568,1]

etaduktambhavati | sakārālambanaṃ yadā śrotravijñānaṃ tasminnevakāle akārasamutthāpanacittenākāro janitastenākārassakārālambanaśca pratyayaḥ samānakālaḥ | tatra sākārālambanena śrotravijñānena sahakāriṇā'kāraḥ svaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayan pūrvavarṇṇopādhiḥ pratīyata ityucyata ityarthaḥ | tadevaṃ pūrvajñānena sahakāriṇā janitātmajñānaḥ | sa ityuttaro varṇṇaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ śravaṇakāle | "apaṭuśruti"rityatvaritaṃ śanaiḥ śanairuccārito yadā varṇṇo bhavati | tadā'paṭvī mandacāriṇī pravibhaktavarṇṇagrāhiṇī śrutiḥ śrotravijñānaṃ yasya śabdasyetyapaṭuśrutiḥ | yasyāmavasthāyāmvibhaktā varṇṇā avadhāryanta iti yāvat | ati tvaritantūccāryamāṇe vibhaktavarṇṇāparicchedāt kutaḥ krameṇa smṛtijananamityasya sandarśanārthaṃ | apaṭuśrutigrahaṇaṃ | sa evaṃbhūto varṇṇaḥ kiṃkārīti |

[568,2]

āha | "apekṣya tatsmṛtiṃ" pūrvavarṇṇasmṛtiṃ | "paścādādhatte" | janayati "smṛtimātmani" | svaviṣaye | pāramparyeṇeti draṣṭavyaṃ |

[568,3]

etena ca svaviṣayāṇi jñānāni prati varṇṇānāṃ krameṇa kāraṇatoktā | ityuktena krame"ṇaiṣā kāryakāraṇatā | varṇṇeṣvi"ti varṇṇādhārā varṇṇānāmiti yāvat | "pauruṣe"yepyevaṃ | puruṣakṛtaivā"nuparvīti" loke "kathyate" |

[568,4]

kimapekṣayā varṇṇānāṃ "kāryatā kāraṇatā" cetyāha | "taddhetugrāhicetasā"miti |
hetavaśca grāhīṇi ceti dvandvaḥ | teṣāmvarṇṇānāṃ hetugrāhīṇīti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ |
paścāccetaḥśabdena viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | varṇṇahetavaḥ krameṇa yadi cetāṃsi teṣāṃ sambandhena varṇṇānāṃ krameṇa kāryatā | taiścetobhirvarṇṇānāñjanyatvāt | teṣāṃ varṇṇānāṃ grāhīṇi yāni cetāṃsi | teṣāṃ sambandhena varṇṇānāṃ krameṇa kāraṇatā | varṇṇausteṣāmvarṇṇagrāhiṇāṃ cetasāṃ janyatvāt |

[568,5]

"citte"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "cittaṃ samutthānaṃ" kāraṇaṃ yasyā "vāgvijña"ptessā tathoktā | vāgeva vijñaptiḥ paravijñāpanāt | sā ca tridhā loka ityāha | "varṇṇe"
tyādi "varṇṇāḥ padaṃ vākyaṃ" cetyabhidhānaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ | tatrākṣarāṇi varṇṇāḥ |
arthāvacchinno varṇṇasamudāyaḥ padaṃ | padasamudāyo vākyaṃ | "tatre"tyādi sara ityatrapade yañca varṇṇāḥ sakārastasmāt paro akārastato rephastasmādakārastasmātparo visarjanīya iti | "tatra sakārasya samutthāpanaṃ" kāraṇaṃ yaccetaḥ | tena "cetasā samanantarapratyayena" | samanantaragrahaṇamālambanapratyayavyavacchedārthaṃ | "akārotthāpanacittaṃ" |
akāra utthāpyate "janyate" yena cetasā | tadutpādyate | "tathe"tyuktena krameṇa"rephākā" yaiścittaistāni "pūrvapūrvapratyayāni" | pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ cittaṃ pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | tatrākārasamutthāpanacetasā repha utpadyate | rephasamutthāpanacetasā samanantarapratyayenākāraḥ | akārasamutthāpanacetasā visarjanīya utpādyata iti |

[569,1]

nanu cedampadamuccārayāmīti vivakṣayā padamuccāryate | tenaikayaiva vivakṣayā varṇṇakrama uccāryate | na tu varṇṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ vivakṣāpūrvakatvamapratīteḥ | tatkathamucyate | sakārādisamutthāpakacittenākārādisamutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ janyata iti |

[569,2]

evammanyate | varṇṇoccāraṇe tāvadayameva kramaḥ | padoccāraṇepi prathamamayameva kramaḥ | tathā hi | sakāravivakṣayā sakāramuccārayatyevamuttarottaravarṇṇavivakṣayottarottaramvarṇṇamuccārayati | abhyāsāttu padoccāraṇe padavivakṣaivaikā kāraṇamityeke |

[569,3]

anye tvanyathā | padoccāraṇe | ekaivavivakṣā kāraṇamiti |

[569,4]

satyametat | kevalaṃ sakāroccāraṇakāle'vaśyaṃ cittaṃ vidyate'nyathā maraṇaprasaṅgāt | tadeva ca cittaṃ sakārasamutthāpakamucyate tadanantaraṃ sakārasyotpatteḥ |
evamuttarottaravarṇṇeṣu cittasamutthāpakatvaṃ draṣṭavyamiti | atra ca "sakārasamutthāpakacetasā samanantarapratyayenetyā" dinā granthenaikakarttṛka eva varṇṇakramorthapratītiheturna bhinnakarttṛka ityuktambhavati | tena yaducyate ma ṇḍa ne na |

[569,5]

"kāryakāraṇabhāvaścet kramastadgrāhicetasāṃ | taddheturātmabhedo vā vakttṛbhedepi dhīrbhavediti sphoṭasiddhiḥ 31"

[569,6]

tadapāstaṃ | bhinnakarttṛkavarṇṇagrāhicetasāmātmabhāvasyārthapratītihetutvānabhyupagamāt |

[569,7]

yaccāpyukta mama ṇḍa ne na | "atha samutthāpakacittakrameṇa varṇṇakramādarthapratītistathāpi sa ca kramo jñāpakatvājjñānamapekṣate | dṛśyate ca tirohitavyavahitavaktṛprayuktācchabdādarthajñānaṃ | na ca tatra samutthāpakacittakāryakāraṇatāṃ kaścana niścetumarhati | cakṣurekatve hi sā niścīyetāntareṇa śabdajñānāt | na ca tirohitavyavahitayorvakturekatve pramāṇamastī" ti |

[570,1]

tadayuktaṃ | yatastirohitavyavahitāvasthāyāmvakturekatvaṃ kaiścidavadhāryata eva |
tathā hi | devadatto māṃ śabdayati na yajñadatta iti loke pratītipūrvikaiva pravṛttirdṛśyate | yatra nāvadhāraṇaṃ na tatra pravṛttiritīṣṭasiddhireva |

[570,2]

api ca spho ṭa vā dinopi tirohitāvasthādau kathaṃ sphoṭābhivyaktirvyañjakānāṃ varṇṇānāmekakarttṛkatvānavadhāraṇāt | avaśyaṃ ca tatra sphoṭābhivyaktireṣṭavyā |
anyathārthāvagatirna syā diti kaiścidavadhāryata eva | yatkiñcidetat |

[570,3]

taditi tasmā"dime varṇṇā" anyānyahetava iti | anyadanyatsamutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ heturyeṣāmityarthaḥ | "svakāraṇāni" samutthāpakānyeva jñānāni teṣāmānupūrvī kramastasyā janma yeṣānte tathoktāḥ | kāraṇakramāt kramabhāvino varṇṇā ityarthaḥ |
iyatā ca |

[570,4]

yo yadvarṇṇasamutthānajñānajājjñāto dhvaniḥ | ityetadvyākhyātaṃ |

[570,5]

sa śrutyā samavasīyata ityetad vivṛṇvannāha | "śrutī"tyādi | "śrutikālepi"
śravaṇakālepi "yadā mandacāriṇa" iti yadā nātidrutamuccāryanta ityarthaḥ | "pūrvavarṇṇā"lambanaṃ jñānantadeva sahakāripratyayastamapekṣante ye varṇṇāste tathoktāḥ |

[570,6]

ta evaṃbhūtāḥ kiṃ kurvanti | "svajñānaṃ" svaviṣayaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ janayanti |
tathā hi | sakārālambanaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ yasminneva kāle tathaivākāropyakārasamutthāpanacetasā janitastenākāraḥ sakārālambanaṃ ca jñānamekakālantasmādakāraḥ sakārālambanajñānena sahakāriṇā svaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayati | evamanyeṣvapi varṇṇeṣvayaṃ nyāyo yojyaḥ |

[570,7]

"tade"ti yadā svaviṣayamanubhavajñānaṃ janitavantastadā "pūrvavarṇṇaviṣayaṃ yat smaraṇantadapekṣā eva smṛtimupalīyante" smṛtāvārohanti | yenaiva krameṇānubhūtāstenaiva krameṇa smaryanta ityarthaḥ | sa eṣo yugapadabhāvalakṣaṇo varṇṇānāṃ svabhāva iti sambandhaḥ |
kīdṛśa ityāha | "bhinne"tyādi | pūrvapūrvavijñānajanyatvād bhinnaḥ kāryabhāvaḥ |
uttarottarajñānasya hetutvād bhinnaḥ "kāraṇa"bhāvaśca yeṣāṃ sakārādisamutthāpakajñānānāntāni bhinnakāryakāraṇabhāvāni | tānyeva "pratyayā" hetavaḥ | tebhyo nirvṛttirutpattiḥ saiva "dharmo" lakṣaṇaṃ yasya svabhāvasyeti vigrahaḥ | etena taddhetucetāṃsyapekṣya varṇānāṃ kāryatvamuktaṃ |

[571,1]

tadgrāhicetāṃsyapekṣya kāraṇatvamāha | "bhinna"sya vijñānakāryasya nirvarttanaṃ"jananaṃ" sa eva "dharmo" lakṣaṇaṃ yasya svabhāvasyeti vigrahaḥ | "sa" evaṃbhūto "varṇṇasvabhāvaḥ puruṣasaṃskārabhedabhinnaḥ" puruṣaprayatnabhedabhinnaḥ "krama ityucyate" |

[571,2]

nanu kramo varṇṇānāṃ dharmastena kathaṃ sa evaṃbhūto varṇṇasvabhāvaḥ krama ityucyate |

[571,3]

evammanyate | na yugapadutpannānāṃ kramostyapratīteḥ | tasmād yugapadutpannānāmeva varṇṇānāṃ kramaḥ | ayugapadutpannāśced varṇṇā iṣyante ta eva loke kramo na varṇṇebhyorthāntarabhūtosāvapratīteḥ | nāpi teṣāṃ krama eko dharmo'sahabhāvāt |
nāpi pratyekaṃ dharmaḥ kramopratīteḥ | tasmādayugapadutpannā eva varṇṇāḥ krama ityucyate ityuktaṃ | kevalameṣāṃ krama iti kalpitoyaṃ vyavahāraḥ | na ca ya eva sara iti pade kramo loke pratīyate sa eva rasa iti pade | nāpi kramavyatiriktaṃ pūrvāparavarṇṇānāṃ svarūpaṃ | tasmāt pratipadaṃ varṇṇānāmanyadeva svarūpaṃ | lokaśca sara iti padād rasapadasyānyatvamavadhārayatyeva |

[571,4]

tena yaducyate ma ṇḍa "ne" na |

[571,5]

"utpattivādino varṇṇāḥ kāmante santu bhedinaḥ | na tvasādhāraṇasteṣāmbhedorthajñānakāraṇaṃ | sphoṭasiddhiḥ 30"

[571,6]

tasyānavadhāraṇāt saṃketakāle cādṛṣṭatvāditi |

[571,7]

tadapāstaṃ | yatassara iti varṇṇakramād rasa iti varṇṇakramo bhinna evāvadhāryate |
nāpikramavyatirekeṇa varṇṇāḥ pratibhāsante | tasmāt kramabhedāvadhāraṇameva varṇṇabhedāvadhāraṇaṃ | kevalaṃ rasapadād rasapadāntarasya bhedaḥ sādṛśyānnāvadhāryate |
ata eva saṃketakāle dṛṣṭatvāt rasapadārthapratipādakaṃ yuktam | evamanyasyāpi padasyeti yatkiñcidetat |

[571,8]

etadeva darśayannāha | "anyadeve"tyādi | yato "varṇṇānāṃ" svabhāvo yathoktaḥ krama ityucyate tataḥ kāraṇāt | "tadi"ti sādṛśyādekatvenādhyavasitamapi "rūpam"varṇṇānāmanyadeva "padaṃ padaṃ" pratipadaṃ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "karttṛsaṃskārato bhinnaṃ" yataḥ |
samutthāpakacittameva karttṛ tasya śaktibhedād bhinnaṃ | "sahitamiti" pūrvottarakrameṇoccāritaṃ | "kāryabhedakṛ"diti | buddhibhedaṃ karoti |

[572,1]

na ca "varṇṇā nirarthakāssanta" iti 1 | 241 pūrvameva pratipāditaṃ |
tatkathamvarṇṇasvarūpaṃ sahitaṃ kāryabhedakṛdityucyate |

[572,2]

atraike manyante | pratipadamvarṇṇānāṃ svarūpambhinnaṃ pauruṣeyamvācaka | nāpauruṣeyamiti | yadāha | satyam | asti sā kintu puruṣāśrayeti |

[572,3]

tadayuktam | varṇṇānāṃ sahitāsahitānāmarthāpratipādakatvāt | tasmādayamabhiprāyaḥ | yadi paramārthato varṇṇakramaḥ syāt tadāsāvekapadādirūpatayā kalpitorthasya pratipādakaḥ syāt | yataścaikena vikalpena viṣayīkṛtāḥ kramiṇo varṇṇāḥ pratipādakā ata evaikavikalpāvabhāsitvāt | kramiṇāmvarṇṇānāṃ rūpaṃ sahitaṃ kāryabhedakṛdityucyate ityadoṣaḥ | yataśca samutthāpakabhedād bhedaḥ | "tasmānna khalveka eva svabhāvo varṇṇānāṃ" saro rasa ityādipadeṣu | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | karttṛcittasaṃskārabhedena bhedāt | karttṛ ca taccittajñātasya saṃskārabhedaḥ samanantarapratyayabhedena śaktibhedastena varṇṇānāṃ svabhāvasya bhedāt | sa ca varṇṇānāmpratipadambhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kramarūpa ekavikalpārūḍhatvāt | parasparasahitaḥ kāryabhevasyārthaviṣayabuddhibhedasya hetuḥ |

[572,4]

yā caivaṃ kāryakāraṇatā lakṣaṇānupūrvī sā cānupūrvī varṇṇānāṃ pravṛttetyutpannā"racanākṛtaḥ" puruṣāt | racanāṃ karotīti "racanākṛt" tasmāt | kasmādityāha | "icchetyādi" | puruṣecchayā yeṣāṃ varṇṇānāmaviruddhā siddhisteṣāṃ sthitasya kramasya virodhataḥ |

[572,5]

"kārye"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "kāryakāraṇabhūtāśca te pratyayāśceti vigrahaḥ" |
varṇṇasamutthāpakacittānyevamucyante | tāni hi pūrvavijñānāpekṣayā kāryabhūtānyuttaravijñānāpekṣayā kāraṇabhūtāni | tebhya "utpannaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣa ānupūrvītyuktaṃ |
sā cā"nupūrvī puruṣasya yau vitarkavicārau "tatkṛteti kṛtvānasthitakramā" varṇṇāḥ |
kimidamidaṃ veti vimarśākāro vikalpo vitarkkaḥ | idameveti niścayākāro vicāraḥ | kasmānna sthitakramā | icchetyādi | icchayā aviruddhā siddhiryasya"kramasya sa icchā'viruddhasiddhiḥ" | icchāviruddhasiddhiḥ kramo yeṣānte tathoktāḥ | tadbhāvastasmāt | tathā hi | yathecchamvarṇṇānāṃ kramo vyavasthāpyate | kimiva | "karmaviśeṣānukramavat" | yathā karmaviśeṣāṇāmākuñcanādīnāmicchā vyavasthiteḥ kramastadvat |

[573,1]

"na hī"tyādinā vaidharmyamāha | "deśakālayo"riti deśesthita... ... ... ..."maracanā śakyate karttuṃ na"
hī ti sambandhaḥ | na hi hi ma va tsthāne vi ndhyo bhavatu ma la ya sthāne vindhyādi rityevaṃ pūrvamaṅakuro bhavatu paścād bījāttajjanakamiti puruṣecchayā śakyate viparyāsaḥ kartu | varṇṇāstu śakyante yathecchaṃ viparyāsayituṃ | "tasmānna" vyavasthitakramā varṇṇāḥ | tata e va... ... ... ... ... ...ryakāraṇabhūte "vikalpānukrame sati" varṇṇakramasya bhāvādasati ca vikalpānukrame varṇṇakramasyā"bhāvāt" | laukikavākyeṣu "puṃsāmvarṇakramasya ca kāryakāraṇatāsiddhiḥ" | puruṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ varṇṇānukramaḥ kāryaḥ | tataḥ kāryakāraṇatāsiddheḥ kāraṇādanyopi vaidikaḥ "sarvo varṇṇa"... ... ... ... ... ... ti sarvo "dahana indhana"pūrvaka eveti "yukti"sta"dvat" |

[573,2]

"satī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "satīndhane dāhavṛtte" dahyateneneti dāho dahana evoktaḥ | "asatī"ndhane dahanasyā"bhāvāt" | kvacid dahanendhanayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau satyā"madṛṣṭendhanopi" yasyāpi dahanasyendhanaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ sāpi ... ... ... ... ... ...t | tadā "tasya" dahanasyāheto"rdeśaniyamasya kālaniyamasyāyogāt | " sarvatra sarvadā bhāvaḥ syāt | atha niyamenaivakvaciddeśādau bhavatītīṣyate | tadā deśādiniyame ca dahanasyeṣyamāṇe "tasyaiva" deśāde"rindhanatvāt" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "dahane"tyādi | dahanasyopādānaṃ ka ... ... ... ... ... ... napekṣatve deśakālaniyamāyogā"stathāyamapi varṇṇakramo" hetubhūtaṃ "puruṣapraya"tnaṃ "yadi nāpekṣeta | tadā nirālambo" nirāśrayaḥ puruṣaprayatnānapekṣaḥ "svayaṃ prakāśeta" varṇṇakramamuccārayāmītyevampuruṣasya "prayatnepi na śakyeta" varṇṇakramaḥ prakāśayituṃ | kasmād | ata tpra... ... ... ... ... ... krame puruṣasya śaktistadā "kvacicchaktā"viṣyamāṇāyāṃ "sarvo" vaidikopi varṇṇakramas"tathā syāt" pauruṣeyaḥ syāt |
kasmāt | laukikavaidikavarṇṇānukramayo"rviśeṣābhāvāt" | viṣādyapanayanādilakṣaṇasya viśeṣasya laukikeṣvapi dṛṣṭeḥ |

[574,1]

kiñca "tadbhāvabhāvinaḥ" puruṣa... ... ...dyapanayanādinā laukikavarṇṇakramā"daviśiṣṭasya ca" vaidikavarṇṇakramasyā"tatkṛtau" prakarṣeṇa kṛtau | "sarvatre"ti yatrāpi puruṣakṛtatvamiṣṭantatrāpi "kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca nirākṛtaḥ syāt" | kasmād | "anvayetyādi" | tadbhāve bhāvonvayaḥ | tadabhāve'bhāvo "vya ti re kaḥ" | "tallakṣaṇatvāttasyeti" kārya... ... ... ... ... ...kāryatā neṣyate | tadā tadbhāvabhāvitvavyatiriktaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya "lakṣaṇāntaramvācyaṃ" | yadvirahād vaidikānāṃ puruṣaprayatnena saha kāryakāraṇabhāvo na syāt | na cānyallakṣaṇaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāsti |

[574,2]

atha tulyeṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇe laukiko varṇṇakramaḥ kṛtrima iṣṭo the... ... ... ...ḥ "prasaja"nti | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tatrāpi" ghaṭādiṣ"vevaṃ kalpanāyā" vaidikaśabdakramavat kalpanāyāḥ "sambhavāt" | yathā puruṣavyāpāreṇa sa eva vaidikaḥ kramo vyajyata iti kalpanā | tathā ghaṭādayopīti | "viśeṣābhāvācca" | na hi puruṣavyāpārānuvidhāyitvena ghaṭādeḥ sakāśā... ... ... ... ... ... stasya viśeṣa iti cedāha | "tāni"tyādi | "tānapi" ghaṭādīn paraiḥ pūrvakaiḥ kulālādibhirghaṭādīnāṃ racanā | tasyā"darśanaṃ pūrvameva" | tān dṛṣṭavaiveti yāvat | "anyaḥ" pāścātyopi kulālādiḥ "karoti" |
nānupadeśaṃ | paropadeśapūrvikā ca yeṣāṃ pratipattisteṣāmapauruṣeyatve ... ... ... ... ...vai dikaḥ kramaḥ kartturasmaraṇādapauruṣeya iṣṭaḥ | "evantarhi" ghaṭādayopya"viditakarttāraśca keci"t | bahutarakālācchannadeśe ghaṭādayo dṛśyante | na ca teṣāṃ karttā smaryate | tasmāt tulye puruṣavyāpārānuvidhāne yadyapauruṣeyo vaidikakramastadā sarveṣāṃ ghaṭādīnāmakri... ... ... ... ... ...yathā vā kartturasmaraṇād vaidikakramasyākriyā | evaṃ "keṣāṃcit" kadācit ghaṭādīnāmasmaryamāṇakarttṛkāṇā"makriyābhiniveśostu" | na caivaṃ | "tasmā"nna caiveyaṃ laukikī vaidikī"ca varṇṇānupūrvī" puruṣakṛteti sambandhaḥ | kasmāditi | āha | "prasiddhe"tyādi | "prasiddhiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo"... ... ... ... ... ...viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | teṣāṃ "dharmaḥ" svakāraṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhānantasyā"natikramāt" |

[575,1]

yata eva pauruṣeyā mantrās"tata eva" prākṛtebhyaḥ puruṣebhyo "sādhāraṇatā" viśiṣṭatā"siddhā" | keṣāṃ | mantrākhya"kramakāriṇāṃ puṃsāṃ" | maṃtrasaṃjñitamvarṇṇakramaṃ kurvanti ye | teṣāṃ kenā ... ... ... ... ... ...masya parijñānaṃ | samīhitārthasampādanśaktiḥ "prabhāvaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇam | anyebhyosādhāraṇatetyāha | "anyeṣāṃ" prākṛtādīnāṃ puruṣāṇāntayoḥ | jñānaprabhāvayora"bhāvataḥ" |

[575,2]

"ayamit"yādinā vyācaṣṭe | "varṇṇānāmayaṃ kramo viṣanirghātādisamartho nānya inyevaṃ"vibhāgena "yadyanyopi" prākṛtapuruṣo "jānīyāt tadā" tamvarṇṇakrama"ntathaiva" vibhāgenaiva "pratipādyetā"nutiṣṭhet | "na caivaṃ" pratipadyate | "tasmādayaṃ" mantrākhyo varṇṇā"nukramaḥ svabhāvato" yadi nāma "kāryakṛda"bhyupagato mī māṃ sa kai stathāpi "kaścide"va puruṣairatīndriyaśaktibhedayukto "vijñāta iti" kṛtvāsti "parokṣārthadarśī puruṣo" yo mantrantatsāmarthyantadanuṣṭhānañca vetti |

[576,1]

yadyapi satyatapaḥprabhāvavatāṃ samīhitārthasādhanaṃ vacanaṃ mantra ityuktaṃ |
tathāpyabhyupagamyocyate | "svabhāvatopi" kāryakṛnmantra iti | kāryakṛnmantrakaraṇena vā mantraphalaśaktijñānena vā puruṣātiśaya ityuktambhavati | anumānāt mantrāmantraparijñānāt parokṣadarśino'bhāva ityatrāha | "na hī"tyādi | "ayamarthaḥ" | varṇṇānukramalakṣaṇo viṣādyapanayane "samartho"'yantu varṇṇānukramo na samartha "iti" |
evaṃ "na hi śakyaṃ" liṅgāt "pratyetuṃ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | mantrāmantravibhāgenā"saṃkīrṇṇasya liṅgaviśeṣasyāsiddheḥ" |

[576,2]

nanu ca varṇṇarūpayormantrāmantrayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe phaladānaśaṃktirapi tadavyatirekāt pratyakṣagṛhītaiveti |

[576,3]

ata āha | "pratyakṣayo"rityādi | "anupadiṣṭayo"rityayaṃ mantro nāyammantra ityevamakathitayo"raparijñānāt" | ayamviṣādyapanayane śakto'yamaśakta ityevamaniścayāt | "upadeśepī"ti | yadi nāma kenacidupadiṣṭambhavatyayaṃ mantra evaṃkāryakārīti | tathāpi kathaṃcit "kenacidapyākāreṇa" mantrasya yaḥ "svabhāvaviveka"stasyā"pratītera"niścayāt | upadeśasyāprāmāṇyāt | "anyatra kāryasamvādāt" |
mantrasādhyakāryaprāptyā tvayammantra iti niścayaḥ syāt | "tasya ca" mantrasya sādhyasya"kāryasya" karaṇāt "prāgi"ti mantrānuṣṭhāt prāg "draṣṭumaśakyatvāt" | tadānīntasya satvāditi bhāvaḥ | na cāniścitasya mantrasyānuṣṭhānaṃ sambhavati | tasmādavaśyaṃ mī māṃ sa kenātīndriyārthadarśī puruṣobhyupagantavyo yo mantrāmantrasvabhāvaṃ vivecayati | anyathā mantrānuṣṭhānaṃ na syāt |

[576,4]

"na cāyam"mantrākhyo varṇṇa"kramaḥ svabhāvato" viṣādyapanayanādeḥ "kārakaḥ" kintupuruṣasamayāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "kasyaci"nmantrānuṣṭhāyinaḥ puruṣasyāśumantrasiddheḥ"anyasya" tattulyamantrakriyānuṣṭhāyinaḥ "cirāt siddheḥ" | svato hi phaladāne'yaṃ kālabhedo na yujyate mantrasya kenacidutkarṣānutkarṣākaraṇāt | "anyasya" puruṣasya mantrāt phalaniṣpattau "vratacaryādyapekṣaṇānna" svabhāvato mantraḥ kārakaḥ | vrataṃ mantrakalpavihito niyamastasya caraṇamanuṣṭhānaṃ | apiśabdāddhomādiparigrahaḥ | svabhāvato hi phaladāne | kiṃ vratacaryādyanuṣṭhānenāpekṣitena | tatotiśayānutpatteḥ | "tathaikasmādapi" mantraviṣayājjapahomādi"karmmaṇaḥ" sakāśāt "kayościt" puruṣayostulyaṃ vidhimanutiṣṭhatorapyekasyā"rtha"darśanādanyasy"ānarthadarśanā"nna svabhāvataḥ phalaṃ | svabhāvatastu phaladāne tulyorthayogaḥ syāt | "vahatāmapī"ti | viṣādyapanayanaṃ kurvatāmapi "mantrāṇāṃ" punaḥ kālāntare tenaiva puruṣeṇa prayuktānāṃ "kasyacit" kāryasya "visamvādā"dakaraṇāt | "na hyayaṃ prakāro" vastu"svabhāve yuktaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "svabhāvasya sarvatra" puruṣādau "tulyatvāt" | yo hi yasya svabhāvo na sa kañcidapekṣya svabhāvo bhavati | yadā tu puruṣakṛtāt samayāt phalamiṣyate tadāyamadoṣaḥ | tathā hi | "puruṣastu" mantrasamayasya karttā | "svecchāvṛtti"riti kṛtvā "kaṃcit" puruṣama"nugṛhṇāti nāparamiti yuktaṃ" | kena kāraṇena | "sattvasabhāgatāviśeṣāt" | mantrakriyānuṣṭhātuḥ sattvasya mantrapraṇetrā saha sabhāgatā tulyaśīlācārādinā | ādiśabdādupapradānādiparigrahaḥ | tadvaśāttadanurāgāt | "sevāviśeṣādvā" | japahomādinā devatārādhanaṃ sevāviśeṣastasmādvā | "kañcidanugṛhṇāti" puruṣaṃ | "nāparaṃ" sattvasabhāgatādirahitaṃ |

[577,1]

"vrate"tyādinā paramāśaṃkate | niyamasyānuṣṭhānaṃ "vratacaryā" | vratacaryā ca vratacaryā"bhraṅaśa"śceti virūpaikaśeṣaḥ | "ādi"śabdaḥ pratyekamabhisambadhyate | vratacaryādinā vratacaryābhraṃśādinā cetyarthaḥ | vratacaryādinā "dharmo"pacaye sati siddhiriti sambandhaḥ | tathā "prakṛtyā" svabhāvena "dharmā"tmano vā puṃsaḥ "siddhiḥ" | vratacaryābhraṅśādinā tvadharmopacaye sati | "adharmā"tmano vā prā"kṛtyā" puruṣasyā"siddhi"riti vākyārtho yojyaḥ | svabhāvatopi mantrāt phalaniṣpattau yathoktena prakāreṇa "siddh"yasiddhibhedo bhaviṣyatīti paro manyate |

[578,1]

"netyā"dinā pratiṣedhati | na dharmāpekṣāt mantrāt phalasiddhiḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "dharmaviruddhānamapi" mantrasiddhihetūnāṃ vratānāṃ "ḍā ki nī bha gi nī tantrādiṣu darśanāt" | ḍā ki nī tantre | caturbhaginītantre | ādiśabdāt | cauryahetuṣu kambuki nī tantrādiṣu darśanāt | kāni punastāni dharmaviruddhānītyāha | krauryetyādi | "kraurya" prāṇibadhaḥ | "steyaṃ" cauryaṃ | "dvīṃ"driyasamāpatti"rmaithunaṃ | "hīnakarma" mārjārāśucidhūmapradānādi | ādiśabdādanyasyāpi dharmaviruddhasya grahaṇaṃ | tāni krauryādīni "bahulāni" bhūyāṃsi yeṣāṃ bratānāntāni tathoktāni | "taiśca" tathoktairvratairmantra"siddhiviśeṣāt" | tathā hi | ḍā ki nī tantre samayavyavasthā | yadā prāṇinaṃ hatvā khādati tadā mantrasiddhimāsādayati | tathā kambu ki nī tantre steyācara ṇāt siddhiruktā | tathā maithunācaraṇāt siddhipradā kāciddevateti bhaginītantrāntare kvacit samayaḥ |

[578,2]

krauryādyeva dharmo bhaviṣyatīti ced |

[578,3]

āha | "na ce"tyādi | "evamvidho" krauryādilakṣaṇo "dharmasvabhāva iti yathāvasaraṃ" paścā"nnivedayiṣyāmaḥ" | evantāvadadharmādapi siddhirdṛṣṭā |

[578,4]

dharmādapi siddhirna dṛṣṭetyāha | "maitrī"tyādi | satvānāṃ hitasukhacintanammai trī | "śau caṃ" dvividhaṃ | bāhyamāntarañca | bāhyaṃ snānādi | āntaraṃ steyādinivṛttiḥ | dānādinā parānugraho dharmaḥ | maitrīśaucadharmāḥ pare pradānāni yeṣānte tathoktāḥ | tathābhūtānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ | "tannimittameva" maitryādikameva "nimittaṃ" kṛtvā"kasyāścit siddhe"riti maitrī"viparyayeṇa" yā labhyā tasyā "asiddheḥ | viparyayeṇa ca"
dveṣādinā punaḥ "siddheḥ" | na dharmopacayāpekṣāt mantrāt phalasiddhiriti | dveṣādisamutthitopi krauryādirmantravidhānenānuṣṭhitassan dharma eveti |

[578,5]

ata āha | "na ce"tyādi | ekarūpāddhi sādilakṣaṇāt "karmaṇaḥ" sakāśāt"sa tadvirodhya"dharmavirodhī "dharmo yuktaḥ" | adharmaśceti mantravidhānādanyatra tata eva hiṃsādeḥ sakāśādadharmaśca "na yuktaḥ" | na hyadharmahetordharmo bhavati virodhāt | tathā hi | yenaiva dveṣādyāśayena mantravidhānādanyatra hiṃsādikurvato'dharmo bhavati | tenaivāśayena mantravidhānānuṣṭhānepi hiṃsādikaṃ kriyata iti kathantasya dharmāṅgatvamiti |

[579,1]

yadi dveṣādikṛtatvānmantravidhānenānuṣṭhitopi krauryādiradharma eva "kathamidānīmadharmātmano vratāderi"ti pūrvoktāt | krauryādilakṣaṇād vratāṃt | ādiśabdādanyasmānnihīnādaśucidhūpadānādilakṣaṇāt | "dharma"sya "phalami"ṣṭasambhogādilakṣaṇaṃ"kathamaśnute" bhajate jāpī |

[579,2]

"ne"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | "na caitasyā"dharmātmano "vratādestadiṣṭaṃ phalamvipākaḥ" karmaphalaṃ | "kintu pūrvakṛtasya" śubhasya karmaṇo vipākaḥ | kimvaditi |
āha | "brahmahatyā"yā "ādeśa"stasy"ānuṣṭhānāt" sampādanāt | "grāmapratilambhavat" |
yathā kaścit kañcit puruṣaṃ niyuṃkte | mārayemaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ahante grāmandāsyāmīti |
sa tasyādeśasyānuṣṭhānād grāmaṃ pratilabhate | na ca tad brahmahatyāyā phalaṃ | kintu tadbrahmahatyācaraṇenārādhitaṃ puruṣaṃ sahakāriṇaṃ prāpya pūrvakaṃ śubhameva karma tathā phalati |

[579,3]

adharmātmanastarhi tasya vratasya kiṃphalamityāha | "tasya tu" krauryādilakṣaṇasyā"dharmātmano vratasyāgāmi" bhaviṣyajjanbhabhāvi phalamiṣṭaṃ narakādi |

[579,4]

yadi śubhasya karmaṇa iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ ki"ntenā"dharmātmanā "mantrādiprayogeṇā"pekṣiteneti ced |

[579,5]

āha | sa tvadharmātmā | ḍā ki nī "mantrādiprayogaḥ" | ādiśabdāt krauryādivrataprayogaḥ | "tasyeṣṭaphalasya" śubhasya "karmaṇaḥ" | iṣṭamphalaṃ yasya karmaṇa iti vigrahaḥ | "kathañcit" kenacit "prakāreṇopakārāt pācakaḥ" phalasya dāyakaḥ |

[579,6]

kathaṃ punaḥ kuśalasyākuśalamupakārakambhavatīti |

[579,7]

āha | "citratvādupakāraśakteḥ" | sahakāribhāvo hi citraḥ | kadācit kuśalasyākuśalaṃ sahakāri | akuśalasyāpi kuśalaṃ | yathātyarthamudārakuśalakāriṇo na narakādiduḥkhaphalamaśubhaṃ karma kuśalaṃ sahakāri prāpyehaiva janmani | vyādhyādiduḥkhamātraṃ datvā kṣīyate | adharmātmako mantrādiprayogaḥ | kathaṃcidiṣṭaphalasya karmaṇa upakāraka ityuktaṃ |

[579,8]

yatra yena prakāreṇopakārastandarśayannāha | "puruṣaviśeṣo" mantrasya praṇetā saevāśrayastena vipākaḥ phaladānaṃ sa eva dharmaḥ svabhāvo yasya sa puruṣā"śrayavipākadharmā | dharma" iti puṇyaviśeṣaḥ | teneti puruṣeṇa "kṛtaḥ" pūrvajanmani | "sa tathā tadārādhane"neti | sa dharmastathā krauryādyācaraṇāt | tadārādhanena mantrapraṇetṛpuruṣārādhanena phalatīti |

[580,1]

etadeva spaṣṭayannāha | "tadi"tyādi | tena mantrapraṇetrā puruṣeṇa vihitā kroryayuktavratādiprayogaste"nopakāraḥ" | karmaṇaḥ paripoṣaḥ | tena vipākaḥ phaladānaṃ dharmaḥ svabhāvo yasya tasyaivaṃdharmaṇaḥ | "tatphala"syeti | iṣṭaphalasya "karmaṇaḥ kṛtatvāt"
kāraṇāt | tadārādhanena phalatīti |

[580,2]

vināpi mantrapraṇetrā puruveṇa tadupakārāt | tasyaiva yantrasya kevalasya japādinā vyāpāreṇopakārānmantrātphalamiti ceta | tataśca puruṣārādhanena phalatīti yaduktantadayuktamiti paro manyate |

[580,3]

"ne"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | "naitadevaṃ" | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | puruṣetyādi | mantrapraṇetuḥ"puruṣasyākāro" varṇṇasaṃsthānādiḥ | "svabhāvaḥ" śāntarodrādiḥ | "caryā" kāyavāgvyāpāralakṣaṇā ceṣṭā | teṣāmākārādīnāmadhi"mokṣo"'dhimuktistasyā "vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt" |
mantrasyādhiṣṭhātā puruṣaścennāsti | kimarthantasyākārādīnadhimucyet | atheṣyate tasyāpi puruṣasyo"pakārakatvantadā" tasyāpi mantrapraṇetuḥ puruṣasya mantrāt phalasiddhiṃ pratyupakārakatve'ṅgīkriyamāṇe siddhaḥ puruṣaviśeṣosādhāraṇaguṇaḥ | asādhāraṇā guṇā asyeti vigrahaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tadadhimuktereva" puruṣaviśeṣākārasvabhāvacaryādhimuktereva viṣakarmādikaraṇāt | tasmānna mantrāḥ puruṣapraṇītā api tadupayoganirapekṣāḥ puruṣaviśeṣopayoganirapekṣāḥ svabhāvena prakṛtyaiva phaladāḥ | kintu puruṣaviśeṣopayogasāpekṣā eva |

[580,4]

yadyasādhāraṇaguṇa eva puruṣo mantrasya praṇetā | kathaṃ prabhāvādiviśeṣarahitā api tantravido mantrān bhāṣanta iti |

[581,1]

ata āha | "yepī"tyādi | mantrapratibaddhāni śāstrāṇi tantrāṇi tāni"vidantīti te tantravidaḥ kecida"dyatvepi "mantrā"napūrvān "kāṃścana kurvate" | tanna "teṣāṃ"
kevalānāmasāmarthyaṃ | kintu yat tantramāśritāste tasya tantrasya praṇetā yaḥ puruṣā"tiśayastasya prabhoḥ" svāminaḥ sa "prabhāvaḥ" sāmarthyaṃ | kasmāt | "taduktanyāyavṛttitaḥ" |
tasmāt prabhuṇā yastebhyassamayādiko nyāya upadiṣṭastasyānuvarttanāt | prabhustuṣṭastatpraṇītānapi mantrānadhitiṣṭhatīti bhāvaḥ |

[581,2]

"rathyāpuruṣe"tyādinā pūrvapakṣopanyāsapūrvakaṃ kārikārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe | "rathyāpuruṣā apī"ti sāmānyapuruṣā api "kecana" gāruḍikaprabhṛtayo mantralakṣaṇa"tantrajñāḥ kiñcid"
viṣādiśamanalakṣaṇaṃ "karma kurvanti" | na ca te viśiṣṭāḥ surāpānādyanuṣṭhānāt | "tathānyo"pīti prabhāvavattvenābhimato "mantrasya praṇetā'natiśayaśca syāt" | rathyāpuruṣavadatiśayarahitaśca syāt mantrāṇāṃ ca kartteti | tathā ca prabhāvavān puruṣo na sidhyatīti manyate |

[581,3]

netyādinā pariharati | na prabhāvarahitānāṃ mantrakaraṇaṃ | ye tu rathyāpuruṣā api mantrān kurvanti "teṣāṃ" puruṣāṇāṃ "prabhāvavataiva" tantrasya praṇetrā"dhiṣṭhānāt" mantrakaraṇasāmarthyaṃ |

[581,4]

etadeva darśayannāha | "tatkṛtaṃ hī"tyādi | tena prabhāvātiśayavatā puruṣeṇa"kṛtasamayamanupālayanto" rakṣantaḥ | "tadupadeśena ce"ti prabhāvayuktapuruṣopadeśena ca"vartamānā" mantrakriyāsamarthāḥ kuta etat |

[581,5]

"ta"dityādi tasya prabhāvato yassa"mayaḥ" | yaśco"padeśa"statra "nirapekṣāṇāṃ" puṃsāṃ mantraracanāyā"masāmarthyāt" | tatra samayo yasyātikramāt punarmaṇḍalapraveśādiḥ karttavyo jāyate | tatonyadvidhānāmupadeśa ityanayorbhedaḥ | "tatrāpī"ti rathyāpuruṣakṛteṣvapi"mantreṣu tadākāradhyānādeva" | prabhāvavataḥ | puṃsaścākāradhyānādereva |
ādiśabdāt svabhāvacaryādhyānasya parigrahaḥ | tena mantrasya "prayogāt" pravarttanāt | "yata evantasmāttadadhiṣṭhānameva" prabhāvavatpuruṣādhiṣṭhānameva "tattādṛśamunneyaṃ" boddhavyaṃ | "yatte svayaṃkṛ"tairmantraiḥ karma kurvantīti |

[582,1]

"api ca" | kecit tantrajñā mantraṃ kurvantītyabhidadhatā "puruṣātiśaya eva samarthitaḥ syāt" | yasmāt sopi "tādṛśas"tantrajño mantrasya karttā "prabhāvavāneva | tadanyai"ratantrajñaiḥ puruṣai"rasādhāraṇaśaktitvādi"ti kṛtvā | yataśca puruṣādhiṣṭhitānāmeva mantrāṇāṃ phalaṃ | tasmāt "kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāśca" phaladā ityeva"mmantrā vācyāḥ phalepsunā" |
mantrād phalamicchatā na nityā mantrāḥ kintu kṛtakāḥ kṛtakatvepi na phaladāne puruṣanirapekṣā ityarthadvayamādarśayituṃ kṛtakāḥ pauruṣeyāśceti dvayopādānaṃ |

[582,2]

"na hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | na hi nityānāmvaidikānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ "prayoga" uccāraṇaṃ"sambhavatya"nādheyātiśayatvāt | na cā"prayuktebhyo" mantrebhyaḥ "phalami"ti kṛtvā "prayogāt phalamicchatā kṛtakā mantrā vācyāḥ | pauruṣeyāśca" | puruṣādhiṣṭhitāśca phaladā vācyāḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "puruṣādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa" vinānyato bhāvaśaktyāde"rasambhavatphalānā"mmantrāṇāṃ puruṣādhiṣṭhānādeva "phaladarśanāt" | yathā ca na bhāvaśaktyā mantrebhyaḥ phalotpattistathā pratipāditaṃ |

[582,3]

"sarvasya sādhanante syurbhāvaśaktiryadīdṛśī" tyādinā 1 | 297 |

[582,4]

nidarśanaṃ cāha | yo madīyaṃ kāvyādyevaṃ paṭhiṣyati tasya mayāyamarthaḥ sampādanīya ityevaṃ"kṛtaḥ samayo" yasmin "kāvyā"dau ādiśabdācchilpasthānādau | sa kṛtasamayaḥ kāvyādiḥ tasminniva tadvat | yathā tatra kāvyādipāṭhakānāṃ puruṣādhiṣṭhānāt phalantadvanmantreṣvapītyarthaḥ | "puṃsāma"tīndriyārthadarśanaṃ prati "śakti"rnāstītyevamaśaktisādhanamasāmarthyasya "sādhanaṃ" yannāma kiñcit mī māṃ sa kai rucyate tatsarva"manenaiva"
mantrakāriṇāṃ jñānaprabhāvātiśayasādhanena "nirākṛtaṃ" |

[582,5]

"pratipāditā hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "pratipāditā hi puruṣakṛtā mantrāstadadhiṣṭhānācca phaladā" mantrā ityetadapi pratipāditaṃ |

[582,6]

na ca sarve puruṣā mantrān karttumadhiṣṭhātuṃ vā śaktāḥ | "tadi"ti tasmā"dasti kaścidatiśayavān" puruṣo mantrasya kartte"ti | tasyā"tiśayavataḥ puṃsaḥ "pratikṣepasādhanānyapi" pratikṣiptāni | etena ca paroktasyātiśayapratikṣepasādhanasya na viruddhāvyabhicāritvamudbhāvyate | kintarhi puruṣātiśayapratikṣepasādhanāni vastubalāyātāni na santyevetyanena vyājena kathyate | na hi vastubalāyātaṃ puruṣātiśayaṃ nirākarttṛ kiṃcit sādhanamasti |

[583,1]

nanu cedamasti vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo nātiśayavān buddhimattvāt | indriyavatvāt |
vacanāt puṃstvāt | rathyāpuruṣavaditi |

[583,2]

ata āha | "buddhī"ndriyetyādi | buddhiścendriyaṃ ca "ukti"śca "puṃstvaṃ" ceti dvandvaḥ | "ādi"śabdāt prāṇādimattvādi | puruṣātiśayanirākaraṇa"sādhanaṃ yattu varṇṇyate" |
tatsarvaṃ "pramāṇābhaṃ" pramāṇābhāsamanaikāntikamiti yāvat | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | vipakṣavṛtteḥ sandehena sarvasya śeṣavattvāt | "na hi śeṣavata" ityanaikāntikatvāt | "yathārthe"tyaviparītā "gati"ranumeyapratipattirasti |

[583,3]

"yattvi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yattu puruṣātiśayapratikṣepasādhanantattvagamakameve"ti sambandhaḥ | tatpunaḥ sādhanaṃ | "buddhī"ndriyayogādityādi | kasmādagamakamityāha | "pratikṣe"petyādi | pratikṣepaśca sāmānyaṃ ca "pratikṣepasāmānye" | tayoḥ "sādhane"
tayo"rayogāt" | tathā hi | buddhimattvādinā sādhanena nāsti puruṣātiśaya iti pratikṣepo vā sādhyeta | yadvā yosau puruṣātiśayaḥ sa rathyāpuruṣaiḥ samāna itītarapuruṣasāmānyaṃ sādhyeta |

[583,4]

tatra "na hī"tyādinā pratikṣepasādhanasyābhāvamāha | "na hyatīndriyeṣvartheṣvataddarśino"tīndriyārthādarśinaḥ "pratikṣepaḥ sambhavati" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "satāmapyeṣā"matīndriyāṇāmarthānāmarvāgdarśanasy"ājñānāt" | tasmānnādarśanamātrātpratikṣepa iti bhāvaḥ |

[583,5]

nāpi viruddhavidhānāt puruṣātiśayasya pratikṣepaḥ yasmā"data evā"tīndriyatvādeva puruṣātiśayasya buddhitvādinā hetunā | dvividhasyāpi "virodhasyāsiddheḥ | avirodhinā ca" vaktṛtvādinā puruṣātiśaya"syaikatra sambhavāvirodhādityuktaṃ prāk" |

[584,1]

nāpītyādinā sāmānyasādhanasyābhāvamāha | nāpītareṇārvāgdarśinā puruṣeṇa tasyātiśayavataḥ sāmānyasiddhistulyatāsiddhiḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | atīndriyadarśanādilakṣaṇasya viśeṣasya yo sambhavastasya jñātumaśakyatvāt | īdṛśeṣu ca parasantānavarttiṣu puruṣamātrāpratyakṣeṣvatīndriyārthadarśanādiṣu | yā kācidasambhavapramādhanyanupalabdhirupādīyate | tasyā anupalabdheḥ prāgeva hetutvapratikṣepāt |

[584,2]

kiṃ ca | puṃstvādi sāmyepi yathāsvaṃ saṃskārāt kasyacit prajñāmevāderatiśayadarśanāt tathānyasyāpyatiśayasya sambhāvyatvāt | tasmāt sambhavadviśeṣāḥ purupāsambhavadviśeṣe cetarapuruṣasāmānyāsiddherityapyuktaṃ prāk |

[584,3]

tasmāccheṣavadanumānametad vaktṛtvādyasamartha puruṣātiśayāsambhavapratipādanāya |
vipakṣavṛtteradarśanepi |

[584,4]

yadi nāma vipakṣe puruṣātiśaye vaktṛtvādervṛttinaṃ dṛśyate | tathāpi vādhakābhāvena vyatirekasya sandehādasamartha | api caivaṃvādina iti nāstyatīndriyārthadarśī puruṣa ityevaṃvādino jai mi nī yāḥ svameva vādamiti kathacidatiśayavato jai mi nyādeḥ sakāśād vedārthagatirbhavatīti puruṣātiśayābhyupagamavādaṃ punarnāstyatīndriyārthajñaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścidityanayā svavācā "bidhurayanti" bādhante'tiśayavatpuruṣapratikṣepeṇa vedārthagaterasambhavāt | tathā hi | ayamartho'smākannāyamartha iti svayamvaidikāḥ śabdā na vadanti | tenāgnihotraśabdānāṃ yobhimatorthaḥ sa kalpyo bhavet puruṣai rmī māṃ sa kaiḥ | tacca nāsti | yataste hi puruṣā rāgādisaṃyutā rāgādiyuktāḥ | tato na tatkalpito'rthaḥ pramāṇaṃ |

[584,5]

atha tasya vedārthasya kaści jjai mi nyā di reva vetā kalpyeta | tatraikapuruṣo"bhimatastatvavit" | vedārthatattvajño nānyaḥ puruṣa iti kiṃkṛtaḥ | nātra kiñcit kāraṇamasti mī māṃ sa ka sya puruṣatvāviśeṣāt sarvo vā vetti | na vā kaściditi bhāvaḥ |

[585,1]

atha puruṣatvādisāmyepyasādhāraṇaśaktiyukto vaidikānāṃ śabdānāmatīndriyairartheḥ saha sambandhasya vetā kaścijjai mi nyādiḥ kalpyate | tadā tadvajjaiminyādivat | puṃstve puruṣatve tulyopi kathamapīti nirnimittamanyopi kaścijjñānī jñānātiśayavān | kasmānna vo na yuṣmākamabhimato jai mi nyā divadanyopi jñānavān prasajyata iti yāvat |

[585,2]

netyādinā vyācaṣṭe | eta āgacchata bhavanto brāhmaṇā ayamasmākamartho bhavadbhirgrāhyo nānya ityevaṃvaidikāḥ śabdā na vikrośanti na kathayanti yena tebhyorthagatiḥ syāt | kevalamityavadhāraṇe | anabhivyaktārthaviśeṣasaṃsargā eva śrutiṃ śrotravijñānamabhipatantyārohanti | anabhivyaktorthaviśeṣeṇa saha saṃsargaḥ sambandho yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | tatrājñātārthasambandheṣu śabdeṣu śrutimabhipatatsvekaḥ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ kañcidartha svecchānurūpaṃ kalpayatyanyopi puruṣoparamarthaṃ kalpayatītyanirṇṇaya eva padārthasya |

[585,3]

svābhāvikaḥ śabdānāmarthasambandhastenaikārthapratiniyamo bhaviṣyatītyāha |
netyāha | na ca kaścicchabdānāṃ svabhāvapratiniyamaḥ svabhāvena prakṛtyārthaissaha sambandho yenānekārthakalpanāyāmapi kevalaṃ samayavaśāt tantamarthamāviśanto vācyatvenopādadānā dṛśyante | teṣāmvaidikānāṃ śabdānāṃ kaścit tattvamācaṣṭe nāpara iti na nyāvyamiti sambandhaḥ | kīdṛśānāmaviditārthaniyamānāṃ | aviditorthaniyamo yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇam | atyakṣāveśāt | atīndriyasya svargādisādhanasyārthasya viṣayatvenātmasātkaraṇāt | na hyatīndriyārthasya śabdasyārthaniyamamarvāgdirśanaḥ śakto jñātu | tatrāvidvāneva | rāgādidoṣopaplutaḥ | kaścijjaimi niḥ śa va ra svā mī vā | teṣāṃ śabdānāntattvamācaṣṭe | asyāyamevārtha itināparaḥ | aparopi puruṣo jai mi nyādyaviśiṣṭo na tattvamācaṣṭa iti bhedavyavasthānaṃ na nyāyyamayuktitvāt |

[586,1]

"atha kutaścida"nirdeśyarūpād "buddhīndriyādīnām" | ādiśabdādabhyāsasyātiśayāt kāraṇāt "sa eva" jai mi ni prabhṛtirvedārtha"mvetti nāparaḥ" prākṛtaḥ puruṣa itīṣyate | tadā "tasya" jai mi ni prabhṛteḥ "kutoyamatīndriyajñānātiśayaḥ" | atīndriyasya vedārthatattvasya jñānātiśayonyairaviditatattvairaviśiṣṭasya |

[586,2]

bhavatu vā jai mi ni prabhṛtiḥ puruṣotīndriyārthasya vettā | "tathā" jai mi nyādivada"nyopi" puruṣātiśayo bau ddhā dya bhimato "deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭānāmarthānāṃ draṣṭā | kimasambhavī" | kasmādavidyamāno dṛṣṭo yena pratikṣipyate | sopyatīndriyārthadarśyastvitīṣyatāṃ | na cedabhimatopi jai mi nyādirmā bhūt | "yato na hi tatpratikṣepasādhanāni" | bau ddhā dyabhimatapuruṣātiśayapratikṣepasādhanāni puruṣatvādīni "kānicit" santi | yāni "nainam"vedārthavivekakāriṇaṃ jai mi ni prabhṛtiṃ no"palīyante" | na viṣayīkurvanti | kintūpalīyanta eva | teṣāmapi puruṣatvādiyogāt |

[586,3]

atha puruṣatvādisādhanasambhavepi jaiminyāde"rviśeṣa" iṣyate | tadā "yathāya"matīndriyavedārthavivecanalakṣaṇe "viśeṣosya" jaiminiprabhṛteriṣṭaḥ | "tatsādhanasambhavepī"ti |
tasyātīndriyārthadarśipuruṣapratikṣepasādhanasya puruṣātvādeḥ sambhavepi | "tathānyasyā"pi puruṣasyātīndriyārthadarśanaṃ "syādityanabhiniveśa eva" bhavatāṃ mī māṃ sa kā nāṃ"yuktaḥ" |

[586,4]

nātīndriyārthadarśīti kṛtvā jai mi ni prabhṛtervedārthajñānamiṣṭamapi tu | "yasya"
vākyaṃ "pramāṇasamvādi | sa" puruṣo vedā"rthavid yadī"ṣyate |

[586,5]

jai mi ni prabhṛtereva ca vedārthavivecanaṃ kurvato vacanaṃ pramāṇasamvādīti paro manyate |

[586,6]

netyā dyā cā ryaḥ | nedamuttaraṃ yuktaṃ yasmā"nnahyatyantaparokṣeṣu" vedārtheṣu svargādisādhanatveṣu "pramāṇasyāsti sambhavaḥ" |

[587,1]

"syādeta"dityādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na vayaṃ puruṣaprāmāṇyāḥ kasyaci"jjaiminyāde"rvedavyākhyānamabhiniviṣṭāḥ | kintarhi | pramāṇasamvādād" vyākhyānamabhiniviṣṭāḥ | etadeva vyanakti | "bahuṣvapi" veda"vyākhyātṛṣu" madhye | "yo" vedasya vyākhyātā | yathā vyākhyāterthe "pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ saṃsyandayati" yojayati "sa"
tādṛśo vyākhyātā"numanyate"ṅgīkriyate nānya "iti" |

[587,2]

"tanne"tyādinā pratiṣedhati | dharmādharmāva"dṛṣṭaṃ | ādi"śabdāt svargādisādhakatveṣva"tīndriyeṣu" pratyakṣādi"pramāṇāntarāvṛtteḥ" | na vedārthe kasyacit pramāṇasamvādi vacanaṃ | yasmāt "tada"sambhavā"deva" hi | atyantaparokṣe pratyakṣādipramāṇasyāsambhavādeva hi | "tatpratītyartha"ntasyātīndriyasya pratītyartham"āgamaḥ upayācyate" prārthyate | "anyathe"ti yadyāgamagamyepyarthe pramāṇāntarasamvādādevārthaniścayastadā "satyapi tasmi"nnāgame tadgam"yerthe yadi pramāṇāntarasyāvṛttiḥ" syāt | tadā pramāṇāntarāvṛttāvāgamāt kevalā"dapratipatteḥ | tataśce"ti pramāṇāntarāt"kevalā"dityāgamarahitārtha"pratipatterasādhanamevāgamaḥ syāt" | pramāṇāntarabhāvābhāvābhyāmevārthapratipatterbhāvābhāvāt | "keva"lādāgamanirapekṣā"danyatopi" pratyakṣādeḥ pramāṇāda"tīndri"yerthe "pratipattiḥ"
kintvāgamasahitāt pratyakṣāderatīndriyārtha"pratipattiriti cet" |

[587,3]

"katha"miti si ddhā nta vā dī | "kathamatīndriyaśca nāma" svargādisiddhyupāyaḥ"pratyakṣādiviṣayaśca" virodhāt |

[587,4]

syānmataṃ | naivātyantaparokṣerthe pratyakṣādīnāṃ sādhakatvaṃ kiṃntu "te punaḥ" pratyakṣā"dayaḥ svaviṣayepyā"tmīye viṣayepy"āgamamapekṣyaiva sādhakāścet" tathā cāgamasyaiva prāmāṇyamiti paro manyate |

[587,5]

"anāgametyā"di si ddhā nta vā dī | nāsminnāgamostītya"nāgamognyādipratyayo dhūmāderliṅgānna syāt" |

[588,1]

"ne"tyādi paraḥ | "na vai āgame"tīndriyeṣvartheṣu "pravṛtte" pratyakṣādipramāṇamāgamaviṣaye"nviṣya"te | yenāyandoṣaḥ | syāt |

[588,2]

tataśca kevalāt pratipatterasādhanamevāgamaḥ syāditi | "kintu saivāgamasyā"tīndriyeṣvapi "pravṛttirna jñāyate" | tenāgamapravṛttiḥ pratyakṣādikamapekṣata "iti cet" |

[588,3]

"svaya"mityādiprativacanantadāsya pratyakṣādeḥ svayamatīndriyārtha"prasādhane samarthasya tadāgamopadhā"nantasyāgamasyopadhānaṃ sannidhānaṃ pratyakṣādeḥ "kamatiśayaṃ puṣṇāti"
yenāgamapravṛttimatīndriyerthe jñāpayati |

[588,4]

athātīndriye pratyakṣādyasamarthaṃ | tato "samarthantu" pratyakṣādi "āgamapravṛttimapi naiva sādhayiṣyati" yato yathā svargādisādhakamatīndriyantathā "sā cātīndriye" pratyakṣādinā siddhā | naiva siddhā | yena tadarthaṃ pratyakṣādiranviṣyata iti yatkiñcidetat |

[588,5]

bahuṣvapi vyākhyātṛṣu yaḥ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ saṃsyandayati tasya bhāṣitaṃ gṛhyata iti bruvato pauruṣeyatvādāgamalakṣaṇā"danyaścaivamāgamalakṣaṇaṃ syāt" | etadevāha | "tathā" hītyādi | "yasya" puruṣasya "vacanaṃ pramāṇasamvādi | tatkṛta"ntena puruṣeṇa saṃskṛtaṃ"vaca" āgama "iti prāptaṃ" | vacanasya ca saṃskārastadarthasya pramāṇānugṛhītatvakhyāpanaṃ |
idantadanyadāgamalakṣaṇaṃ | tathā ca "nirarthā" vyarthā'pauruṣeyatā āgamalakṣaṇatveneṣṭā |

[588,6]
