viparyasto"'nṛtamapi brūyāditi" kṛtvā "nāsya" puruṣasya "vacanampramāṇamiti" | "tada"nṛtavāditva"mihāpi" vedārthasampradāyānukrame | jai mi nyādinā puruṣeṇa kriyamāṇe"kinna pratyavekṣate sambhavati na veti" | yasmāt "sa eva" puruṣo rāgādimān jai mi niprabhṛti"rvedamvedārthamvopadiśan" rāgā"dyupaplavāt" kāraṇāda"nyathāpyupadiśediti" mithyārthāśaṃkā naiva nivāryate |

[596,1]

āśaṃkākāraṇānyeva darśayannāha | "śrūyante hī"tyādi "kaiścit puruṣairyā" jña va lkya prabhṛtibhi"rutsannoddhṛtāni" | utsannānyantaritāni santi vedasya "śākhāntarāṇi" | uddhṛtāni smṛtvā smṛtvā punarāracitāni | tāni ca yathātattvaṃ smṛtvoddhṛtānīti kimatra pramāṇaṃ | "idānīmapi kānicid" ā hū ra ka prabhṛtīni śākhāntarāṇi "viralādhyetṛkā"ṇi | svalpādhyetṛkā"ṇi" dṛśyante | te katipayādhyetāro na samāropyopadiśantīti kimatra pramāṇaṃ | yathā viralādhyetṛkāṇi śākhāntarāṇi dṛśyante | "tadvat pracurādhyetṛkāṇāmapi" bahutarādhyetṛkāṇāmapi śākhāntarāṇāṃ "kasmiṃści"dityatikrānte "kāle saṃsārasambhavāt" | alpādhyetṛkatvasambhāvanāsambhavāt | teṣāṃ prāgapi pracurādhyetṛkatve pramāṇābhāvāt | idānīntarhi kathaṃ pracurādhyetṛkāṇi tānītyata āha | "puna"rityādi | "punaḥ" kālāntareṇāptatvena "sambhāvita"sya "puruṣa"sya "pratyayāt" prāmāṇyāt tadanyāsambhāvitapuruṣādhyayanavaiparītyena saṃhṛtānāmadhyetṝṇāṃ "pracuratopagamana"sya bāhulyopagamanasya yā "sambhāvanā"
tasyāḥ "sambhavāda"niścayaḥ |

[596,2]

kiñca | ye te puruṣā viralībhūtāḥ śākhāntarāṇāṃ pratānayitāra"steṣāṃ pratānayitṝṇāmanyathopadeśasambhavā"diti sambandhaḥ | tathā cānāśvāsa ityabhiprāyaḥ |
kīdṛśānāṃ pratānayitṝṇāṃ "kadācidadhītavismṛtādhyayanānāṃ" | adhītaṃ sad vismṛtamadhyayanaṃ yaiste tathoktāḥ | yathādhītaṃ vismṛtāssantaste'nyathāpi pratānayeyurityarthaḥ |
kena kāraṇenetyāha | "anyeṣā"ntadabhiprasannānāmadhyetṝṇāntasminnadhyāpayitari | yā mahatva"sambhāvanā" | ta"syā bhraṃśabhayāt" | yadyahamanyathāpi nopadiśeyaṃ | nūnamete mayyāptasambhāvanāṃ ja"ha"tīti | ādi śabdādāhopuruṣādikāt anyathopa"deśasambhavaḥ" |

[597,1]

pratānayantu nāma te'nyathā | tathāpyadhyetāro na tathā pratipadyerannityāha | "tadi"tyādi | "tasya" sambhāvitasya puruṣasya "pratyayācca" taduktānāṃ | sambhāvitapraṇetṛpuruṣā"bhiprasannānāmavicāreṇa" vedādhyayana"pratipattera"nyathāsaṃpradāyasambhavaḥ | puruṣaprāmāṇyāt pravṛttimeva sādhayannāha | "bahuṣvapyadhyetṛṣu" madhye "sambhāvitāt puruṣād bahulaṃ loke pravṛttidarśanāt" |

[597,2]

nanu sambhāvitāt pratipattau samvāda evetyata āha | "tatopi" sambhāvitāt puruṣāt "kathañcit" kenacit kāraṇena sambhāvanā bhraṃśabhayādinā | "vipralambha"sya visamvādasya "sambhavāt" |

[597,3]

upacayahetumāha | "kiṃce"tyādi | "parimitā"śca te "vyākhyātṛ"pu"ruṣā"śca teṣāṃ"paramparāmevātra" vedavyākhyāne "bhavatāṃ" mī māṃ sa kā nāṃ "śrṛṇumaḥ | tatra" teṣu madhye "kaścid"
vedasya vyākhyātā "dviṣṭādīnāmanyatamaḥ syāt" | kaścid vedadarśane vidviṣṭaḥ sonyathāpyupadiśet | tathā kaścidajñaḥ dhūrtto vā | tathā ca vedavyākhyāyāma"nāśvā"saḥ |

[597,4]

yata eva"ntasmānnā"pauruṣeyād veda"vyākhyānād" vedārthasiddhiḥ | "nāpi sāmayikāt" sāṃketikā"llokavyavahārādvedārthasiddhiḥ" | lokasya rāgādyupaplutatvāt |

[597,5]

bhavantu vā nisargasiddhā vaidikāḥ śabdāssamayanirapekṣāḥ | evamapya"sāmayikatve"bhyupagamyamāne | "vyavahāre nānārthānāṃ" gavādi"śabdānāndarśanāt" | sarvatra vaidikepi śabde na tadāśaṃkā'nivṛtteriti sambandhaḥ | nānārthāśaṃkāyā anivṛtterityarthaḥ |
laukikānāmeva nānārthatvanna vaidikānāmiti cedāha | "kasyacidi"tyādi | tasyāpi vaidikasya "kasyacida prasiddhārtha"syeti yatra śabdaḥ prasiddho nārthastasyā"prasiddhasya" vā svarūpeṇa śabdasya | "punarvyutpattipradarśanen"ārthaḥ kalpanīyaḥ puruṣaiḥ | tathā ca sati punaḥ kiṃ yathā sthitamevārthaṃ puruṣo vaidikānāṃ śabdānāmupadiśati kimvāviparītamiti "sarvatra" nānārthā "śaṅkāyā anivṛtteḥ" |

[597,6]

aniṣṭerthe prayuktā api vaidikāśśabdā na tatra pratītiṃ janayantītyapyayuktaṃ | yataḥ "sarveṣāṃ" śabdānāṃ laukikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca "yathārthanniyogepi" | vīpsāyāmavyayībhāvaḥ | yasmin yasminnarthe niyogassaṃketastasmin satya"pyavaiguṇyena" tatra tatrārthe "yathāsamayaṃ" yathāsaṃketaṃ "pratītijananā"t | na cāniṣṭenyathāpratītijananaṃ | yata"iṣṭāniṣṭayo"rarthayoḥ pratyāsattiviprakarṣābhāvena pratītajananasyā"viśeṣāt" | tataścā"viśiṣṭānāṃ sarvārtheṣu" vaidikānāṃ śabdānāme"kamarthaṃ" kimviśiṣṭa"matyakṣasaṃyogaṃ" |
śabdena saha sambandho yasya sa tathoktaḥ | "anatyakṣadarśini" | arvāgdarśini "puruṣasāmānye ko vivecaye"t | naiva kaścid vivecayet | "yato lokāt pratītiḥ" syāt |

[598,1]

"api ca" | ayaṃ mī māṃ sa kaḥ "svayamapi na sarvatra" vede "prasiddhimanusarati" | yena prasiddhāllokapravādād vedārthagatiḥ syāt | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yasmāt svargorvaśyādiśabdaśca" | svargaśabda urvarśī śabdaḥ | ādiśabdānna nda na va nā di śabdaścā"rūḍhārtha"syāprasiddhārthasya "vācako'nena" vedavādinā "nirvarṇṇyamāno" vyākhyāyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ | tathā hi prākṛta"puruṣātiśāyino" ye "puruṣaṃ" viśeṣāsteṣāṃ "niketaḥ" sthānaṃ |
mānuṣātikrāntaṃ sukhamatimānuṣaṃ tasyā"timānuṣa"sya "sukha"syā"dhiṣṭhāna"māśrayaḥ | nānā prakārāṇyupakaraṇānyupabhogavastūni yasmin | sa "nānopakaraṇaḥ" svarga iti lokapravādaḥ "tannivāsinī" svarganivāsi"nyapsarā urvarśī nāmeti lokapravādaḥ | taṃ" lokapravāda"manā"dṛ"tya" manuṣyeṣveva niratiśayā prītiḥ "svargaḥ" | urvaśī cāraṇiḥ | pātrī vetyādinā | lokaprasiddhādarthā"danyāmevāṃrthakalpanāmayaṃ" jai mi nyādiḥ "kurvāṇo"gnihotrādi"śabdāntare"ṣvarthanirṇṇaye | "kathaṃ prasiddhiṃ pramāṇayet" | naiva pramāṇayediti yāvat |

[598,2]

"tatrā"gnihotrādiśabdeṣu lokaprasiddhārthakalpanāyā "avirodhāt" pratītasyaivārthasyā"bhyupagama iti cet" | svargorvaśyādiśabdeṣu tu prasiddhārthābhyupagame pramāṇaviro dhādanabhyupagama iti paro manyate |

[599,1]

"ne"tyādinā si ddhā nta vā dī | bhedamanantaroktaṃ yujyate | yasmā"datrāpi" svargorvaśyādiśabdeṣu lokaprasiddhe"tīndriye"rthebhyupagamyamāne | pramāṇena "virodhāsiddheḥ"
na hyatra pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā bādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti | "anyatrāpī"tyagnihotrādiśabdeṣvapi lokaprasiddhārthakalpanāyā"mavirodhasya duranvayatvāt" | sādhakapramāṇābhāvena durbodhatvāt |

[599,2]

etadeva sādhayannāha | "viruddhāmapi" yathāprasiddhāma"gnihotrāt sva"rgā"vāpti māndyādayaṃ" jai mi nyā di"rna lakṣayedapi" kadāciditi saṃśayaḥ | kiṃ ca | "virodhāvirodhau ca" nānyāveva | kintarhi | "bādhakasādhakapramāṇavṛttī" |
yathoktasyānupalambhākhyasya bādhakasya pramāṇasya vṛttirvirodhaḥ | sādhakasya pratyayānumānasya pramāṇasya vṛttiravirodhaḥ | te ca virodhavirodhasvabhāve | bādhakasādhakapramāṇavṛttī | "atyakṣe"'tīndriye vastuni "nābhimate" | na hi deśādiviprakṛṣṭeṣu svargādisādhaneṣu bādhakaṃ sādhakaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ pravarttate | yadā "caivantatkathaṃ" naiva"tadvaśā"diti virodhāvirodhavaśāt | virodhavaśāt svargādiśabdeṣu prasiddhārthapratītiravirodhavaśāccāgnihotrādiśabdeṣu prasiddhārtha"pratītiḥ" |

[599,3]

atha mataṃ | na sādhakapramāṇavṛttiravirodhotīndriyerthe kiṃ tvāgamasaṃjñitasyāgnihotrādivacanasya lokaprasiddhārthavācakatvena pravṛttirevāvirodha iti |

[599,4]

ata āha | "na ce"tyādi | lokaprasiddhārthavācakatvenāgnihotrādi"vacanasya pravṛttirevāvirodho na ca" | kiṃ kāraṇam | "anyatrāpi" svargorvaśyādiśabdeṣvapi svargādivācakatvena pravṛtteravirodha"prasaṅgāt" | tathā hi | svargorvaśyādiśabdāḥsthānāpsaroviśeṣādiṣveva pravṛttā loke dṛśyante | tataścāviśeṣādubhayatra prasiddhārthaparigrahostu | na caikatrāpi |

[599,5]

kiṃ ca | "apauruṣeyo" vedākhya "āgamaḥ" sa ca svamarthaṃ svayaṃ na prakāśayati kintu "tasyā"gamasya loka"pravādādarthasiddhi"rabhyupagamyate | "tatra puna"rlokaprasiddhyaṅagīkaraṇepi "virodhacintāyāṃ" kriyamāṇāyāṃ sarva"trāgame'nāśvāsaḥ" syādatīndriye virodhāvirodhayorniścetumaśakyatvāt |

[599,6]

anāśvāsameva sādhayannāha | "satyapī"tyādi | "satyapi tasminna"pauruṣeya āgame | svargādiśabdavācyasya svargādyarthasyātathābhāvāt | "tathābhāvasta"thātvaṃ | yathā lokeprasiddhasvargārthagrahaṇa"matathābhāvāda"prasiddhārthagrahaṇādanyasyāpyagnihotrādiśabdasya "śaṃkanīyatvāt" | kimasya lokaprasiddha evārthaḥ kimvā svargādiśabdavadanya eveti | etadeva kutaḥ | "pramāṇavṛtteḥ" | na hyatra lokaprasiddhārthagrahaṇe pramāṇaṃ pravarttata iti |

[600,1]

"yadukta"mityādi paraḥ | yaduktam | "agnihotraṃ juhuyādityatra" vākye"śvamāṃsabhakṣaṇa"sya "codanā"bhidhānantasya "vikalpaḥ" kalpanā "bhavatviti | sa" doṣo "na bhavati" | kiṃ kāraṇam | vedasyaiva "pradeśāntare tathe"ti bhūtaviśeṣe ghṛtādikaṃ prakṣipedityevamasyāgnihotrādivākyāsyā"rthacarccanāt" | vyākhyānāt |

[600,2]

"ne"tyādi si ddhā nta vā dī | "ne"damuttaraṃ yujyate | "tasya" pradeśāntarasthasya vyākhyābhūtasya vākyasyā"rthāparijñānāt" | tataśca "pradeśāntereṣvapi" vyākhyābhūteṣu"tathārthakalpanāyā" iti | śvamāṃsabhakṣaṇakalpanāyā "anivāryatvāt" |

[600,3]

"yadītyādya"syaiva samarthanaṃ | "yadi hyayamapauruṣeyo" vedākhyaḥ "śabdarāśiḥ kvacit"
pradeśāntare "viditārthaḥ syāt tadā tato" viditārthāt pradeśāntarāt pariśiṣṭa"syārthapratītiḥ syāt" | yāvatā "te tu" vaidikāḥ śabdā "bāhulyepyapa"rijñānārthatvādandhā"eva sarva iti" kṛtvā puruṣeṇa ya"theṣṭaṃ praṇīyante" vyākhyāyante |

[600,4]

yata eva"ntasmācchabdāntareṣu tādṛkṣvi"ti | agnihotraṃ juhuyādityādi vākyānāmvyākhyābhūteṣu "tādṛśyevāstu kalpanā" | kīdṛśī | ityāha | "yādṛśyagnihotrañjuhuyātsvargakāma ityasya" kalpanā kṛtā pradeśāntarepi śvamāṃsabhakṣaṇakalpanāstviti yāvat |

[600,5]

"api ca prasiddhiśca" nānyadeva kiṃcit | kintarhi | "nṛṇāṃ" puruṣāṇāṃ "vādaḥ" vādaḥ "pramāṇanneṣyate" bhavatā | sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ rāgādyupaplutatvāt | "bhūya"
iti punaḥ | "tataśca" lokapravādādapramāṇatvena pūrvaṃ vyavasthāpitāt punarvedā"rthagati"riti yugapa"tkimetadviṣṭakāmitaṃ" | yadeva vastvapramāṇatvena dviṣṭaṃ | tadeva punaḥ pratipattihetutvena kāmitamabhilaṣitamiti parasparavirodhaḥ |

[601,1]

"na prasiddhirnāmānyā janapravādāt" | kintu janapravāda eva prasiddhiḥ | "te ca sarve janā asambhāvanīyayāthātathyavacanā" asambhāvanīyaṃ yāthātathyamaviparītatvaṃ yasmin vacane | tadasambhāvanīya"yāthātathyaṃ vaca"naṃ yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "rāgāvidyāparītatvāt" | rāgāvidyābhyāṃ vyāptatvāt | "ta"diti tasmā"deṣāṃ"
janānāṃ "pravādo na pramāṇaṃ" |

[601,2]

bāhulyājjanasya tatpravādaḥ pramāṇamityapi mithyā | yataḥ | "na hi" bahūnāṃ janānāmmadhye "kasyacide"kasy"āpi" puruṣasya "samyakpratipatterabhāve" sati lokasya"bāhulyamarthavad" bhavati prayojanavad bhavati | kimiva | "pā ra sī ke"tyādi | yathā bahubhiḥ pārasīkai"rmātari" maithunācaraṇānna tannyāyyambhavati | evaṃ bāhulyepi rāgādimatāmatīndriyerthe vacanamapramāṇameveti |

[601,3]

atha "teṣāmeva" rāgādimatāṃ "puruṣāṇāṃ vacanāt punaḥ parokṣa"syāgnihotrādiśabdavācyasyārthasya pratipattiriti | "kathantadeva yugapade"kasminneva kāle "dveṣyaṃ ca kāmyaṃ ca" yujyate |

[601,4]

agnihotrādiśabdasya yasminnarthe loka"prasiddhi"stā"mullaṃdhya" tyaktvā | tatorthāntarasya śvamāṃsabhakṣaṇādeḥ "kalpane na nibandhanaṃ" kāraṇamiti | tasmāt prasiddhireva gṛhyata ityetadapyayuktaṃ | yataḥ "prasiddherapramāṇatvāt tadgrahe" prasiddhigrahe"kinnibandhanaṃ" | naiva kiñciditi prasiddherapi graho mābhūditi |

[602,1]

"prāptye"tyādinā pūrvārddhantāvad vyācaṣṭe | prasiddhyā "prāpta"syārthasya "pratilomanena"
tyāgenānyatrāprasiddherthe"pravṛttirguṇadoṣadarśane" sati "yuktā" | yadi prāpterthe doṣadarśanaṃ syādaprāpte ca guṇadarśanaṃ | na cāgnihotrādiśabdānāṃ prasiddherthe doṣadarśanamastyaprasiddhe vā guṇadarśanantataḥ "prasiddhe"revā"nvayonu"gamana"miti cet" |

[602,2]

"ne"tyādinā pratiṣedhati | etacca paścārddhasya vivaraṇaṃ | "naita"devaṃ | kiṃṅkāraṇaṃ | "prāpteḥ pramāṇavṛttilakṣaṇatvāt" | sādhakena hi pramāṇenārthasya prāptirniścīyata iti prāpteḥ pramāṇavṛttilakṣaṇatvamucyate | na ca prasiddhiḥ pramāṇaṃ yena siddhortho nyāyaprāptaḥ syāt | tataśca tāmenāṃ "prasiddhimapramāṇayato" mī māṃ sa ka sya"tanmukhena" prasiddhidvāreṇāgnihotrādiśabdavācyasyārthasya yā "pratītiḥ" sā yatkiñcanaḥ grahaṇamapramāṇakatvāt | yathākathañcit tadgrahaṇamityarthaḥ |

[602,3]

tataścāgnihotrādiśabdasya lokaprasiddhortho nyāyaprāpto na bhavatītyevaṃ "nyāyā"llokaprasiddhasyārthasya "prāptipratiṣedhāt" kāraṇādagnihotrādiśabdānāmicchayārthaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ |

[602,4]

tatra mī māṃ sa kairagnihotrādiśabdānāṃ yorthaḥ parikalpyate dahanadravyādilakṣaṇo yaśca pareṇa śvamāṃsabhakṣaṇalakṣaṇastayoḥ "svaparavikalpayorubhayathā"pīti yadi prasiddhyanupālanamatha nānupālanantathāpi pramāṇābhāvādicchayā parigrahe "tulyā vṛtti"riti kṛtvā "kaḥ prasiddhānurodho" yena prasiddherarthakalpanā kriyate |

[602,5]

"api ca | prasiddhyai"va sarva"śabdā"nā"marthaniścaye" | iyannānārthatvena "śaṃkotpāditā" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "yasmānnā"vṛttitvamagnyādi"śabdānāntatra" prasiddhau"dṛśyate" |

[602,6]

"ne"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "na prasiddhe"ssakāśā"dekārthaniścayaḥ śabdā"nāmvaidikānāṃ |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tata eva" prasiddhereva "śaṃkotpatteḥ" | tathā hi "nānārthā" agnyādi"śabdā loke dṛśyante" | tacca nānārthadarśanaṃ lokavādo "lokapravādaśca pratītirata eva"lokavādā"nnā" kṛtvā "tato" lokavādād vaidikānāṃ śabdānāmekārtha"niyamo " |

[603,1]

aniyatārthatvameva draḍhayannāha | "anyathe"tyādi | "svayaṃ" svabhāvato "nānāśak"teranekārthapratipādanayogyasya dhvaneḥ śabdasyā"nyathāsambhavābhāvāt" | abhimatādarthādarthāntare vṛttiranyathā | tasyā arthāntaravṛtterasambhavonyathā'sambhavastasyābhāvāt | pratiṣedhadvayena vidherabhyupagamādanyathāpi sambhavasya bhāvāditi yāvat | tataścātīndriyārthavṛttiṣu vaidikeṣu śabdeṣ"vavaśyama"nekārthavṛttitvena "śaṃkayā bhāvyaṃ" | keṣāṃ "niyāmakamapaśyatāṃ" puṃsāṃ pratiniyataviṣayasādhakaṃ pramāṇamapaśyatāṃ | 326

[603,2]

yata eva"ntasmād | aviditaḥ arthavibhāgo" yeṣāmiti vigrahaḥ | "teṣva"viditārthavibhāgeṣu "śabdeṣvekamartha"mabhimataṃ | kiṃ bhūtam | "atyakṣasaṃyogaṃ" |
atyakṣotīndriyassaṃyogaḥ śabdena saha sambandho yasyeti vigrahaḥ | ālambanaṃ pramāṇantadabhā"vādanālambano" niḥpramāṇaka"ssamāropo" yasya sa tathoktaḥ | "tamevaṃ"
bhūtamartha"mviniścatya vyācakṣāṇo jai mi niḥ | tadvyājeneti" veda evaṃ prāheti vedopakṣepeṇa "svameva matamāheti" kṛtvā yastīrthakaro nirvyājamevamāha |
ahameva svayamvadāmīti | tasmāt "tīrthakarāntarādasya" jai mi ne"rna viśeṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ" |

[603,3]

aviśeṣameva sādhayannāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | sa cāsāvarthaśceti "tadartha"stasya prakāśana"mvacanaṃ" | tatra "vyāpāra"ssāmarthyantena "śūnyasya" rahitasya vedasya | "tatsamāropeṇe"tyarthaprakāśanavyāpārasamāropeṇa... ... ...evamvaktīti yada"bhidhāna"nta... ... ... svavacanameva tasya taditi yāvat | "tatkāriṇā" vacanavyāpāraśūnye vederthaprakāśanavyāpārasamāropakāriṇā jai mi ni nā "kevalammithyāvinītataivātmanaḥ samuddyotitā syāt" | na tu pauruṣeyād vacanādasya viśeṣaḥ |

[604,1]

etadeva sphuṭayannāha | "tathā hī"tyādi | kaḥ panthā pā ṭa li pu traṃ gacchatīti pṛṣṭaḥ "kaścana" puruṣa āha | na jāne svayamahaṃ kevalame"ṣa sthāṇurayaṃ mārga iti vaktī"tyevameko mārgopadeśasāmarthyaśūnyasthāṇuvyājena mārgamācaṣṭe | "anya"stvāha | na sthāṇorvacanasāmarthyamastyahameva "svayaṃ" jñātvāyaṃ mārga iti "bravīmīti | tayore"vamabhidadhatoḥ svayamvacana"bhedaḥ parīkṣyatāṃ" yadyasti naivāstītyabhiprāyaḥ |

[604,2]

"nirabhiprāya" ityādinā vyācaṣṭe | abhiprāya idaṃ cedaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti cetanā |
tatpūrvakaḥ prayatno vyāpāraḥ | "abhiprāya"śca "vyāpāra"śca "vacanaṃ" ca | tāni "na" vidyante yasminsa tathoktaḥ | "tasmi"nnevambhūte "sthāṇau" mārgaprakāśakatvaṃ "samāropyopadiśata"
ekasya puṃsaḥ "svatantrasya vā" sthāṇunirapekṣasyāparasya mārgamupadiśata iti samba"ndhaḥ" | etayordvayoḥ puruṣayoḥ svayamva"canopagame na kaścidviśeṣonyatra jaḍasya pratipattimāndyāt" jaḍasya śrotuḥ pratipattimāndyameva viśiṣyate | yatobhiprāyādi śūnyasya sthāṇorvacanaṃ pratipadyate sthāṇureva vaktīti | evaṃ jai mi nervedavyājena svamataṃ bruvato jaḍaḥ pratipattimāndyāt veda evaṃ brūta iti pratipadyate |

[604,3]

"api ca" vaidikasya śabdasyai"kārtha"prati"niyame satyena"mekārthapratiniyamaṃ "jai mi nirjānīyā"t | yāvatā "śabdasya vācaka"sya "sarvatrā"rthe vācakatvena "yogyasyaikārthadyotane niyatiḥ kuto" naiva | "na hi śabdasya kaścidarthaḥ svabhāvena" nisargasiddhyā "niyato"sti |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "sarvatra" vācyerthe "yogyatvā"cchabdasya |

[604,4]

atha punarna yogyatā sarvatrārthe śabdasya tadā"pyayogyatve ca tadapracyute"rayogyatāsvabhāvānnityasya śabdasyāpracyuteḥ kāraṇāt "puruṣāṇāmavidheyas"yānāyattasya"kvacidarthe upanayana"mvācakatvena niyojanaṃ | niyuktasyāpya"panayanaṃ" | nedānīmayaṃ śabdo vācaka iti tas"yāsambhav"āt | bhavati ca | tasmāt sarvatra śabdā yogyāityekārthadyotanaṃ nāsti |

[605,1]

bhavatu vā vaidikānāmekārthaniyamastathāpyatīndriyamarthaniyamaṃ puruṣo jñātumaśaktaḥ | tadevāha | "jñātā vātīndriyā arthāḥ kena" puruṣeṇa | na hi mī māṃ sa kotīndriyārthadarśinaṃ kañcidicchati | "vivakṣāvacanād ṛte" | vivakṣāyāḥ prakāśanamvacanamvivakṣāvacanantena vinā | vakturabhiprāyakathanamantareṇātīndriyā naiva kenacijjñātā ityarthaḥ |

[605,2]

"puruṣe"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | ka"yācid vivakṣayā puruṣe"ṇa "praṇīte" uccārite "śabde"
sa puruṣastāmvivakṣāṃ "kadācit" kvacicchrotari "nivedayedi"daṃ mayā vācyatvena vivakṣita"miti | vivakṣāpūrvakāṇāṃ śabdānāmarthe niyamaḥ pratīyetāpi | apauruṣeye tu" śabde vivakṣāpūrvaṃ kenacidaprayukte "vidyamānopyarthaniyamaḥ kathaṃ jñeyaḥ" | naiva kathaṃcit |
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | s"vabhāvabhedasyābhāvā"t | na hi vaidikasya śabdasya kaścit svabhāvo bhinnosti sa ekatrābhimaterthe niyato yaddarśanādiṣṭārthapratītiḥ syāt | "satya"pi "vā" svabhāvabhede sa svabhāvabhedaḥ pratyakṣo vā syādapratyakṣo vā | na tāvatpratyakṣaḥ | kiṅkāraṇaṃ | "pratyakṣasya" svabhāvasyopadeśanirapekṣasya | "svayaṃ pratītiprasaṃgāt" | athāpratyakṣaḥ | "apratyakṣatvepi" pramāṇāntarasyābhāvena "kenaci"dapyarvāgdarśanena "jñātumaśakyatvāt" |

[605,3]

abhyupagamyaitaduktaṃ | "na cāsti kaścid viśeṣo" ya ekārthapratiniyataḥ | "sarvaśabdā hi sarvārthapratyāsattiviprakarṣarahitāḥ" |

[605,4]

na hi kecicchabdāḥ kvacidarthe pratyāsannā viprakṛṣṭā vā "bhāvato"'pi tu "teṣāṃ"
śabdānāṃ sarvārtheṣu svabhāvatastulyānāmekārthaniyame vaktu"rvivakṣā hetuḥ | saṃketastatprakāśana" iti tasyāśca vivakṣāyāḥ prakāśanaḥ saṃketaḥ | tathā hyayamarthaḥ tena vivakṣita iti saṃketādavagamyate | "sā" ca vivakṣā"pauruṣeye" śabde "nāstī"ti kṛtvā"tasyā"pauruṣeyasya śabdasya "sā" yathoktā "ekārthatā kutaḥ" | naiva |

[606,1]

"vivakṣā hī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "vivakṣayā" hetubhūtayā "śabdortheṣu niyamyate" 'syaivārthasyāyaṃ vācaka iti | "na" tu "svabhāvataḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" śabdasya kvacid vastunya"pratibandhe"na sambandharahitatvena kāraṇena "sarvatrā"rthatu"lyatvāt | yatrāpi"
śabdasya "pratibandhaḥ" sthānakaraṇeṣu tataḥ śabdānāmutpatterabhivyaktervā | teṣāmapi karaṇānāṃ "sarvaiḥ śabdai"ra"bhidhānaniyamabhāvāt" | na hi sarve śabdāḥ "karaṇānā"me"vābhidhāya"kāḥ | karaṇābhidhāyī punaḥ śabdaḥ karaṇāni pratipādayedapīti sarvagrahaṇaṃ |

[606,2]

yata eva"ntasmād vivakṣāprakāśanāya saṃketaḥ kriyate" | kīdṛśaḥ | "abhiprāyanivedanalakṣaṇaḥ" | vakturabhiprāyaprakāśanalakṣaṇaḥ | "apauruṣeye" tu śabde "na vivakṣā" niyāmikā | "nā"pi "saṃketa"statprakāśanaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | puruṣanivṛttereva"kasyacidabhiprāyasyābhāvāditi" kṛtvā "nai"kārtha"niyamo" vaidikānāṃ śabdānāṃ | niyame vā | "na tajjñānaṃ" naikārthapratiniyamajñānaṃ kasyacit | arthe svabhāvata ekārthaniyatā vaidikāḥ śabdā na vivakṣātaḥ |

[606,3]

tadā "svabhāvaniyame"bhyupagamyamāne sa śabdo"nyatrārthe tayā" vivakṣayā "na viyujyate" |

[606,4]

"yadī"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "yadi saṃketanirapekṣaḥ svabhāvata eva śabdortheṣu nilīno"
yuktaḥ "syāt | uktama"trottaraṃ | "kvacidvastunyapratibandhādaniyata" iti |

[606,5]

"api ca | svābhāvikena" nisargasiddhe "vācyavācakabhāve"'bhyupagamyamāne | "na punarvivakṣayā yatheṣṭaṃ" śabdonyatrārthe "niyujyate" | na hi rūpaprakāśane svabhāvato niyataṃ cakṣuḥ śabdaprakāśane niyoktuṃ śakyate | niyujyate ca yatheṣṭaṃ śabdaḥ | tasmānna svabhāvaniyataḥ | hastasaṃjñādivat | svabhāvatorthapratiniyame śabdānāṃ "saṃketaśca" niṣphalaḥ syāt | yato "na hi svabhāvabhedaḥ" svabhāvaviśeṣa "indriyagamyaḥ svapratītau paribhāṣādikaṃ" | paribhāṣā saṃketaḥ | ādiśabdāt saṃketasmṛtyādiparigrahaḥ |
kimiva | "nīlādibhedavat" | yathā nīlādiviśeṣāḥ svapratītau saṃketādikaṃ nāpekṣante tadvat | "tadapekṣapratītayastu" saṃketāpekṣapratītayastu ye | te "na vastusvabhāvāḥ" | na vastuno nisargasiddhāḥ viśeṣāḥ | "kintarhi | sāmayikāḥ" saṃketakṛtāḥ | kimiva | "rājacihnādivat" | yathā rājñā svapratītaye samitā dhvajādayaścinhabhedāḥ | ādiśabdāddhastasaṃjñādiparigrahaḥ | "ya"śca "sāmayika"ssa "svabhāvaniyato yuktaḥ" | nisargasiddho na "yuktaḥ" | kiṃ kāraṇaṃ | "tasya" sāmayikasya puruṣasya puruṣe"ccha"yā "pravṛtteḥ" |

[607,1]

vaidikasya śabdasyārthe nisargata eva svabhāvaviśeṣo niyataḥ sa tu saṃketena vyajyata iti ced |

[607,2]

āha | "ata evet"yādi | yasmādicchāvṛttissaṅketo"'ta eva" kāraṇāt | "saṃketā"dekārthaniyatasya "svabhāvaviśeṣasya vyaktau niyatiḥ kutaḥ" | naiva |

[607,3]

[608,1]

[608,2]

"anyastvi"tyādinā vyācaṣṭe | "anyastu" mīmāṃsakaḥ | yathoktadoṣopahatatvāt | "apauruṣeyamāgamalakṣaṇaṃ parityajyānyathā prāmāṇyamvedasya sādhayitukāmaḥ prāha |

[608,3]

uttaramāha | "tasye"tyādi | "tasya" vādina "idaṃ" sādhanaṃ śeṣavat | kasmād | "vyabhicāritvāt | īdṛśama"numānaṃ "nyāyavidā" ācārya di gnā ge na pra mā ṇa sa mu cca ye prati"kṣipta"miti sambandhaḥ | kimiva śeṣavadityāha | "rasavadi"tyādi | yathā | svāditena phalena tu"lyarūpatvāda"nāsvāditamapi phalaṃ tulyamityetadanumānaṃ śeṣavat |

[608,4]

"sva"yamityādinā vyākhyānaṃ | "īdṛśamanumānaṃ svayamācāryeṇā"sādhanamuktamitisambandhaḥ | kva | "nai yā yi kā" nāṃ "śeṣavadanumāna"sya "vyabhicāramudbhāvayatā"
pra mā ṇa sa mu cca ye | kimiva | yathā "tulyarūpatayā" hetubhūtayā'nāsvāditānāmapi "phalānā"māsvāditaphalena | "tulyarasasādhanavat | ekasthālyantargamāditi ca"

arthakriyāsamarthaṃ hi vastu | taccārthakriyāsāmarthyamakṣaṇikasya na sambhavatītyasadeva | tatkutastasya vastudharmaḥ | "apratyakṣāṇyeva sāmānyā"dīnīti | ādiśabdāt kriyāguṇādīni "pratyakṣāṇīt"yāha vedaḥ | "janma" ca "sthi"tiśca "ni" tāśca bhāvānā"mviṣamāḥ" prāha vedaḥ | janmano vaiṣamyeṇa viṣayo heturbhāvānāmuktaḥ sūtre |

[612,6]

evaṃ sambandhādyabhidhānāni ca śāstradharmānapradarśy"ātyantaprasiddhaviṣayasatyārthatābhidhānamātreṇe"tyatyantaprasiddho viṣayo vahneḥ śītāpanodasāmarthyaṃ tasyābhidhānaṃ satyantena satyābhidhānamātreṇa | prajñāprakarṣeṇāpi duḥkhenāvagāhyata iti "prajñāprakarṣaduravagrāhaḥ | ta"ta eva "gaha"nanta"rsmiṃ"stathābhūtepiviṣaye'tyantaparokṣepīti yāvat | "niratyayatāṃ" satyārthatāṃ "sādhayitukāmo" mī māṃ sa ko ba"ndhakīmapi prāgalbhyena"
dhārṣṭyena "vijayate" | yādṛśīñca bandhakīmvijayate tāṃ "kañci"dityādinā darśayati | "bandhakī" duścāriṇī | "svayaṃ svāminā vipratipattisthāne dṛṣṭe"ti vipratipattyavasthāyāndṛṣṭvā parapuruṣeṇa saṅgatā tvamityu"pālabdhā" satī | "sā taṃ" svāminaṃ"pratyuvāca" | pratyu tta... ... | kathaṃ pratyuvācetyāha | "paśyatai"tyādi | pārśvasthāḥ striyo māta ityanenāmantryante | "mātaḥ paśyata puruṣasya"
madīyasya svāmino "vaiparītyaṃ" | nanu paśyateti loḍmadhyamapuruṣabahuvacanāntametat |
tataśca mātṛśabdādapi bahuvacanameva yuktammātara iti | tatraike pratipannā mātṛśabdenāmantritaikavacanāntena samānārtho mātaḥ śabdosti | vi... ... svarapratirūpakāśca nipātā ityanena nyāyena | sa cāvyayatvāt sarveṣu vacaneṣu tulyarūpa iti bahuvacanenāpi paśyata śabdena sambadhyamāno mātarityeva prayukta iti | anye tu paśyata mātaraḥ puruṣasyeti paṭhanti | dharmasya sādhanabhūtā patnī dharmapatnīti madhyapadalopī samāsaḥ | "mayi dharmapatnyāṃ pratyayamakṛtvā ātmīyayorja"labudbuda... ddhāñ"jalabudbudyo"rdvayornetrābhidhānayoḥ ka"roti" pratyayamiti prakṛtaṃ | netramityabhidhānaṃ yayoriti vigrahaḥ | parapuruṣeṇāsaṃgateḥ kāraṇamāha | "tene"tyādi | jaraṃścāsau kāṇaśceti "jaratkāṇaḥ" | vṛddhakāṇenetyarthaḥ | tatra jaradgrahaṇena vayovaikalyamuktaṃ | paraṃ rūpasthānaṃ cakṣuriti tadvaikalyāt kāṇagrahaṇena vairūpyaṃ | "grāmya"grahaṇena vaidagdhyādiguṇavaikalyaṃ | "kāṣṭhahāraka"grahaṇena kṛcchrajīvitvāt dāridryamuktaṃ |
tadevaṃ vṛddhatvādiguṇayuktena puruṣeṇa saṅgatyarthaṃ "prārthitāpi" satī | "n"āhantena saha "saṅagatā" prāk | "rūpaguṇānurāgeṇa" | rūpaṃ prāsādikatā | guṇo vaidagdhyādiko dharmaḥ | rūpaguṇayoranurāgobhilāṣastena hetunā | "maṃtrimukhyadārakaṃ" mantripradhānadārakaṃ yuvānaṃ putraṃ | mantrimukhyaścāsau dārakaśceti vigrahaḥ | tamevaṃbhūtaṃ dārakaṃ "kāmayehamiti" kathamidaṃ sambhāvyate | tatra vṛddhādidoṣacatuṣṭayavaiparītyena mantrimukhyadārake guṇacatuṣṭayamuktaṃ | rūpagrahaṇena prāsādikatvaṃ guṇagrahaṇena vaidagdhyādiḥ | mantrimukhyagrahaṇenaiśvaryaṃ | dārakagrahaṇena vayoguṇaḥ | etacca bandhakyā dhārṣṭyāt preritameva kevalasvamvacanaṃ na tu yuktiyuktaṃ | rūpādīnāmeva kāmahetutvānna tu vārddhakyādīnāṃ |

[614,1]

"evaṃjātīyaka"mityādinā dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ dārṣṭāntike yojayati | "evaṃjātīyakami"ti bandhakīprativacanatulyaṃ | "etadatyantaparokṣerthe" vedasyā"visamvādānumānaṃ" |
kimbhūtasya vedasya śakyavicāre vastuni "dṛṣṭapramāṇavirodhasya" | dṛṣṭaḥ pramāṇavirodhosyeti vigrahaḥ | vahniśītanodanadṛṣṭāntenānumānaṃ | vahneḥ "śītapratīkāravacanena" | yathāgnirhimasya bheṣajamiti vākyamavisamvādi | tathānyadapi vedavākyamavisamvādīti |

[615,1]

bhaṭṭodyotakarādiṣu pravicayo yeṣāṃ mahān vidyatesadvastvākaradharmakīrtijaladherantarnimagnammanaḥ | paurvāparyavimarṣiṇī smṛtiralaṃ prajñāpi cotkarṣiṇīyatkiñcid gadintadatra nipuṇaistaireva vijñāsyate || arthotkhātaparamparāsu mahatī vācaḥ prasannātmatāyasyāmanyasubhāṣitā'... ... ... ...tiḥ | darpādhmātasamastatīrthikamatadhvaṃsaśca saṃvedyateṭīkeyaṃ suvilakṣaṇoditadhiyāmāvarjanīyā kathamiti || 0 ||
